comment: easy and fast

We traveled from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap by Seila Angkor van. The driver was professional and it was a smooth ride. It took us only 5 hours to get to Siem Reap (including one short stay at gas station and lunch break at Kompong Thom for 30 minutes).
Booking tickets thru bookmebus.com is always easy and reliable. My guests were fetched at the guesthouse as requested. Travelling with Virak Buntham transport makes my guests feel safe.
In Mekong express There was no wifi. The driver was running very very fast and after all we did 5,45h and not 5h which was said to internet page.overal:worse trip ever.
Trip went smoothly, border crossing was easy, food and beverage provided. Free tuk tuk ride to hostel if you want it, i didn't use it but others did. Happy with service. Would use again.
Best bus i had in cambodia. Very professionel.
Clean and well temperatures bus, comfort was ok. Very fast driving with a lot of overtaking but i I still felt safe.
The roads were very scary.

My wife and I am very happy with the service we received from your company. The bus was comfortable, breakfast and lunch served were more than satisfactory and the two young stewards were very helpful especially at the border crossing. Thank you very much
Wonderful trip. V. Good bus. Excellent driver and stewards and food on board. Thank you very much.

The booking process was surprisingly easy, but I feel like the credit card fee is a bit harsh. They guys I was chatting with were very helpful until I asked for a new pdf file for my e-ticket as the one they sent was showing some kind of booking mistake.

The booking process was surprisingly easy, but I feel like the credit card fee is a bit harsh. They guys I was chatting with were very helpful until I asked for a new pdf file for my e-ticket as the one they sent was showing some kind of booking mistake.

Dangerous driving, doesn't feel safe as the driver was speeding and overtaking slower moving vehicles even there are oncoming vehicles on the opposite direction.  Although we arrived earlier than expected, I would prefer a safer than fast journey.

Dangerous driving!  The driver was speeding and overtaking slower moving vehicles in a dangerous manner even when there are oncoming traffic on the left lane. Although we arrived earlier than expected, I would prefer a safer journey instead.

The seats were very nice and comfortable, but driver was terrible. The AC was cold and when we asked him to turn it down he rudely refused. He stopped us at a bakery then again at a restaurant 30 minutes later so were 90 minutes late. No baggage ticket.

The staff was very kind, helpful and explained im a god english the whole border crossing procedure. Howevwr the bus was not what we expected. It was and old and not so comfortable bus, seems at least 30 years old. The delay was due to Viet border staff.

The bus arrived an hour and a half late. Both of our seats were broken. Employees told us misleading instrutions at border. And we've  been  dropped off in the middle of a busy street!!!  We should have took the plane instead. I dont  recommand it at all.
Really great! Even little bit faster than expected :)

Apart from the Restroom at the Siem Reap Bus Station which desperately needs some maintenance, I can only highly recommend the Nattakan Bus Service to everyone who plans to travel from Siem Reap to Bangkok or vice versa! Much easier and more comfortable t
Great service as always. Arrived earlier than scheduled after a comfortable journey.

Excellent value and professionalism overall. Cambodia POST VIP Van departed and arrived on time. Comfortable seats. Stopped 2 times for using the bathroom or eating/drinking. Great way to travel across Cambodia...post office to post office!
I enjoyed the ride to Siem Reap from Phnom Penh. Well equipped bus, received water and snack, good service, modern bus, WIFI, electricity and A/C. I would choose PSD Express every time again.

We booked a pick up from the hotel (confirmed via email) but no one ever showed up, so we missed the bus and went to the bus station ourselves where the guy in charge told us that he does not receive pick up requests from the headquarters. Big joke.

There was no aircondition in the bus. Its overall condition was really bad. The bus had a 2 hour delay at the pickup because it picked up a wrong passenger at first and had to drop her off later. We missed the ferry we were planning to take.

BookMeBus sold me a direct night bus that was suppose to take 10h that finally has a connection and took 13h, making me rush for my connection and finish up my night on the floor of a shitty Terminal. When asked, BookMeBus never replied. never again.

BookMeBus sold me a direct night bus that was suppose to take 10h that finally has a connection and took 13h, making me rush for my connection and finish up my night on the floor of a shitty Terminal. When asked, BookMeBus never replied. never again.
old, shitty bus - door did not open after stop in Kampong Thom... punctuality okay, traffic is not their fault. service good, but there are way better and more modern busses.
Very good and welcoming service !

The bus was in total 2hrs late  (initial departure time 1.15 pm. Final time 3.00pm)
The driver didn't speak a word of English and couldn't tell me which stop to get off
Bus wasn't cleaned and still had rubbish from previous trip
Too expensive for value

I always take Seila Express. The only thing that worried me is that the bus driver drove too close to other cars and I was worried that he wouldn't have enough time to stop. However, he did better when we were away from the city and the highway was clear.

I always take Seila Express. The only thing that worried me is that the bus driver drove too close to other cars and I was worried that he wouldn't have enough time to stop. However, he did better when we were away from the city and the highway was clear.

I always take Seila Express. The only thing that worried me is that the bus driver drove too close to other cars and I was worried that he wouldn't have enough time to stop. However, he did better when we were away from the city and the highway was clear.

The bus ride was great. Left 5 minutes late, but still got to Battambang on time. I had booked my ticket earlier, but they said that there were no seats left for me. I ended up sitting on a seat in the aisle. It was OK, but I was thankful to get a ride.

I had a direct night bus ticket with that company that ended up having a connection, finishing my night on a hard bench... Because of this, we were 3 hours late and I nearly miss my ferry. Of course, Virak Buntham never apologize or offer anything.

I had a direct night bus ticket with that company that ended up having a connection, finishing my night on a hard bench... Because of this, we were 3 hours late and I nearly miss my ferry. Of course, Virak Buntham never apologize or offer anything.
The back seat it built for kids.

The ticket said 7.30. You guys recommend being there 30 min before.  The boat actually left around 8.30. Before The long boatride I had to wait 1.5h. 
The legroom on The boat is bad.
The toilet is really bad.
The number of lifevests is bad.

A good service in the sense that it made the border crossing easy. However the advertised time for arrival was wrong by several hours. It was also inconvenient to have a long scheduled lunch break in Stung Treung.
Worst bus company ever. Dont use this company!

Overall, service is good. Less hassle too. Bus conductor  is very accommodating and we were on time. The only thing is, the bus toilet smells so bad. Even if the door is closed, I can still smell the toilet. Toilet is awful.
Good on time

Excellent and safe driver, no excessive speed.  The seats were comfortable, and the border transit was very well managed. The en-route meal was very good, far better than on Thai railway from Bangkok to Chiang Mai.

Driver could be a racer. We were racing 50% on the left lane.... Insane maneuvers. 
We have booked 2 seats that have been taken already.  No help from staff to get our reserved seats. Bus was okay. We were on time and we were dropped at the airport.

i wait a lot of time at the hotel
The bus was not the bus i shaw
Just under my head the fan was broken
So i was cold along the travel
Good
Driver made a disgusting noise the whole way. Bus was boiling hot. No wifi as advertised. Would choose a different company next time.

I booked for a dobbeltbed. I got two singels. That was really a problem because me and my boyfriend could't ly together, and he is 200 cm so that was really a problem. I confronted the staff, but they didnt do anything.

Great journey! Had heard lots of bad stories of bus journeys across the borders into Cambodia but we had no troubles on this journey! Bus was spacious and clean! Staff were very friendly and helpful when it came to approaching the border! Highly recommend

We booked two seats on a 11 seater van and picked the last row, it was very crowded even for a small sized Asian female.  Only three seats should fit in the last row as in the other two rows but instead 4 seats were fitted in and that made it so crowded.

The bus driver is not friendly & keeps on shouting at passengers using Thai. I also ask for them to drop us at a place nearby our hotel but they didn't even notify me that we could go down at a place along the highway where one couple was dropped.

The driver nearly crashed with a car in oncimming traffic when trying to overtake a truck. The driver took many risks when driving.
There was not enough room for everyones luggage and we ended up having to cram it in between seats. No WiFi at all.

The driver nearly crashed with a car in oncimming traffic when trying to overtake a truck. The driver took many risks when driving.
There was not enough room for everyones luggage and we ended up having to cram it in between seats. No WiFi at all.

I was very pleased with bus and service overall, however when arriving in sihanoukville we were not dropped at the bus station but left outside of town forcing me to spend 5 dollars on a taxi. Before this I was extremely pleased with the journey.

Driver drove us to Han Tien border, we crossed the border and then waited for the driver to show up... for 1,5 hours. Somebody of the locals then organised further transport, driver never showed up again. Missed ferry. Transport minivan in bad condition.

We payed the transfer from the boat to siem reap at Phnom Penh but the driver asked 5$ mire un siem reap. Not professional and disapointing. 
Travel Easy, landscape not do beautifil, be careful of sun !!

Was forced to spend extra $20 for a "special visa service" by the inspector, who implied he would drop me at the border and would not bring my passport with the others if I did not pay him $20 for the special service. I was cheated by this company.

We didn't have a good experience with this company. Our bus got broken on the way and we had delay of 3 hours. Air conditioning was not working properly so we got a bad smell from a bathroom as well. Moreover, a company's stuff stole my headphones.

The bus itself was very comfortable but the bus and my seat changed last minute. Problem is: NO SEATBELTS in the back row. So anxious with local driving being what it is. I was upset cuz I didn't realize until after we left the bilingual agency office.

CTT was terribly bad and I wouldn't recommend to take their mini buses.The office staff were unfriendly, especially the oldest lady was impolite.The driver drived terribly fast that make somebody on board sick.Got wrong gasline,wasted everyone's time
Free hotel pickup on time. Staff very friendly and helpful. Unfortunately issue with bus led to a one hour delay. Overall a good trip though.

Our seats were sold twice-we were asked to seat at the back of the bus even though we had our seats reservation confirmed.My husband suffers from travel sickness so he cannot seat at the back.We explained it to the stuff but they were unwilling to help.

I really recommend this operator! It was organised and the trip is good. You get some drinks, a snack and lunch for free! Bus stops before entering the border. Waits for everyone on the other site. Getting your visa is obviously your own business.

Great booking service. Fast and helpful.
Only not cool that the Kim Seng in PP was uncaring/unhelpful when tuk tuk drivers wanted to charge us more from the office to PNH airport than the entire ride from Siem Reap to PP...

Great booking service. Fast and helpful.
Only not cool that the Kim Seng in PP was uncaring/unhelpful when tuk tuk drivers wanted to charge us more from the office to PNH airport than the entire ride from Siem Reap to PP...
No complaints here. The van left on time and the trip lasted 5 hours, including a half hour stop for lunch. There were also several brief stops to pick up additional passengers.
Terrible. We were put right at the back of the bus, even though we had picked our seats when we booked. Very hot and no leg room.

Everything we've very smoothly. Very much appreciate the inspector showing photos of the offices on the border. It was a great help! Very friendly and professional service. I would recommend to others
our trip was smooth, driver and staff are helpful, except for the TOILET smells really bad.They should be clean it atleast every 2 hours.

Mekong charges an unfair"service fee"in the amount of 5$ due to not existing fees for customs or whatever, which you usually don't have to pay,e.g.at the airport.Anyways you should pay,if not,it could be that you alone spend to much time at the border...

5h instead of 6 (sr to pp). Driver was good.
comfort is not very good for tall people...

Departure time announced on Bookmebus did not correspond to the sign where the bus left. It was 3pm and not 2.30pm. The bus was late and left Kep only at 3.20pm, collected passegers, went to Kampot to change bus. No seats. Trip 5.5h with wait. Horrific!
more than 4h but good driver, comfortable seats.

Bus left promptly at 06:00 and arrived at around 18:30. We stopped a few times for bathroom breaks. For meals, you get a pastry/juice/can of coffee and a microwaved rice dish. Border crossing was smooth; the bus just drops you off and picks you up.

This is the second time I've chosen Mekong and the second time the bus has either broken down or had a puncture. Also I had booked an 11 seat van, but was transferred onto a big bus for the second half of my journey.. not ideal

All of the foreigners were forced off the van onto another van operated by Green Eagle Express. Instead of 5 hours, it took 7+ hours. When we arrived in Siem Reap we were taken to a bus station many kilometers from town and forced to buy a tuk tuk

Everything was great with the service. Nice friendly staff who helped a lot with crossing the boarder. Snacks, food and water provided. Not loud music or freezing like usual case. But need more info about arrival to bus terminal in bkk. Was very confusing
A/c on the bus works Very well so wear some extra clothes. Border passing is a bit surrealistic. Dont listen to the People trying to help you get  visa before you have gone through thai borde.r.
I booked seat A5, but that was taken when I arrived at the terminal in Bangkok.  The representative kept saying something like 'agency'...your system isn't coordinated with the bus line.
For the price very good value - very local experiene - enough space - not as fast as the VIP van, but way cheaper
Best way to travel around cambodia.  Safest drivers. Comfy van w/wifi.
The staff was very rude and the Seats are terrible
Driver drove really really fast.
Good trip! Unexpectingly good food, nice staff!
Small breakfast and lunch. Only 9 hours of driving, great! No wifi for those who cannot live without ;)
Comfortable bus, safe driving and on time. Excellent all round

Operator in Siem Reap told me we would be on 1 bus entire journey. Ordered off bus in Phnom Penh. Station employees in PP were asleep. They were unable to tell me when next bus would be arriving. Very rude personnel. Ignored us. It ended up being a van.

Crampt and horrible. Got us there in time but it was extremely uncomfortable. No room for feet. People trampling all over our bags. 

Driver made a comment to all of the bus in Khmer about us (two westerners) in which everyone laughed.
Safe driver, comfortable van, good value for money
The restaurant at stop was not clean

Driver left us far from siganoukville and drove off before we could realise (first time there). He left us by 4 tuktuk drivers he probably knew and since we couldn't get to the town without them we had to take their expensive price of $18. DO NOT USE!!!
Good service easy to use
Good driver, comfortable vehicle, arrived on time but left a little late but I would definitely use again.

It would be better if we wouldn't run and overtake while honking constantly and arrive a bit more late in my destination. Eitherwise everything was very good. Staff was friendly and attentive and minivan was in good condition.
Very good
Nice to have snacs on the way.Kind service.
That was my birthday, thanks to that boat trip I had lovely and unforgotten time
Everything is perfect!

If you are over 5'2 you will not be able to lie down flat. Also if you do not know who you are next too it's very intimate! Numerous stops made by driver, and ended up arriving over two hours late. Driver drove incredibly fast and had loud music on
Is it normal that we made a 30 minutes break during the  3 hours trip?!

Great service - bus on time & no problems during journey.
Staff all great. Regular meals given throughout.
Easy to book.
Would use again

The experience was an absolute nightmare. The seats are absolutely crammed together so you will have literally zero leg room. The air con comes and goes. The driver was reckless and I'm just glad we got to Mondulkiri alive.

Cambodia Post VIP Van offers safe, reliable travel between post offices all across Cambodia.Compared to other transportation options on Cambodian roads,Cambodia Post VIP Van is an excellent long-distance option.It is reasonably priced, safe, and on time.
Good service

Great trip, we were picked up on time and the bus even arrived early in Sihanoukville.
Very comfortable bus with good aircon and great legroom. Nothing to complain about.

We had aisle passengers who were locals I guess. We waited for them on the Cambodian side for 40 minutes after all visas were done. We then stopped near Siem Reap for them to do something and waited again for 20 minutes.

Perfect experience! We went from Phnom Penh to Siam Reap - journey started on time and it took us about 5,5 hours to get to Siam Reap! Driver was very careful and we stopped two times! 
Totally recommended!
Very happy with the service. Left 15 mins later than scheduled but that is Cambodia. Staff put the bags gently onto the ground and done everything at the border.

SHAME ON YOU
nobody came for the pick up you din't answear the phone and your office was close ! A shamed Never used your comagnie anynmore stoler !
Very old bus,uncomfortable seats and 1,5 hours of delay. Quick border pass,friendly inspector.

The bus made a stop at Kampot, but when I booked my trip nothing is specify... Moreover we made a stop of more than 1 hour, it's not tolerable when we don't know this information. You have to ask the bus company to say it to the customer before

Kampot Express hires drivers who do not care for the safety of passengers or anyone else on the open road. All passengers were holding on for dear life as our driver wildly weaved in and out of traffic and passed other vehicles at inopportune times.

Cambodia Post VIP Van hires excellent drivers for its minivan services between Phnom Penh & Siem Reap.The Toyota Hi Aces offer comfortable seats and the driver values passenger comfort and safety. An excellent long-range transportation option in Cambodia!

Terrifying ride. There were at least ten times we almost had a serious accident and it's because the driver was going way too fast. I know if you asked all the passengers if they would be okay with arriving 20 minutes later but safely, they'd say yes.
We wait more than 5 hours at Phnom Penh. The 2 drivers are inconscious they drive very fast  And very bad.
My bus has been canceled. I had to wait 4 hours to have another mini van from another company. The mini van was full and I had to seat on a pile of luggages and backpacks.
Great service, I would use again. We left from Siem Reap on time and arrived Phnom Penh on time or little bit earlier.
The service was very good.Thankyou.
Does the job very efficiently
Very good journey. The company gave us snacks and water at the starts. We arrived on time with no issue. I recommend.
Didn't have knowledge of our reservation on bookmebus.com. Seats were occupied. Thankfully they let us on. Good journey although a bit late
Everything was great except for luggage storage. It needs a good cleaning. Only bus that dirtied my backpack in Southeast Asia.

The most comfortable/best ride in Asia! The driver was driving by speed limit, did not overtake other cars, and made enough stops in between. Bus was clean, seats comfortable, air-conditioning at normal temperature. POST van is the way of travel Cambodia
Overall happy with the service.

Great service from Bangkok to Siem Reap. The assistant offered good advice at the border crossing and seemed genuinely concerned about everyones experience. Arrival into Siem reap was handeled well with free tuk tuks to hostels. Snacks and lunch inc.
Excellent cost effective way of travelling throughout Cambodia

The driver was over speeding, overtaking every vehicle almost crashed us four times. Even after asking him politely, he continued to drive like we ware bag of potatoes! I do not recommend this company. Take Ems post van or Giant Ibis.U get to live after.

For the price paid and comparing to similar service in Vietnam and Malaysia...Cambodia wins hands down...food and drink supplied. Strict adherence to seat policy (we lost our seats in malaysia). Toilet on board which was great and clean and smelt fresh.
Driver used his horn constantly on poor motorbike drivers who were as far to the right as possible. I had seat 2B as did another passenger; luckily the bus was not full.

It was perfect !
Thanks a lot for everything.

We arrived a 1/2 hour early as required but the bus left a half hour late. On the way the bus even stopped for one passenger to buy chips causing the long trip to be even longer for the rest of us. I can live with all this, but no wifi is a game breaker.

Great service. Left Battambang on time and the journey was fine (although where the road works were near Phnom Penh it was a little bumpy - not the drivers fault though). Seats very comfortable and stop offs were appreciated for snacks. Water provided
Great service - even arranged for us to get picked up from our first drop off before going to get others. Seats very comfortable. Driver was very safe. Water provided. Would use again
Comfortable journey after couple of people went off at first stop. Overall feeling very good. Good ride, nice driver, arrived faster than scheduled. Thumbs up
Overall it was interesting experience but delay in start was over 1 hour.
Overall it was interesting experience but delay in start was over 1 hour.
Overall it was interesting experience but delay in start was over 1 hour.
Overall it was interesting experience but delay in start was over 1 hour.
Excellent ride from Phnom Penh to Seim Reap. Driver was safe and bus was comfortable. Nice a/c and wifi.

I am very disappointed with our trip to Bangkok from Siem Reap. The driver is constantly on the phone while driving. The tourist were not given any instructions what to do in the border unlike the Bangkok-Siem Reap trip. Very disappointed.
wonderful trip would 100% recommend

The bus ride itself was great. Seats were very comfortable and there was a lot of leg room. 
However I was supposed to leave at 5 pm from Kampot and got a phonecall at 3 pm that the bus will arrive at 4:15 pm, I was still in Kep and could barely make it.
Highly recommend this mode of transport. Would use it again
Best way to get between both destinations. Excellent service
Not confortable, 1h late, not pick up where i was 3min close, wifi doesnt work...i tried it because it was next to my hotel but finally prefer Bayon express for same price
Good service overall, good break stops!

វាពិតជាមានភាពងាយស្រួស និងរហ័សក្នុងការកក់សំបុត្រ​ ប៉ុន្តែអ្វីដែលខ្ញុំបានជួបប្រទះគឺថាអ្វីដែលខ្ញុំជ្រើសគឺកៅអីនៅក្នុងអនឡាញផ្សេង​ក៏ប៉ុន្តែពេលដែលជិះជាក់ស្តែងគឺផ្សេង​ ខ្ញុំមិនដឹងថាវាយ៉ាងណាទេ​ សូមពិនិត្យឡើងវិញត្រង់ចំណុចនេះ។​ សូមអរគុណ
Nothing to moan about. Bus was fine and clean and stopped halfway for refreshments and toilet break

Easy to use booking system, the whole journey was enjoyable, lots of snacks along the way, we were guided through the visa process at the border and had no issues, the only minor complaint was the smell of the toilet on the bus, will definitely book again

I would not use Mekong Express Mini again. If the person in front of you reclined there chair there was no room for your legs. You physically would not be able to sit in your chair. Luckily I had a spare seat next to me so I could move
Fantastic and relaxed ride!!

It's been a good experience for first timer like me. The services are tiptop. They also provide complimentary mineral water. The driver bus will exchange at every stop. The bed has enough space. Very good.

This trip is last time er do that
Expencive
NOT punktuallity
Ni service
Awfull sittingroom
Next time Will it ve by buss( Giantibis very god and cheap)
Perfect. Next to an hour faster than expected!
wonderful transportation - good job

We used the same company from Bangkok to Siem Reap and the return trip. Both occasions we had the best service, very comfortable drive and close assistance at the borders. Very happy and thank you and your fine staff.

The minivan was spacious, clean, and a nice ride. Bumpy, but that's the road, not the company. Wifi was advertised but did not work. This is a minor and unimportant complaint but that's the only one I have. Everything else was great!

There was no bus at 8:30. We were lucky that free seats were on the 9:00 bus. Otherwise we probably had no bus at all. Furthermore bookmebus Support gave me wrong advise that there would be an ATM at the border in cambodia but there is no :( never again
Excellent service and a fun, fast crossing over bumpy seas. Everyone had fun!
The journey was ok, except the trip took a lot longer than expected.
Generally very good however there were big baskets of greenery put in front of my seat and they were covered in bugs that have left me with incredibly sore and swollen bites - really not good!
Generally very good however there were big baskets of greenery put in front of my seat and they were covered in bugs that have left me with incredibly sore and swollen bites - really not good!
Driver was a bit agressive against weaker vehicles, eg motorbikes, but maybe this the way it is in Cambodia.

Excellent and pleasant journey to Siem Reap. Driver on time for Pick-up at hotel. We left at 8.00 AM from Phnom Penh as excepted. Many stops on the way. We did the travel in 5.30 hours, with air-conditioning and 1 bottle of water offered. I recommand

Instead of the 16 hrs they told us, it took 26 hrs to get from sihanoukville to bangkok. People loose flights because of the delay, and from what we herd it is always like that and they lie you in your face when you ask 10 times and they tell you just 16h
Booked two front row seats. Received email just before departure saying they put is in the back. Didn't even get those seats as boarding was chaotic, they were just shoving people into the van.

The drive was good shuttle was clean and new the driver was a little to fast at times and didn't care for picking up his friends along the way but other than that it was well worth the money. I would use again for sure

ac was not very good
the places in the last line for 5 people too small

The windows were NOT transparent, so if it was raining or too cold and you HAD to sit inside it would have been a NIGHTMARE and a DISASTER. 
Luckily it was a nice day and we sat on the roof for the whole journey.
Great service helpful at customs arrived in good time

Comfort was not good, A/C worked but still it was quite hot in the van, for inpunctuality the traffic was guilty, not the company. pick up service went well. I would prefer to spend a dollar more and go with service bus which includes water, working WIFI.

comfortable, big bus, good A/C, functioning WIFI + plugs for charging, a little late but because of the traffic, not companies fault.. includes snack + water - best service for the price. nice stop for toilet + food.

Overall it was satisfactory. We left 30 minutes late and waited another 30 for our little rice meals. Also, it seemed like people we smoking on the bus or in the bathroom. We had little direction at the border. I'd rate the experience 7/10. It was fine.
Driver dont give me password from wifi. Bus arrived to Bangkok about 2.00 pm, not 11.30 am!!!

This is really nice company. You get drinks and snacks and a warm meal. Make 2-3 stops. Driver and the waiter very nice, friendly. Helps u with the visa process (if u don't have a e-visa). Seats are comfy for a "standard bus". All in all very cool trip.
Bus is on time and very kind Inspector.  Driver is always yelling when he talks. Bus is not in good condition because its noisy. Very hot A/C. We arrived in Bangkok 4hours early.
Everything Well organized! Perfect on time, busses could get an update for more comfort.
This was an excellent service at a very reasonable price.  The driver drove safely, the postal van was clean and we arrived on time.  I would use this service again should I return to Cambodia.

I think Noch is super helpful. He booked the awesome seats for me and was being helpful when I postponed my schedule. 
Thanks for that!
Nothing worked. I would like to get my money back. I will not recommend this company for anyone.
Good driver buy old seat. Drop off wrong location. Departure not on time.

Had to wait for maybe 45 min on the Vietnamese side for driver. Guy who received us in Ha Tien, and checked our ferry tickets, tried to scam us into exchanging dollars for Dong. Claiming no cab would take Usd on island. All cabs take usd, atms in town.
Perfect journey, can't find anything at all to fault. Would go again.
Thé travel Waze very good but we never receive our confirmation of réservation and we never arrive to join your office during the weekend before our travel

The driver to Battambang was speeding, more than allowed. Even when driving through villages he was speeding. He was overtaking, even there was traffic coming from front. VERY DANGEROUS! Driver was using the horn to scar slower drivers away. DANGEROUS!!!!
Van went a different way through Kampot without informing passengers. Many stops in-between. Delayed arrival to destination.
Minivan interior a litlle bit tired. Air conditioning a bit hot. But the journey was ok
All perfect as usual. Nothing to say.
Would highly recommend it. Cheap, comfy, enough stops, meet people, quick
Would highly recommend it. Cheap, comfy, enough stops, meet people, quick
highly recommended. used them twice

Realy hott with No aircondition. The seats so small, that You have your schoulders in the Face of your neighbor. And surprise, we are travelling with bags, so Maybe there Schould be a Place for it. Oh, and the driver thought he is Driving a Racing car
Great driver, kind and considerate. 2 stops enroute to break up the 6 hour journey. Excellent overall
Very good service of Mekong Express bus
Nice staff, helped with the visa process and everything. Recommended!
Was a very comfortable, safe and fast service. Staff people frinedly and kind. With two stops on the way. Good travel abd good driver. I would strongly reccomanded to use your van service!

Positive experience. Very comfortable seating with plenty of leg room. Two stops enroute were well timed for rest breaks. I will most certainly use this transportation service in the future.Thank you!
Good service. Direct bus from Siem Reap to Bangkok. Small breakfast and lunch were provided. The bus was confortable and the staff was nice and helped us through immigration.

Good price, comfortable and reclining seats. It says that pick up from mayor hotels is included, but I don't know if mine is on the list. So you should send a text message or email precising if pick up is included in service, please.

This was not my first time on this bus and I must say that if it weren,t for some silly tourists who are easy prey of border scums we could have made it in at least one hour less but the company should be clearer on how things work at the border.
very good!
Not stopped at official drop off Point
All ok

Excellent mini van service. Our driver was extremely careful while making good time. Even dropped us off near our hotel which we didn't ask for which was greatly appreciated. 
I highly recommend this company especially to foreign travelers. Outstanding.
Very good service, best bus company I've had in Cambodia. The trip to Sihanoukville had a stop at The Stop, which is an extremely clean and nice rest stop.

The adress to take the bus in Ho chi Minh is wrong ! The company had move for a other place in the city. I came very early so it was ok but it is not acceptable to give a out-of-date adress for the boarding point. Thank you for fixing it.
Very relaxed and good driver. Easy border crossing procedure.
Very punctual, prompt, speedy, comfortable with air conditioning, quiet Cambodian music.
I love the lie flat beds they give you! Upper level is more comfortable than the lower level. It's nice to be able to go to sleep and wake up at your destination.

Don't go with this bus. Waited 30 minutes before leaving for no one. Then we had to deliver everyone to their house except the 3 foreigners who were dropped far away from everything. Take Giant Ibis or the Post Vans.
Todo muy bien. Llegamos a tiempo. Muy buen servicio!
Driver arrived at 7.15AM for pick-up instead of 7.00AM, so there was a bit of worry. But finally all was solved out. Drop-off with courtesy at the International Phnom Penh Airport on the way.
It was a pleasant bustrip
Fare was cheap, inspector/conductor can speak english well. Only downside was that the AC seems to not wor, was a bit hot inside the bus.
Left slightly after scheduled departure but arrived roughly on time in Phnom Penh - bus was immaculately clean and comfortable

I'd definitely recommend to use the bus operator. The staff gave detailed information and very helpful. One recommendation is better not to take the free tuk tuk driver cause it's not free after all&driver can be quite insisting on renting him for ur tour

The bus was supposed to arrive at 15:15 but we actually arrived at 17:25. And on the website it said there would be WiFi and snacks, we received neither of those. The only positive thing was the driver was kind enough to stop when my friend had to pee.

Departure 10 minutes later. Get on And get off many local people on the route, this IS not good. But the driver was excellent  with his behavour, seats normall.. overall thanks . No wi fi. I will recommend your company to my  friends
Well, it waw my frist time tryint this online booking service and I didn't really expect it such convenient. I would suggest my friends and other to use this service too.

Bus wasn't direct as promised, had to spend more than 2 hours waiting for another bus (now MINIBUS) and then another 2 hours driving around city collecting mail and cambodians. arrived late, drop-off point missed. will never recommend mekong express
Great service! Left on time and didn't make a bunch of unnecessary stops. Reliable, comfortable seats and wasn't crowded. Easy to book online! Highly recommend this company.
25 minutes late for departure. One stop after 10 min to fill fuel. 3 other stops to take people along the way and 2 stops before Sihanouk to let them go. No bottle of water. Disappointing

Driver seemed to think he was on the F1 grid and spent the entire journey driving absurdly fast, overtaking everyone and nearly crashed on several occasions. A few of the passengers were crying and overall was not comfortable.
Great service!

your on line service is a joke : I was put on the 8 am bus when I wanted the 9 am. At the station I had to stand in the queue to get a ticket at the counter and was put on a different bus on a different seat

We took the Cambodia Post Van from PP to Siem Reap and back. One driver safe, one aggressive and occasionally texting. Both trips left 15 min early and took about 5.5 hours. Trip there had one 15min stop, trip back had one 30 and one 15 minute stop.
It's not van. It looks like the bus.
In general, the service was very good e.g. Seating comfortably, driving safely, ahead of scheduling, tuktuk arrangement at drop-off point.....

The journey was comfortable but the wifi wasn't available. We only had one stop which was like more than 3 hours into the journey. The drivers need to remember they are transporting people therefore they should drive carefully.

Pick up service did not show up for 15 min.  I took a tuk tuk to the bus station myself.

The coach is fine and arrived Sihanoukville 1 hour late
Thanks for the trip.

Overall, this trip was OK. But we were on the bus for two and a half hours before a break to stretch our legs and use the facilities. Once back on board, it was only another sixty minutes to Siem Rap. Poor timing.

We booked 12:45 but there was non till 1:30.  We had to wait outside in 37*. Then the bus was packed, no Legg room or room for luggage no ac, no internet . The driver then stopped to get him a coffee. Bus took 6h instead of 4. Never take them
It would be helpful if driver can speak English. Overall it was a good experience. We arrived earlier than expected.
The wifi did not work

The bus itself wasn't too bad, offering sufficient legroom, space and air con if need be. The journey however was around two and a half hours longer than advertised and the driver's excessive and relentless horn honking was incredibly frustrating.

All in all a good journey. Sometimes a little more information why we have to give the passport, but peanuts :) The only thing: toilet was broken. This is why the accommodation got only 3 stars. Thank you for your service. :) recommend it.
pleasent, perfectly organized trip
Want to book to come back from Siem Reap to PHNOM PHENH
Rude inspector, bus was not as advertised (sleeper bus instead of minibus) departed 30 mins late and arrived more than 2 hours late, missing my ferry.

Please ignore my previous review - that was meant for another company. 

My bus arrived late, missing the ferry. However, they were kind enough to let me onto the next one for free. Staff were courteous and facilities were clean. Ferry was also on time.
Excellent service

The bus arrived at Phnom Penh exactly 4.5 hours after leaving Siem Reap on time. The bus was clean and the seat belts worked. The wifi worked as well- bonus! Some of the driving was a little sketchy but nothing out of the ordinary for SE Asia.
The driver was a little intense but we got there alright.
Good communication and appreciated being picked up from our accomodation.
Unnecessary changes of vans, the air conditioner didn't work properly.

Air conditioner isn't working well. It's hot during the trip. The staff and driver were eating a grilled chicken on the bus. Actually in my country, Thailand, we don't allow to do it. Smell quite bad on the van.

Air conditioner isn't working well. It's hot during the trip. The staff and driver were eating a grilled chicken on the bus. Actually in my country, Thailand, we don't allow to do it. Smell quite bad on the van.
Awesome sleeping night bus Seila. Driving is slow and safe. I had nice sleep.
Awesome sleeping night bus. Driving is slow and safe for the sleepers. Seila night bus highly recommended.

Overall it was a comfortable and cost effective e way to travel to Cambodia from Bangkok, the bus attendant took care of the visa into Cambodia so we could sail through border crossing,I would recommend this way of travel if flying is too expensive
Very little leg room. The trunk was so small that we had to store people's bags in every crevice. The drive was quick however. Would not recommend mini van to anyone above 185 cm

We booked via web, got confirmation about pick up in Guesthouse. We waited in lobby, nobody came. Then I started to call office, too much stress around, finally they sent tuk tuk for us, 5 minutes before departure od Ferry. Running and stress...
Overall, this bus ride was a fantastic experience. The bus was comfortable, the driver was great, and the border crossing process was smooth and easy.

The bus departed earlier then my ticket said. The driver shouted at us in Khmer for being late (we caught up in tuk tuk). Driver pulled over 5 times to vomit, he was a very ill man, poor guy. Stopped several times for passenger to do shopping. 6 hours.

I forgot my wallet in the bus when we arrived to poipet, after that one of the Virak Bunthan staff stole 45$ from my wallet!!! I was the last one who left the bus, and first one who boarded, so no one else could take it!!

One star too many for Kumho Samco, who failed to get us from PP to HCMC. Bus was good, driver a heavy braker but ok. Attendant awful; knowingly left us at Vietnam border, despite the short hold up being due to his mistake. No attempt at warning. Disgrace.
Bus left Phnom Penh on time. Short stop in Kampot to drop off and pick up passengers. Arrived in Kep at advertised time. Bus was new, clean and comfortable.
Love it. Easy peazy
Before start departure no someone contact me. I really wait for a long time for your pick up. No someone pick me up, till I call to the company then pick up me. It is not good.
The most uncomfortable ride ever. Do not sit at the back of this bus I was pretty much in an S bend for 6 hours!
Driver was so friendly, I arrived early and he invited me to breakfast with him. He was friendly, polite, and safe driver. I will always travel with cambodia Post from now on.

The bus was comfortable enough and made good time as we left in the evening of a Sunday. Although driving around the town and picking people up from all over takes FOREVER! They also give you a little coffee and a water.

Terrible-a total rip off-boat was falling apart. 30 minutes in, the hull filled with water and the driver (no english spoken) had to rig up a make shift pump to keep the boat afloat, windows cracked/dirty-you couldn't see out-no life jackets on board.

I booked this bus under the pretence that I had an assigned seat. I arrived at the bus which had been swapped for a smaller minivan. I have no qualms with travelling in a minivan except I didn't have my seat. It was too cramped and we were not told this.
On time, ac, wifi, and super comfortable. Very happy!

We made contact with Mekong Bus via email and they responded promptly.They collected us from our hotel The staff were easy to deal with and dropped us at our  hotel after arrival in Sianhoukville. Driver was safe and friendly. A great service. Recommend!
Very comfortable van. Driver and the attendance ok.. Nice to us..

I use Mekong Express regularly and I like them, overall.  They are usually very dependable, however some of their vehicles are not well maintained.  On my last trip, we had to listen to a faulty "door-ajar' alarm which sounded through the entire trip.

Bus was dirty and uncomfortable- no cushions for your neck they had been removed. But the air conditioning worked great. Our driver made many stops, dropping off every customer individually so it took maybe 45 mins longer to get to sihanoukville

The driver picked us  from our hotel 20 minutes before departure time. 
As a whole, we are satisfied with the condition of the vehicle, good Aircon and WiFi is fair to good . The journey took 5.5 hours and the driver drove reasonable safe.

The coach service is good. The trip is ok - we were much quicker than the schedule said (8h instead of 12). The vehicle is well air-conned. There was a nice small hot meal provided. A few pauses were more than enough. I recommend this coach service :)

I booked this bus after reviews on tripadvisor.  What a mistake.
It had no wfii as advertised.  The bus was full of merchandise being sent from Ho chi minh.  No one spoke any English and it was advertised as a 3:45hr trip time.  In reality it took 7hrs

I booked this bus after reviews on tripadvisor.  What a mistake.
It had no wfii as advertised.  The bus was full of merchandise being sent from Ho chi minh.  No one spoke any English and it was advertised as a 3:45hr trip time.  In reality it took 7hrs

A C broken 
Wifi not working 
I paid extra money for the internet 
But unfortunately NO internet 
Very bad service 
Anyone use the service 
Noway to used again

Our trip was really comfortable. I booked not direct bus but it appeared to be direct. So it was better then we expected. Great sleeping accommodation, everything was clean. Free pick-up service on a dropoff point.
Perfect

The bus wasn't VIP class. Much too little space. The driver was too aggressive, resulting in many unnecessary hard braking situations. But quite like all the other Khmer drivers I have experienced. Unpleasant feeling and low safety.

The driver and people at the counter were so friendly and helpful. The booking process was convenience. Pricing is so competitive. The van is in good quality; I would say it be even better if they use some aroma or scent. Overall, I love it.
Excellent service
Really great bus trip, comfortable air conditioned bus, only 3 of us on there so loads of space. Stopped once for toilets and food which was also ideal. Arrived on time. 5*
Short Drive from kampot to Phnom Penh, the driver drove very fast, sometimes it was dangerious.

Only problem was we were told we would get a free ride to our hotel from the bus terminal in Siem Reap and the tuk tuk driver drove us only half way there then said he wouldn't take us any further until we paid him or booked a tour. Very bad impression.
One of it drivers went way too fast and was unsafe.  Even one of the locals on the bus asked him to slow down but he didn't until the local called his boss and got him to slow down

We startet in time but drove through the city to get a packet for 50 min. So actually we really startet about 1h later than expected. 
And the WiFi did not work out in the bus. 

I don't know what you mean with inspector so I just gave 3 stars

2 hours late with no explanation. Have a feeling our bus didn't run due to lack of customers and we were squeezed onto another service. Driver was very irratic, could have been a lot smoother - got us there fast I suppose.
Good service, extremely puntually!! Fast and safety. But at dinner too fast (we ordered but don't have time to eat....)
Everithing was perfect we had a safe and comfort trip to our destination,  The staff is friendly and fluent English speaker!

My way from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville with CTT Transportation was very comfortable and fast. Also support of this Company is very helpful , professional and kind. I defenetly choose this company again. Thanks a lot!
We used this service and found it efficient and comfortable.  I appreciated the care the driver took to ensure our safety and communicate the length of stops.  I would use this service again.

Nice bus ride to Bangkok, the only issue was that the complimentary pickup couldn't be done. Apparantly we were not in the coverage zone (we stayed 2 km from the bus terminal). Otherwise good journey.

/Karl
Mini Bus delayed by 45 minutes. No water being offered. No wireless working.
everything was great. probably the best way to get from A to B for reasonable money

Our trip to Bangkok from PP couldn't have been smoother. It was a long day, but the seats were comfy, the driver was friendly, and we stopped just the right amount of times for food and bathroom breaks. They also made the border crossing really smooth.

Our trip to Bangkok from PP couldn't have been smoother. It was a long day, but the seats were comfy, the driver was friendly, and we stopped just the right amount of times for food and bathroom breaks. They also made the border crossing really smooth.

We printed out our e(?)ticket after the booking which I thought will be eligible for boarding. At the bus terminal it turned out you have to exchange your "voucher" to a valid ticket. The bus was comfortable and clean, we had 2 meals durring the journey.

Driver was all the time over passing all the cars at around 100-120km/h on a road limited to 60 km/h. He was still doing the same when it stared raining. I've tried to ask him to slow down but he didn't change his attitude. Everybody was afraid.

Bookmebus had the wrong time of when my bus left by a half hour and when I showed up the bus company couldn't find my reservation. I had to get in a later bus and got caught in so much traffic that a trip that should have taken 5 hours took 8.

It's  no problem.
I'm a Japanese. And I like Cambodia!

The website was saying 3hours from PP to Kampot, and it took us 5h30 because the bus was going to Kep first and made a lot of stops during the journey. Next time, indicate all stops and actual arrival hour please

It took 6 hours from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville actually ! This company told 4 hours to reach there. In case of that delay, you should not take longer break. To make matters worse, some passengers were not punctual. Be careful for your connecting boat.

I Think that I book for 9 pm so I didn't get the bus. Instead I had to bye a plane ticket to 125 Euro. So you can maybe understandthat I am not happy about your bookong page. 
Carsten
The van departed and arrived at the scheduled time. The driver drove very carefully. We had a lunch stop and a toiletstop on request. We were very satisfied.
The bus was very comfortable, clean, a/c worked great, seats reclined, out let's and Wi-Fi worked at all times for me, and we got to Siem Reap in good time.
The bus was comfortable and punctual, however the driver was a bit careless - more so than usual in Cambodia - and we nearly hit a truck at one stage when he was trying to double overtake.

Seats are very spacious and comfortable. I felt cozy during my trip. I could say this bus is much better than any mini-van. However it took 5.5 hours to reach Phnom Penh. I will use this company next time.
Please add seat selection option for buses.
There duplicated tickets(same seat/bed). So, I exchange seat for a lady passenger.
Excellent service, we felt safe and secure and we'll taken care of. Thank you.
Service was slow. Rest stop was in a surprisingly nice location, although we were here for almost 40 minutes rather than the 20 minutes we were told.
This was a great service! The trip was smooth and the driver was safe. Would use them again!

Bus was very very very late, arrived to Bangkok 4 hours after I was told we would be there. Traffic was not the problem. We stopped many times for food and bathroom. Border was I only 2 hours, but I was told 4pm to Bangkok, 8pm still not therem
Older bus but no hassles, even the border went relatively smooth. Stops near airport & shuttled rest of the way in a taxi.
What a brilliant way to mix postal services with passenger service. Fast, efficient, clean and with wifi! I would highly recommend anyone travelling across Cambodia to use Cambodia Post VIP Van.
Good service from Phnom Penh  to Kep. Highly recommend to others. My first choice to travelling to Kampot or Kep!
Great travel, comfortable, sure again!

Hi,
Very comfortable bus. Thanks.

The bus is a bit hot and stuffy. There were more people than it should be. It was a bit noisy as well.
But overall it was not bad, I would recommend.

I booked Nattakan as ive read we need not to bring our luggage once we cross the border. We were disappointed when we have to take our luggages out within 1 minute for all passengers as bus are allowed to park for 1 minute only. no wifi. book giant ibis!

A nice van and mostly on time. Addition of internet would be nice. Too many unscheduled stops to pick up Khmer passengers. We stopped 1 km from the station. This is a disruption, need to rearrange people and baggage. This is an express, no? Why can't ...
horrible driver

The inspector did not give any information for the boarder, did not come with us thru. We had to find our way. Other groups were accompanied. Service is everything and there was no service. Never again for us.
Transfer was fast and convenient

Do not use this bus company!!!!! We made the Phnom Penh - Mundulkiri trip in 2017. The driver was driving crazy. He was really dangerous, was driving much too fast, sometimes on the left on the road in left curves where there was no visibility at all.
The bus was much later arriving than stated and was also very hot, but otherwise good
All good, I arrived safely and sound in Bangkok. What else do you want.
Excelent choice

Good travel
But the place we were dropped off in Bangkok was not good.
No sky train  system in the near.Too fare in the North! !!!
The bus we exactly on time - leaving and arriving. I appreciate that the driver stopped to get an energy drink and also took his phone calls with a hands free headphone.
Cepat waktunya ,busnya bagus makanya juga banyak ,

Excellent driving skill.  Sometimes his language while driving does get the ears soar, but that does not take away the quality of his skills. Was helpful in suggesting different options. Overall a good experience.

Excellent driving skill.  Sometimes his language while driving does get the ears soar, but that does not take away the quality of his skills. Was helpful in suggesting different options. Overall a good experience.

We forgot one our bag on the bus and called after. They promised that we can pick our goods next day and we tried. We vent to the station and they said that they will drop them by our hotel next day, because the goods were not yet came. Never showd since.
Everything perfect. Co-driver made sure everyone got through immigration fast and easy!
I had a good trip overall but at one point our driver almost drove us right into some motorcyclists! The wifi didn't work and the a/c wasn't great. The seats were decently comfortable though.
Old car and  full passengers

Nice experience! we left on time, enough space in the bus, driver was sensible on the road, the staff took care of us by giving badges to not get lost during the customs and they served little meals on the bus.
Departure 45 minutes late, else a good trip
Departure 45 minutes late, else a good trip
I was really surprised, great services, best customer experience that I had in  Cambodia.   Do not afraid to recommend as a nice, comfy and cheap way of transportation. Thank you.

If booking online make sure you go to ticket desk first to get real ticket, email says present email but this not case.. Good service. Snack, lunch and water, ice coffee provided. Left BKK 8.30am arrive Siem reap before 6.00. Border was very easy. Cheers

About KSO at poipet and Thailand KSO,your stuff is very terrible, at first, poipet stuff, he didn't check my passport clear, told me that I can go to Thailand, so let me to have problem until I go to Thailand , second, Thailand KSO,arranged seat very bad.

We booked luxury bus n we get sleeping bus, we wait in phnompenh for more than 3 hours n get van with 17 people for 6 hours 3 hours trip to border, in the border the driver didn't know what to do n can't speak english.
Good bus, good service, we satisfied with the trip. Hope you get better in the future
Change of pick up plan was notified by email and unfortunately missed by us. We waited for pickup for 1.5 hours. Driver also drove dangerously because of the delayed time.
The bus broke down on the way there. They sent another can to come get us, but I wonder whether the engine was properly inspected ahead of time. I'm sure this was an isolated incident.
Ok lah
Boleh!

Very safe driver.
Would recommend the post van to others.

I turned up at the correct place. Couldn't find you guys. Got told to wait in some random place. Then got told I had missed it. Me and my friend are very disappointed and would ask for some money back? Thanks
Everything was perfect and accommodating.
Booked seat 2 and 3, got 11 and 12 without confirm.

On the trip going:The driver was applying for Fast & Furious, the tire threads were balding beyond 2mm, the van was not maintained and the vent system was only intermittent. The return journey had a better van and a more stable driver.

Our experience was great, we arrived in the terminal a bit early, the bus left exactly at 8:00 am. The whole trip is excellent, they gave us breakfast and lunch (small amount) but still okay. Id use Nattakan bus again on my next trip. Thank you
The bus left almost on time. It was comfortable and got us there in a decent time.

This is not a lux van. It's an old van that is tight when sitting together and the worst part the AC wasn't working. Needless to say, a 4 hr ride was painful and smelly. 
Terrible and won't be taking this ride again.
I paid for an express VIP van but was put on a local bus that took 5 hours longer as it stopped all the time. Uncomfortable and disappointing

The ferry is crowded, people are noisy, it's hard to board and the driver likes to blast bad techno music all the way there. Departure was late. Plus there were a few people who got seasick and started puking midway. Pretty rough experience.

The driver was fine and managed to nearly avoid a cow collision. The annoying part were there French idiots talking loudly all the way to Sihanoukville. Also, the en route stop is not at the nice place PSD stops at, but another place with poor facilities.
so helpfull. can book online, despite u are not in Cambodia

The bus left almost on time and arrived earlier than expected. Driver and inspector were friendly. We'd appreciate if in the future the driver and inspector could at least give us instruction or to-do's upon reaching the border. Will ride your bus again.
Online booking said it would be a 15-seater VIP van. In actual fact, it was a mini bus (without aircon) came 45 minutes late. Too more than 5 hours from Kep to Phnom Penh. NO MORE NEXT TIME!!
The bus was comfortable with good seats, free water, decent driver.
Car drives very fast and this company not accommodation with the customer.

0 communication with the driver. No English at all. We stopped on the way and I haven't been informed why and for how long. Took us 2h longer. My stuff was chucked on the ground when we arrived. The worst trip ever, Same with a service.

I booked a bus to depart at 10; it departed at 1230.  There was no 10 o'clock bus. Bus was old and A/C barely was working. Trip was OK/transfer from Kampot to Kep was fine. People at the bus depot seemed to have no idea that there was an online booking.

trip was fine. no complaints. can't beat the service for $8/trip. Only issue I have is that there seems to be little communication/awareness at the bus depot about on-line bookings. This needs to improve.

The worst experience ever. Apparently our 3 seats were booked as 1 seat so we had to sit on the floor. I would like to have my money back for the shittiest ride in history. You should be happy that the ride was so hard we didnt manage to complain on FB...

Wifi is broken

Minibus was infested with cockroaches.  We killed at least 10. Driver was a maniac.  We decided to return by train,  even though we had purchased a return bus ticket from the same company. I recommend you do the same,  or hire a private taxi. Traumatising

Got to siem reap nearly two hours earlier than expected. Driver was lovely despite having to beep when passing other vehicles every few minutes. Bus slightly dated but fine nonetheless. Organised free shuttle from station to hotels too.

Took the minibus from PP to SR after the Cambodian New Year. It was only me and another passenger. The ride was uneventful which is good, however couldn't find the wifi nor did the driver bring it up. It was fine since it's a good 5 hr nap to SR.

The journey was quick however not the most comfortable. I had booked two tickets but didn't get my assigned seats - instead my seats were given to locals and I was shunted to the back of the bus where leg room and air were limited. should have had my seat

The journey was quick however not the most comfortable. I had booked two tickets but didn't get my assigned seats - instead my seats were given to locals and I was shunted to the back of the bus where leg room and air were limited. should have had my seat

The journey was quick however not the most comfortable. I had booked two tickets but didn't get my assigned seats - instead my seats were given to locals and I was shunted to the back of the bus where leg room and air were limited. should have had my seat

The driver was great however the journey wasn't so comfortable. The seats I had allocates were given to local people so I was forced to sit right at the back of the bus. No explanation was given as to why I could not have the seats I had booked.

The bus had no seatbelts. And, instead of taking me to Phnom Penh, the bus left late then took me to Kampot where they told me to wait 10 minutes. Half an hour later, I was put on another company's bus to Phnom Penh. I arrived at 12.30pm instead of 11am.
Really nice clean bus. Driver, drove safely, no crazy overtaking. Good price, I shall certainly use them again if at all possible.

It was so impressive.i took minivan from Siemriep to Poipet on 15 Apr'17. the driver dropped me off at Poipet even though i was only their passenger on that van. unfortunately it left from boarding point almost 30 minutes late.

It was actually great, air conditioned and quick. Two stops, took about 5 hours from Siem reap to Phnom Penh. The only problem was this bloke who snores louder then I've ever heard anyone snore before from start to finish. So irritating. 4 stars
Perfection !
This's a great transport, next time I'll take this.
Faster thn shcedule. I can sleep well. thx Book me Bus
Smooth and easy trip. Grumpy sour driver. Leather on the seats all cracked and difficult to get comfortable on.
Punctual. Driver was grumpy. Leather seat cracked and difficult to get comfortable on.

Departure point was not the same as drop off in Pnom Penh - check your ticket! However, the journey was fine. Our bus of 11 was full and we 3 had back seats which are smaller than the others so a bit of a squeeze. Otherwise all was good

The bus was on time and driven responsibly. The staff were courteous. My only complaint is that the leg room was almost non-existent. (Note, I was forced to give a rating for "inspector" above. I have no idea what that is.)
The journey was very straightforward and punctual. Only comment was that the bus was a little hot but that may have been the hangover.

Stopped like 3 times which I thought was unnecessary, but still arrived early. New bus and had great air con. Unfortuantely the seats were very uncomfy (a6/7) as they had literally no leg room, therefore I found it impossible to feel comfortable.
Upgraded from a minibus to a charter bus. There were no seatbelts on the bus.

Bus arrived 45 mins late, with no explanation. We were picked up from the boarding point by a tuk tuk and taken to a random spot to be picked up by the bus as it made its way through Kampot from Sihanoukville. Once on the bus, journey was ok.
Very good Careful driver Comfortable  van.
Was sat on the coach then got told to change to a very old mini bus where the baggage hardly fit, seats were uncomfy, next to no air con and the suspension must not have worked as it was so bumpy

Minivan: uncomfortable.Driver: very rude, dangerous driving, refused to have more than 1 stop on the way(4-5 hour journey)even though I asked him specifically as I am 5-month pregnant.Obvious and utter disregard for women.Choose Mekong express, is better!

Very good overall experience. Very comfortable minivan, lots of room for legs, complimentary bottle of water, safe driving. Driver gently stopped when I asked him (I am 5-months pregnant). I highly recommend it!

- Staff is good help and be cheerful.
- Staff at bus terminal should can speak english.

We left about 25 minutes later than scheduled from Bangkok and I was given very little instruction on how to do everything at the border and got scammed out of an extra $20 when getting my Cambodian visa, you need to warn people about what the scams are.
Easy and cheap wat to travel from Battambang to Phnom Penh. We already booked the tickets through the internet and everything was confirmed quickly. Good service.
Pick-up was 1 hour earlier then agreed therefore we had no time for breakfast :(

The driver appeared to be falling asleep whilst driving, very concerned for the safely of myself and the rest of the passengers. On the trip back to kep the air conditioning was disgusting. Filthy water dripping from the vents. Extreamly poor.
I booked a ticket and got a confirmation email. But never received the actual e-ticket. Luckily I was admitted to the bus.
Easy ride, safe driving, we had couple of stops for toilet and food and arrived safe and sound after 5 1/2 hours. Good job!
Great service, very efficient and well air conditioned comfortable mini bus.
Complementary OK
Bus condition is good. Staff helpful. We do not need to worry for breakfast and lunch onboard.

Bus condition is good. Bus attendant supports in English and helpful. It is punctual.  The driver speaks loudly and it annoys us. After two-third of the trip, he stops speaking and we feel much better.

Spot on service! Comfy pleasant ride. A bit late on departure but it was all caused by an accident on the road. We were lucky to share the vehicle with two other passengers only. We got off the bus on request I'm Siem Reap. Great stuff.

Do not booked your ticket on line they will charge you more than 1USD per ticket. I booked 9 tickets on the  e-ticket it says 252 USD for 9 but in my credit card bill they charge me around 267.12USD for 9. They should do something with their IT system..
Very good online service and able to solve my problems with delayed flight, I was able to rebook my van with free coupon and easy to communicate. Recommended for sure!
Very good online service and able to solve my problems with delayed flight, I was able to rebook my van with free coupon and easy to communicate. Recommended for sure!
Nice trip. I went in my own and the driver was good and had a really good journey. Wifi was a plus.
Great sevice ever
Very good, quick and safe transport. Would definitely recommend!

Not the most comfortable bus but AC worked OK. A nice number of snacks and drinks included and wifi worked in Thailand (not Cambodia). TAKE A PHOTO OF INFO CARD for reference. At border we were dropped at agency (don't pay!) - ignore and go to departures.
Very good & quick service to Siem Reap! Also, the water was a nice tip! Will use again! :-)
Good and safe

Enjoyed the journey. Our friends took this bus a month ago, a few people on that bus were scammed. They said it was because the bus workers and the scammers have a friendship. but our inspector showed us where to go and helped us. NO MEAL FOR VEGETARIANS
Amazing trip. Before time arrival. Clean and Tidy bus. Wifi was the cherry on the cake. Would recommend it to everyone.
The driver drove very fast and the van was so dumpy unlike the previous time.

Great service, excellent driver. 
Will be our first choice for ongoing travel by road in Cambodia.

Was what I expected. But I was put at the back of the bus in a smaller bed. Next to the air-con machine which gave out heat. 
I expected the dirty beds and long ride, but the bus broke down and air-con turned off, so a long stopover.
Was on time, short stopover and comfy. The driver was a bit crazy, but it is Cambodia!

Our return trip from Koh Rong - Shihanoukville was 3 hours later than booking time leading late other schedule. We nearly missed the last trip to boarder. 
Other things are good including staffs, services. 
It would better if seat number is control
It would be better to have someone guide us clearly when we depart from PP to Kep as there were many vans at there. It seems like they are only friendly to foreigner guests.
Great service and driver.
The wifi didn't work and we didn't have any movie, apart from this, the bus was confortable
Border crossing area between Cambodia and Thailand was somewhat confusing.  Bathroom on bus could have been cleaner.
Great service, punctual arrival and thoughtfully equipped with Wu-For. Trip was fast and safe.

Really good service. 
Stopped for bathroom and lunch! 
Made a long journey enjoyable. Have just booked my return bus!
Bus broke and new one came to pick up all of us and take so long time to bus station I reach there 21.30 hrs. Disappointed for this trip
Punctual. Convenient. Courteous  driver.  Very good service.

Journey was hassle free. Driver drove safely (for Cambodia). Got a free bottle of water and wifi for the trip. As good a service as the two big decent bus companies and about $5 cheaper. Seat reservations made online don't mean anything though.
This was an excellent service and I would highly recommend it to anyone

Arrived in Siem Reap 1hr early, left PP 10 min early with all passengers. Only felt a bit unsafe driving when it got dark. 1 stop in Kampong Thom. Soft music played 2nd half. Tuktuks waiting when we arrived. Driver & inspector same. Covered waiting in PP.
Food served was very good. Departure was delayed by almost 30mins.
Departed about 15 mins late but not a big deal. Good driver and fantastic van. Will use it again.

I booked the return journey with bayon as my outward journey was great.
The bus arrived late, there was already people in our seats booked, the driver was really rude and unhelpful. There was also no WiFi on the bus in which was advertised! Not great!
driver got into an accident. we arrived to hotel late.
Good, fast and reliable service. 6% transaction fee on creditcard payments is a bit of a scam. Would be better if pickup point in Bangkok would be closer to town, it's 30 mins taxi ride out.
Please do not use this company . Schedule is a joke !!! GVTC FAR AWAY BETTER
The express van was comfortable, but in this particular van, the seats did not recline, so it was a little difficult to sleep.
Really comfortable journey, nice Cambodian music playing, seats reclined, so it was easy to sleep.

Good! Toyota van was comfortable and with air condition. We had one stop in the middle. For those who are afraid of driving - it's Asia guys. Better get used to :) Those people knows how to drive. Even if there is no rules :)

Bus service was good, driver had nice behavior and also they were punctual. We stopped in the middle for around 10-15 mins for break and arrived Kampot at 10:30 am. 
The only thing which was a bit uncomfortable was the seat and there was no wifi too.
Great service and relative comfort and efficiency. Quite a lot of horn use on this leg of the journey.
There was a bit of a consfusion with the pick-up service but aside from that, everything was smooth as it can be.

The bus left 15 min late and made many stops to pick up people (5-10 min each) and for food (5-20 min each). None of the stops had a set time. The driver was very wreckless. He overtook other cars on blind curves, going uphill, etc. I never felt safe.

The drive drove very fast and overtook cars on curves during torrential rain. There were many stops along the way with many delays. We sat in seats 3 & 4 and were blocked in by large packages. We couldn't get out at the rest areas due to the boxes.

Another easy, stress-free trip with Cambodia Post. Good driver and punctual. No free bottle of water this time, but got free wifi. The post office is a fair way out of town though, with no cafes or shops nearby to snack or drink while waiting to leave.
The bus wasn't cleaned, but everything else was ok. The trip back to Siem Reap with PSD wasn't good at all.

Sorya bus are not usually this late and slow. This particular bus driver (Phnom Penh to Kratie on 8 May at 9:45 am) was extremely cranky, extremely slow, and did not give us enough time to eat a meal on the ride for more than 8 hours.
Left on time and arrived early! Decent bus and seating and trip was without incident so definately would use them again for this route.
Great bus! Unfortunately the seats we booked on bookmebus were taken so we ended up on the back row.

The bus itself was very, very nice and super comfortable. The meals were a little small, but the only big disappointment was that we had to take our bags and walk with them about 750 meters through the border and customs. I think every bus had to do this.

Highly recommended! bookmebus.com allowed us to chose seats and payment with credit card was easy - great website! The bus ride was also great: nice AC, comfy seats (3, 4 and 5) and english speaking driver. Van was on time and we had 2 restroom stops!

Reasonably good company, bus are a bit old but OK. It does not stop every 10 minutes to pick up and drop off so that's nice. There is very little legroom though... If possible prefer mini van, otherwise this bus is a fair solution to travel
Overall good experience!
But it reached very early, by right 6-7hour journey stated on the website, reached 4.30am, not punctual, over all is good
Never again. No power plug at seat 6A, so I moved to 7B where the seatbelt was broken. Seats are worn out and not much legroom. This is a very old bus, and I saw the driver twice using his phone.

Love the service, with free water and food on the trip. Was just disappointed that the bus stopped, next to a visa scam. Lucky we didn't fall for it. But will have loved, that the inspector will have told us, not to make visa there.
No delays, breakfast and lunch included
Very good service, went from Siem Reap to Battambang and arrived on time. Would recommend and definitely use again

budget friendly and legit transpo from siem reap to pnom penh. at the back of our minds, we always worry of scam tour buses and stuff so booking this gives us more relief since this is a post office or govt owned line. we had smooth trip as well and the d

The driver was ok, the bus arrived on time without driving reckless. On the negative side, the bus has no wifi, no power points to charge the phone. The steward was very rude and refused to charge my phone on his power point so i could not contact my taxi
None

I had to wait in line when I arrived at the station to show my BookMeBus receipt and then they gave me a bus ticket. Buying on bookmebus did not save me any time or convenience since I had to wait in line to get my ticket.

I booked 10.30am and the bus ready to go at 10am. Very punctual! The driver drove fast, reached 5 hours from PP to SR. Aircon doesnt work and all of us very hot until need to open window to get fresh air

The scheduling was simple.  The travel was very comfortable & smooth & the guide & driver did as sensational job with great kindness. I highly recommend the Mekong Express & I highly compliment all staff associated with this fine travel & tourism business

Would never do this journey again. Arrived to Phu Quoc at around 7pm... Boarding point is not the same as the address on a ticket. Some tuk tuk has to take bus they have no logos. Changed 3 terrible buses. Should have taken a flight via HCMC
Really good company, helped out with visa, got breakfast and lunch on the bus. They were really sweet and helpful, drove us to our accommodation when we arrived. A/C on the bus, everything was good.
comfortable seat among all the bus journey which I did.
Journey was good and we reached on time. Driver also was really nice but the seats were not comfortable.

Main point which has to be raised is punctuality, ferry arrived 1+ hour late on both departing & returning trip... Apart from that, staffs seem not too nice but kinda acceptable, there are some other tourists with zero moral & no one took actions on them.

Overall a very comfortable journey with plenty of space on the bus. The only thing I would suggest is that the inspector better explain the visa process on the border with Thailand (i.e. where to go and how long it takes).
easy booking process. the trip was pleasant. the driver will stop for 20 mins at the rest point, the toilet is also clean at the rest stop.
easy booking process. the trip was pleasant. the driver will stop for 20 mins at the rest point, the toilet is also clean at the rest stop. and the van itself is very clean
Very clean van and very punctual, a smooth ride
very clean bus and punctual, smooth ride
The departure is on time, bus clean and helpful driver. one thing that you should improve is passenger waiting room(Sihanoukville), it is really hot while waiting the late passenger.

Arrived early, staff asked to take an earlier departing car, we said no. Then went to take "15-seat vip van", but saw "25-seat mini bus", asked "why". They said "Why do you complain, everybody is happy, can't let you go, get off" Terrible service ever
Scheduled for 7.30am on Bookmebus but their printed schedule and actual departure time was 8.15am . A bit annoying but otherwise fine.

I would not recommend this company. Very rude staff, no explanation on the change of vehicle(Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville) and ordered us to get off abruptly. We asked for the refund, but they said nothing and kept saying to get off. literally terrible!

Unfortunately I got badly bitten by some bugs (bed bugs perhaps?)
It has been 5 days now since I was on your bus and I still have the marks on several parts of my body of the bites.
Very bad.... And I definitely did not have them before...

We were late leaving. Cleaning the van to the driver meant taking the rubbish and throwing it onto the ground in front of the van. He drove at least half the distance back to P.P on the wrong side of the road. The wifi didn't work.

Was trying to get home to PP from Kampot after the King's birthday public holiday. Drove around town but all the bus companies were booked out already. Then I remembered the bookmebus app on my phone! Booked my tix then celebrated with a few brews...
Everything was perfect. Will take postal van for our return trip to Phnom Penh!
Everything was perfect. Will take postal van for our return trip to Phnom Penh!

The bus was terrible! Cause of broken air condition it droped water everywhere. The instructor of the bus Tour gave no instruction at all. We were forced to buy the visa in the bus for 40 dollars, too expensive... At the border we felt lost and undirected

Left late, then pulled over somewhere to wait for the drivers family members to get in even though it was full already.  Lady sat on ground next to me so I had no leg room. Squeezed another person in one seat and they threw up.

The bus was new, clean and well maintained. There was a lot of mail onboard so space at the rear was limited. We had a late arrival thanks to heavy traffic and wet conditions but overall, a comfortable journey.
Very good service, cookies and light lunch was provided. The inspector is friendly and helps you get across the border.
Van was really comfortable. Van stops at resting area for us to have dinner (good thing, so we won't be hungry).
