Waited at the pick up location 30min early, but no one came to pick us even after 45min later. They had sent a tuk tuk driver to come pick us up to another pick up location. Punctuality quite bad, but at least they're still responsible towards customers
Van was very comfortable. Driver stopped at a pit stop for a quick 30-min break. Arrived earlier than designated time.

Phone operator was rude and got angry at me because I couldn't find where the van was at the pick up point.(it wasn't there are the designated time) She scolded me and told me that they were on holiday. Sorry for being your customer!
Also, they tried to move my seat and I had to argue with the conductor that I bought my seat number specifically before he would let up. Rude rude rude and so unprofessional.

Everything was fine. Booking online without any problems. Enough stops. Bus was clean, also the on-board toilet. Chilling music :-) We got snacks and even warm lunch. The driver drove fast but secure. Arrived on time. Absolutely worth its money.

We arrived in Siem Reap ahead of schedule. The driver gave us enough stops for bathroom breaks and food or just to stretch our legs. The van was spacious as we only had 6 people on board. Glad I chose this service over the bus. Happy overall with service.
Never again. Bus cancelled few hours before, and no possibility to have a solution with same time departure and same seats. We had to find a taxi in emergency. Cost us way more than scheduled!
The driver was very friendly and drove safely. We arrived in good time. Overall, pretty good.

This was the worst and most dissapointing bus ride I've had. Firstly, it was advertised as leaving kep at 7.30am taking 3.5 hours. 
6 hours later, I made it to PP. A stop in kampot and at the local market. No-one listened to us. I am really angry.
I'm appreciated your service, please keep going and make it better :))

I took this service because of the wifi provided and there was none! Also, it supposed to be an express service with no stops, and the van stopped so many times that we arrived one hour late, so I couldn't have lunch. An absolute bad service. It's a lie!
Prompt leaving and arrived on schedule, comfortable seats and two evenly-spaced rest stops. Same quality service on return journey. Third time to Mondulkiri, never had a problem.
A good service! Thanks you so much

-delay of departure from 10min
-broken bus after 60km
-waiting for another car 1,5h
-transfer to next bus 60km, when 12 people were in 7 seated  MPV car!!!
-arrive time to Bangkok has to be at 5pm,we arrived at 11pm!
- no discount,full price payed

Very friendly staff.
Clean buses
Safe driver
Efficient travel time
The holiday traffic caused severe delay in our arrival in Kep.  Otherwise, the service was enjoyable.
Satisfied

Last time, the driver, punctuality and bus were all excellent with Kampot Express. This time there were lots of stoppages, addition pickups for customers and even a driver change,! Little bit disappointing.... The AC was also struggling so a warm ride
A decent and clean bus this time, but have had some clunkers on this trip.
Needs improvement on the immigration process. No staff is guiding the passengers.

it was ok from what we experienced -traveling by buses in Vietnam, Laos and Cambodia including- this was above average. However all transportation services have one thing common and so- lack of infos provided to travelers, especially not local ones.
Sehr zu empfehlen. Im Preis war ein kleines Frühstück, Kaffee und ein Lunch invegriffen. Siem Reap wurde 2 Stunden früher erreicht.
Very good services

Our ride from Poipet to PP was alright. Webooked different bus operator but we have to change it due to time difficulties and BookMeBus provided us departure change with different bus operator with different price without additional charge. Recommended.
All very good. If driver can speak English, it's better ;-)
Excellent, affordable, punctual mode of transport. Highly recommend and will use again
Despite trouble finding the bus stop - this was a very easy border crossing thanks to the staff. The seats were comfy! A good trip over to Ho Chi minh

Terrible drivers. The bus drivers did not properly explain the visa process and I was scammed at the border for a lot of money. I asked multiple times if the visa was free and they said " you must pay" I will let everyone know on my social media accounts.

The drive was great, I'm was very happy with the WiFi connection. Some of the seats appeared to be broken and would just recline as soon as you sat down in them, it seemed the the handle to recline was broken

Boat left a bit late, 10 mins. Crossing was about 40 mins from step on the boat to step off the boat. Bit confusing from office staff as to when/where to go to catch ferry. All said, worth the money for a return trip and recommend. New, safe reliable boat
Very good company, I recommend it.
Comfortable van and good driving. Very punctual and arrived on time. Good experience.

There was no bus at 6:30pm. The travel agent put the wrong time on the website and I booked it. And I had to wait at the office. Luckily, the staff was helpful as they booked me in another hotel bus but it wasn't comfortable.

Booked seat 7 but was asked to accommodate someone else and move to seat 2 with not much leg space. I was okay with this but the issue was that there was water leaking from the roof on seat 1, 2 and driver's seat.

It is terrible. 
Counter person is rude. (in pp)
There is cheater person in border both side.(in koh kong)
very good, safe and quick driving!
Thanks for your service, it's nice and I hope it's getting better soon, :))
So far so good services! Only that on the way the aircon was broken its so hot until we reach SiemReap safely with wondows open.
One more thing, they need to update the telecom contact number  023 537 8999 written cannot be contacted when called up!

Overall services ok. But want to remind that u have online booking system, must check every passenger's order# who buy personally in your office to avoid double booking on online maybe that seat# already booked or purchased by another passenger. Thanks
Unexpectedly good!
Nice bus. Quick response from company. Used eticket fine. Would recommend.
Really good bus ride from bangkok to siem reap. We also got food and drinks. Well organized trip. They also tried to help us to get visa at the cambodian border which can be overwhelming at first.

We had 4 hours of delay on the way to Rhatanakiri and were very tied in the bus even though I booked the places in advance. We paid online and they try to make us pay again, we had a very hard time explaining we paid already. Wouldn't recommend it!!
Fantastic!

Booking a bus ticket is a very convenient option, but refusing of a pick-up from Phnom Penh airport to Sihanoukville really upset me. Please make a pick-up from the airport and thank you a lot of passengers!
Good

I was the only one in the van at first and then they picked up 5 people along the way. Had an empty seat next to me. The driver drove very defensively. Stopped along the way for lunch. Made a post office stop. Overall would recommend, good experience
bus left 1.5 hrs late... seat belts did not work... van was rough...  would not use again... driver was polite and helpful

The bus left in a timely manner. The crew seemed friendly. The border was a nightmare. The bus broke down. The air conditioner quit working. We stopped somewhere to fix it but it wasn't fixed. We got into Phnom Penh 4 hours late. The driving was insane.

Bus left 20 mins late - appeared to be waiting for 2 passengers.  Very squashed seating in back row of bus.

Despite late departure, arrived Siem Reap early.

Originally booked on 4pm bus, but cancelled. 5pm bus was fully booked. I susoect this happens often. Left 20 mins late - appeared to be waiting for 2 passengers.  Very squashed seating in back row of bus.

Despite late departure, arrived Siem Reap early
Really poor service, my seat was damp. I would like a partial refund.
it is good service and comfort car

The driver was so rude and argued back to the customers and always talked on the phone while driving. Also he stopped the bus many times to take passengers along the road and over speeded sometimes that make passengers feel like car sick.

I paid extra for seats A1 & A2.  Middle seat too tight.  Music TOO LOUD.  We felt cheated & moved away from A1 & A2.  Driver drove technically well and dangerously - tailgating, crossing yellow lines, veering to the shoulder a lot - with a few near misses
Safe ride, our phnom penh - siem reap trip was just 5 hours. liked the fact the driver makes safe the bus is kept clean by not allowing strong-smelling foods onboard.
It was a long trip. Refreshments servedwere good!
very happy with this bus company
Nice comfortable journey. Thanks
Very nice trip !!!
Convenient location and punctual service, but the bus was old and the aircon did not work well.

We booked the 8am bus and were told upon arrival that there was no 8am bus and to get the 9am bus. We initially thought we were put on a bus from a different company. This confusion was frustrating. Once the bus finally departed we had a lovely trip
Seat choosing through online and real seat on van is not matched.  Both way  is being provided new seat while at check in at with van company.
Excellent driver. He did nothing reckless and drove at a decent speed.
Good Journey to kep From Phnom-Penh. 30 minutes of delays but fair accommodation and driving.

Booked a ticket Kep-PP, time 3.5h. Left at 7.45am, first stop Kampot to change bus, while nobody said anything. We left at 8.45h in an old dirty bus (suspension, seats). On the way stopped many times to pick up more pax. Never again ! Arrived at 12.15 h.
Driver and crew were helpful. The system of handing out IDs until crossing the border works. The bus 12-02 was old though

The bus is not non smocking, badly smock in the bus. Staff is really really impolite at all. :( 
No more us the bus any more.

No Hotel pick up, nevertheless it was confirmed. That caused a lot of trouble! No appology, no compensation!
Not reliable!
perfect journey ! thanks :)
Good services and reasonable price
Very punctual and professional, however, the bus was not in good condition.  Quite old with a weak aircon.
Excellent service, quick but safe driver & ac was a plus :)

It was awful. The driver got into a bad accident and swerved us off the road and almost tipped the bus over. He then ran away along with his driving partner and left all the passengers in the middle of the night. New bus showed up 1 hour and a half later.

The service departed on time, though driver received a phone call, and we had to wait 15mins for 2 no. passengers that were late. Should have just left them for the next service. 

Good overall.
Very punctual company

Need to improve : 
Airconditioning - not cold enough
CR lighting - room is dark

But overall, the rest are ok.
Nice service, thanks. Please keep going and make it better :))

The driver and inspectors were very punctual concerning the trip. I did recieve my bottle of water and the wifi was as good as it could be. The driving was good and safe. I would take trip with this company again and recommend them for future trips.
The bus left and arrived as scheduled. In between 2 small stops, one for lunch. Bus was clean and a bottle of water was provided.
Unfortunately the seats were extremely uncomfortable although this van was not so old
Excellent service
Excellent service

All the seats in the right side of the bus are too compressed! There's not even space to put your feet in the ground. It is so unfair because we paid the same price like everyone else yet we had to sit in a very incomfortable position!
Bus took over 6 hours instead of the 4 mentioned when booking, late leaving and then had to change buses.

It's good that I asked tourist information about my trip. Then, they called the driver to pick me up because the boat was leaving from a different port. It was a bumpy ride due to the rain, but we arrived safe. The driver was good.
Great trip, good driving, leaving and arriving on time.

The journey was well organized and the inspectors on the bus explained the process of going thru the cambodian border. The bus arrived on time but left bangkok 1 hour later. Overall i had a great experience.

I wasn't sure if they would pick me at my hotel cause it was my first time using psd express but they picked me 15 minutes before departure. Bus was awesome. Wifi on bus and air-conditioning. Driver beeps too much unnecessarily. Great company to travel!!

That was my most scariest journey with a van in Cambodia so far.  The driver was most time so much speeding and overtaking others. His speed was all the time over the allowed limits. We would not choose Golden Bayon again.
Good service all round and delivered what was promised clean efficient and professional ps I don't know what was meant by ' inspector' in the star ratings so left blank
I got the bus from Phnom Penh to Battambang, it was a small mini bus we had but fitted everyone's luggage on. Inside it was nice and comfy and had a break half way which was good.
The driver is friendly and helpful and the car is new and comfortable .
Very comfortable chair!

Driver is great, humble and officer very usefull In the border area... I Love Mekong Express  
4 thumb for Mekong Express

Alexander Glenn 

Indonesia 

Thank you so much

I felt very sage all the time. Good staff.
Theresa was also lunch, water and some snacks included. English from the staff was not that great, Burgen you could understand. They have good tipps for you at the border.
Very good driver, comfortable chairs, one stop for lunch or coffee was good and not to long and another short toiletstop was pleasant.

It was a very bad road from Kep tp Phnom Penh and I wondered why the driver didn't take the road from Kampot to Phnom Penh. Driver drove too fast on the bad road. Not very comfortable. We didn't have one stop. Chairs are not very comfortable.
Save driver!

Good bus, Everything went smoothly. Food/drink were provided (small breakfast and lunch). Instructions on the border were given.
Website mentions pick-up service in Bangkok, but not available to us. Tuk-tuk service in Siem Reap to hotel free of charge.

They change my seat number from 9A to 7A.
But after i got my bed. Someone told me that 7A is his bed. I told them that the officer change my seat number. N driver already take my ticket. N they ask me to change the seat. To upside. Wtf
The Bus timing was very Punctual and we reached Phnom Penh in 4.5hours itself. The wifi signal is not so stong. leg space is comfortable, seating are ok

Driver was very good not like others I've experienced around Asia. Bus was due to leave at 7.30am but left 10 mins early, could have been a problem for anyone running late but it's advised to arrive 30 mins before departure. Free water given.
Very comfortable trip from Bangkok to Siem Reap - staff were nice, seats very good, air condition too. We even arrived 1,5 hours earlier than expected. No complaints!
So helpful and prompt. Greatly appreciated service! Very clean as well

Never felt safe in this bus, the windows were partly cracked and the bus driver was over the limit speed. Be careful, they check every backpack during the entire journey (I got my laptop stolen)!! Avoid this company

Great service, prompt, on time and organised. The only downside as an Australian travelling in Cambodia was not knowing which stop was which, as in where to get off, but otherwise, I could not fault the service I received. Modest price

We were really impressed by the service: the bus arrived one hour earlier to Siem Reap and the driver was very kind. WiFi and AC worked well and we also had time to grab some lunch on the way. The van was a Toyota Hiace and it was in very good conditions.
Way too many stops on the way. Multiple pick up and drop off along the route.

Stopped to pick up random passengers.  Old equipment, uncomfortable seats, and no shocks on the ancient vans.  Change bus at Kampot to an old one then waited as they stopped for gas.  Go with another company if possible.
Didn't tell me it wasn't the border stop and I got off too early. Had to pay moto taxi to rake me the last 12k. 4 dollars.

My first impression for cross the border gate was good with mekong express, surely i will recommend to my friends, but my second bus from phnom penh was not good, ac too hot.. but overall was excellent

Very old equipment.  Drivers made plenty of unscheduled stops.  Blasted techno music when we entered Phnom Penh then couldn't find his own company office and tried to just drop us off on a corner.  Two stars since we didn't crash or have huge delays.
Everything went as expected.
Safe comfortable drive .Driver friendly and approachable

This is a fantastic way to travel between cities in Cambodia. Although my 7 am bus was cancelled and I had  to change to 8 am the staff at the post office were fantastic. The journey was very safe (no speeding), wifi on bus, and arrived on time.
The driver was talking phone while driving a car. He talked so loudly.

The only bad part was that the driver stopped at 5 other locations to try to pick up other people who wanted a minivan ride to Kampot since we only had 5 people in our van. He also dropped us off not at advertised drop off point. Please improve on these.

The tuk tuk leaved me on another station where the lady in the front desk asked me to wait until 8am. It was weird but in Asia you never know. When i had to donthe check in the lady told me it was another company and had to buy another ticket.

My boyfriend and I were very pleased with the bus service. It arrived on time, was well air conditioned and the free food and drink was delicious. We also arrived at Siem Reap 1 hour before expected. Would definitely recommend.

Complete scam. They lied to us about our visa pricing and overcharged the whole bus by 10 USD each. When we asked they refused. When we got to Siem Reap they kept acting like they no longer spoke English. Never again. Don't use them.

Vans are in very good condition, very punctual. But I like to highlight the driver here, he was flawless and driving very responsible...no speeding and no dangerous (overtaking) manoeuvres. We had a very good experience taking the Cambodia Post VIP van!
Clean and comfortable van. Careful and pleasant driver.  Enjoyed the drive and were not tired after 6 hrs on the road. Highly recommended.
On time, smooth ride. The wifi worked surprisingly well and the pit stops had decent food. Definitely recommend.
We made four stops along the way and 30 minutes lunch break, I understand picking others up at different locations but no need to stop for lunch.
Was supposed to leave at 12:30, left at 1:40. The four hour trip ended up taking five and a half hours. Disappointed.
All are ok, but only driver problem. My friends asking to stop for toilet , driver replied ^ Use plastic bag ^ very rude reply. But then 5 minutes he stopped for us. But why reply like this ???
Everything is good in overall

Not a lot of room, I have a tall boyfriend so needed leg room. Had to pick up people around Phnom Penh so we left about 30-40minutes late. Driver was fast and reckless (like most drivers in Cambodia but didn't feel safe)
We were given a snack at the start which was awesome and tasty. Seats were comfortable, a lot of leg room. Wifi was alright, not excellent

In my email it said there were TWO drop off points, we passed the first so asked why they didn't stop, she said because her office was at the next stop but we booked accom next to the first stop for a reason and so we had to tuk tuk to our Hostel. -.-

Journey/bus was good, but driver used his horn a lot , which didn't help those wanting to sleep! We stopped 3x: bakery/restaurant/roadside toilet break! Bad thing was pickup was late and tel in email didn't work - had to take tuktuk -was reimbursed though

Very good ride to Bangkok! Nice bus, friendly staff and even a decent lunch after you cross the border. Only the place where you will be dropped off in Bangkok is a bit difficult to find a cheap ride to the city. But overall a nice bus ride!
The bus very fast I am satisfied
It is good service with reasonable transportation fee. I would recommend that you may want to try.
Decent.
I just order 2 tickets by Bookmebus.com website and I choose payment by Emoney. After I complete the service successful by Emoney, there no email send about the ticket that I order.

Best and easy way to cross the boarder. The driver is very polite and good to know even we are only two inside the vip van going to bangkok still they continue our trip and booking. Highly recommended bus when you are trying to have your southeast asian

The bus inspector was nice UNTIL we were at the boarder to get our visa. I was about to give my passeport and fill out a form, then the bus inspector told me to go see anothe guy, who finally charged me 15 usd extra! Someone told me they split commissions
Excellent. On time and a safe driver. Highly recommended

Solo traveller- Strongly recommended. Worth the price, service provided was excellent. Inspector spoke English which was especially helpful at foreign customs. Warm lunch was provided. Inspector made sure everyone is accounted for before move off.
Really enjoyed driving with them. Good and not a crazy driver, clean bus with WiFi, enough space for me.

We ws two hours because og the driver. The driver was very nice but this bus ride was not okay. Alive chickens around the hot bus. I have backpacked theough Asia for a year, this was the worst bus ride ever!!
Very comfortable, very easy to use. Great wifi!

We were disappointed with the length of the trip. We stopped 6 times on a five hour drive. The last three stops were to drop off passengers and seemed to be out of the way from the route. However, the driver refused to drop us at our hotel.
Comfortable journey
Comfortable journey
Fantastic way to travel! I recommend this as a very good way to travel to a Siem Reap!

I booked a KSO bus leaving at 8pm Phnom Penh  to arrive at 8am at Bangkok. First, when I arrived none of the staff spoke English. Then, the bus, didn't have beds but hard seats, no blanket and was playing loud khmer music. The bus dropped me only at Poipe

The driver from Siem Reap to PP was just awful. Not only did we feel that our lives were in peril (we almost got into a head on collusion), he felt the need to stop the bus to take a wiz. We paid $1 for someone to help us at the border but we were bribed!
Excellent service. The driver stopped regularly, and everything was on time. Nice, clean bus.
Good service on the whole. Quite comfortable.

The bus trip was ok. 
On time and fast.
We made only one stop for 10 min.

We had heard good things about Bookmebus, and with this particular outlet (Cambodia Post VIP) we must agree! For our trip from Phnom Penh to Siem reap, the van was comfortable and clean, & the staff working at the post office were very friendly & helpful.
I like receiving e-ticket quickly after payment.

We booked the bus at 08:00 AM with actual seat numbers. Unfortunately when we came the bus was full. We booked online to get guaranteed seats but we had to wait for the next bus. What is the purpose of making an online reservation if the seats are taken?!
The service was good in general, but I would have preferred a drop off in district 1.
Excellent
Would highly recommend. Bus was clean, spacious and stuck to time. Driver was friendly, careful and made regular stops

The bus was horrible, not the one reserved in the booking. Was dirty, without wifi, from the A/C come down water. No safety. A local woman with a baby travelled sitting on the floor. We stopped in a dirty restplace. Impossible to the toilette. No english.
Comfortable mini bus and good driver. Stopped 3 times for a break including a longer food break. Arrived in PP at 10.30am so 3 hrs was accurate. No complaints.
Excellent
Service was very good and on time.

Worst booking ever. We rode a cargo van not the VIP van as advertised. The cargo van we rode was so full we didn't have space. Bookmebus and Mekong just ignored us. Promised REFUND but NO refund was given.

By far the scariest and worst bus ride I have ever taken. I can't even count on two hands the number of near death experiences I had on that trip from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville. The driver was an utter maniac. For your own safety don't choose Bayon.

It would be better for Bookmebus sell no longer Mekong express. In the bus there was no room for the laggages. So we travelled with our bags on the knees. No matter to say w there was no wifi and no snacks. The driver was no english speaking.

Worst trip ever. I don't know how we survived.The driver was a criminal.No respect for the rules, azardous overtakings in a narrow and crowded street.Totally unsafe.Ovviusly no wifi no snacks.The driver speaking nothing but Cambodian.Matter for acomplain
Depart Time says 10am but van didn't show up until 1130pm.
Comfortable minibus with A/C, had a nice trip on a very bumpy road. The only thing was that my seat didn't have security belt.
Comfortable minibus with A/C, had a nice trip on a very bumpy road. The driver stopped on request. The only thing was that my seat didn't have security belt.

Great service!  I decided to use Cambodia Post VIP services  as an alternative to Mekong Bus. I was very pleased with how the trip went. The driver was courteous,  on time, quick and safe. The van clean, comfortable and had wi-fi. Would recommend highly!

We were there on time, but for some reason we had to wait almost 45 minutes for a group of chinese tourist. When they finally showed up they were dropped of at Koh Rong first even though the schedule Said we were to be droppes of at Samloem first.
Safe and comfortable journey. Set off from Phnom Penh at 8AM and reached Siem Reap round 1PM or so. There was wifi on the van but it didn't always work for me.

First they changed the time I signed up for, then they changed where the departure was; when i tried to figure it out then hung up on me many times. The story goes on and on. I would never recommend this to anyone. Just horrible.

changed departure time and location, hung up on me several times when trying to figure out departure details, stopped at many other bus stops wasting at least 2 hours, dropped off at different location than advertised, the list goes on and on and on..

Generally an excellent experience. Comfortable bus, food/water provided, friendly staff, clear explanations at the border. Disappointed by the pseudo-scam about free hotel drop-off once we arrived in Siem Reap. Everything else was really great though.

The trip went really well. The minivan was clean, AC worked, we got free water and even the wifi was okay. We stopped only once for 20 minutes to grab some snack from a small town. We were in Phnom Penh 1 hour before the scheduled arrival time.
The bus levt on time and arrived on time, 5 hours later including 2 stops. The seats are ok. The plastig seat made it warm but I had a sarong and put it on the seat.  The driver was good.
Our review is quit simple: bus was 1.5h late and the driver was totaly reckless. We would never recommand this company to others.

90-100 km/hour in crazy traffic on bumpy roads to PP. Some bypassings were so close to dangerous that we held our breath. Whats the hurry? I'd rather have a longer trip than have to hold on to my seat, especially when mine had no seatbelt.

I read the reviews and decided to try an online booking of the post bus after an appalling service on Mekong express who we normally use. We were not disappointed,our pick up was on time,the driver was careful and the van clean. Wifi was strong. Recommend

I cannot rate the above as we were put on a different company boat. This was not a problem until we arrived at the main pier and your company was not there to take us to Long Set beach as promised. Your offices there are closed. This was very poor service

Cambodia post VIP  service from Phnom Penh to kep was excellent, got picked up early from my hotel, I was the only one on the bus and they still brought me. It was a 3 and a half hour journey. Air conditioning and WiFi which was great. Driver was kind.

I took the Mekong Express VIP Van from Siem Reap to Battambang. It was a safe journey and we arrived on schedule. We were each given a bottle of water and a wet towel. Although there was wifi, there was no working internet connection.
driver was so friendly. was a nice change from what you get in Vietnam! was lucky enough to end up with a bed to myself.
Comfortable bus with wifi and the toilet stop was very nice!
I recommend for everybody i will recommend your company in my travel blog

So me and my friend traveled from Bangkok with the early bus to siem reap. we waited for 1 hour for departure.   At the boarder we got  tags with bad instruction of what to do and thrown out of and people tried to scam us. Even police waned extra 50 bath.

Journey not great. Bus so packed with boxes etc, was nowhere for my legs which was very uncomfortable; aisle was full so if had been an accident we would be trapped. Also driver drove very fast on wet roads on wrong side of road on his phone; I was scared

Decisamente il modo migliore per spostarsi fino a Siem Reap! Il bus è pulito e puntuale, il wifi funziona bene, così come l'aria condizionata. Così comodo da poter dormire senza problemi! Lo raccomando!

Driver is too dangerous the way he driver. We were supposed to be driven to Kampot we have been left in sihanoukville. The driver did not tell us that we had to get out and take another transportation

We had a very nice experience with Cambodia Post Van. They kindly pick us up at our hotel and we arrived even earlier in Siem Riep. Several stops for washrooms and one for lunch. Drive was smooth and the seats comfy. We recommand it at 100%! Thank you

The pickup location is NOT that  stated on the ticket. I spent a lot of time driving around town trying  to find hehe bus. hebus assistant had the nerve to tell  me I failed to include  a telephone number and that was why  he could not reach me. Not true
Bus from Phnom Penh to Battambang left bang on time and made good time. The wifi didn't work and the a/c wasn't great either. There is less room than on a Giant Ibis minibus.

After having a horror experience getting into Cambodia (four hours waiting in a bus at the border), using Mekong Express was incredible. They were smooth and professional, the bus was little dated but we were all extremely comfortable and impressed.

The seats were broken, the bus broke down 1 hour away from Bangkok. The drivers did not speak English. There weren't many decent food stops. Our bus from siem Reap to Bangkok was supposed to be 12 hours but it ended up being 17. TAKE A FLIGHT NOT THE BUS!

Awful experience with the intimidating inspector. He didn't recognise Evisa and was annoyed by this. Was rude and shouted at us on a number of occasions. Made no attempt to try to communicate. We had to look for an English speaking person at the border.

If you book online then you need to present your online reservation at the bus station ticket counter to exchange it for an actual bus ticket.
All quick and very easy.

The adress of the location of departure in Phnom Penh on the ticket was incorrect.  It was the adress from where Virak Buntam minibuses leave, but not the big bus we booked.  We needed to take another tuktuk to get us to the right departure place.

Afwul ride. Drive drove like an idiot.  Passing other cars when ever he wanted. Often there was not enough room to pass otter cars. He stoppd outside of Sihanoukville where tuktukdrivers tred to scam us to get out of the bus and get into overpriced tuktuk
Do all cambodians drive like idiots? Passing other cars even when this is impossible. Crazy! Stopped 4 or 5 times. Way too often. I felt very unsafe during this ride
All in all a fine service. Seats are a bit small for taller people, but that is quite common ;)

Lots of leg room on the comfy Mekong Express from Battambang to Siem Reap. Large leather seats. But no wifi at all even though it was promised and it was written on the bus that there was wifi. Bus left early as all passangers there and made good time.

Direct bus was promised, but we have to change it in Kampot for a kind of van with hard seats and open windows for aircon. The journey took 6 hrs instead of 4.5 and the driver for the second part of the trip was driving like mad.
Everything as it should be
Great experience travelling with this company. Was the only passenger on the bus which was comfortable and wifi worked great. Will travel with them again for sure.

Wouldn't recommend this company to my worst enemy. Horrible drive with no communication regarding the many shady stops made along the way (this is NOT an express service). Seems to be a package postal service along the way too.
I appreciated the meals during the bus ride. However for the tuktuk ride which was supposedly free, my companion and I were told to pay $3 each. Bus was prompt though.

Firstly, toilet stops are very random. Sometimes there are 4, Sometimes none. Second : the driver will try to scam you in buying a visa of cambodja with him for 40 dollars instead of at the border. At last: the driver drives very dangerously

Firstly, toilet stops are very random. Sometimes there are 4, Sometimes none. Second : the driver will try to scam you in buying a visa of cambodja with him for 40 dollars instead of at the border. At last: the driver drives very dangerously.
One hour late from what it says in the timetable. I almost miss my boat schedule.
Neither the best company nor the worst. The boarding point was hard to find and the clerck at their office did.
Half of the sleeping pods don't have access to daylights. The ones above the wheel are small - claustrophobic people, avoid!

I was the only passenger, the driver was great, it's a slow trip about 4 hours from Kep back to Phnom Penh..the bus was in great condition, had excellent air conditioning & wi-fi..
Definitely use them again..
Pick-up on time, comfortable van and free bottle of water. Very good.
Had a great journey. Bus was on time and the staff was really helpful and friendly.
I was so disappointed!
I had a generally good experience on my bus ride. The driver drove a little too fast for my comfort though, and the wifi didn't work. Otherwise good ride, comfortable seats, and efficient timing.
Everything ran punctually and efficiently. Felt safe and comfortable the whole ride. Made it there in just over 3 hours with one break which was great.

Bus had no belts and headrests at every Place. luggage was unsecured. with the basic streets a dangerous Adventure. At leaste the AC worked. 
We made a stop to pick up new Clients and had to change the bus. The Accomodation there was the same. ferry ok
Was good and like a real bed just little smaller and they had toilet on but clean and tidy very well done

The bus picked us up 3 hours late due to the driver going to the wrong hotel then leaving without us. We were then transported to Kep in a terrible broken bus and left in the office for ages. When we finally got on a bus it was so full and uncomfortable

After traveling for 2 months now this mini bus service is the best we have had so far- free wifi- Air con - and the driver was very professional and got us there on time with a stop to get some food plus some free water. Its a a cheap safe way to travel..
Dreadful from start to finish

Absolutely top notch trip - only possible complaint was the restroom cleanliness at the first stop, but the company itself went above and beyond with a courteous driver, early arrival, and amenities at the drop off point. Highly recommend them.
It was discousting how many cockroaches there where in the bus!  Small big everywhere

It was like Mario Kart in real life. Dude was driving like 160 kmh, driving on the left side of the road all of the time, honking at everything that we crossed at the road, people were crying and everything... To put it short, best ride of my life 10/10!!
Fast, safe and cheap.

We are a family of 4 travelling from Phnom Penh to Kampot. The bus was in very good condition and clean. WiFi was working very good and the driver was a good driver as well. All in all a perfect ride! Many thanks
It was good. They pic you up your hostel. Comfortable seat nice ac. And 2 or 3 times stop for toilet.
Good and fast service. Drop of for lunch could have been better. Drop off at hotel was nice extra, tjx
Very happy with the service. Good attitude and friendly service.
Great trip, will book it again. Lots of space.

This service has been amazing. They picked us up straight at our hotel and left to the agreed point. We got there 1 hour before expected time. Driver was really nice. Keen to travel by this company again
Very good safe and fast driver.
PSD Xpress is, by far, one of the best companies that I have travelled with. Buses are comfortable and wifi is relatively stable :) Pick-up was on-time and well-arranged as well.
Nessuno aveva specificato sosta a kampot che si é trasformata in un'attesa lunghissima partiti h14.30 arrivati. 19.30 compagnia non seria
Orari rispettati bus nella norma bottigliette d'acqua e Brioschi non male
Tutto magnifico ottima organizzazione tempi rispettati

There is no space@ te back of the mini fan voor us europeans we are tall.  
The driver wanted to leave is middle of know where cause of their bad adminitration. When we arrived they didn't know we were comming. 
Dn't book online but directly

There is no space@ te back of the mini fan voor us europeans we are tall.  
The driver wanted to leave is middle of know where cause of their bad adminitration. When we arrived they didn't know we were comming. 
Dn't book online but directly
A good option for bus travel in Cambodia, the van was clean and we made 2 stops on the 5 hours ride from PP to Battambang. Would use them again
The only problem in general is 1 hr re get out from Phnom Penh.
New Bus, and save driving. Top

Very good enjoyable journey , left on time and arrived on time no hassles with anything , good value for money pleasant journey , plenty of room , provided water and had a stop for toilet and to stretch legs and to buy drinks and snacks . Would use again.
Muy puntuales, cómodos asientos, te dan un paquete de galletas, agua y toalla húmeda. Hace una parada para baño. El concierto conductor manejó muy bien durante todo el camino

Driver was funny and seemed nice but drove like he was on grand theft auto, the bus was cramped - one passenger had to sit bent over at a 45 degree angle because the seat was broken. We were scheduled to arrive in Phu Quoc at 2:30 but arrived at 6:00
The service was great, the driver had to face some dangerous others drivers on the route but everything went good. we even arrived before time in phonm penh.
We had a great trip. Comfortable. Driver was very good and drove extremely well. Thank you. Would definitely recommend this service.

This is the best way to get between cities for a reasonable price and an extremely comfortable trip. On the way to Battambang we were the only passengers, so it was like a private car. On the way to Siem Reap, just my friend and one other. Amazing.
Nice option for movement between Phnom Penh and Siem Reap. Overall, very nice experience. Clean Van, comfortable seats, WiFi availability, smooth journey and very good driver.
Probably the best option to commute between Phnom Penh and Siem Reap. Nice, clean, smooth and the fastest option.Great value for money, comfortable and safe ride.

The ride was good and the employees friendly.
However, the complimentary tuk tuk drive less so. The driver tried to guilt me in ordering a day-trip from him, an unwelcome request.

There was a lot of noise on all of the trip: music and loud talk from the driver and some of the passengers.
The driver drove very fast and we felt a bit insecure.
I was a bit nervous going to Siem Reap in  a bus. But the service this company gave was great. They fed us and kept the guest hydrated. The workers were super friendly as well. Thank you!
Mauby a plate with the destination name could help travellers to recognize the right bus.

We had a good experience riding a Sorya van from Phnom Penh to Kampong Cham. Driver was polite, safe and friendly. Van left and arrived about on time. The van was pretty crowded with passengers and luggage, and the AC was cool but not super cold.

Didn't have all the facilities like charging ports or wifi. Just a normal bus. Ride back to Phnom Penh was smooth but drivers were chit chatting away like school girls so bring headphones to block off the noise.
Wonderful trip, fast driver, convenient!
The car is a bit old.
Very fast driver
I was the only person on the 11 person bus, so it was a really nice comfortable ride.

We were very happy with your company and our journey. The bus driver left and arrived on time. We had 2 large suitcases with us which he accommodated without fuss and moved people around to ensure our comfort. On arrival, he hurried tuk tuk drivers away.
The trip with the Post Vip Van was very comfortable and our driver was very nice and helpful with everything. We're very happy to have used the Post Vip Van service!
Friendly staff, comfortable seat (can lie back and hold your feet), comfortable space for 185 lbs man, wide enough without touching other man's shoulder.
Seat is a little bit small for 185lbs man. You will touch other's shoulder easily.

The van was clean (brand new), quick trip btw Siem Reap & Battambang. Much faster than the return trip on Mekong Bus. No WiFI was available, hadn't been set up. I wish I had known the option in advance for hotel pick-up - rec add to booking option.
It was a nice and secure trip! Despite the bad weather in the final par of the trip, we had a pleasant trip.
Great - like to be picked up and dropped off at our hotels.
Very nice service, there is water, there is English spoken, bags were accomodated. Reccomended for those who want to be more comfortable than riding a bus.
I suggest this transportation. The bus was clean, air conditioned and driver very efficient!!
Good trip. Driver good. Air con was poor in this particular bus which made it slightly uncomfortable.

This was probably the most enjoyable ride in a van in my life. The driver was super nice, the van was spotless, comfirtable, on time, no hassle whatsoever, plenty of space and a good price. I am recommending it to everyone i know. Keep up the good work!
Great. Included water and wifi. Attendant even knew who i was. 2 stops. AC was great. Van is clean
Great service and comfort. Thanks!

Driving in Cambodia seems to be a lot different than in Europe !
Driver seemed to be in the traffic as a fish in the Sea !
Fast, clean, comfortable and pretty good music during the trip.

My bus was cancelled because I was the only customer. Eventually organised other transport for me but tried to blame me for arriving 15mins before departure. Was put in a shared taxi which was fine in the end but I had to move twice and it wasn't safe.

I left my wallet on board after I left the bus and the guy in the service depot called the driver to look for it. The driver found it under my seat and it was returned the next day minus £50. No one had been on the bus other than Mekong staff. thieves.
Probably the best company I you looking for a smooth Thailand (poipet) border crossing
Excellent trip. Very comfortable van. Driver very good. Highly recommend.
The van driver was polite and helpful. We left on time and arrived early. The van was comfortable and cool. All in all, this was a pleasant ride and I would use Virak Buntham van service again.
I was told to be ready and waiting an hour before the 7 am departure.   ! did that, but was then not picked up until after 7.  I'd like my hour of sleep back!
Very good service

very good service and journey. thought temperature got quite cold and could have done with a toilet stop. dont know if there is one or not, was sleeping.  would take again and highly recommend to others
Really bad. Departure got late almost 2 hours, no updates were announced, and no apologies until we complained. Screwed up our schedule.
Enough leg rooms and comfortable seat. It only stops once for dinner break.
I have taken Post office bus 4 times, and I had no problem with it. Recommended.

Very nice ride, safe driving, good company, nice views. We arrived on time, although a thunderstorm surprised us just one hour before arrival!
I would not recommend another way of travelling from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap.
Good service
Good service

Good in terms of value-money. 
However, the driver tried to change the sits of two girls that had booked front sits and he offered the sits to local people. After arguing for a while,  the girls could sit in the place they booked. Quite strange.
No Wifi
We are not transfert fiom phnom pen to chau doc by boat but by bus i have payed for a transfet by boat but it did not happen and the refund of 12 dollars is not correct
Great comfortable service, felt safe.
I was happy with their excellent service. There was absolutely no hassle or stress at the border and we made it through quickly.
Excellent price and faster than taking a bus.
Great trip. The bus was smooth and the ride was exactly as expected. Accomodated my extra bags without problems and provided a nice snack.
Great trip! Everything was smooth and the Wi-Fi worked very well, allowing us to make time passing fastly!
Perfect way to travel through Cambodia. Very friendly staff, smooth driving, arrived before the scheduled time, cheap, lots of legroom. Just perfect :)
Reliable company, punctual and safe. Recommend! Easy online booking.
Very fast transfert between Siem Reap and Phnom Penh
Very nice service! Keep up the good work

Check the scheduling with the bus line because even if your website offers 7 AM, they didn't even have a scheduled trip at 7 AM. Good thing we arrived earlier so they accommodated us at 6:30 AM trip. No notice, advice or disclaimer. POOR SERVICE.
Very good value. Swift journey. Felt safe with driver.
Best drive I've had in Cambodia so far! We arrived even before time, there is a lot of leg space in the Van and the driver was doing a great job.

No place for bags other riders expect us to give up our feet space because they have many bags
Driver talks on phone while driving
Great experience, punctual, short travel time, agile, etc
A good experience!

We stopped for a break when a woman came and told us we must get off the bus and staying on the bus was not allowed. She tried to con me out of $20 for using the toilet and buying some coconut. Beware!!
Left a bit late, driver managed ok on the "Death Highway" to Sihanoukville, weaving in and out of the convoy of trucks in at times heavy rain.

Clean vehicle, left on time. As the only passenger it was more like a chauffeured limo service - and kudos for not cancelling the trip. Made great time (PP-Kampot in 2.5 hours) without any insane driving.

Cambodia Post VIP bus is a great way to travel! The a/c is good, the seats are comfy, the wifi is good, and the drivers drive safely. Whenever I travel, I will use this company whenever my route allows.
Smelly toilet
Smelly toilet
Smelly toilet
Smelly toilet

Kratie to stung treng toke a 1.5h to get out of town and was in a really bad state in stung treng we got dropped nobody know where we should go the man at the guesthouse house was a asshole and the drive to Siem Reap was driving like a maniac

The bus was 3 HOURS LATE to arrive in Sihanoukville after breaking down and the driver making heaps and heaps of special stops for various passengers after that. We only just made our ferry, very stressful.
it is out standing experience
Left on time, van in good shape, had the front seat yet no near-death experiences, Kampot to PP in just over 3 hours. No complaints.
The van is comfortable and quite spacious although no wifi provided but i'm very satisfied wtth the service..

The van left on time even we are not full, only 5 passengers. The driver drives very fast and was raining heavily at rhat time.. Rain water seeps in the van making tbe floor wet. The staff at the bus terminal was kind enough to phone our pickup service.

Did not see an inspector. Generally comfortable although air conditioning very cold and unable to turn off. About 45 mins later than schedule due to traffic. Still comfortable journey and would take again.
Overall was good. Got us from a to b, no problem. And 20 minutes early
We were stucked in a 30 minute traffic shortly after leaving but the driver did not borher to explain what was going on maybe he dosnt't soeak English...
Car broke down. Wait two hours for another car to come
The site show nice bus .but in actual passengers like sardines.no aircon bad smell driver very rude..no come back again
Avoid this bus dirty bad smell people like pig inside the bus.driver no speak english.
The bus was an hour late, the air conditioning didn't work, the seats I had booked were occupied and the driver refused to sort this out-very poor
Really nice trip, I've enjoyed very much the views. Perfect times and no problem at all with anything. The staff is kind and friendly.
Super punctual and quick.
Very efficient, made good time and driver was very accomodating
This bus ride was really good, very punctual.
Did not get on the bus even though I had booked it online because I did not receive a confirmation email to say that it had been booked. Very poor service.

The roof of the bus leaks when it rains. Comfort is ok, but not VIP. Power outlet was working. Station in Siem Reap not in downtown. Overall it's ok but given Giant Ibis is just $4 more, Nattakan is overpriced on this route.

This bus company lost our reservation, and refused to allow us on the VIP Van we had booked. Instead, they put us on a slower large bus leaving later that day, which arrived very late. The staff was very rude on top of this.

I was trying to think in a word to describe this company and I couldn't think in another one than DISASTER. We showed up in time and the van not only didn't show up but the company office was closed too. Van never showed up and we had to changed company.
Great in every aspect! Departed on time from the place announced in the ticket. Love the bus with air-conditioning. Nice and relaxing trip from siem reap to battambang.
This trip took much longer than advertised. Instead of 12 hours it was almost 17. Not good at all!

We were supposed to leave Sihanoukville at 7PM on saturday and arrive to Bangkok sunday at 8 AM, but we arrived at 5PM to bangkok and we had a flight at 8PM. The driver was driving so fast most part of the times, and stopping many times. Dirty bus. Awful.

Please add phone number of Bookmebus on receipt as well as page so customer don't need to google. 

Also put phone number of those travel company that are working and accept the call from customer.
ឡានបើកលឿនពេក ហើយ រលាក់

I sat on the 3,4,5 with my friends.
That seats are so comfortable. Van is so nice and driver drived good. If I have more chance to come Mondulkkiri, I'll book Virak Buntham again.

The driver stopped to pick up a friend on the way out of Siem Reap. The lunch venue didn't serve us in time before we had to leave, thus denying us any food for the whole journey. Everything else was OK, the staff at Siem Reap were quite professional.

We were promised a luxury bus (stated on our ticket) but were crammed into a small minibus, despite there being three big buses available. None of the staff in Phnom Penh seemed to know what they were doing. Then the bus broke down outside Sihanoukville!

Virak buntham serves as a nighttime delivery service.  The bus makes frequent and often long stops to drop off and pick up items. The ride left 30 minutes late, drove around the corner and stopped for another 45 minutes.  Arrived 3 hours late. :(
Love BookMeBus. Wonderful ride back from Siem Reap this weekend.
Good price, the driver is so good. Comfortable Van.
I had the bus to myself. The driver was a safe driver and courteous. I highly recommend your service.

The most terrible bus ride EVER! The driver was an idiot, speeding on narrow unsafe roads. We crashed into a motorbike carrying two teenagers and he disappeared! After 2hrs the replacement arrived who was no better. We nearly crashed again 3 more times.
The seats were quite spacious. The driver was very friendly too.
Timely. Do not need so long to break and was an expensive stop. But did the job!

This was a horrible service- never use. The bus was late but no one called me, and no one picked up when I tried calling. Finally after booking a different bus so that I could get back to PP, they called said it was 2 hrs. late and yelled at me. dont use!
Dirty Bus...
Feeling comfortable with bus environment, and no more car sick feeling.
Easy travel pick up at hotel large comfortable coach with some refreshments thrown in - can't fault it
The journey was good, no delays. We arrived a bit ahead of the schedule which was good. The organization of our group on the border could have been better - we were a bit confused where to go
Highly recommend this service

The trip was good except for the second leg of the journey from Stung Treng to Kratie where it was really hot in the van and the screaming music gave me a headache. 

The price was also high compared to what I paid for a trip of a similar duration.
Smooth all through immigration and comfortable ride.  Not over crowded with good A/C

Overall we had a smooth ride. They provided us some light snack, bottled water, pack lunch and a coffee. The bus driver and the inspector were very accomodating. They also guide us step by step in entering Cambodia. I hope they could provide free wifi :)

The driver and inspector only know a little of english, it's hard to converse with them if you need anything, even just water. They're really not very accommodating. The airconditioning in the bus is bad. We were sweating in the middle of the night

Overall this was an OK ride. I was stuck in the back, which is a bench for 4 people and the seats aren't large enough. I would strongly recommend booking in the front rows if possible. The bus was half an hour late departing.
Bus has low aircon so it's hot during our trip. Toilet is not clean.
Have taken the PP-Kampot trip a few times with this outfit. Mostly empty van during the week, and the driver goes fast but not reckless. Good van with seatbelts.
Good service. Bus was comfortable with good air conditioning.
Pick up prompt - coach comfortable & food & water thrown in

No airconditioning, the driver never checked our ticket and when some people got off, we asked 'is this Sihanouville?. 'Yes' he said without explaining there is an other stop. Tuk tuk drivers make good money because of this. No help from CTT. Never again!

A great ride. Very comfortable and clean. Great pick up service. Staff were very pleasant and well organised. The meals stop was a great place to eat. The driver was very good and drove safely. The best transport we have had highly recommend these guys.
Friendly, on-time, comfortable service.

the experience overall was OK but i will write on the internet that one of the drivers/guide told us to give him 40US$ for the visa to Cambodia and it turned out to be 30US$, every one on the bus was angry and to come back to bangkok i will not book wit u

We arrived early and the previous scheduled van was loading so they put us on the earlier van which was great. For drivers, I think it depends on whether you are using a North American definition of "unsafe passing" or a Cambodian.

It was over before we knew :)
WiFi, airo was all there!
Comfortable trip. Ample stops for going to toilet, having something to eat etc. Air con was good. The road from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap is much better then from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville.

The driver failed to drop us at our guesthouse (we have passed it I realized later on) and since we were the last two passengers he refused to drive back (5min drive!!!) to our guesthouse to drop us off. He became very aggressiv threatened to beat me up!

We started very punctually, the air-con was working fine, the bus was clean and comfortable.
Also - very different to others - the driver was driving reasonable and safe
No comment. Thanks
The inspector was very helpful and friendly. Didn't expect the free food. So that was a bonus. Thanks :)
Nice air conditioned car, friendly and helpful driver, 2 stops along the way between Phnom Penh and Siem Reap, arrival ahead of schedule. All good, I'll choose them next time as well.
Bus comes very late
Strongly recommend this company, they actually care about their customers!

I was given this bus and this route due to a booking inconvenience. They sold me two tickets on a "direct" bus and then wrote to me that the bus was full and it would take more than a week to get a refund. (Via bookmebus.com)barely ac really small
Very good service. Could cut out the first comfort stop to save maybe 20 minutes of the journey and cut second stop to 15 minutes maximum othetwise great driver and great service. Thanks Pete

We have a nice journey to Siem Reap. Timing as described, nice check in area in Phnom Penh and the service on board is ok! To who read this comment, please remember that it's a bus...not a plane! Better than some service in Europe!
No comment!
Very disappointing a poorly maintained bus took 7hiurs. Thanks to the driver who repaired the bus and got us there.

The trip SR to PP was good but driver drive very fast constantly passing vehicles. Made me very nervous all the time. But he got us here fast so that was a positive. Being a Westerner it took me a while to relax with his driving
Service not good enough

Reception counter was small and staffs were not friendly. 
Driver was impolite, bad driving, turn on with louder of radio and picking up walk-in guest along road to replace a seat of no-show passenger while their friends got ticket
no wifi, it waa always just a myth.
Driver would not give wifi password. Specifically booked this company as I wanted wifi and needed to be able to contact people but couldn't. Otherwise everything was great.

The worst bus service I have ever used. The staff in Sihanoukville were so rude. Seats get changed without your knowledge, were made to sit in the back corner where the air-con did not reach us. Just look at TripAdvisor comments! AVOID! DISGUSTING COMPANY
Really good bus!!! They gave us more than enough time for bathroom breaks and even gave us free lunch!

The stop over in Phon phenn took about 4 hours and the bus to sihanoukville is not available so they transferring us to 168 bus line. Everybody feels wasted for 4 hours and the information didn't tell us what's happening. Very Poor service. Bus is bad too

The journey itself wasnt terrible but we had $300 stolen from our bag which is what has really ruined our experience with Virak Bunthy and we won't be using them ever again. We have since discovered they have an awful reputation for thefts on journeys.

The post bus was great. It left right on time. The driver was great no crazy antics. The wifi worked better than I expected. You won't be streaming Netflix's or anything but it's enough for anything else. Seats were smaller but I'm a tall guy. Would again
Bus late but driver friendly and trip okay, arriving only 30 min late in Phnom Penh

When we arrived there was no bus. We had to wait 7 hours until the 1pm bus. This bus was late. The windscreen was cracked, the seats were uncomfortable and the driver drove dangerously. We are used to bus travel here and this was the worst journey yet.

I've tried multiple companies with 'vans' which drive like madmen. This was comfortable,
Felt safe and as it wasn't a full-sized bus, not really much slower than the van option. Would happily use again.
Sometimes the driver drove a little too fast but it was fine for me since the driver was very friendly and helpful.

I don't know why the bus was nearly 2 hours late, but it probably had something to do with it being a holiday week. In spite of it being late, the ride was comfortable, fast, but safe. We will ride it again.

My friend and I were the only ones on our Cambodia Post van. They could have cancelled the trip and left us, but they went ahead with their commitment and lost money on the trip. The van was clean and comfortable and the service was great.

Bus was on time, staff helpful, bus brand new high Ford Transit. Seats were large, leather and so comfortable. The driver seemed experienced, didn't take unnecessary risks. The negative reviews we read before our journey must have been for the night bus.
No problems.

OK drive.  No complaints...
Bob Anderson
It was a very comfortable trip. Wifi worked well.
It was a very comfortable trip. Wifi worked well.

Comfy seats, power sockets and wifi.
What more does a person need?

The service,excellent as always. The online chat to get my seat changed was amazing and the ticket agent was super friendly the Inspector is Spectacular he is friendly&so helpful, the driver was very safe!SiemReap staff was very fast also! Seats too small

We took the 8 am bus from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh and only 8 passengers including us are in the bus so we had much space. The seats were comfortable, we got a free pick up from our hotel and the check in was easy at the friendly PSD office . Recommended !
The bus left on time and the driver was good.  One stop on the way for toilet and food.  Good wifi on the way.  Very good value for money.
Overall the experience was really good. The bus was modern, clean and punctual. They even provided a free bottle of water which was welcomed and in the end we got to Siem Reap about 20 mins early.
Highly recommend PSD express - the best service and best coach we have used in Cambodia. Speedy and on time. Good to have phone charger port. WiFi didn’t work but everything else was excellent.
Had a great trip.  Thank you very much
Left on time and arrived alittle ahead of schedule,driver was polite and drove safely,the Van was in a good condition clean and tidy,would use again
Nice Ford big seat
A great opportunity to see the real country. Would do it again. The stops were well placed and added to the atmosphere. Would recommend to all.
The driver was fast, I mean efficient in covering the drive time. The experience was amazing. I wish the cabin was a little bit roomier
Thanks for your good service. Please keep going :))
We bought a ticket for 8 am but started at 9. The ticket on your site costs 28$ + transaction fee, but at the bus station in Bangkok it's 750 bht (22-23$). Bad move!

As a very frequent and highly satisfied user of the Cambodia Post VIP Van Service I was not disappointed on this trip. Driver was helpful & excellent & van spotlessly clean. Surprisingly, I was the sole passenger so had the interior to myself.
Really nice and recommended. We arrived earlier than the scheduled time.

I used this company to go to Bangkok and it was so nice and fast. But, when we went back, the driver ride so slow and talk a lot with his friends. So, it took 3 more hours than normal time. And at the border they changed the van, but the aircond so bad.
Bus was quick, safe, and got us to PP in good time.
Bus was in good shape and clean. Driver and crew were great. They hand out a cold water and a light breakfast sandwich  (croissant, ham and cheese pizza bread, etc.). We'll worth the money.
none
I felt safe, it had good wifi and was clean and efficient... will use again
A great service.  It was comfortable with plenty of room.  Wifi was reasonable, didn't work in some areas, which is fine.  I felt safe and assured of my arrival ;-p

Sorya incorrectly noted my date of departure as the day before the actual date, but the counter staff sorted it out fairly quickly. The bus departure time that day (on the PP-Stung Treng route) was 45 minutes later than what was stated on the website.
Postie van is a great way to travel. Free wifi, very comfortable seats and several rest stops. Much better than a large bus.
We had a nice trip from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh on nice roads and nice views.
empty bus, flood situation,  but driver safe driving..
empty bus, flood situation,  but driver safe driving..

Van left 15 minutes (2:15pm) late but arrived by 7pm in Seam Reap. Stopped for snack for 20 minutes. Driver stopped for 3 times to pick up passengers on the road as the van wasnt full. Aside from the unnecessary stops, trip was ok.

The bus was quick, and the driver always felt in full control. The free pickup in Sihanoukville was a nice touch as we were low on time following a late ferry from koh rong. I would definitely recommend using PSD
Very good trip. Stops were at good intervals. The driver was cautious and felt comfortable during the ride
Interesting option for travel I would recommend this to others
Nice trip
We were very pleased with PSD xpress. The bus was very nice and the journey was safe and easy. The two pitstops along the way were very scenic. Great service.
As all the rest of the customer said - WiFi is advertised but with no surprise, not available
Clean new bus on time in Kep
Just a regular bus with karaoke etc, departure delayed 1h, arrival delayed 2h. Still, quite cheap and took me safely to final destination.
What a great way to travel between the two cities. Everything went smoothly. Great way to see the less traveled parts of Cambodia. I would definitely recommend this company.
Всё прошло хорошо, спасибо!
WiFi proudly advertised by "not available at the moment"
The driver was rude and drove very fast. I booked a luxury bus and got an unfriendly driver in a VIP van.

This is a great new service to travel from Siem Reap to visit the Mondulkiri Project without changing minivans.  The van left on time and had several stops along the way.  This service goes via Kampong Cham which is much quicker than via Banlung.

I would like to inform you that the driver drove very fast at that morning. The speed was around 100-120km/h. I don’t know whether that speed is fast or not for you, but for me, it’s too much. Beside this, your service is acceptable. 

Thanks you.

Arrived early and took an earlier bus, which was fantastic.  Ride was nothing special.  A/C worked fine and seats were clean.  Staff didn't speak very much English, but no major issues.  Lots of traffic, but that's understandable.  Overall good experience

Also, the address is definitely wrong.  It has the same one listed for all of the companies, but that's not the case.  That one is not on the bus company though, it's on BookMeBus.  Arrived early though, and was able to get to the right spot in time.

The first bus had extremely natrow seats. The machine broke down in the middle of the trip. The visa was checked in pnom penh but when arrived in Hatien I was not let to enter Vietnam. I went to Kampong with another bus where I had to pay accommodation

I like this Cambodia Post VIP van, is amazing! I mean is new experience and nice, as I m like a piece of “special parcel” get deliver by the postman to the destination! Highly recommend this, compare to the local bus/van are very horrible and overload.
Great service and enjoyable way of seeing the country side. Driver excellent.

Sihanoukville to PP.  As usual it was a pleasant journey with the Cambodian Post van. The van was late but it was due to the bad traffic from Phnom Penh. Two pit stops picking up mails on the way. Van almost empty. Comfortable and good good driving.
Very good. Arrived earlier.
Virak buntham has the worst service. Bus aircon is not good, bus has many mosquitoes, no wifi, the driver is not driving safely, late arrival, not good, not recommendable to other passengers
Everything ok

Departure and Arrival was on the mentioned hours. 
We didn't always felt very safe during the trip because the driver was driving like crazy, and we picked up some extra people on the road that had to sit on a box of beer or a plastic seats.
Have taken this outfit a couple of times and not the best, but better than most. Left PP on time and arrived in SR in just over 5 hours. Van was a bit cramped.
Everything was fine. The driver passing many cars but he was paying attention.
Please be punctual to leave

I have taken this bus four times now and overtime without incident. In the past with other buses there was always some scam somewhere. Not with Nattakan! Professional, onetime and as comfortable as a bus can be. I'd rather fly but its much more expensive.
Driver was on time. Smooth ride.
GOOD SERVICE ,GOOD FREE WIFI,GOOD DRIVE AND SAFE.

Too many stops and to pick many passengers on way, under my seats put all water so difficult to put my legs freely. Driver always drive and call phones so it's scary to accidents if he drive one hand with big bus like this. Inspector didn't care in bus.
Very good bus, driver and service. Thanks a lot!
Everything was good
Bus was not the same as the picture online. It does not matter but I don’t like false advertising. Otherwise service was good.
Excellent service and will definitely recommend. Would not hesitate to use again. Comfortable, efficient and great value for money.
Modern and clean bus, pick-up was late, overall very satisfied.

I showed up for my 4 pm bus and was told they were going to pick me up at 4:15 because they cancelled my bus and out me on the 5 pm. I provided a local number and email and yet they didn't notify me in advance.
Excellent service
Driver was very helpful, courteous and was a very safe driver. Totally recommend this company.

We left a little late, 10 mins, but that was fine. Unfortunately the driver didn’t drop me off at the indicated drop off point in Kampot, which costed me extra for a tuktuk. I asked driver to drop me off at the drop off point but I was ignored.

Prompt service, both pick up and arrival time, as advertised. Some travelers may find driver speed and passing on traffic congested roads unnerving but that has been our experience across all of Southeast Asia.
Good driving! No WiFi available. After some hours water from the air con were dropping on my seat :( do not sit at the last rows!
Excellent service! Driver was cautious and efficient. Clean and comfortable ride was enjoyable. Thank you!
There was no van service operating anymore,  manager gave me refund and my hotel arranged another company for me to get to Phnom Pehn

The whole trip was a lot more enjoyable than expected! The leg room and comfort levels were amazing, and the staff were so helpful in helping us get visas and cross the border. Very impressed with your service- we'll be lifelong customers!!

My trip from Phnom Penh to Siemreap was really nice, the Driver is very helpful, friendly. His driving skilll is incredible, because oy bus is full we could departed ber for departure time which is great. Really recommend

Even though I made an internet reservation, I had to go to the company and get a seat again.
There is no reason to book online.
I'd rather go directly to the company and make a reservation.
you super company
Driver was blur on passengers location. He was also on the phone. It will make you less concentrated. Besides that pleasant ride.

we picked up a extra passaenger which wasn't a problem. We dropped him off a few hours into the trip. We took a turn off & came up to a gate which was open, we drove in and the gate was closed behind us. It was what I think a Islamic school. It scared me

Bus left a little late, but that was because they waited for a passenger to arrive. Traffic was very heavy in Phnom Pehn, so it took a while to get out of the city because of that. Once outside we went fairly fast. The driver was very good and careful.
Was a great way for us to move between Siem Reap and Phnom Penh.

The trip from siem reap to Battambang was decent. Mekong express 25 seater bus is old but still not too bad. Running AC and no karaoke was a plus. We stopped after 2 1/2 hour at a big petrol station with clean bathrooms and a great coffee shop.
First bus strange and the second from PP was better
Enjoyable drive, easy and organised. Would use them again. No wifi although advertised.

Ferry to Koh Ring was great, on time, enough seats, good service. Way back was a bit of a mess, not enough seats and dropped us back at a different pier without communicating this at all. Cost $5 in a tuk tuk to get back to where we were meant to be.

I was told from your customer support that I could change my bus tickets, but then they decided one hour later that I could not.  The customer support said they would call me back and never did.  They offered to give me one ticket back but did not.
The schedule said 10am. Driver arrived at 10:30am. Google map of pick up location was wrong. More expensive than other bus.
Right on time!!!
Bus arrived about half hour late. How very good driving and decent driving brought us in to PP close to scheduled time. I would recommend this company.
Bus arrived about half hour late. How very good driving and decent driving brought us in to PP close to scheduled time. I would recommend this company.

The bus seat is real comfort with three row seat. Environment is cool. I just hope that the bus operator allows us to choose the seat number when booking is made one day prior the departure day. but this is not the case.

Was told there would be WIFI and there wasn't. The bus was almost an hour late. There were frequent stops that literally involved people getting off to buy seafood. We also arrived 3 hours late, but that wasn't the drivers fault, just traffic.
Very helpful bus staff, especially at the POI Pot border crossing. I would have been confused otherwise. Also liked it that they gave out food & drink

Everything was great - snacks, driver helpfulness, comfortable journey until the border when the inspector said "You have to pay me for your Visa". I'd been previously advised NOT to do this, so was pretty shocked!! Luckily NO ONE fell for it. Tut Tut!!

Departure from post office was very organized and on time. Nice cafe in the building too.
The A/C was almost *too* cold but hard to complain about that in Cambodia.
We saw WiFi info on a sign posted inside the minibus but there was no network available.

I booked this bus from Phnom Penh to Mondulkiri and it was fantastic - it left on time and arrived early with a few short breaks to use the bathroom for anyone that needed to. 
The views were great and the price is incredible value. 
Thanks guys
It was a great trip!!

Do not book this bus (Kratie to Siem Riep) you will get kicked off the bus for 4 hours in a nowhere place in the north of Cambodia then put on another bus and not get your seats. There are cheaper direct buses.
Awful trip.

We were only 4 passengers in an 11 Seater Van so it was very comfortable. The van departed punctuality and was driven safely . We had a 20 minutes break for a snack and another small break for toilet or cigarette. The aircon was good, the driver polite
Bus left on time with all seats taken. Driver was good and safe. The staff in the Battambang Office went out of their way to assist me to get a tuk tuk to my hotel. Very happy with the service.
Really good, a little known service I think, but great value for money.

The van left 20 minutes late and there was a strange smell inside. Other than that the journey was good, the driver was safe, aircon worked well and we were the only passengers so it was easy to get comfortable. We've booked again tomorrow with the PO

There was noisy quite much in the van by talking and phone call. Need more quiet moment on the long journey with many hours.
The van was crowded when all seats were booked. Passengers and their luggage made us a little uncomfortable. Wifi is not good.

We almost missed the van because the boarding location was different than the ticket said. We were in our way to the riverside but had to go back to Orrusey. Please be more clear about boarding location and notify if the location changes.
Compared to a lot of buses in Vietnam this was comfortable. Good air con, a decent amount of leg space and storage for our backpacks
Drove aggressively and the bus broke down. No offer of compensation.  Not up to the reviews

Even though it took 4 hrs and WiFi was, ahem, spotty, I arrived at Siem Reap in one piece. Almost arrived in multiple pieces going reverse direction, in 2.15 hours, 10 days previously. Driver was speeding between multiple vehicles, dogs & cattle. Scary.

Excellent service in a v clean, modern minivan. The driver was great, 2 stops made at the cleanest service stations I have ever seen and the booking process via bookmebus, with the electronic ticket provided, was perfect:)

1. I made notes in your APP with my hotel name and my phone nubmer as well as hotel reception number, why pick-up service not call me ?
2. When I went to Mekong Bus SR station, they told me 8:30AM no bus to Phnom Penh
3. Finally they changed to new bus

Departed 30 mins late and the rear suspension  must've been in bad condition because constant rattling and larger bumps had us out of our seats! Driver made a few risky passes but mainly OK. Reluctant to try other companies due to terrible reviews!

Bus pickup location did not match map linked on BookMeBus. Upon arrival, bus company was not aware that we had made online booking. They hustled to find us a place on another minibus, where the AC did not work. But, driver made up for tardiness with speed

Hello, the first bus from siem reap is a nightmare. The aircon is at very low usage due to maybe the age of the bus. No wifi from the first bus and the beddings cannot even fit one person. The transferred bus was heaven , clean, relaxing, much more space
Very good services. The driver is very friendly and polite and I will definitely choose this again.
Really like your service, see you againnext trip
It was a safe drive. Road between Siem Reap and Phnom Penh is good. However, because of the renovation of Japan Bridge, it may take time to reach to the post office in Phnom Penh for a while.

The driver was very fast. Actually we arrived about 1 hour earlier than usual, but it was scary. I hope the all post office bus driver drive safely. Safety is more important than punctuality, I think.
It was quite hot in the car. Maybe because i sat next to the window and it was very sunny

I don't think the bus is scheduled for 8pm, many passengers arrived after 8. I think we left around 9. 
The person on the bus did not recognize my ticket from bookmebus. 
The bus broke down at around 4.30am and no one even tried to inform me.

Overall it got us from A to B. Classic Cambodian driving styles which were fine. The completely bald rear tyre caused me concern. There was no AC which made it a stinker of a journey and luggage lined not just the boot but the whole isle. Pretty average.

This was our 3rd and best trip with the post bus. We left 10 minutes early and were the only passengers for the first hour. Then just one other couple boarded at a stop along the way. The driver was safe throughout the journey and the van comfortable

Bus turned up late but arrived at destination on time. Stopped en route frustratingly to wait for one passenger to join who was late. Should not have waited for him- without him and late bus, could have reached destination 20 minutes  quicker.
Very efficient, low cost way of getting around Cambodia. Driver was very safe and punctual.
Have taken this outfit a couple of times between PP & Kampot. Always good and small van leaves on time, though the trip took 3.5 hours this time because of traffic and several pickups along the way.
