Attendant was rude when we wanted to self process our visas. Bus took on extra random passengers during the journey. Bus did not stop at Mekong Express office like the email ticket said, it only went to the bus station so we had to pay extra for a tuk tuk
This service is not bad for the price. The ride was fairly comfortable, and getting across the border was easier than I expected, with good advice from the inspector n board the bus.

The ride was good. The border was hostile and stressful. Bribing. Not paying extra fee and being treated badly. I felt scared and stressed and afraid of Cambodia. If you want tourists to come, please treat us well and we will come back.

Good job we checked our booking the day before as our departure time didn't exist anymore !. A call to the office managed to secure us 2 seats on the 9.30am van. Driver stopped 5 times, twice to pick up and drop passengers and 3 for food etc.

Terrible service and logistics. First of all, the speed boat delayed for 25 mins. Secondly, the travel time was 60 mins, not 30 mins as stated in the ticket. I could have spent this hour on the beach...

We were promised pickup service by the company and waited until past nine (departure 9:30) but they never came so we had to arrange that by our self adding a cost. The seating area was really small, i felt chaustrifibic. Otherwise good.

We were promised pickup service by the company and waited until past nine (departure 9:30) but they never came so we had to arrange that by our self adding a cost. The seating area was really small, i felt chaustrifibic. Otherwise good.

We left 35 minutes late.
No bottle of water in the bus as it was written on the website...

Easy booking, very good service overall, the driver was very professional but sadly didn’t speak English. The bus van from the postal service seemed new and stable in the kaotik traffic! Thanks for taking me from SR to PP safely!
The driver was very nice but at times drove very fast - at 120 and even 130 km/hour and he also took unnecessary risks when overtaking other vehicles
The car that I took form Phnom Penh to Battambang at 3:30 pm is old, annoying and the light is unclear. You should prepare its well. Thanks

Tried giving this company another go because they are cheap, but yet again, I was dissapointed. Late and yelling customers. A very uncomfortable experience and it's not the first time this has happened to me with this company.

Excellent experience.  Bus was so punctual.  Left at 9am sharp. Bus was not cancelled or late even though not fully booked at this time of year. Snacks, meals provided. Driver patiently waited as passengers crossed border and sorted out Thai issues.
Just a no nonsens bustrip from PP to Kampot
We arrived phom phenh 2 hours late.  Conductor could hardly speak in English. Bus driver drive too slow and lot of stops.
I had a pleasant time going on the van to go to Sihanoukville. He was a prompt and safe driver. We arrived at our destination on time!
Started on time, good bus, bad driver.

Bus itself not bad, comfortable seats, air con, food. Staff charged 40 USD or 1400 baht for visa!! DO NOT PAY. get visa at the border for 30 USD. in Siem reap they gave us tuktuk who CHARGED 400 bahts for 10 min ride!! that should be for free!!! BEWARE!!!
Very good. The bus came just on time. The driver was nice and friendly as well as driving carefully. Wifi was available also. if come back, I will chose it again :)
super bad corporation , when i arrive at bus station , they can't check that i book online . so everything is so messy
All good.  Fast - got in early.  Wifi was good.  Would definitely take it again.
Good service ! And good apps to rely on

I will be sending an email to the support explaining my situation. I had a very bad situation that almost cost me my trip.
Please wait for further information on my email.
Best,
Fairly modern bus, very clean & not crammed with people & a good amount of leg room. The driver was fast but very safe.
Solid bus service, left on time, typical of other bus services in KH. Seats in the very back are uncomfortable; be sure to choose other row. Also, do not expect spare seats!

Somehow they overbooked the bus and my seat was taken despite me booking on bookmebus. They arranged me to ride in a different van (old beat up Toyota) from another local company in a different seat. No explanations, no apologies, bye bye leg space.

Good service, no delays. Travel time here on bookmebus said 5hrs, but I doubt it can be shorter than 5:30-6 hrs. Also forgot my jacket in the van. Retrieved it from the station couple hours later with no problems. Definitely recommend this one!
Left on time, arrived as usual with traffic in PP. No wifi (don't remember if website said it had it or not). Good service overall.
Nice minivan, good service. I actually arrived two hours earlier to the station and they rebooked me to an earlier van (which wasn't shown on bookmebus). Would Recommend this company.

We booked and paied for the bus. Called the night before to arrange pick up, the next day they didn't show up. they hung up every time we called them. By coincidence we arrived at the bus station, got on the bus finally and then the driving home was crazy
Our driver was almost falling asleep since the beginning of the trip. We did not feel safe at all. Luckily we were sitting in tje front so we could watch him. The middle seat was very uncomfortable.
Excellent!  Great service!

Ticket stated departure 07:30, unannounced schedule change: departure 08:00. Complementary pickup did not happen although called two days ahead of departure. Only two passengers so plenty of room in the bus. Decent driver, no reckless driving = good!
An absolute great experience. A wonderful way to see the real countryside. Would do it again and recommend it to anyone
Great company! Despite mechanical problems and a bus change midway, our driver managed to get us to our destination ahead of schedule and was kind enough to drop us at the airport.

Well, I am not really happy to travel with this company. The departure schedule was 7:45 am, but it departed around 9 am. The bus didn't reach the destination, Poi Pet, they transferred me to another bus which I had to wait for hours. They pissed me off!!
The driver slowed the journey considerably by driving through all villages trying to pickup new customers, by driving very slowly and beeping  his horn. This was very time consuming and tedious.

Boat is a little old, noisy and vibrates. But glad i went by boat and not bus.  After the lake. 


Scenery was very nice and see river life of cambodia. With more modern vessel i think it 
would be very popular with tourists. Departure was late
It would be fine if the driver have enounced the relax pause for toilete when the bus stop. We hadn't know if any would be or not.
Took 4 hours, but well worth $6. Seats were comfy and the aircon worked so what more could you need!
The bus did't come. They said that it will be maybe at 14pm....I have booked at 7:30 am
The Bus was 30min later but everything was all right

I didn't get the seat I booked online, minivan overcrowded (people sitting on chairs in the corridor basically leaning on other passengers), baggage everywhere moving at every bump on the road, dirty. For the PP-Mondulkri route TCT Express is way better.
Excellent service.
Driver didnt speak any english. He didnt inform at the stops how long we stay and what we do. We arrived 1 hour later then planned. Bags were not checked upon arrival.

I paid for a sleeper bus and I didn't get that all throughout! We were only in a sleeper bus for the first 6hrs, Siem Reap - Pnom Penh. After that, we were transferred to an uncomfortable bus for 8 FVCKING HOURS. NOT WORTH YOUR MONEY!!!!
Great trip. Good driver, free wifi, water, good aircon. Dropped right at my hotel. Highly recommended.
Great trip with PSD express, we had a tyre puncture but the driver and attendant got us underway again as quick as possible. Great service!
The driver was really gut and the bus too

A bit late at departure. Driver goes too fast....
Van was OK with Space for leg and à seat per person but Seat not confortable.
I will try another with new van...
On time and nice driving overall
Автобус старый, но вполне комфортный, в автобусе небыло неприятного запаха , ехали до Пномпеня из Хошимина 7.5 часов

Excellent journey ..very clean van ..Air/com..Comfort stops..WIFI ..left on time and arrived in Phnom Penh 1 hour early .
Considerate driver ..very safe ..Highly Recomended..Excellcent value for money.
The driver was over using his klaxon. It tends to stress me.during the travel. However, the rest was ok

Driver couldnt understand english. Was very chaotic at the station as people entered+exited the bus several times, many people grabbed luggage inside+outside the car.Had to change seat several times.Started with delay. We arrived 1.5 hours too late.

On time, and we have a bottle of water on the bus. 
But the driver drived very fast, it was scared
Started on time, good bus.
Was a great way for us to move between Hochiminh and Phnom Penh.
Excellent journey ..very clean Bus ..Air/com..Comfort stops...left on time and arrived in Phnom Penh on time. Considerate driver ..very safe ..Highly Recomended..Excellcent value for money.
Compared to a lot of buses in Vietnam this was comfortable. Good air con, a decent amount of leg space and storage for our backpacks

Overall good way to travel in Combodia
Easy and very good service of the bookmebus team via mail
Thank you
Perfect service!
We were waiting for 30min et it was very hard to get information about the late. Nobody at the office, on the phone the person was not polite at all...

Very professional company.
Driver was friendly and kept us informed, the van is new, the ride goes smoothly. No bad surprises overall.
I just wish the seats could be reclined more.
Strongly recommend.

Very professional company.
Driver was friendly and kept us informed, the van is new, the ride goes smoothly. No bad surprises overall.
I just wish the seats could be reclined more.
Strongly recommend.
The bus did not start at 7:30 but  at 8:15. So your information was wrong. We had to hurry to get ferry. De we cannot recomand your Service.

We cannot recomand the service of BOOKMEBUS.COM.  First they gave us a wrong time for a bus and then we were booked for a wrong time on the ferry.
Never  again BOOKMEBUS.COM

Overall good. Quick trip. Driver was very safe. My complaint is confusion at drop off point. When dropped off, the only person talking to me was a pushy tuk-tuk driver. I wasn't even sure if we were at right drop off location listed on the website.
The Bus is not very constable, and they turn off all lights very early. And the driver and the tour guide didn't speak English very well. But the bus took us safe from siem reap to sihanoukville

Boat arrived late when we were leaving for Koh Rong. It left 40 mins after our scheduled departure time. It was 15 mins late when we left the island. They ran out of seats and some had to sit on the ground. Would not recommend
All good, even WiFi working most of the trip
Bus was not like the image in photo but adequate.  10 minutes late departing but that seems reasonable.  Actually was a good experience.  No complaits

So good.
The seat is so comfortable.
I recommend Mey Hong :)
Phnom Penh to Siem Reap!!

Rather harsh driving style of the driver (quite scary sometimes for westerners)
Arrived one-hour late
Excellent service and comfortable seats. There were a few movies playing throughout the trip, but the volume was not too loud and easily ignored.

At the office they told us they did not have any service at 3pm as we booked. After discussing back and forth finally they made a call and all of a sudden they had the service but at 3,30... quite stressing.
Van fullybooked without trunk was very packed.
You posted 7:15 bus on your website but there’s no 7:15 bus. I had to wait for the 9:45 bus and I arrived at my destination 6 hours later. I am never going to use your website ever again.

Everyhing was fine, so the service was perfect. One little bad thing was before the border, we needed to fill up a visa application document which we didn't need it. At the border the company's staff wanted to give us Cambodian visa for extra USD 10.
Ok
Very bad driver, not nice, stops without a word, few stops like this, no explanation. Very very old bus, very bad trip.

The bus for which I bought tickets never arrived. Man working at pick-up point didn't seem to be interested in helping. He just made a call, talked with someone in Khmer and told us to wait. Bookmebus phone number was off and we had to wait for 4 hours.
At bus station manager said that he hadn't our booking. It's our problem, because we didn't for him. It's no emty seats in the bus. After 30 minutes speaking,he found seates. It was terrible.

Driving is terrible and very dangerous.
It is very dangerous to overtake across the opposite lane and it is better to quit. All the passengers were frightened by fear
fells good and no probrem
No problems with the booking. I was the only passenger and the van left as soon as I placed my bag inside. Felt safe with the driver and the service.

The estimatet time of travelling woth 4hours is to low. At least it took 5 hours from Sihanoukville to the Aiport in Phnom Penh. (Regarding the traffic)
The first trip from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville it was the same issue.
Overall good service. Bus was on time. Leg room was limited and WiFi didn’t really work, but the bus got us from Phnom Penh to Kampot on time and that is what we paid for.
Very efficient service. Safe driver
Really good service. Very good driver and modern, comfortable vehicle.
perfect
The seats were comfortable and spacious and the staff provided us with information about the visa and so on. Overall good experience, would definitely book with this company again.

Il Van è partito puntuale, abbastanza pulito, la strada è quella che quindi la guida è un po' movimentata ma non per colpa dell'autista, nel complesso buon rapporto qualità-prezzo, affidabile buono per spostarsi senza troppe spese!
Excellent journey, plenty of stops, quick journey! Can’t complain!
The trip ended up with using three more hours than planned. Driver was good :)
Felt safer with this company. Still made good time but with fewer heart in mouth moments. The driver was also very accomodating and free water  supplied.
Made the trip in 4.5 hours, driver attentive and helped in accommodating my broken ankle, would recommend
Good service, arrived 30 mins early even with stops on the way to collect passengers further from city, enough time for breaks, not really enough room for 20kg bags per person

Fews errors: pass our seat to other passagers untill we asked them to change, said our hotel is out of pick up zone which is okay later when we called, random passagers make noises and play music out loud and any staff pay no mind to that whatsoever.
I booked a direct journey but had to wait 2.5 hours between destination and then put on another bus company coach that was a really old bus and no wifi.
Great service. Pity it is a Ford Transit and therefore uncomfortable.
Departure not on time, low customer service and inspectors behaved not good
Good and Secure drive!
Very old and dirty bus, with no space for legs or any other comfort. Driver was nice but driving like hell

Took the bus from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh. Bus was in good condition, driver drove very reasonably and safely. Bus was 100% on time. Sufficient space available for transportation of luggage. We can fully recommend this bus operator!!

Bus from Phnom Penh to Kampot. Bagage was everywhere. Airco was not working that well, it was quite hot. The trip took 4 hours, there was a lot of traffic in the city and i think you should always count 4 hours. Good for a small trip like this. And cheap.
Multiple stops throughout d journey for pickup n drop off customers. Intially there was only 5pax and  while journey the van become fully occupied till .
Drop off point was not correct.

We bought tickets and we got the ticket. BUT, you offer to pick us at the hotel and despite two confirmation from your side you never showed up. In the end we had to pay ourself for a tuktuk on short notice . Poor service.
Fast but scary driving.

There was no water or wifi on the bus as advertised, the driver picked up and dropped people off all the along the route. He also stopped at 2 different places for 30min each within 7 KM of eachother. We ended up arriving at 730PM over 2 hours late. Worst

There was no water or wifi on the bus as advertised, the driver picked up and dropped people off all the along the route. He also stopped at 2 different places for 30min each within 7 KM of eachother. We ended up arriving at 730PM over 2 hours late. Worst

We were charged twice for our trip to Sihanoukville. We paid cash ($20) when we arrived at your office, then you charged my credit card $21. Can you please refund the $21 you took from my credit card. Please let me know, thank you.

Very unpleasant experience.

Paid for an express van, got a bus instead. Information on e-ticket was completely wrong, both departure point and arrival point. Uncaring staff. Arrived hours late and angry.

Overall the bus ride was ok. We started about 15 min delayed. On the border there was an accident (not our drivers fault) but they organized a new bus immediately and we could continue without waiting too long. I would take the bus again.
The bus service with vip post was excellent, on time & comfortable. I felt very safe as the driver was a good & skilled driver
We would have arrived at PP post office even eRlier if we had not gotten stuck in horrible traffic at the bridge entering town.
It is reliable and comfortable. Comes with Wifi service.
It is reliable and comfortable. Comes with Wifi service.
The journey was quick, with a break to eat something after a couple of hours. I’ll definitely suggest to others.
They all were pretty kind and helpful. They didn't force us to pay for visa. Just told it us as an option.

From Kep, you have to wait in Kampot to change onto another bus, not direct. The minivan was old, dirty & worn, at one point the boot opened & luggage was strewn across the muddy road. Too many passengers & insufficient room. Take Cambodia Post instead!

Very efficient service. The bus left on time, made a couple of rest breaks on route, border crossing was swift & painless (everyone already had visas) & although the vehicle wasn't the most modern, the seats were comfy with enough leg space & aircon.
The driver was very fast and dangerous on night

Very satisfied with this transportation. The mini-van was comfortable and clean, not overloaded, with functioning seat-belts. The driver stopped at appropriate times for breaks. Would recommend this service.
Overall, we were satisfied with this transportation. Not the same level as Giant Ibis but still quite good.
The contact by phone with the main office in Phnom Penh was bad. The driver perfect. Please my felicitations to this man.

The boat was very small.  We spent the travel on the top/roof of it. We were quite disappointed at the beginning, but the trip was nice  and i would still recommend it on a sunny day if you don't mind the lack of confort.
Multiple stops, 2hr delay

The drive wasn't how we expected und after all we get tricked. We were transfered to a public bus because they said the minivan isn't fully booked. They earn the difference between the the ticket prices. 8$minivan / 5,85$ P. Bus. 2h late. Lost. no pickup
Good. free Wi-fi

Driver was drunk and very nervous behind the wheel. Even though I have a big tolerance for different driving skills, it was not the safest trip ever. Other trips with Cambodia Post VIP Van where very well.

A+ service. No bus transfer needed after passing border control which makes the process easier. There’s a guide on board the bus who takes you through everything step by step. Lunch and snacks are provided. Great service, highly recommended.
Easy way to see the countryside between Siem Reap and Phnom Penh
Drove very fast, multiple stops, very restricted space
Perfect

AC works, driver pretty safe, Ok lunch stop.
Would use again.
Excellent service, very organized.

The place of the lunch brake was very bad and expensive. No pasenger could eat there.
There was no inspector
Great trip! No complaints!

The seat space is relatively small. There is no room for luggage in 15 seat van and we had to put the luggage under our seats or along the aisle. The driver drove very fast and kept honking all the way.
Wifi was not great in the bus which was also very old.  No seatbells. Driver yelled to passengers. They did not have ticket for bags. A lot stops along the way to pick up extra passengers.
The bus was 1,5h late (over a trip of 4h) then planned, but the bus stopped at random places to pick up/drop off individuals.. dont know if this is common
Great service and great people. Loving the people of Cambodia!

Our driver was excellent. He got us to our destination quickly and we felt very safe with is expert driving and knowledge of the roads. He was very friendly, always smiling and we liked his choice of music!
Very good trip, safe riding, wifi onboard, quick.

The van was very nice & clean. The AC worked,maybe a little too well, as I forgot to bring a sweater. But that was my own fault. Water was provided and the driver stopped twice, for toilet and food. Overall, great ride! I highly recommend CamnodiaPostVIP!
Wonderful drivers. Would definitely recommend to anyone traveling between BKK and Siem Reap.

Left on time and arrived on time - even after stopping briefly at a repair shop for a minor mechanical issue (which the driver apologized profusely for!), never felt unsafe as a passenger.  Wonderful comfy seats & A/C, and very central pickup/dropoffs!
Overall very satisfied with the bus trip. Even though the cambodian style of driving might be a little bit crazy to western people.

Very quick. Driver doesn't speak English. Stop in HCMC in District1. Pick up a bit late, so if you use pick up service don't worry they came if pick up was approved. Great chat service. I has some issues and all well quickly fixed by chat.
In overall, the service and driving are satisfied. Departure and Arrival were on time as estimated. Recommended this company!
Van is clean & comfortable

The Phuong Trinh bus got cancelled; we were transferred to another (Phuong Heng) bus. Feel the company could've told us beforehand; it would've saved us a long cab ride. But happy with the solution, even though we were 2hrs late in Phnom Penh.
Very good service,  fast and efficient.  Highly recommended.
Overall good

Il conduisait trop vite et surtout il ne nous a pas laissé au bon port !!!! Nous avons dû marcher 45' avec nos bagages dans le sable...
Merci Speed ferry
Amazing service. Super smooth and easy border crossing. Very smooth and comfortable journey!

Was fabulous ride in mini bus
Very comfortable
Not crowded 
Would highly recommend

The  busstop is close to the ferry. We left one hour late. But since we were allowed on this earlier bus and were originally scheduled for 2,5 hours later the delay didn't bother us at all. The ride was perfect, save and quick. Would travel with CTT again
very wild ride, few people were vomitting  :)
Bus was comfotable, with wifi and complimentary water.

Comfortable seats, save driving for cambodian standards, minimal stop at the vietnamese boarder (driver takes care that you know where to go and how to find him); but bookmebus lists wrong departure point out of phnom penh, it leaves from orussey market
Feared for our lives a few times on this journey. Was so relieved when it was over. Reckless driving is an understatement. Uncomfortable journey. Won't recommend to anyone.

The mini van was full A/C and comfortable! However, the driver drove a bit hastily, horning a lot, typical of Cambodian drivers, and so the journey was bumpy (roads not that good  either) Apart from that i surely would recommend the service!

We travelled with the speed boat from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap, it took 6 hours - two hours less than expected. Sitting on the deck was a lot better than inside (noisy, shabby seats). Pick up- service from the hotel worked well.
Great bus, great seats, great functioning WiFi. However the bus arrived over an hour too late due to crazy traffic in Phnom Penh - why do all these bus companies display unrealistic arrival times!!
When I ask some questions,your company reply very fast and kindly.so I want to use again.
I booked with internet and with water and tissue but got nothing.

We got there two hours late, mainly because it took sooo long to leave the bus station. We went to the bus station near the night market and then they brought us to another one. Would have been easier to meet at 8pm at the last one directly.

They use only one car to operate. The first schedule from KP-PP was late. it caused 1h late for my schedule from PP-KP. They didn't notify till I called. When they picked us up, they said to us "Just a bit late, why you can't wait?" in such a rude manner.
Great service by Cambodia VIP Post. Very punctualiteit and no nonsense - I loved it
I did not use the Service, because the Trip from sihanoukville to kampot was so bad with CTT/Champa. Sorry. Please read my comments I have sent you.
Highly recommended.
Great trip, excellent driver very comfortable
The driver was great. He insured we had water and he allowed us to have an ample break.

I am very angry because they told me to pay 5$ more! So I paid 22$ to you and 5$ to Buva office. They said that it was because I was going to a special stop. May be but the price to this stop was 25$ and I paid finaly 27$. It's a beggar!!!
We booked that bus because online you sell.it with wi fi(and outside the bus it was written wi fi)but your bus had no wi fi!!

The trip was said to take 4 h, but endes up taking 7,5 h. That was partly due to some waiting at the border, but we wouldn’t have made in 4 in any case. What disappointed me the most was that after the border we were put on a minibus the rest of way.

The tuk tuk driver collected us from the hotel promptly and was a good safe driver.
Bus station check in was smooth and the bus was on time. The driver was careful and the stops were fantastic! We arrived safely in Siem Reap slightly ahead of schedule.

Great service for the money and only way to get to sihounuk in relative comfort. Bonus of having WiFi on the buses. They drop off at airport on way back from sihounuk which is a big advantage.

Would recommend and use again.
Nothing to complain about.
Seats are a bit uncomfortable.  Wonderful safe and courteous driver.

We left the departure point almost on time but then stopped for a while without any explanation. The bus was confortable. Thd driver did not leave me where he was supposed to and when I asked how to reach the centre he told me to take a tuk tuk..
Good option when travelling from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. However, the driver did not communicate with passengers regarding the quick stop made in one of the shops.

They forgot and left me at the border without luggage after immigration. Someone was able to tell me where the bus went and drove me 2 or 3 km to the place where the bus stood and everyone had lunch. I know mistakes happen, still it was rather unpleasant.

They forgot and left me at the border without luggage after immigration. Someone was able to 
tell me where they went and drove me 2 or 3 km to where the bus stood and everyone had lunch. Mistakes happen, still this was a rather unpleasant experience.

They forgot and left me at the border without luggage after immigration. Someone was able to tell me where they went and drove me 2 or 3 km to where the bus stood and everyone had lunch. Mistakes happen, still this was a rather unpleasant experience.

Showed my emailed ticket and they gave me a physical copy.  Just remember to bring a sweater and pants because the air conditioning works! Also bring headphones/earplugs because the driver needs to use his horn to safely drive on the highway.

Showed my emailed ticket and they gave me a physical copy.  Just remember to bring a sweater and pants because the air conditioning works! Also bring headphones/earplugs because the driver needs to use his horn to safely drive on the highway.

Buy Cambodian standards, driver was fairly safe and sensible, though the last few miles he drive very fast, on the wrong side of the road. He stopped a few times to do what seemed to be his own personal shopping. Bus ok, but hot because aircon very weak.
The bus left and arrived on time. The driver even dropped each of us at our hotel and since we arrived in Battambang at night, I really appreciated it!
Great and safe driver. Comfortable bus. Seemed very quick!

Journey went well. Felt safe with the drivers ability. Only negative is he was being interrupted in his driving by being called on his mobile phone on several occasions during the journey. Illegal in my country as it's been responsible for many accidents.
Very good journey. Comfortable and efficient.

Der Bus ist pünktlich abgefahren und hat aufgrund des Verkehrs etwas länger gebraucht. Insgesamt waren es 5 Stunden. Auf dem Weg wurden einige Einheimische eingesammelt, die sich teilweise lauthals mit dem Fahrer unterhalten haben.
New fleet if minibuses. Very Comfortable.
4 hours of late so I missed my flight thank you

driver was reckless in various situations (did not allow and overtook other drivers to branch off to
 the  left when they indicated to do so) and was over speeding
Too packed..
very good journey

The bus ride was OK. We were an hour late, which seems to be normal in Cambodia. The driver did his best given the traffic. There was very little space for luggage on the bus. WiFi worked well. We took a twenty minute break for lunch en route.
Everything was perfect. Comfy and clean doublebeds, safe ride. We even arrived Sihanoukville one hour earlier than planned. Gladly again!
Excellent Bus Transfer Service.  Free wifi wasworking
Went above and beyond!

They put me on a bus to outside the city and dumped me on another crappy bus service on seats at the back. Bookmebus also didn't bother picking up my calls or replying to my email when I tried to recharge them regarding this.
Will not use either service

A good trip - definitely worth it if you like boats and have a robust approach to safety. Take sensible precautions for Sun and when moving around the outside of the boat - life jackets are available. Slightly overpriced possibly
Driver fast but - for western standards - risk taking. Else good.
Good driver.  The bus had "only"20mn delay due to traffic in Phnom  Penh but that's average. Bottle of water provided.
Bus was very good. But pickup was so late, (didnt show up at all) I had to take a tuktuk  last moment, cost me more money.
i have not been informed that from Poipet to Bangkok is required another fee 300THB
Driver fast but - for western standards - risk taking. Else good.
the trip is excellent , the driver is nice all of the staff on that trip is superb! until we get off at phnom penh they assisted us

Bus meant to leave at 12:45 left at 2:30 and stopped no less than 5 times. Will be the last time I use your company after only using your company since I arrived in Cambodia 18 months ago. Terrible experience.

Bus meant to leave at 12:45 left at 2:30 and stopped no less than 5 times. Will be the last time I use your company after only using your company since I arrived in Cambodia 18 months ago. Terrible experience.

I travelled with Cambodians Post Minivan in the beginning of December. The car departed on time, Wi-Fi was available during the whole trip, free water was provided. Good service and good value for money.
Varm att sitta på konstlädersäten
Pleasant ride
Very good journey. Comfortable and efficient.
Great and safe driver. Comfortable bus. Seemed very quick!
Bus left 2 hour late, arrived 3 hours late

A bus I rode on had an accident that tire's shaft was broken and stoped during 1.5 hours. That's unfortunately. 
But a moment of that accident, a driver controlled a bus with his good technique. That was awesome.

So bad the minibus wasn't check before departure and broke 2 hours later because of an issue with the motor.
Fortunately one of the passenger spoke english and helped us to have information because we didn't have nothing from the driver
Start on time - arrival on time and the driver was good driver
Excellent service. Thankyou
Our seats that was chosend online was not honored when we arrived at the ticketing.  We chose our seat number but they gave us a different seat number.
Our seats that was chosend online was not honored when we arrived at the ticketing.  We chose our seat number but they gave us a different seat number.

It was nice the Van was newer and there were some stops along the post office to pick up mail and drop off but we didn’t mind it made our trip much more exciting.

The driver was kind and drove fast so that it only took 5 hrs! Departed on time. Wi-fi is sometimes disconnected, so you should re-connect several times if you want to use it. Drivers in Cambodia drove so dangerously, but I think it's their culture...
They were on time, driver was good. De beds weren't super comfortable, but good enough.

We arrived at 30mins earlier. Inspector saw us from a far and asked if we were heading to sihanoukville. When we nodded with acknowledgement, she hurried us onto the bus. Did not check the ticket, did not inform us anything. Overall ride was good,4.5 hrs

I bought for my mam.
And the bus company charged my mam another 8usd.
Disappointed.

We were offered tonleave early since we got there early it was a nice timming on our end.  The inspector helped us by fiving a clear insteuction once we arrived at the Bavet border crossing and mindfully reminded us of the drop off station to be careful.
In general a good trip. Only we left the bus station 30min late. This could be improved.
The seats were very uncomfortable. Everything else was fine!
was good but maybe a bit too cold and seat not possible to turn back
Absolutely first class service.

Für den starken Verkehr sind wir gut vorangekommen. Der Fahrer hat viel aber sicher überholt.
Die Fahrt mit dem Maxi VAN war angenehm.

The wc didn’t work, it was very cooled, sheets to small. You can’t be over 175 if you want to lay straight. 
But on the other hand it was worth the money

But on the other hand it was worth the money

The bus was 1.5h late so I missed the ferry
By booking it wasn’t clear the final destination. So I had to pay extra money from Trat to the pier.

Die Begrüßung im Bus war herunter geleiert und leidlich verständlich. Vor der Grenze wurde dies wiederholt, in den Abfertigungsgebäuden gab es keine Unterstützung. Trotzdem klappte alles, es ging keiner verloren. Der Abschied war grußlos

This company did not inform us they are picking up customers from a later time slot and dropping customers at PP airport. Whole journey took extra 1 hr because of the traffic jam from airport to drop off point in PP. All future customers take note.
Friendly driver although little English. Stop on way for food, toilet. Water and wet wipe provided. Late arrival but not an issue.
No English whatsoever, stopped at restaurant that ignored non-locals. Only positive was we arrived an hour early. Very unpleasant experience.
We had a good ride, was punctual and well organized.
Ticket is more expensive en théir own website than if you buy it in à hôtel for examole

Our boat departed 2 hours late. When we inquired about departure time, we were told first that there was a storm, then that there was a big whale. Turns out the water was rough, and there were certainly safety concerns, but we should have been informed.
Little space in the minibus

I booked the trip for my family who is on holiday here while I was working. They said they could not find fault with anything and were very impressed with the service. They have recommended we keep using this service and Kampot Express. Fantastic service.
Fantastic service. WIFI is great and the trip is comfortable and efficient. The staff were helpful with moving our return dates. The stop was good and Kampot Express was easy to book and on time.

The bus was not really luxurious , it was only 4 passengers but driver stopped along the road to pick up locals , which is supposedly not allowed with this bus company. Driver was driving at a safe speed and we arrived before estimated arrival time.

We were half an hour late leaving Kep with a very fast and slightly dangerous driver. We were then told to change at Kampot  which no one knew. And no information at Kampot  're departure time. We then had tyre problems and took 7 hours to get to PP.
The ride was much better than I had anticipated. Comfortable mini van with a 30 min stop at a resturant and the whole trip took 5 hours. So easy. Would definitely do again.
The service was professional , courteous  and punctual. The driver was very good and safe. Highly recommend this service.
Great service.
Excellent

I was pleasantly surprised by the van ride. It wasn't crowded at all, just myself and two others. It was super cheap and got to Siem Reap earlier than I expected. I would definitely use Cambodia Post VIP Van again.

if there are several stops, the Passenger should be asked, where they get out. The ferry has 2 luggage cabins. So it is more quicker to handle it by the stops.
Disabled People need a plank/board or stairs  to get off. 
Pls stop at stairs at peer.

Biggest downside, drop off point wasnt right, $3 tuk tuk was needed... dissappinted. However nice bus, good aircon. Bags safely stowed away, no probelems. Good steady driver, maybe a tad overcautious even!
On time and comfortable journey with WIFI provided.

The driver was good, but did not speak a word of english, tue bus was comfortable. The driver stopped twice durinf the trip and still we made it to Siem Riep before time. Overall they provided a good service
We had a very pleasant journey. The staff on the bus were very helpful.
Excellent.

When we left de driver went out of his route to pick up other passenger in the streets of 
Sihanoukville. So why must we pay for tuk-tuks to go to the post office when other are picked up
at a place agreed between the driver and the passenger?
Deadly driver

Satisfied.I chose this bus because of a good reputation and for the reason that the pickup point is so closed to the harbour where speedboat from Vietnam arrive. I arrived at 1.20 pm and the bus was on time at 2.00. Good service

Satisfied.I chose this bus because of a good reputation and for the reason that the pickup point is so closed to the harbour where speedboat from Vietnam arrive. I arrived at 1.20 pm and the bus was on time at 2.00. Good service
excellent driver, good stops, all in good time. Thanks!
Excellent bus service with reasonable prices. WiFi on the bus is not stable and keeps dropping.

The driver was punctual and polite, the restaurant where we stopped on the way served tasty noodle soup at a good price. We arrived in Kep earlier than I had expected. I will definitely use this again.
Punctual, clean, comfortable. Very good driver. Completely satisfied.
It was faster than what I am expecting. The driver drives carefully.

Left on time, arrived early!
Highly recommend Cambodia Post VIP Van.
We had an absolutely seemless journey from Phnom Penh to Kampot and have already recocmended BookMeBus to friends :) Thanks!
Bus departed an hour late, nobody could tell us why.

The ride went well, Left on time, driver drove safely by local standards. If you're tall, book the seats directly behind the driver as they have the most legroom. the vanilla deodoriser dangling from rearview mirror left me nauseous on the bumpy roads.
Excellent.
Good bus overall. Attendants were a bit pushy and overwhelming at first, but I think that can be attributed to cultural differences. Very safe ride. Would recommend to anyone!
Virak bus ok, but bookmebus requested for changing the bus&hour without information that the bus starts from other place than we initially booked (60 baht to paid for transport)

The bus was clean and comfortable, even though a little dated. We were provided water and morning tea and were assisted in immigration at the border crossing by a staff member. We arrived approximately 1 hour later than expected - overall no complaints
no space for foot and van smells like dead fish

We arrived at the station and people cannot tell where the bus is due to language barrier. When we found the bus, we were asked to go to the counter to get the tickets and unfortunately we did not get the seat which we have booked online. So disappointing
The mini van was fast and the journey was good. We also stopped at a restaurant along the way.
I paid for a bus but was switched to a van. I paid more because I wanted a bathroom with the bus. Should have received some money back or at least an explanation.
I paid for a bus but was switched to a van. I paid more because I wanted a bathroom with the bus. Should have received some money back or at least an explanation.

It was the worst trip ever! The driver was totally insane and at the free-way he drove so fast that parts were falling of the car and he had to stop and pick them up. Most of the time he was on the wrong side of the road. Never again Larryta Express

The bus took an hour longer than it should have so it's best to factor in this kind of delay into your travel. There was no extra traffic or reason for this delay other than slowness of the driver. Minibus was clean, cool and comfortable. Would use again.
All good, I recommend this service. Transfer took barely 5h including 30min break to eat mid-way.
No  WiFi on bus.
Comfortable Ride
The bus was older than expected with less leg room. It would be nice to have usb adaptors on the bus for charging devices while traveling between countries.
Fast trip in a recent a/c minivan. Good prices too. Will use the service again!
Terrible service ever. I called to ask Support Center. Then they asked me to call to driver directly. He don't even know the area in Kampot. Terrible and never recommend
Great ride overall! No problems!
quite comfortable， better than giant bus .
Wish there was only 1 stop for the trip... stops that we did have weren't spaced equally so didn't feel the 2nd stop was warranted.  Otherwise,  the ride was good.
excellent job. was clean, quiet and comfortable. slept the entire way and did not even know we arrived at Siem Reap.

Great trip, highly recommend. Arrived 2 hours early in Phnom Penh. But if I had booked with a local agent I would have been picked up from my hotel. As it was I had to arrange my own transport to the port 16km away.
Worst trip ever. Bus broke down twice, no information whatsoever from any of the crew, took us 22hours instead of the announced 12. No refund, no excuses..
Buying ticket through online always given last seat due to inspector has selling our to others . Reason received is they don't know .
Smooth and easy trip.
Very good and safe journey.
Driver spoke pretty good English and communicated to trip well also dropped us on his way to the final stop so that we were closer to our hotel.   I would use this company again and again!

Bus arrived on time! Good to see a company show a realistic journey time (3hrs). Only thing is, it's hard to find KSE in Kampot. Even local people didn't now where it was. Name/street for Kampot do not appear on google maps - only the map for Phnom Penh.
Good but one jour and a half late
Absolutely great service!!!!
Fabulous, efficient, affordable!  Highly recommend
Despite booking our seats months ago our bus didn’t show and we were put on public bus- very disappointed

The journey was fine, but we arrived in HCMC more than an hour late due to busy late afternoon traffic. Not the fault of the company or driver, but I would book a much earlier service next time (this one left Phnom Penh at 1030am)

Booked for 13 people Siem Reap to Battabang. Arrived at depot and found had booked wrong date (tomorrow instead of today). Bus company was happy to refund but bookmebus refused and kept our money. Innocent mistake on our behalf. Bookmebus SUCK!!!!!!!!!!!!

After a problem with bookmebus stealing our money for our original trip (had to rebook with another company), mekong bus did a wonderful job of accommodating us. Very punctual. Although not impressed with 30min stop in middle.Too long on already long trip

I'd received an email to say the start point for the bus had changed, but actually that wasn't the case. Fortunately I was quite early, so more than enough time to go back in the tuk tuk to the right place. Very friendly staff.
no WiFi, no in time, too many stops
no WiFi, no in time, too many stops

Comfortable bus with air conditioning. Arrived in PP 2.5hrs later than scheduled. Unaware that there was a transfer in Kampot and getting up to date information as to when we would expect the new bus was difficult.
Very good service

So far, it was a good trip. The worse point was the aircon: it was freezing in the bus!!!!
Also, WiFi does not work well as it uses a standard 4G bridge shared by everyone.
But we reached out destination on time without any problem.
Comfortable bus but it left more than 35mins late. It was a good job I was awake and aware because no one alerted me to my stop, as they said they would

FALSELY Promoted as 3hr 30min PPenh to Kep departing@7:30am. Bus arrived into Kampot (about 30 min from Kep) at about 11:30 & then we were asked to get off the bus and wait for another service going to Kep "shortly"...GOT TO KEP SHORTLY AFTER 2PM!

Wasted an hour driving around Phnom Penh picking up/dropping off packages and locals, the driver had his phone to his ear 60% of the trip. Then we stopped for the driver to have lunch. Over an hour late arriving. Would take giant ibis next time
The staff was very attentive and knows the answer to our questions.

The bus transportation was great due to a sympathetic driver. Despite a problem with the motor which was too hot due to a leak, we arrived at destination! Thank you for that. Not a lot of place for the legs but comfortable seats anyway, so a good company.
Departure on time, a sportive driving and not lot of space but nice trip
The bus was on time at departure but 2 hours late at arrival

It was unacceptable and I wouldn‘t book with this company again. We had to wait for over 2 hours. After arriving at the Em Samang Agency they let us wait for 1 hour.Then a tuk tuk driver drove us to the public bus terminal.There we waited for 1+hour again
Although I had to cancel my trip with Bayonne, I found the staff extremely helpful and willing to assist me with a pleasant journey.  I will use them in the future and thank them for their assistance

I booked seat 2 through your website...i ended up with seat 6..very unhappy...you should include the seat choice is not guarenteed next to seat choice on website...maybe its in fine print, im not sure
Was nice driving.didn't get very tired.
We accidentally went to the wrong Mekong Station, and a driver took us to the correct station while the bus waited a few minutes. Unexpected, excellent service.
Very comfortable and pleasant ride

To be improved
- comfort of seat A1: hard and small space
- place for the legs 
We booked also another trip for the 4th of Jan Sihanoukville to PP. It is a pity you told us the pickup is not available in Otres as we are 6=1/2bus!

Departed perfectly on time, but arrival was much later. Ticket said arrival at 11.17 (which I already knew couldn't be right), actually arrived at 2pm. Half hour stop along the way is too long, 10-15 minutes would have been much better

We went to siem reap from pp and it was actually okay. Not enough leg room for sure  but the bus and the driver were fine. We had 2 stops for comfort and the only thing that he didn't say to foreigners how long the stop is. So we were confused. Overall ok

They shouldn't sell the seat No.A1. It is too small for a passenger. Moreover driver should drive safer. He was too fast and careless. I hope Post Office Bus keeps its quality, but I think it is getting worse. (I've taken Post Office Bus many times.)
We arrive earlier (4hs). Everything was ok. No wifi.
Bus outdated and uncomfortable, 1 hour delay

Terrible experience with bookmebus. You issued 2 tickets for journey, when I called, person kept hanging up as they cant speak English (so why give a phone number?). Was issued with new ticket - seat 5A, bus didn't have a seat 5A. Won't use bookme again.

プノンペンからシアヌークビルまで使用。
乗り場は、わかり難いですが、Google mapで行けば、確実に着きます。車も綺麗ですし、移動6時間の間の休憩先のトイレも綺麗でした。また、ホテルまで送迎して頂き、助かりました。

To shorten it, the whole trip was a nightmare for me. The driver drove at 100 km/h all the way, and doubled all the card. He was doing zigzag between cars and truck. Morever he doubled in the turns. My boyfriend said to him to stop this, without succeess
Not good at all
The bus was 1hr late leaving and we only reached the boarder 20mins before close. Then had to wait on the side of the road with all our luggage for 20mins at dusk with mosquitos.

Everyone was friendly, full of smiles and consideration. Bus driver honked a lot but was safe. The attendant on the bus made sure we were informed and taken care of at each junction. We stopped several times to pick up locals for extra cash. Made us late.

Bookmebus puting wrong schedule, i book at 9am but happened that PT claim that was wrong schedule , a good driver and friendly bus assistant, the problem is passenger pick up after the cambodian border make the journey last 8 hours from Hochiminh to PP
NEVER AGAIN

Left on time, but arrived st our destination about 1 hour late, due to having to pick up a boat load of people in the middle of the sea.  All seemed very dangerous.  Held on for my life for a good 40% of the journey.
The worst trip on bus I have ever had. Nobody told me I would have had to stop in Phnom Penh in the middle of the night and wait for another bus for two hours more. Very disappointed.

This was a decent service. Finding bus location easier than anticipated, around the corner from Travel Mart. Seats comfortable. Can't complain about the air conditioning, though others did, delayed 1 hour. Border transfer takes a while: do it yourself!

Staff not friendly at all and don't want cooperate in English! Our VIP van get broken at half way. After 2 hours waiting under a strong sun, they move us to a big bus, it was full, need to sit on the floor! I was so late, my hotel didn't keep my booking.

The van was clean and gassed up before we left on time. The driver drove normal Cambodian style and made sure everyone was back in before he left during the 2 stops. There was no bottle of water on board. The music was quiet making a pleasant background.

The van was clean and quiet with a bottle of water for each passenger. We left about 15 minutes late and the driver was a little too fast where there was standing water in the road due to the rain that morning, even compared to other Khmer experiences.
10am departure I reached home 4:30 pm so crazy.. Vip van is way better
This guy was great. He didn’t drive like he was speed racer passing people left and right and driving super fast. He was the right speed. Thank you!

The condition of the bus was very old and air conditioning is like not working well. It was hot and make my whole journey so uncomfortable. The seats are small and there’s not much leg space too. The free wifi was not really able to be connected.

Left Siem Reap on time but they did not tell us that we will be dropped at Phnom Penh. Stayed at the bus terminal in PP for 4 hrs before we were transferred to a different bus company called KHAI NAM. Their bus is very old and they said Virak "Cheat you".

Arrived 5 mins late (Tuk-tuk broke down). They had left on time. The woman there told us to hop on her moto (me & my huge bf + huge bags!)& rushed us to catch up with the driver just so we could make it. She is officially my hero. Tight squeeze but fair!!

I was rather disappointed as on your website i chose seat#2...i end up getting seat#6...you should include the seat is not guarenteed when we choose one...driver very aggressive..3 vehicles wide on highway..back door opened dropping luggage onto highway..

The van was very old and tiny. There was no available space for passengers' luggages so the driver put the luggages under our seat. Thus, we had no space to rest of feet. What is worse, the driver picked up more passengers than seats available.
It was 1st of january and i think driver got extra passengers, we sat 3 person on the front seat A1 and A3 for 2 hours. Driver didn’t know any english.

We were on the speed boat to Siem Reap. The journey was shorter than predicted, around 6,5h. The boat was fairy comfortable despite the age. Simple but good air con. Boy was selling cold drinks and baguettes. Overall pleasant experience. Amazing views!
Every thing was excellent. The best choice for me. Just some troubles at the end when they offer tuk tuk free to the hotel and the driver of the tuk tuk  was not honest and let me in other place.

Arrived 30mins late and claimed to be full even though we booked and paid in advance.  They found room and the driver was very good,  so it made up for that.  They need better organisation,  but overall positive.
Thank you so much for the supervisor, she help me a lot for crossing the border.

Overall a good experience. They charge an extra 200 baht to get the visa in advance but we just did it in person and it was easy enough by following the signs. The driver was good and the tuk tuk to your hostel in Siem Reap was a nice addition

Overall a good experience. They charge an extra 200 baht to get the visa in advance but we just did it in person and it was easy enough by following the signs. The driver was good and the tuk tuk to your hostel in Siem Reap was a nice addition

I was so disappointed when my friend arrived bus station and operator told her that there is no place for our 3 tickets. We had to argue to the seat that we have booked. KSO should improve their customer service. For other things are okay. Thanks.

We booked and paid for a VIP VAN, but had to sit in the front of a tiny van, with an improvised 1,5 seat (we are quite tall). 
Ride would take 7 hrs.
So we refused and after some argument we were put in the right van, which was perfectly fine.

The trip was good. Only 3 people in the van. Water as provided. Air con was perfect. Arrived on time. Yet, the coach is too small and straight which disallows me to incline. Will use his service again!
I was disappointed since I purchased VIP van ticket, however they offer mini bus with same price. So bad!
Everything seems alright as plan. Anyway, it is great respond by Book Me Bus. I do love your service, it way better than dealing directly with Bus Company.
15 mins delay is o.k.; no water or wifi provided
VET is a very good service, but check your booking hasn't been cancelled because word doesn't always get through.  Also avoid back seats if possible as they are smaller.
Very good, in time and safe.
The van departed and arrived on time. The driver drove well. My only (and biggest) grouse was that there were a couple of cockroaches on the floor/seats which was off-putting.
No curtain on the bus making it difficult to stay away from the hot sun light.

We had a smooth, enjoyable trip from Mondulkiri to Siem Reap. Great driver, who made stops along the way to allow us to use the bathroom and buy food. Traveling via Mondulkiri Express is not just for transpo, it's an opportunity to see more of Cambodia.
Really quick and save!

Lat, our driver, was extremely efficient and an excellent driver.  My husband had the opportunity to sit in the front passenger seat on the trip. The experience made him very appreciative of Lat’s excellent driving skills.
Good
This was a great trip the driver was very good
Is ok!!! Thanks
Nice driving

Driver was adviced by inspector at Sihanoukville to drop us off in Phnom Penh Before the final stop. He forgot and didn‘t even say sorry. He just said: i don‘t speak english and turned away. Very unfriendly!
Very good
Trip was planned for 3 hours. Also due to a 20 minutes pause after less than an hour we arrived 1 hour too late in Battambang.
I took them Phnom Penh to kep, they did everything perfectly just the coach was a bit late and old (but I'm not complaining)
Incredible delay on this trip.

I booked this bus because it had a good reputation and being a direct bus. Still the driver stopped 5mins before the border and the guys tried to scam everyone with the visas, which caused at least an hour delay. Since you get scammed anyway book cheaper.

Despite all the bad reviews I've read on the internet, my trip was actually good! especially the driver, he drove carefully & always reminding passengers on the front seats to put their seat belts on! Company should give him reward for safe driving!

The bus is clean and comfortable and the journey was good. However, we were a bit disappointed with the pre- journey service. We did not get the notification of changing the time and would have missed the bus if didn't call in to confirm the booking.
The driver stopped almost every two hours without reason. It took more than 13 hours to reach our destination. The organization was really bad
This service was great value for money. The van was comfortable and ran on time. I would recommend packing your own lunch thougj.

Great overall service. The bus left on time, it was very comfortable and crean, they gave us water and refreshing towel. Only one 20 min stop in a 6 hour journey and while the driver was driving at good speed, we didn’t feel our lives were in danger.

Felt comfortable while trip.
but even I got the seat with number, when I got on the bus the staff told us just go take any seats. when we got in the bus, we wanted to take upper seats but all taken. so just took down seats. other things are fine

The bus is quite uncomfortable, goes very slowly and the A/C is lowered sometimes I don’t know why.Also, a guy came onto the bus when we approached the border and said he was the one who did the visa.Later I found out it wasn’t true and he charged us more
The ride included a lunch, which was unexpected but surprisingly decent. The drivers were kind, offered to do our Cambodia visas for us but we declined. Lots others did though and they seemed fine?
You can get safely from PP to Siem Reap in 5hours including stop for breakfast. Everything is clear and you can find reviews all over the travellers blog. Have fun!
Smooth trip, comfortable bedding. Nice driver and staff. But, our seat was moved because somebody was on our seats already. And the electrical plug was broken.
The first driver drive very risky imo. Nearly had a rear-end crash. Second one was better
Good

Bayon VIP was as good as any bus trip from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh and cheaper than some others so good value all round. Driver was safe and journey was comfortable. It took a bit longer than advertised but only because the traffic was bad.
Driver hit the horn every 10 seconds for 5hours! Front seat was too small beside the driver but same price. But quick.
A very safe driver, and despite us not speaking Cambodian he was so so helpful! many thanks.
Very good overall, a bit late but you can’t expect much better when going through Phnom Penh. The mini van was comfortable and spotless
It wars a nice and pleasant journey. I felt safe all the time with the vehicle and the driver.
Good bus trip. Buses could be a bit cleaner but overall fine

After waiting in a very long line to cross the Thailand border, our bus was not even there to pick us up so we waited for well over an hour for the bus to arrive! This caused many people to be aggravated. It should be better organized and on time!
Ok it easy . I booked back koh Kong to PP . On 08 January 2018 2 pm by VIP.
Horrible accomodation, hardly any space for taller individuals. Driver was a little careless sometimes but overall pretty good.

Good service, clean bus, cosy but enough space to have a decent rest. Only bad thing: bus left with at least half an hour delay in Phnom Penh and arrived 2 hours late in Sihanoukville, apparently due to some issues with a wheel that had to be fixed.
This service was an excellent way to cross from Cambodia to Vietnam. The bus is very comfortable and our conductor made the bird crossing a breeze. A great trip at a great price.
Highly recomended

A comfortable journey! We got a free snack pack (2 drinks and a small cake) when we boarded and then a meal just before the border. note that this is where they try and offer a visa service, but remember you are still in Thailand and politely decline!
The bus was so much better than the one from Bangkok to Siem Raep. Air conditioner was good and stable, more space in between seats.

Very nice tour guides, professional, organised and willing to help, all three are lovely and really helped us sort our visas out too, also got a free pick up to our hostel which we didn't know. Thanks for the help!
Punctual departure and arrival, short dinner stop on the way, enough space in the cabins, nothing to complain about.
Nice car, punctual. The driver was sometimes driving a bit too offensive when doing overtaking. (We went with another driver some days before and he drove very safe)
Pleasant drive to Koh Rong
Perfect trip
Comfortable and professional service. Would definitely recommend. WiFi onboard was a nice bonus when it worked.
Diverted a considerable distance up country lanes to drop a one passenger off ?
Driver was very rude and always on his cellphone. Had a near miss accident many times because of the driver's lack of attention on the road but instead most on his cellphone.
Simply Very Good!

The Cambodia Post van was fantastic.  Very well maintained and the driver was professional and friendly. I will absolutely travel with Cambodia Post again.  Bookmebus however, was meant to supply me with a promo code that I never did receive.  ??
Smooth and on time. Recommended!
Trip was typical of the other Mekong Express trips we have taken on this trip (punctual, clean bus, courteous driver). Well done Mekong Express!

the Information given on bookmebus are wrong: the drive from Phnom Penh to Kep is advertised to take 3.5h. In actuality it took 6.5h, with a 1h stopover in Kampot. Try to avoid Champa Mekong! The driver lost his way several times and there was no aircon!
If you are late to the bus its ok. They will take you to the bus by car anyway. But if you are not late if you are in time you have to wait to those who are late. It happened two times in our trip

The bus left on time but was an hour late. We stopped twice from Siem Reap to Battambang. The first stop charged to use the bathroom and everything was so over priced. Driver never once spoke to us, had no idea how long we we're stopping for.
The driver went very fast (but was more impressed by his skills than scared). Pretty comfortable ride, had lots of breaks, stopped for lunch at a local restaurant. No big complaints.
Pretty good trip
Wir sind einmal von Saigon nach Phnom Penh und einmal von Phnom Penh navh Siem Reap mit Mekongexpress gefahren und sind beide Male nicht enttäuscht worden. Empfehlenswert! !

Prompt service that left on time and arrived 45 minutes earlier than estimated, despite a short break. The ride felt very bumpy from Kep to PP, but I'm not sure if that was more due to the old van or my health at the time. No complaints.
Was no wifi
Cambodia Post, all the time good ! Happy to see one company which care their customers on the good way (not same Champa Mekong or Anny Tour which have the worst service).

Minivan was quite old but still ok. I supposed to be the only passenger on board but during the way we did few stops to pick up local passengers what caused delay. There also should be bottle of water which I didn't get. But I think I can recommend.
Journey was ok

Actual departure was 8.15 instead of 7.30 am. We were told time on the website was wrong ... We departed at 8.40 am and were too late in Sihanoukville and nearly missed the boat. Luckage was in the bus itself, dangerous. Seats are too small for us.

Actual departure was 8.15 instead of 7.30 am. We were told time on the website was wrong ... We departed at 8.40 am and were too late in Sihanoukville and nearly missed the boat. Luckage was in the bus itself, dangerous. Seats are too small for us.

The crew threw all european-looking people out of the bus 10 km before our destination. “Coincidence” that there were two tuk tuk drivers in the middle of nowhere - willing to take us to the city for very questionable prices. Don’t use this operator!

Trip departed on time (do not be late), driver constantly received and made mobile calls the entire 6 hr drive and spoke no English. Bus was over crowded with luggage/parcels/etc which should be stored on roof of bus. Locals give preference of seats!
a 4 hour trip turned into 7+ ... make sure you book earlier if you plan to make to Phenom Phen to catch a flight

Thank You very much. It was a very positive experience to travel with you guys. Everything worked well. Maybe for the future, would be great to have a little written time schedule to hand out to the travellers.But thanks again, was a nice & conveniet trip

Not the best trip to have. All in all the bus was late for 2 hours and was going very slowly. WiFi didn't work. In the middle of the journey the TV started showing some terrible film with gun shotting, fihgting, very loudly!

Very good service! The crew speaks very good English and you always know what is happening. The border crossing is the easiest I've done in my life as they take care of everything! I would use this company again! Comfort of the seats: moderate.

OMG this was scary!!!! The driver drove on the wrong side of the road 90% of the time. He was like a race car driver and I haven’t prayed so much in my life in a 9ht period until this ride. It was scary! Stay away.

There was no VIP van in Poipet. All immigration and bus operators said they do not operate out of Poipet. I asked for the address and you all were unable to provide one. I want a full refund as I had to purchase a new ticket home

The bus was on time and punctual. The driver almost backed over my partner on the bordercrossing. The van was a bit worn, and with almost full bus it was a bit exhausting. Giving away passport with little information what is happening is also scary.
To small space.

Great trip, sitting on the roof of the boat en seeing the fantastic scenery of the lake and rivers! Sunshine and nice people. The trip to the boat (pick up at hostel) was very bad organizes - next time we would take a taxi.

We were too many people forced to sitt tightly in a minibus which in high speed and without breakes went toward Phu Quoc Island. Scary! The border between KAmbodja and Vietnam was taking unsecure: the Vietnaese site wanted extramoney for a faster procedur
No place for store small packages and the sleeping bed is not convenient it hard to lay down. With permanent partition which is too small for both bed
The pick up point was not correct and the itinerary did not tell that we had to change bus three times. Also, the seat I selected was not the one that was reserved...

Everytime I go between HCMC and PP, it always takes at least 1 more hour than the estimated time. Why is that? I like Mekong express, and this time the driver let us off in the city before reaching the main office, which is far north.
Kat, our bus driver, was efficient, courteous and a very safe driver. Stopped at a nice clean rest stop which served fresh tasty food.
The seat was small and don't have any space. Cambodians was eating something smell in the bus. There was only 1 stop for toilet in 6 hours.
Good.
WiFi doesn't work!!!
The conditioner make very cold and I'm ill now(

I had a terrible experience. Got a call just on the day saying that the schedule had changed and the bus will leave 30 minutes early - it was only 40 minutes to the leaving time. The drop-off was in a completely different location than said on the ticket.
Everything fine!

Overall, the trip was good. However, the driver drove a bit too fast the road from Phnom Penh to Battambang was extremely dark. At one time, our driver had to pull the brakes surprisingly because he was too fast and the road was zig zag.
(Battambang to Phnom Penh) Nice seats with enough leg rooms. Punctual. BUT a bit fast though and it's scary when your driver passed by several cars at one speeding.
Safe journey

No good! 
Do not bring where they promise. a stop outside the city, far from the destination. there they propose to sit in a tuk tuk at an inflated price! Be late for 2 hours!
deceive!
Speedboat left late and we also went to Koh Rong, not directly to Koh Rong Samloem, which wasn’t made clear during the booking. The ride was smooth though and we were helped with the luggage.

The bus broke down after 1h on the road.
I had two huge cockroaches on my bed, and after changing beds, I had another one full of ants. 
The bus stopped 4,5km away from the drop-off point, had to spend 5 more dollars in a tuk tuk. Awful experience.

The drive was pretty good. Our driver made decent time with out being too dangerous. The worst part is how long it takes to pick everyone up. It would be far more efficient if all passengers were required to go to the station. We will not take again.
We did not know that we are to transfer bus in Phnom Phen as it is not stated in the confirmation booking. My cousin's phone was stolen on the bus.

The journey was good.
But booking experience was poor.  I don’t know if fault of Bookmebus or SmartLuy.  But I have paid for the journey two times. SmartLuy say the money was sent, bookmebus say it wasn’t received.  So for a $9 ticket, I have paid $18.

Our driver was an hour late.
Just outside Phnom Penh two locals were picked up...did not seem like they paid and they were quite loud.
Wifi did not work.
However, driver was very nice and drove well...no HOOTING, which was fabulous

Initially we booked the bus for 8.00 am but the bus was broken (this is what we were told) so we left with the next bus 9.00 am which was not a big problem for us. Food was provided too. Overall we are satisfied and we plan to use their services again.
I hope wi-fi service be available.

Very good service, clean and as far as journeys ion Asia roads compared to European not bad at all.  The instructions and directions on website were excellent. We went from Kep to Phnom Penh.  Good and comfortable van.  Would recommend definitely

The drop of point wasn’t at the same location that the one write down on the paper booking. And nobody told us, that’s not pleasant. 
Please check your location with the driver before leaving us in an other place. 
Thank you
Left early as we were already complete and had a very good ride. Fast, efficient and good.

I sat in the central area of the bus, so could not really inspect the driving skills of the driver but from my impression it was a good driver, I was satisfied with the driving skills. The bus left on time, 5min past 9am. Good job!

We buy 2 tickets to go to Phnom Penh to kampot but the van never came. We were waiting at the meeting point who was in the email but nothing. 
I want to add That we tried to call the compagny but no one  answerd

It's not glamorous but a fabulous experience. The boat left very late, about 1.5 hours after schedule, so don't plan on getting there at 7am (30mins before scheduled departure). 8.30 would have been fine. Regardless, we loved it. Definitely recommend.
Bon voyage avec du personnel attentif et disponible. A refaire
Fast ride! We stopped multi time to eat at good places.

Our schedule said that we would arrive in Sihanoukville at 09.30am but we arrived at 1.30pm (4 hours latr) after waiting in Phnom Penh for 3 hours. We tried to ask the instructor for help but they just said 'wait'. The driver could not speak English.
Seat 8a was like a cot. Not fit for a person to lie down in.
Good service

The bus that I boooked left without me. Due to not being picked up at my hostel (which I confirmed twice via email), don’t know why. Was supposed to arrive I’m at my final destination at 6.30 pm, arrived at 10.30 instead. They screwed up but fixed it.
Hello! I think I fogot my towel and Bikini in a plastic bag in the bus to Battambang. Is it possible to get it back in Siem Reap?
All was okay, perhaps an English speaking person would be  quite useful. Not very comfortable for tall people.

We asked for pick-up at the company office and manager said that it will at 7:00 (arriving was at 7:30).
But noone came and we were forced to take taxi
Good value and comfortable seats with nice AC

This was the worst company we used in Cambodia. 90min delay. 40 people in the bus for only 35 seats! They managed to convince people to seat in the middle : they do not care about safety. 7$ per person to do 100km, whereas we paid 8$ to PP - SR with EMS
Cheap, fast, comfortable, easy to find in Phnom Penh and on time, I couldn't see any better way of travelling to Siem Reap
You guys dona great great great job !! Thanks for let us feelimg home and safe. See uou on the road !

Driver to loud, 
Cockroach on the seats 
Brutal stops 
An awful night

After loading up the van in Phnom Penh, we left about 15 minutes late but no drama ... including 2 short stops, we still arrived in Siem Reap early. Only downside, other than office staff nobody spoke English so communicating was not possible.

After arriving a bit early, I was able to store my pack until bus arrival. No problems passing through Vietnam/Cambodia border, as I already had my visa ... took no more than 20 minutes! Bus host very nice and happy to arrive on time!
Love this bus company for my trip from Battambang ?????.
Shouldn’t pick up passengers on the street
Reliable and Good value for money. Need  some announcement in the bus whenever it goes to a bus stop for passengers to know what's going on
Reliable and Good value for money. Need  some announcement in the bus whenever it goes to a bus stop for passengers to know what's going on

Good service
 Left on time

CTT should make their time schedule realistic. The driver was skillful, but  had to drive like a maniac to make any headway against the 4 hr supposed trip, but it still took 6 hrs . The bus from Phnom Pehn to Sihanoukville,  turns around . Late both ways

We paid for a mini van, but were put in bus, which was over half an hour late. Then the driver drived like a maniac, overtaking in many dangerous situations. We took more than 5 hours on a trip that should have lasted only 4 hours. NOT RECOMMENDED!
Great experience from beginning to end. Handling the border control to enter Vietnam was a breeze.
The cheapest and easiest way to travel around Cambodia. The postal service are brilliant.
Second time I have used this bus service and absolutely no complaints! Punctual, safe And comfortable.

the bus that I bought did not arrive and they told me that I had to wait for the next one that arrived in 3 hours more. When arriving at the border of Cambodia they threw me out of the bus because I did not have a visa so it was a very bad experience !!
The service was good and efficient. Wifi was useful.
Smooth comfortable trip ?
The driver was professional and helpful.  The bus has wifi which we can use during the trip.  Although the bus journey was long, there were stopovers for toilets and meals.  Highly recommended!

Suicide night bus experience. Survival chances approx. 39%. Besides a crazy driver, even an accident with a low speed would have meant sure death. No WiFi although promised! Several dubious stops and no English speaking staff. Any questions?!?
All was fine; would recommend
Our inspector was really lovely-he offered a morning snack and was helpful with border control. Thanks Mekong! :)
The bus staff did not announce the names of the stops, and also did not explain how much time for each stop, which lead to some confusion. Otherwise, fine.
Très satisfaits de notre voyage, sommes arrivés presque à l'heure malgré la circulation en arrivant sur Siem Reap. Le chauffeur conduisait très bien.

I heard about this bus from movetocambidia.com and I am so happy I did!! It was a great trip. Driver was polite and drove carefully. Van was super nice and new. Overall it was a great trip and I would definitely ride it again.

Thumbs up for this company. I like the fact that driver stopped few times, to freshen up and grab some snacks.
Hectic trip, but overall ok.
The departure from Phnom Penh to Kampot was in time. The bus was comfortable, good seats, AC and Free WiFi. The ride was fast and the bus arrived in time in Kampot.

comfortable and rapid service in reasonable price.
compared to the other bus service, about 30 minutes earlier.
on the way to Kampot, there was 1 place to take a rest.
Overall an okay experience. The bathroom started to smell and was very strong. The bus left a little late but we got to our destination.
Super happy with this service. Easy to find pick up points and we got there safely in a comfortable mini bus. Would definitely recommend, very professional service.

The reason I gave 4 out of 5 was because the seat I booked was given to someone else. It seems like you have to go to the station and replace your printed ticket with one from the station. Rest of the trip went smoothly.
If you only want to get from A to B quickly, the bus is the perfect way. But just because the driver drove for one’s life and risk dodgy situations. If you want to live, don’t travel by bus.
Disapppinting there was no toilet on board for such a long trip. The driver was a bit too fast. Punctuality was not a priority on this trip.
Disapppinting there was no toilet on board for such a long trip. The driver was a bit too fast. Punctuality was not a priority on this trip.
Teljesen rendben volt minden. Elegedett vagyok! Visszafelé is velük megyek. :)

The driver was driving at extreme speed at times, taking over cars in curves or in hills. We had several stops but he never communicated on when we are expected back and once he already finished eating when we were should have lunch (at 10am..)
We had no information about the change of bus in phnom penh, we had to wait 2hours at the phnom penh station bus waiting for the next one.

Best bus trip I have had in Cambodia! Helpful staff at the PP depot, clean, modern bus with aircon and seatbelts, good sensible driving, smooth trip, on time.Booked the return trip immediately!! On line booking great too as you can choose your seat number

The bus departed on time and arrived a little after the time – but in the drivers defense, the traffic was chaotic in Phnom Pehn. 
Very comfortable bus, lots of space for legs and bags. Nothing to complaint about — would definitely book it again!
A little old but comfortable van with a nice driver. We arrived before the schedule to Kampot. Would book it again – absolutely nothing to complain about!

We start at time. At the beguining, the driver was driving very slowly, and he hadn't take the good road. After, he as driven very fast on a road with many trafic.The duration of the trip was so long: 4h30.

The travel was great! We left from Phnom Penh at 7.30 am and arrived at 11.30am at Kep with a small break for breakfast. The bus is passing by the pier to go to Rabbit Island so you can ask to the driver to make a stop!
