Mekong Service was wonderful, the bus was clean and comfortable, our driver was perfect and the way he drove was beyond my expectations considering the traffic. We will recommend Mekong Express to all our friends. More than satisfied by your company!!!
2h de retard à l'allé, 3h de retard au retour... le tout pour voyager dans des bus minuscules et surchargés ! Je deconseille fortement !
Great!

Overall the boat was ok but not much space. Yet, there were not many people so I could use 3 seats and lie down. Windows are yellow (maybe to reflect the sun) so you cannot see outside from the boat, you need to go out. Takes 7 hours, slow.
Departed on time. Arrived early! Smooth ride. WiFi worked.
Driving the bus not so good, most slowly.maximun 65-68 km pH.
Driving the bus not so good, most slowly.maximun 65-68 km pH.
No seatbelts, a NO GO considering Cambodian traffic and the way people drive here, especially buses.

I think bookmebus.com is the best option among other hassle situation, especially as a tourist, I have no idea what would happen without bookmebus. It is very helpful and pleasant journey that I have had with the Nattakan bus that I bought online.
Very comfortable ride in a modern new vehicle.  Excellent driver.
Megbízható, jó volt a sofőr. Egy megálló volt ebédidőben. Az indulás és az érkezes is pontos volt.

The bus arrived in time at the pick-up point. The seats are comfortable, the bus comes with seatbelts, AC and Free WiFi. The driver was going really fast (maybe a little bit too fast), but everything was safe. We arrived 20 minutes before schedule.
Advertised as having water and Wi-fi, didn’t have either. I also couldn’t really feel the air con/fan.
Very unfriendly driver with a breathtaking space. Ther were no WiFi on the Bus even it should be.
WORST TRAVEL EVER WITH NATTAKAN BUS COMPANY.
Tutto ok

Driver was 40 minutes late. Didn’t apologize. Didn’t accommodate our reserved seat assignments because his friends were sitting in our seats. Told us to sit somewhere else when the whole van was empty. Didn’t stop for the restroom during our 3 hour drive.

Took 2 buses with Cambodia Post and they were always on time. Driver stopped twice on a 6 hour drive. For lunch he allowed for 30 min which was just enough. Driver didn’t speak much English but was safe and time estimates are right on point.
Happy with service, arrived 2h early thanks to smooth drive and almost 1h at border

My journey started from Siem Reap to Ho Chi Minh City. It is sleeper bus and don't expect luxurious class. but in my own experiences it is worth a try, even though the staffs are not friendly at all and less informative.

Fast, save and comfy,can't complain
We were 1 hour late but just because of terrible traffic in Phnom Pehn, but I felt safe whole journey and it's most important part of the trip. 
PS: Some tuktuk drivers dont know where post office in Sihanoukville is!

KSO was not great. Told me when I boarded of a non listed stop due to Thailand Immigration not being open until 7:30a. This added 5-6 hours to the trip. Then was unexpectedly transferred to another "bus" which ended up being a mini van. (van was nice)

Buva Sea wouldn't accept my e-ticket despite their own ticket office checking us in with it. Said I paid for a ticket in the "opposite direction" and insisted I pay cash directly to the ticket inspector or miss the ferry. Bookmebus have been great though.

Very good service. Comfortable conditions. At the border had to pay 100 baht on top of the visa which was annoying. Also told that we have free transport to hostel after arrival however, driver named Coco insisted we had to pay him (tried to scam us).
The ride was pretty nice. Rough roads but the driver made the best out of it. Got a row for us and had a pleasent journey.
it was a bit confusing since they pick us up drop us at the station and again took us to another station to take a van. Memorable experience and good driver. Overall rating is 8.5 out of 10

Return journey from Sen Monorom to PP, both trips were great. Modern aircon bus with seatbelts, pick your own seat with online booking. They picked us up from our hotel in SM, good driver, smooth ride and right on time. Thoroughly recommend!

The bus from Sihanoukville tp phnom Penh was delayed about 30 minutes. But despite the delay we made a break for one hour in the middle of nowwhere. I was afraid that I will miss my bus in Phnom Penh, but nobody reacted and answered my questions.
Worth the money. The driver was friendly and talkative ? ? ?.
We had a great experience except for a little delay for the pick up driver option to arrive. We left at probably 9am and arrived at 6pm in BKK.

Departure was 30 min late, but staff in post office informed me when I asked, so not a big problem. Made two stops between Battambang and PP. 6 hours total. Driving was safe and driver spoke basic English.
Do not use this company, Buva Sea!! Had to wait for 2 hours past the departure time. Ruined the whole day!!

The driver was good and we felt safe. The only negative things were that there wasn't much legroom in the van and the driver didn't announce anything when we stopped for a 30-minute break. He should have mentioned that in English.

The bus showed up on time. We got our booked beds and everything was fine. We stopped several times from mondulkiri to phnom penh. Some stops were in the middle of nowhere, so be ready to pee/whatever in the nature close to wild dogs yelling at you.
Perfect service!

Very safe and comfortable trip with AC. Left 10 minutes late but somehow arrived an hour early! Had confidence in the driver. Bottle of water suppliied. Toilet stops and lunch break. Highly recommended way to go.
Cancelled it weeks ago - and you thanked me for letting you know!  Why are you asking me how it went?

Unfortunately the driver didnt pick us up, and the company didnt pay refund. We were asking pick up from the hotel, and we were waiting at the reception from 30 minutes before the bus start. The driver didnt call us, and didnt speak with the repection.
The drive was horrible.
The drive was horrible.
The trip was on time and efficient. Will recommend it to friends. the driver was very competent. Seemed to honk the horn incessantly, otherwise he was fine.

Sorya buses are awful. Broken seats, dirt everywhere, infrequent bathroom stops, being told to get off and pee along the road with men, no seat belts, rude driver constantly honking & driving dangerously,, no wifi. Never again. I dread the return trip.
Staffs are really nice and helpful, accurateness information provided on each stop.
I arrived in Battambang over 2 hours late, The drivers stopped twice for long periods of time.
Good service, got us there in good time, would use again
Comfort and safe. Driver was very friendly and helpful ????.
I booked the taxi for Kampongtom then I changed my mine to extend my trip to Siem Reap without any penalty from the site. The car was clean, the driver was pro and friendly.
Comfort and fast.

The drop off point in Koh Kong is different from shown on the website. It is far away from our hotel. We need to take another Tuk Tuk to the city. And the driver didn't tell us clearly the station. We nearly missed this stop and went to Thailand.

The driver was very bad attitude, always on phone from PP-SR using very rude words in working time. Impolite (act like a BOSS) lols! 
Will never go with this company again!
Great trip! No issues. Stopped for a bathroom break halfway through. Very timely and comfortable. Thank you!
The bus was late  but the driver was verry good
The bus was late  but the driver was verry good we had to wait half en houre  en the office was closed

Said VIP but with 11 seats in a van. Was certainly not VIP.
Driver was good. Never felt unsafe.
Everything was good. Safe driving. Driver picked up a couple of locals on the way, cash payment right in his pocket, not a huge problem though as there were plenty of free seats.
No further comments
Super voyage merci poste Cambodgia?
Overall a very good service and punctual.
Very good service, economical way to travel and punctual.
We had to call the hotline, there was no driver to pick us up. So we left 30 minutes late.
It was quite safe this time. Comfortable ride.

Can't really fault these guys,  we left on time and arrived on time. The driving standard I would say is very similar to other bus companies we have used here in Cambodia, on the edge but got us there in one piece.
Bus was comfortable and clean, left a little bit later than original departure time but the usual Cambodian driving style made sure we arrived on time.

Good service and driver was safe felt fairly comfy as busses go but way too many stop just for locals to pick up stupid things it’s a 5 hour journey and I think there should be two stops then just get there
Attention le terminus du van n'est pas celui indiqué sur le plan.

A great ride between SR and PP. arrived 30 minutes early even.
Driver got progressively sicker during the trip, coughed and sneezed the entire trip. Felt sorry for two French ladies in the front seats. Won’t be surprised if the fam or I get sick soon.
Hard upright seats in mini bus with little view if not by window ! Very fast driver which seems to be the norm in Cambodia! A 5 hour trip just about bearable
Good and fluently
The team helped a lot with visa and at the boarder.
It took so long to Delivery the goods. No one is responsible for provincial post office during breaktime, wait for a long time
The trip was good. Water as provided. Air con was perfect. Arrived on time. Will use his service again!.
The trip from Phnom Penh to Kampot was on time and efficient. Will recommend it to friends. the driver was very polite.
Hello! I've been using Private Taxi services for 1 month now. I am very satisfied with the quality of the services provided. Very informative, easy to contact to private taxi driver.
I recommend everyone to contact for booking transfers in private taxi.
The driver help us to pick up our luggage in the car. We met in time and it was easy to find him. Everything is excellent.
This bus ride was quite nice, though a little hot at first. The wifi worked well and we arrived on time with no problems.
Vert good  organisation ! I Will do positiv recommandation
This ride was absolutely good. The driver was drove smooth for the entire trip. Good services. Had 2 stops during the duration. Definitely will use this van again on my next trip to Siem Reap
Unfortunately no Wifi

Really small boat with absolutely no comfort. We were expecting something better. There was a small toilet, if you can call it that. It wasn’t possible to buy anything. We traveled with a child, and it felt very unsafe because of the nonexistent life vest
Everything was good
Fantastic punctual service. Highly recommend.
Pay 3 dollars more and have a way better and more spacious trip with Mekong Express
Good trip, safe driver. The road from siem reap to Phnom phen is very good. We stopped twice to go to the toilers and one to quickly have lunch (20min). Good experience that we recommand !

Trip took 2 hours longer than expected. Driver didn't know where the address was, we had to use google maps to find the place ourselves. He had someone on the phone helping him (we don't know if from the company) that tried getting more $ from us at end.
crazy driver. we were not sure to come alive ... company to avoid if you want to live.
crazy driver. we were not sure to come alive ... company to avoid if you want to live.

I've read a lot of bad reviews, but I must admit that we haven't had any problems at all. Yes it is a bit chaotic at the pier and the staff doesn't speak English, but our trip back and forth was safe and right on time. No complaints at all!

Driver didn't spoke a word English. He stopped now and then, opened the door and without saying anything took off. He also picked up a few Cambodian people who were late, so we had to wait. Pretty annoying! Must admit the trip was safe.
Ac was not working 100% but otherwise we departed on time and arrived per schedule in spite of the negative feedbacks

Good experience. Driver spoke English and was very friendly. I was the only western tourist and the bus was full of locals, businessmen and a monk. Very clean mini-van and comfortable. Stopped twice. Overall I recommend!

This bus is not something I can recommend! It took 5,5 hours before we had a break, other than all of the many many small stop they "had" to do, to Pick up people and stuff. We stoped 12 times to Pick up people! The Van was old, dirty and uncomfortable!
The booked 3day tour to Angkor did not take place because the driver dös NOT appear. No Mail, no Cancellation, NOTHING!!!
No issues at all.  Arrived to my destination earlier than expected, including 2 bathroom breaks.  Driver was friendly and had good music on.  Highly recommend.

My 2nd time using this company.  Experience not as good as the first time.  Only 2 issues were 1) My seat had garbage already on it when i sat down, and 2) the driver was on his phone most of the time.  Other than that, everything else went smoothly.
the seats are a bit cramped but quite punctual and organised.

Arrived at station early so was asked if we wanted to go on earlier bus which we did. Bus guide very helpful at border crossing sorting out the visas. Snack and water given and a 20 min stop for lunch. Great experience!
Super chauffeur
Trip ok and pretty much on time. Did not like all luggage piled up next to driver as no one on bus could see anything out of front window ?
All good!
All good!
Fast and efficient!

“Mini-bus” really an 11 passenger van, is best for traveling SE Asia. Driver is aggressive but safe. Passes massive trucks on one lane roads saving you time. Driver left on time (although left something behind and had to go back) but made up for it

I will not be using this service again. Not only on the way there were we an hour and a half late but we left on the way home almost an hour past due. It's rude and misleading to have such blatantly wrong travel times.

Driver passed everything without regard for road conditions or oncoming traffic. He locked up the brakes twice to avoid collisions. Driver repeatedly talk on the phone. No luggage space because of cargo. A/C worked poorly. Worst SHV ride in 9 years.
Very fast and efficient. A/C too strong though, was a bit cold.
Great trip....comfortable journey, set off at correct time, had 2 short stops and a 20 minute lunch stop and arrived on time. Will certainly use again.
Everything was excellent. Great service! Thanks

Took the Mekong Express from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh. The seats at the back of the mini bus were incredibly cramped. The traffic into the city was terrible and we arrived an hour late and the driver made us get out at the wrong drop off point.

Horrible, van and driving were ok, but the driver picked up five locals and put the money straight into his own pocket. One of them was a very annoying child, the mother allowed him to scream incessantly for 5h and also to urinate from inside the van

Great service.arrived on time even stopped for food on root.
Would definitely use again 
Thanks
Driver arrived exactly at 4PM which was the agreed time. A bit late for a "Meet & Greet" but he apologized for the delay and was very professional. Overall recommended.

Great service for a very reasonable price. We were picked up (for free) from our hotel about the time the bus was scheduled to leave town and we ultimately left Phnom Penh 45 minutes late. We had 2 stops for food and restroom. We would use them again
Brilliant service, thank you!

The ride was very comfortable and the van was clean and the driver drove safely. We left on time but the driver kept stopping to pee, but snacks (which he chewed loudly), but gas etc so we arrived almost 30mins late. But overall much better than expected.

The ride was very comfortable and the van was clean and the driver drove safely. We left on time but the driver kept stopping to pee, buy snacks (which he chewed loudly), and gas etc so we arrived almost 30mins late. But overall much better than expected.
1h 35m from Kampot to Sihanoukville and on time departure

Useless to book online as I was requested to get in line at ticket booth to get paper tickets. This took 15 minutes as the guy at the counter couldn't care less, also had to argue with him to get the water bottle ! Late departure, Airco & seats defective.
Boarding and arrival was on time from Mondulkiri to Phnom Penh. It was a great bus trip honestly!

Decent mini van, good driver who stopped 3 times for bathroom/food breaks. The ride is long though (6hours) as there was traffic leaving Phnom Phnom Pehn. I’d use this company again, it was cheap and easy!
My first time with this type of service and it has been a good experiencie. Thank you

the driver was on time at the agreed pick-up address. He came to pick us up at 5 o' clock in the morning and was very quiet which was positive for us. So we could sleep in the car for a while. The payment also worked without any problems.

Even though I booked late, they managed to get me a driver for a smooth transfer from Phnom Penh airport to Phnom Penh City/Hotel. I would recommend to book your transfer through private Taxi. Highly efficient and reliable.
Very helpful with my bags when I was picked up. Good conversation during the drive and gave me directions on where to go when I was dropped off at the airport. Overall a great experience.
The service was in time, the car was comfortable, the driver was driving good.
Excellent service. Professional driver. I would highly recommend this website.
Great experience very accommodating driver. Nice job
Great experience very accommodating driver. Nice job

From Phnom Penh to Siem Reap it took about 5 hours. Not much longer than time it takes to fly with the airport time and hassle. It was easy, inexpensive and a great way to see Cambodia’s country side. I’d do it again and would recommend it.

From Phnom Penh to Siem Reap it took about 5 hours. Not much longer than time it takes to fly with the airport time and hassle. It was easy, inexpensive and a great way to see Cambodia’s country side. I’d do it again and would recommend it.
Comfortable trip, we left a bit late but arrived nevertheless right on time. Mini Van all clean and in good shape. WiFi soso, working A/C, no annoying or loud music. Solid driving.

Great way to travel if the weather is good. Bookmebus were prompt in answering my many emails, but they need to update the photo of the boat on their website to correctly show the type of vessel. There is some food and drinks on board to help with boredom
fast and on time.

Bus was extremely crowded, no space and no fresh air. Way took 4 hours instead of the originallh announced 3. Looking at other reviews I cannot understand why Bookmebus still sells tickets of this company since it also destroys their reputation!!!
Not bad. Little bit old bus, funky car horn and bustling Cambodia popular song. But I can sleep well. It is good enough.
Good service. Good value for money. Some stops on the way for refreshing and drinking, good drive, punctual.
The bus was on time , beds pretty confortable,  a bit small thow , the overall experience was satisfying

Overall not too bad. Sihanoukville to Trat took 10 hours total. Border crossing relatively easy. There are clearly marked signs on the Thai side for the mini bus you take to Trat. Once you’re there, a truck taxi to old town Trat is 30 baht per person.
Staff was very friendly and helpful.
Very good

The bus departed on time, we got a bottle of water and the air con worked well. Yet, the bus driver drove like a maniac at full speed (he used the horn at least 100 times), we reached Phnom Penh' edges from Kampot in only 2 hours.
The taxi arrived 15 minutes late however the car was clean and driver courteous.

The bur left 20 minutes late and we were panicking slightly about getting on our Siem reap flight to Phnom Penh. All worked out ok though as driver stopped at airport road on way back. We got a tuk tuk for $2 immediately to the airport

Not the best - sharing a bed with 2 people isn't ideal, the bus must have stopped maybe 10 times before Poi Pet, then the minivan stopped maybe 4 or 5 times on the way to Bangkok, meaning you get very little sleep or rest on this journey. Tedious and slow

It was a smooth ride with 2 breaks along the way. The van did stop along the way to pick up passengers but we did manage to reach Phnom Penh on time. Though the station at Phnom Penh is a bit outskirt the city.

I went from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap and I am delighted with the service. We left punctually at 2 PM and arrived in Siem Reap at about 7:30 PM (early). The VIP van drove fast, but safely. I highly recommend, as it is easy to book and very affordable.
Traveling with Post van was interesting and I felt good .
need to do something with the toilets/ smelly and not clean/

Trip was ok but the boat left 30mins late for each trip. It was over crowded with more people than seat and not enough life jackets if needed. Safety should be the No 1 priority. I would choose a different ferry provider next time.

Pickup was 30mins late. Stopped 3 times (understand that one for petrol is required) but did not ask if we wanted to stop. Drove dangerously at times - fast with reckless over-taking, then slow to take calls. Would not recommend - will use hotel provider.
Personnel très serviable sur le ponton à l'attente du bateau et très bon service à bord; ponctuel.

There were 2 cockroaches in the bed! The employees didnt have spray or anything else to do something about it. They said: we will clean the bed when we arrive. Ofcourse this was not helpfull to me because I had still the whole night to spend there.

The driver left without us. Without even asking the hotel to call us. Nothing. We waited and waited then I had to buy new tickets on the local bus, the only seats left at the last minute. I will never recommend this company

The driver left without us. Without even asking the hotel to call us. Nothing. We waited and waited then I had to buy new tickets on the local bus, the only seats left at the last minute. I will never recommend this company

Avoid using this company!!!! We had a really bad experience with them 2 days ago so we rather decided not to go with them on the next trip but get a private car, while we already had ticket! Bookmebus, why are you promoting this good for goodness company?

The bus was supposed to have wifi but did not have working wifi. We had to change buses in PP but were not told that we would have to wait from for two hours. The second bus was smaller but more comfortable and with less people. The staff was ru

I booked my ticket in December 2017, and I booked a seat at the front. However, when I presented my ticket at the counter, the bus company had booked my ticket to someone else and said that "book me bus never called us to book your seat". So that was poor
Seatbelts, water, WiFi, modern bus, drived safely, excellent trip xx

Requested to be picked up from our hotel. They agreed and said to be ready 1hr before departure. We waited and no one came to get us until 10 minutes after the original departure time. Then they told us our bus was full and we’d have to wait 2 hours
Perfect Bus Ride. Bus was on time, everybody was friendly, air cond., extra water. Really good.

This was a scam bus. We stopped close to the border for more than half hour and a guy who came on the bus was offering a VIP visa for Cambodia. He asked for 1500 baht and we waited for 1 hour. We said no and did it for ourselves.

Minibus was supposed to leave at 1.15pm. At 1.30 we got in a crappy minivan that dropped us of at another bus company where we had to wait another 30min, not knowing if the bus was going to leave or not. Poor service.
A very good experience with a great driver.  I will definately use them again for my next trip. The driver was great with my elderly parents too.

One major issue is when we arrived at the border of cambodia and thailand. The conductor just shouted "passport!". We have no idea what he was talking abt he didnt instruct us properly so we almost got lost. Next time make sure to inform the passengers.
Awful bus ride, would not recommend

It was a smooth journey from PP to SR. The van departed on time with wifi connection along the way. We had 2 toilet stops and arrived at SR on time. I would really recommend this company for long distance travel.
We arrived a bit late than the scheduled timetable but overall it was a smooth journey

Terrible experience! I booked a ticket from Bangkok to Siem Reap 2days ahead of the trip, but when I get to the terminal 15mins before the trip, they said that the 9am bus that I booked is already full, so they put me to another bus, at the back near CR.
I was very satisfied with this trip!

The service was excellent and would highly recommend using this company for all your travel needs. We had a bit of issue with the pick-up time and bookmebus responded to me emails very quickly and send a driver very quickly. Do not hesitate to book.
Good bus

Don’t book!! 
The bus we paid for didn’t exist, we got sent to a different company. Bus was supposed to leave 13.30, we left 15.00 no info no nothing. Then the bus driver ran over a big dog on the road, and didn’t want to stop to chek if it was dead. :(

The driver is a liar. He stopped 2km before the arrival point and said it was the last stop just to make us pay for tuk-tuk. Only when I said the the final destination is different and I would call his company, he said he would go there. UNACCEPTABLE!

We left on time, arrived earlier than scheduled. Travelled in a mini bus, was good but way too warm, air con needed to be turned up. Maybe some reclining seats too. Overall it was a good and easy experience.

the service a disaster. They left us halfway, they made us get off the bus. to continue to destination we had to wait more for 4 hours, arriving at the destination 5 hours later than planned. We had to take a taxi to get there. I would like you to return

The bus trip was comfortable and punctual and the driver was a responsible driver.  
We would use this service again.
Driver made and took calls on his mobile phone whilst driving. This was very irresponsible when in charge of peoples lives.
Good trip. Left 15 minutes ahead of schedule and arrived 30' earlier than expected.
Excellent service, on time, easy to book !
Very congested seats and old bus. Overall just ok.

My only complaint would be that the bus gets very hot and the AC was not really sufficient. By the end of the journey the whole bus stank of BO which wasn't ideal. But in terms of punctuality, efficiency and safety I have no complaints.
we left from Phonm Penh to Kampot in time, got there in 3 hs. Perfect!
we left Kampot on time, got to Phonm Penh a bit out of schedule due to Phonm Penh traffic, good ride overall

Pick up point was hard to find so went to their downtown office and the drop off point was out of town 1/2 hour walk back into town.  Driver drove a bit fast and took some risks but we arrived safely.
Bus ran late. Over sold seats. Dropped off in wrong location.
Driver refused to turn the air con up even though it was too hot , i asked him 4 times
We was not picked up as arranged and could not get in contact with taxi company. Had to pay another taxi !
Good service

Online the trip total time is 4hrs. We arrived to be told the average journey time is 4.5 hrs, plus a stop for 20 mins. Because of this we had to order a last minute taxi to get to Phnom Penh airport. PLEASE USE ACCURATE TIME ON YOUR WEBSITE (4.5 - 5hr)
great journey, everything just perfect.
Driving and bus was great. However did not get the seats we had booked for and we had to sit separately as a result
Bus left 15 minutes late. Scheduled as four hours but trip took five hours with two stops along the way.
The return trip was an hour and a half late, which is a real pain when you have a taxi waiting.  - This seems to be the norm.
Aroud ok
Excellent service and good price. Nothing bad to say, I would recommend it anytime.

When I booked, I was told I could change it. It took almost 3 hours of walking to find them (they even sent me away to someone else at one point- Intentional??). The owner or manager refused a change and became belligerent. I just walked away. I didn’t go

The boat was more than 1.5h late and the inspector was absolutely incompetent to organise the queue and the different queus + boat times.
To make it worse, the acessibility to the boat was quite bad as the wooden stairs were broken and fixed to old seats
waited a little too long to get email with printable ticket.  other than that bus departed early because everyone was on board and the trip was fine.
Bus departure on time & seat bed also fine.
Completely impressed by the service. Very friendly staff and punctual as a gun.

The scarriest ride of my life.Driver did not take any responsibility,no english spoken,super over-speeding the whole time,when I asked him to slow down he said NO.Do not risk your life and choose some other company.NEVER AGAIN
Quick, accurate, comfortable. Little room for luggage, but overall it was fine. Took less than 4.5 hours to get to Phnom Penh from Sihanoukville.
Late in start, full of boxes and bags, no leg room at all.
Confortable bus! Nice journey though we arrived the 2h delay. Just tell people it will be longer due to the traffic jam in Phnom Penh because it’s all the time the case

It was really annoying on the number of stop that were just to pick up or drop off parcels
Especially in PP when we went to two other stops to pick up parcels only and it was the opposite direction to our destination

I reached the boarding point 1 hour before departure and waited there for 3 hours. The bus never showed up ... I tried to get a refund but CTT Transportation never responded to my mails or my phone calls ! Very bad experience 0/20

The bus was almost an hour delayed, acceptable given Chinese New Year. Nonetheless, the seats we reserved were already occupied. We got two seats in the front row, however one person got left behind (possibly booked on an alternative bus)...
The bus was 40 minutes late and then there was no sit for me as the same ticket had been sold twice. So I took a shared taxi instead, and left an hour late.
Driver was very safe and did not make any silly moves overtaking dangerously. Very smooth journey

It was SO GOOD to get dropped off at Phnom Penh Airport and not have to go into the CBD and out again. I'm so grateful to the customer reps. at Sihanoukville office for making this happen. The bus driver was great too! I'm not sure what 'inspector' means.

My reservation was not taken into account. The office couldnt find my reservation. Luckily, they found 2 places for us on the next and last one.
Worst places on the bus, at the rear. Couldnt sleep as there was air con leaking and too much noise
We enjoyed the ride from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh, thank you.

Bus was overbooked so I was given a stool to sit on for the entire journey. Very uncomfortable. No compensation given. On arrival to Siem Reap, we were told tuk tuk rides were free to our hotel. They're only free if you purchase a tour with the driver.

We booked with them because they were the only available. We received no information about where we were or transfers (the bus office was not near the bus stop).  Our phone was also stolen on the night train - be careful! Good thing, we made it to Kampot!
Everything is Ok, but driver should be slowly.
Good bus journey. No problems.Comfortable bus, safe driver.
Good service, comfortable bus.  Bit too long a wait in Pet Poi border crossing while they tried to fill the bus but hey, that's SE Asia, lol!!

AVOID THIS COMPANY !We left Siem Reap10:30pm and arrive the day after at 12:15am in Sihanoukville.Horrible trip, 3h not planned step in Phonh Penh in the middle of night, then they didn’t wanted to take us to Sihanoukville,we finally got minibus after war

The GTVC boarding point is at Miiya Hotel. If you arrive early, you can hang out at the boarding point while waiting for the next speedboat.

From the boarding point, GTVC will arrange a bus to take you to the pier.

A bit late on my departure time but overall not bad.
Friendly staff, they can understand and speak English.
Driver is friendly but busy with his phone all the time
Bus was fine...stopped once for a break ...good AC. Ticket said trip would be 2:40 long...reality is more like +5 hours!

The driver was right there waiting for us on arrival and extremely kind. Made a stop for food outside the airport as cheaper than at the airport and 2 stops along the way to purchase fruits and have a short break. Recommendable.

Your driver drove the minibus like a maniac. Far too fast. At one point he overtook a car that was already overtaking a lorry at the same time. Dangerous. I would not use your service again if all your drivers are like that.
Quite strange to waiting at the post office! Van was new and comfortable. Left on time and the driver drove safely. Great option  A+

The driver was incredibly fast and overtook irresponsibly. Please do not book this company, bookmebus. If they drive like that all the time it is an accident waiting to happen. It was dangerous and we were unsafe.
Cambodia Post VIP Van never disappoints. I've used this service many times. They are online and always arrive earlier than schedule.

Driver was polite and friendly.
Car is clean and comfortable .
What inspector?
We got scammed on the border with Cambodia, went to exchange currency and we got told to change everything to Cambodian Riel and we lost tons of money from exchanging.
Everything was quite good, if a bit gruff. Best part being that we got to our destination an hour earlier than scheduled and the driving wasn't scary/dangerous.
Our driver was good at driving, however he didn't speak English and was 30 mins late to pick up up at our departure destination as well as not knowing our arrival destination.
Very Good
efficient and fast service.
efficient and good transportation

Very good the welcome ( he was waiting with the name). Just difficult communicating because driver did not speak English so was not clear about the question on arrival time. He said totally 3h trip then finally was 4h. But that is not a big problem at all

Paid for what was told a VIP van to kampot, ended up being told they don't run VIP vans there on the day I booked and was crammed into a bus. Not at all the experience that was advertised and took an hour just to leave sihnoukville.

We took a ‘direct connection’ from Siem Reap to Ho Chi Minh City. We were dropped in Phnom Penh; no communication (bags were on the street..) waited from 4 am to 10.30 am until we headed in another bus (no luxury at all broken chairs and too many people).
Not the VIP standard of bus in picture, very cramped on the back seats.
The bus driver was reckless, I was about to text my parents goodbye.

I made a round trip from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville with Mekong Express. The first trip left a little bit late and the van wasn't too comfy but the second one was an improvement and left on time. They also dropped us off directly at the airport.
GOOD
Bus left almost on time, driver was realy nice and new bus made trip very pleasant. Thank you!
BookMeBus web site said to arrive at 7:00 am for 7:30 am departure. At dockside, however, departure was said to be scheduled for 8:30 am. Actual departure was 8:47 am.
Ottimo

Perfect and we were only 4 passengers (my family) and wifi is good.
The driver was nice and stoped 3 times fir toilets, food or when we asked
Really a good service

Nightmare. I buy online. at the office near the pier and get my tickets. Nobody inform that i had to book the return.boat delayed 1h and at return 47m. Only the captain ok.the others look like grown childs. Even spleep at work and joke. Never again!
Was pleasantly surprised by the service after reading previous reviews. Bus staff was punctual and professional! We applied for e-visa before hand so the border was super simple!

Really annoying to be transferred to another pier from the main office. Delayed for over one hour transferring from shuttle to bus to ferry.
Return trip met expectations.
our trip was quick, the driver friendly, and the bus was comfortable and big.
30min delay.

Bus did not drop off at the location given on the bookmebus website. I tried to explain this to the driver but he didn't speak English.  He then started to grab my bag and take it off the bus. Had no choice but to get off the bus and take a cab.
Startet 1 hour lately because of loading goods, too long breaks in the nowhere, in total almost 3 hours delayed.
I ordered taxi to airport  one day before departure. Driver picked up on time. Overall feeling good. Would definitely use this again.

3 hour journey was broken up at a nice and unexpected 15 min stop at a coffee shop. Staff gave out water before the trip. Seats were leather and comfy. Looking forward to my next trip with this company.
Perfect trip, anytime again.

the seat belt was broken, the metal end wouldn't click into the slot where it should, could it be fixed?  Great ride, no mook in bus, la-ah, and a new stop for lunch, superb! Got great pictures there and along the way. Good service, will use you again.
No accomondation...

It was a bad trip. We must changed the car four times. Nobody told us that before. We should reach the final destination at 1pm. We arrived it at 4pm. Never will take champa mekong again. The whole staff was unfriendly.

The  transportation to Phnom Penh was perfect, excellent driver and very fast.
But the guy at the office was lazy and impolite. He ignored us when we said that we had a plane to catch. We had to shout that we don't want to wait any longer. Very unpleasen

Check-in process was easy, I showed the lady at the office my phone and she made me a paper ticket to the driver. The luggage was given a tag so you brought back the other side of the same token. The bed was very comfortable and roomy. Great experience.

For an over night bus fine, really not to much space but for the price okay. We are just not sure if we got our bed bugs from there.... I would bring a sleeping bag inlay! But to get from A to B still a good way to go.

For an over night bus fine, really not to much space but for the price okay. We are just not sure if we got our bed bugs from there.... I would bring a sleeping bag inlay! But to get from A to B still a good way to go.

I was late, no refunds. Charged me for another ticket with another bus line. A terrible company with no consideration for the passengers or their laugage. As with most Cambodian bus lines, drivers are very aggressive & quite scary to ride with.
This is a safe, respectable, and reliable bus company. Kind employees, and safe driving — much better than other bus companies I tried in Cambodia!
ALl was fine. Good bus and left only 15minutes after scedual. Trip took us up to 6hr because the driver was doing real slow.
It was perfectly fine. Bumpy, but thats because of th sea.
Way better and faster then the bus!!  Worth the few extra dollars!

CTT was one hour late. They did not pick up at hotel as promised and confirmed twice. Dangerous driver constantly on his phone and nearly hit cows on road twice. No apologies for lateness or inconvenience. My recommendation, use Mekong Express if possible
Prompt helpful response from booking team
Good journey, all fine at border crossing, though would have been helpful if bus staff could have given out more information.  Nice snacks provided
I left 15 minutes late, but arrived early for one hour than a plan. The seat let me sit at the appointed seat. It was comfortable.
The departure was 20 minutes late and arrived at Sihanoukville late for two hours than a plan. Because the driver let get in and out of local people on the way, it caused a large delay.

Given that I had pre-booked and was ticketed for seat number six (6) it was unreasonable to be displaced from this seat so that another could sit there.
Otherwise it was the standard slow six and a half hour trip from Phnom Penh to Kratie.

Clean van. No room for pax baggage due to space occupied by mail bags which was a problem for me as I had to place on internal seat which cramped us up. No water given to  pax. Very good driver. Departed 10 minutes late. Overall OK

The overall was good. Just as a comment we would like to say the first bus didn't seem very clean and Wi-Fi wasn't really working in any of them. We would recommend and travel again with you for sure. Thank you!

Booked a Sangyong-Taxi for 12 pax. Were actually 7 pax + 9 large suitcases and hand luggage. Car just fit us but not our luggage. Needed to wait for the driver to organise 2nd car. That didn't take too long (about 20 min) but still was a bit annoying.

Booking is very easy and customer service is amazing! Can only recommend! Bus picked us up at exact location although 15 min late. Pleasant ride, no problems. Driver could have used own google maps to find drop-off location.
Although booked correctly on 24th at midnight (12am) didn’t get a seat and had to lie down in the aisle. Also didn’t get picked up by my hotel.. other than that worked out fine
Quick ride, however don’t book the first row. It lacks lag space.
I had seat no. 15 and was very cramped.  Also, I was on the side of the mini-van with sun shining.  It was so hot, the air con was not sufficient.  No water was provided.
No accomondation
Comfortable van, left on time. Stopped after about 2h of driving for about 15mins. The van transports mail as well and stops at a post office on the way.

PATHETIC in one word! It’s a lie that you’ll reach in 6.5 hours! We reached in more than 12 hours! There’s a delay and waiting throughout. Take you to Kampot before Ha Tien to change van. Bags flew out of van midway! Put us on slow ferry instead of fast!
Driver was 30 minutes late but other than that it was great
Quite good. Driver went a bit too fast at times, but bus was quite comfortable

Comfortable car, really nice driver who spoke a little English. His driving was usual Cambodian style with some scary moments while overtaking. We had trouble finding our hotel in Phnom Penh as he didn't seem to know the city but he tried very hard for us

This is not a sleeping bus. There are so many stops some picking up passengers, most delivering/pick up freight, sleeping is impossible.  Arrived 1.5 hours late. Air con freezing. Seat A3 at front door too short if over 160cm tall. Staff nice and helpful.

The driver was polite, we left on time, there was free water and wifi, I (certainly a tall person by Aisan standards) was comfortable in the van and it is definitely one of the cheapest ways to get from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville and back.
Old bus withput wifi and toilets. We traveled 11 hours without, on stpps standart of toileys npt accectanle

The ticket I bought said the bus was due to leave at 1:30pm but the driver was adamant I was wrong and it was 2:30pm even though my ticket said 1:30. Didn’t leave till 3pm. Other than that driver made good stops for us all. Comfy seats
Good

The staff were kind even if they didn't speak English. The food provided was also okay. You will use same bus for entire the journey. Leave your heavy baggage in the bus and go for immigration! :) It makes trip easy and convenient. Thanks !

Overall service is great. The Van left  4 min ealrier & arrived as per plan.
Except the nonalignment between Bookmebus & service operator on seat booking.
My booked seat has been confirmed while I was asked to change seat once I arrived at the station.
Great trip! Four stars, because the pick-up point was a bit unclear. The bus was green (not in any way marked) and stood in the parking lot in front of the post office in Phnom Penh
We booked front seats as we are tall people and need some leg space. However, we were forced into the back row, cramped together.

Worst Booking experience ever. The same itinerary keeps changing and luckily the booked itinerary was finally confirmed.
Check your voucher you sent to me carefully, that was not the pick up point at all (super far). Stupid, Will never use again!
Bus broke down for 2 or 3 hours
A new bus, a perfect driver ... What else could one wish?
The pick up from the hotel was on time - the bus new and very comfortable, the driver very good. I can only recommend this company and will chose it again.
I booked the ticket because I expect to arrive there on time but the reality is that the bus arrive destination 5 hours late. Bad experience ever!
Random seat number.
Very good service. We arrived in Phnom Penh almost an hour early.
Random seat number.
The driver was complitly creasy he drive dangerously and it is a miracle if we are not dead
The driver was complitly creasy he drive dangerously and it is a miracle if we are not dead
Not sure about accommodation or inspector, but everything else was just fine. I loved the easy online booking system. I will use Bayon again. Thanks, Bayon!

Phnom Penh Sorya Bus didn't have my booking information, and the cashier couldn't speak English, so it took lots of time, and unless, I took the copy of my booking receipt, I might  not take the bus. And no announcement of arrival to destination, I missed
1 hour &  30 minutes delay on arrival!!!
I don't want to ride again.
a very good driver, carefully; gave us a good feeling
Everything has been all right,  seat are not really confortable but in the end we are arrived without any problem :)

No Accom or inspector.  Left on time, comfortable, air conditioned, made a couple of stops for food, drink, toilet.  Would suggest taking some foods with you as we were a bit stuck for eating at places we stopped but good to grab a coffee or iced tea

Giving a 4-hour drive is just totally lying to customers, count more than 7! If I could, I would never do this kind of trip anymore and rather take a bus. We arrive in Phnom Penh DT at the same time as buses. I am really disappointed. Reimburse me
Easy to book online - day before we wanted to travel. Comfortable, reliable and left on time - would definitely use again.

Journey took 6 hrs due to rush hour in Phnom Penh. Coach company should factor arrival time in and adjust departure time to miss this heavy traffic. The trip was 2 hours longer than it should have been! Coach driver also on phone lots whilst driving
Very dirty boat. Sorry Inside the boat you see nothing of the surrounding. Would not recommend it. Very expensive.

The conection was not operated by CTT but by another company. The van was was overloaded and we stoped approx. 500 m from the given boarding point to split the group. But this was a big chaos. Booking the seat was completely useless.

Was a nice ride from Siem Reap to Kampong Thom. Startete before time and arrived also a bit early. Driving was fast but secure. Cabin was spacious and not so full as normally in a Asian Mini Van. Enough space for luggage.

The most disappointed thing was that no announcement about the reason of the delay and just let the customer waited in the ferry.  The departure time was originally 7:30am, but it finally departed at 9:15am.
Punctual, quick, and comfortable. Great way to get from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap.
Can recommend, good vans and quite punctual. Friendly driver
Departure on time, arrival as well! Three hours as expected. No chaos during boarding and the booked seat was realy booked. So far, the best bus transportation company I met in Cambodia!

Sihanoukville - Phnom Penh 
The journey took 2 hours longer overall than it should have. The driver constantly chatting on the phone. Some people have no regard for their passengers lives

- The seats are not as the same ones as they show.
- The destination is Khao San Rd, not near Pratunum.
- It is not actually a direct bus. You have to take all of your belongings down to cross the border and there are no assistance at all.
The air conditioning was high and it was not possible to reach an agreement with other passenger
Super service

The bus was 3 hours late! They had my Phone-number and nobody contacted me. I asked a few times at the office where they had to pick me up but the woman said I had to call myself.  I would have appreciated it if they kept me updated.
Third time using the VIP van now and it's pretty good every time. Good value, and you get to where you need to be pretty quickly. Definitely recommend.
Bus was decent enough, but not great. And it left about 30 minutes later and didn’t drop us of at the point which was specified on the site. So 3 stars will do this ride justice

We booked a taxi online & I was hesitant to pay online so I contacted the office on the chat line & they accepted my booking and sent me a confirmation email within 1 minute, I cannot fault the company I found them very helpful the driver was very good
I had purchased a ticket by mistake on my reservation date, but when I called the customer center, I responded promptly.
We booked a dedicated car, but it has been changed without notice. No one spoke English, so it was difficult to manage. Not again if can avoided

Almost everything was fine. No real delay and comfortable ride. The only thing was a wet puddle of water in the trunk where the driver put our backpacks so they got very wet (even our clothes!). That was a bit disappointing!
Booked seats way ahead but got pushed on terrible spare seats by a guy who worked there. Bus overbooked, some people who had already paid couldn’t board. Avoid
It says 4h, took more than five. I hardly believe they can do it on time (during the day)
Picked up exactly on time. Driver was safe and courteous. Vehicle clean and in top condition. Will use the service again next week.

awful journey from start to finish. 
No English spoken during trip so had no idea what was going on at border control from Cambodia to Thailand. 
We even ended up on a mini bus when I booked a sleeper bus. The driver was obnoxious and rude.
Great service but think need to be more realistic with your estimated time of arrivals. Both trips we took were over 4hrs but we were expecting nearer 3,
it was an excellent service, and we enjoy our journey. thankyou :)

The bus was approx 20yrs old. Maybe older. But the seats reclined. Staff on the bus wanted extra 10usd from everyone to process visa. Total rip off
I refused. Went and got my own visa.  And got mine quicker than anyone else. 
cant right more. No space

The bus was approx 20yrs old. Maybe older. But the seats reclined. Staff on the bus wanted extra 10usd from everyone to process visa. Total rip off
I refused. Went and got my own visa.  And got mine quicker than anyone else. 
cant right more. No space

the Tv didn’t work. The snacks on the bus were. 
A piece of cake. And a small water. Would I use these again definitely not. VIP bus. They said. The bus was on its last legs.

they send the wrong car! 
I specifically booked a Toyota highlander - NOT a Lexus RX300
This is because the back bench of the Toyota is wider. With three people in the back, the Lexus is extremely uncomfortable. 
Otherwise great service!

Need to give people information when bus stops. We had no idea if we were stopping for toilet break or food and had no idea how long we had. A script in English held up and shown to travlers is all that is necessary.
The bus was late for almost one hour and we didn’t get the seats we booked.
Our private car from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh was great!  The driver was waiting when our boat arrived (and we were 30 mins early), the car was very clean, and he drove quite safely!
Nice anderen safe trip
All' eccellent!!!

Unfortunately i had the chance to experience 3 times on different routes the same driver and every time it was the same. Too many stops (2 times fuelling 5usd each, picking up people on the road) extremely frequent honking without reasons.
Due to a group showing up late... block of seating, we left late.  THE driver was excellent.  I know that rosd well. At night it is full of trucks. He was excellent. I will always take this bus .
Due to a group showing up late... block of seating, we left late.  THE driver was excellent.  I know that rosd well. At night it is full of trucks. He was excellent. I will always take this bus .
We ask for the change departing day....and nobody didn't confirm....so we paid again for new tickets!

Great as usual. Best to get to the post office 15-20 mins in advance. Take snacks and water as the van doesn't always stop somewhere where you can buy food. A small bottle of water is provided, though
Driver drove excessively fast (up to and possibly above 140km/hr) for the whole journey. Terrifying.
Nothing good to say.
All i have read about the company is negative, so i had to change bus in the last minute.
Just a small delay but that happens usually depending on the traffic. I missed free water and wifi, because there was nothing of mentioned. But in general the traveling with K.S.O. was okay.
A bit late for pick up from hotel, and bus a bit late from "depot"/office! Besides, everything ok (except that I do not like mini-vans)

Driver was driving too fast. Dangerous.
No water.
SIN WIFI. EL TRANSPORTE SALIÓ 10 MINUTOS ANTES DE LO MARCADO Y POR POCO NO LO PERDEMOS
Had a great & comfortable trip
comfortable and cheap transportation

I had a great trip (Phnom Penh - Kampot). The bus departed and arrived on time. We were given water, had a break halfway and travelled at a sensible speed. Aircon worked a treat but I didn't try the wifi so no comment there.

This trip was a disaster. 
The pick up from the hotel was supposed to be 8am; it arrived at 8.50am. At 10am I was told there was a problem with the a/c on the bus. By 10.30 I asked for my money back and caught a different bus. I wouldn't use Bayon again.
Had a problem with the van overheating at one point so we were a bit delayed. The driver had no formula one aspirations nor a death wish which was nice.

Comfortable clean bus.  Very punctual departure and arrival.  Stopped twice each for 20 mins (though once would personally be enough for me, though perhaps not for everybody). (Accommodation/Inspector ratings not applicable-bookmebus required)
Best bus service so far in SEAsia.  For journeys up to 6-7 hours I’d say (not a sleeper)

Bayon remains one of the better outfits and its drivers less maniacal than some others, but why do you let these companies get away with falsely claiming PP-SNV is a 4 hour trip? Took over 6 hours this time, and never done it on any bus or van in under 5.

Voyage inconfortable, nul, avec driver qui s'arrète quand ça lui va, pas aimable du tout ! Kep/Phnom penh =5h !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
Je déconseille cette compagnie
Arrivée à l'heure....
Départ à l'heure, mais conducteur complètement fou, vive allure........

+ cheap $6 bus trip from siem reap to phnom penh
+ no overbooked

- reckless driver
- no any information about stops or the last stop
- no wifi or ac as they promise first
- seats old and uncomfortable 

next time book better bus

this review is not applicable for accommodation or inspector but this website requires it...the driver was extremely competent - and driving in Cambodia is pretty crazy...the car was clean and comfortable...pick up was on time...

We left and arrived on time. The company even gave us complimentary tuk-tuk rides to our hotels. This bus went right through to Cambodia from Thailand and we didn't need to change buses. Have visa money with you though and they organise the visa for you.

Bus is expensive and compare to thaï bus, the comfort is average 
A guy came in and said that we had to give HIM 1400 bath for visa 
A tourist was stocked at the thaï border BUT THE TEAM LEAVE HIM BEHIND !!!!
Tuk tuk drop us 1 KM AWAY FROM OUR HOTEL

Overall I’d recommend this bus over others, but this route our driver got angry with another overtaking us in a dangerous manner.  Anger okay, except that our driver then started driving more aggressively/dangerous in retaliation, with passengers aboard.
The trip took six hours because the driver stopped and waited many times to pick up extra passengers and packages.
Staff at the office extremely disregarding and unfriendly. The driver stopped to pee several times line he couldn't go as the date time as everyone before leaving and at the stop we made.
Good service and punctuality, quite comfortable. Nothing to complain
Good service, just a small disruption changing the bus after the first 10 minutes of trip. Not room enough for luggages, but overall a good trip.
Great service and communication when we contacted to change time was very quick and good. Have used a lot. Highly recommend
Very helpful with the pickup

Bookmebus are fantastic but Champa Mekong not really. Bus was an hour late, we were seated for 15-20min while they washed the bus & we stopped shortly after leaving to pick up more people & get petrol. Bus so full luggage was stored under passengers feet!
Nice trip

Would totally recommend this service. Punctual and it made 2 stops, one for lunch. The lunch is only 20 mins so if you really need to take a lunch make sure it is a fast one. The car has wifi as well, but not stable at certain area. Really enjoyed.

There are various un-scheduled stops along the way. We picked up a box of raw fish at a market, which leaked all over my bag (the box was placed on my bag). I managed to get a $5 USD refund. My bag still stinks. Do not travel with Virak, go with Mekong.

We made it from Bangkok to Siem Reap in a total of 8 hours.... which was 2 hours ahead of schedule! The seats had a foot rest and reclined about 75%. They provided a small breakfast and lunch which was unexpected! I would recommend them!
Long drive without wifi, but a chance to look outside the window
Had booked with CTT on a minivan. They took the 3 booked passengers up to Phnom Penh from Kampot in a Highlander SUV instead!! Excellent service. Would definitely use CTT again.

Driver was very friendly and helpful. 
Service was punctual and effecient

This van did not leave on time and did not pay attention to assigned seats. I get sick on long rides, so this wasn't ideal. Also, there was a transfer in Kampot (had to switch vans). Kampot was mass chaos and it was difficult to find the right van to Kep.
The van left EARLY because everyone was there. Efficient, clean, clearly assigned seats, arrived early. It was fantastic!

maybe, you can propose water during the way.
This driver phone during the way, and drive a little fast.
Every time I use this bus there is a drama before we get on! Too many passengers booked and unhelpful office staff. Once we got going the driver was good and journey was ok.

Driver was very professional and safe. He drove smoothly, was uniformed, and informed us of how long the rest stop was.
The trip from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap was very smooth except for the final part near Siem Reap.
The journey took exactly 5 hours

The driver drove ok but quite aggressively and thorefore not as smooth as expected. He was not uniformed and made extra stops to get drinks for himself -- making us passengers wait. Very rude.
He also did not communicate how long the rest stop was.

Bus from senmonorom departed half an hour late. Then stopped 6 Times to let people on board. Arrived 2 hours later than planned and that for a 5,5 hout trip. Virak is much better optioneel for this trip. New bus and punctual
Comfortable bus, great driver, got to Phnom Penh in good time.

This bus ride was just as expected. The driver was very nice and drove safely. He stopped for a restroom break and made sure everyone got back before leaving. It’s a long trip but I highly recommend this bus.

Nearly a crash with another boat happend while going full speed. Very unfriendly staff. I asked twice about trip duration (because of reports I read online), they insisted that it will be only 45min. Actually, it took 100min to and 95min from the island.

Information provided about point off departure incorrect, in fact the whole journey was not as advertised. The coach was very old and basically used for transporting commercial goods with passengers as an afterthought and no toilet.
Very good driver, all is fine

The trip was ok with a good driver. However, at the departure in Kep, it was really messy. We left Kep an hour late, because of some booking problems. There was more people than seats in the bus, even if we mostly booked online few days before.
Good overall experience. Easy way to take the bus when booking via Bookmebus.com. Driver was good and we didn't encounter any particular bad experience.

Nothing to complain. The ride was smooth and almost in time (we left like 30 minutes after scheduled, really good for SE-Asian standards) and reached Sihaknouville in time. The van was in good condition. There's not room though, but it is a van after all

Champa Mekong had over sold tickets for this bus. They had no clear records or system to know how many seats had been sold, and blamed everyone else for their confusion and poor service. As it was there was 6 more people than seats, leaving people behind.
Good service

Quite good safe journey. Unfortunately the break stops were horendous!
Khmer music was playing too loud for most of the trip. It was ok at first but after a few hours it drove us insane!
VIP bus is a 12 seater mini van. Bus arrived 10 minutes late, but we got to Sihanuokville on time. You make a pitstop once where you can eat food + drinks. Overall satisfied & would ride again!
Pretty good

Terrible experience at least. When you arrive to Siem Reap, guys from Nattakan tell you about included taxi to the hotel. Dont trust them, they are liars, we had to pay a lot!! And the driver of that taxi tuk tuk was agresive. Never more.
Set off on time & arrived on time. And the driver was safe by Cambodian standards : )
We left on time and arrived on time. To be able to make up for the lost time due to traffic in Phnom Penh, he drove quite fast the rest of the way.
All is ok. Good driver, he give us all the informations required, smily.
The hotel bus from Siem Reap to Kampot was very comfortable. Pillow and blanket were provided. While the reading light didn't work, the outlet did. The bus stopped every 2 hours for a toilet break.

The VIP Van was over an hour late arriving. I have NEVER experienced such horrible customer service in a VIP van ticketing/pick-up office as I have using this company in Kampot. Avoid using this company at all costs! Driver was nice and seats were comfy.

Champa Mekong overbooked our VIP van and we were relocated to another company. The ticketing inspector was accommodating (fortunately) and by all appearances, we lucked out with a far superior company. Avoid Champa Mekong at all costs!
Very prompt departure. Good driver. Van A/C was not working extremely well. Seats were fair. Honored seating reserved.

The trip was pleasant and the bus was clean and comfortable, the fare was quite reasonable. When you change buses in Pnom Penh watch your baggage, some of us had our bags tagged incorrectly. Other than that no problems.

The best bus ride in all of my 6 months traveling through Cambodia!
Highly recommend this bus company!

We left late (45 mins later) and we arrive 1 h late.
the driver made too much stops (for instance half an hour after the late departure)
nobody told us where we were in English so we did not know when to stop

Bus company did not pickup at hotel as promised. Bus stopped to pick up locals several times. Border control took long due to inspection of items purchased by staff on route. Did not get seat that was booked. Toilet terrible and unusable.
Arrived only 5 minutes late, driving fast but safe, arrive 30 minutes earlier !
Punctual and flexible, as one needs after a long plane trip
Great service, punctual and at the exact spot as arranged.

Book Me Bus was  incredibly helpful with last minute ticket changes... super flexible!! Night bus was an hour later than expected but not a problem as it still worked out fine. Beds were much more comfortable than other night buses in Asia- bonus!!!

Driver arrived on time and although he didn’t speak English (we hadn’t requested this, so no problem) he was polite, helpful and friendly. 
He got us to our hotel in Phnom Penh quickly and with no problems.  Excellent service!
In one word  SUPER.I will recommend  to my friends.

Driver was speedy but safe. Unfortunately the local passengers had huge amounts of goods/freight -- multiple bags and boxes each which made the trip very uncomfortable. My wife and I only had a small backpack each and nowhere to put them.

The bus journey was fine, it was a small bus so the seats were a bit small and not a huge amount of leg room (big bus is much better). Arrived 45 minutes late at Battambang, not sure why but all in all it was a good journey.
The van from Kampot to Sihanoukville was 40 minutes late, but it dropped us off right at our ferry company. Van had leather seats and aircon worked fine.

Punctial on time
Safe and experiend driver
Comfortable car
Next time we will book again
We were very happy with the online booking and the trip itself. We would definitely recommend travelling with this company from PP to SHV.

The drive was perfect. We stopped twice for toiletbreak and food. Driver drove safe but fast. The roads were quite good. The wifi worked, we got some water. And we got to our destination 45min early. What more would you want. Great service.

It was an interesting drive for us; we are not used to the Cambodian style of driving! The van was comfortable. The only suggestion would be to allow 2 rest stops rather than the one 20-minute one that was our lunch stop.
Please be more restrictive to the departure and arrival schedule. I almost missed my appointment.

Based on price&booking process (you even choose your seats like flight booking), CCT transportation service did not nearly meet our expectations: run down mini-Vans, densely packed, a/c not working, many stops on the way - ordinary buses cheaper & better
Acoitding to their own schedule, we legt 20 minutes late and arrived 40 minutes. Also because we made more stops than the toilet stops. Main issue: an older, less comfortable bus was used.
Booked and confirmed  the middle row, BUT the inspector give back row sit!

Punctual departure and arrival. The uniformed driver was friendly, professional and handled challenging traffic situations well. Luggage was safely stored in the designated luggage area. Modern minibus with comfortable seats and good air conditioning.
Great

Driver drives carefully and experienced, was even ahead of time on our destination. Only point is that he couldn't find the pickup place for the first time, so he was a little late. But it was an unusual place to find, so that's ok.

El bus salió a tiempo desde el terminal, pero el chofer manejó pésimo, frenaba tan brusco que no se podía descansar porque te pegabas. Había que ir afirmado todo el camino.
Nada de cómodo
The driver was already for us at the airport. Via Google Maps we gave him the exact location of our destination. We arrived on time. The car was clean and we had enough space. Higly recommended!

Clean, good bus with A/C, very friendly staff at the stops. Free water for on the way but no toilet stop. 1h delay (not too bad) but driver on the phone while driving and speeding on bumpy road to catch up. Do again but not recommended for longer drive.

BS Ferry irresponsible! we arrived in different pier from KRong. BS said there'll be a FREE pickup to main pier. but because of there was a little problem with our ticket, free shuttle LEFT us. we have to spent extra USD15 for tuktuk to go main pier.
There was no problem. The company had our booking, so we had our place in the bus. We were approximatively on time in Saen Monorom

Bus driver was checked by boss for excess speed. Boss called me.  Great!

Driving team were VERY LOUD talking. I lost sleep because of sudden loud laughter. 
VERY BAD FOR A "SLEEPING" BUS! 

The driver was unsafe when passing other vehicles....
Pas de problème pour réserver ce voyage qui s'est déroule dans de bonnes conditions.  Bus dejà ancien mais assez confortable.

Perfect timing, took exactly 3 hours.
In a mini van.

The driver was half an hour late. To be fair, our location was difficult to find. Getting in contact with the company was easy via WhatsApp. Even though the driver didn't speak English, with Google Maps the driver found our destination easily.
Our driver was a nice guy however his driving was a bit all over the place. Always felt I needed to hold onto something
Excellent trip. Left early as we were the only customers that day. Arrived before lunch. What a great initiative from Cambodia Post. I highly recommend using their service.
Best trip and company out of four in Cambodia so far!
Totally okay.
Good service. We were taken care of and everything was fine.
its good
appreciate the guide. but the 12 hr didnt meet. we depart at 7am and arrive at 8:45 pm
appreciate the guide. the bus is very hot and not properly maintained. 12hr travel time didnt meet we departed at 7am and arrived at 8:48 pm
Well organised procedure at the office for getting on the bus. Staff pleasant and helpful. Bus was on time at arrival. Uncomfortable seating as we were at the back of the bus.

The trip isn't 30 min as they said, it's 1h since it stops in 3 stops in Koh Rong and then it goes to Sihanoukville. It came late and with these unexpected stops we almost loose our bus from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh. The staff was very unfriendly.
Puntual and good service.

The trip was from Siem Reap to Sihanoukville. We took a first and horrible "sleeping" bus that took us to Phnom Penh (there was no western people on it and Cambodians were so rude to us) and from there we had to wait 2.5h to another bus to Sihanoukville.

It was 2 hours longer than expected and the driver was a bit reckless (no more than the other Cambodian drivers), there was air conditioning and the seat was acceptable. They were very punctual in the pickups and they accompanied us at all times.Satisfied
Great Service, free water and refreshment towel for every customer. The bus drove off on time.

Depart in time from central front river + Arr on Time in a station relatively far the city /port (about 4 km S.E. can walk? or Tuk Tuk> 2$ (avoid from st.)) + G. Double Bed SLEEPER with access & water but without: place for Hand Bag or Bathroom --> 8/10

Depart in time fr relatively far city /port (about 6 km N.W): Tuk Tuk> 2$ +Arri on Time in Centr (cls. N. Market) passing on PP Airp.  +G. (Driver+ Seat+ AC) +Van originally service (Post Parcell) in between Post Offices? so fulfill with goods  --> 8.5/10
The driver pressed the signal every 10 seconds. Tired of this.
The driver was nice but he didn't speak English so we had no free Wi-Fi. We started one hour later as we should.

We left on time. The seats /bed was fine although the fan was right on our heads and the vent couldn't be closes properly neither could the curtains. Velcro on them would be nice. Since it was a night trip, reached an hour earlier to Phnom Penh
Sorry, we never met an inspector. Therefore I gave only 1 star
The post office busses are the way to go!

The service was very friendly and the accommodations were comfortable and even better than expected. The drive was quite fast and a little bit scary but I think that was more from the lack of clear highway laws being followed (in comparison to the US)
អ្នកបើកបរនិយាយតែទូរសព្ទមិនឈប់ រឿងធ្វើការ ១២ម៉ោងអីណា អត់លុយអូធីអីណា និយាយមិនឈប់ អ្នកជិះពឹងអ្នកបើករបគួរគិតផង, ឡានគ្មានម៉ាសុីនត្រជាក់,

I’ve never felt so unsafe in all my life the driver never introduced himself couldn’t speak English he drove too fast overtook on corners and was in my opinion reckless I couldn’t wait to get out and would never use this service again
Driving way too fast feel unsafe.   I will not ride again ever.

Seats spacious enough. Ac freezing, given blankets but taken away at 6am. Spent 3 hours parked at the boarder waiting for it to open.  but most annoyingly wasted 1.5 hours after the boarder for he bus which was awol. Meant 12.5 hours total instead of 8

They led me into The wrong bus to Kampot, then blame everything on me and demanded me to buy another ticket. I say that is bullshit. 
I asked them: Is this The bus to Bangkok? They nodded and showed me The way onto The bus
Very cheap and easy way to get around Cambodia .The driver was very safe and most helpful.
was a Good Trip, i can recommend it!
Very good driver. Was in front of hotel 10 mins before. Texted me on whatsapp in the morning to confirm. Lexus RX300 comfortable, AC not too low.
Perfect.

The pick up location was very unclear, we expected an office but there was none. We walked around in the heath with all our luggage for half an hour and when we walked back we luckily saw a van parked on the side of the road with the ctt logo, which was
We did not know where we would be picked up
Excellent service! The bus was on time, clean, driving was sensible and the arrival was 50min earlier than expexted.

We start punctuality, but their was now WiFi. And the bus was old and not very clean and there was not much space.  The driver drove very fast. We had a lot of stoops, thats fine. If the driver speaks English you can go of, where you want.

Do not do this. You do not arrive on PhuQuoc at 2 you arrive at 7.30pm with the company lying about timings the whole way. They make you change bus(broken) then spend an hour driving round picking others up meaning you miss ferry/wait for the 4pm slow one

Disgusting..on the day we were taken to the wrong Pier 3 Times...Rang the cruise company and they said don't worry even though you've missed the ferry today we'll pick you up tomorrow from your hotel they never came..REFUND..???

very annoying that less than 1 hour from Siemens Reap we stopped at a roadside shop for a 10 minute stop. The shop owner ordered us off the bus saying the driver was still eating!. We had not spent enough! 30 minutes later we left.
All fine. Stop off a little too long but then the driver ate.
All fine. Stop off a little too long but then the driver ate.
I've had very good experience. The driver was really reasonable and drove safe. I would definitely use them again.
Nice driver with a comfortable ride. The trip from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh took 5hrs which is good!
Boat was great, on time, confortable and safe, thank you
Speedy and efficient transport - would book the service again...
if there wasn't all the time late, when i said late is between 30 and 1 hour late, and if the driver dont use is cell phone while he is driving or pass car, the service will be perfect
Nice van with wifi on board (but frequent disconnections) but too many stops (4 during all the trip meaning more than 5 hours of road for a 200 km trip) and not enough effective A/C
On time, fast and a bit scary sometimes with a driver frequently on the phone while driving. Nice van with A/C and wifi

Water provided. Confusion because they switched to a partner company with non-English speaking staff. The trip was overbooked, we made the 1. stretch in a car - 6 of us in the 2 back rows! 2. stretch in a coach. With that seat reservations were nullyfied.

Very very satisfied with the bus. Very good service. Driver dropped us off at the pier in Sihanoukville. It took around 5hrs with a breakfast break. 
Best bus experience so far!
The bus is old, the streets are bumpy but overall it was a comfy and good ride from Siem Reap to Kampot. We recommend the OLONGPICH Night Bus, as it is a very affordable transport and good service.

I am waiting for my refund. Your driver didn.t pick me up from airport. We waited more than 30 mins at airport. And i had to take another taxi.
Please refund me my money. Thanks
Serbice at counter friendly, driver prompt and safr driving.excellent .great initiative of cambodia post.
We waited around for a bit longer than we would have liked at the various transfer points but overall the service & communication from AVT was very good.
Really happy with the service. Very comfy and helpful. Was really easy getting over the boarder, I have heard horror stories but they made it so simple. I will defiantly be using them again.
Even picked me up at my hostel, very good service. Ride was smooth on a decent bus.
The driver was good, But always no bottle of water. It's not expensive but they put real information.

I do not recommend for this price. We came to the indicated place, but no one was there and we didnt know what to do. We had to call and find out. I decided on this company because it offered a minibus, but we rode a big BUS!

The bus was great, comfortable, ac and really punctual. In fact I was late and they went out of their way to wait for me to catch up with them with was really nice. But, I was the only passenger and the driver kept trying to touch me and being a perv...

Had a suspicion that there would be no bus as all the seats were available as I booked the 9am bus the day before. Sure enough, when I arrived they told me to wait for the 12.30pm bus. I insisted and they put me on another company's bus.

Service was disappointing. I paid extra for a larger 12 seater vehicle so that children in the party could sleep. But a slow and uncomfortable old 6 seater was provided; too tight a fit. Whilst the driver was very good, the trip was very uncomfortable.
The bus was really slow and got us to our destination an hr late.
Very good driver. Felt safe and comfortable.
The ride was smooth. I felt safe. Thank you.
Excellent service. Lunch was provided. Arrived earlier than expected. Will definitely ride with them again.

We aspcted a direct Transfer Siem Reap to Kampot. Its not visible at the homepage, that you have to change the Bus two times, and the stop in Sihanoukville is from 6:00 am to 11:00 am . Also not that there is a upper place with and e under without window.

We aspcted a direct Transfer Siem Reap to Kampot. Its not visible at the homepage, that you have to change the Bus two times, and the stop in Sihanoukville is from 6:00 am to 11:00 am . Also not that there is a upper place with and e under without window.

Excellent service. Booked a car at 10pm for 12.30 the next day, Siem Reap to Phnom Penh. Got confirmation straight away, good price, the driver was early, drove safely and we got to Phnom Penh in good time.
The driver was taking to many risks while overtaking. A little bit more patience would be very good for the safety - eventhough it takes more time...wifi didn’t work
The driver rushed in the cambodian traffic so the journey wasn’t properly relaxing.
Perfect way off travel. Save and conveniënt.
Driver waiting for me just ahead of booked time, car clean and comfortable and safely driven to get me to my next hotel in one piece. Good value also.

1- they didn't give me the seat I booked.
2- they was late for around 15min.
3-  The driver drives recklessly.
4- in the boarder, they just off loaded my bag without telling me what is going on, later I found that the immigration refused to give visa.

1-the bus was new. 2- delay for aprox 15min. 3- The driver drives recklessly and honked a lot couldn't sleep. 4-in the boarder, they just off loaded my bag without telling me what is going on, later I found that the immigration refused to give visa
Very good
Very good

Driver is crazy, risking life of passengers all the time ! I won't be suprised if that driver would have accident one day because the way he is driving is completely out of norms,even in Cambodia. Road full of stress, no more in my life...
