Driver is crazy, risking life of passengers all the time ! I won't be suprised if that driver would have accident one day because the way he is driving is completely out of norms,even in Cambodia. Road full of stress, no more in my life...

Driver was very nice and friendly, he brought  us delicious breakfast from the hotel and water as well! Driving safely! I recommend ! The only thing is when you are leaving from Phonm Penh there is no office of this company,the bus is leaving from hotel
Le voyage s’est bien passé. Le bus était à l’heure et tout s’est bien passé.

Une catastrophe ! Le trajet a duré 3h de plus que prévu. On a changé 3 fois de bus. Fais un trajet à pied ou en tuk tuk a nos frais. Très mauvaise organisation ! Un passager était assis au milieu du bus de nuit  tout le trajet à cause d’un Overbooking.
Very good service.

Booked a private taxi from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh - driver was on time, drove safely and offered to stop for lunch/snacks/toilet etc. Was very impressed with the service and would recommend to others!
I want to be able to select seat in the future.

Finally good, but late. They said us "is a direct bus and in 3-3'5 hours you will arrive to Kep" but finally we arrived 4'5h later and we needed to change the bus because the first stop was in Kampot...

It was what one would hope. Driver was there when we landed. With namesign. In the right place so he could not be missed. The car (Lexus SUV) was in good condition and clean. Driver never drove to fast. Price was about the same as taxi but with no hassle

Frustrating that even though I bought this ticket separate from my ticket to Koh Rong (at additional cost) I was denied a spot because the boat was already booked. Had to use a different service to get back to Sihanoukville.
Left later than expected and was crammed a little too full. Trip itself was fairly short.

Driver was very nice and got be from Phnom Penh to Sohanoukville in a good amount of time even with traffic. Even though he didn’t speak English and I didn’t speak Khmer, he was patient and found a way to determine where I wanted to be dropped off.
Old bus...very very very old. NO WIFI
Everything was fine except that the driver stopped in the middle of nowhere after 3-4 hours to pee without asking us if we would need to as well.
With 3 stops to just Kampot from Phnom Penh the drive gets really long. To many breaks.
With 3 stops to just Kampot from Phnom Penh the drive gets really long. To many breaks.
Very punctual service, good car, enough space with luggage
Fast travel, we missed the wifi.

We had an awful experience. At one stop where the driver was letting a passenger off we asked to use the restroom, and he said ok. When we came back out, the bus was gone and we were not informed. We were stranded for over an hour in the muddle of nowhere
Departure should be at 7.30 am, we left at 8.15 am by different bus. It was big mess nobody didnt know anything.
Leaving on time
Good experience for the price.   I didn’t have my booking itinerary printed out and couldn’t access on my phone so a little confusion when checking in but not a problem.    Ovetall a good experience

I would recommend you to other travelers and I will use you again in the future, but please do not let anybody come onto the bus and try to charge foreigners a price that is not true. Just give instructions for how to cross the border on their own. Thanks

we sat at back of boat & found we had to hold on very tight to weather covers to stop them from flapping in our face.  got very very wet. boat way too over crowded. people sitting out front of boat & going extremely fast.  not good.

The van left on time, and we arrived at our destination on time. The only thing which I would advise is when they do the lunch stop they only give you 20 mins to eat and pay. The place stopped at is the central point where many buses stop and is very busy
N/A
A good driver and was on time. Arrived an hour later in PP but that was only because of the traffic in PP. We had 1 stop during the trip and it was perfect.
Good service and excellent driver

An hour late for picking up time because of traffic and difficulties to find the place.
Therefore, we arrived in Phnom Pehn much later than expected.

Ac didn’t work and driver stop to garage to fix it. After that it’s ok. No promised WiFi or water bottle.
And we have 50+ Yankee onboard and when he needed to go to toilet, driver refused stop. Just laughed. Stopped to buy eat after an hour. Not recommen
Right on time at the airport, very good and friendly driver ... Excellent service, thank you very much.
Right on time at the airport, very good and friendly driver ... Excellent service, thank you very much.
Extremely cramped with minimal space between seats. Air-conditioning didn't work but driver stopped at mechanic to get it fixed.

The bus was 1h late, without any information about the ETA. We just had to wait without any information.
The seat arrangement in the van was different than the one online, so the seats we booked did not exist in that van.
The driving was alright.
Late by one hour. Tuk tuk expensive from office to hotel. No communication at PP office. Arrive late at destination. Pick up and drop off of locals delayed van even more. Generally, bad service.

Easy process and good experience
would use again :)
Liked the journey,though a more punctual arrival would have been appreciated.

Bus was very comfortable with c
Very smooth ride. Very nice driver but no english

Easy booking and paying by credit card. Temperature was perfect. Not too cold and not to warm. We left on time and seats were comfortable. We made a break so you could by something local to eat if you like.

Easy booking and paying by credit card. Temperature was perfect. Not too cold and not to warm. We left on time and seats were comfortable. We made a break so you could by something local to eat if you like.
Parti à 8h30 au lieu de 8h et a accumulé 1h30 de retard, je ne recommande pas. De plus, le bus est vieux et l’airco fonctionne à peine.
The driver was kind, perfect

The van was involved in a fatal car accidents. When it happened, the bus driver did not provide any support to the passengers, he did not even ask if passengers are ok. After one hour, a replacement car came to pick up the passengers and provide support.
No complains, the bus was on time on Asian standards and crossing the border went without surprises.

Excellent and punctual service. The mini-van was very comfortable and clean.  I  would highly recommend Cambodia 
Post ViP Van.

Really cramped up van .. too many stops and got locals that joined on Board during the journey 
On way back it’s big coaster and lot more better

We took the Postbus from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh. It was on time, air-conditioned and comfortable. We made 1 stop,about 20-25 minutes. There was a small restaurant/shop and some toilets. Everything was smooth, a bit of traffic entering PP but expected

Very disappointing! Price nearly twice than comparable companies (i.e. Giant Ibis), service much worse. Hardly any of the advertised (really old Bus, no WiFi, no Snacks). Bus broke down after 100km. Had to be picked up by the following one 1 hour later.
At the first van of air conditioning broken down yet the driver immediately call backup to the new coach for collecting passengers . Salute to Mekong Express staff and drivers !
Parti à l’heure, arrivé en avance : rien à dire ! Mais heureusement que j’étais la seule à avoir une valise, car je ne vois pas où on les aurait mises. Et un peu trop de moustiques dans le van...

We recommend Mekong Express because the staff was very helpful and polite. The price includes pillow, blanket, water and a lot of different snacks and the seats are extremely comfortable on the night bus. Driving was good and bus was on time. Amazing!

We recommend Mekong Express because the staff was very helpful and polite. The price includes pillow, blanket, water and a lot of different snacks and the seats are extremely comfortable on the night bus. Driving was good and bus was on time. Amazing!

Bus left an hour late without explanation or update from office. The bus we rode on was different from the one we'd made reservations on. Seats were cramped and uncomfortable. We arrived more than an hour late.

Please, for the love of your comfort, DO NOT RIDE CHAMPA MEKONG! Our booking said "VIP VAN" but the van that we rode was not anywhere near "VIP". The van was dilapidated, A/C doesn't seem to be working, they try to fit in too many passengers and luggage!
Late departure time. Took a long time - much longer than four hours.
Left my wallet, came back 5 minutes after realizing I left it in the seat and it was gone. The van was being cleaned at the time, therefore, one of the employees took it. Very unhappy.

The trip to Battambang was fine, once we were in the bus. We booked online and chose the pick-up Option. Got the etickets via mail but nothing mentioned about the pick up from our hotel so we did not no if someone would come! Waited 1h with 2 kids, no fun

It's not because when you book you think the bus is not going to be full because it is not the case! They try to put as many people as possible in the bus. No wifi, and if you don't ask how long it will last for the breaks, they won't tell you. But fine.

Bigger van so nicer but extremely cold with the A/C on, not able to lower it, not enough space for luggage in the "trunk", and arrived at least two hours later. On breaks recommend you dont come out from the bus unless you must as I almost missed the bus.

Not one but 4 buses: 1 from SHK to the border with Thailand, then 2 from the border to Pattaya, then 1 from Pattaya to BKK. The final destination is inaccurate, arrived 4 hours later than expected, and to arrive to departure point had to take a tuktuk

My driver & car were great; safe & comfortable. Driver said he wasn't told soon enough to be on time-not enough time between his airport pickup & my job.  He was about 45 min late & still needed dinner. Evening traffic bad; he needed an hr to get to me
Right on time in Siem Reap, our hotel wasn't easy to find !!! Efficient and friendly driver ...,thank you

Malheureusement il n'y a pas beaucoup de possibilités pour se rendre à senmonorom. Soit par les minivans, certes à faible coût mais trop de prise de risque des chauffeurs, ils roulent beaucoup trop vite. Ou alors le taxi : prix élevé mais moins risqué..

Soyez avertis: voyager en minivan vers senmonorom est un risque à prendre! Trajet effrayant, chauffeur ayant roulé à 120km/h tout le long, et prenant des risques inconsidérables. Très mauvaise expérience. Je ne recommande pas.
Trajet qui s'est bien passé, court, rapide et confortable. Je ne me suis pas sentie en insécurité comme sur les trajets longs. Je recommande les minivans pour trajets courts seulement.

We booked by bookmebus.com a bus from Sihanoukville to Kampot.We arrived at the departure point that marked on the map and we found a tuk tuk that takes us to the bus for 3 dollars just to travel 150 meters.They are messy.

The bus was supposed to be without scam, but IT IS A LIE. Someone not from the company entered the bus 1h before the thai border and ask everyone $35 to take care of the visa. DO NOT DO IT! It is faster and cheaper by yourself. Also bus and food were bad.

This company is no longer as good as it used to be. This I found out both by travelling myself and I also discussed with a local guy who said that Mekong Express is no longer good company. Two hours late, no water, driver didnt speak english, drives well.

Bus was on time, clean, the food was good. I would recommend but be aware of scams. They stop 5km from the border saying you can get your visa faster here - their price is $15 more (which they don’t tell you). Don’t take the tuktuks they offer for free.
Wrong sit number given
All was really good ?
Might be better to not pick up from hotels it meant the bus set off half an hour late and so the journey was 4 hours not 3.
Driver smoked in van / 2 hours delay but all together ok

I travelled down to Sihanoukville from Siem Reap with another company a few days previously and it was much better. 
The Bayon mini bus was already very small and it had been overbooked so was very crowded and cramped for the whole 6 hour journey.

Malheureusement, deuxième fois la même journée, le bus est tombé en panne. 1h30 d’attente dans un café pour qu’un autre bus vienne nous chercher et nous emmener à notre destination (arrivée à 1h du matin au lieu de 22h...). Malgré cela, chauffeur sympa!

Après 2h de route, le bus tombe en panne. Pendant 3h (!!!!!), nous avons été bloqués au milieu de nulle part sans savoir ce que nous attendions (le chauffeur ne nous disait rien). Finalement j’ai payé un autre bus qui passait et ai raté ma correspondance!
Left on time. Clean van. Comfortable.
Excellent trip!

Never go with Buva Sea, their service is the worst. We had a delay already and then they said there was a big whale?! so we could not leave. We had to buy a new ticket from another company GTVC which was amazing! So go for GTVC!
Very pleased with our trip. Driver safe and accommodating to all requests.

Parti avec 10 minutes de retard, 1 arrêt imprévu et 30 minutes de plus qu’annoncé (arrivée à destination après plus d’1h)... Point positif : bouteille d’eau offerte. Et... attention aux « turbulences » ;-)
Driver took way too many risks. Also, they dropped 5 individual people off. Way too many stops!

I really wish i had known that the sleeper bus is booked so that each shall bed holds 2 people. The beds are too small to fit 2 normal-sized adults shoulder to shoulder. So you end up spooning with a stranger if you don't have someone to book with.
Problems when boarding with e-ticket

I booked a ticket back to HCMC at 1.30pm for bus depart at 2pm, only until 2.08pm i received my E-ticket? I wasn't able to get on the bus because bus station said they didn't see my booking, lost $12 for nothing
The bus is not cold enough

They advertised 6 hour trip. After six hours we had only just passed the border. The lady told me two and a half to get to border. They made us wait an hour before departing and then spent another one in Phnom Penh picking up other people to full up bus

Ticket said departure was 2:30, actual D was 1h later. 3 Breaks (20min) on a 5h trip, we were worried if we would make it to the Hostel onTime. Nobody was able to tell us where to go for pickup for the next bus.We will never travel with virak ever again!!

This is the worst service that I have ever taken.
I personally recommend you to think twice.
Unlike all other companies I traveled with, Bayon VIP has always been punctual, as comfortable as it gets and safe. They have once again held up their part of the deal and I can only recommend them.
Had picked our seats online and did not get them and had to sit in the very back with our feet on other peoples luggage and our bags in our laps. We did leave on time and the van was clean.

First bus crashed into a tuk tuk. No regard for anyone’s safety on board or the tuk tuk driver. Took an hour to send another bus, which also broke down. Inspector actually found it FUNNY. No communication. AWFUL.

Pin on map is not same as actual location. Good thing the operator called 5 mins before departure. Had to rush on foot to make it on time. Seats were comfortable but not much leg room. A.C. was unsatisfactory. No Wi-Fi on board but there is free water.
Worst journey I have ever made
First time in South East Asia so far that I arrived before the set time. Nice spacious clean vans with airco. Great skilled driver, felt very safe.

The bus which should pick me up at 5PM never arrived cause it was broken. After 1 1/2h a shared taxi arrived - the arranged alternative. It picked up 3 locals on the way; the driver couldn't speak a word English; drop off was not correct(more outside city

Departed an hour later than scheduled, took longer than it should've to get out of PP, A/C didn't work for the first few hours of trip. Bus broke down about 20 minutes outside of destination-arrived 4 hours later than scheduled- not due to bus break down.
Good driver. The smell inside the bus was terrible and the seats quite uncomfortable. But still ok for the price
The bus inside could use a good cleaning.
You are very nice company.
It was put as the mini bus, but it was the van. It was too hot inside of the van, and the company should have checked with all aircons.

잘 도착했습니다! 메콩 익스프레스 나름 괜찮았어요! 귀여운 벤에 옹기종기 타서! 
그치만 기사님이 운전 중에 전화하셔서 조금 불안했고!! 나머지는 다 좋았습니다!
Excellent!
Very late being picked up and then packed into a mini van with the driver trying to sit his mates on top of us! Not good at all when you pay money for a seat! Appalling service.
change the schedule without informing us and let us wait extra six hours because of their own fault.
The WiFi didn't worked and there were no water in the bottles. Otherwise everything was fine
This company never contacted Mekong express. So instead of riding in the bus I booked they put us in a smaller van in the back row.
Good
Bus left on time and reached destination on time. No complaints. Good trip. Please allow us to select seats when booking.
The bus driver was careful to overtake slow moving carts safely and go around or slower over the bumps.  No problems with the trip. Didnt see an inspector
Departed 1 hour behind schedule, otherwise ok..
The bus driver put us in an area with only restaurant for lunch break of 20,mins. It happens the restuarant was full with other guests. We don't even have time to order our lunch.

The time schedule was totally different than the arrival time. Online schedule says, 12 hours trip but the bus arrived very late. From 12 hours to almost 20 hours trip.
It's a nightmare.

The bus broke down after one hour journey from Siem Reap. We had to wait for 2 hours on the road to get another bus o pick us up?.... They said fan belt broke.wonder whether they don't do regular checkups on their bus. Not recommended
Cambodia Post buses are great. Good, careful drivers. Can be a bit cramped but very good value overall. Pity they don't serve more destinations.

from Phnom Penh to s
Shihanoukville drop off point is not the same you said .why you always differed destination .other customers as well they all  claimed your system is not trustful. destination is so important . You never understand!yourserviceissobad
Take 9 hours to be a to HCMC ...

When I booked the van, I chose to have us picked up infront of PPSEZ, according to them, we will be picked up at around 8:00am. So we waited there, I cant contact the driver, and he was able to pick us up at 8:45am already.

Very good driver and the punctality was good to.
Over all a good service.
It very good that I book with your company.
We didn’t know about stops to be made. It would be nice if this could be explained in English. Overall, a good experience.

Check-in was efficient and driver left early. He was efficient and friendly, but drove too fast, tail-gated dangerously, and braked sharply at a few points, some near-contacts. I understand bumpy roads + a different driving environment, but too dangerous
The driver drove at over 100km an hour weaving in and out of traffic. The other passengers screamed and worried we were going to die. We were nearly hit my two other trucks. Terrifying.
The air condition should be more efficient and cool so the journey will be more pleasant.
It was a bit chaotic before boarding. Actual ride was ok. We left 25 mins after scheduled time.
I used several companies  during my stay in Cambodia and this one was definitely the best! Punctual, wifi on board, car in good condiition - well done!
I used several companies  during my stay in Cambodia and this one was definitely the best! Punctual, wifi on board, car in good condiition - well done!

Nice bus 
Stoped 3 times 
Arived 20 mins late due to traffic
So all good

I booked for the 1pm bus, but it simply did not exist, and I got registered for the 2pm one. I did not receive any email, about this, a confirmatuon of my booking, or anything. The rest of the trip was perfect.
ល្អប្រសើរ
Left on time and arrived in time
All as envisaged, arrived on time, thank you for the service.

The driver dropped us off at an abandoned gasstation. Because of that, we had to pay a tuk tuk driver 11 dollar to get us to the right place. It was not the place they promised tot drop us off and now it was very expensive and unpleasant.
Overall the trip was good but need to improve in providing more clear information for the departure point such as with picture.
great
I was given a different seat from what I've booked. Seems like their list is not updated since I booked online, luckily there was an available seat.
We left on time and arrived half hour early in Kep. No bathroom break, but that was okay by me. Good driver, good van, good ride.
AC not so cold ...

Hat alles super funktioniert. Die Busfahrt war sehr gut organisiert und die "Stewardess" hat für die Touristen extra auf Englisch alles wiederholt. Das erste Mal das jemand englisch bei einer Fahrt konnte. Kamen sogar früher als geplant an.  Top.
Reliable & fast driver. Departed and arrived on time, slightly packed in the mini van, AC working fine.
Great service as always from Cambodia Post. Arrived well ahead of time with no dangerous driving.  Why ask for rating of inspector?  There is no inspector.
Great journey on a very new and spacious bus . Brilliant staff who were so welcoming and told us what stops were for and how long ! Thanks

Rude and hateful counter staff giving customer dirty looks. They can be nice and help, even if they're busy. Also, the seat arrangement online doesn't match van's seat arrangement. Online, seat 8 is seat 7 in van, and I have online receipt to prove it.
Vzey smooth trip, took less than three hours thanks to a very quiet traffic
We left more than 30 minutes late but the driver was quick enough to make up for it a little bit. The van was so comfortable that we didn't fell it too much. I guess they just know what they do haha
A bit slow but overall a very safe trip
I used the post bus several times and think in terms of punctuality and safe driving its the best solution!
overall experience is great! we had a smooth and safe ride to siem reap.
First Class trip back to PP.....Driver was very good; Van was clean and comfortable.   5 stars all the way....

We had a horrible experience with Bayon while returning from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh. No air conditioner, no water, bus broke down, no information given by the driver. Alternative bus was packed and filthy. Never traveling with Bayon again.

I was sitting in seat A1, which is right next to the driver.  That seat was EXTREMELY UNCOMFORTABLE. while the note when I booked it said that it was narrow, I was not prepared.  should have cost $1-2 at most.  Otherwise, great driver; bus; etc.

Our Mini van was 1.20 hour late, it was very old and unconfortable 
Driver was driving like a maniac and dropped us of in the middle of nowhere, 3km away from the bus station.
Really good :)
Quick, safe, comfortable!

We had to make continuous stops to let the engine cool down and then the van broke down completely about halfway to our destination. We waited about two hours on the side of the road for another bus which was too small and so extremely cramped.

I just want to raise my word to all the drivers/transportation company to consider. 
I believe that not everyone like the same music. So, it's better to lowering or turning off music. 
Travel is tiring, I really want to sleep without loud boring musics!

Everything was great until the driver took people on the street for extra money. The driver rudely asked me to move to other seat so he could take more people. And then he asked me to get off on a random street not at the final drop-off place.
Perfect !
The driver couldn't be bothered to pick me up at the prearranged bus stop and will not refund my money.  Left me stranded on the side of the road.    Completely unprofessional.
Didn't receive water and no wifi on board. Had to show the tickets twice, one time after we already boarded.

The trip down to Sihanoukville was ok. The bus back was a disaster. No water no WiFi no aircon!!! The bus broke down outside Sihanoukville. The replacement was older and smaller. It was uncomfortable and hot. I will not recommend to anyone.
We were moved to the back of the bus even though we had previously reserved seats. It was so so hot at the back due to the heat of the engine and bad AC. Overcrowded with people sitting on floor!
Great comfy bus. Seats were spaced apart, AC was great and had wifi also. Got us to our destination on time.
Bang on

We booked a minivan and ended up with a minibus instead. We were delayed by 30 minutes leaving Sihanoukville. In the first 90 minutes we only drove 33 km. Air conditioning was faulty. No leg space. Arrived in Phnom Penh 2 hours later than expected.
Just need to update the map on the website- the address says van will be in Odessy (?) but if you click on the map, it'll give you the address near the night market

We left half hour late and we arrived over one hour later. It was important for us to get to Phnom Penh on time as we had only one day to visit. Comfortable seats, pleasant travel. Driver was driving pretty slow when was daylight and when it got dark fast

Never again! The bus arrived 2 hours late and it smelled really bad, the bed covers and pillows were disgusting. Stopped several times to pick up and dropped off people, thought it was a straight drive. Not recommended!

Horrible experience! Never again! Never again! The bus arrived 2 hours late and smelled really bad, the bed covers and pillows were disgusting dirty. Stopped several times to pick up and dropped off people, thought it was a straight drive. Not recommended
We had trouble locating our taxi and I did worry he wasnt there. Thought he would be waiting at the pier, had to go looking for him. Still got to the airport okay though :)

Packed a 12 person bus with 19 people and huge bags of rice and other things. The one bathroom break was at a huge open field. No where for my fiancé to use the restroom. Lunch at the transfer spot was good. After that the vans were good.
Great as always with Cambodia Post.  The only cheap and efficient service in Cambodia.
Left on time, very clean bus, offered water and wifi. Choose seat A8 so much leg room !
Horrible!!! No Space for anything and ist smells! Driver transported Durian.
My reservation was not followed i book for seat #4 i ended up in seat #21
My reservation was not followed i book for seat #4 i ended up in seat #21
Very happy with your service. Thank you!
I booked and paid one seat but when I arrived the bus station, the seat that I bought was sold to other person so what will be solution for me now??? And how is my money paid??

The van was quite comfortable and the driver was very safe for Cambodian standards - still non-stop overtaking but taking less risks than than others. We arrived an hour late to our destination so maybe allow some buffer before any connecting flights.

Everything was fine. I'm 185cm tall so the bed was too small for me but I could bend my knees and stick my feet out so it was fine. I slept well the whole way, bear in mind I had a couple of diazepam. But I would recommend this service siem reao-sihanouk
Van was clean and cool, not a lot of room for long legs. Left and arrived early, with one short bathroom break.

I had my confirmed booking from bookmebus but despite this was told my seat had been sold to someone else and that there was no room for me. I had to get a taxi as it was khmer new year and no other companys had spots. Never using this service again!!
do not follow what my reservation I book for seat #4 but I ended up in seat #21 and the driver  always using the horn

Driver drove safely, kept stopping which was a bit annoying & made us hit traffic
WiFi didn’t work didn’t get the water promised
Van was nice & comfoy big seats, leg room
other drivers on the road made it feel a bit unsafe

(Minibus VIP) Driver was mad! We hit / killed a chicken (it like exploded, feathers & all) & kept nearly hitting motorbikes and cars! 
WiFi doesn’t work 
Seems quite unorganised 
Bus itself was comfy and air con was nice

Did the job, drove from A to B safely, quite slowly however. Fairly comfortable, bus nice & empty.
HOWEVER 
There was mosquitos EVERYWHERE! I got bitten alive bring bug spray! There were a ridiculous amount! 
Also air con was poor - the front is colder

The bus drop off location was nowhere near Pratunam Market (actually Khao San Road and Main Station) as stated in the email, which was very inconvenient as I had booked accommodation in this area based on information in the email.

1.) The drivers stole our money, charging six Westerners almost $80 for an otherwise $30 visa.  2.) The drivers changed out of uniform upon crossing into Cambodia and picked up numerous private passengers and pocketing the money, making us three hours lat

The ride was just ok. We stopped several times for driver and assistants to eat/get drinks but were never offered to get off. They got stinky oysters at one point that made the entire bus smell. Driver also watched cartoons the whole way.
Superb terrible time!!!!!
Old bus with not good aircon. Driver kept radio on the whole trip. The driver tried to overtake every vehicle on the road, very unsafe. Overall a scary terrible trip.
Had to sit on back seats where 4 seats were squeezed in. Everyone else had bigger seats. Bear this in mind when choosing your seats.
Too many stops around 10-15 at each post station in province; hence, it has been behind the expected schedule around 20 minutes while the rest are fine.
So comfortable :)

Steward girl was unsorted and not in control of the situation at the border crossing (still owes me 50k vnd) vietnamese/cambodian guests are really unfriendly. If you want a proper review, contact me via e-mail: jan.wardenga@googlemail.com

The driver drive way too fast and cutting in and out in and out of all the cars to get to my destination it was very dangerous I don't know if I'll use this service again. Aircon didn't work that good so it was a little hot .

I emailed Sapaco asking them if I could reschedule the bus two days before the date of travel. Unfortunately, I never received a reply and ended up forfeiting the fare and travelling with a different company.

This trip never happened because on the morning of my trip, I was told there was not going to be a bus from Battambong to Phnom Penh. So, I lost out on a roundtrip ticket fare because I couldn't find a way back. There was no refund after much conversation
Задержка отправления почти на час, прибытия больше чем на два. Очень старый автобус. Водитель постоянно гудел, очень резко тормозил
Водитель всю дорогу гудел. В остальном все хорошо

Bus was ok and operated by Transport Co. Drinks & snacks were provided at beginning and later a simple lunch. Shortly before border a man selling Visa Express service entered the bus, but after "no,thanks" he did not bother me. Border crossing was smooth.
The driver I not good drive too fast

We arrived one hour early for departure and inspector managed to get us in the bus ready to go (so one hour earlier), which was great as we were travelling with little kids and it made our travelling time shorter.
Perfect ride for a family with little kids. Airconditioning was good, water provided and traffic was easy.
Reserved seats next to each other and were split up which was upsetting.  Bus ride was good, wi fi good, but bus was late.
A very safe and reliable driver

The driver was nice & got us from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh in time for us to catch our flight.He drove very fast, which seemed to be the norm b/c the traffic speeds and patterns in Cambodia are crazy.We appreciate the driver getting us there on time
SUPERB SERVICE.  I booked 2 ways on bookmebus and both drivers are on time and friendly. Thank you!
A bit late

Not a bad experience but also not a great one. The bus is very tightly packed when fully booked and the air conditioning cannot really keep the bus cool enough in the heat. No wifi as advertised but if you have a sim you should have coverage for the trip

Driver didn’t understand the simplest words in English and, during the trip, stopped to wash his entire car, keeping us waiting. Didn’t drove us safely and almost stop the car in a car accident to film the accident victim. Sad.Next time, I would use a bus
Probably my laptop was stolen from my bag during this tour.
The website said there were 4 buses this day. I booked the 1pm one. Turns out it just did not exist, and I was registered for the 2pm one, which left around 2:20.
Very pleasant trip

The bus is a bit older but it's well maintained and the staff is very nice. The bus trip was smooth. The only thing is that they didn't pick us up from the hotel like we arranged. Luckily I realized this in time and was able to make it.

We are 1h:15m late, mainly  because we have to drop everyone off - but not me? Why don't you ask? We are driving RIGHT BY Malysian embasy where I need to go - and in stead I waste 1½ hours of a lovely Saturday :-s
Pleasant trip, good driver.

The driver was terrible he stopped for cigarettes whenever he wanted with no respect to the schedule. Also he is a terrible driver we almost crushed with cows and he laugh maybe the passengers didn’t noticed it but I was on the front seat. Breaks suck too
I would like to recommend Meyhong bus such a comfortable and one more would like to request, please let us to select the seat accordingly. Thank you if you let us to select the seat.
Pick-up and drop-off was fine. Waited at the bus company for quite some time before departing. Everything else was fine.

It was described at booking as one trip but actually it was a connection in Phnom Penh (3 hours waiting at 4:30am). The trip was ok but the night bus stopped a couple of times during the night. We still don't know why
We ended up not taking this company as they do not care about customer safety or comfort.we hope they go bankrupt.

We paid 8 Dollars for a "VIP" bus. Our prebooked seats (number 6+7) were occupied when we hopped on, water was not provided, only when we got off the bus, we saw it under the seats - noone showed us, WLAN did not work, driver didn't care, it was ok.

All great until we got to Snool and then the car broke down. We were sitting at the side of the road and told we must wait 4 hours and then drive to Pnomh Penh. No water offered! No alternative offered. So three passengers got on a bus passing by.

Punctueel, goede chauffeur. Prima rit, goed te doen!  Twee stops onderweg van circa twintig minuten. Gratis flesje water. Van Siem Reap naar Phnom Penh duurde ongeveer 5 uur. Je mag 20kg aan bagage pp meenemen plus handbagage.
Organised and pretty reliable service with Mekong Express. They offer the best price-service of the bus companies I’ve tried in (and to-from) Cambodia.

We were picked up from our hotel Sunway hotel in Phnom Penh. The minibus driver loaded our luggage and when it was unloaded at the bus station there was a large score mark in our brand new large pink case. The driver denied he had done it, HE DID

Overall good experience, we didn't expect to make this long route in time, but to our surprise it went all well, with two short stops in between.
Driver was excellent, fast, but felt safe. Minibus was clean looked like new (with 120k+ km on it).
Excellent, value for money service. Thank you

Everything went smoothly. We got there 1,5 hours later than told by the company but we already knew that it was going to happen so we didn’t mind. 
Would just appreciate more info beforehand (price of the visa etc)

Do not use this company! To start of we arrived for our 1:30pm journey half an hour early as requested, to find out we wouldn’t be leaving until 2:15pm. The air condition didn’t work well and the WiFi didn’t work at all. The communication with the driver
Very cost effective and safe driving. Comfortable seats
The promised wifi w was not available and the air conditioning was poor.  The inspector was terrific.

Competent driver
Well paced
Comfy car
Incompetent driver, 1 h delay for pick up, very dangerous driving, unsafe

The driver drove over the speed limit and he used a different road which was very bumpy. Everyone in the bus wanted to complain but it was hard to tell him in English. We left right on time receiving a bottle of water. So, only the driver was the problem.
Overall trip was excellent. We left a bit late because of some seat misunderstanding. However, we arrive the destination on time. Driver was friendly and helpful.

The bus arrived early this was the only good thing about the bus. The bus had no aircon and we booked seats at the front of the bus but instead we got seated at the back of the bus next to the toilets. The people on the bus were less then helpful. Awful!!
Really bad, because when i arrived the bus station no seat for me.

The guide charged me $15 extra for a year multiple visa, he said because today is holidays...
Normal visa only costs $5 extra, I am not very satisfied with this $15 extra charge, this is already
beyond bus charge.Anyway I do not use this bus anymore.

The trip took us 8 hours instead of the 4. I was supposed to be dropperd off at the Phsar Orussey stop (near my accommodation) but I was dropped off near Wat Phnom. The girl at the agency didn't care and only said that I can pay for a tuk tuk. Frustrating

The air conditioning didn’t work. It took over 10 hours to arrive in Phnom Penh after taking 3 hours just to cross the border. How interesting this was watching the locals walk through whilst the rest of us waited. The snacks were the only good thing.

The aircon broke early on and the driver found a mechanic who could fix it.
Overall no complains, we got to Siem Reap in time, had several stops on the way to pick people up and drop them off.
Sure driving is a bit more adventurous, such is life here.

I keep my bag in Phnom Penh bus station after I arrived Phnom Penh. However, when I got back my bag I realize that my money were gone. I can't sure is it stolen by your employee but I really feel sad about that.

We turned up st hotel reception 20 mins before booking and driver was waiting which was great. He took cases to car. He was very polite and also bought us water. Lovely comfortable car and journey. Great service and would use company again.

Your Services are very bad.
I never book your ticket. 
Terrible!!!
Good services !!!!
Good service,  bus is very clean with profisional bus drivers .
If the driver spoke English, that could have been great! Another thing that really bothers me - you could make the stop at a different venue where there is more choice to eat, buy fruit, etc.

Very comfortable trip, superclean minivan, nice and amenable driver, Wi-Fi available. I really enjoy the trip. 
Thanks also to the customer care service which answer to my questions in few hours and helped me when I was in need.
Super recommended! 5*
It was overall good, but we had no idea where we would stop in the middle. You need to inform people beforehand or put it on the ticket that 1 stop will be made at a specific location.
Had a good trip comfortable and on time.
All good
Perfect. We were late of one hour, And he was still waiting for us and nice. Drove us safely.
Boat a bit late but generally alright.

I have never seen the bus like this before, storm water poured on my head when raining. It took 8 and a half hours from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh because we need to wait 2 hours for changing bus. My visiting plan that day has gone.

Despite the reviews, everything was perfect from the moment I got my ticket printed and baggage tagged until
I safely arrived in Phnom Penh 6 hours later :) The sleeping chair/bed was slightly thin for a big man like me, so tips; get the window seats.
Comfortable trip from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh. I suggest this company for your transfer.
Good serivice, comfy seats, WiFi on board and water / wet wipe. Careful driver

For a no frills trip from Siem Reap to Battambang and back to Siem Reap, Mekong Express was great. Departure was a little later than 8am, closer to 8:30 both times, and in turn arrived about half an hour later both ways. Otherwise- a solid, simple ride.
bus is old. seats not good. No wifi.
AC too cold but besides that, everything was fine
Family of 5 with kids aged 6,9,10.  GOOD-AC worked, efficient and on time, made plenty of stops.  Broke down, needed brakes replaced, and still made it to destination on time. BAD-very cramped

The Bus Driver stopped the bus in the middle of nowhere at midnight ask me to give him $10.00 more person from me and my husband even after I showed him the tickets that i already paid in full. I felt threaten and and got robbed.
On time ( pick up ) and customer service very closely.

Bus quite old, seat not so comfortable. The girl of Mekong Express should be a bit more professional, without laughing and chatting with the driver all the trip. Departure terminal too far from the centre of Phnom Phen
Great and confortable trip!
I booked seat 8, 11 when we arrived at bus station they said 8, 11 already sold to other then they asked us to sit at the back of the van.
Everything okay / good except the delay of departure (around 40 min).
Its ok
We had so many groups passing before us at the borders. The guide was not staying near the Vietnamese officers and our passport, so the Vietnamese officers just took so many passports before ours.
On time, thanks for the no notice booking and for taking me to my destination safely. Great service and better than trying to find a ride in the street.

I think that your company don’t take care customer. 
It too bad. I had been refuse your services and change to Larryta bus.
Your service is bad !!!
No WiFi, uncomfortable van and driving.

I had always been fond of the service provided by Cambodia Post VIP Van (Siem Reap <-> Phnom Penh), but the driver from Kep to Phnom Penh this May 1st made me and my team so disappointed. This driver made 3 long personal stops for his personal purposes...

We were told report to the bus terminal 20 minutes before departure. We had arrived on time to the bus terminal location, but we werent notified the terminal had been moved around the corner. So we were late but the bus had already left at 2:40
Wifi wasnt working

Bus was clean and comfy. A small water bottle was provided. Boarding location was convenient. Bus left on time and arrived about 45 mins earlier than scheduled. Stopped twice at nice places with clean toilets. Highly recommended.
Driver look like F1
Driver look like Fast Furious 7
Road infrastructure needs to be up dated if Cambodia wants tourist
The driver was good and safe!! The seatbelts did not work though and we chose 4 seats in the back but there were only 3 so my husband had to sit in the front besides the driver.
Fast and comfortable
Please include Wifi services
driver's service was okay.  The van was clean.  But I did not get free wif .
I trust Cambodian post van.

Excellent service, driver was on time and very friendly and helpful, lunch stop was at a very nice restaurant, we were delivered safely to our hotel well within the time promised, would definitely use this service again.
Should have available transportation from Pursat to Phnom Penh as well.
The bus was 30 mn late. Called the number on booking ticket but no one answered. Had to google around to get the company number to find out what happen.

Despite  There were only 3 passengers the van left on time without waiting or picking up  No-ticket customers like other bus or van. The interior is quite old but it's ok for 3h30mn trip. Driver did a good job.

Would not travel on this bus again!!!!  Equipment was dirty and run down. We were told they would only wait 1 hr for us to clear customs which took 2.5 hrs in total and then they would leave without us. This turned into a nightmare trip.

The driver was about 10 mins late due to the heavy traffic. I had to call the number provided but I wished they had called me instead. Driver was very apologetic when he arrived. Taxi was clean and with good aircon.

Your "bus trip" consisted of:
One tuk tuk
One bus
Another bus 
Walking 1 km across the border 
A van
Another van 
#crazyshit
Driver well ahead on time at hotel and drive safely to destination
Diver stops to pick up his friends.   90 min late. Poor.
Great service
Seat is okay and the time of departure is accurate.  But no drink and snacks are provided. The restaurant dropped in at is not good and  expensive.

Displayed as arriving at 6:30 at Sihanoukville on the website which was in reality the departure time at Phnom Penh (we arrived at 12:00 and missed the ferry we booked). The space in the night bus is small especially with 180cm and more guys.
Very good service and easily adjusted departure time for us
Great ride. Everything was exactly as requested and planned!
A trip that was supossed to be 45 min took us 2 hrs, and they left us in another peer that the one we need.
1 hour late, driver was stopping to pick up friends and cargo.  Not impressed.
Arrived in Phnom Penh 06 hrs. later than schedule. The bus was hot, air conditioning not working properly. Staff was friendly.
Good trip. Friendly staff. We arrived safe and on time.
Driver is too crazy.  We scared

Old bus,no wifi/plug.1h delay due to technical issue.Extra $3 to help cross border (who is if for?),the guy almost left with my $17 change,had to make the bus stop to get them back.Driver (while drove well) stopped in random market instead of bus terminal

Passengers should've just waited in the bus after passing through the border and wait for their passports in the bus and not in the immigration office, that way it would be less chaotic in the office and it would be a calmer process.

We were told when we got there the departure time changed to 30 mins later - slightly annoying but fine. The AC was turned off at one point-locals on the bus complained - they turned it back on. We had 2 stops about 25mins each. Cheap but less than ideal.
Reliable service for the price. Seemed much better than the other bus services available in the city
A little bit expensive but the best travel since we are in asia.!!
The bus was two hours late. And smelled of sickeningly of gasoline
Easy to book online, and easy to check in to get on the busy. Nice staff on the bus, the hostess was friendly, polite and helpful with customers through our the trip.
Everything went well. He drove carefully. We had several stops. Wi-Fi worked well, so did the AC! Recommended!
Because CTT didn't pick me up. So I have to find other transportation to be back home.

On my return leg of my trip to Siem Reap I was very disappointed with the legroom available. As a tall man, I deliberately book a big bus because you supposedly offer more legroom. I was very uncomfortable and will travel with Giant ibis next time!
Only problem was,that there was no wifi as it should be

After reading reviews I was expecting the worst of my PP to BKK VIP van, but it was comfortable, we had plenty of stops to stretch our legs and grab some food. We arrived late but this is expected, delays at the border and Bangkok's notorious traffic...
The trip was ok. But I feel the seats are a little too small for VIP and no leg room .

I have been in Cambo 2.5 years, this was my best van/bus ride. Driver = very good & alert & cautious. The seats = comfy. If you have long legs, book the 1st row. Only issue, at 1 point we had 2+ ppl over limit. Driver not happy about it, agency made him.
Perfect, nice staff, we had our reserveted places in the bus. Thanks!
Confortable van and very nice driver. The ponctuality isn't a the top office rate but  i prefer a safe driver

I like your app a lot and plus 30% discounts when I used Pipay for payments. I'll consider to use your app for bus booking again and again when I need. I love when you make bus booking in Cambodia very easy for people.
very dangerous driver !
Good service. A bit scary as driver kept overtaking slow cars.

Champa Mekong is not good. I left Kep at 2:45pm while the ticket said at 2:30pm. It took us to Kampot to pick up others guests, so I waited more than 1h in Kampot and arrived PP at 8pm. Totally, if u suppose to have meeting or work on time, don’t take it.
Excellent service. Efficient, on time, very well organised
Good safe clean trip with wifi. Only leaving half hour too late

Instead of big bus with wifi a mini-van arrived. We had to sit at the end with so limited space that could not move at all. 7 hours in the middle of two people was unbearable. Bus also arrived 1 hour late. Refund would be nice. Very disappointing!!
Very good

The bus on this trip was very nice, WLAN was working, the driver drove safely. The only slightly annoying thing were several stops along the route to pick up or drop off locals... Overall absolutely recommended. :)
Comfortable ride to Kampot. Great A/C. Safe driver. I would use them again
Sadly we were not overly impressed. The buses are old and the air conditioning poor. The Inspector hardly communicated with the passengers.

The bus was old and the air conditioning very poor. On our way up to Siem Reap our bus broke down and we were very late arriving into Siem Reap. The replacement bus was much newer and more comfortable. Also, the lady "inspector"  was very good.
Friendly and very accommodating service, needed same day visa and they pulled it off quickly for me. Definitely recommend!
No water. No wifi. Not enough legroom.  Very small windows so it is hard to look outside.

I had a problem with rithya. Me and my friend booked the tickets online and arrived at the bus station 20 minutes before leaving. However, the bus never came and we had to take another bus. 
We were disappointed, please be careful with rithya.

I always use Virak Buntham when travelling to Siem Reap. They are a professional bus company, however, there were plenty of times that we would almost hit some cars/motorists. The VIP van is comfortable, I sleep most of the time.
On time, no pickup when travelling, safe driver, space for legs and safe for luggage too. Would definitely travel with Cambodia Post again !
Excellent service, as usual.
late start and very late arrival. driver constantly on this mobile

Un bus parti très en retard, des conseillères à l'agence exécrables et donnant de mauvaises informations. Le chauffeur a conduit dangereusement, l'état du van laissait à désirer. Je déconseille vraiment cette compagnie !!!
Punctual and comfortable. Safe driver
Très bien organiser , et très attentionné.Un vrai bonheur

BookMeBus is very good system, it’s really convenient to looking transportations for our traveling. Save time and easy to process payment. We used Pi Pay .
Larryta Van , it was old van, air conditioning so poor, Nero Space. Seat is not  comfortable.
Large, clean and comfortable seats, helpful driver, excellent driving, arrived ahead of time. There was nothing negative about the ride.
I enjoyed the ride from phnom Penh to kampot. The driver drove safe and it was great meeting new people on the van. The seats were ok but overall the trip went well. Thank you for your service!

We had a great experience, the bus was new and very comfortable. The only bad thing that I can think of is that they put movies the entire journey with very loud volume, and it’s kinda uncomfortable if you wanna sleep. Apart from that it was great !

록셔리 슬리핑버스를 타고 혼자서 두개의 자리를 차지하고 있었지만(2장을 예약했음) 나름 조용하고 시끄럽지도 않고 푹 잘자고 안전하게 도착했네요

혹시 캐리어 도난이 있을까 걱정했는데 도착해서 캐리어 받을때도 미리 나눠준 태그 확인하고 가져가게 하고, 위 아래 모두 에어컨 송풍구가 있어 좋았습니다

제가 178인데 발 쭉펴고 누울 수 있는 길이구요

A long drive, the bus was very old and slow
Everything was good, didn’t have any notable problem during the trip, but the van was a bit old.
3rd time I've used this service & they are great.  Will use them again, definately
Departure 8pm, it is a lie. We left at 8:00am and we arrived at Bangkok at 4pm. The company don’t take care their customers.
Good driver, safe trip and be on time.

1 hour late before the effective departure... We also got a flat tire on the way to Pnomh Penh.

When we arrived at the departure place in Kampot, the receptionist told us the van was 30 minutes late. Turns out it was over an hour late in the end. I wish she'd been honest. It seemed the driver took unnecessary risks on the road.

When we arrived at the departure place in Kampot, the receptionist told us the van was 30 minutes late. Turns out it was over an hour late in the end. I wish she'd been honest. It seemed the driver took unnecessary risks on the road.

I never use your online and mekong express.

very bad experience!!!

Bookmebus is real value for money servicel. What I like mpst is their prompt support in rescheduling my trip.
Air conditioner is bad.
Crossing the boarder to thailand was a huge mess, but this wasn't the fault of the bus company

I booked a bus at 1.15pm. It got cancelled because I was the only passaenger. They didnt manage to book me a seat with another bus company - apparently others were fully booked due to the holiday.
I departed more than 2 hours later. The drive was fast.
Drive fast

Tidak sampai pada tujuan. Padahal awalnya kami ditanya dimana akan turun, tapi pada kenyataannya, kami diturunkan ditempat yang tidak kami ketahui. Alhasil, kami harus menyewa taxi untuk menuju hotel.

BUS company 's staff who call follow up with me about the departure station is rude. Totally unacceptable the customer service. Suggest bus company displays the certain station, 
 if they have more than 1 stations.
Good VIP Van
Comfortable bus, on time, several stops, overall very good!

My vip van which was supposed to depart at 2.30pm was cancelled.The company changed my transport to VIP bus departs at 5.30pm.It was too late so they changed to a normal bus departing at 12.30pm to me without refunding the extra 2 dollars that i had paid

Driver will make one stop on between for restroom/snacks. 
Do expect later arrival (approximately 30-40mins). Not the driver's fault, but the road and traffic can be bad sometimes.
Be on time ( Boarding and arriving ), good driver

Good Service , I would recommence this trip to everyone .

Please enjoy your trip with Bookmebus.com
Careful and friendly driver. Inspector allowed us to enter a van that left one hour earlier than we booked.

Everything was fine except that our departure delayed for about an hour without any notification. The bus was okay, they gave us snack and lunch. Eventhough the bus crew can not speak english, I think they are quite friendly :)
Good trip, air con working, good driver and punctual
we chose this bus to have a direct route but we made a stop in Kampot! suddenly it took 2h more without any problems on the road. we wish a refund.

Completely enjoyed this journey. As always Cambodia Post VIP is my first choice travelling in Cambodia. The driver was professional and drove safely. The van was clean and well maintained. It’s a perfect start of my trip.
just dont risk your life with that bus.... everyone in that car have only one wish during that : they just wish to stay alive....
Driver was very friendly and drove his car safety with moderate speed. It took only 3 hours from Phnom Penh to Kampot and return as well.
It was disappointed that my driver was late for picking up for nealy 30 minutes.

We booked and paid for our tickets with Book Me Bus. When we arrived at Virak Buntham, they told us that the bus was already full. The only available bus was a sleeper bus. It was disgusting and the driver was terrible. It took 7 hours to get to PP.
Great!

K.S.O are poor of driver speaking bad. 
Departure delayed. Van is not comfortable (seat) & air con is not work well. Drive so much fast.

The bus from Siem Reap arrived promptly however having the back four seats meant no leg room and bags piled in aisle way. Air con did not reach the back. The driver spent most of the journey overtaking other vehicles, very quick journey but rather scary.

The bus from Siem Reap arrived promptly however having the back four seats meant no leg room and bags piled in aisle way. Air con did not reach the back. The driver spent most of the journey overtaking other vehicles, very quick journey but rather scary.

Driver talked over the phone leaving only 1 hand driving. He was impolite if talking. The can dropped at many places. He dropped along the road for men to pee while lady just waited in the van. Front glass of the van was fragile.

I had arranged 3pm for the pick up. I only get onto the car at 3.45. Besides, I had requested for driver who can under English for communication but I was given a driver who can't understa d English at all and we had a whole lot of communication breakdown
Uncomfortable seats, don't recline, weak AC, driver too fast and felt unsafe, but punctual (left 15 minutes after scheduled, arrived 30 minutes after scheduled). Bus not crowded.

I like using passapp and it is helpful for travelers. One thing I don't like is there are very few rickshaws in Kampot so it is very difficult for me to call for them. I suggest you to have more rickshaws there.
I don't like this company. seat management is poor. I booked seat 4 and 5 and I finally was asked to seat at the back. no idea with this.
Too much goods added along the way to phnom penh, It annoys that the post office 's heavy goods are going to destroy customer's baggage.
Car is a bit smelly. Driver is very smelly (arm pit smell).

In general all went well, a lack of communication skills with patrons. When we got to the Cambodian border to travel the balance 
of our journey to Thailand, we were told to go to another transport company. Not mentioned on the ticket. Thailand super!
Why not just add 30 min in the information? It's impossible to make it in 4hrs..
Great new mini-bus, aircon worked great, not overcrowded. Punctual, safe driver. Would take this bus again.
Nice bus but it broke down. It took an extra 3.5 hours to get to our destination. No credit was provided to make up for this.
Smell gasoline on the car whole trip, and the aircon seems not work!!!

The bus was late so that meant i arrived at my destination a little later then i would have wanted. It was a good trip however if i were to use this company again, it would be good if the bus could show up 30 minutes before travel time.
I would never book with this company again.

The driver is not friendly, he didn't told us even the bus is stopped for lunch. he just turn off the engine and walked away while the trip from PP to Kampot took more than 5 hours. It's unacceptable.

Booking on-line excellent. Impressed with service. Left on time and arrived on time, despite variable traffic conditions on a 300km journey. Safe driver with zero "exciting" moments. Comfortable seats with seat belts. Efficient aircon, no Karaoke.
The aircondition is not so cold.
Driver not professional
The WiFi is very slow.
The WiFi is very slow.
On internet you see the travel takes 4,5h. We drove more than 6h and the bus stopped too frequently to pick up people. Driver was good, he droves safely.

He was early so no problems with wondering if he would arrive. Very helpful and happy to stop and let me take photos along the way. His english was not great but he made up with his enthusiasm to be helpful anf make us happy. The trip went to fast.
Driver was ahead of time, courteous,  drove safely and even had water for us!
This time nice service and driver is good, I like Rhiannon time
This time nice service and driver is good, I like Rhiannon time

No bad. This is à local company (Khmer) doing the job at a cheap price. OK, the buses could be newer and cleaner, but the AC worked fine, the driver was good, and the inspector did a very good, super fast job at the border.

Pick up at hotel is punctual and departure is only 5 minutes after the schedule. Due to I am only one foreign passenger among 11, the driver did not explain in English at each milestone while traveling.
Everything went smoothly, two thumbs up ?????
Good travel.

Horror stories of being left behind, bus not showing up and 16 hour trips had me scared but all was fine. Bit dirty on bus, and they take $10 off you to do the visas which seems a bit much, but I was expecting worse. Took 9 hours instead of advertised 12.

[+] Staff was very helpful at the border, pretty good driver, well equipped bus, not too much delay on arrival. 
[-] Poor food and beverage, not very transparent policy regarding VISA (extra cost in order to have its visa made by a staff member)

We did online booking for a trip by vessel with Mekong Explorer to the Chau Doc. On the internet this company is the cheapest. Vessel has been broken, they took us half of way via land and Vietnam side via Mekong.Book another company at the port! Cheaper!
I think that’s why driver and all staffs are very stuck-up because they are using USA dollar as a currency.

We booked online, selecting seats and got an amendment from selected seats to other seats pretty swiftly. Which would have been fine except the seat was double booked. To fit us in, we were sat on backless pullout seats in the aisle which was unpleasant

The scheduled departure time is 1hr later than the time I booked, but there was no email or call so we were waiting in the depot for 90 minutes before we could board.  The bus had bad AC and no Wi-fi, and the seats we booked were filled with luggage.

I book by your website. When I arrive at Samang station at Pratunam I have to wait 30 mn more. 
He did like I am begging him for the car. 
I can not plan for my next drive cuz his late departure. All my plan were ruin by him.

The bus ride as well as the immigration process (both for exiting HCM and entering Cambodia) were very smooth. The driver went for the "safe speed" while the bus attendant attends to the passengers' needs as much as she can. Overall, it was great!

Our land travel to Bangkok went very smooth unlike what others have had experienced when I read their reviews. Although there was no lunch break provided (only 15min stop over to buy food) and the requested (& confirmed!) hotel pick up did not push thru.
I was not provided with the seat I had booked. Also, the bus reached an hour late

Driver on time, booking online was easy. Safety issue that driver clocked 80miles p/h a few times and we felt unsafe.
Reason for low rating is speed.

Driver on time, booking online was easy. Safety issue that driver clocked 80miles p/h a few times and we felt unsafe.

Good service!
Good service!
Good service!

I really had had a bad time on the journey, the driver was driving too fast,during the trafffic jam, he even drove in opposite lane and blocked the other direction traffic, even on the motor way at the rightest. everyone was scared to death, I swear!

Bon voyage. 
Avons toutefois changé de bus 2 fois, sans savoir pourquoi, donc un peu de perte de temps. Personne ne nous a rien expliqué
While on board the driver mostly talking phone. So, made me and other passangers feeling not safe
This is our third experience with Mekong Express and we’ve  had a good experience each time! Solid A/C, bus snack and water, one stop off point, met all expectations!
Small seats and too many stops on the way, 2 times 20 min plus 4 quick stops to pick up or drop off people. Good and safe driver
Safe option comparing to the big bus. Some of the vehicles are old but all have air conditioning and reasonable conditions

One of my best journeys ever in Cambodia. Professional and warm English-speaking staff, excellent driver, new and clean minivan, not too many stops on the way. We arrived safely and on time. Convenient pick up/drop off point in Phnom Penh near Wat Phnom.

The bus I took was quite new, but doesn’t look like it is maintained well enough. Inside was filthy, some of the seats have no seatbelts. But A/C is good enough and departure and arrival time are very on scheduled, well punctual.

Everything was fine.  It got us here and in very good time but staff was neither friendly or unfriendly. They did not communicate with us but that did not affect things too much.  Reviews were good but we found nothing special. Will try someone else.

The min bus arrived late - nearly 30 mins. Instead of the call centre number, if the driver’s number was shared with us it would be better for coordinating The vehicle interiors were not cleaned after the earlier trip. The driver’s driving was good
Very comfortable and very accomodating. Thanks to the the man and lady for making us feel we're home by the buses..
We were not told when making the booking that the gropbwas to Phom Pehn and then to Sihanoukvilke and we changed vehicles and driver at Phmom Pehn. This made a very long day.

Easy to book ticket online with local payment without extra charge. 
Mekong express bus, i am really appreciated to the staff on that bus i took, for keeping my phone that i forgot at my seat.
i love the trip. left ontime. wifi is good. was able to watched netflix and really loved the whole experience. very free and easy. highly recommended to other travelers
Very good driver. Van in good condition.

No bus from CTT. Lower standard. Wrong drop off point. Driver wanted us to take tuk tuk to final destination. Not on time. No WiFi. Bad bus. Not recommended. Very bad experience. Too expensive. 9$ rip off. Not reliable service.

On the Van from Phnom Penh to HCM Is OK . Wi-Fi Hotpot little weak and slow.
The one the way back to Phnom Penh from m HCM is bad... the van is look very dirty from outside, interior is terrible for it call VIP, I could not got sit-belt, it been removed.

They offer free pick up, which is well arranged and reliable. Seats are okay and you get free water. The journey between battambang and siem reap only takes more like 3½ to 4 hours than the planned 3hours.
No water, no wifi, depart 9:10 arrival 13:15. So 1:30 later.... firt time, last time with your company
The ferry arrived 30 minutes later. I went to the office near the pier and the guy was sleeping. Totally not recomendable.
Driving was safe and reliable even during heavy rain. Good VIP Van with great driver.

Drove reasonably. No wifi or power on bus. Very attentive and helpful staff. Asian music was playing throughout the journey, but not overly loud. Would do again, but will opt for a company that has wifi.
Great van. Clean, with wifi and very comfortable.
Definitely not as bad as some people would like you to believe, the ride does take longer then said but would take this again!

The seat I booked (window seat) was given to a local and I was told I never booked a seat. When I showed them my seat number they didn't care. Tourist are ALWAYS ripped off and it's disgusting. Will NOT be using your company again.
WiFi very good, due to availability of seats the ride was very comfortable.
WiFi very good, due to availability of seats the ride was very comfortable.
Superb
The staff provides the better service than other companies, welcoming, driving, and caring to customers; but just a small comment the space to sleep is little small.

45min wait at pickup place before and overloaded tuktuk arrived after we called delivering us to the company office where we waited another 40 for the minibus. Driving was pretty scary, arrived about 1.5 hours late. Wouldn't use again
Nice mini van , punctuated time table but driver is not good enough, he was drives very fast , feel not confortable . All passengers wasn’t feel good
Overall happy with this trip! Good driver, staff and arrived on time. However, there were a ton of ants on the bus - I got quite a few bites during the trip.
Overall happy with this trip! Good driver, staff and arrived on time. However, there were a ton of ants on the bus - I got quite a few bites during the trip.
Aircon not cold, the car abit old, the place they break for the food, the food not nice to eat.
Nice service and great driver.
Really happy with Mekong Express. Clean, comfortable, polite, and connected me to my hostel afterwards :)

Overall a pleasant trip. It took longer than the VIP van, but was expected due to the size of the bus & number of passengers. The border-crossing process was smooth and well taken care of by the bus staff.
all over best.

It was quite dirty on the inside, didn’t arrive on time and quite an uncomfortable drive, as it felt quite dangerous.

Good experience all around - can certainly recommend.
Good except Air-Con which is very hot at the back.
Not smooth driving, my little sister got 8times vomit by this drive. Moreover driver taked customer along the way for money pocket.

Good company, nice and comfortable seats, the driver spoke English which made it easier to communicate. the only thing is that two hours before the end, the driver added an extra person to the car, which made me share my sit with her.

We had issues getting our visa issued and they happily changed our departure time twice to accommodate. We would definitely use them again!

Mostly no qualms with my trip from PP to Siem Reap. Clean, well conditioned, blankets and pillows laundered and standard space. Only thing was it felt like the bus driver would occasionally drift to the other side, as noticed by the many toots

We booked seats though the app. Paid. Got the seats assigned 3A, 3B on the night before the van VIP depart on next day May 27th.

Driver drive too fast and take too many risks overtaking trucks, also raining as well make it more dangerous. Very uncomfortable trip sorry to say.
Good service

It was a super nice trip, the driver was excellent, never took a risk, was kind and funny. The seats were comfortable, plenty of room for the legs, I will be back and will highly recommend to my friends. See you soon!

All a bit haphazard getting on the ferry - leap of faith to get on ferry from jetty (couple of feet above and no adequate plank).
No advice of what jetty we were pulling into. I think the nbr of bags we had caused 1 staff to tell us Saracen Bay. Trip OK

All a bit haphazard getting on the ferry - leap of faith to get on ferry from jetty (couple of feet above and no adequate plank).
No advice of what jetty we were pulling into. I think the nbr of bags we had caused 1 staff to tell us Saracen Bay. Trip OK

I saw my life flash by during 4 hours. The driver tried to overtake each car, sticking to it in order that the car in front accelerates. The driver overtook more than 50 cars, sometimes 6 in a row, driving on the other side of the road. A true nightmare.
Very punctual, efficient and safe trip overall. Scheduled trip is 11:00-17:00. Left Siem Reap post office 10:50 and reached Phnom Penh post office 15:30.

About a 10-minute delay departing Phnom Penh; the stop was longer than 25 minutes (as announced).  The pick-up van from the hotel was very old and too small for the number of people.  Everything else was good.
Driver came 20 minutes early. Polite. Spoke good English. 4 hours to Siem Riep. Recommended.
It was freezing in the bus, horrible, I could not sleep at all.
Very good service, would recommend
Very good service, would recommend
The driver was driving very fast and was calling and texting at the same time .... It made me feel really unsafe.
Left right on time. Bus was clean, comfortable and very safe driver. Will use again.

Bus left on time, driver drove fairly safely - there's a lot of overtaking on this road so it's best not to look. He did spend a bit of time on his phone while driving which wasn't good. We left at 1:30 and arrived at 7pm.
The van was really nice, we stopped quite a few times but traffic was light and still arrived an hour early. The driver was fairly friendly. Very comfortable service, wifi worked well.

Most comfortable bus I've used anywhere in the world - seats were more like armchairs. Lots of leg room too which is important when  you are tall! Road is a bit bumpy but can't be helped of course, I enjoyed listening to music and watching outside.

Very slow internet, bus arrived late, poor leg space, seat locations were incorrect our seats were changed
Smooth border crossing, Clean bus !!!

I booked 2pm Departure by big BUS but when I was clicking it was for a VIP bus, when I arrived on Mekong Express station everyone is confused, they think I am for VIP Van departure for 3:30pm. Bad communication between companies.
Fast and convenient, just multiple random stops cuz it's a post delivery related thing.

I highly recommend this company. I booked the front seat, which was awesome cause I got to see everything, although I must admit I slept most of the way. The stop for food was really good, the driver and other passengers really friendly, the AC very cool.

Felt very safe the entire trip. The roads were very good, the van clean, a little cramped in the leg room (lm six foot) but had two stops to have a walk about. Would recommend this as a transport option, the countryside views were excellent.
It was a pleasant  jorney. Thank you.
It was raining and the driver was really good
2nd trip using this service and was just as good as the first.
We enjoyed our trip. The bus was clean and the driver was friendly. We appreciate that we were given water, WiFi, and it had charger adopter on the bus. Thank you!

We left and arrived a little late, but nothing too bad. Ok driver. The worst part of the journey were the seats, very uncomfortable even for someone who frequently travels on minivans. Air con was not working very well and it got quite hot at 11 am
Some more communication regarding border crossing would be helpful, very uncertain process with passports not in our possession.

Good - Leg space, Inspector
Can be improved - Internet speed, food and water quality

Van booked  for 5pm. Xed and put with 3 pm van in a small car. Not informed about change and lucky to be early. Driver excellent. arrival in PP inspector smashed front door on my fingers. Only laughing! Asking responsability went, n said i do not know you

Worst bus I have ever had in Cambodia. 8am bus was cancelled at 8:10am. 10:30am bus left at 11:20am because of late 2 guests. From what I could tell, we were actually waiting for a bag that was being transported to PP. DO NOT TAKE.
Driver drove too fast and very dangerous way, no obey the traffic rule. Seat was big but no seat belt
Perfect trip. Thank you

처음 슬리핑버스이용했는데 충격
폭은 싱글침대 길이는 1.60쯔음 되는곳에서 2명이서 써야하는데 180인 나로써는 매우좁음. 만약 쾌적하게 오실꺼면 2자리 예약필수
당신이 여자라면 노상방뇨해야 할 각오까지 해야함.
