Driver has got it under control, goes fast but knows what he’s doing.
is very good .
Very comfortable minivan. The driver was driving a little too fast. We left and arrived on time. Overall a good journey.
Overall the trip was satisfactory. The only thing that bothered me was the delay. The bus was supposed to depart at 7 o'clock  in the morning, unfortunately it arrived in the pick-up point at 8. am.
It was okay overall. Though it was a bit cramped as it id a minivan.

The driver had several close calls with passing in dangerous manner a few times and also nearly running into the back of a couple of vehicles that needed to slow down due to congestion a couple of times.  I guess this is supposed to be normal here?

The inspector was very helpful to us tourists. Although not fluent, he spoke English to communicate to all of us. He also guided us well while crossing the border. I just hope next time there would be an orientation to passengers.
Awesome trip
Driver was rude/not very friendly, didnt prepare us on whats happening , we didnt have a longer break to eat something - only one break when we asked for a toilet - maybe he had a bad day
Good customer service. The boat is punctual from Sihanoukville to Koh Rong Samleon, but too many stops on the return trip. stopped at too many islands.
The driver didn't be preocuped by the wellness of the passengers. We had to ask him to make a stop because he only stop the travel for his own confort

Journey was not bad, but absolutely not VIP VAN like was written on reservation website. Driver cannot speak english and drove very fast so we cannot sleep, there was no wifi, no water and we picked up many Cambodian or some boxes during our way.
Tire lost pressure during drive, another burst completely. Did not have equipment to fix. Long snack break. Arrived several hours late. No wifi.
With free snacks and drinks. Comfortable travel
Best bus ride I've ever been on. Not over crowded so there was plenty of space to sleep, AC and Wi-Fi worked perfectly, comfy seats, and the driver was helpful when crossing the border.
Best bus ride I've ever been on. Not over crowded so there was plenty of space to sleep, AC and Wi-Fi worked perfectly, comfy seats, and the driver was helpful when crossing the border.

Unfortunately we were over an hour late. We also were not told that we would get dropped off at the hotel and so we booked a tuk tuk for $6 which was annoying.

Thanks,
Sam
There were only 4 of us and we got to SR early from PP. bus driver drove safely and we got to SR an hour early. Highly recommend :)
Great service, arrived early, very safe, slow driver. Highly recommended :)
It is very comfortable night bus - I like it

Ok for price. No wifi or ability to charge phone on board. Guide got through visa process on Viet/Cam border but was pretty rude to passengers who had already got e visas in advance. Having said that $23 for a 5.5 hour bus trip is pretty good value.
Good service. Bus left on time and arrived on time.
The ferry left Koh Rong Samloen 1 hour late. The people at the pier didn't inform about the delay. It's just normal. Most of the time the trip is much longer than 1 hour.
Great service.  Reliable and honest. They were on time and arrived in Siem Reap safely.
Good trip.
Good service. Friendly staff, comfortable seats. An hour late arriving into Kratie.
Got to my destination in a timely manner. We took the routine pit stops.

ホテルバスを予約し、前半はよく眠れてなかなか快適でしたが明け方いきなりプノンペンでたたき起こされ「チェンジバス」と言われ(もちろん事前になにも聞いてない)全員降ろされ、一時間弱は道端で待たされようやくきたバスはかなりボロくて小さなバスでした。ホテルバスでシアヌークビルまで寝ていけると思ったのにビックリ。時間については出発も到着も一時間かそれ以上は遅れていました。カンボジアなんてそんなものなのでしょうがバスはもう信用できないので二度と利用しないと思います。普通に飛行機にすりゃ良かった。判断ミスでした。

Bus nya lumayan nyaman lah. Dikasih snack & air mineral juga. Untuk pelayanan paspor di imigrasi juga diurus oleh kondektur bus. Tapi pelayanan paspor hanya di perbatasan Kamboja saja, begitu masuk di perbatasan Vietnam penumpang harus keluar bus.
I had booked 2ticket by PIPAY .and I ready show the ticket # with seat # by phone to him but he refuse than force me to take a note from the reception .
the bus is good by so far. delay 30mins but everything is okay. Good bus

The bus was correct, but, the driver arrived 1 hour late. ON the road he stopped like every 10 min to take some random guys. Result : we did a 5 hours trip instead of 3. 
It's okay to have a old bus or whatever, but punctuality should be a priority.
Bad air condition, the  chofer drives a liitle too fast
No loud music please.
bus picks up and drops off people along the way. it would be better if bus drives straight so it would arrive early
The driver drove very fast, constantly overtaking other cars in a dangerous way. The van was old compared to the ones from other companies that do the same service.
Overall, it was a great journey. The only thing was, the driver didn’t stop anywhere on the way
Punctual, helpful, service with a smile. Good driving and punctual. I recommand.
The bus was about 2 hours late from its schedule arrival time.

Easy to find the departure point... Straight forward trip!! The traffic out of Phnom Penh can be quite heavy in the early morning, so we were a little bit behind because of this, but no-ones fault!
WiFi available on the bus!!

me n a Jap guy got a bad exp. V book VIP at 0630 but they change 2 bus 0700 w/o priority inform. They only inform when v call 2 ask them, VN site say VIP van have problem but CAM site say VIP van already gone. VIP=$14, Bus=$11, I 1 2 write more but limit
Aircondition is very low. Not cold

Driver was nice, but cannot speak english.We don´t know when and for how long is stop for break. Drive fast but many stops pick up people or some boxes. We arrive 15minutes late. In Sen Monorom the lady who check tickets no english and very unfriendly.

There was snack, water,but no wifi, they say that is broken.Very cold in bus for whole journey.Stevard took our passport at the beginning of way without explanation and on boarder it was also very chaotic and uncomfortable. We ARRIVED TWO HOURS LATE!

The instructor is a genius, very helpful. Also, the woman in front of Ourissey Market is amazing. Very professional and helpful. I have booked the way back with the same company! Thanks for everything, I love your Khmer kindness.
Good company. Very customer oriented.

This Bus is not made for people about 175cm heights... and also not V.I.P.! especially the seat next to the driver is only for very small people and also very uncomfortable. I think this seat should not be sold as a standardseat!

When I got there, I was told that there was no bus. However, they went out of their way to arrange a bus for which I'm very grateful! 30mins before arrival we ran out of fuel and I waited for 1h in the dark alone until the driver returned with a new van.
Everything was fine, except the late arrival (about 45 min later than the schedule.)
Everything was fine!
Arrived an hour early, comfortable journey

the transport was late by half an hour- the lady at the station was pleasant but couldn't give us an accurate estimation of its arrival(via google translate). The vehicle was nice and the ride your typical cambodian ride
6 hours trip with 3 short stops and 1 longer stop. So de, my longest trip with Mekong Express. Group of Chinese with wrong booking occupied the bus. My reserved seat was not available.
Just have a misunderstanding on the pickup venue, but the overall is EXCELLENT.
The AC was not workin and we were like in a sauna room for 12 hours. Although I really appreciate the bus helper guy he was so apologetic and sincerely tried to help everyone.
Overall good except that it's Post's Car therefore, many stops when reaching any provinces.
Good timely bus ride. Would use again. Nothing to complain about
A smooth journey with a careful driver.  Quite a lot of unscheduled toilet stops but better than wet seats.

the driver talked on phone all the times, one hand drive with other hand on phone.
Drive very fast and unstable, there was half of the passagers in the car was car sick.

Company should used the recorded camera to review the driving quality
Good

Everybody said that you shoudn't drive with Virak Buntham and I made the mistake and didn't listen so I'm jus telling you that you shouldn't do it. The Bus was 100 minutes late in Senmonorom and 160 minutes overall. Beds are 105x170 and for 2. No Toilet

The bus stop at Poipet where there is nothing and no indication. I should take a tuktuk to the border where there is no one who can help me. I waited 4hours there before crossing it and go to Thailand thanks to a customer from another company.
Really bad

We took the van from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap on 14 June 2018. The ride was smooth and fuss-free, and the driver very polite. We stopped for 20 minutes at a very clean rest stop mid-way through the journey, and arrived at Siem Reap ahead of schedule.

Driving too fast in the rain, dropping and picking people up along the route, nearly had an accident because of bad driving...

I won't use you again..

The curtain is very dirty no washing or cleaning, the seat is not comfortable enough( almost all participants complained about the space, អ្នកបើកបរវ៉ានៅផ្លូវកោង និង នៅពេលមានឡានច្រើននៅខាងមុខ, the waiting station in Siemreab is unclean and smell bad,

Nothing much to say about the cleanliness or comfort of the bus. Its comfortable enough for me. However, 6 hours of travel time duration is too optimistic. In reality, it took us 8 hours to reach Ho chi minh from Phnom penh.
Mekong Bus to much old.
Mekong Bus to much old.
We left ten minutes but it was due to waiting for late passengers. Arrived basically on time, and the boarder crossing was so easy. Would definitely recommend
The driver was driving like hell. We were very close to have an accident. Being in a front seat, that was really scary. Yet we arrived in Kampot an hour late on schedule...
The service was good but what makes our trip delayed was on the Boarder of Mocbai. We waited for almost 45 minutes just for our passport be stamped to legalize our entry in Vietnam.
Would recommend and use again — bus left promptly on time, driving was tolerable, van was comfortable, and purchasing online was easy as could be.

The bus was supposed to leave at 3:15pm. We arrived at the pick up point at 2:51pm and waited and finally we found a number and called and we were told the bus was on its way; only to hear later that the bus supposedly waited for us for 20 minutes & left

The journey was very uncomfortable. The seats and space beetween was very narrow but above all lacking air conditioning in these weather conditions is highly unacceptable. Woman who was looking after us, doing all passport papework work was fantastic
Yes good, I already take 4 and 5 time
Yes good, I already take 4 and 5 time
What I like about Mey Hong for this trip is their punctuality and friendly driver. They take care of my luggage well but window seat is a little bit narrow.

Well ... hotel bus experience from my recent trip, the driver drove passengers for only 4 hours from Phnom Penh to siem reap while the original arrival length is 6 hours stated in the booking table. OMG ! Please check on this ... however, good bed size !
Our driver was about to fall asleep the entire ride. We felt very unsafe going from Kampot to Phenom Penh
Most of my feedback is directed at bookmebus.- travel times provides are unrealistic, no bus drives to Sihanouk Ville in 4.5 hours. Please update that this to a realistic 5.5 hours. Thanks
I like the way that provide passenger full access to check and book the ticket and paying online. Save more times and very very comfortable.
Will not try your service anymore
Uncomfortable trip. Will never used this service again!
Poor service, old van, uncomfortable trip
Will never recommend this service to anyone! Poor bus condition! Worst customer servixe! Uncomfortable journey!
The trip is amazing with the beautiful landscape along the way that making us think like we're on the  sea-forest while the driver is friendly and their comfortable seat.
The Van is clean and new. We leaved on time and arrived as scheduled. The driver is good, but he talking the phone few time while driving. Totally, the trip to SR is nice by EMS.

I think this is the best transportation company in Cambodia. I recommended this one if you will transport in Cambodia. It's late for for 15 - 30 mins but I can understand about it. The others company will be late around 2 - 3 or more than we can expect.

First way was perfect. Good driver(senior one)and car clean. The way back was bad, the driver was younger and he doesn't listen for recommendation of the clients (driving too fast for a family) and the car was not so well cleaned.

Very clean modern mini bus. Aircon and wifi. Excellent safe driver. Arrived early both ways.
Will definitely use again...excellent!!

Very clean modern mini bus. Aircon and wifi. Excellent safe driver. Arrived early both ways.
Will definitely use again...excellent!!
All services are good.
Great service from ticketing to baggage handling. Very professional. Always use this company when in Cambodia.
The bus need to fix air-con there was water leaked dropping on my head during the trip

The booking process was easy and the support service of bookmebus replied very quick, friendly and supportive, great!
The trip itself was okay, beds very comfy. The driver forgot to fuel up, so we had to wait on a highway for 2h for new fuel :D

You should make your app optimized with the newest iPhone like iPhone X. Then, you should add descriptions to each payment method like wing. I didn’t wanna pay by Visa card due to additional service charge. I tried to pay by wing but instruction difficult

HCM-PP leg is not a sleeper bus more of a standard commuter bus. PP-SM leg was a pseudo-sleeper bus for the fact that the seat slightly reclines more than the previous. AC isnt so well on PP-SM bus. There’s a drunk personel in PP-SM bus. On-time trip.
Good Service
Yes great, good driver
Best bus service ever.

The bus was supposed to be leaving at 745 but delayed.The seat was torn, no curtain.The bus broke down 2 tinesduring the night ,broke down completely in the morning but noone helped to find alternative options.we have to pay more to get another transport
I was very happy with this company. The driving was much safer than other bus companies I've travelled with.
good
Very comfortable seats, punctual departure and arrival, good value for the money
The driver was efficient and got us to the destination on time with few stops. Fortunately, we stopped to have dinner at a restaurant so I didn't have to find food at the destination.
Car arrived in time, driver friendly and speaking basic English. Car very much ok, small problem with one tyre, quickly solved. Overal a good experience!
No service, difficult to find some staff member who speaks some English. Pick up pen drop off location were not correct. The Bus broke down and still we were 1 hour before schedule.
i would like to depart beside the bus station, Mekong express let me contact bookmebus directly, but the contact number on e-ticket can not reach at all.
The driver made a lot of stops and he drove like crazy to get to the scheduled time.

Battambang/Siem Reap.
Compared to the previous experience the driver has driven very well, attentively and seriously! He made a stop at a bar where among other things they made a very good coffee.

Excellent service, left on time after short English explanation about stops.
Driver quick, but safe, sat in middle I could see the road ahead, overtaking was planned and done with care.
Seat were comfortable, van was clean arrived early. Would recommed

My driver was excellent, nice vehicle and no problems finding my destination.
Great, affordable way to get from Phnom Penh to Battambang
Fair good. Disappoint left late and journey took 6 hours instead of 4 as we were told.
Best service I’ve used.
Good service. Clean van. Great wifi.
Bus très propre et bien équipée (avec prises). Le seul point négative est la sécurité pour les bagages.

We left late and stopped to change a tire. Very helpful at crossing the border.

The bus is old and in very bad condition, wifi not working, seat very rundown,

no complaints    average to good service  would use again   you get what you pay for

The VIP van was cramped up and there was no wifi neither snacks provided. The description and the service we got was totally different. Would not recommend to others.
Bus. 45 min.
Mekong express needs improvement with the bus but the crew are very helpful

custom officers USD 2 ( 1 each for Cambodia & Vietnam ) to avoid delay
so I pay him to settle all problems. Is this the way? 
we normally join bus from Bavet no food given?
Satisifed with the whole service provided: on time pick up as agreed in advance, courteous driver, comfortable car. Recommended!

The bus was on time.....the fast track through the border clearly was paid for.through our.bought tickets. The minus was the actual bus itself as.it.looked.pretty tired and old...no WiFi and seats were.narrow so it was pretty cramped !

Was booked on a different bus by the company without telling me beforehand as they had cancelled their own bus. Went from front seat for myself to middle of the back row with an absolute terrible driver. No refund or even apology given.
Very good service! And very helpful information on how to cross the border without being scammed. Keep up the good work!

Bus REALLY old. One star off for exposed metal & wires & cracked/taped windows. But bus worked, aircon included! $5 for PP->SR, left and arrived on time and at the right place. Does exactly what it says on the tin. Better food and seats than flying!
Perfectly fine bus - It was late, but it seems all busses are
Bus was suppose to leave by 2pm but drag till 3pm...

Booked SR-SHV overnight sleeper bus with transfer in PP, was placed on coach with big seats, not beds, for first leg, on minibus for second leg. First leg aircon turned up to freezing, driver wouldn't change, couldn't sleep. Not as promised!

I booked and paid for 2 seats/beds. 7A and 8A. When I got the the bus station, seat/bed 7A was allocated to someone else (ie double booked). Luckily the person I was to travel with could not travel. If both of us had to travel, there would problems
Good service except no wifi

Overall experience was awful. The bus was overpacked with belongings which made the journey terrible. The driver stopped at so many points to deliver parcels to local people we arrived late. There should be less people on the bus and less bags as no space

I always use Mekong Express VIP van, our drive was very friendly and professional,
For Cambodia arrival/ departure cards, visa application, suggest give to passengers inside the bus, they can fill themselves to save time, faster to cross Cambodia border

More than expected. Spacey and punctual.
Definitely recomend my friends Mey Hong Bus.

Pick-up at the hotel was rejected even though it is in the zone. Bookmebus never help me by repeatedly saying bus company didn't accept due to out of pick-up zone.

Our driver arrived at least 30 minutes and was a considerate and safe driver. We arrived at our destination within the time frame. Easy to book online and cheaper to book direct than through a resort. Would definitely recommend and would use again.
It was a smooth journey. I enjoyed the whole trip. Wifo was working good too. Can provide light snacks of you want to beat other competitors. Good job overall..

Definitely a good service, van is smaller than the other VIP vans, but has more luggage space. Great trip, couple of stops for post & meal & still arrived ahead of schedule. Our driver was fantastic, would travel with Cambodia Post again. 2 ratings NA
No air con, very hot

Excellent driver.  He didn’t overtake vehicle unnecessarily. The mini-van wasn’t full so we all were able to spread out. There were two restroom breaks. No complaints at all and I would travel with Cambo Post again.

The two criticisms I have are as follows:-
1. Not enough time was allowed at the rest stop to finish my meal I had to leave over half of it!
2. The tour (van) bus was fine except for the seats. The contours were the worst I have ever experienced.

It was a very nice trip with mekong express to Ho chi minh. The staff is friendly and helpfull. They have clean toilets and free WIFI at the office. You will get snacks and mineral water on the bus. There's WIFI on the bus. The prices are also cheap.

Overall a nice way to get around, just the back seats don't offer much space especially with some of the luggage under the feet. We had one free seat next to us so it was more comfortable though and since I'm a short European it was okay. Thank you Bayon

The bus is clean and spacious. The driver and staff are friendly, they give a clear instructions to walk to both immigration. This is a direct bus from Bangkok to Phnom Penh, you don't need to worry about changing bus.

We booket a VIP bus rid from Saigon to Phnom Penh, but it was far from anything on their website. It was very little space, no wifi and at the boarder it was quite chaotic. Papers and passports was given back to wrong peoples.
Very efficient and while quite fast, felt safe

It took us closer to 6 1/2 hours rather than the advertised 4 1/2, which meant that we missed the boat we had booked in Sihanoukville. While this was frustrating, I have to commend our driver, who drove very safely in treacherous wet conditions!

No words, I was thrown out from Heaven to Hell. Bus was changed to small VAN with no leg space to stretch now any available space to put passengers' belongs.
Their ad should be changed by adding " Bus type may be changed to mini-BUS without notice "

There's a wifi but no internet connection in the van. Other than that, don't have issue. 

Philippines ??

My driver was watching videos on his phone while driving at high speeds. I felt very unsafe. Usually I have been happy with the safety of Bookmebus drivers, but not this time. Please educate your drivers on safety issues.

The trip was very good except one thing, they forgot to leave me at Pursat Stop and left me 3km far on the street, but luckyly I had a friend who picked me up after 20 mins to bring me in the Hotel! The Bus was with very good temperature and comfortable!

The bus left on time, travel time 5.5.hours including 0.5 hours for stops. Good air conditioning, working wifi after some attention by the driver. Driving was about as safe as it could be in Cambodian traffic conditions. I would use the service again.
The Van suppose to go to Kep direct. However the went to Kampot and wasted at least another 45mins. We should be informed earlier.

Bus was comfortable and there was enough bathroom brakes on out trip. At our destination we had to change to bus to another one and the bus driver took us to our hotel. Service was only 4$, but the driver did not tell this before and we did not like this.

The Post Office Bus was an enjoyable trip by land from Sien Reip to Phnom Penh. The trip took 5hrs with 3 rest breaks. The bus was air conditioned and we pre-booked our seats #1& #2, which were in the front of the Bus with the driver, so good views.

សូមអរគុណចំពោះការផ្តល់សេវាកម្មដល់គោលដៅដោយសុវត្ថិភាព។ប៉ុន្តែស្របពេលមកដល់ដោយសុវត្ថិភាព ការបើករបស់ក្រុមហ៊ុនអ្នកគឺអន់ ដោយសារតៃកុងឡានបើកឡានមិនយល់ពីស្ថានភាពផ្លូវ ឡើងទួលបើកលឿន គំលាតសុវត្ថិភាពកិតឡានខាងមុខ ចាប់ហ្រ្វាំងភ្ញុចៗ បើកឡានជាងតាក់ស៊ី ផ្តាច់ព្រលឹងទៀត។សូមកែរ

All was great.
Comfortable seat. 
Clean bus. 
Very helpful staff. 
One negative is the air conditioning wasn't cold enough. 
It was so hot on the bus.

Overall, the travel was very good even though we arrived late into Siem Reap from Battambang.  Picking up travelers from their hotels and road construction were the reasons for the late arrival.  The driver drove safely, which is a rarity in Cambodia.

Left on time. Courteous service, one bathroom / snack stop. Not luxurious, but comfortable. Would be difficult with a lot of luggage. Driver dropped us off at the airport. Faster than the train. They provided a small bottle of water. I'd do this again.

Nice journey except bus was oldish and toilet didn’t work properly. Border crossing went smoothly and we arrived earlier than scheduled. Bus company offered free tuk tuk to hotel, but a driver was a worst kind of scammer.
The bus was late for more than one hour.
Since the driver stopped at Khemera Hotel in BTB, I got off there and walked since I live 3 blocks from there. Great service and very nice bus!
bus is old, and need some cleaning more better.
This was an excellent service, except for a long delay at the visa due to one passenger's evisa not being checked properly prior to departure.

Never using them again.The website leads you to believe they are a bus company but in fact, you don’t travel with their vehicles. 0.5 hours late leaving, 2 hours late arriving. em samang employee put me on a public bus, charged $13 when it costed them $3
Hero was a great driver that I would hire again. He was incredibly professional and courteous.

i asked nicely three times if he could move to one of the seats at the back for extra leg room as he is 6 foot 5. The driver said no that they were booked however, the driver slept on it himself. Also the aircon was FREEZING and on all night.

Right on schedule in Siem Reap and in Bangkok. The driver told us everything to cross the border properly. No problem. We had a small bottle of water and did several stops on the road. Very good service this price. I recommend.

Very nice bus service. We had no problems at all. Arrived in time in Siem Reap
We were pleased that tuk tuk drivers were there to bring us to our hotels for free
Watch out for excessive prices for excursions with them afterwards. They weren't fair to us
Alomst enviroment is good to me. But the bus was very old type. Anyway if I go to theire again. I'll use same company^^
Good service. Safe driving with no risk-taking. Clean van.

The driver's wife talked loudly on her phone the entire time.  Her phone volume was turned up and it would ring every few minutes with one loud conversation after another. No respect given to passengers.  Unscheduled stops.to pick up & drop off locals.
Very clean, fast and comfortable! I didn’t expect it to be that good. The staff was helping and providing best service. Recommended!

My drive from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville was fine except that the driver suddenly left me at a service station instead of the allocated drop off point and I didn't know what was going on. I was however very upset with my trip back to Phnom Penh from Siha

The driver put some other passenger's bag of frozen fish on top of my bag, so my clothes and bag stink like fish and are totally wet. I have just paid $11 to have my clothes cleaned and soaked my bag in soapy water for hours, but the smell won't go away!

They didnt come to pick up people at the bus station..almost half an hour later we asked at a counter that was around and they had to pay a tuktuk that drove like 40 minutes to where the van was waiting.....terrible driver
Hazzle-free travel from HCM to PP.
Our bus left and arrived exactly on time. Comfortable enough, a little cramped but overall a good trip!
I told them I stop at Kampong chhnang, but he forgot and take ne to Pursat. If I dun ask maybe he bring me to Poipet already. I have to take another car to back to Kampong chhnang.

Very dirty buses. The driver dropped in between for 1.5 h to fix something on the bus, which wasn’t urgent. For him doesn’t matter that all the guest had to wait for him.
In the future I will use only the Van-Service
We got stuck in traffic and late 10 minutes, our life local driver requested to wait and they did.  Awesome driver.
Too cold inside (a/c to check). It was difficult to communicate with the driver who did not speak english. Good experience overall
cũng được. tuy nhiên xe hơi cũ

Wrong location given to meet the bus so we sat idle on the street with no explanation.Took off 25 minutes late with no explanation. Rude driver who refused to turn the air conditioning down just a little. Unsafe driving as he was on phone half the time.

Very useful and efficient service. Read lots of negative reviews beforehand, but my experience was only positive. Air conditioning was effective, plenty of leg room and three toilet breaks including one where we bought a cheap and fast lunch.
The drive from Phnom Penh to Kampot went well and the driver was very nice, but the driver took many stops which delayed our arrival in Kampot.
One great service! Best county VIP can =)
Their management didn't inform staff about our booking, so they double booked our seat. For that reason, we were crammed into the back seat. Otherwise the trip was fine.

Arrived safely and on time. Van was okay, but legroom is limited if you are bigger than Asian average. Driver and staff at post office were very reserved and uncommunicative. The driver drove pretty fast but proactive.
Все было очень хорошо
Fast and efficient
The tired and old bus broke down and we were left waiting on the roadside for over an hour for the next bus.
Ok went on time and arrived about went expected. My bum bloody sore by the time we arrive

There are no snacks given. The driver/bus staff did not inform me that they will stop in Phnom Penh and a bus transfer is needed. I am clueless that the bus will not go to Ho Chi Minh anymore. There is no proper instruction given on what to do next.

Snacks were given including the bus transfer. The bus staff properly instructed us what to do for the transfer. They informed us the stops, what time we will be arriving in Phnom Penh and Ho Chi Minh. I am more than happy with their service.

The driver talked on phone for long time with the fun words while he was trying to move faster. He has no headset while talking. It was so risky for me. The Bookmebus.com is good to me in overall , just driver made me scary with his careless driving.

Got us there quickly. Culturally different driving, however, the driver proceeded with caution and was efficient. Roads were safe, did not speed out of control. Only worries were when other drivers passing in the other lanes weren't being cautious.
Guy behind me burped for the whole trip. Could not sleep since the bus driver honked every 20 seconds.

It took us a long time to arrive in Phnom Penh. Communication is definitely a working point: we didn't know the time of arrival, that there was a lunch stop or what happened at the border control. This could be far more better! Good price though.

A pleasant journey with wi-fi and air con. We were dropped about 2.5-3 miles away from the port area in sianoukville. One of the drivers did try to tell us it would be 15 dollars by tuk tuk into town but he could take us for 10 dollars, we declined.

I would rate it a star less for the bus not being on time, and making a lot of stops on the way to pick up and drop passengers. Also no wifi on the bus but mentioned otherwise on the website. The staff was extremely polite.

Driver was below par - a very bumpy ride. 
The hostess on the ride was poor, and incredibly rude. She demanddd for me to sit in another seat, despite already reserving seats. I felt that the poor treatment was as I was white. Everybody but me got water.

No wifi on board
No usb charger
Bus didn't arrive at address written in e-ticket
Local style driving.. It may look crazy but in the end everything was ok. Our driver was nice and experienced. 4h 30’ from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville on a chaotic monday morning

There were no problems whatsoever. The raod quality was great. The driver was very careful, a few stops on the way, but all seemed to be scheduled, a lunch break at a place with local food - try their deep-fried spring rolls!
Said bus would arrive at 5.30 didn’t arrive till 7 driver not that pleasant wouldn’t overly recommend but was only $5.50 so can’t complain to much

We were worried about the bus trip as we had heard so many bad stories... but this trip was fantastic! Very comfortable and excellent service. We were even given cold water and yummy pastries for breakfast!

I have used this company many times, and it's extremely rare to have wifi available, but they still advertise it.
Would be nice if they gave you the option of several drop off points, but that's only for Khmer passengers.

No other major complaints

After showing up 20 minutes late after multiple phonecalls, we were informed by our driver that the minivan we had booked 3 days earlier was broken. After more phone calls we finally got a second taxi and everything beyond that was fine! Very disorganized
Brilliant. Very comfy
There was a lack of communication between the driver and passengers. Didn't know what was happening during rest breaks. That was probably down to language difficulties for me.

We arrived about 30 to 40 mins late. The attendant who goes around getting our passports is seriously not accommodating in answering our questions. The bus is dirty and old which is incomparable to the one we used for overnight and the difference is 3usd

As negative my review is for the bus servicing their morning travels, this VIP bus for overnight travel is probably one of the best ones I've ever had in my entrie experience of traveling. I will highly recommend.

Time: one and a half hour late
Bus: very bad condition
Friendliness: no information, no help
Good driver, punctual and safe.
Comfortable journey.
Great staff and service

No WiFi after crossing Vietnam Border.
The bus from Pnom Pehn to Siem Reap has water leaking.
The trip was too long and delayed, but the service was good and helpful all the time and the driver skills were excellent. We would recommend Mekong Express service to our friends
Left on time, bus was clean, we arrived safely.

Good and safe trip to Siem Reap. Air con works fine and room is not spacious but endurable for 6 hrs. I could reserve my seat and van left on the time, then arrived earlier than I expected. Overall I sastified with their service.
I had a good travel. Before departing, I got a bread and water. And stoped 2times. It was Very propet to me!
The trip was pretty good, the only thing is that between the lunch break and the time at the border the trip was more 7 than 6 hours
Good in general terms but last stop was unnecesary only for spend money at the shop.

The bus was good and comfortable.
If it had arrived on time, I’d have say “ it was great.”
It took 8 hours to get to Ho chi min city, although we’d been informed it’s 6 hours. 
But other things were just fine. 
I’ll use the bus again when I need it.
One minor point. There was no WiFi although it was announced on the website and the promo.
Everyone was very friendly and gave us a complimentary bottle of water. We left a couple minutes late, but arrived in siem reap in less than 5.5 hours. Overall it was an easy journey.

Overcharging foreign tourists for visa fee. When we refused to pay the driver got annoyed and just drove of without us. When exiting the border control another guy was waiting for us to bring us (for money) to the place where the driver has dinner
Globally very satisfied. I'll use the app again. Thanks

Our trip went very well. The bus is started at time. The bus at 11:00 pm from Phnom Penh to Ho Chi Ming is an old bus but very very confortable. Every think is ok on the road  Ok on the road. Staff are Ok. Procedure to cross the border is optimize.

Given wrong departure point by bookmebus.com when I asked for confirmation,they sent a phone number.Not helpful.Found email for the company,they collected us. Bus was late,I’ve had more comfortable rides dune bashing in Dubai.No wifi,picked up two randoms

Very poor service... There is no coordination between bookmebus and Virak Buntham..
I booked a bus for 7am in a day advance and I got the confirmed ticket with seat number but was not allowed to board 7am bus, they said they dont have confirmation..
On time with name sign at airport.
Over an hour late. Drop off point at a different location that on web site.

My friends and I had the worst experience ever in traveling to the borderline of Vietnam and Cambodia. our passport has no stamp it cause us a lot of damage financially, time, emotionally and physically. MEKONG was not able to help and accomodate us.

My friends and I had the worst experience ever in traveling to the borderline of Vietnam and Cambodia. our passport has no stamp it cause us a lot of damage financially, time, emotionally and physically. MEKONG was not able to help and accomodate us.
No wifi on the siem reap to phnom phen. And smaller bus from phnom phen to ho chi min
Comfortable

Our private driver was excellent. He was early to pick up, the car was in great condition and he was very lovely. We stopped for lunch and he showed us how to eat Cambodian style, which was a highlight. We highly recommend his service and book me bus!

Poorly organised, no one told us where we were, where we had stopped, why we had stopped - there was a lot of random stopping. 
Inspector kept turning air con off and we had to constantly ask for it back on. 
Not the best!
Good service
Good service

The journey was efficient and comfortable. It arrived about 45 minutes late, but that is OK, since I slept through most of the journey. What does "inspector" mean here? My assigned seat on the bus matched the ticket I bought - great work! Come to MIT!
It was the worst trip in my life. I won't come again with this company.

The booking was quite simple and a fairly prompt response was appreciated. The bus left as per schedule and was quite comfortable. The driver did a good job considering the condition of the roads, particularly where it had rained.
Départ à l'heure. Le chauffeur a très bien conduit sans imprudence à une vitesse raisonnable. Le mini bus était propre. La petite bouteille d'eau offerte était placée devant chaque siège. Parfait

Départ à l'heure. Le chauffeur roulait vite avec des dépassements sans trop de visibilité car il pleuvait. J'étais contente d'être arrivé car pas très rassurant !!! Pas de wifi ainsi que de bouteille d'eau mis à notre disposition.

Cheap tickets, good online booking as you can choose seat, bad customer chat service either offline who cannot communicate in english, bus left on time, CR is not smelly, chairs has good legroom but bus is a bit old and slow so we arrive 1 hr late.
It was a cool drive from Phnom Penh to Ho Chi Minh. Though there was delayed its an immigration concerns and not by the bus company! Kudos Mekong!
Very good service. Punctual and friendly driver. Good to start and leave from the post office as it’s an easy point to arrange to be dropped off / picked up at.
The bus driver stopped at bus stops on the way out of the city looking for extra people, then dropped them off along the way adding a fair bit of time to the trip
Beds are a bit cramped. The staff could have announced stops and arrivals more clearly.
Departed 30 minutes late, arrived 2 hours late.
Car very clean. Very nice driver. Quick and easy. Thank you.

Transfer with Cambodian Post Mini Van. Left right on time. Responsible driver. Comfortable AC Mini Van. Got a little crowded because of 3 stops along te way, picking up more people. But never uncomfortabel. Smooth 5 hours transfer. Can recommend.
Driver did an amazing job. There was a flood and the road from Sihanoukville To Phnom Penh was cut. What should have taken 4 hours took 9 and he smiled all the way! Terrific driver!
Great service! So helpful when I was changing my booking beforehand. Great coach service - I will use the company again. Thank you
Great service! So helpful when I was changing my booking beforehand. Great coach service - I will use the company again. Thank you
Good service, professional crew, clean and confortable, especially for air conditioned. Great driver!
The bus was very old. a few airconditional's hole was broken. Add many seat was wetted by airconditonal's water. and very cold. They didn't control it.
The journey ended early.  Really good.
The VIP Van is clean and cozy
Best bus company in Cambodia!
We spend 61/2 hour on the journey, not 3-4 wich we had the understaning it would take.  We lost our boat in Shanoukville and had to buy new tickets.

We drove 4h and about 3+ half hours the driver was on the phone talking to someone. When he started texting,  we told him to please stop as we had 3 small children w us. He did so for 20minutes,  but then started on the phone again. All the way till end.

We drove 4h and about 3+ half hours the driver was on the phone talking to someone. When he started texting,  we told him to please stop as we had 3 small children w us. He did so for 20minutes,  but then started on the phone again. All the way till end.

We drove 4h and about 3+ half hours the driver was on the phone talking to someone. When he started texting,  we told him to please stop as we had 3 small children w us. He did so for 20minutes,  but then started on the phone again. All the way till end.
Great trip!! Thank you so much!
The driver was friendly and accommodating.

Very nice! Small leg room for someone who’s tall but overall we had a pleasant trip. The lunch and snack were provided, and the processing of visa at the border is easy because they assist you before getting there :) Recommended!

Very nice! Small leg room for someone who’s tall but overall we had a pleasant trip. The lunch and snack were provided, and the processing of visa at the border is easy because they assist you before getting there :) Recommended!
Fantastische rit, chauffeur was mega relaxed. Niets te klagen. Prima snacks onderweg en beetje lopen beppen met se chauffeur. Aanrader!
Bus wasn’t quite as described! Old & scruffy with quite poor suspension. Wi-fi stops once in Cambodia & paid $35 for visa instead of $30. Bus left an hour late too.
Short and convenient trip. Good driver. Good van.
Problems at border as I had e visa on my phone but not printed.

I booked online and get unsatisfactory rather i didn’t get any information to what to expect on my journey.we left 10:30pm in siem reap was ask to alight at phnom penh at 3:30pm clueless with what happen to sleeper bus ride and wait for 6:30am saigon trip

Very disappointed i didnt get what i actually paid for. Sleeper bus turn to a night of sleepless journey. The person at the counter in Phnom Penh was sleeping and we have to wake him up to ask for information. NO TRANSFER is a BIG JOKE.
Everything went fine. The process for buying the tickets on Internet and the company Island are both great value.
Everything went fine. The process for buying the tickets on Internet and the company Island are both great value.
Everything went fine. The process for buying the tickets on Internet and the company Island are both great value.
Trip went well. Thank you.

Fantastic service, highly recommend. Really comfortable, we made it through the border crossing from Cambodia to Vietnam speedily and even arrived before the scheduled time. Very considerate driver too.
Great experience . Thanks
good travel

Conducteur prudent qui est parti une fois tous les passagers arrivés donc 10 minutes avant l'heure prévue. Pas de wifi mais la petite bouteille d'eau était bien présente devant chaque siège. Je recommande vivement cette compagnie.

No English Speaking person in bus
The bus go all the way to thailand. We wanted to get down from Battambang. No one told when it reaches to Battambang. We got down about 6 miles away from town at 2.00 am in the morning. Horrible service
Very good car with airco and good seats. Skilled driver. -: some smelly en juicy food was placed on my baggage in the trunk, the juice ran over my baggage and now my backpack smells really hard.
Great trip! Driver was lovely, bus was very nice and clean.Free wifi was a bonus. Highly recommend.
Suggest you to lunch luxury vehicles

Van was on time, clean with AC. Driver was a little aggressive on the road and was forced to slam on his brakes, but nothing out of the ordinary. Got us where we needed to go on time.  Can’t complain.

I did not enjoy this Mekong Express. Safe driving & clean (dirty AC) BUT the Inspector was very aggressive about collecting a 5$ service fee for the Border Crossings. We refused and she threatened she would leave us behind (x3) - we actually were faster!

Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh inspector spoke very good English and was able to communicate properly and had guided us through the Cambodian border. There was no trouble getting by with/without visa because you can buy one once you arrive.

The inspector spoke very good English and they offered water and snack as soon as we hopped in which was a really nice complimentary. 
The air conditioning was also reasonable for such a hot day and the recliner chair was absolutely comfortable to sleep
I emailed already regarding rude & inefficient staff at reception/information office
The trip was quite pleasant and went smoothly with this bus line. The staff was very polite and helpful during the immigration process at the border.
Bus arrived earlier than expected time and left right on time. The bus was new and very clean. Everything went fine.
The trip went fine and in the timing!
A very comfortable ride.
Trip from Battambang to Phnom Penh. We had a very safe trip and arrived on time, even we left a little bit late.
Great service! Highly recommended!

Left 3 minutes early. Arrive at expected time. The driver was good on difficult roads after recent flood damage to the area. Because it's a transit van the bags can be piled a bit close to the passengers in the rear seats, so book other seats if not full.
Overall good ride, friendly staff

Employees of Virak Buntham are trying to "help" them with Visa - and require a lot of mamy od that. Visa cost to Cambodia - 30USD (around 1000 THB) - they want 1500 THB (45USD). Their "help" in real is nothing - its the same waiting time or longer
Fantastic !!!
The bus was really cool. The seat, AC, toilet are nice. Convenience and good. Thank you

Traveled with BayonVIP on a mini van from PP to Siem Reap. Booked ticket with bookmebus online rather then at hostel and it was half the price. Pick up from hostel was free and journey was an hour shorter than scheduled. Would use this company again.

Due to a service error our tickets were cancelled and that was a little annoying. We were told we couldn't be picked up at our hotel but thanks to our hotel staff's effort we were finally picked up. Very good trip after all.
So far the best company I took in Asia, I loved the fact that the girl spoke perfect English with me and helped me with the Cambodian Visa and drop off

Unfortunately, our bus broke down underway. But that is not the worst. The problem with this bus is that it is too old for the duty. Maintenance is so poor that breaking down is just a matter of time. It took 2 extra hours to get there
These guys are really good. We were 10 minutes late (informed in advanve) and they did wait patiently for our arrival. Reached Kampot on time and the driver drove very safely.
It was a comfortable journey
The driver was on time, made stops for us to use the bathroom and drove carefully. I would definitely recommend this service and would use it again

Very poor service from this company. They cancelled the original boat I booked but didn't tell me, then put us on a boat via Buva. The boat had far too many people on and was not safe. Dispite people raising concerns the staff did nothing to reassure us.

Bus picked us up on time and was comfortable. We got there safe although the driver was weaving in and out of traffic and had to emergency brake a few times as he was going too fast, we still arrived 2 hours after expected arrival time.

Bus was a little late getting into Kampot, but that was due to traffic. Driver did well to handle traffic on trip from Kampot to Phnom Penh due to very heavy traffic. Staff were quite courteous. No objections.

Good service.
Nice airconditioner.
Comfortable seat. 
Early arrival than schedule.
The worse experience in my life. The worse travel company in the world, they have stolen our money.

The Mekong Express night bus, while not the ideal way to spend a night, is a convenient option to get around Cambodia. The beds are narrow but comfortable enough & I slept most of the trip. The attendant was very friendly. The only issue was lack of wifi
Good. And please be improved your service and promotion more

I had an horrible experience. The bus was 2 hours late. I didn't mind that it was late but theady never said we were waiting for a bus just that it's 10 minutes away. Until my white friend went in to ask why we haven't left yet.

The bus I originally booked was no longer leaving that day and I had to get on the earlier bus. Thankfully I arrived a few hours ahead of my original booking to make the earlier one! We left about 45 min late due to passengers who didn't arrive.

Driver bumped into a truck in front of us, we were going slow and there was no damage. Lots of political people in the streets so the ride was delayed by about 2 hours as it was slow moving but not his fault, we made good time and he navigated well.
Good.

The tyre on the bus I was on burst, there was a loud explosion. There was no communication between bus staff and us. You could also state clearly that beds must be shared, the guy I had to share with was horrible, kept kicking me! Water bottle is nice!
A great experience. The driver did a great job. He drived carefully and was very kind. He drived us till the hotel. It was a good way to travel from Vietnam to Cambodia.

The journey from HCMC to Phnom Penh was smooth and quite comfortable. The bus stewardess was very nice, polite, efficient and spoke great English. We liked the fact we received a free bottle of water and a snack as it was quite a long journey (7 hrs).

Bayon VIP did not get the reservation from bookmebus. Eventually they were able to accommodate us on the scheduled bus but made us sit in the back seats, when we had chosen different seats in our reservation.
A bottle of water would have been appreciated

Dangerous driving.  
A bottle of water would have been appreciated
30 minutes late departing.

We have been waiting as the boat was late and when he finally reached our hotel, the staff did not wait for our booking and left without a word or any explanation. We had to ask our hotel to call them to make the boat coming back to pick up our family.
Confortable boat, efficient staff, a nice moment and a good way to reach the islands near Sihanoukville.

Our previous experiences had been good. For this trip, however, the bus was old, rickety and uncomfortable. Our trip was delayed at the border as the bus agent lost my visa forms. We also kept stopping in Cambodia to pick up random passengers
All good.
The bus that I take is very old and not comfortable at all

The van was full not just of people but also of a lot of parcels and the delay was due to all these parcels delivery along the road, was really the worst trip I had in Cambodia and 18 dollars for a thing like this is inacettable

I really think the service was good except for the driver, really inconscious and unsafe at all! After my request to drive slowly, he continued  to the same as a furious. Furthermore  he did hazardous

The bus was quiet, stable. Bed was comfortable as well. However, the driver/staff play music from his phone was annoying.

Very good service thank you bookmebus
Crew nice. Wifi stopped working in Cambodia Please more water to drink.

Again the bus is very old and not comfortable for client like me but it’s also alittle easy for me too, because when I take it. There not many people and I can change seat easily.

Really appreciate the online chat with the staff, who replied us very quickly and clearly for all information about the pick up service. Quite comfortable journey and the driver arrived quite on time for the pick up.

The driver drive crazy, too much fast and felt very bad for this. He even hit a motorbike with 2 people driving, and didn't stop. This experience was terrible. He noticed cause there was a sound, I was the only one who was in this side and saw it.
Excellent and clean bus with friendly staff and complimentary water and snacks. Thank you!

Worst bus company in Cambodia! We had to go from Kep to Kampot on a tuktuk and we arrived in PP with 3 hours delay.
We booked a VIP van but we ended up in a super messy bus with backpacks on the floor and the driver was so rude too. A waste of money!
Aircondition is too hot. No good
Bus moyennement confortable, nous sommes partis avec un peu de retard mais sinon trajet ok. J'avais laissé mes lunettes dans le bus et le chauffeur est venu me les apporter le lendemain :)

We were never informed about the fact that we would have to change 2 times to another bus, despite the (way too inpolite and fast) explanation in the Siem Reap office.

Driver was stopping you many times along the way to pick passenger up, to make delivery of things, to buy phone top up, to screen the street for random things. He's rude, didn't even make the effort to explain why he's stopping. The trip sucks
Waited 3 hours for the transferring of bus in Phnom Penh

What a great trip! If at all possible I will use this transport to & from Kep every time. lots of space, the van is in great condition & the wifi was acceptable. The driver dropped us off before the final stop which was great cos it was closer to home.

The SUV's condition is lower than I expected (expected according to the website's descriptions), and there was an unpleasant fishy smell. The driver is excellent. He's a very polite person and a careful driver.
Pleasant and safe trip :) Free pick up for your location, Highly recommend
Toilet was out of order on the 2nd bus.

I booked a bus from Sihanoukville to Siem Reap, it was to stop over in Phnom Penh where I would transfer. They didn't have me down for the transfer journey, only the first one. Make sure you confirm your journey!!!!

We had a good journey on the Mekong express. The only issue we had was the bus being very hot when we initially got on to it, and it took a while to cool down. We were also two hours late into Phnom Penh so missed our shuttle from the hotel.
The bus was comfortable and the stewardess friendly and helpful. There was working aircon, free bottle of water, free snack and a toilet on board. We also stopped for lunch. Nice journey!

Hi,
When we showed for our bus we were told that the bus would not be running. We were then moved to travel with Kumho Samco. The cost of the trip is $10 per person with Kumho compared to $12 with Mekong Express. Can I be refunded the $4?
On time, clean, good WiFi.  Great services.

Clean and comfy bus. Lots traffic and concerned would miss flight. Mentioned this to driver and he dropped us at airport gates so saved us the time getting to airport from the city. Very grateful to him
I love Mekong Express
Perfect
Excellent service. Arrived prior to the departure time. Driving was first class. Felt totally safe all of the trip. Would use again.
Excellent service. Arrived prior to the departure time. Driving was first class. Felt totally safe all of the trip. Would use again.
We started late because they decided to wait for some guys around 20 minutes, the A/C didn't work well, too many stops and the accommodation isn't VIP at all, nothing fancy or nice, is just standard.
Nearly Perfect !
there was no water available on board
Safe travel, good driver
our driver was excellent. Prudent, very good advice for restaurant on the road.
