- No rest station along the way.
Very good. Polite attendants and easy to talk to

Worst co. ever for 6 ppl who bought full priced tickets. When we arrived at the bus, they told us that the bus is full. The bus attendants sold our seats and pocketed the money. We slept on bus corridor with no beds. Travelled on 28.7.18 1.30am PP-HCMC
It was a comfortable journey. Thank you
My driver never showed up.  I will recommend people not use this service.

The driver stopped several times to drop off his buddies in places that didn't seem to be even on the route, he had to make detours. This added almost two hours to our already long trip. He ignored us when we asked something. Bad service.
It was a good expérience...the compagnie are great no problem i can recommand

Worst bus ride ever! 4 people squeezed into the back seat bench for 5 hours. Driver was constantly speeding, honking and squeezing through the traffic. Driver turned the AC off after asking to lower the temperature. I really wonder what VIP stands for?!
Excellent service

The trip was super punctual, we left on time both on pickup and at the ferry. Only downside was that the drop off point was not what the booking map had indicated. But not a big deal, and was still good value, thanks!
Friendly helpful driver. Comfortable van and ride. Only complaint was internet didn't work.

Siem Reap to Battambang.
Very luxurious bus albeit a bit older.
Much much better than the ramshackled bus that took me from Battambang to Siem Reap.
Nice lunch stop modern premises with some western food options.
Departure was on time, we arrived 30 minutes earlier than expected. Driver drove not too fast and foresightedly. I will choose Cambodia Post VIP Van again

Massive detail you need to fix - your stated arrival point on your etickets does not match where the bus actually stops, in Phnom Penh the bus stopped at the Ossery(?) market, but  my ticket said your office near the River Palace hotel, which I had booked
Remove unnecessary stops along the way for your drivers to get commissions from restaurants

The bus left about 15 minutes later than posted and arrived about 40 minutes late. No complaints otherwise, everything else was a great trip. Would highly recommend. Driver was extremely safe as well, no constant overtaking.
Very good service
The Pick Up Service was good, the ride fast ( 4 1/2 hours instead of 6), but the AC was way too cold.
Driver was a bit noisy and drove a bit fast on the difficult road!
Good service !!! Continue to do such. Thank you

DO NOT GO WITH THIS BUS COMPANY. The time on ticket was 7.30. We got there at 7 and was told it does not leave till 8.15. It did not leave until 8.45. This made us miss our ferry to Koh Rong. Pay $1/2 more and go with a better company!
I love Mekong Express
Place of pickup is not correct on the map. Bus was SO LATE making us miss ongoing travel for that day. Staff only laughed when we told them. Go with another company

We went from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh. The bus is spacious and comfortable, air con was working and water provided. We started the journey 15 minutes late due to some passengers arriving late. Arrived after around 6 hours instead of the stated 4.

Ferry itself is fine but staff are awful. We were told we would be picked up. Then we called to check and they told us they couldn’t anymore but would wait at the office for us. We rushed, When we got there they said we were too late and ferry had gone

Poipet destination should drop passengers at roundabout which is closed to immigration check point. The driver requested for extra money from passengers if would like him to drop at roundabout--Cambodia immigrantion check point.
Good service...
I didn’t use accommodation etc...but because of the great customer service over email I gave you full starts. Quick response and solved my issue very quickly
Keep up the good service!

Surprised there was no toilet on this 6h coach trip.Very annoying that the final arrival point was different to that stated on eticket,  persuaded your staff to pay for a tuk tuk to my destination so worked out ok but you need to fix this problem.
They not tell to clients about rest time on the ways.

Kep to Phnom Penh : One hour and half of delay without any information. We had to wait a new van in Kampot in the street. After the air conditioner didn't work and we hadn't enough place because of the luggages. I definitely don't recommend it !

A trip from PP to Kampot was wonderful since the driver was responsible for his role, but a trip back from Kep to PP was a desaster because a different driver started stopping to pick up passengers along the road due to having empty seats.

The booking was easy. Driver was on time at the airport. However, instead of 5 hours, the trip to Siem Reap took 6 hours & 15 minutes. This should be given duration as normal length of trip (due to road & traffic conditions). Driver didn't speak English?

The bus left the terminal late (about 30 minutes).   Nonetheless, we didn't have to transfer to another bus, the driver was cautious in driving, and the inspector was approachable. Overall, we arrived in Bangkok late but safe.

The bus departed Ho Chi Minh City on time. But it was delayed about 1 hour in Phnom Penh from the schedule time and also another 30 minutes delayed when we arrived at the terminal because the bus door was stucked and all passengers have to wait.
Excellent
I was pissed off because of the Mekong’s driver picked up a lot of people on the street along way from Ho Chi Ming to Phnom Penh. It wasted my time, company should think about it. Thanks
Just pickup many place. Let the van go and stop many time

The bus took 11 hours instead of 6. It also had no WiFi when it said on the website that there was WiFi on board. We stopped for an HOUR for lunch even though we were already running late. The bus was uncomfortable and too hot. I am very disappointed.
Very great service! On time
Late departure, the driver stopped to eat soup in the middle of the trip (4h ride), so we arrived too late for our next van. It was supposed to be a van but we ended up with a bus.

Driver drove quite fast but was usually careful. One customer kept wanting to drop off items along the road to friends, even though this VIP bus shouldn't have so many stops. Driver negotiated with this customer tactfully. Air con didn't work at the start

Everything is okay except for the bus itself. The aircon is not functioning well, and our trip was after lunch time so it’s kinda hot in the bus. It has no wifi, but it has power sockets to charge your phones. The inspector helped us with the immigration.
Again, no wifi but with power sockets to charge your phones. Aircon is not functioning well. But overall, it’s good. :)

I booked a bus ticket from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. The bus was new and clean and the staffs were very respectful, friendly and helpful with my journey. The Driver was very great. they provide us with some breads and a bottle of water. The wifi also works
សូមក្រុមហ៊ុនជួយពិនិត្យម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ឡានផង ព្រោះឡានខ្សោយម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ក្ដៅបែកញើសកូថ
The bus was way too cold the whole time. Now I am sick.. told the driver but he didn’t change unfortunately. Besides that the trip was fine, the bus little old.
Great bus ride, spacious. Left on time and arrived on time. I would highly recommend it.

Experience doesn't live up to what is advertised. Driver didn't speak any English. Border proceedings were confusing. Bus was small but comfortable enough. Was dropped off in Phnom Penh in a different part of town then what my ticket said. Bus was on time

Driver didn't speak any english despite the website saying all drivers are fluent. The minivan wasn't fully booked so it was spacious and comfortable. Bus took 5.5 hours and was just a bit later than indicated.
Don’t book the 7:30 am bus! It doesn’t exist. Unfriendly staff. Not professional. Driver didn’t spoke english, no communication possible. He was just loughing about me. I nearly missed my ferry.

Nel traffico caotico e purtroppo non regolamentato da segnaletica, L'autista ha più volte preferito risvegliare con altri veicoli piuttosto che privilegiare la sicurezza dei trasportati a lui affidati. Molto pericoloso
Driver was awesome
Very little place at the bottom of rhe minivan and the driver drove very fast, it was really inconfortable
Good service plus staying Comfortably on the night bus ... Moreover, Saving the time to see more around in Siem Reap,Highly recommended #MekongExpress :)
Good trip.
Left on time and arrived on time. Driver was friendly and drove safely. Two stops en route for food and loos. All worked very well, would definitely use again.
Not clean and especialy is  not possible that the driver stops every 1,5 hours and Seat 20 minuts for eat (only him while the passengers wainting)

Mekong express truly provides a great quality of transport services from Vietnam to Cambodia. I haven't encountered any problem with our transfer. It was fast & smooth. Thanks to our guide or inspector who's always there to guide and answer our questions.
Pretty cramped mini bus- so not the most comfortable. But relatively on time, one clean rest stop, working air con, and wifi to some extent.
Really nice spacious seats and leg room. Wifi didn’t work at all though

Bus was two hours late (reasons not explained) so we we missed our ferry to Koh Rong that afternoon, really frustrating and ended up being expensive for us having to book another night's accommodation.

bus broke down just outside of Battambang. Had to wait for a new one to come. Driver didn't speak English and couldn't tell us this so had a local come on and tell us. When new bus finally arrived it was much smaller so was hot and cramped for journey.
We had a delay of over 4 hours, we took several very long pauses. Wouldn’t go again with Olongpich.
Good  driver !
Clean bus with room, ac but controlled by two front passengers, safe travelling as solo female BUT no Wi-Fi which was one of the rains I had booked this particular bus.
Good and Responsive Service. Plase enjoin and try safe and sound on your travel
Friendly, relaxed, efficient and safe trip.

This was an excellent trip -- the driver was very professional and courteous. He was also careful and didn't speed! The stops were at the right times and brief enough to use the toilet and eat. I would recommend this route and company.

The mini van I took was really comfortable and driver is very friendly and stop for break so guests could use toilet and have some snack for a long distance travelling. I like that this company has an online promotion, hope it gonna last forever.
Broken bus tool us 6h
Very nice , good service and comfortable. Thanks
Dope ride- only minor complain was the internet sucked. Everything else was prime.
Car was old and shit and the driver was a lunatic talking on his phone the whole time and swerving off the road or into oncoming traffic. Absolutely fucking nuts.
So comfortable seats, safe ride even it was evening, we had the 17:45 departure PP - SHV , good Air-condition, complimentary snacks

1 hour earlier arrived in Phnom Penh from Siem Reap, driving fast but safe. Seats are like sportscar seats but only comfortable if you're tiny because of its shapes. Pick up failed, driver couldn't find our hotel.
Avoid. Although advertised as having a toilet there is none. Driver stopped at random construction sites and open fields for toilet stops.
The bus started 40min later from confirmed hour and also the driver arrived 2hrs later than expected to Mondulkiri

1. We didn't get the snacks?
2. The bus took us somewhere different from where we were supposed to go! In the email it gave a drop-off location but they made us get out somewhere else. It felt like a scam, there were tuk-tuk drivers waiting there ?

We talk about the driver of the Phnom Penh - Sihanoukville part, he was on his phone all the trip long, it took 7 hours to do the way to Sihanoukville.He did not let us lower the AC besides the fact that it was freezing and made a break of 1h in a restau

We were on the bus for half an hour when it broke down, after 2 hours of hammering the wheel we had to swap buses. After a further 2 hours the front screen completely smashed glass all over the front passengers. Swapped to a third bus. no staff spoke engl
Our driver was absolutly amazing. He was easy to talk with and told us a little bit about Cambodia and gave recommendations.

I have traveled to Kampot multiple times with this Company and it’s been great. This time however was not the same, we stopped about 6 times before even leaving Phnom Penh and the driver was very abrupt and made some careless decisions.
Safe driving is most important so thank you! The bus is old, the seats bed to be deep cleaned and broken plastic, handles, seat belts should be repaired.
Wifi did not work and the bus was really very full with people and luggage. Overall a satisfying trip, however I wonder if this VIP van service is not a bit overrated in the various forums.
Very safe driver!  Please update buses with USB charging for phones.
Everything right
Good smooth trip! Thank you
Wifi not available
Very punctual, and the van is very clean. The aircon works very well unlike most of other providers. There's also Wifi too. However, the driver was driving very fast.
Arrived to late in Phnom Penh, but the next bus were waiting for us. You will sleep in one small bed with a stranger. No space for small luggage. Driver spoke not English, hard communication.
Not on time. Not very helpful inspector. Boat was okay. Quick boarding.
Van was a little cramped but manageable. Not the most comfortable but if you are not fussy, this is ok
bus was spacious and driver was good. use their service!
bus ride was comfortable although im not sure if they made any toilet stops through the night because i was sleeping all the way.
Thanks! Trip was smooth!
Very confortable trip

I booked this to Sihanoukville, pls note: there is no Wifi in the car, never; it took me 5.5 hrrs to reach there, and 7.5 hrs to return on Sat. Legs compartment are designed for Hobbit. If you are tall, book the seats behind driver.
Pls improve your real time booking system.
Approx 1h delay...
I simply love it! I never thought that a bus ride of a 13hrs makes it comfortable and easy. Thumbs up’

The driver was dangerous and we almost got into a car accident (he was speeding and he slammed on the breaks and almost hit a cow)
After arrival he rude. He stood outside the bus and was jeering at me and my friends and talking about and pointing at us.

Driver in Thailand very bad guy 
Arrive bkk 11:30pm very bad , last time for soriya bus
I booked a night bus. I just slept the whole trip. The bus seat i loved it you can sleep comfortably not seating but lying (bed). It's more convenience to book in their website.

The bus is old and so bumpy. I booked 830am from PP to HCM. There's no problem in Immigration. They're nice to transfer us from Riverside HQ to Orussey Market. It's diff when I book in their website not the bus I booked. So dissapointed
Drive to fast and dangerous.
Drive to fast and dangerous.
Drive to fast and dangerous.
Air condition out after 1.5 hours of travel. Instead of 4 hours of travel, the bus needed 8 hours!! Bad service
Good car, safe driver.

Our suitcase worth 400usd Rimowa. Dropped two times at passenger stop on the road and at border check. I warned one time after the first drop, but it s still dropped. 

Am no longer interested in a small VAN of Mekong with small space to put luggage.
Nice trip. Bus have seen better days but good driver and punctual service. I would book again.
Good service. A bit delayed arrival due to road construction and rice trucks. Would recommend

Taxi arrived exactly on time but driver had to be repeatedly told that we need to reach our destination by 2pm so we could catch the ferry. Eventually he picked the pace up but was more concerned with avoiding even the smallest of potholes. Not Impressed.
I cancel that trip because I booked the seat 2, and I got success booking. Then, my seat was changed to seat 8 by telling me technicall error. It was funny to me.

our bus was an hour late, you are made to share a single size bed with a stranger, they pulled over in the side of the RODE multiple times so people can use the restroom. No bathroom on bus. The bed was also filthy. Just awful.

After hearing lots of negative reviews of the drivers on this trip I was pleasantly surprised. The driver did try to make progress in the traffic but it was done in a safe manner generally . Left 45 minutes late and arrived 2 hours late. (due to traffic)
Very dangerous driver. Cramped small bus. On both buses I went on WIFI did not exist. Don't advertise trained drivers (trained in what!?) and WIFI if it doesn't exist.
A bit late leaving. Not clear about departure and pick up points but ok overall in the end.

Your web site said we were going to arrive at 7:00 am and its not true, we arrived at 11:00 am, so I missed my 10:00 am flight.the staff is terrible. No one would help us, They would keep looking at facebook. They are very rude. The bus is dirty.

The bus was from Shihanouk ville, and arrived in Kampot to pick me up 2 hours late. 
The receiptionist in Kampot said it's because of recent rain, and the bus delays often. If so, they should put on the web as note or change the schedule.
Puntuale, van pulito e conducente attento e simpatico. Consigliato

The person at the reception scammed the hell out of us. We need to change dates and he explicitly say 20%, which would be 6 dollars total. Then he jumped to 6 each, 8 each. When I pursue asking, he pretends not hear it or on the call until the bus start.
We are arrived to Phnom Pehn with more one hour of delay, the bus was very old and there was not the wifi and the electric connection.
Excelente!
Easy booking and save time ... but some bus companies aren't in the app ... love it anyway
Love it but the seat is not too comfortable

The adres we were given (in the confirmation) was wrong, which Made us have to rush to the city to get there in time. Luckely the bus was late. Sadly it was 1,5 hour late. To try and make up the time the driver rode scarely fast

L'autista guidava ad una velocita' elevata con sorpassi molto azzardati, il minivan era un po' datato con le sospensioni da buttare. Sono stati puntualissimi...ma forse avrei preferito arrivare con un po' di ritardo ma piu' tranquilla
Easy to book with good service!
Still not used to constant honking.
I don’t like bribing for visa application..Also agent was asking more money
Excellent trip between Phnom Phen and HCMC.

This is a great service.  Cheap, comfortable and air conditioning.  Had 2 stops on the way to stretch our legs.  I had plenty of leg room so wasnt cramped.  Driver knew what he was doing.  Would highly recommend

Left bang on time only to have to go back after 15mins because we collected a wrong passenger & forgot a further two. Driver drove like crazy to make up lost time & was reluctant to keep the air con on despite the stuffiness and our requests.

To be honest, I never want to ride this again. The driver drove like a straight-up lunatic. We saw a child who had just been killed, he was still lying on the road and the driver still sped through the towns like a bat out of hell. Never again!!

Despite confirming the night before, our seats were double booked and we were transferred to Kumho Samco which was not the same quality of service but got us to Phnom Penh 2 hours later than predicted. Very didappointing Mr Bookmebus.

Very good service.
On time, good van, good temperature and quiet. 
I advise this van company.

The bus exceeded my expectations. It was very clean and the staff were nice and welcoming. We received a pillow, blanket, water and some biscuits which we were not expecting at all. I would definitely recommend this as a cheaper travel option.

Exactly what we expected.  We received some water on the bus and the staff were helpful at the boarder. We sat at the back, the seats had less space than the seats in the middel and the front so I would definitely recommend those two rows. Thank you.
The overall journey is comfortable and ive reach Siem Reap on time. I’m a single traveler but the inspector/ attendant is very accommodating
The bus is a bit old especially the one from Ho Chi Minh- Phnom Penh and the lady assisting us was a bit moody. But overall, trip was good.
Inspector and Overall: I don't know what is it
Driver appeared 20 minutes ahead of time. Did a good job by driving fast but save. Due to high traffic trip took a hour longer than planned.
Driver was late but very nice and good car
Very good driver and car.I booked this private taxi 6pm ,1day ago.But the driver came on time!!
Excellent service. Comfortable. Punctual. Good stops.
There was no wifi on the bus and I just got to sleep at other bed with one guy after I booked just one bed for myself.
the layout of seats online shall be updated for better view，really hard to understand when you book
Great service, will use them again.
We take the boat one hour and half late and the same for the return trip.

Not clear about departure and pick up. Finally, we arrived and left Ko Rong Samloen from another pier at 3 kilometres to our hôtel. For the return, we arrived at a pier far away from the city so we must pay a tuck tuck. Be careful but finally good trip.
Good quality  service , accomodation by the staff in giving the necessary services for the passengers , attended with the passengers visa and snacks. Thank you for a safe ride.

we needed to go to Pattaya but had to take a ticket to Bangkok when booking. and after the border, we did not have enough seats in a minivan that go to Pattaya, and your administrator charged us another 1000 baht to put us in another mini-bus and with a

Servicio puntual. El mayor problema es que la gente de aqui vomita mucho en los viajes, seria un gran detalle quede hubiesen bolsas para el mareo, asi si alguien vomita no lo hace en el suelo y se queda ahi todo el viaje, lo cual es asqueroso.
A really interesting cross country journey. The minivan was overcrowded and uncomfortable. One poor girl sick during the trip. Kept ontime regardless of who was in the way!

Change arrival time 
23 30 insted of 21 30 !!!!!!

We were asked to pay $5 each to cross the border from VN to CB for the process to go faster. it is unacceptable to then be told that if we didn’t pay, the bus wouldn’t wait for us. And the fact that it is actually just $1 is even worse. It wasn’t just us.

I got the bus with CTT twice within a week and both times the bus departed over 90 minutes late and arrived late. When I went to get van from Kampot, the office and gates were locked, eventually a staff member arrived an hour late, then the van 30m later!

We did not get the ferry which we booked with Campa Mekong. At our arrival in Sihanoukville the inspector told us that we will be picked up by the ferry company. But nobody came and no further information were given...
Very reliable and professional service. I would recommend Cambodia Post VIP service to all travellers.

Driver was on his phone, bought durian, 2 hours delayed, bus company did not take us from our hotel, but they said so!!
Lots of mistakes!! Can not book again
Overall very satisfactory. For additional inputs and better service, driver should inform passengers how many stops before departure. :)
Everything was good, we arrived 40 minutes before
Bus was over an hour late, there was no-one at the CTT office and no update for customers
The driver was okay, however we had difficulty communicating. Suggest the drivers have Google Translate App to assist them.
The driver drive too fast! Also the company of receptionist speak impolite with customer

We have waited at a a roundabout during 45min, we found help to call the company that forgot us. They came to pick up by tuk tuk, then then sens us with another tuktuk to another company. The substitution bus left 45 min after ours and dropp off very far
During purchase ticket, should have textbox for customer comment. Ur hotline didn't receive my call at 7pm.

We booked the van at 13.30, but no van arrived. We asked and they told us to wait. After 20 min we asked again to different people and finally they told us that there was no van! They booked a van of a different company and we arrived later than expected

Bus departed late and arrived over an hour after scheduled time. Bus needs updating and would be good to have USB or plug socket for charging mobile phone. Otherwise pretty smooth and comfortable journey.
Suggest writing 12:30 to 6:30 pm on the website. 6 hours is more correct from Sihanoukville - Phnom Penh.
Good solution for transfer from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap.
Trip from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap went smoothly.

I love Mekong Express. I’ve used them as my means of transpo from Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh and a night after in Phnom Penh, I used them again for my Phnom Penh to Siem Reap trip. I’m amazed that they have snacks on board!

I have selected seat 3A & 4A on this trip but when it came to time of departure, they told me the seat is randomly assigned so I have forced to be seated on 19A & 20A. The seat is narrow and not comfy at all. I’ll never come back to Virak Butham anymore.

The seat I purchased was ended up deserved for both inspectors so I have forced to be seated on 19A & 20A where is super narrow and uncomfortable compared with others. I did feedback to 1 of them but they refused to make it for me. Never come back anymore
Never never never book again.

For the trip from Phnom Penh to Bangkok, they left me at the Poipet station for over an hour after taking everyone else on the bus to the border. Then they made me pay a moto taxi to take me to the border. Ended up getting to Bangkok 4 hours late.
Good driver, good luggage management.

We hadden een minivan geboekt, maar door meerdere reizigers kregen we een grote bus. 1 persoon werd overboekt en werd in het midden op de gang geplaatst op een plastieken stoeltje. Voor de rest tevreden van de organisatie, op tijd en vriendelijke service.
Wrong directions, vans late, waited 6 hours after expected departure time and journey took 7 hours... Not the best experience...
I'd prefer if you said me it was 10 hours (not 6!). By the way,  a mini van like that seems unappropriate for such a trip !

Older bus with pretty small uncomfortable seats. Crossing the boarder was very confusing as we were told where to go but not why or what to do by the bus people. A little late, but it was overall okay.
Old bus, broken aircon, driver honking the whole ride, bad stop restaurant, drive was more than 7 instead of 6h, etc

Vraiment une très bonne expérience
Je recommande sans hesitations

My booking was cancelled on my travel date because the bus cannot operate. Kumho Samco transfer us to Phoc Danh Bus which provided very poor service. Phoc Danh Bus has no seat number, driver drive like FORMULA ONE car race, etc and a lot other shit thing
Van ride from hell!! Coackroach infested minibus !! Very disgusting and scary!! Unprofessional service!!
A van arrived on time and a driver is friendly, kind and give us for recommendation to do in Kompot. Moreover, wifi was so fast.

The driver drove 100km/h all trip long. Speedlimit? Who cares? Somewhere it was 40, je drove 80-100km/h. The only times he drove slower were when he was stopped by another car. 
He was very close from other vehicules.
I don't think he drives safely.

Driver came 20minutes too late. Also took a 20mins for lunch. Drive from Phnom Penh to sihanoukville took us 7.5h. Since the Driver couldnt speak any Word in english, he had to call someone who told us Route 4 was closed and we have to pay 20$ more ..etc

Don’t use this bus agent. They have a fancy website and advertise with free WiFi and a bottle of water, but the seats in their mini-vans are as uncomfertable as can be and your sqeeuzed between locals who refresh their baby’s dirty dipers in the van!
overall, perfect!!!
The bus with bed it's very good

ATV takes the new road to the north Cambodian-Laos border. You are left to cross the border yourself. The Laos side was slow, we waited 30 mins for a TukTuk (thought it  would be a mini van) and then 45 mins for a boat to Don Det. Arrived at 7pm.

PP to BB.
Travel this trip a lot.
 This driver excellent.   Schedule should say 6 hours. Have never done it in 5 :-)  Trip include eating stop 20 ish minutes

The bus was old with no confortable seats. They made many stops along the way making it a really long trip.The A/C was not good. And the bus broke down and we stop for around 40 minutes until they fix it. Overall a really bad service, no water provided.
Very safe driving and time

I'm not ok.
In web tell me 5 hours but truth 8 hours 20 min.

I must buy new ticket of airplane.
Left on time and arrived on time. Driver was friendly and drove safely. Two stops en route for food and loos. All worked very well, would definitely use again.
The latest departure due to road got cut off. Since there's no standby bus, we have to wait till the bus come.
Spare plenty of time.

Excellent and safe driver. I always use Cambodia Post VIP wherever possible for that reason.  Also, they don't spend the whole journey honking the horn as other bus companies tend to do.   It's a relief!

We got a bottle of water.  Good seat and aircon.

We pay for VIP Van with Free wifi, but the wifi doesn't work on the way Saigon to Phnom Penh, and on the way back...
I mostly take this trip VIP to get wifi, but it was not working...
You should not advertised that you have wifi if it doesn't work...
Perfect
Well service
The driver was not friendly and the food at the place where he get his free food because he stopped there with the passenger for dinner was not so good.
This is my first time took round trip Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh. Everything good
Very bad service, Bus always late
I'm tall and  the sit was small for me, but in general is e very good service.
Smooth driving.
The bus was not clean and also had cockroaches. For the price paid, I expected a better service.

Your driver showed no care for the safety of his passengers. Very dangerous driving. Will not use Batyon again nor will we recommend to others too dangerous. Even Cambodian passengers were commenting on driving.
Disappointment was lack of leg room (we were on back four seats), no WiFi code on show, no. No Charging point and no snack. According to website these things are what customer can expect. Staff good.
Very smooth driving. Perfectly on time.
Safe company, wifi and water would be nice
Overall, it was a comfortable ride. Although, the 2nd bus smelled bad when the toilet is used and the inspector did not explain what is going to happen when we got in the border to Siem Reap
Thanks for your great service! I enjoyed the trip with you :)
booking bus and ferry in phnom penh and sihanoukville has became super easy and convenient so far. Highly recommended.
It was a nice and confortable travel to sihanoukville. The driver is courteous. We arrived on time and were able to catch the ferry that we booked on that day.
Bookmebus gave me wrong address for the bus station. As a consequence, I had to pay to take another bus company and missed all my other connections. This ended up costing me an extra $150 total.
All good, even the wifi worked!
Very safe driver on very bad roads

The driver didn't drive safely. PS: Also, he picked up passengers along the way, which seemed like it wasn't paid customers as he picked them up midway on the route and dropped them before the official drop off point and they paid him in cash.
The driver talked over the phone throughout the journey. This is risky. Wouldn't recommend Mekong express to anyone.

Overall it was ok, but what’s the point in booking a specific bus (12 seats) and selecting a specific seat (front) if the bus used is completely different (22 seats) and everyone sits randomly where they want?

Tyre burst on journey, causing a long delay. Sometimes these things can't be helped, but there was NO communication whatsoever with any of the passengers about what was going on, which is just not good enough.
Bus seems old. Pick up is not punctual. Waited very long.
Horrible ! We were 4hours late. The personel don't speack english and don't care about you. The worse bus company never see. Do not book with them !
Wasn't the best bus I've been on, wasn't the worst. Left slightly later than planned, your spine will feel every pothole...
Driver was a nice guy but had limited English so was a little hard to communicate sometimes. The car was nice and clean. A good comfortable ride overall.
Good trip. Safe driver. Comfortable. Has wifi and seats recline. Was 1hour late due to wet season. We always choose mekong express when travelling in cambodia as is always safe and reliable

The bus departing from Phnom Penh was 1 hour late, which as a result arrived HCMC at past 10pm i/o the estimated arrival time of 8:30pm. If not for our flight being delayed for nearly 2 hours, we would have missed our flight back home. Not satisfied.

Started with a delay of 1 hour with no AC in waiting area.. No wifi... Ac very  weak no cooling... Reached destination after delay of more than 2 hours... Only the lady was good to listen but could not do anything for AC and wifi ...and the delay....
Easy border crossing
Easy border crossing
We book the seats but the inspector put us in other more little. I don’t like anything.
Nous sommes partis à l’heure, avons fait 2 arrêts (dégourdir les jambes et manger) et nous sommes arrivés à l’heure. Van confortable. Rien a dire je le reprendrai sans problème.

Partis avec plus d’une heure de retard du mondolkiri, un froid horrible dans le bus lit, la clim est à fond!! Crevé sur la route (pas de leur faute). Sinon trajet ok. Pris un van en correspondance à Phnom Penh pour Siem Reap à l’heure et chauffeur sympa

The bus was in perfect condition, the seat was comfortable and the trip was good. The organization was perfect ( give us also the box with food and water) and punctual! Very, very good... Consigliatissimo!
The bus delayed for 1 hour because a group of people didn't show up on time and we had to wait for them.. Cost us extra one hour.

Wasn't the best coach journey I've been on. Speeding, doing 100 in a 40 zone. Excessive use of the horn which led to me moving towards the back for peace. We stopped whenever the driver felt like it. Took much longer than advertised.
Excellent and friendly service.

There was a problem with the bus and we were forced to stop several times whilst the driver tried to fix the problem. He eventually connect a wire cable from the engine through the bus which was genius of him and allowed us to continue our journey!

Bus was broken, so we had to wait for more than a hour to get another bus. Driver didn't speak one word English, so he couldn't inform us what's going on. The driving time was stated as 4 hours, but it took more than 7 hours.
Basically it was good trip

I booked by email.  After receiving ticket we found flight was delayed two hours so I emailed pick up time change from 4.45 to 7.10pm.  Noone met us.   A man rang the number and we were finally met at 8.10pm. The change of time had not been passed on.

The person in Mekong Express in Ho chi Minh waas really not nice,  They need to improve the sence of hospitality.  Thank you jehwoeuheuhdhhdiudhieuyieurieriefieieuriueddhkshiudyieyeiyeyrweyrweiuriuefhsdkhfksdfksufsdfhsufieuyrwiyrwiyrwieyrweiuyrweiuyrweiur
The seats where very uncomfortable, couldnt sit properly and the space for bags is very limited. As for punctuality the van left 15 minutes late and reached final destination an hour late.
We travel from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh , the trip lasted 8 hours. Everything was ok but the bus was different than the one we saw in the website  and there no wifi on bus.
Used them a few times and its and excellent service. Friendly staff who always keep you informed.

I wonder if this is no.1 bus from  Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh???1+.5hr delay b4 and after=8.5hrs.I’m only 1.7m and my legs are too long for the seats???visa 30usd we paid 35usd? 5usd service charge/person is too expensive for 12usd bus tickets ok?!

The A/C worked for all the travel at 18°C and we were literally freezing. The driver and the staff on the buss didn’t speak English, communication was impossible. The driver listened loud disco music all the night till our arrival, at 3AM. Painful
Dirty, noisy and unpuntual

I did two tours with them. From phnom penh and back. Both ways were on time even though some streets were damaged because of the flooding. Both drivers did a good job. Wifi was working one way. Would recommend!
Everything was good. Except the duration. Is as usual 6-7 hours PP to Batambang. NOT 5 hours as advertise.
The driver was 1 hour late. The entire trip was insufferable due to loud music and several kids playing in the van with no seatbelt.
Good driver, quite on time, long trip but it went quite fast. Van didn’t have WiFi and seats were confortable but not too much space for legs for tall people.
An old bus with semi ok Aircon.  No real place to put the bags (stacked on top of seats in the front row.  We booked seats A1 and A2 but the bags were stored there.
The bus is not comfortable and we were scammed by the tour guide.

Great trip Batambang to Phnom Penh 7:30am Sunday.  Staff at Battambang were dissapointing very offhand. No drinks etc.   Time 5:28. best time for the trip which varies from 5:28 to 6:45  in my experience (8 trips over last 3 mo ths)
They arrived on time. However, they did not leave from the pier as mentioned, instead we were placed in a mini van and taken to a different place to boatd.
Good enough
Worst bus trip in cambodia. No space! Car got broken. The bus which picked us up after the other car was broken, was full of cockroach. So disgusting! Never again!
Nice trip.
Good Job Thank you

The journey was fine. The border was confusing but it happened. You should warn people as they get off the bus about the motorbike taxis waiting there to scam them. Someone drove me round then tried to charge 500,000vnd. Help keep your customers safe.

ស្នើរសុំឲ្យអ្នកបើកបរ មានការប្រុងប្រយ័ត្នខ្ពស់ ជាពិសេស មិនត្រូវបើក កញ្ឆក់​ៗ.​ គាត់បានបើកលឿន ហើយជាន់ប្រាំងកញ្ចក់ ចាប់តាំងពីសៀមរាប រហូតដល់ភ្នំពេញ ធ្វើអោយខ្ញុំ គេងមិនបាន ហើយ មានអារម្មណ៍ថា គ្មានសុវត្ថិភាព មានអ្នកខ្លះទៀត ស្រែកថាចង់ក្អួត គាត់នៅ តែប្រព្រឹត្ត ទៀត
Recommended bus to travel from PP to SR and SR to PP.  very clean bus, good driving and i just love it. Will use this mey hong bus again for next trip.

we spent 16 hours on the road. for this time there was 1 stop to eat. Instead of arriving at 7pm in Bangkok, we arrived at midnight. frustrated and tired, we lost a lot of time on the road. We hope that your service will be good in future
The bus was 1h delayed but it's compreensive because of the bad weather. The beds are too small for 1,80m peson and much smaller then the previous one I've taken.
The bus was 1h delayed but it's compreensive because of the bad weather. The beds are too small for 1,80m peson and much smaller then the previous one I've taken.
Good. But hard to contact to PP branch
The overall experience was okay. I asked the Inspector to drop us off somewhere then she agreed but she never dropped us off the requested point.
The van didn't have a working wifi. The seats were comfortable. No food was given in the trip.
On both trips the stop for food only had Cambodian food.  Even the potato crisps were all hot and spicy.   The only thing we could buy was soft drink!!
Just a bit insecure when the employee can't speak  English. But that's not  a big problem.
Their van from Phnom Penh to Battambang was excellent. Reach at 1pm which is ok. A lot better than my last bus ride from HCMC to PP with the same company.
ល្អ
Good driver, smooth journey (PP - SHV) but the road itself is bumpy and the traffic is tiring.
255 character is not enough to describe bad thing happen to my guest.
Nice, friendly, well organised bus service here. Recommended!
Great trip. Single bed to myself. Slept like a baby and woke up in Phnom Penh right near a coffee shop :)
Good service, the driver doesn't speak english, but we understood each other.
Over all is very good.. I had vip one,  and the driver is very nice,  humble,  and help us so much.. Thank you..

Very unhappy. We were not informed that the boat was going from another location so we missed it and had to wait 3 hours. I bought a ticket to SokSan beach but we were left at the main Koh Rong wharf and had to pay for 3 motorbikes to our destination.

Was quite a comical experience...a bus full of people heading the opposite direction had to go an hour south for me to be dropped off and I sat on a stool in the mini van because it was over packed but I got there with relatively good time
Bon trajet rien à dire et en plus sont venu nous chercher à notre hôtel. Bus vip un peu vieux et un peux moins confort que d’autre compagnie mais sinon rien à dire tout ok
The driver is lovely, yet this Van is a bit old and AC not work properly

If you enjoy the sight of oncoming death in the form of an 18 wheeler truck coming at you at over 70mph whilst you're overtaking a vehicle on the wrong side of the road, then this company is for you! Looking forward to doing it again tomorrow!
Minivan and very clean.  Comfortable seats and very good Aircon.

The trip was 1 hour late. From Phnom Penh to Ho Chi Minh, even if we did not yet reached the border, there was no stop over even for just few minutes for call of nature. The driver was very, very slow in driving. The inspector barely speaks english.
Good condition.
Very good service and attentive Inspector!
got there safely, thanks driver.  meal stop could have been shortened to a bathroom break, trip was 6 hours instead of the 4 1/2 as stated on the ticket.  Will use again

The driver picked us up on time. However, he drove very fast the whole way and was quite unsafe, passing many cars in a very dangerous way on the road. My wife and I were very worried we were going to crash. We arrived 1 1/2 hours late.

The driver picked us up on time. However, he drove very fast the whole way and was quite unsafe, passing many cars in a very dangerous way on the road. My wife and I were very worried we were going to crash. We arrived 1 1/2 hours late.

the passenger were transfer/transit in poi pet (to take another car to Bangkok) while we expect to take the direct VIP Van from PNH-BKK. This does not show or tell us in system.
Very troublesome.Pls correct this.
Very uncomfortable seats, the van arrived in over 5 hours instead of 4, many useless stops, WiFi did not work, not recommended
All good
It was quite nice overall, I will book again with your company if I travel by bus.
Excellent service!!

AIRCON WAS NOT WORKING PROPERLY, SMALL LEG ROOM, DRIVERS DID NOT UNDERSTAND AND SPEAK ENGLISH. Picture of the bus shown in bookmebus was not the same bus we were able to take. Only good thing was that they provided food for lunch. Overall bad experience.
Good option for travelling in Cambodia

Claims to be punctual and abides to Cambodia's traffic laws, it doesn't take 4 hours to go from S to PP, more 6! If overtaking on the other side of the road and driving at the speed of light is the law then so help me! Fly to Sihanoukville.

It is written in the bus station in Bangkok free tuktuk service to our hotel in SR. Our driver dropped us at our hotel, and asked for money because we did not book a tour in Angkor with him. Awkward situation, he asked for 100 THB we only had 40 THB left.
No complaints for the price I paid!
Left late but fast driver so still arrIved on time. The road from kampot to Sihanoukville is one of the worst roads I've ever seen but the driver navigated around the pot holes well

Overall I can’t complain. Yes, I bought one of the last tickets and sat at 11c next to the toilet door. Yes, my seatmate was big and didn’t use deodorant. Yes, there was a 1 hour delay at the border.. But it was $10 ticket and staff are nice and helpful.

The ride was fine and the driving was safe. The only hiccup was that there was a cockroach in the van...it just doesn’t inspire me to use Bayon, I did drive back to Sihanoukville with Bayon and the second ride, there wasn’t anything.
Very fast, comfortable service
No seat belt, one hour late, dangerous driving even upsetting local drivers. I wouldn’t choose CTT ever again. Only go with the Post van
Good experience with Mekong express.
Very good choice for travelling in Cambodia, good drivers,acon, wifi, town-center pick-up
Wrong seats given to what was on ticket booked. Driver not driving safely, side door flew open half way on trip. Arrived late
Wrong seats given to what was on ticket booked. Driver not driving safely, side door flew open half way on trip. Arrived late

Takes longer than advertised, driver dropped off before final stop which should be advised as tourists were confused and driver could not speak or understand English at all. Overall a pleasant experience.
The bus arrived at SR 1 hour earlier than expected. For day-time traveling it’s good, but for night-time traveling it’s difficult cuz there is nothing to do at 4am, but waiting for sun light.

1.Give me a wrong chair. Wrong ticket
2.Late for 1 hour
3. Spend too much time to arrive the location
4. There are a lot departure
5. No water 
6. When the bus stop, they didn’t tell. Or alert for a bathroom.

Very happy overall. Bus was clean and comfortable, excellent aircon, complimentary water included. 
Also arranged for free transfer to hotel in sihanoukville which was excellent (saved us from having to deal with tuk tuk mafia). Would recommend

The bus company is a bit disorganized because they didn't arrange the bus to pick us up in Kep as we purchased the ticket for, and we ended up taking the tuk tuk through a dusty road from Kep to Kampot. Then, the van broke down half way. So disappointing.
Delay too long
The bus from Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh was HOT and not comfortable at all.

The road is really bad at the moment but our driver did not really seem to care. Did not really feel safe while I don’t have any problems with that normale in minivans in Asia.. bus was also extremely old, received a water bottle though for what its worth
Really good and efficient journey!
Driver driving so fast and scare
The air con is very hot, sweating the whole 6 hours journey. Driver can’t speak English.
Staff not value customer who book by BookMeBus. Same price of $25 for ticket purchase from Virak Bunthan get more benefit than BookMeBus.
Comfortable bus, punctual service, free wifi on board and some complementry water for the trip! All good!
Efficient and professional service

We unfortunately missed our bus, due to a mistake on our part by not informing our driver of our collection point, but when we tried to rearrange and find a solution the driver on the end of the phone was extremely rude and hung up on me.

The driver kept inspecting the rear wheel before we left but didn’t do anything about it, then 20 mins into the journey we stopped and had to change vehicles. The 4 hour journey then took 6.5 so we missed our next transfer.

You sold me a 12 pm ticket to a full bus. virak buntham wasn’t notified in time so they just changed my ticket to 1 pm. It was also a mini bus, not a VIP van so I got in 2 hours late and missed my ride home so I had to pay for a hotel. Wouldn’t refund me.

The service provided by Mekong Express in Siem Reap was excellent. I booked tickets on the second level of the sleeping bus by accident but the inspector was really flexible and arranged seats on the 1st level for us (I get carsick so it helps a lot).

The service was okay. There was no water or cold towel. I wish the bus driver had told us what to do at the immigration gate. Our group just stood there without our passports not knowing what to do for more than half an hour or so.

The driver could have told us how long he was Gona stop for when during each break instead of sitting in the restaurant and all of us was standing outside. We got in within 5 years. Overall was alright

Dangerous driver. I asked the staff at sihanoukville office where i have to go to take the gtvc that is in my online booking with the van ticket, they told me to go with the driver to the pier.Got dropped off at wrong pier. Had to pay 5$ for a tuktuk.

No wifi in the van that was really old (paid the same price as for the newer ones) driver always on the phone while driving. Staff at offices need to improve their service and behaviour towards non cambodian speakers.
Not Professional, we bought 3 ticket online, seat no 3, 4, 5 but reality we at back seat. late almost 1 hour & to many stop.
some of the stuff are rude.
We travelled twice with Cambodia post, excellent service in both cases. Definitely recommended

we had booked a minivan and instead they gave us a bus. the accommodation was not bad but immediately at the beginning of the trip the air conditioning broke down. it was a terrible journey, an unbearable heat.
comfy van, stopped for breaks. ran a little late but not too bad.
Bus leaked and suitcase got wet. Other than that was fairly quick and easy.
Good, but please promote some discounts
I hope that the driver could slow down the speed of his driving. He should have considered about the safety of the travelers. It was too fast.
He was on-time and friendly. He let us stop for toilet and snack breaks too
The journey was good and comfortable. Our bus to Phnom Penh was late to arrive due to immigration taking about 2 hours but our bus to SIem Reap waited so it all worked out fine in the end.
The service girl is asking for 1$ for the visa process
It took me 30 minutes to clear immigration and customs but after that had to wait for almost one and half hour for the bus to leave.Please improve on the waiting time
We’ve been left in Poipet at 7 in the mirning without knowing where to go and with two strangers that wanted money for moving our suitcases.

Absolute disgrace. We arrived at CTT depot in Kampot where our transport had been cancelled without being informed. Me and my girlfriend were put into a car with 6 locals doing a good supply run to Sihanoukville. We had no idea what was happening. Furious
The driver was nice, the van was in good shape. We even arrived an hour ahead of schedule. Definitely recommend.
My seat on email number 07 but on car number 10. what happened ?

The person at the office confirmed of the 1HR prior pick up at the hostel a day before but the next day, no one came to pick me up. I went to the place myself and when I asked him about it, he just smiled. He was busy playing games with his phone.
The service is good but there is no amount written in your eticket that is why I cannot use to reimburse from our office

Overall service good, but in the E-ticket should add the location station departure and arrival destination. My experience, taxi driver asked me where the station I dropped u?I forgot, fortunately have a Thai guy help me to check and called to Virakbuthan
good service, a little bit late but not matter much, great!
Khai Nam has the first bus to depart in the morning - their service is fine. Seats not quite so spacious as Kumho, but tickets at $9 are cheaper.
Just make sure to provide ear buds , so that the engine and gear voice not break your ear drums.
Over all very good
Driving like crazy, to the death limit.
Well it is was good, the driver gets your passports and everything. And when in Ho chi Minh, if you let them know they might drop you to your or close to your hotel.
Everything is OK. Only Con is the Terminal. It says Mochit 2 but it is in Mochit Terminal right infront of it. Please change it. Thanks!
The van departed and arrived on time. The driver is professional. Great overall experience.

Meant to be picked up at hotel at 06:15 for the 07:00 minivan. No one came, had to get hotel to call twice. Came at 06:50. Driver ignorant and tried to get my g/f to move from the front seat, despite booking that one. Then wanted to drop us at wrong place
Handled the road works very well.

Rubbish and disorganised excuse for a bus company. Our bus booked for 11am was "cancelled" without notice, and we were put into the next bus 2.5hrs later. 2 bus changes & 3.5hrs late we arrived at our destination. Awful service with zero communication.
In other countries such as in Thailand and Indonesia, the agent has provided our meal. But here we must pay by ourself! Driver also can not speak english at all.

When it was  raining I toik a shower 
Check the windows seals
Perfect for me

Back seat was quite uncomfortable as the seats were high up and the space was little. But #9 and #10 was a lot better!
Drivers were very skillful so took only a little over 3h. Also satisfied with pick up service from the hotel I stayed :-)
Driver could not easily find our destination on the map. I had to direct him from my own device
Left Phnom Penh on time, we had 2 short breaks of about 10 mins each and arrived in Siem Reap an hour early! Good company, comfy bus and safe driver!

We left on time. The van was comfortable on terms of leg room. A stronger AC and working wifi will be helpful next time. Please ask the driver to take it easy on the speed. He is very helpful and accommodating. Overall a good experience.

Punctual but border crossing was awful. Guide told us we needed to give him money when we had organised e-visas in advance and said we would have to explain ourselves to the police - a lie! We were left for 45 mins at border without passports or any info!
Should upgred the accommodation.

The station has been the dirtiest one in our month here. No english in the office and neither the driver. It was a private old car. We left 30 minutes later and arrive 1 hour later too. The driver wanted some Usd for dropping us closer to hostel.
Trajet impeccable, rien à dire. Le départ n’était pas sur le ponton, mais un bus nous amène au bon endroit donc super! Au retour un peu de retard, mais vu la grosse pluie c'est normal!!
It took us 6.5hours not the advertised 4.. Other than that it was good

I was on the vip van that crashed into a moto on the early van, I was sitting up in the passenger seat next to the driver, I have lived most of the year in Phnom Penh, and the USA, the driver was at no fault , she ran into him, he did nothing wrong
Driver handled the traffic in a most safe and excellent manner. Lots of construction on hwy 5, but he took it in stride. Great experience!
Our driver was fantastic! Great trip!

We were very satisfied with your service. We booked a car from Pursat to Battambang. Thank you for arranging an earlier pickup than originally planned because of early train arrival! Driver and car was perfect!
Nice experience.. perfect for bus pp-sr.. just a bit small bus for hcm-pp

We enjoyed our comfortable trip from Kep to Phnom Pen. We left 10mins early. The driver was very good and dropped us at our accomodation which was not to far out of his way. Greatly appreciated as it was pouring with rain. Loved seeing other towns.

We enjoyed our comfortable trip from Kep to Phnom Pen. We left 10mins early. The driver was very good and dropped us at our accomodation which was not to far out of his way. Greatly appreciated as it was pouring with rain. Loved seeing other towns.
It's was good.
Always on time to reach the destination. The girl who’s assisting the passengers was very accomodating and nice.
On time, helpful & courteous staff, comfortable bus. Good service and highly recommended.
Very profesional driver! Always worried about the clients and was always in communications with the Hotel which arranged transfer to island
Very punctual and really good driver!!

free shuttle was not being arranged but we have requested via email and got reply saying no issue. Once we reached Phnom Penh, a day before we email the room number few times, no response. On travel day, only realized nothing wer arranged for whole trip!
Everything is ok excluding the driver. He is very bad.
It was a nice ride from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. The van was right on the schedule and the driver is friendly.
We availed the VIP-VAN that departed by 6:30am. Hassle free and comfortable seats, especially if you choose row 2.

Took 5.5 hrs not the 4 hrs as per timetable. Nice comfortable clean bus with 2 stops in the way. Driver drove well Cambodian style. Very happy. Also very helpful in trying to get us to our prebooked ferry on time.

everytihing on time
good driver
good service
Water from the aircon is already condensing. Also, they turned off the aircon from time to time. I dont know why. But it was a great ride
Driver was waiting for me with legible name sign. Car was clean although a bit dated. Will use them again.
Hi
Took 8hours due to rain and flooding but the driver was fantastic and dropped us off at our hotel
Picked up an hour late then arrived at a different pier from the one we left from and very poor communication
Picked up an hour late then arrived at a different pier from the one we left from and very poor communication

We needed to get from Siem Reap to Battambang and were told by locals that this is the best solution to that problem. The driver was excellent - a good balance of safety and speed. However, with the midway break, I doubt this route ever takes only 3 hours
Definitely a different twist to adventure, can improve on punctuality, but overall a nice experience
So good
The driver was speeding like crazy. No sense of responsibility for his customers at all. It was a horrible trip. I would never choose this company again.

I think it’s a way to expensive for that minibus. I booked a „super VIP“ transport and it was not even super... the seats are not really comfortable and 15 Dollar is a way to much if you compare it to the other companies... the bus driver is not friendly!
Fast and friendly, aircon worked well and very comfortable
Bus was ok, only people on it for last few hours and seemed to go long way to destination, over 1 hr late which isn't too bad for Cambodia
Viaggio perfetto,sedili comodi,AC e Wi Fi funzionanti,autista dalla guida sicura, ottimo prezzo puntuali.assolutamente consigliato
Viaggio perfetto,sedili comodi,AC e Wi Fi funzionanti,autista dalla guida sicura, ottimo prezzo puntuali.assolutamente consigliato.tratta PP Siem Reap

The whole trip took 1.5 hours less than planned. A 20 minutes stop for bathroom and food was included in the time. The bus is ok in terms of comfortableness but very clean. We got a complimentary water bottle. The driver was fast but overall safe.
Small space can not movement can not sleep

Maybe it's the way it's but our bus wasn't full and the driver picked up more passengers along the way to fill the seat which is fine to me but it came off as invasion of privacy to me and I think your company should know about this.
The driver is driving too fast. A long the road, we nearly hit the other people. And I felt like it is my last day on earth. One more thing, he is not friendly.
The taxi driver was very punctual at the airport and had a sign with my name which made it very easy to find him. We got to my hotel within 30 minutes. Thanks for the service!

I got an email confirming that we were going to be picked up at our hotwl, but only to be told in the end Kumho Samco Bus Lines refused to do so. Hadn’t I called the bus company, we could have missed our ride! I am very disappointed!

The company is very responsible. I recieved an upgrade with same price due to fully booked of bus company I was booking with. The booking process is simple and conviniece. I will surely book again via bookmebus.com

This trip was a 12 seater van, old, Aircon feeble, seats close together and not obvious how to recline. Driver a bit risky and drinking far too many energy drinks. PS big road works for half the trip.
Air-conditioning in bus didn't work well, was very warm. Driver stopped for longer than usual and stopped 3 times, delaying arrival time.
Another great trip. All ways look to book bayon vip when in Cambodia, maybe a loyalty discount would be a good idea for loyal customers.
Trip takes longer than expected. No clear instructions regarding border crossing but assistance is still provided with some delays.
Great hospitality but actually i dont get seat i booked. Fortunately there are empty seat so i managed to hop on the bus.
Only took 3 hrs and pick up was on time. Dropped off at central location which is great. All our Mekong vip transport was very clean and comfortable with adequate service stops.

The Cat mekong express website stated that if it's a direct bus, there was no need to get off the bus while on  the borser. But we alighted at the Vietnam border and waited aimlessly until somebody called a passenger's name.

Made two stops along the way: a 20-minutes one and a 5-minute one. Had time to have lunch and go to the bathroom. The ride was smooth and fast, but we made some random non-justified extra-stops along the way. Arrived about 1 hour earlier than scheduled.

Could have been 5 stars, but the girl attendant was a little snub, not friendly, and not even smiling, unlike the first attendant we've encountered riding your bus from Phnom Phen to Siem Reap (very friendly and accommodating).
Almost perfect
Nive driver, patience and on time

The road is still a bit rough and bumpy & one lane each way means you get stuck behind slow traffic too much. Still, the driver did a good job and we arrived in 5 1/2 hrs, which wasn't too bad at all.
Bus was due to set off at 10 30, the driver sat outside the bus smoking until around 11 30. Had two break stops on the way which lasted too long and again the driver was just smoking the whole time
Very good service. Punctual, nice staff.  They give you water and some bakery food. I recommend it!
Just the bed is too small for two people.
The bus departed Siem Reap on time but there was 45 min delay in reaching Battambang, without any particular traffic jam or accident during the journey.

The bus departed Battambang on time but there was more than an hour delay in reaching Phnom Penh.  There was some traffic jam because of the large trucks from the construction sites at the outskirt of the city, but one hour's delay was not acceptable.
I cancelled my booking. Will my $ be refunded ?

Rude and irresponsible staff, their talk are like shit
Will never go and ride that fucking bus again
good!
Git rip off by driver but it is an experience
Too many stops. No electric on the bus. Seats too close together.
The best bus company in cambodia
The bus did not arrive anywhere near the stated time when we booked the ticket

Outstanding service and unbelievable for the price.  I was a single girl travelling solo and felt 100% safe.  The driver even took care to make sure I knew how long breaks were and drove very well (for Asian standards). Don't fly - take the post bus!!!

The trip started 1h late cause they were waiting for more people. Tire exploded but the replacement tire was too low on air so he had to LEAVE us on the side of the road in the dark in the middle of NOWHERE to go get it pumped. UNSAFE OVERALL! WORST EVER

This is a very good service. Value for money.
Phnompenh - Siem reap and vise versa it takes only 5hours. provide free water and wifi service as well.
Fully satisfied with this service.
Everything is nice and accepted to me :-)
The trip is good and the service is awesome

wev did not use the service as you lost our booking, s o i hace lost money becausrnof yoy poor company and lack of service we calked three times and each time yoy coukd notvfind oyr booking absolutely disgracefull and pathetic
Driver is so friendly, pickup on time, We strongly recommend to other traveller.
2 hours delay  for arriving, over customers, change car  and 45 minutes waiting on the way, all is without enough explain.
The bus was quite dated. The food that was provided was okay. The restaurant that we were taken to was essentially a tourist trap. It took a really long time to pass through immigration.
The service was excellent, they provided bottled water and pastries which is great.. i just think that the seats were a bit uncomfortable and a little small but overall its okay
The whole trip was very comfortable, leg room are spacious, they also offer bottled water and snack. would recommend it..
Responsible and safe driver. Much appreciated
Very good service as usual. Being the only passenger on the bus was even better!
Long trip. 7am to 1pm.  They said 5 hours but driver did his best although the last stop to wash the van was unnecessary
We really like the trip and food was good and tour guide Fa was excellent. Really humble and nice.
very comfortable trip! a bit cold in the van though so think about taking a sweater!
Recommended this bus service, compare to other company I believe Mekong Express is more establish and reputable for their service.
Excellent

We had had a good trip, everything was all right.
Although it was delayed due to unsuitable condition of the originally on duty driver to proceed, nevertheless reassigning another driver was a safety move.
Thank you very much for serving, it’s good to re open again for night running PHN- BTB - PHN

Yesterday afternoon was my first ride from HCM to PP by mini van and it was much better than expected.
The ride was pretty fast, formalities also, the guide at the border really helped and was nice.
I recomand!

Not particularly impressed with my experience. I understand the quality of Cambodian roads is poor, but the driver drove far too quickly. The bus was pitching/rolling around, like it would overturn. I felt so unsafe that I have booked a taxi for my return

You put online only 4h for travelling but it almost 6h. Your company should respect the customer time prepare your van before departure time not 6:30 leave just prepare the van and still pickup customer. And your driver stop to take guest along the road.

The van departed 1hr late + we spent 1/2 hr circulating the city to pick up more passengers, which made us hit rush hour in Phn P. We finally arrived 4 hrs late. The driver made crazy overtakings, AC worked poorly and no space for my legs on the back row.
Thank you for making the trip comfortable!

Very bad service. we were promised a water bottle, cake and Towel. None of them were given. Also, we were drenched in rain and the driver put the AC in very cold temperature, everyone was shivering, no proper help in handling visa. Overall very bad
Good and reliable, when service and communication might have been more extensive and with a smile, it would have been perfect.

Stuff on bus so rude
Bus smell like shit 
Departure time is not accurate
I very much enjoyed the ride and serviced provided.

- None of the drivers are speaking english
- None of them want to help you
- Don't care to announce the stop
- It was not my first time with Virak and I also had some little troubles but this time I just arrived 100km away from my hotel .... Very nice

Especially the stop half way with the very nice restaurant was great.
One star less for accomodation: chairs are somewhat narrow for West Europeans, and believe us we're not  fat ?
The drive was alright. The driver seemed to speed at some points but he seemed to know the road at the same time, so this was alright. We arrived roughly on time. The Wifi was good.

We were leaving to early and so didn't hit bad traffic. So if you book with Cambodia Post VIP Van, be there 20 minutes before the departure time. There is a lot of construction going on on the road from Battambang to Sisophon (Siem Reap). Safe driver!

Phnom Penh-Battambang. The driver was not what I was used to know from the Post Bus. Usually it's a comfortable ride with them. But this time not at all. He was driving too fast and to close to other vehicles. We arrived 15 minutes to early...
Excellent
Nice friendly driver, and very kind. Easy ride, even in heavy traffic.
Great service. Just took longer than expected. Took the 1pm bus that was to arrive at 7. We did not make it till after 8pm
Nice experience
Okay company. But the driver drove very irresponsible and kept talking on the phone very loud.
We had bad luck and were sticking direktly in Phnom Penh in a traffic yam. Not fault from driver but we had more than 2hours delay. Other wise good service.
Stopped for toilet break then again 20min later for lunch at 10:30 in the morning at what’s seemed like a mates restaurant who had asked him to stop there to get more business ?
Nice and early no messing around here . My advise get to your bus stop 30 minutes before departure and don’t drink to much water on the bus as he only stops once
Nice and early no messing around here . My advise get to your bus stop 30 minutes before departure and don’t drink to much water on the bus as he only stops once
Very good: clean, safe, and fast!
Driver easy to locate. Clean vehicle. Very satisfied
The bus was super clean, they provided us pillows and blankets, and even water & crackers. Would definetely recommend to anyone travelling in Cambodia!
On time, good leg room and overall comfort

Ponctuel et efficace. Climatisation et wifi à bord.
Musique khmer en fond sonore, mais cela ne nous a pas empêché de dormir malgré nos placement aux dernières places arrières

The bus that i book is sleeping bus and the timing and location is good. But i want to complaint is the bus compressor have water leaking and the driver and assistant was not helpful at all. They didn't help me solve the problem and i need to do myself.

overall is quite ok, just the van keep stop and fetch roadside ppl to earn some money. It make me fell uncomfortable. Just like when you just wanted to take a nap then the van will stop and fetch ppl up again.
Left on time at 9.30 from PP but took 6 hours to Sihanoukville. We were taken to the ferry port free of charge, which was very  kind and very handy in the pouring rain.
Left on time at 9.30 from PP but took 6 hours to Sihanoukville due to traffic. We were taken to the ferry port free of charge, which was very  kind and very handy in the pouring rain.
Van driver doesn't know how to speak english, but the sleeper bus to siem reap is so comfortable. I slept well.
the bus was oke but old. the trip took us over 6 hours to get there. when we arrived they wanted to take us to the hotel for 5$ more, after they where late.

The driver picked us up from the airport with no problem. He was driving very experienced and safe. He even found my cellphone after I lost it and brought it back to my hotel. In summary I can only recommend the company and their good service
Great bus ride! Only complaint was the border system could have been explained better (they just took our passports and pointed to the border building). Everything else was great though!
Highly recommended
there was no wifi , no toilet although they should be equipped as reservation web page

My friend has forgot a power bank charger for mobile phone on bed 3A in bus from phnom penh to siem reap at 11:30pm on 3rd Oct. Please help me to find it and inform me via email: my.luong.ng.1293@gmail.con
Fyi These sleeper buses are double occupancy, meaning that 2 people share every bunk! Know this before you book
Punctual, clean, driver wasn't as aggressive as usual minibus drivers and still arrived on time. Highly recommended
Conducción un poco arriesgada a veces pero dentro de lo normal en Camboya.
Very easy to book and pay online. Very pleased with this service.
My booking number which you give to  Seila Angkor was wrong. Plz aware about this!

The trip is advertised as 3 hours -- in my case from 2 pm to 5 pm. This is highly impossible. The real time is 4 hours. Everything else was fine -- service, comfort, etc. But passengers must be aware that the trip will surely take longer than advertised.
El conductor más precavido que otros, forguneta en buen estado, aire acondicionado ok
Very nice and comfortable transportation ! I'll remember and recommend.

Nice outbound from Phnom Penh to Kampong Cham but scary way back as the driver runned much too fast with strictly no consideration to other vehicles, spending his time honking and forcing others to fall hastily. So heaven then hell experience

The trip itself was very well. Good driver, short restroom break, clean car.
Only, we were supposed to be picked up at our hotel which didn‘t happen.
Excellent
When I got back it looked like my bag had been opened and thrown in the rain. It was wet and dirty.
This trip is definitely not four hour I would plan on 6-8 hours to be safe.
Best service
It was a lovely experience! Save Driving, very friendly driver and guests, very comfortable bus
Maybe good for foreigner but not for Cambodian. 2 hour when cross border, due to Visa process, all cars not the same, some comfort n some bad smell
The reception staff was so good and help me to change bus reservation time. but driver is dangerous.
The driver was on the phone the whole trip!! His was driving like his soul was not with his body.
Very best service serving.
The bus was old, but space for sit are bigger than normal bus. I confuse bus station, between ticket counter and bus station, it should be have a car transfer from ticket counter to bus station.

I book a window seat in advance in the Internet but needed to change it without any asking by your staff due to another family asked a staff to assign my original seat and got the permission without my permission. It was literally unprofessional...
We left late but the ride was ok. Driver drove nicely and safe.
The bus was broken and we have to wait almost 2hours and not all passengers got evacuated at the same time.

The bus was late. If you were to book anything afterward, do not chose this company. Most important of all THERE WERE NO SUCH THING AS SEATING NUMBER. The bus conductor ask you to seat where ever they want. It is so Frustrating.
Punctuality is not good...

We purchased a VIP van due to departure and arrival time.  On arrival we were told things are running late.  What they didnt say was you vip van is not coming but in 1 hr you will be put on a bus to make the trip. Should have afford us a discount but nope
It took about 2 hours to clear immigration and customs on the vietnamese side. Why? This made the trip extremely frustrating and tiring. If not for that, the trip would have been much better.
great driver, very safety conscious
Excellent service, very happy.

I booked a minivan, but they had a big bus. I have a broken leg and had specifically booked the seats in front. Champa did not consider any compensation, and also went to Vietnam first. After 7 years in KH, I know that better service is available.
Can we change our booking on our way back tp PP?
Can we change our booking on our way back tp PP?
Trip took 8,5 hours. Could have little bit more legroom, though not a problem when you have average height.
terrible traffic jam and crowed immigration took 12hours to ho chi ming !!
Departure time should be more accurated. The ticket said leave at 8:30 but actual at 9. Must fill the tank before leave. Take passenger along there way also annoying.
Cleanliness need to be improved inside bus n pillow n mattresses.

The driver was so dangerous.
When turning left corners, he would drive entirely in the wrong lane, even on blind corners. He also overtook cars when going up hill and sped constantly. Very unsafe!

I don’t know what “inspector” means in this context. 
The driver was nice and on time. Sometimes he drive a little recklessly when overtaking other cars. We are Europeans and not used to that kind of driving I think.

I don’t understand what “inspector” means. The driver was excellent. He drove calmly and safely. However, unfortunately there was no seatbelt for three people in the back seat. For us, that was a big problem but we hadn’t pointed it out. So our fault.

Absolute nightmare. Almost missed the ferry to Koh Rong because the 5 hour drive from Phnom Penh took SEVEN hours instead. We had two flat tires (driver hit every pothole in Cambodia) and then stopped for a “rest” even though we were already running late.

The trip itself was great. The double decker was very comfortable and had a washroom. But the inspector should have been more clear on the stops that the bus would make in Bangkok. I missed mine because he didn't announce
Better than average by Cambodian standards. Typical aggressive driving but the driver did leave exactly on time and we only arrived half an hour late

Worse than average by Cambodian standards. I arrived at departure terminal 15 min early and saw 2 vans pull away early, with no communication with inside staff. Ended up taking another bus 45 min later. At least they provide bottled water and a towel
Really great!

Hello, 
Our driver was 40 minutes left and dropping point was not the one on the confirmation. 
We arrive at 1:00 AM. 
The driver did all deliveries package before dropping us off.

Hello, 
Our driver was 40 minutes left and dropping point was not the one on the confirmation. 
We arrive at 1:00 AM. 
The driver did all deliveries package before dropping us off.

A truly terrible experience. Bus filled with strong fumes and smoke but the driver wouldn’t stop until half of the bus was choking. It then stopped by the side of the road. No attempt to apologise. Waited 3 hours. Left PP 10am arrived 10.30pm. No meals!
Still the best of the minibus companies in Cambodia, even though we arrived late on this trip. Friendly bus driver, safe driving
The worst bus journey of my life. 13 hours on a bus with no toilet. I will never use this company again.

ARRIVED 3 HRS LATE DUE TO CONGESTION AT THE VIETNAMESE BORDER?/ NO ABC SNACKS ? I AM  A REGULAR TRAVELER EVERY 3  MONTHS ALL IN-ALL USUAL GOOD STANDARD THE SEAT CUSHION ON A1 MITSUBISHI BUS A BIT THIN .CANT WAIT TILL FLEET ALL NEW  THANKS FOR THE USUAL GO
All went accordingly to get us through the border.
Old bus, too long trip

The address on the website is wrong, so I wasted my time and my money going to the incorrect place. Then you cancelled my trip cause you got “problems with the air conditioner of the van”. So I had to wait 3 more hours to go in a horrible bus from another
Seat No.15 very uncomfortable. Seat was very hard. 30 mins later for departure. AC was fairly ok.

The bus itself was comfortable and spacious, what should have been a 4 hour trip was over 7! The bus was late to start with, we proceeded to have not 1 but 2 flat tyres during the trip. To top it off we got dropped off to location different to informed.

He always pick up the other guests along the way.
Stop for lunch unsuitable time and didn’t care about foreigners who can’t eat local foods.
The drive stopped to many location to pick you passengers. Also he stopped in betwen to purchase his own along the road side
No border immigration delay issue this time.

Good driver, comfortable seat, fast wifi. I had a trip from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh (11:30) which supposed to be 4 h. We arrived in 3h55mins even though we had 3 stops. Defiantly recommend you the Bayoun VIP bus.
It was a great travel :)
There were so many people who rode on/ off on the way, so we arrived 2hours late. I’ll never use Mekong express.

Bus left precisely on time and has all the necessities for a comfortable trip - aircon worked well, reclining chairs & free water bottle was appreciated. However the driver does do multiple stops on the way to pick up locals.
The driver from Kamput was very disrespectful. The bus was not on time. We got to PhnomPenh 2 hours delay. The worst company.
Your company is very careless with the customer. You change our seat without getting an agreement from us. I really disappointed both your company and car company.
