The car that drove me back was too old, the air-condition didn't work; therefore, I sweated from Siemreap to PP. You should fix it.
Worst service, very lousy transport , pls avoid , if you can

Changed driver on morning of pickup resulting in late  pick up.   No issue with driver who showed up.   Would probably not book a taxi with you again.  Better service from our taxi guys. I did not have accomodation or inspector

Traveled PP-SHK right before PchumBen holiday at 7.30am so expected some delays. Rode in new Ford van very comfortable. Driver was good and careful. A lot of traffic going out of city due to holidays.Took 6 hours to arrive to SHK. A bit slow but safe.
Good driving and be on time. Thank
Great service
Fast and safe
Very good just we arrive 1hours late but no matter, all was very good and the driver offer the water
The bus is a bit old and during the travel there is water lacking from the air-con.
Ride was good especially compared to other companies (like Olongpich!! So bad) Stopped at a cute coffee place on the way and arrived in Siem with only 1hour delay.

The driving was too dangerous, we were really scared and couldn’t complain because the driver didn’t understand English. The rest was ok but safety is first, so I would not recommend traveling with this company.

The service is fine, the departure was actually on time but the vip van was kind of old and when it drived, it made a lot of noices. It looked new from outside but not the inside. So it was really like I was taking a normal 42 seats old bus, not a VIP one

Company forgot to tell the driver to pick 2 other guests on the way (don't know, just my theory). Driver was kinda too fast on the hole filled road. Huge traffic (no ones fault). So from original 4hrs it became 7hrs. But overall it was good. Recommend.

First we book the seat but they changed our seat without no good reason. So we feel so hot in the back of the car. Second the car didn’t stop in the right place (arrived place). So I pay more money for tuk tuk.
Cleanliness n air cond to be improved
Buses should be renewed soon

I booked mini van at 6:30am but the car arrived at 7am. The seatbelt did not work. Flat tire along the way and we were transffered to bus. It took 8 hours to arrive in Ho Chi Ming. One of the bad experience i had so far.

Very happy with the service received.
Very comfortable mini van

Don't know what I'm meant to mark about Inspector? What inspector? 
And had no accommodation booked through you?
Friendly and helpful staffs. When we reach Siem Reap the staff was helpful snd assist us to contact our hotel which was late for pick up

Mekong Express should make it clear that they no longer take passengers to their final destination for free, and they don't pick up on holidays. Also, drivers make extra money picking up passengers along the way, taking the rest of us on long detours.
Was all good, just a bit too hot in the van.

Took SHK-PP. Typical local "VIP": poor condition of van, seats are hard, suspension is nonexistent, AC struggled to cool, driver is Formula 1 racer. Only plus is we made it in 4 hours, which is the fastest time I've seen so far. Risky shaky rollercoaster.

the travel was much smoother than anticipated, didn't seem as long as it did.  We did accidentally leave our camera on the bus, and unfortunately
nothing was turned in.

I like the hospitality from ticketing staff, car was clean and comfortable to sit and take a nap. However, I did not like the driver at all. He drove too fast and made all passengers almost got car sick and I could not close my eyes to sleep too.
Good service
To small, no water, no wifi, bus to mondulkiri was even worse, driver to fast
Good
Good
Wifi was not working. You’re lucky if yours does.
One of the best bus companies in cambodia .. but a bit expensive than other ?

Our driver was driving like hell, talking twice on the phone and one tire blew. Luckily enough we had some Indian guys on the bus to make sure that the replacement tire was well installed. After the almost accident the driver kept on driving like hell.
It's a good bus company,would recommend to anyone.
Seat space is a bit tiny and uncomfortable, driver drives over the speed limitation, won't recommend at all.

The way of driving is acceptable but aircon doesn’t work cooler, it becomes hot more and more. Better improve or check everything before departure. The way of greeting and served passenger isn’t so polite or be respectable.

The company was not welcoming. The toilet there was filthy and they didn’t give us toilet paper. Not enough room. One couple left after 10 min of drive because of space. The driver then picked up some locals from the street who brought foul smelling food

Our bus with Mekong express from Phnom Penh to Battambang went smoothly with no delays. We got to our destination in just over 5 hours with a short toilet/food stop half way. Although the driving was fast we felt safe at all times. Would recommend

Very friendly staff at TCT's offices in Sen Monorom and Phnom Penh. Relaxed and concentrated driver from Sen Monorom to Phnom Penh. Arrival in Sen Monorom was always late, so maybe plan a bigger buffer between arrival and departure at Sen Monorom.

Very friendly staff in TCT's offices. Experienced driver. Punctuality was affected by public holidays. Not company's fault. The driver probably tried to catch up with the delay in last section, which led to breakneck speed on the winding mountain route.

The stewardess complained a lot about 2 Westerners that were supposedly drunk and being loud. Nothing was said to the Westerners but the lady constantly complained in Khmer. Somebody should have talked to the Westerners instead of complaining

I was well pleased with Mekong Express and highly recommend them as your choice of transport between Siem Reap and Battamang,  the travel route I used.  I understand they also go to Phnom Penh, and I WI use their services if I return to visit Cambodians.
The service and punctuality were terrible. Had to wait a couple hours for the bus. Then they said we get a private taxi, the bus is going straight to Phnom Penh.

absolutely the best ride that I have experienced in Cambodia.  Everything was 5 star.  Highly, highly recommend this company over all others. 
Not even close.
Good, recomend
No WIFI, No space to keep baggage, No clearly information, Opened Cambodian song too loud, out of order toilet bowl in Phnom penh

Well scheduled and on time. Efficient and safe Internet booking.  
Bus is a bit old and vegetarian option should be added for lunch. 
Overall very recommended
1 000 000 mosquitoes inside the bus was not a very nice experience. Othervise ok, as you'd expect!
Good driver, friendly. Thank for a comfortable trip ?
Nice Traveling To Siem Reap and Nice Bus

Took PP-Mondulkiri. Decent ride, no issues, no delays, was a Ford van, a bit worn out, but with good AC, ok seats and ok legroom. Could improve by allowing to book specific seats online like other bus companies.
The ride to Kampot was pleasant. The driver was prompt and drove safely.
Everything was fine. There was about 30 minutes delay due to traffic in Phnom Penh.

Was a good bus trip for Cambodia. Left a little late, drops you off far from the city (too far to walk, Tuk Tuk drivers waiting like predators) but otherwise was pretty nice. Comfortable, relatively clean for Cambodia, I’ve had much much worse.
Leave on time but arrived in Phnom Penh very late. Driver talked a lots. Air-con did not work well from half way. I felt almost run out of oxygen!

Bus broken before departure, waiting 1 hour at bus stop until we were told to get on another bus from a different company. Booked a VIP van and got a coach! Took 2 hours more than it should have. Wouldn't recommend, not reliable
Driver drove very nicely but did not arrive on time.

I and my family took Ekreache from Kompot to Phnom Penh. The seats were OK. The driver was good on the day, nothing wrong. The getting on broad place is easy to find and the dropping off point as well. Only one that the space for luggage is not big enough

Good trip, very nice driver.
Too cold in the bus, aircon on full blast.

VIP van
Very good trip!

Toilet in Siem-Reap is available even doesnt facilitated, why bus driver stop to buy something in Petro station nearby Phnom-penh riverside 15 mins (no information announced)
Phnom-penh office toilets is available but Wifi is not quited good signal.
Good service
Good service

It's good but when I select seat, got other seat not my selection. 
Thanks

We were part of the bus collision that happened Oct 14, 2018..We were seating on the 2nd row and I felt the impact. As per the people seating on the first row the driver was usinv his phone while driving. It was a very traumatic experience. Never again.
BUS QUALITY CAN BE IMPROVED
BUS QUALITY CAN BE IMPROVED
Driver was great to me to my destination safe and sound even though we went through a torrential thunderstorm
I really liked that you could change my ticket at no extra charge when I realised I booked the bus for the wrong day.
What a horrible experience I have never been so sick in my life I fill 2 bags of vomit NEVER again!!!!!

Our driver was on his phone and speeding, which resulted in a bus crash in the evening. 2 people in the other car died, and we have yet to be compensated or reached out to by Mekong Express regarding the terrible crash that we endured. It was terrible.

Highly recommend this company. We were late arriving at the bus station (15 min) due to my luggage being the last to get at baggage claim. The station called the driver and pulled on the side of the road while the taxi driver drove us to the bus.
A good trip apart from the kms of roadworks outside Battambang. Sigh
A good trip apart from the kms of roadworks outside Battambang. Sigh
A good trip apart from the kms of roadworks outside Battambang. Sigh
Experienced driver, overall a good ride

Very punctual service and good driving. water bottles were provided. It's a short journey so only one toilet break was scheduled which is understandable. I will continue to use their service for sure.

If you want to go directly to Phu Quoc, I advise you to contact directly Champa Mekong to book tickets. You don't have to go to Kampot, they will bring you directly to the border with Vietnam. In the ticket is included van + boat = 28$ 
Very good service

The bus is not what we expect as it seen in the website. It is old scrapped iron chamber that equipped with  wheels with crooky running all the way from beginning to the destination. The staff giving poor service. At worst , the bus die on the way.

He drove really fast and it was a bit scary. We got pushed off the road at high speed when he wouldn't yield to an incoming driver that was passing another vehicle. He saw it coming and didn't slow down.
2 hours late on the first journey and then over an hour on the return. No WiFi, no water

Bus for the second time did not reach its destination, this time again the clutch broke but at least we made it to Phnom Penh, the last time I went the bus broke down 2km before the ferry 5 years ago we had to walk, would not recommend this company
It was a really great experience I did not expect to have.
We paused very little time and the driver was driving extremely fast

I assume the attendant on the bus is the inspector. He was rude, snarky, and did not give us any information on what was happening at any point on the trip. He also tried to make us give him $10 for the visa, which we did not need to give at the border.
Very smooth trip, left from Siem Reap and arrived to Phnom Penh ahead of schedule! Driver was good, the bus was comfortable, and the WiFi even worked (part of the trip)! Would recommend this company.
The driver was very professional. He made sure we were as comfortable as possible.
Excellent. Will definately book again.

The driver was good, safe etc however the bus was unclean (there were fruit seeds on the ledge next to my seat from a previous passenger) and the back of the bus was hot and smelt strongly of exhaust fumes.
Good as usual. Comfortable Ford van with AC. Departed and arrived on time. Driving was decent, nothing crazy. Best option for Mondulkiri.

Everything ok. The inspector was terrible, she argued over the state of a $20 bill asking for another & that we need to exchange it & when at the border we were sent to the back of the queue by the guard she asked us why we're late and told us to hurry up
The AC doesnt work at all and it super hot from kampot to PP. Please fix it

Great driver. More aggressive passing on highway than most foreigners might expect but was always careful and never took risks. Didn't know where we needed to be dropped but we figured it out. Great system to be able to call company if we had a question.

I don’t know what inspector means.
Unfortunately, we found that the driver was sometimes driving a bit recklessly and a few times we even got scared when he overtook other cars. 
I would not recommend him therefore.

The company was good. But there is something dark in the aduana check. We know that the real cost for the entrance to Cambodia is 30$ and the driver and “his friends” make bussines charging 35$. What think the Mekong Express about that?
It was good.
Driver was a very good and safe driver.  On time, very comfortable.  great service.  I don't know what the Inspector category means
Late arrival at pickup. Had to call office which was no problem with the information provided. Once mistake got cleared, the service was flawless.

The lady collecting passports in the bus said because I have e-visa I must pay 5 dollars or my passport will be kept at the border.She couldn’t explain in English why I need to pay any extra money, she was rude and unprofessional. I do not recommend
It was good.
It was good.
#NAME?

Left on time. Pick up was exactly where was stated, as was drop off. Don't get a tuk tuk when they drop you off, is just a five minute walk to the pier down the hill. Driver never said a word the whole journey but wasn't rude.

Left and arrived on time. 
But confusing once on the pier. Make sure you check in with the staff before your time to get on boat. Staff were fine and boat was a good standard!
The minivan left on time but the journey took too long due to the driver making frequent stops for snacks and to pick people up on the roadside.

Trajet agréable avec un personnel qui nous guide à la douane 
Je recommande
Didn’t drop at the designated bus stop. Just somewhere walking street.
Bus stop at the tourist trap. Free sim card but you need to top up 500 baht. What a scam.

Ride absolutely fine. BUT we were dropped off outside of centre (incorrect location) as driver wanted his mates in tuk tuks to make a fare from us as well. After harassment from tuktuk drivers kind Cambodian man forced driver to continue to centre....
Very punctual & comfort for the long journey
This was a quick comfortable service with no issues at the border.
Good service

We got one of the older buses in the fleet. It was comfortable and clean including the toilets.

We didn't like the place where the bus stopped. I would recommend people bring their own snacks. Also terminal in phnom Penh not convenient to the centre.

Mini-van with comfortable, reclining seat.  My first time on Cambodian roads, so as a Westerner all I can say is that the driver was much less hairy than the Cambodian average, in particular overtaking was fairly safe. Terrible traffic delayed us by 2h.

Not a pleasant journey. 100% recommend buying two seats so you get a bed to yourself. It's only a single so if you get a fatty next to you like me it's pretty grim. Also get the top bunk not bottom, more space. got from a to b though, two hours early!
We had a pleseant journey. Bus was on time and the estimated time was also right. I would recommend going with the vip bus from kampot to phnom penh.
Much more leg space than in a western bus. Friendly staff. Bus was pretty much on time. No crazy driving. Would book again.

The Lady Inspector is VERY RUDE & disrespectful when the Bus that we rode last Oct18, 2018 stopped at Phnom Penh because of engine breakdown. It was very hot inside the bus & we were asked to wait for 20 minutes but the rescue bus arrived after an hour.
We arrived SR earlier than expected which is a good thing for me. I will book the same company next time.
The trip was smooth. The bus is on time. Seat is comfortable, air conditioner is working good. Seatbelt is available for all the passenger. Thanks!
There was a mixup with the type of car we booked and they arrived with a 4 seater car instead of 12 seater van. They did a great job of getting the new vehicle within 15 minutes.
Still the problem with pick ups in the way, but every company is doing it...so, I just accept it..
The address for departure is wrong. They didn’t respect our seats numbers, they were late and took around 4 hours.
good service

We booked well in advance, confirmed bus with confirmed seats in 1A & 1B, however bus was apparently broken-lack of passengers? I work in Tourism industry in Canada.  Seats not applicable, back of van with others, uncomfortable.  Believe others paid less.
Old VAN but still acceptable.

You guys really need to get your shit together. I spent over 3 hours at 5am waiting for a connection from Phnom
Penh to kampot with the guy saying "it will be here in 10 minutes".

Deluxe Bus is quite clean.
At Poipet, only I was told to across and find another bus by my self. I hope more kind info.

Female conductor on board bus 3E-2041 spoke little English. Microphone was on echo mode, thus inaudible. Air conditioning far too cold, nothing done when mentioned. Extra $5 demanded at the border in addition to $30 visa, she threatened to remove our bags
Everything was ok. I've forgotten my glasses on the bus and got them back thanks to the Inspector, who was generally very supportive. I hope my other ride to SR goes as smooth.
Chauffeur conduisant vite et doublant sans cesse même dans les virages ..
Booked the VIP 28 seater bus but the 40 seater bus came instead. Bus is old and dirty. Very disappointed with the bus and we paid more for the VIP 28 seater option.
I had a rather bad experience with Mekong Express. Got overcharged for "border fees" and we arrived in Saigon 2hrs later than expected. Would not recommend.

Ridiculous service as it was not a VIP Van service, driver made more 10 stops  pickup local customers along the way. For whoever want to book with Post VIP Van, please think carefully before spend your money with them.
Very ponctual, meet&greet service at the airport, impeccably clean. Highly recommend.
Much appreciated for the customer service, helpful and responsive!
Stops w/o notice

Driver made detours to pick up soup for his personal use. Also driver talked on his phone and was distracted the entire time making the drive even longer. I take Mekong because your driver are fast and pay attention to the road. He DID NOT

The divers from poi Pet to Phnom Penh too bad they stop to get morn passengers even the bus are full . That night I can’t sleep because they are talking so lourd even I told them to make quite but they make more louder!!
I don't no what is ment by inspector
Driver picked  me up at Kep on time but stopped over for 45 minutes at Kampot to pickup other customers. Plus traffic,  bumpy road and 20 minutes break, so it took me 5hrs to get back to Phnom Penh.

Really comfortable and clean. Drives were really lovely. The only suggestion would be, with the change over of cars in Phnom Penh. I would suggest a that the car swaps happens outside of the city centre so the cars are not caught up in traffic.

The trip was good except for the driver that stop more or less every hour because he was a smoke Addictive!!.. but the price is cheap and the van was good condition!!.. at the end we made it to the capital on time . So overall good to use the post office
Lack of communication. Bus poorly maintained. Staff at departure not interested in helping. Do I need go on....
Excellent. Safe. Travelled with our 9 and 10 year old daughters, no issues at all.

It’s a long drive but we travelled with our 9 and 10 year old and felt totally safe. Take in the scenery and it goes quicker. Our car had air con to help. Driver stopped when asked for refreshments. Great experience, the roads are not as bad as reported.
Ferry excellent. Safe. Travelled with our 9 and 10 year old. No issues. Would use again.
Efficient, reliable and fast. Highly recommend! :)
I enjoyed my trip and the bus stops were timely and well placed. The seats were a little small but still ok.
We arrived on time. The drive was smooth. Inspector was helpful. Toilet was quite dirty though. Overall a nice experience.
The service provided was excellent. We were very happy with the service.
Overall good van service. However this trip takes over 6hrs not the 4hrs advertised.
Delay from 11AM TO 12.

Our bus at 1.30 was cancelled and we were not emailed to be informed of this, we wasted time and money having to come back at 3.30 and almost missed the bus we had booked separately from Ha Tien to hcm. We would like s refund for our inconvenience.
It would be nice to know what is happening on the border the lady took our passports and did explain nothing really confusing

The journey was fine overall, little cramped. The driver stopped a lot for him to eat or pick up people from the road or drop off parcels. More like a delivery van than transport. Got to mondulkiri in around 6hours which wasn't so bad

Absolutely awful trip. A trip that was supposed to have 1 stop, stopped 10 times. To pick people up, drop people off, drop parcels off, drop pizza off, buy local produce that stunk the minivan out. The drive didn’t speak to us once or acknowledge us.

I couldn't find the meeting point because the adress given by BookMeBus was wrong. So I missed the bus. 
Fortunately, people of VGS are very kind and helped me find another bus. We're waiting for a money compensation for the bus I missed...

Nice boat. Staff were good - helped with bags. Left a bit later than schedule but arrived in good time. Free bottles of water given out. Had printed online ticket only which went ok. They dont announce departure but pier is small so its easy to keep track
The whole trip we were scared to death. The driver spent more time on the opposite lane than on our. We even overtook someone who was already overtaking. And of course we were still 2h late!!!

The trip to Phnom Penh was perfect . 
Service very good . 
Would recommend it .

TERRIBLE SERVICE!!!!
Booked a ‘direct’ service that should have arrived at 1730 but didn’t get in until 645pm due to multiple stops! SHOCKING!
シートはフルフラットではないですが寝るのにちょうどよい角度で気持ちよく寝られました。車内で配られる水とお菓子は嬉しかったです。
Arrived 1 h later. Car driver made a very agressive ride

The service was fine however the driver honked his horn every ten seconds for the three hour drive. There was absolutely no reason for him to continually do that. My precious driver didn’t do it once. Very annoying and unnecessary but apart from that ok

We departed on time, from the pick up point. than we drove around PP for 50 minutes to 2 other pick up points, which the company didn't mention that they exist when I booked. Could have save that 50 minutes and depart straight from the 3rd pick up point

The driver was driving erratically and far too quickly
In the dark. There was numerous times I thought we were going to have a head on collision
Our bus got delayed in visa immigration. We were there for more than 1 hour because of the driver.

The ride was bumpy, but the whole bus ride was very comfortable. The seats were very satisfying. It was like a business class seat on the plane. Would use this service if I ever travel around Cambodia again.
We rode a small van to Phnom Penh instead of the larger one we had from Siam Reap to Battambang. The whole trip was good.
Good services

No one cleaned the van before departure then there were old tissue and coffee bottle left by previous passengers. Lack of hygiene. No drinking water and tissue arranged for passenger. Car is a bit old then it was a bit noisy.
The driver was very punctual. In fact early and we left earlier than expected and got to our destination as expected .
Very good service.

Bokor transport were great. Nice comfortable bus with seat belts. Driver very nicely dressed, polite and friendly.
The trip (with any company) is not 3 hours, it is closer to 4. There is a lot of traffic and the road very rough. Would go with Bokor again
I was more than happy with our bus drive from phnom penh to siem riep. Very comfortable, on time, and friendly staff.
All went fine and according to schedule, sleeping place a little limited but overall good service.

Pick up location has changed.
117/3 ซอย, 15 Phetchaburi Rd, Khwaeng Thanon Phaya Thai, Khet Ratchathewi, Krung Thep Maha Nakhon 10400, Thailand
Very happy, was waiting for me and arrived at hotel in a timely fashion
Overall good service . The whole journey is good .
Hi, we were only able to reserve one of two ferries, and when we showed up to the first ferry, they hadn’t received any notification about our reservation.

Appreciate if a family wants to travel together, and adults have bought their seats, do so for the children too.  It is very uneasy to sit in a bus with children trying to share the seat with parents and with legs moving up and down and kicking you.

office staff didn't explain delay of bus in detail.
blackout the waiting room for more than 1hours

Better than expected. Bad road bur careful driving.
30 minutess late, which is less than usual according to pick up guy
1 break on the way, which was fine.
Horrible and unreliable service

The roads from Kep to Sihanoukville was awful . Our driver was great but be warned the roads are in an awful condition. The longest car ride ever , st times we couldn’t see anything in front of us due to the dust. But comfortable car and friendly driver

Do not catch the Kampot express. I was surprised we made it to Phnom Penh without being involved in an accident. The driver took too many risks passing long lines of traffic. The bus had no seat belts and the driver a disregard for safety.
We arrived 1 hour later than the specified time.

Use the vipvans regularly. This trip the driver was giving gas and the breaking in very inefficient way. Made people motion sick. After talking to driver he drove a little better but overall not a great trip this time. Next time better I hope

Unfortunately our driver thought he was sitting in a ferrari - he tried to overtake anyone at any risk. Every time he wanted to overtake someone he was speeding till the maximum when he suddenly realized oncoming traffic and had to hit the brake very hard
Nice van service , very comfortable and punctual.
I took a hotel bus and despites all things were good, I would suggest the operator to add seatbelt for better safety of passenger.

Really bad punctuality. We took the bus at 11am, which should arrive at 3pm The bus didn't arrive even at 4:45, and because we had a ferry reservation at 5, we decided to get off in the middle for tuk tuk. We didn't make it at the end and we're very angry
good

Old bus, the strong AC can't be turned off so everybody was freezing. No toilets and no information as to the duration of our breaks. Inspector not inspiring communication... Lots of stops to get people in, but  we arrived on time and the driving was good

Old bus, the luggage compartment was wet and smelled of fish, but the (nice) inspector washed it a little. Good driving (good road), but please why use the horn every two minutes? 
No way to switch off the AC, but it was not that strong as in other buses

Everything was fine: booking & confirmation, driver, car, drop off
like I booked for - no complaint!
Road bit bumpy, but it’s not drivers fault. He drove a bit to fast. But overall it was good.
We got little water. One stop for toilet. Everything was on time, no other unexpected stops

We were the only people on the bus for half the journey and one other person joined half way through so definitely felt like a cup service ha ha . All round very impressed though we arrived nearly an hour late on a 3 hour journey though the roads were bad

The trip to Kep was great but the driver on the way back drove very fast sometimes on bad roads, & at times I &I'm sure the other passengers felt that he was really reckless. But I will use the service again as it's the most convenient way to get to Kep.

Pros: 1. Staff in the office are all nice. 2. Bus is on time.
Cons: 1. The conductor tried to ask for dollars even we said that Filipinos dont need to pay since we are Visa Free.
2. The bus is old.
3. Too hot on the bus.
4. NO WIFI

I'll never use Khai Nam again! We were left at border 'cause "we took too long" but it was Khai Nams staffs fault 'cause they didn't have our visas with our passports! Wasnt OUR fault! We were literally only 5 mins longer than everyone else! Staff so rude

I driver drived too slow. Just about everyone passed him on the road, including small scooters.  There was no heavy traffic, the weather was good, the border crossing was fast. The trip took 8 hours instead of the normal 7 hours.

1 problem and I think it is on Bookmebus: the boarding point was not the one mentionned on the site... ihad to pay an extra taxi journey to get to the real bus boarding point and luckily I was early to get the bus because it took 15 min.
It was night bus from Phnom Penh to Sihanouk at night they stole the phone that was in the bag in the luggage compartment,
Perfect, as usual. Passengers were 80% locals. But service is very international (clean bus, aircon working fine, great driver, regular pee / food breaks).
Pleasant trip no mishaps will use again
The bus left late. And the driver drove like a maniac. Have driven many countries before but this guy took too many risks. Won't use service again.
Overcharged for the visa. Should only be 30$ not 35$
Overall comfortable , good driver!
It was a good journey, arriving on time. Really packed people in though so was very cramped.

The bus journey itself was fine. Charged extra even if have e-visa. Inspector lady was so rude. Waited ages at border, unnecessary if we had done it ourselves. But they take your passport from you so you can't. Really didn't like the lady inspector!!
Driver was late for 30mins, then the journey back to Phnom Penh was late by 2 over hours, had a plane to catch and almost miss my flight
The road is a disgrace of course. The driving was fast but not crazy.
Driving was fast but not crazy. Good there was no music on bus. Good rest stop. Appreciated getting dropped off at my hotel.
The bus stopped at expensive place for a lunch, we would like eat at more cheaper restaurant. On the other hand, they have nice and free toilets.
Very good service. But food at the stop was not nice but expensive.
I was the only tourist on this bus. The experience was a little wacky. Nontheless, I got to where I need to go in a timely fashion and the ride was fairly comfortable.
best driver, good punctuality, so so bus condition, bad seat.
I’m satisfied with your service and would recommend your service to others

In less than an hour, the bus had a problem. Aircon is not functioning. Also, the “girl inspector” asked for 2usd for visa application even though we don’t need one. It seems like she is making a lot money out of it.
was good hassle free just be on time provided water and snacks, just bring snacks or dinner to save on money bus stop food is expensive.

The bus driver drove dangerously. Also, the “girl inspector” asked a Danish family of 4 around 150usd to have their visa processed. I am quite worried with the said family if they were able to enter Vietnam since we left them in Cambodian border.

Pretty comfy and friendly driver - recommend sitting upfront

Road from Kampot to Phnom Penh is largely undeveloped so expect a bumpy ride. Due to the bumpy road and traffic entering Phnom Penh, we arrived at the bus station an hour late.
Fantastic! We were picked up from our hotel, the bus was clean and seemed quite new. Cannot fault this service
Very good trip

Great ride; loved everything except the weird $2 per person charge. We assumed it was a bribe at the border but still wish it would have been mentioned earlier. I am lucky to have had any US dollars on me en route to Vietnam

The pick-up from the hotel took a while. The seat assignments were followed, which is good. Aircon is cool. Restroom during stop-overs are clean. The only thing we hate is conductor ALWAYS ask for $ 1 to foreigners. Such a SCAM, Mekong Express!
Ferry process well organised and left on time. We were the last stop at Saracen Bay on Samloeum Koh Ring which took 1 hr 45 mins. Not a problem but much longer than advertised.
Overall a good service, but seat was a bit small and there was no power supply for charging electronics.

The bus was old with cracks on the windshield, worn out upholstery and broke down on the way. This meant that a scheduled 3 hour trip took 5 hours. The driver was a safe driver which was the only positive from the experience.
I don’t like the restaurant at the Cambodian border. It’s terrible and expensive. Not worth at all. But I like Mekong express...
To many stop (shop and restaurant) journey take 5,h.
transportation provide by cambodia post. punctual, driver can speak english and helpful.Easy booking using bookmebus.com. take this transport if you want to arrive early
The overall services are good except the restaurant they stop is not really tasty. I hope they consider to change restaurant.
Nice staff overall. Safe journey. Smooth border crossing
Very easy booking trough the website. The boat was clean. And the trip was made easy. Recommand to everyone who wants to go to Koh Rong
Modern bus. Departure on time. “Typical“ cambodian driving style (a little too fast)

Trip was about 14 h due to heavy Traffic in phnom penh. The van driver from pnohm penh to Sihanoukville was friendly but didt talk much to the english speaking passengers. It was often unclear why the van stops and what happens next.
Trajet très agréable et rapide en minibus climatisé, avec deux arrêts en route. A recommander sans hésitation. Merci
Driver couldn’t speak English. Sometimes he were on his phone talking with someone very loud. Heard him even tho I had headphones on

First of all we couldn't find the bus station because of the terrible explanation of the location. We had to pay twice because there was no bus when we arrived and the people treated us like criminals. No one could speak English with us. Never again!!

We had to cross the border between Thailand and Cambodia on foot in the middle of the night. Alone. The bus wasn't witing on the other side as promised. Everybody tried to rip us off and n the end we had to trust a randome guy and payed twice!! Scarry!
Great service, comfortable van and almost empty so a very good and easy option. Prefarable to the big coaches in terms of comfort.

We booked initially the bus for departing at 12:30 but we were indicated a wrong pick-up point.
Luckily we came across a different Mekong Express driver who helped us to get another bus at 13:30 and drove us to the station, for free.
The trip was OK

The booking service is good, but the real service of transport company is not good.
The seat in the vehicle is not convenient either.
Young driver speed
It was great and smooth! ❤️
Super effective! Thanks
With a little delay, but nothing in special. Sea trip comfortable and easy. Thanks

Inspector Rating done but there was no inspector.
For Accomodation, I would give nearly 4 star.
For Overall, I would give +4.5 star.
Great advantage with CAMBODIA Post Van is that there is absolutely no ambiguity with starting point and drop off point.
Good
Clean bus with great aircon. Unhelpful driver though.
Driver was really good, excellent job
At the end, we had over 2 hours delay. Driver was always using his phone and stopped everywhere to give people a ride for some bribe! AC dripped, so the seat was wet.

The driver was driving way too fast and in a dangerous way. I have taken other vip bus companies soI can compare . We started 15 mns late because the driver was waiting fir a passenger (which he’s not supposed to do)and then he drove like crazy
We were not picked up even after requesting pickup in enough time. This meant we had to spend another $4 on a taxi there. The staff were apologetic but no refund for the $4. Disappointed.

We had an horrible time crossing the border. The guy you hire at the border to collect our passports is corrupted. Even if I live in Vietnam and have a diplomatic passport for 3 years, he made us pay for every step. We missed our ferry. It's a shame!
Superb service. Very comfy and prompt on departure and arrival. ??
Had to change bus because of problem with the first bus and the dropoff point was not even close to the one indicated when we booked the tickets, terrible service...
Bon service à bord petite bouteille d eau et petit gâteau gratuit.personnel polie
Bon service à bord petite bouteille d eau et petit gâteau gratuit.personnel polie
We went to the wrong Mekong branch and the person-in-charge hire us a tuk tuk to the right station to avoid delay.  Great service.
Bus was comfortable and reasonably quiet. However, we were 3 hours late to our final destination... Unacceptable. Bus also made many unscheduled stops and it was hard to know when it was your stop.
Very comfortable! Water and crackers given on bus journey!
Easy!
Good Company, good price, comfortable bus and good driver

Bus arrived at least 30 min late at the starting point. We lost one more hour on the way, even if the driving seemed regular. We made it in 4h, while it had taken me 2:15 the other way round. Killer AC + inspector watched action movie much too loudly!!!

We were happy with our experience on this journey. 
The bus was reasonably comfortable, the driving was safe and the arrival time acceptable (slightly late but there were road works). 
There was also one comfort stop.
Driver was okay and accommodating. He drove safely. However, the state of the vehicle can be improved -- needs maintenance and cleaning.
Very good service. Departure ontime. Clean van. Good driver. Free water. WiFi didn’t work. Trip took less than expected including 2 stops.

Bus broke down so was given a 7 seater taxi replacement which had 12 people and a dog in it meaning a shared seat and no seatbelt. Replacement taxi was arranged but it was the same with even the driver sharing his seat! A 3 hour journey ended up taking 6!
We had to wait too much before we stop to go to pee. It would be better after 2 hours than 3 hours.
The busdrive was not so confortabel as it was explainet. The bus was old.
Very dangerous driving, we lost a miror (the left miror) and yet the driver continued overtaking dangerously. Quite disapointed, even if the compagny is recommanded for its safety

Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville was horrible.The driver never told us how much longer we had, where we would stop, nothing.  He pulled over us to use the toilet on the side of the road, as a woman that is not ok. Never again will I or anyone I know use you.
The trip was comfortable and punctual. The driving was perfectly safe. Recommended.
Nice
Very good service, highly recommended, will definitely use you for the return trip

The ride was fine. We made 2 rest stops & made it to Siem Reap just under 5.5 hrs. Only complaint was the back of the van was filled with cardboard box material which apparently was also being delivered and made the back seat very cramped.

The support via whatsapp and phone is good. We had some issue as the driver hold a sign with an other person name so we were unable to find the driver.
Luckily, the support via whatsapp is responsive and we finally manage to find the driver.

When I go to check in they don't know my booking while I have saw them report from bookme bus, they need more information to verify.

About bookme Bus app I have paid already with aba mobile app success, but dialog payment running time count not close
waited more than 1h30 for the driver with no information at all.  Sleepy driver made us feel a bit unsafe.
Only one person can occupy in a bed. They are giving it to two person. Very pathetic service. Do not book this bus again. You will be getting a hell of a ride.
Driver should speak a Little more english.

The bus left 45 minutes late from the scheduled departure, we then arrived 1.5 hours late so missed our second bus to Battambang. We had to wait a further hour and did not arrive until 9.30pm. This was (4.5 hours late). Very unhappy with this service.
Good
I would say that the service friendly and accommodate is good as well. I will keep using this service which it is available. Cheers
Driver was  50 min. (!) too late. No apologies or whatsoever!
Driver was driving safely. Inside the bus it was clean and comfortable. And to my suprise when we arrived to Siem Reap, we were provided with free Tuk-tuks to take us to our hotels.

The driver was driving too fast especially in the forest area where he was driving on the left overtaking  other vehicles and not being able to see oncoming traffic around corners. It made me car sick!! Too many stops for no real reason.

Their bus is so old!!! First bus aircon is broken, second we had fire.. And we stop nowhere and get grab to go my destination... Never ever again  Meekong express... Stay away if u don't want risk ur life!!!

The journey could have been so lovely and trouble free but unfortunately the driver honked his horn all night long at very random times (even when the road was clear?) which did not make for a pleasant nights sleep.

Were there to meet us even though the ferry was over 30 mins late, decent car and got us were we needed to be
Will use this company again

We reserved 4 seats in the front. When we arrived at the Bus, it was almost full. Two of us had to sit in the back and two got one seat in 2nd row but one was not really a seat. It was a totally different bus.
Worst trip ever. Disrespectful driver, does his own shopping leaving everybody in the bus. One hour to late at drop off. Air-Con regulation was broke on every seat so everyone was freezing.

Punctuality was good. The driver drove really fast, too fast and we felt in danger.
The space for the legs is very small.
My first time using this company, I have used  Mekong Express in the past with Nice comfortable seating and good driving over some pretty rough stretches of road. Punctual and courteous. Recommended.
The journey went smooth, quite long but we knew it. The driver was driving fast but we felt pretty safe most of the time. There was not much leg room but overall it was good.

We had a very good experience woth our first taxi, but this was criminal. I felt so unsafe, how fast we were driving and how many critical turnovers he made. I was very happy to finally have arrived in Pnom Penh. Driver was 25 min late due to searching.

It was terribly! Us just threw on the border and we 5 international customers by taxi've  got to ha Tien !!! Very bad that all organized at this level. I will write about this fact in all reviews for tourists! Back my money!!!

Bus arrived at destination 2-hours later than expected otherwise was ok. 

Journey itself was comfortable although someone managed to sneak on board animal some how. Noticed this once I realised I could smell urine on the bus.
Transfer was excellent and on time
Nice service! Good company! Good luck!

Departure on time although it stopped in every pier even though we bought directly to long set beach. Free bottle of cold water. They put our backpacks in a different area because we were leaving on the last stop which was useful.

At the border the staff of the bus refused to give us our passports and let us go through immigration on our own. We kept asking when we would get our passports back, this is highly suspicious. We will not travel with you again because of this.

NO WIFI on board!!!!
9 hour trip due to heavy traffic.

The van had a problem. So we wait 30m before a man came with a car, but CTT wanted 5 people in !(so 4 people at the back). As we refused to spend 3hours in this conditions we paid 10$ more to go in a other car...
Good price, good driver, we arrived 1.5 hour in Advance on scheduled arrival time.
Great

Surprisingly a good service.The beds are ok,considering it’s a bus,we could sleep all the way through. Much better than a seat for 15 hours. Perfectly on time though they never advised where we could stop for bathroom rest. Driver was quite loud all time.
The driver at 11 Nov, he play the telephone and check facebook when driving, it is very dangerous and not care our safely.
We were very pleased with the driver. When we got to Phnom Penh the hotel had overbooked, so there were no rooms for us. The driver waited and then took us to a new hotel. Great service!

Thé journey was fine, took longer than expected . However I sat in the back of the minibus and after 5 hrs had terrible travel sickness . For those that suffer from this I would suggest a big bus like the one we used last time
Van was late, and overbooked, did not get the seats we reserved, but was lucky to get on at all. Driver was fast and efficient

The driver has to buy take away fried chicken along the way for delivery at the next town but the person who is supposed to pick it up was not there, so we have to wait a while. Better be finger lickin good that fried chicken.
Very narrow and small place. Not comfortable at all
The service was very good. Staff is very friendly and helpful. It was long trip but because of comfort in bus, I did not feel how time passed.

The driver stopped too many times, drove 30 minutes stop, drove 30 minutes again stop. He stopped like 10 times in total. Then the stop in Phnom Penh is way too long. 
You are called Mekong express but this is not express at all !
The driver read and at a gas station, which was not even the terminus where tuktuk driver already almost entered the bus and wanted to offer a ride.

the boat always late. We waited for 2 hours for the trip to Koh Rong Sanloem. They asked us to follow the tuktuk and bring us to stroll around the city for about good 30minutes and when we arrived at the pier we still have to wait for another 2 hours!
Very comfortable night bus. I slept very well. I felt safe even for my baggage because it was with stabs so that no other person can claim it.

Van going from Phnom Penh (PP) to Sihanoukville (SV) was excellent (punctual, and WiFi provided). Unfortunately, had bad experience on return trip from SV to PP- van did not show up on 9/11/18, 7:30am. I have updated and given feedback to your team.
Pick up point was different from the voucher and they transferred us to another bus that is broken.
Driver was fast. The whole trip was good.
They asked us to pay for the immigration which is kinda shady.

the inspector just disappointed me so much. I paid the ticket with my chosen seat since the night I booked yet when I arrived VGS express, the inspector just move me to anywhere she want just becus other passengers demand for.

Overall not a bad experience. Had a puncture on route but the driver delt with it within 30 minutes or so. Took much longer than the stated 4 hours though. Nearer 6.5 with the 30 minute delay and food stop.
Overall is OK. Van ar departured on time. So far i like the service by Kampot Express except the wifi on board was On/Off intermittenly.

Booked our private SUV the night before we needed to go from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. Called them just to make sure all was in order. Driver showed up at 8:50 for a 9am departure. Excellent driver, courtesy, spoke great English. 5hrs with ample stops.

Booked our private SUV the night before we needed to go from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. Called them just to make sure all was in order. Driver showed up at 8:50 for a 9am departure. Excellent driver, courtesy, spoke great English. 5hrs with ample stops.
On time, two time to break, clean, cheap, and easy to find the pool.
The price you paid worth for the first time visitors to Phnom Penh that they pickup right at the airport.

They never arrived. Wouldn’t answer their phones. Still won’t respond to emails. DO NOT BOOK WITH BOKOR TRANSPORT. Not hopeful we’ll get our money back for a service that never happened. Useless pricks

We had booked the 4:30PM bus, but the asked if they could put us on the 4PM bus instead which was more convenient for us. We left on time and even arrived 30 mins before scheduled. The seats are comfy but not too much leg space. Would book again!

The ride was an experience. Driving in Cambodia is different than in NA, so passing on blind corners or when a truck is coming at you or when there are motos in the other lane isn’t an issue here. Some passings made us nervous, but overall it was fine.
Good job

Terrible driver, terrible van (air con was broken), they don’t have seat numbers and we had to sit separated because we had a connection bus (also with them) and were the last to arrive. 
Arrived late.
Avoid if you can
A/C not good, too cold at evening but too warm at afternoon. No free WiFi on aboard. No room for luggages at rear. But price is cheaper than larger van of course.

Excellent. I set only 4 stars at accommodation, because five star goes to their new, super luxury buses. Just amazing with 1+2 seats per row, with lots of space for the legs. This is the best company on PNH-SGN route.
Staff was friendly and the bus was fine... arrived 1h30 late though.

They would pick us up at 12:00 in the end had to wait untill 14:00(!!) before they picked us up, no working airconditioning in the van, bad road, horrible driver. Unfortunately would not book this again
Taxi driver was on time. Drove safely and found a great place for lunch enroute
1,5 hour late. Nobody needa to go to toilet 4 times during 4 hour drive and eat dinner. I’d prefer to be on time then stop every 45 minutes.

Great online booking - used twice when touring Cambodia. Very easy to book a driver within a day's notice. To make the overall experience 5 star include a field for the destination address as drivers don't speak English so the can get the address from you
Good service....
Driver was reckless, over the speed limit and dangerously overtaking all the other vehicles

Very nice bus. Forgot to pick us up at the hostel as promised. But got us right on time to go on the bus. 
Confortable bus. Would take this bus company again
Not really good

The driver drove erratically and at times dangerously, left the bus 3 times to get refreshments for himself, not explaining to passengers, my window could not be seen out of due to being broken and sticky film covering it, he didn't talk or smile to us

Do not take the GTVC boat if you need to go to Coconut Beach, as they will not go there. They only have one stop on Koh Rong, at the community pier, and will not stop anywhere else. We had to forfeit these tickets and buy new ones for Buva Sea instead.

Wrong location on map for pick up: use google map and it would show the right place. It was 1 hour late! Comfortable seats with A/C. Good driver. Good service at the drop off area: the girls help us contact our hotel for pick up.
Boat was on time. Smaller than the one we used before. Comfortable seats. A bit overcrowded. From Koh Rong Samloem to Sihanoukville it stopped once. Journey took 45 min.
Bus departed 2:05 pm instead of 1:30 pm.
The depature office address on the ticket doesn’t exist anymore because it has been knocked down! We had to ask a tuk tuk driver to take us to the new location and the bus was over 1 hour late.
It was ok, it got me from A to B. There is no WiFi on the minibus as advertised.
Over all very good . luggage not labeled at start. More information is always good.

Best the driver could have done with tools at his disposal. Van was ok in morning but lots of breaks with bonnet up. Van breakdowns led to push starts at least twice. Looked to be alternator and/or AC compressor issues. Great job driver. do better Rithya
I've travelled with this company for more than one destination and the buses were ALWAYS late. Moreover, on the web site the root battambang sihanoukville displayed as direct while is not.

The whole van filled up with locals except us. And there is a woman who spoke very very very loud on the whole 6 hours journey non stop. Behind us a family with a little kid who cried everytime and played with noisy game. Narrow chair and ac was hot.

Waiting place is super comfortable. Service was great! Everything went well on the border. Super! Bus was very comfortable as well. We got snack and water. The only thing weird is they picked up some locals on the journey, I don't know if this is normal.

Great experience as always with Mekong express. The mini bus was spacious, clean and even had nice decor.The bus driver was really friendly and polite. I asked if we could stop for a toilet break and he stopped less than a minute later at a service statio

Late departure, late arrival. Poor condition of the bus interior.

Wifi not working. No charger as advertised.

The staff was great, it is a shame that they have to work in such a poor environment.
After 1:30 delayed with no reason why. I got bitten by bedbugs on the seats of the bus probably due to the lack of cleaning of the bus. I would never use you again.
Great service with a nice stop in the middle ☺️
Bus was seriously uncomfortable and hot for 6 hours. It was late so we sat outside our hostel for 45minutes at 6am. Apart from that, did the job.

Die Bestätigung welche man nach der online Buchung erhält tauscht man vor Ort in die richtigen Tickets. Die Fähre hat sogar kurz auf uns gewartet, da wir etwas Verspätung wegen des Bus hatten. Die Island Speer Ferry war SUPER! Danke nochmals.

We departed on time and though the bus seemed old, it was comfortable enough for the trip. Water was provided and they facilitated a smooth immigration process. The AC acted up a bit and it was a bit warm for about and hour or two of the trip.

The trip took longer than expected but the staff were friendly and efficient. They provided biscuits and a bottle of water for everybody. The bus was comfortable enough for the trip. It’s a good option if you’re looking for value for money.
Overloaded with both people and baggage. Was informer about that traffic could cause some delays, but we arrived 2,5 h later than estimated. No information was given by the driver.
The halfway stop was not at a great place. But overall great service. We would recommend this!
No WiFi

Bus was on time. Good waiting area at bus stop. Clean van. Good service. Free water. Couple of random stops on the way to pick up local people. BUT the driver was going insanely fast which was too dangerous. Journey took 3:30 h

Boarded 20min early, left 1hr late. Aircon sucks. My partner got sick and we had to leave the bus - not their fault, but the driver laughed at us. Wish I knew how to insult back him in his own language.
Expensive compared to the bus but saved us an extra day of travelling. The whole journey was only about 6 1/4 hours compared to around 11 by bus. Worth it! And so much more comfortable.

The bus trip was good with very clean and well presented bus, however the wifi system kept cutting out.
The big problem we experienced was being kept for 2 hours by Vietnamese border post officer who was determine to process all others  before our bus.

The Wi-Fi wasn’t connecting but the bus wasn’t full and we made up some extra time. Could do for a shorter bathroom break between the two stops. Driver was very friendly, gave water before the start, and the seats declined. Good air conditioning.

Driver seemed expetienced and confident so I wasn't too worried when he overtook other cars quite frequently. There were quite a few unnecessary stops along the way, where the van door was left open and the locals tried to sell us things and beg for money

Really good staff and overall excellent cheep service. The bus was a little old and the aircon wasn’t very good - I would recommend the company but. Try and book either a mini van or the better bus! It’s worth paying a bit more for this

Nous faisions l'aller PhnomPenh-HaTien. Nous avons changé 4 fois de bus! Nous sommes arrivés 5 min avant fermeture des frontières.  On nous a laissé du côté du Cambodge et on a dû marcher 15 min avec nos bagages! Pas facile pour des retraités!!!
Soooo much better than the trip there.  Don't know what an Inspector is that you refer to.
excellent service. highly recommended
everything ok
the first bus from hcmc to phnomphen ia better than the bus from phnom phen to siem reap. the aircon is not that cool and the bus smell like smoke inside

The bus driver was so lovely, bus was comfortable with lots of toilet breaks and even 25 minutes for lunch. Only downside was the journey was supposed to take 4 hours (which was always very optimistic!) but took 7!

Best driver I have seen in Cambodia in ages, honestly. He took over the other cars safely, and the speed was appropriate. Again, I highly recommend the driver, congratulations, keep up the standards. Great company.

The inspector should be more clear on communicate with the entire bus instead of only speaking to your operators. I wasn't told to give him my passport so I almost didn't get it stamped goind out of Vietnam

Does (sort of) what it says on the tin. Definetly are not a company that cares about customer service but we arrived safely - all be it an hour late as the driver picks up locals on the way. If you don’t mind travelling in style and can be late then use
Arrived ahead of schedule and were informed about the route and details.

Left on time and drove quickly without being reckless. Stopped twice for bathroom breaks from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. Didn’t try the WiFi but it looked like another passenger was able to use it well enough. Highly recommended!

At first, from my point of view, the driver drove 'dangerously'... However, i realised that, it seemed to be the cambodians  'way of driving'.  Nothing to worry.. I enjoyed the scenery along the road. Overall.thumbs up
The big disappointment was that we didn't get the box snack we have grown accustom to with Mekong Express. Is this something that Mekong has stopped supplying?
Overall good experience despite the delay and limited AC

i bought Seat Number 3 , but end up they change my seat to Number 5 ( not a good seat ) , Online Booking why need to choose seat? no point .
Delay And drive slow. Stop many time on road. waste many time. driver keep use phone when Driving.

Worst service ever! The trip was supposed to take 4h but took 5,5h, which almost made us miss our boat. We told the driver already at start about the boat, but he couldn’t have cared less. The bus itself was disgusting, with beetles crawling around.
The Driver was just horrible. He was just honking the whole time. There was not even a reason to do so. Permanently honking for 6h can realy get on you
Instead of kep, we drove at first to kampot and leave the bus, wait nearly 1 hour an drove with an other bus to kep. After 6 hours we arrived kep, not 3,5h as announced
Arrived on time. Driver was polite and punctual. Would use this company again.

Would never use this company again, the fiasco at the border was unnecessary and avoidable, wish I had of went with Giant Ibis, they didn’t have to wait 2 hours to get through passport control. 
And why did we all have to put a $ in our passports????
Used your company several times, always punctual and reliable and reasonably priced. Would recommend you to anybody.
There's no stop where we can eat since its a long travel and the comfort room/toilet is not clean.

The assistant from the boarder of cambodia and bangkok scammed us even if we are from ASEAN country and others. They asked us to pay $5. And also in immigration, we are also scammed. Hope you do something about this for the protection of the passengers.
The driver played loud, annoying music for most of the journey (headphones didn't help) and drove quite dangerously. Got to PP in about 5.5 hours but not very comfortably.

Your pickup point from Phnom Penh to HCMC is seriously problematic though. I wasn't able to find it on GRAB's map. I had to get a TUKTUK who couldn't find the location also. Ended up, a TUKTUK from another office took US$10 from us to catch up the bus.
Punctuality:-(
wifi not good,  overall ok...
Nachdem ich endlich das richtige Office für die Fähre gefunden hatte, es gibt einige Office für Island Speed Ferry, lief alles perfekt. Nehme gerne wieder dieses Schnellboot.
the bus driver drove safely but kept on picking up passenger on the side of the road and stopped for almost 45 mins at the post office.
The driver was very kind and professional. Everything wen’t smoothly.
Excellent service! Great value for money!

On time departure, good air conditioning, have seatbelt, good driver, there are passengers alighting and get on throughout the journey, but it didn’t affect the arrival time. Highly recommend to everyone for transport between Siem Reap and Phnom Penh

Woman in the bus took passport and money and left us without a y instructions when we arrived at the border.
Restaurant we stopped was a scam, charging a ridiculous amount of money for food.
The mini bus was a bit crowded, especially in the back, where there was not much fresh air but altogether it was pretty good value for the price and the driver was supernice! :)
thanks for the service - great
The other trip was better overall.

This was supposed to be a VIP express bus, but it was nothing like that. Scratch the VIP because there was no space, even for a small person like me. Scratch the express also because we stopped so many times to pick up people. Ticket was too expensive.

Not a 4 hour drive as claimed, 6 hours. Very comfortable and really thankful for the driver helping with the ferry - do not recommend speed ferry as they were very rude! Would use Mekong Express again.
Good

Horrible drive from Sihanoukville to Kampot. We (16 customers) were squeezed like cattle in a van for 10 people. The driver drove like a maniac. Many potholes on the way but the driver did not slow down. If you want to live don't use this company!

The bus was 1,5 hour late before we even departed. The journey itself was smooth but we hadn't enough space for all languages so a little bit uncomfortable to have all languages in the leg space. Also, no water provided how it's common in other buses.
Sold our seats eventually got on to find that people were sitting on floor, boxed in, hot as AC insufficient,  crowded and dangerous, HORRENDOUS 10 hour journey !!!
Absolutely first class, prompt, answered emails very quickly

Driver spoke good English.We had included our destination address into the additional info in the order, but it was not received by the driver. We had to instruct the very last turn to the hotel (based on what maps.google.com claimed). Good service anyway
Journey was fine, but very hot!
The driver drives over the speed limit during  all the trip

The driver was late which in all made us an hour late. The driver tried to pick up an extra passenger along the road and honked at random people (we ordered a privat taxi). He kicked us out at Phnom Penh airport (we were going to downtown Phnom Penh).

- too much AC, we were cold
- the bus spent 10hoirs instead of 6!

The travel was really bad. On the web site was written that the trip was direct, instead we have to change bus in kampot and wait one hour there. Moreover, the bus delayed almost 3 hours. Really bad experience with this company, never more!

The bus delayed to depart about 45 minutes. But the driver drove so safe, the bus seat also comfortable, sadly because the wifi service didn't have a fast connection. But overall i like the hospitality of the staffs.

The lateness of the bus was due to the very busy roads as we were traveling on the first day of water festival. The air conditioning want working, the outlet's above our head were broken so our journey was unpleasantly hot.

The lateness of the bus was due to the very busy roads as we were traveling on the first day of water festival. The air conditioning wasn't working, the outlet's above our head were broken so our journey was unpleasantly hot.

So late. 2:30pm become 3:45pm.
Many time to pickup customer.

Highly recommend this bus service! The man who saw us onto the bus looked after us and was very friendly, always smiling. Also lunch and snacks provided!  Which was just an added bonus. Very well planned out with timings etc.  Couldn’t fault this service!
No reservation even though I paid and show the confirmation email to the bus company , the bus was full and I could not get in

On your website nothing were right about departure/arrival times. Due to this we missed one night that we booked with a hotel on Phu quoc, as we arrived to Ha Tien after ferries to Phu quoc closed. We had to get an extra night on a hotel in Ha Tien. Bad!
They overbooked
I know it’s holiday but the bus picking up too many people on the road side like a public bus. And please bare in mind that the car AC unit gets quite hot during the day . Thank you
10 hrs to travel. Catch up the customers on the way to Phnompenh

Very bad trip ! The staffs of the speed boats give the priority to the passengers with a ticket bought in a local agency. We had to wait. But finally it remained no place for us. Same thing with another boat but, at the end, the staff was pity of us !
Good services! Very comfortable.. the staff friendly

Mekong bus sation at shk just told us that they're not taking us to the ferry terminal and just go to the ferry company GTVC, ferry representative told us ferry is already full for 2pm even when we're there at 13:00. He said mekong express didnot confirm

Inspector? I never seen him. May be i did miss but dont know about him. 
Important negative comment is driver. At least 2-3 times we were lucky to avoid accident. Driver was careless and drove very poor.
This bus service is literally cancer.
They made me wait 30 min to print my ticket, then they told me I can’t get in the bus because it was full. Horrible service. Never traveling this company again.
We arrived 2 hours late in Phnom Penh because we stopped in kampot and it supposed to be a direct bus arriving in Phnom Penh at 20 o'clock, we arrived at 22!

Chairs are a bit too close together, leaving no space for arms to rest. Wifi is too slow, if you mention before that the bus have wifi should mention it will not work for more than half the way. Driver is good. Overall should make the bus ride comfortable

Trip started by van for about 2 hours, not what hired.  Driver drop us after crossing border with luggage to walk to a terrible access/pier and then the boat was not what the photos showed.  Quite dissapointed. Arrived late to Chau Doc and lost our bus.
So so poor

Trip started by van for about 2 hours, not what hired.  Driver drop us after crossing border with luggage to walk to a terrible access/pier and then the boat was not what the photos showed.  Quite dissapointed. Arrived late to Chau Doc and lost our bus.
Took us just over 6 hours to get from PP to Battam bang. Only downside was the lack of information. Once we left PP we had no information from the driver

Friendly driver with drinks,food. Headache after this bumby road. At the postoffice in kep, no one knows about if the bus will arrive or has already left, contactnr. wasn't helpfull. But bus picked us up on time, drop off was late because traff
The chair was not comfortable at all because of the space but overall was really nice. The processing of our needs in immigration was organized
The bus and the ride was perfectly okay, great value for the price. The bathroom is not suitable for anyone over 50kg so maybe more actual stops should be considered.

We took a Larryta minibus from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. The driver was professional and followed road safety rules (what a surprise in Cambodia :-) ). The minibus did 2 stops on the way and arrived in time. The bus was clean and new.

Went to the office at 12.30 & were told our bus was not running. We were not emailed or notified. They reluctantly offered another service & were unwilling at first to give a partial refund. Utterly useless

Wifi password didn‘t work.
Bus was about half an hour late.
Nevertheless a good driver and good seats.
Hab enough space with my 192cm

The driver was very nice but I worry about his driving because he answered and played with his phones a lot. He drove too fast sometime and I was sometimes scared. All your drivers need to slow down to the speed limit in the villages - many children.

Top class. Comfortable ride, safety belt provided, very punctual, and most importantly to me, the Cambodia Post in Siem Reap is easy to find, especially since I wanted an earlu morning departure. Thumbs up all the way.

Bus ride took longer than usual because of the incident about my lost passport. The lady who collected our passport allegedly lost mine. She was very rude and unprofessional. I'm not sure if what happened to me is a plan to extort money but I felt it was.

The bus ride was comfortable since it's a night trip but the bus driver and another staff argue and fought during our ride. They were shouting at each other and didn't even bother to tell the passengers what's happening.

The driver was crazy blowing his horn all the time. We stopped in a horrible place for lunch time, much different from the first trip from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh. The driver played his music very very loud, impossible to find any rest.

The driver was crazy blowing his horn all the time. We stopped in a horrible place for lunch time, much different from the first trip from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh. The driver played his music very very loud, impossible to find any rest.

At an awful food stop he forced us to pay for his meal, claiming posted prices for our order were wrong. He kept telling false stories, hoping for a big tip. He passed recklessly, MANY oncoming drivers blew their horn at him.
It was okay. Left on time. However the toilet at the Kampot station is absolutely horrible.
Not clear to me what you mean with inspector
The trip was terrible, we stopped before the destination..
Bus is is unclean. Chair is broken and AC did not work well. Stop hundred times to pick up passengers on the way. Such a nightmare experience. Transfer van is smelly. No more for Phnom Penh Sorya.

Best of all the bus/van services we took in Cambodia. Not over crowded. Booked seat selection was the seat provided. Very safe driver. Punctual departure. Arrival a little later than advertised but everyone travelling on a budget should expect that here.
Did the job. No frills. Fair price.

Bus was 25 mins late.
Air conditioning was inadequate. 
The bus advertised free WiFi but there was none.
The driver was driving in a dangerous way (too fast and not careful while overtaking)
Driver was driving like crazy, we bumpped into another car on the way. Horrible exepriance!
El aire acondicionado no funcionaba, un horror! Asientos súper incómodos, como en una lata de sardinas o peor!
Bus was old and tired, too hot at back, bus arrived at different station to the ticket without any previous information and company refused to pay for transfer. Pretty bad day

There is no punctuality at all. It takes me around 10 hours to arrive at Ho Chi Minh but we are told before departure that it takes only 6 or 7 hours. The instruction at the border checkpoint is not clear, and we have to wait and wait among the crowd.
very good driver
Good service. On time. Would recommend to travellers in Cambodia. Thank you
Will rather choose the big bus instead of a minivan. High speed plus all the bumps on the road
I reserved 2:00pm bus a few days ago. But on the day they asked me to take 1:00pm bus instead, which was unpleasent.
No wifi on board, although they promise in the internet. The driver was the rudest and most unfriendly person we have met in whole cambodia during our 1 month travel.
Good company, departure and arrival (almost) on time. Nice and comfortable van with wifi.
Driver aggressive but fast and obviously good. Bus station in SHV a bit dirty
A bit confusing situation on the pier in Sihanoukville, lots of people and ferries and no one knows what to do) the ferry was good, a bit late maybe 5 minutes.
overall very good
The people who ran the bus were really rude. Speaking to us like naughty children and with very sour faces by Cambodian standards. It felt more like a school trip than a border crossing

The van was on time ( only 15 minutes delays at  the departure) but on the website was written 5 hours of trip, obviously it was 6 hours and half ....the van also stopped and the people had to push it  to restart it!

The van was on time ( only 15 minutes delays at  the departure) but on the website was written 5 hours of trip, obviously it was 6 hours and half ....the van also stopped and the people had to push it  to restart it!

The van was on time ( only 15 minutes delays at  the departure) but on the website was written 5 hours of trip, obviously it was 6 hours and half ....the van also stopped and the people had to push it  to restart it!
Very disorganized boarding and un boarding process. Your staff was rude, almost got into a fist fight with a customer who was scammed by your company. I will not recommend this service.
Everything was fine. The driver was not crazy on the road and "only" spent 10min on the phone, out of a 5h trip.

Third time crossing the border to Vietnam with Mekong Express. Before smooth, this time every foreigner got ripped of 5 dollars for some stamp excuse with the threat we'd be left at the border if we didn't pay. Never using Mekong Express again. SCAM

The driver picked up extra people after departing bus station which the van could not legally hold. We made numerous stops along the way including an unscheduled lunch break for 40mins. As a result, a 4hr trip became 6 hrs which meant we missed our ferry.
no problem.
Bus driver always shouting in the phone all the journey long. Horrible. The bus was 1h30 late !!!!

The ride was canceled so I was transfered to Champa Mekong bus. and the main reason I booked CTT was to avoid Champa mekong. Champa mekong was 6 dollars in camboticket but I booked CTT in bookmebus just because of that reason. This should be compensated.
We arrived 1,5 hours too late in Phnom Penh, however the bus which departed one hour after ours arrived at the same time?! Maybe the reason was an extra stop at the airport....
All the best. Clean bus. Better price. Only half full on PP-SR journey 8am
The limousine bus was amazing - wish we knew it was an option, we would have booked only limousines and not the regular buses.
Nightbus was a comfortable option.
Good trip although the last 25km into Kampot are horrendous because of the state of the roads.  Wifi in the van wasn't working.
The minibus left more than an hour late as the original bus was not available but the driver worked hard to get to destination without further delays.

Please put the correct time of travel for phnom penh sihanoukville. It's never 6hours. It took 5and half or 6 hours for my 2 travels. And even with a private taxi with no traffic this travel is 5 hours.
Thanks
Good service and I would use again
Love it.
Drive was alright but the aircon above my row didn't workand the one behind. It was an older van that was extremely worn and torn in a lot of places. The seat were not comfy and the WiFi didn't work
Had a very nice Driver, did wait for me almost one hour because my flight was delayed. PERFECT!!!

- The Bus was supposed to be 3 hrs. It ended u more than 4 without any visible cause (not much traffic or other issues).
- AC wasn’t working - super stuffy
- Stopping at the shop not necessary, particularly when so late already
Everything is great, except that we arrived 1 hour late.
was not safe. driver was talking on the phone too much
The driver drove very safely and the bus was very comfortable.
punctuality, it was not the fault of the company, to much trafic on the route, bevsuse the first day holiday in phnom phen

PP to Sihanoukville. Driver was friendly and courteous. He drove swiftly, but no unnecessary risks when overtaking other vehicles. Lot's of traffic, trip took 6hrs. M.Express offered a complimentary ride from the drop-off point to the Serendipity pier.
For European People was the seat to small. I'm 175 cm and slim. I hat problems 5h to seat in the bus.

Bus was in poor condition and air conditioner was dripping on me. It was hot, and your partner bookaway.com left multiple passengers stranded by allowing ticket bookings on full buses and taking a fee - this is awful and you should cease using them
This is very bad company. They has only one car for operate multiple time. With this booking they delay my trip up to 2 hours.
They departed on time but arrived 2 hours late, partly because of traffic and partly because of unreliable estimation.

The seats are very limited, no enough space. However, the service it is excellent, either punctuality, no crazy driving, professionalism, etc. If they could update the buses, and have more spacious ones, it would be amazing.

Load/unload scooters, food, etc.
Rude staff, no ans to ques
Regular ETA (9am to 2pm): official arrival 5.15pm
Dropped us at wrong drop off point (6km away) to favorite tuk tuk drivers to suck more money from us
lost last boat and hotel for being late
Very good driver and comfortable van. Took around 6 hours from PP to Battambang including 30 m’ stop overall a bit tiring but not bad given the heavy traffic on the road
trip ok  thanks

Although the mini bus want the newest, it was clean, the aircon was just right and the seats were large, comfortable separate seats, not bench seats. The driver spoke English and we were able to ask him to drop us near okie destination. Would use again.

Everything was perfect, one of the most comfortable bus trips I took in Cambodia! Driver left on time and we arrived slightly late but through no fault of the driver we just ran into traffic as was end of festival weekend! Would definitely use again

The driver drived too fast we almost took a truck !!!! I was really not confidence I Stressed during all the travel !!!! 
It is really dangerous !!!!!!!

Late to leave from bus stop and Stop time is too long in Kampong thom, which take the delay. Schedule leave from 2:30PM, but leave around 3:10PM. Stop around 50 minutes in Kompong Thom. Arrive Phnom Penh at 10:15PM while there is no traffic jam at all.

I was mistaken and thought my bus was at 8pm. It was in fact at 7pm. Of course, I arrived too late only to find out that the 7pm bus was the last bus. I was really frustrated - I provided my phone number but no one called! This could have been avoided...

The minivan was pretty small and narrow.
BUT great service! We were late and the bus waited for us. The driver was very nice and smiley. Thanks very much!!
Everything was ok but on the website was written that the trip would last 8 hours, instead was 10
All went smoothly with the booking. I'm very satisfied with bookmebus.com. Whatever the failings of the company, if any, has nothing to do with bookmebus.com. Well done, bookmebus.com.

This company services very bad, when not enough car then rental from out side then got problem when call to company said don't know&booking select seat already but actual seat change just system error no solution. Human error but no response their mistake
