This company services very bad, when not enough car then rental from out side then got problem when call to company said don't know&booking select seat already but actual seat change just system error no solution. Human error but no response their mistake
Bus was late over 1 hour. Little space for bags. Driver was driving while talking on the phone and did several hazardous maneuvers.

The trip simply didn't take place. We've been told they didn't receive booking confirmation from bookmebus. After 1.5 hours of waiting she managed to get her husband on board of their car to drive us to Kampot. She wanted extra money. 3 hours delay. Bad.

I did not ride on this bus, as even though I booked the ticket a couple of days before and my place was only confirmed on the morning of the departure, bookmebus would not let me cancel the ticket as it was within 48 hours. No leniency, I won't be reusing

Der Fahrer war sehr pünktlich und mit einem sehr guten Wagen brachte uns der ausgezeichnete Fahrer von Sihanoukville to Kep.
Wir haben heute wieder einen Transport von Kep nach Phnom Penh. Vielen Dank für den ausgezeichneten Service. Gerne immer wieder.

Bus clean, left slightly early -great! Mekong X needs to adjust it's timetable -with construction in Sihanoukville - no way trip could be 4 hrs. Driver was great. We arrived 3 hrs late & he took us further & assisted in negotiating a tuk tuk! So kind!

Sihanoukville to PP. The minivan left punctual. Driver was safe. Trip took 6hrs instead of 4-5hr, because of heavy traffic.
Staff at departure point was service minded. Overall, I am very satisfied.
Many different bussing options in S.E.Asia. this was definitely one of the better ones we've tried. A longer route from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukeville makes this a must booking.

The driver was talking on the phone for fist 2 hours using mic and it was loud. He was also touchinga his iPhone while he drives and he shoud focus on driving. He used big break at least 3 times and it was dangerous. The car was too cold too.

Bus was delayed at departure by 25-30 mins waiting for late passengers who blamed problems with pick up. Road conditions led to further delay, arriving in 4 hours. Seats not very spacious when people in front recline theirs. Overall not a bad journey.
Safe and comfortable transportation hotel to hotel. Good driver. Reasonable price.
Aggresive driver, drive like crazy fast and not safe and still not accurate time of arrival. Bad experience.

Very disappointing. Bus was 1.5hr late, staff at the Siem Reap office were extremely rude. The bus ride itself was terrible - four passengers were squished onto three seats which was unsafe (no seatbelts) and uncomfortable. Would NOT recommend.
Driver drove so fast we were scared - in fact, we arrived 45 minutes ahead of schedule with 2 stops. VIP bus nice but crowded and not much space for luggage.
I booked for the trip from HCMC to Phnom Penh, I booked online, the bus was really different with bus that show online, its old , no snack like i read on the review.  No power socket also .
More than 7 hours instead of 6. And unexpected drop off place. But safe and comfortable trip. Strange border experience.

The driver made multiple stops for him to go to the bathroom on the side of the road. When he did stop at a gas station, he didn't check if anyone else needed to use the bathroom but just walk away. For the lunch stop didn't announce a time to be ready.
Speedy service, stopped once at a nice restaurant
Very efficient and courteous driver.
Alles perfekt von der pünktlichen Abholung und Transport in einem schönen und guten Auto (Lexus) zum Hotel in Phnom Penh. Immer gerne wieder.
Happy with the service but paid an extra $5 for the crossing visa

We had a very professional driver and he did not go fast dangerously. I also recieved a bottle of water and we had two stops on way. 
A reliable bus company

I had a seat in a mini van and I didnt have problems. I also arrived on time to Phnom Penh. They acepted my bagagge even it was too heavy. 
I have no complains about this company.

There did not keep my promise.
 some food and tisu
Only water gave us
Good service
Can recommend
All berth are single. Soft seats, water and cookies. Liked!

Although the service is commendable and efficient I would suggest that more care should be taken when explaining the Cambodian visa fees and process of obtaining with the help of the staff. I do believe we have been charged more than we should have been.
VIP bus with plenty of space and comfortable seats. Flawless trip and very helpful staff. Much better experience PP-REP to what we had SGN-PP
Excelent service! Right on time, confortable seats and bus, good drivers. Great service overall, I recommend it!

We departed quite on time and the driver drove safe. At a specific moment the road got very bumpy and that was fun for a while, but the bumpy ride took too long. Not that he could do anything about that. Overall a good drive and a nice driver
The trip was excellent !

Overall, the ride was okay. The only thing I didn't like was that they were having people coming in to the bus in the middle of the trip and letting stay like us. I am not sure if they paid or not because since the bus is full they just sit on the floor.

The bus arrived 1:30 hour late. Then the driver made me sit at the back of the bus regardless of my seat number. So I sat all the trip long on luggages. There were no space at all and all of this only because he let his colleagues sit confirtably in front

The journey started with a delay of 40 minutes, it took another 6 hours to get to PP (instead of advertised 2.5 hours). Forget about WiFi/cake in the bus. Plus an additional passenger was been taken halfway through. Bus dirty with cockroachs. Never again.

Worst bus journey during my time in Cambodia - how this org is highly rated and considered ‘luxury’ is a mystery to me. 45 mins late departing, 2 unnecessarily long stops, arrived almost 3 hours late, dropped off at the wrong place, and an unsafe driver.
Prompt pick up and departure. Journey was a bit bumpy but arrived within a good time.
A small delay due to works on the road. All the staff great, the best.
Bus was clean, and left punctually. Perfect trip - no problems at all for me. Just make sure you get back to the bus in plenty of time if you do get off for a rest stop.
Good reliable service
Half hour late

We left a passport in the driver’s car and he came back so we could look!!!!! Literally so amazing of him. It was hard because we didn’t understand each other but so so nice of him! The drive was great too!

Overall it was fine, we got from hotel to hotel with limited fuss. The issues I wasn’t pleased with were the amount of time the driver spent on the phone, taking calls and texting and the 30-40 minute stop we had when my partner and I just wanted to leave
All ok
Kampot -> PP took me ~5 hours both early morning and late afternoon, they need to update the schedule to reflect this. Stops are unnesecarily long. And our driver made two.

The sleeper seat number i booked was taken by someone and the inspector didn't allow me to take my seat and assigned me to another seat at last row which was partially wet. I couldn't sleep the whole night as the bed was wet and smelled awful.
I like this bus service, they provide free pick-up from my stay to the bus station. The staffs are friendly and the seat is comfortable.

The driver was excellent, the mini van comfortable and the temperature of the vehicle was just right. However we left Siem Reap half an hour later than the scheduled departure time. There was no inspector!

The ride took about 8 hours, 2 hours longer than advertised. The bus runner will also collect an extra 5 dollar fee for some made up reason related to getting through customs so factor that into your decision when choosing a bus company for this ride.
GREAT SERVICE! WOULD TRY AGAIN!
Bus was extremely slow. AC on bus did not work well, so it was hot and uncomfortable. And bus driver made a flirting comment toward me that was unprofessional.

The bus left around 10-15 mins late. The drive was fast but not smooth - highs and lows of speed. Stopped at 2 places for food - one looked unhygienic and the other one was isolated restaurant in the middle of nowhere and was super expensive for bad food
The driver is a friendly and helpful person.
Overall an enjoyable trip

Bus advertised to take 4 hours however it took is 7.5 hours. The bus driver picked up some lady along the way. He stopped next to the road and waited for 30 minutes without telling us what was going on. We only stopped once in 7 5 hours so had to hold in.
The seats were very old and uncomfortable and there was an annoying and unnecessary 30 minute stop at a tourist trap were they tried to sell you overpriced stuff.

I have taken Mekong Express many times and never have anything to complain about.
Great company! 
Would recommend

A comfortable journey, left on time and arrived on time. Driving was in keeping with the Cambodian way, two comfort breaks on the way and we shared the van with mail, parcels and anything else going our way. No problems for us and our three kids.
No place for bags, the bus is too small for the number of passengers!

Bad support when you have wrong ticket ordered, only 70% refund if u cancel a booking...!
Even one week before using the Bus.

No confort. No customer service. People are placed regardless of their seat number. No information from the staff about stops/breaks. I did not sleep all long the trip. But I must admit they were punctual. However, I don’t recommend it.
Driver of bus from Saigon to Phonam Penh was eating and talking with fellow passengers during driving of Seat 1A

Driver of bus from Saigon to Phonam Penh was eating and talking with fellow passengers for long time. Driver form Phonam Penh to Sihanoukville of VIP van was 80% of his driving on cell phone. In both the cases it is not safe for the passengers's life
Overall, it was a pleasant experience. As expected the bus was late but is okay as I have built in extra hour, Thanks

I have never got car sick, but with this driver i did. The driver drove very fast, and pass other cars either right or left hand side. He even drove out of driving line, and got in the line of opposite road.

The bus ride from Siem Riep to Phnom Penh was terrifying. Driver drove very irresponsible and had no regard for the 11 passengers. I've had many scary drivers here but this guy kept driving in the left lane even with incoming traffic. Not worth my life.
Nice trip, thanks
Safe driver, arrived only 1 hr after scheduled arrival

Old van with too much persons inside
Some people where in the trunk with luggages
We changed van, it wasn’t plan
It was horrible

The back of the van was so hot! We both got almost sick from the heat. I had to fan us the whole way to be even ok. The vents were broke, some missing. We almost got out early as it was really hot. Add in the roads and it might be our last trip in vip van

Bus attender un necessarily  took 1$ from me.as per his statement it’s required for Vietnam emigration clearance but actually there is no such rule available any where he was insisted to get 1$ from me ..this is for your information and necessery action..

We arrived at our destination 90 minutes late.

The driver was stopping to pick people up from the roadside the whole journey.

Awful experience. The night bus was terrible without any basic accommodations (toilet, place to put our bags,...).
Arriving at Phnom Penh they annonced us that our reservation was cancelled and we were replaced 6 hours later.
Awful.
Good !

Drivers are so frendly and kind.
My seat  was the rearmost row, and it was too hot all the way.

The driver drove dangerously. He straddled the yellow line and drove on the opposite side of the road, even when there were no cars in sight. He swerved in an out of the lanes and almost hit other cars and trucks. He took unnecessary risks.

This is not an easy route to drive. Our driver was on time, cleanly dressed, the van was clean in and out, everyone (2 tourists and 9 locals) was polite. Our driver remembered where to drop us off. It was a bumpy road and let's just say he made good time!

Driver use telephone always being drive.
But he so kindness with guess.
We were very satisfied with the Taxi Trip, everything was fine. We can realy  recommend this service.
Driver was good but talked on the phone several times.
Great ride. Office maybe underestimates travel time for this road.
poor seating , a/c not good, unstable wifi
The back seats should be less expensive since they are incredibly uncomfortable. Be wary when booking these seats.
Maybe for foreign people could be better if driver speak english
The bus was quite old but very comfortable. The staff was really helpful and friendly. I would use their services again

Car was 45' late, driver did not speak a word of English, he stopped on the way to chat, he kept turning AC off, harshly complained that our hotel was far away. I would pay much more to avoid thus experience again!
Driver drive too fast and it nearly get accident.
The car is old and the facilities are broken. The air conditioner and ventilation system don't work, everyone in the car sweat like hell. The company should really check on this.

Too much people inside 
We changed bus it was not planned
Only 1 star for inspector as there wasn’t one to rate! Journey was smooth and driver nice and polite. Timings were accurate and seating comfortable.

++: all in time, driving well.
--: the guy didn't want to push my bag on the road before Sihanoukville so I need have gone across all the construction, couldn't say me where the last station, conditioner is no regulation, short beds for European.
 Thx
The bus broke down halfway. Though the conductor and driver tried their best to help us get alternative transportation.
Good, but too many stops without explanation. As a tourist I felt kinda lost (should I get out? Are we having lunch? Etc)

left backpack behind. Driver lied multiple times. Hours of searching and finally reviewing video surveillance showed that he moved it to be covered and shut the door. He tried to steal it, lied and we had to pay 30$ to get it back after he was caught.

Comfortable bus and excellent driver, very safe and responsible.  However, the bus from Kep is just a pickup service from various guest houses to go to Kampot, where we then joined the bus service to Phnom Penh, so arrived much later than scheduled
Very good, comfortable and safe and right on schedule
Easy, convenient and hassle free in addition to very reasonable cost. Initial problem with online booking was rectified immediately. Definitely recommend
Good trip, could've been faster :D

The ticket office continues to suggest a shorter time for arrival. I think they've not been on Rd number 5. It is 6 hours. The heavy traffic and number of 18 wheelers  weaving between cars and motorcycles  makes a shorter trip impossible.  Good drives!
We arrived 4 hours later, we didn’t have the seats we book for, and the driver drop off us in the middle of nowhere, we had to take a 20$ tuktuk to go to the center of sihanoukville

Driver drove fast. In the backseat it was quite uncomfortable while jumping up and down the whole time because of bumps in the road. Also the backseats for 4 people is quite cramped together compared to the other seats.

Was ready 1 hour before the depature time and ready to be picked up but pick up showed only after several calls to the booking office. Van departed 6:45am instead of 6:00am.
Driver must be good as the van had not wreck with other vehicle as it overtakes

Trip from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville.
lThe driver stopped 3km before the droppong point and tried to leave us there. There were tuk tuk drivers waiting.
We argued that he should take us to the post office. After a few minutes he agreed...

Tu reserves 2 places pour un trajet direct dans un van et tu te retrouves dans un bus qui te laisse à  kampot pendant plus d' une heure pour finir en van. Manque de respect envers les clients. Champa Mékong??

They are not only 30 minutes late to fetch us and change my booking of 12pax mini van to 2 cars which only can fix 8pax. Finally we need to negotiation with the driver to add 1 more car with addition cost of US$2 (from mini van  US$22 to 3 cars US$ 24)

Minivan departed on time. Reasonably comfortable. Adequate toilet breaks. Last few miles very bumpy over a road that had been damaged in the rainy season. Could not comment on inspector, as I don't remember seeing one.

Free pickup from hotel. A little confusion over seating but quickly sorted. Driver took great care over damaged road. I felt safe throughout the journey. Rest stops were at clean and comfortable places. Best bus journey in Cambodia so far (out of 5).
Comfortable and efficient, smiling and friendly staff

VIP Minibus was quite old and had not enough horse power to overtake slow vehicles. Driver was too risky. We arrived later in PP as tragic was too busy. Expected time frame for trip from SHV to PP should be adapted as not realistic.

Start 15 mins late for van to arrive at depot! Driving outrageous - tooting aggressively, swerving. Can’t believe there were no casualties. Arrive 2 hours after ETA. Timetable needs to be updated. Van very comfortable, although impossible to sleep!

Driver was rude, drove way too fast, and the van picked up multiple passengers along the way who paid the driver directly (corruption). These people were then squeezed in between other passengers who had paid for their seats. Not acceptable at all.

Punctual
Driver was so nice that we could be dropped out at the airport

Everything was fine, except the info about arrival time at the final stop in P P (bus station) could have been more clear/exact - 
The driver from the hotel had to wait for a rather long time -
We were almost left by the bus because we were not informed that we would be transferred to another bus and station.
Best bus company of Cambodia

Night bus bed was ok, but the AC flap was missing so there was a constant cold flow of air. Luckily blanket was provided. The seated trip was 1.5h delayed when it arrived in Kampot, but ride itself was standard.

The mini-bus was very crowded and I was not comfortable in the back seat - App. half way it broke down; something wrong with engine or fuel (?) The Inspector handled the situation very well, but she should have stayed on the "new" bus till the end station
Old Bus, delayed, no recommendation

I missed bus because of the speedboat being late making 3 unknown stops . I did use this company on journey from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville . The  staff in the office were polite. The Driver did his best considering heavy traffic  and drove safely
The driver was good, and the stop was also clean and nice. However, the stop was a bit long.
Hassle free, great service ??
Nice company, nice trip from Phnom Penh to Kampong Cham. Everything was fine.
Très bon voyage. Le chauffeur conduisait très bien pour un cambodgien?.il fait souvent des arrêts pipi et un stop pour manger. Bus confortable et petite bouteille d eau à disposition.

I had a nice trip from Siem Reap to Phno Penh. I took the night bus and it was totally well. The bus was on time, pretty clean. You have a bottle of water and some snacks. The staff was nice. The price is ok. I totally recommand Mékong express company.

Booked Mekong Bus Phnom Penh to Siewm Reap and return. Going up was great in main bus, room to sit, relax and stretch ones legs and go to toilet.
On return we had booked major bus but were given minibus where not enough room to stretch legs or go toilet

The bookmebus website gave the departure location as Serendipity Beach Road. It was not there. A local person said it was somewhere downtown but we did not know exactly where. We did not travel and had to make alternative arrangements. Would not recommend

Better than expected, everything worked! We read bad reviews in google and tripadvisor and we were a bit scared, but everything was correct!
I would even recommend this for going from Sihanoukville to Kampot.
Really good trip, even when we arrived at the Viatnam border. They did everythig for the passengers
Very well traveled. The driver made several stops for the toilet. Accomodation not used.
It was okay. Very nice paesonality. Preferably English speaking. Nice and safe driving, sometime fast enough. I will book another trip back to city.
Amazing bus service! On time, no delays, and no problems or complaints to speak of!

I was booked for the 08.00 Minibus service (Hotel pickup at 07.00 hours). But hotel pickup onlu arrived at 07.45 hoyrs and we were seemingly transferred to a luxury bus departing Siem Reap at 08.30 hours. Apart from that everything went well.

I rode the bus from Phnom Penh to Battambang. Bus did not leave on time. Driver stopped too much. Many informal fares and rides. Bus stopped for hitch hikers and for ppl who wanted to buy water/food. Bus stopped way outside Battambang city. Inconvenient!
We arrived at 3 PM instead of 1 PM !
One stop shv - pp would have been enough. A second stop made arrival a bit later than necessary, and my lunch hosts were made to wait. Driver was otherwise polite n accommodating
I had a nice journey and would recommend the company
The trip was okay, has free breakfast/snack and lunch as well. :) Only that, the driver easily gets annoyed most specially for us that he cannot understand communicating with him in english.
Wrong deapature location, and the seat was sold again to other people
Comment decrire mon voyage de 12 heures : pluie dans le bus (non, non je ne rigole pas) , clim a fond, bus tres vieux...

arrived into ppenh one hour late - not satisfied - tour guide or whatever you call him had the bus stopped for a girl to get some money out of an atm .... sorry, that us annoying .... if everybody on the bus has a request - wll not use yr company again
Хороший и удобный минибус. Доехали почти без опозданий, что очень хорошо для Камбоджи. Вайфай не работал в автобусе. При бронирование обещалось предоставление воды, но ее не было.
The driver from the border to Phnom Penh drives like a crazy person. He overtakes when cars and bikes are almost in front of us

Bus was undersubscribed, so they've arranged for us to be transported to another bus free of charge. The other bus left about 45 minutes after the originally planned time, but still arrived in Siem Reap almost on schedule.
The sevice quality was good,except a trouble in reservation of the seat. But,I enjoyed transfer in my trip of Cambodia.

Wonderful experience. Driver was early to pick us up and patiently waited till we checked out. He was polite and friendly. No unnecessary stops on the way and got us to Siem Reap airport in great time. Recommend this service to everyone.

Seat selection during bus booking is completely different from the seating layout in the bus. We chose sleeper berth/seats at the front during booking. However, those seat numbers were in the last row in the bus!. Had a bumpy ride!

1 hour delay. Bad hotline-service. If we (or our hotel) hadn‘t contact the office, who told us, the system was down, we had never get a taxi, because they didn‘t found our order-nr., even we got a booking confirmation. The driver came with his wife & baby
Everything was good, keep doing like this!
came into kampot 2hrs late - also due to the shokingly bad road. departure half an hour late and noone keeps you informed. bad customer service.
thank you :-)
thank you :-)
Most comfortable van I've used. Highly recommended but the van always arrives at destination about an hour later than expected cos the driver picks people up along the way
Once more the online reservation didn’t work and we were rescheduled on another bus...total improvisation and amateurism.
I love your company and customer service. They are great.

Car was nice. AC was working well. Driver was great. I had told him I need to make a bus connection in Phnom Penh. He respected time, and even made sure other passengers do it too. Only stopped when needed, and even dropped me off where I needed to go.

The driver was trying to break the land speed record - getting us to Siem Reap in just 7 hours. He drove very aggressively, but was very friendly and we made it quickly (and safely) to our destination.

Upside: left on time, did not make unscheduled stops, did not overfill the bus, A/C levels were comfortable. Downside; stopped at one of the less convenient rest stops and the driver drove like a complete madman.
The bus from sihanoukville to phnom penh is advertised as 4 hours however it took us 7 hours.
A very comfortable trip with a fabulous driver. He showed up on time, was friendly, professional and courteous. Very satisfied.
A pleasant and comfortable trip!
Excellent journey!
Totally, I like this trip. The driver is good, but if he can drive faster, it's well be better. Because it costs me 6 hr frim shihanouk to phnom penh.

Everything was OK except we got to the destination late and missed
the ferry. They should allow at least 6 hours travel time between Phnom
Penh and Sihanoukville on their schedule instead of 4 hours. 
We survived this trip.
Everything ok; departed on time and arrived on time
The driver should not stop to pick up the passenger on the way as it is not professional.

The bus has clutch problems,driver was driving too close to vehicles in front and looking at his phone,yawning very loudly.Also air conditioning at the rear poured water all over suitcases meaning contents wet.My job is a coach driver and the driver bad

Globalement la compagnie est sérieuse et efficace. Nous avons eu un retard au départ de Phnom Phen le vendredi soir du aux bouchons dans la ville mais dont la compagnie n'est pas responsable. Satisfaite dans l'ensemble
The bus service was easy to book online, the location for the departure was completely clear, it left on time,and the bus was clean and comfortable.
The driver was a bit crazy as he was overtaking on blind areas and speeding like crazy in the torrential rain and lightning storm. I was very scared. But we didn’t die so.....

Trip has been way way better than our trip from Bangkok to Siem Reap which the driver easily gets annoyed when trying to clarify something in English since he cannot understand us. The driver and inspector for our Siem Reap to Bangkok trip is really nice.
The bed is too crowded for 2 persons. Should have booked 2 so you wouldn't be paired with someone you dont know.
The driver was great! And trip was great, it’s fun sitting in front.
Nice express
Left on time and arrived ahead of schedule. Comfortable drive. Bathroom stops and Lunch stop. WiFi didn't work.

Our passports were taken at the border. The conductor did not explain why, as he is not fluent in English. The conductor snatched our passport from us, leaving us no choice. ISome travellers were asked to give bribes for their Visa to be processed quickly

When I want to cancel tickets and send message by chat, as soon as I can receive answer .
Bus driver is good and safety

Took over 8 hours not 6- didn’t get to Phnom Penh until 7pm (it was meant to be 4.45) stopped evey 5 mins to let locals on and off - no exaggeration must of made over 30 stops! Old bus, no toilet or WiFi!- only good thing was price!
Bus covered in cockroaches, left an hour late. Bus driver was driving very fast (100km/h) and very dangerously. I was afraid for my life.

Everything was good. I will consider taking a large bus with another company on my return although it will cost more. I say this for the simple reason that the road is in poor condition and it was a very bouncy ride in a passenger van.
We arrived one hour before to our destination. Everything was good and driver was careful.
Arrived safely and 1 hour early. Bus is clean and acceptably comfortable. Driving is quite fast with lots of overtaking, travellers might be a little alarmed! There is a stop off halfway.
The Bus was not as in the pictures. Spaces are very tight.
Love it .... the van leave on time
Great service which left on time and arrived on time. Good comfort break half way through with small supermarket and clean WC/wash facilities. Could not recommend highly enough.
We missed the bus due to delayed arrival at pier by Island Speed Ferry.
Contrary to other reviews, the buses from Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh, and from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap departed on time. Staff were also very friendly and were helpful during the border crossings.

The ride was close to 12 hours. The bus stopped almost every hour to pick up and drop off passengers. The driver does not speak English and could not answer questions on what's going on. Unfriendly stuff!

Your minivans are good but the driver had no experience on the road. We told him he was too slow after 2 hours at 40km/h and eventually arrived 1h30 later than scheduled.
Road was terrible but could have changed to the Takeo-Kep-Kampot one
Not VIP

The van is clean and quiet, with comfy seats. It left punctually and made very good time along the Sihanoukville - PP route, with one stop at a proper rest area. Would totally use this instead of going by bus on account of the journey speed!

We booked 12 seater minivan for 12 pax with 6 big and 6 small luggage. But the minivan actually can only take 10 passengers, after we put in all our small luggage. And that’s no news about our complaint for our portable speaker left in minivan.
After I contacted head office driver finally showedup 35 min late. No conversation at all. Drove like crazy, glad we had no accident. Would not book again here.

I've waited at my hotel for more than 1 hour for pick up and the minivan departed 1.5 hour later than the scheduled time. If there's delay like that, you should send out a notification via call/ text/ email etc.
I lost my shoes.  Did you found them?

Driver waited for late customers for 45 min and add to that very bad roads, meant for him speeding then sudden braking when toad very bad or he just crashed through bad potholes. Terribly uncomfortable ride

booked a direct bus, but then I had to change busses anyway and wait for 2 hours for fhe next bus + pay extra for the tuktuk driver to bring me to the office (Siem Reap to Kampot - > changed bus in Sihanoukville)
Always pleasant and enjoyable
We arrived 2 hours late in Kratie and were never informed about what happened.
This ride was not good and I won’t be recommending this service. I’ll be following up with an email as well.
overall good, only no snack. Normally I will get snack box

Almost 3 hours delay. No explanations. Start from Phnom Penh one hour behind schedule.
Unfriendly driver from P. Penh to Kep.
No help finding & unloading suitcase from the underneath storage at Kep.
Poor performance compared to other bus companies.
It was a great traveling with this company’s VIP bus.
We left on time. Made the trip in 3.5 hours . Extremely rough trip due c to condition of road, but felt the drive handled the conditions add best add possible.
Even though, I had a slight problem with my booking regarding the departure schedule, that issue had been resolved smoothly between BookMeBus and the bus company.
15 minutes late to go. Took 4.25 hours for a 3 hour trip. Driver was very slow but at least safe. Why do we wait 1 hour before pick up when we are picked up just before departure?
Good trip. Big bus, good temperature, the seats were reasonably comfortable.
Good experienced driver, safe journey

Driver was not English speaking as ordered. He drove recklessly, t car was missing a seatbelt & crashed. After this, t driver was only concerned about t car & did not give us any information.We contacted bookmebus after 2 hr. wait.T new driver was as bad.
What a helluva ride! On 17.12.2018 it took us 8,5 hours to get to Saigon. I should have spared few extra dollars and gotten on an ibis x(
We had an excellent trip. Timely 10 minute comfort stop and a 20min lunch stop. Very good driver and well maintained, comfortable van. Reccomended.
Extremely late and poor service

Hostess rips off tourist at the border.  Terrible that employees are allowed to operates this way. Sent an email to your with pictures on Dec. 2....no response. Will post negative review on Trip Advisor.
Streets very shit.. so no arrive in time.. but all people know the situation in cambodia now, traffic and street very bad
a

phnom penh to battambang. left and arrived on time. save driver no dangerous situations. stop 1 in kampong chhnang, stop 2 in pursat at a restaurant where you could have lunch. used it already a couple times.
Pretty good. Left 20 minutes late then stopped for petrol. The road for the first hour was petty rough. All up 3 hour trip was 4.25 hours.

Great clean bus with good Air Con and some WIFI. Bus left earlier than scheduled and arrived 30mins early. Driver overtook a lot and drove fast but seemed to be safe. 2 stops enroute for toilet and refreshments were appreciated.

The bus did not have WiFi, usb connections, plug-in connections as advertised online. Had washroom, & A/C worked.  We were served only water, no pastry as advertised. After crossing into Cambodia, the bus broke down. Driver did good job. But NOT safe.

We did not get the seats we booked. The vip bus we had to sit on the back 4 seats squeezed together unable to move. All other seats looks comfortable apart from ours. We did not think this was fair. Staff were nice
My laptop was stolen on this bus ride. I need a report from the company, but no one is replying to me. Can Khai Nam please contact me as soon as possible.
Great service, definitely recommended. Thank you!
On the homepage it said the journey will take around 4.5h, but it took 7h, so I missed the last ferry in Sihanoukvile (to Koh Rong) which was really inconvenient. Driver and bus were ok though.

Driver was very Dirty and unfortunately Not friendly. He peed next to the car and spat out all the time! Diver limbed an we felt not secure. We unterstand that cambodia is different to Europe But basic standart has to be met ;-)
The journey was smooth with plenty of stops. The bus was on time and was nice to get some snacks and water on board.
The four hour journey took 7 hours but everything else was okay. Would book again maybe.
Clean minibus, left on time, arrived 30 min earlier, recommendable
Very satisfied
Worst driver ever. The driver overtaken many time 2 times almost hit pedestrians and 2 times almost head on collision. lack of driving skills and He is not a thoughtful person.
Leisure
car was 2h late

The bus made two long stops 10 minutes part. Then did not stop the rest of the journey . A passenger asked to use the washroom and the driver mocked her asking her to use the bush . Another passenger was not feeling well and was puking five people to stop
Driver and service was very good
the bus was very unpunctual and the music played in the bus was unbearably loud. The restroom stop happened just next to the road

Comparing to other night buses, it was great. Clean, quiet, the steward spoke English, water and snack included, toilet in the bus, right on time, no noisy smelly locals. All good. Narrow beds though, as always, three rows.
Arrived on time. Driver was careful. Good service
Easy to book! My driver was waiting for me on my arrival and was very courteous.

My best minivan experience in Cambodia. Friendly, punctual, comfortable. The driver wasn't loud, he offered toilet stops but didn't stop too often, he drove safely but quickly and passed other cars efficiently. Comfortable/reclining seats.
Bus was late because of bus mechanical issues
Driver did not arrive on time. Whatsapp contract provided responded one hour later, after I had already arrived at destination.
Hat alles tadellos funktioniert. Vom Flughafen phnom phen an das pier in Sihanoukville in 4,5 Stunden.

Overall is ok. But the staff in the office claimed that walk in booking close 2 days yet the website still accept booking at the day before departure. There was a little argument luckily Problem solved but need to take Note on this matter

Overall is ok. But the staff in the office claimed that walk in booking close 2 days yet the website still accept booking at the day before departure. There was a little argument luckily Problem solved but need to take Note on this matter
The van is so hot.
Bus was a bit old and not so comfortable. For a long trip we expected to have at least more space for our legs. Nevertheless, the bus was punctual.
Le van est parti et arrivé à l'heure.le chauffeur avait une conduite sportive mais assurée sur une route qui par moment est une véritable piste ! Bonne expérience avec cette compagnie.

Driver was 30 minutes late and then his car broke half way so we were stuck in the boiling heat for 4 hours while the car got fixed. The trip should have taken 4 hours but instead took 9. Would not recommend!!!
This time was better.
Very nice service , punctual time and the wifi works
Very new van, very nice driver, comfortable seats. Thanks for the ride to and from Sihanoukville.
The private taxi arrived on time with no hassle at the airport. Professional driver. I Highly recommend this service.
Very good in all aspects
The driver drove fast but safe. Bus is a little cramped but comfortable.
Left in good time, arrived later than expected but due to road repairs. Good driving, lovely bus, plenty of comfort breaks. I will use again. Thank you.
Very nice and smooth ride. We arrived ahead of schedule. The inspector was very helpful and friendly.
Apparently the driver was not informed that the transfer was paid in advance. This led to some confusion. Not his fault. A plan where exactly to pick us up and to drop us would be helpful.

What could have been a frightening ride was fine because we had such a great driver-he could easily win the Indianapolis 500. He had incredible reflexes and drove in traffic that would have immobilized me. Driver on time as well. A+
Driver was very rude + he honked 5000 times On the way

Driver was horrible. Be kept talking all the time and when asked for water and instead of stopping in the super market he took us to a lady who robbed us. He was talking loudly on the phone and almost missed an accident. Horrible driver

The A/C was broken and changed the bus. We needed to wait a hour at the road. The driver didn’t explain and apologize us. I asked the driver that we go ahead to coffee shop to wait another bus what the company prepare. But he didn’t agree.

I know the ratings. They are right. Champamekong is the worst I ever had in my life. First Bus broke, second was overbooked, they took a barstool inside as another seat?, delivered goods on the way...a real adventure.

I know the ratings. They are right. Champamekong is the worst I ever had in my life. First Bus broke, second was overbooked, they took a barstool inside as another seat?, delivered goods on the way,a real adventure. Kampot to Sihanoukville 10 a.m.-7:50pm

They did not advance us the time of departure because they did not come to win. Having a place in the van, the driver stopped by the road more than 7 times to pick up or deliver packages or people arrived 2 hours later than planned never again
Good journey. But seat  are not comfortable

Driver was punctual and his knowledge of the route excellent. However some of his driving was hasty leaving us on edge with some heavy breaking and crazy overtakes. Passenger safety should be a priority.

Driver was punctual and his knowledge of the route excellent. However some of his driving was hasty leaving us on edge with some heavy breaking and crazy overtakes. Passenger safety should be a priority.
My driver was amazing. So kind, safe, and good conversation.
No Wifi in the Bus  and the driver was not  driving safely

Oltre ogni aspettativa.  Abbiamo viaggiato con diverse compagnie in Cambogia e questa ci è sembrata decisamente la migliore. Partita puntuale.  Sosta di 15 minuti più che sufficiente  autista prudente  per essere cambogiano.

Bus was advertised as having bathrooms, free wifi and air conditioning.  Bus had no bathrooms on it, driver didn't speak enough English to communicate the wifi password and he nearly had several accidents including almost hitting a cow.  Not impressed
Very good and safe driver. Punctual and arrived 30 mins ahead of time.

Trip took 5 hours (not 3), not because of bad roads but because we took the longest route possible and went through Takeo, Kep and then Kampot (Kampot was supposed to be first). Wifi did not work. I DO NOT recommend taking this company/route.

It advertises FREE WIFI but that didn't happen. The bus is older compared to the pictures online. And for a bus company with great reviews, I was shocked to be dumped in the streets of Saigon with no proper bus stop.
Efficient, excellent service.  Will use Mekong Express again.
Great service. Driver was waiting for me at arrivals gate. Straight into air conditioned car to where I needed to go.

Amazing bus ride!!!
10:30am bus, less people and great facilities.

I rated them through Google.

We would never ride with them again. This can not be true. The driver was driving too fast. and after 8 hours we were only there. An impudence.
Very nice clean Van with Wifi.
Very experienced and safe, yet fast, driver. Very pleasant trip. We all enjoyed it a lot.
A joke
Everything went perfect! It’s clear that the punctuality is not a strength ?

This was a very manageable four hour journey. The seats were comfy and could recline well. The air con was adequate. We were given bottles of water and we had a comfort break at a little oasis en route. It was nice to watch the world go by.

Very long wait after border procedure and no communication at all. My guess is that one of two passengers had some visa problem. No one said anything to the other passengers and we were left waiting for more than 1 hour. Inspector disappeared.
The driver was a bit late; other than that, all went well.
Driver drove full speed even through villages. We had a flat tire which was fixed. Nevertheless we arrived on time. Luggage was put under the seat as, also in the space for your legs.
It took us six hours to get from PP to SH though traffic was not too heavy. Would be helpful to update the journey time as I almost missed my boat to Koh Rong.

amazing! the trip was long (Siem Reap - Kampot) but the private taxi driver made it quicker and more interesting. he knew exactly where to stop and where something we would never see is on our way to point out. felt like traveling with a friend!
Leaving 55 Minutes to late.  Not even a seat for everybody. The boat was Cambodian Speed Ferry.
Wifi not  working

Made it from Siem Reap to Battambang but in pretty bad condition due mainly to the very strong and bad gasoline/exhaust gas smell. The bus should be immediately checked and fixed. Otherwise the staff at the office was really nice and professional.
Comfomfortable climatizined bus. But no wife on the board.Arrive on time
Good drive and safe. What is not good is have few stop to get a customer along the way. It take short time but plus two more restaurant. Overall is good and safe.
Driver is very punctual and helpful.

The roads were absolutely treacherous between PP and Kampot! Worst in SE Asia so far for sure. The driver was great and navigated well and safely. I was near the front. Wouldn’t  hesitate to use these guys again over some of the other death trap companies
Every perfect...great team, great service
On time and polite with wide experience
Polite and  on time with wide experience

Late pick up and no experience He dont know how to go to Sihanouk pier. I give him phone no. To contact the Ferry office, he still can't find the pier. Finally, I found by myself.
??

The best journey we’ve had throughout South East Asia- driver was helpful and friendly and drove very safely. There was spacious leg room and the air con was good. Punctual service, very clean van! 5* would definitely recommend !

We frequently travel on Mekong Express and felt this was the most unsafe trip we have experienced. Traffic was heavy and the driver repeatedly sped and overtook unsafely including on the verge of the road (I.e. on right side of vehicles). Disappointing.

Comfy bus, only WiFi wasn‘t working. 
Only problem, neither the inspector nor the driver spoke englisch so we had much fun at the boarder. U should know that they collected all passports in advants and give them at the boarder to one costems official.

Driver picked up with no issues, experienced Cambodian driving/ roads! Only fault was driver didn’t know/ couldn’t find hotel to drop us off, ended up getting tuk tuk for final small part of journey- would still use again though.

I asked for a pick up service from our hotel to the bus station, which was confirmed by Olongpich by e-mail. It NEVER showed up, I had to get a last minute tuk tuk and the Siem Reap staff was VERY rude, unpleasant and should def not be attending clients!!

Bus was modern, clean and a good temperature - a very comfortable journey. We arrived a little late due to major road works but the driver did very well despite the road conditions. WiFi was not working though

Yes I'm arrived with safe. But I have a complaint with do passports leave from Cambodia Bus company they do for their customers buy tickets with them direct only but they said if I book by online they not process passport for me. I need to do myself.
Enjoyable drive at a pace that allowed the scenery to b taken in. Enough breaks and of course door to door service.

This was a nightmarish experience. The driver was always making and taking calls on his 2 handphones, if he was not sending messages. As he was doing all that, he would be overtaking against traffic. I should've asked for a careful and responsible driver,

This was a nightmarish experience. The driver was always making and taking calls on his 2 handphones, if he was not sending messages. As he was doing all that, he would be overtaking against traffic. I should've asked for a careful and responsible driver,

This was a nightmarish experience. The driver was always making and taking calls on his 2 handphones, if he was not sending messages. As he was doing all that, he would be overtaking against traffic. I should've asked for a careful and responsible driver,

This was a nightmarish experience. The driver was always making and taking calls on his 2 handphones, if he was not sending messages. As he was doing all that, he would be overtaking against traffic. I should've asked for a careful and responsible driver,
Driver drives very fast. He almost hit animals on the street.
Comfortable bus.  15 late departure owing to late arrival is customers

We booked a 1.30pm Van which was meant to arrive at 5.30pm but we were told that the bus had 'broken down' (aka there were not enough passengers) and were moved onto a 2.45pm van with another company that didn't have Wi-Fi and the journey took over 7 hrs!

Did not like that the driver stopped after only driving for an hour , then after driving for 1 1/2  hours stoped again. The driver should drive for 2 hours before stopping so the last end of the journey is not so long . Also the A/c was not working proper

The bus was very old,  the Ac didn't barely work,  no WiFi, the bus departed 40 minutes later.  So only going from point A to B was real from your promises guys.  
You should consider tell the truth to your costumers before purchasing a ticket.

We booked tickets online for the 7am bus and when we arrived we were given our tickets at the counter and then went to get on the bus but was told it was full. We ended up having to wait for the 830 bus. It was also advertised as a 4 hour trip, but took 6
Very nice bus service! Left early and had a very nice trip, safe driver and we reached Phnom Penh on time.

On time, reliable.
I booked months in advance and everything was ready when I arrive.  Very punctual too
Best
We had a pleasant and comfortable journey from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap with friendly hostess and good driver.
Old van, not much space, bags at my feet, dirty.. And driver was a bit mad!
(No inspectors). Thanks
All what's count after all. He was a good driver.
After all he is a good driver.
After all he is a good driver.

Left on time, however the driver stopped several times during our trip to pick up and drop off hitchhikers alongside the road as the bus was not 100% full. The trip was uncomfortable due to the roads, traffic and local pick-ups but the van is comfortable
the attendant request illigal money from me. It is a very dissappointed experience. I will not use Mekong express anymore.

We booked in advance as I wanted to make sure we had seats to see the Mondulkiri elephant project so used bookmebus to make reservations in advance after finding them on the elephant project’s website. They picked us up and made sure we arrived.
This company is much better than the other one we used but it was still a long trip. Bus left late and the WiFi wouldn’t work but the driver was quite safe by Cambodia standards
Very good service and a very good and sate driver. On time and car in good condition.
Not arrived on time

some Explanation about the trip would be appreciated but i suppose the driver did not speaker well english langage.
So you should deliver a information paper about it 
Careful driver and in fact good trip

The wifi did not work for the first half of the trip, which was disappointing I guess not the drivers fault as he did not know. We arrived about an hour late which was upsetting considering all the stops we made on the way to drop people off, ran out of

I love the services with free cookies and bottled water included. I will tell all my friends to use Mekong Express anywhere place to travel. Thumbs up. Online ticketing is fast and trust worthy complete with seat numbers to choose from. Highy recommended
Wifi and the usb port for charging are not working. Fix it please thanks.

Seats were good, but no storage space. Had to hold everything in our laps. Limited footroom.

When driver took passenger passports, didn't explain the border process. Had no idea what was happening. Not cool. 

It was relatively on time??

We took the mini van from Phnom Pengh to Battambang.The bus leave on time and it head all the way to BTB after two short stops at the beginning of the trip to pick up passengers. The driver drove quite aggressively and we manage to reached BTB in 5.5 hour
Excellent all round journey. Good  driving and informative along the way.

Mekong Bus Review
The trip was little bit bumpy but I still enjoyed the ride. It was well ventilated and the bus is tidy.

Very good transfer. Driver at the hotel even earlier than scheduled, fast but safe and experienced driver, dropped us at two different spots, the second we would never have found. Helped us with our luggage. Very very good. Good guy.

Very good transfer. Driver at the hotel even earlier than scheduled, fast but safe and experienced driver, dropped us at two different spots, the second we would never have found. Helped us with our luggage. Very very good. Good guy.

The Air Conditioner was freezing cold in the bus for over half of the trip. It gave me a headache that night. I felt like I was in a freezer, it was so cold. I could see into the A/C unit which was extremely dirty. I’m a loyal Mekong customer.

The bus is old, the seat is not comfortable. The inspector asked us to pay extra fee when we pass the border. For vietnamese it was 50.000 vnd per person. And I know for foreigners it was way high! Please stop that action.
Excellent service. On time. We had just enough time to eat and get in with our journey. Driver made us felt safe and secured. Highly recommend.
The bus was comfortable and clean. It was a bit cold by the window but thankful a blanket was provided.
The van was nice and clean. I appreciate the water given. The border crossing was chaotic so that was not enjoyable.
Just appalling.
We had a pleasant and comfortable journey from Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh return with friendly hostess and good driver.
It’s totally sucks. It’s been delayed 1.5 hours and I have flight to catch
good bus!
The driver drove very fast, spending most of the time overtaking other vehicles. A tire was replaced due to a breakdown, but we arrived on time.
5 star service and fast transit through border control. Only complaint is the wifi was not active for the entire trip!
Driver stopped often to load different People. At the end we were 10 people in a 9 Man Bus

The driver was incredible. The roads can be really uncomfortable to drive on but he was careful and did the best he could to get us to our destination safely. Was the best bus drive I have experienced while being in Cambodia.
The stop station (near the boundary) is so terrible. Mekong Express should not stop at the station likes that.
The driver and the office receptionist are not friendly. This is my first trip to Cambodia, but they gave me just a little bit of the information when I asked.
All has gone well, but we arrived with a small delay.
We did not get the seat that was booked and had to seat on hard small space and driver make frequent stops.

Bus started almost 15 minutes late. there is little communication at the post office about which vehicle, timings etc. Lots of traffic on the way to Sihanoukville and the driver didnt seem to be in a hurry at all. reached almost 35 minutes late.

Another good service. Not quite as good as the journey from Phnom Penh, simply because the bus was older and one of the passengers vomited. But otherwise a great service. Check in was efficient, they let me use wifi and bathroom. Excellent.
The inspector was very responsive to call me for location updates because I went to the wrong station. Thankful they're willing to wait extra 10mins.

Excellent service. Driver arrived on time at the airport and was very pleasant. Stopped off at a great roadside restaurant on the way to Sihanoukville. Very comfortable SUV and was a sensible, safe driver. Would definitely recommend the service.
I don’t know drivers name but he is funny
N/A
The trip was very good, the toilet on the way not so good.

We took bus from Ho Ci Minh to Siam Reap. It was not so bad, what I read about this company before. Start at 7:00, there were on time, changing bus in Phnom Penh,we had 2 hours delay, so we changed buses immediately. It had sometime wifi and air condition
Safe trip and very friendly.
The bus was 3 hrs late than the time mentioned on the bookmebus website.

Hello, I am not too dissatisfied with your service, however the handling of the passports by the staff and the border crossing is not great. Also very minimal communication from the host. Seat was quite uncomfortable, But but thank you for the safe journe
Good cheap transport. Leaves on time and is reliable. Driver was kind to non-khmer speakers. Stops at public toilets reasonably often. Good pick up and drop off locations.

We booked a private car because we had a flight and we wanted to be sure that we ll be on time. Unfortunately, the car was more than 1 hour late, not even in the right pick up place. So we didn't take any break in 5 hours drive.. Driver was OK
Taxi driver was very nice and kind! It was a nice drive to Battambang from Siemreap and even faster then they said
The best driver on the world
Very good trip
Good bus service
Great service
Overall is good

Would you please ensure a better puntuality and preparation please. 1 hour delay is unexceptable. Moreover, the driver had to stop for a fuel which increased our delay.  After, he was lost in a city and we had to take precautions - we almost missed a boat

I booked a minivan, but was told it was full, even though I had payed in advance. I got the option to switch to a big bus, but for the same price. The bus was definitely not up to standard and I feel I payed too much. I didn't have a choice (fully booked)

My seat was occupied by another woman and she also said her seat was double booked. Careless of both the travel agency and bus service.
Driver was super rough. We were about to fail once.
Good service

Bus was a little late departing and very late arriving to our destination.
The bunks were clean and you got blankets and a pillow but if you’re over 6ft (180cm) you’re going to have to lie diagonally across the compartment. 
Drivers radio kept us up.
All ok no problem
One half late , have to change car in P.P.!!
The staff of the bus spoke Khmer language, so I could not undertand what happened.
Excellent driver, friendly, we enjoyed our trip. Easy central pick up and drop off location, we definitely recommend.

We caught 4 minivans across Cambodia on our trip and this was by far the best... we were worried about the reviews but we now think that a lot of them were made by precious tourists who don’t understand Cambodian driving and roads... great leg room!

Got us there and felt pretty safe - we got little to no leg room. They make stops on the way to make deliveries but these were generally brief. Air conditioned but no water or wifi provided, overall a fairly average service.
No comment, all are good
The inspector’s announcement is incomprehensible.
Safe and on time.  Instructions was not clear. Aircon is not cool enough and just 2 bus stops 10am and 6pm
Driver was very friendly and he really assist his passengers. Office receptionist in Phnom Pehn is very good
Доехали без задержек, отправление в срок. В автобусе работает кондиционер, wi-fi не работал, были остановки для туалета и перекуса. Водитель совсем не говорит на английском.

Была большая авария на дороге, стояли в большой пробке, но доехали при этом за заявленное время, водитель обгонял кого только мог. Водитель не разговаривает на английском, останавливались пару раз , чтобы сходить в туалет.
Everything was ok. Good ! More attentions to foreigners.
Two hours late, no seatbelt on my seat, besides that good.

No snacks/wifi/water. Someone got away with putting a bicycle in the asle between the seats. Making it difficult to get through. The bus was 1h late and it also left the station 20min early. Let too many people on. Great driver though.

Usually took this van because it's fast and efficient. This time, driver stopped 1) for gas, 2) for snacks, 3) for toilet, 4) for lunch. Took 6 hours when it should have taken 4.5 or 5. Also changing dept time from 7am to 8am the night before is not ideal

I find the service fabulous. Sad that the road was so bad it took much longer than expected, but that wasn't the drivers fault. The hazard light pinged all the way to Kampot and we were air born for absecod went we hot a bump but I like this service.
Fabulous service. Really enjoyed the trip. The bus was comfortable and the driver was very safe. First class service, many thanks.
Nice staff, but very old bus.
The bus was never available I was redirected to another company please process my refund your service is non-existent

WARNING I  booked a bus for 2:30 PM I arrived at the designated departure point I was then told the bus was just not there ?  Even though I had a email confirming my ticket booking for the time required I was told that there was no bus leaving that day
Driver arrived early, car in good condition. Drove fast but was very competent driver.
Used for a trip from Siem Reap to Banlung. Trip was okay, but didn't stop for lunch break as promised and there is also another operator in town for half the price
Trip from Phnom Penh to Kampot was much longer than planned! Driver drove to fast especially at the beginning of construction sites so once we really jumped with the car ! Dangerous

The bus we had from SR to HCM City though arrive ahead of schedule, has  a defective AC.  It runs so slow....reason why we were late for the bus in going to HCM from Phnom Penh.  I suggest you should have a sleeper bus too.

Booked vip for comfort. Got an old limousine with small seats, ac too cold and can't be turned off, just repositioned. Inspector lied to me saying wifi was available until we set off where she said it was broken. Asked for partial refund, but no reply.
Excellent service. Driver arrived 30 minutes before departure time and called me to let me know he was there. His English was great and he was a great driver.

Driver was 30 min early and could barely speak English. On the way he got hungry and invited us to dinner at his house with his family which was a nice experience. He drove very good and we got to PP earlier than scheduled. Would recommend
Was great - just took an extra hour due to NewYear weekend traffic, not Mekong’s fault naturally. I use their service every time because they’re the best & most reliable
No comment all ok
It was too cold on the bus, no toilet, and no wi-fi

service véritablement excellent... Chauffeur prudent et très sympathique... Hôtesse extrêmement gentille... Seule l'adresse de départ et d'arrivée est à mieux préciser pour moi... car sur Google, Mekong express apparaît à différents points de la ville...
The bus service was very good. They picked us from hotel in Balung and provided free tuk tuk for hotel drop in Seim Reap. Was on time and comfortable journey. I will recommend this
The bus service was very good. They picked us from hotel in Balung and provided free tuk tuk for hotel drop in Seim Reap. Was on time and comfortable journey. I will recommend this

Extremely disappointing - your booking service says it is a 4 hour drive, I booked 8.15am for 1pm ferry. Driver didn’t turn up until after 9am & your phones were disconnected. Driver then said it was 5 hour drive, missing our ferry by 2 hours!! Very poor!
Good driver.  Easy to use web site.  Very happy with the service.  Just booked another taxi on this web site.
as usual the Vietnamese border slow not Mekong fault ,so arrive at riverside at 5pm other than the Border confusion evry thing ok have used Mekong for the last 6yrs
Amazing service. I had an emergency change and bookmebus got me a taxi driver for a different airport last minute. Really nice and accommodating.
Good driver and very helpfull for border papers

Journey took four hours, it’s not the fastest road granted,but I was a little confused as to why the driver would race like a lunatic then stop for a break while all the cars he overtook then went past again.Did he need to stop for a break more than once?
We were really impressed with Cambodia Post VIP, having now used other bus companies in Cambodia we notice the difference, definitely recommend!
The driver arrived on time and the car was clean. He didn't take a good route for about 10 kms, but was overall a good experience
Ok, booking and check in very easy. Bus not very modern, assistant very nice and good English.

About 10 mins after our scheduled rest stop our driver stopped  again and got into a fight with another man on the street. There was physical fighting and yelling. Driver had to be restrained & separated by others. It was most upsetting.  Bus 15mins late.
Driver drove safely. Minibus dod not have much leg room. Good rest stop. Booking worked well.

Really bad that no refund at all is done if you can't make it to the pickup point. In my case all the ferries from Phu Quoc was cancelled with very short notice (2 hours before planned departure) meaning loss of $120. At least 50% refund would make sense.

Very good service and help from the customer support when our ferry has been late. They where very reactive to arrange it all. 
The only thing, it would be better to know that there s a car changing in PP, but the drivers was very syncro. Cars very clea

We booked a transport from Sihanoukville Pier to Phnom Penh. If you are truly interested of my experience please contact me at mlejon@shire.com. I will warn everybody about this company!  Kind regards, Martina Lejon
Driver was very angry and dangerous driving.
Van left on time

The staff are highly commendable for their friendliness and courtesy. They were able to provide updates multiple times along the way. James, the staff on our border crossing from Cambodia to Vietnam, was very helpful in processing our papers.
had a fine trip... great value..
We requested for English speaking driver but the driver provided couldn't communicate at all. He dropped us at the center of Sihanoukvile instead of our hotel.
The trip was OK. We arrived 2 hours late though but I guess that's cambodia

Sometimes the driver drove too fast and dangerously.
So he was making stops for personal reasons.
The vehicle was clean and comfortable.
Broken seats could not recline broken arm rest  no wifi in bus could not turn off light on top of my head
Driver was on time spoke the best English he could. Car had engine light on so he swapped with another one on route with no delay to us. Delivered us right to hotel. very happy
Very smooth boarder crossing minimal delays...we did however not arrive until around 230pm
No drinking water in the night bus.

The driver turned up a hour late and kept telling me he would be 15 minutes so I wasn’t happy when he was so late. Lack of communication and want the most professional company I have dealt with, in the end the journey arrived ahead of schedule so all good

Very experienced and helpful driver. Kept calm despite terrible traffic jams on the road and in Phnom Penh. If you have to catch a flight, schedule safety time. At least  6 hours. Anything might happen. We only had very good experience with bookmebus!!
Arrived 1h30 late and the driving was dangerous. Giant ibis was much better and felt safer.
Everything was fine. We will book again if we need.
1 hour late and had to switch drivers without informing me so not the best experience

Покупали билет туда-обратно на Ко Ронг Самлоем. Что туда , что обратно задержался выезд на час. Места в ваших билетах ничего не значат, кто успел какие занять - туда и сел. Сначала завозят всех на остров Ко Ронг Самлоем, а потом на Ко Ронг.
Perfect! This is my first time to experience Sorya hotel bus and it's good. I sleep well. It is very comfortable. They have blankets that are newly washed.
The Driver was horrible. He driving to fast and risk our life’s anytimes at the trip from Pnehm Penh to Sihanoukville.

We arrived at the time on the ticket, no bus, no information. Our eventual bus didn’t deliver us to our destination. We had to wait a further 2.5 hours to change buses, again with little explanation. Terrible customer service. All it needs is to be honest

I bought a ticket online for the 230pm trip advertised from siem riep to Phnom Penh but the ticket did not exist. The inspector did however organise for another bus ticket with another company to compensate.
CP canceled run without notifying me.

A great service with great crew. Only delay was at border and that was out of staff control.
Very happy with everything and good value
The bus was very old, dirty and overly perfumed.
We had a good driver for Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh....thank you.
We did Siem Reap to Battambang. It arrived 30 late witch is OK considering the traffic. The driver was safe considering SEA standards, we felt secure. We would choose it again.

We’ve used a number of bus services in Cambodia and the post is easily the best. Beware on the SR to PP route, the bust can get pretty full. At one point we had 18 people in 14 seats. Not the end of the world, but a bit stuffy at times.
The route from PP to Kep is smooth and easy. We made no extra stops, arrived 30 minutes early, and there were only 4 of us traveling on the bus. Always recommend Cambodia Post.
คนขับรถขับแบบหวาดเสียว แซงรถระยะกระชั้นชิดและบีบแตรตลอดทาง ที่นั่งและระยะห่างแคบมาก นั่งไม่สบายทั้งกายและใจ
คนขับขับรถเร็วและหวาดเสียว ไม่แจ้งผู้โดยสารเวลาจอดพักว่าจะให้กินข้าวกี่นาที บีบแตรเร่ง อาหารที่จุดพักรถดูไม่น่ากิน ราคาแพงและไม่อร่อย
AC was good, bus was comfortable. Driver was unfriendly but competent. Yes, you will be scared for your life sometimes when they pass into oncoming traffic, but the drivers know what they're doing.
Great experience. Fast, safe, and reliable taxi from SR to PP.
Very slow arrived PP in 8hrs

The bus is okay for a night bus and it’s cheap. Driver drove fast = holding onto the rails around corners, talked the whole night and kept beeping his horn. It was impossible to sleep.
The drop off Phnom Pehn was different than ticket.

The Van is very old and the air-con is not cold. I expected it is a VIP van same I travel with other company. But it is an old Sanyong van. I swear stop travelling with Champa Mekong .
Best Regards
No great problems. Very efficient at border. Around an hour later than forecast.
Good driver Felt very safe . Appreciated the bottle of water provided
Departure & arrival at destination were on time. Smooth ride,  comfy seats and clean bus
Mr. Kah was a courteous and excellent driver! His English was great!

We have delay over than 2 hours in there as the bus is old and engine broken. We just stop on the road and driver said we need to wait for 45 mins for changing bus. Finally, we found a tuk tuk for going to Siem Reap and pay more 10usd in here.
Great driver, no complaint
the bus was awful and disgusting.  there are lots of bugs in and outside the beds.
Company said the trip was 45 min from sihanoukville to koh rong and it took 1h45 min to get there. It was bad.
Bus was late for more than 70 minutes and waited under hot sun !!!
(SIGH) ...
Driver was so slow... The expect arrival was suppose to be 8pm but we arrived before 10pm
The driver was sick, coughing and spitting the whole trip
Driver was really helpfull,we stuck in huge traffic he was doing everything not miss our ferry and we didn’t.Thank you so much,we really appreciate that!We recomend this company and driver
Many works on the road. An hour longer. But efficient drive.

Best trip so far in Cambodia! Been on a few buses... Good van. Friendly driver, safe and good. Took 5h, not 6h. Great!  Stopping for short breaks. I'll book my next trip with Seila Angkor Express. Also practical to book and pay via Bookmebus. Recommend.

Bus was on time, inspector ushered us through the border crossing, we were given water, snacks, and even a wet wipe to clean up. Bus was comfortable and AC was good. Driver did not try to kill us. WIFI worked on Cambodia side of the trip.
Very good.
Great driver..
Really nice and calm trip to Phnom Penh. Much more comfortable and punctual than a trip with Sorya.
I can recommend the company . Kind people and you can sleep on the bus. Time fly away!? thank you one more time.

The driver was a bit crazy in regard to overtaking but that’s Cambodia for you. We managed to get to the destination within half an hour of eta with 2 stops. Van was quite new and seats were pretty comfortable.

The trip from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville was awful: we made 4 stops to get out of Phom Penh. Then, we got a flat tire but the driver kept driving until it exploded. Quite dangerous. More than 2h30 late in total.
I recommend but not for toilets
I recommend but not for toilets

It was cheap and everything was take cared off. However the pick up service was one hour to late and there was so much miscommunication. At the end everything went well... as long you keep call them ;p
Really nice and realx trip, toilets, food, good wifi, nothing to say. Price pretty cheap for all the services
Very good driver. Traffic was really bad but he kept us moving & manuvered well. The air vents/a-c needs cleaning. Thank you ?

Car broke down and no information was given, we had a 5 hour delay and were told absolutely nothing. No one spoke English. Airconditioner was broken. Loud bad music was played continuously for some reason? We drove way too fast so kids puked. Horrible.
Wrong address for departure location
The driver was driving like the bus was stolen, a very unpleasant yrip. This driver should never be alowedto drive a bus anymore, ever!! There were no information given. Not even at the border
Very comfortable, on time and polite.

I have ordered taxi to take us for 4 hours tourney from Capital to south of Cambodia. Driver run out of petrol on motorway. Left us in the vehicle to get petrol. Whilst waiting in danger area on motorway, moped crushed into the vehicle. Not Good At All!!!
We are satisfied with the service and would totally choose Mekong Express again
The driver kept shouting, playing music and tooting the horn....it was impossible to sleep!
The bus broke down 4 times, we arrived 3:30 hours late, I want my money back!

The bus broke down for like 6 times, we arrived 4hours later. De driver couldn’t speak English. I did got very ill in de bus because of the warmth. I hope I can get my money back and you guys understand...

VERY unprofessional company.Pickup 90 MINUTES late (because an accident blocked the road about 150km from pickup point), but any reasonable company would have sent another car. Impossible communication. Poor driver had prob been driving for 16h - NOT SAFE
Great job. I made a mistake with the day. They still sent someone to me in 30 minutes and same price.

everyone very kind, but tuk-tuk driver that Mekong driver recommended for us ask for a lot of money. I think he is swindler. but, anyway, the VAN is very comfort. I late one and half hours but it is because of traffic jam.

The driver and not the one you gave the  car number ,came 1 hour later .At Phnom Penh he was tired so he ask us to change the car and the driver  .In 10 minutes this second car has a problem so we change another car ...We arrived in Kep 8 pm .Never again.

We where suposed to be picked up in our hotel in Siem Reap, we where waiting there for an hour an the pick up never came. As we where already late we had to go on a rush to the bus location, to wait there and then be sended on another bus (not direct)

The van is a bit old therefore not so comfortable.  The driver keep stopping on the way of the journey to pick up street pensengers, so the entire travelling time is 5 hours plus instead of 3 1/2hours.

The van is a bit old therefore not so comfortable.  The driver keep stopping on the way of the journey to pick up street pensengers, so the entire travelling time is 5 hours plus instead of 3 1/2hours.
It was badly organised. It was delayed by one hour.

One of the best Cambodian bus trips I've had. The driver was on time, both to leave and to arrive. He was not as reckless as many other bus drivers I encountered. There was enough room for passengers & luggage. The AC worked well, but not the wifi.
The van is comfortable but the seat has bugs that caused my skin to be itchy in different parts of my body.

My seats 6&7 has been swap to 9&10 without acknowledgment from me
And they said just sorry bcoz 6&7 has been buy at her place, while I already booked n paid since 27 Dec.

I booked for 3 individual slot for Luxury Bus,yet i was assignment a Hotel bus. My friends to squeeze to share the bed and I had to share with a stranger. I do not speak their language and was rushing to the next station had to made to with what was given
Driver missed my stop! Very bad!
It took almost 6 hours to reach sihanoukville instead of 2h30 announced...

This was a HORRIBLE experience, I strongly advise other travelers to choose another bus bus company. We were forced to leave our DIRECT hotel bus at 7:30 am to change bus but the 8:30 bus "forgot" us. We were taken to a dump in a minivan and waited for 4h

they didn't pick us up and we had to buy new tickets for the next bus. and then the next one was 40 minutes late. they didn't provide water as stated on the ticket. the van was too small for all the baggage people had. horrible experience

As long as the road is under construction there is no way the estimated duration of the ride will be met. Driver was very friendly and spoke English. Drove like crazy to make up for lost time,  I guess it's Cambodian style, particularly on small busses

From Battambang to PP was great, but from PP to Sihanoukville was very dangerous. The driver drove way to fast and almost the whole trip on the wrong side of the road (I know it's common in Cambodia). We had to tell him several times to drive safely!
Driver was 45 minutes late as BookMeBus had not told him he had a pickup then got lost near Kep. Went from what was meant to be 3 hours to being over 5 hours
2h30 late, but drive safely.
We were more than 4 hours late and could only cross the border because the travel agent paid the customs. Driver was speedy as hell. Wouldn't go with champa anymore, better book giant ibis
It was a long trip from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville. Many trucks on the Road took 5hrs 30 minute to get to the Beach destination. Driver was safe driving. Booked already for trip back.
The bus was in poor technical condition. Twice the V-belt had to be changed. Result: Two hours late.
The ride was a bit bumpy, but the driver got us there in a good amount of time with plenty of rest stops.
The bus left 30 min before the scheduled time. We were very tight, it wasn't comfortable at all
Driver very dangerous ! Always phoning, drinking coffee while driving, overtaking and braking very dangerously, we were really scared !
Very comfortable ride and we arrive earlier than planed
We arrived in time, very good service!
It is quite smooth ride and we were early around 10minutes ahead of schedule despite of some few stops done by the driver for answering our nature call.
Despite staying within our 20kg limit for baggage, half our group was kicked off the van and had to find additional transport at an extra cost. There was not enough space for luggage of travellers.
The toilet is bad. Sometimes the bus is a bit fast.
As an ASEAN passport holder, i didn't expect that i have to pay a fee in the border though. The ride was comfortable. They provided water and bread. And most importantly we arrive safe and on time.
The bus was running late and the air con kept shutting down which was annoying however the free water and comfortable seats was good
It was good but 1 Hour to Late
All was good!
The bus was comfortable, clean and we didn't have problem with the time schedule. The staff was professional and very helpful during border's procedures.
they stayed in time, bus and deiver where good an clean. enough space for even tall people.
Although stop during the journey is a bit long, the driver arrived the destination 30 minutes compensate that.
Very punctual, clean and arrived early. What more can you ask for!

Left on time.  Safe driver. Full van.  AC worked well.  Did not try wifi.  Two 10 minute bathroom stops and a 20 minute stop for lunch.  Total trip time 5.5 hours.  Centrally located bus stop locations in Siem Reap and Phnom Penh.

I appreciate everything of what's expected from a company like Mekong Express. You have done the best for each and every passenger you have on board. How I wish I could book again with you in the near future on different route. Good luck and more powers.

Absolutely worst drive of my life!!! Driver was a very aggressive driver, went WAY over the speed limit, constantly honking the horn of other cars! Never felt more unsafe in my life!!!!! Hope everyone else get a better driver!

We were 45min late leaving,  but we didn't have any business meetings to get to in Kep, so it didn't matter too much, it just meant we sat around the depot a lot longer than we needed to. But the bus was nice with comfortable seats and good aircon. =)

The ferry was quick and punctual. The staff put your luggage on board for you - be aware if you have any injuries or are older and less able as getting on and off all of these ferries involves walking along a slightly moving plank!
