Bus was clean an efficient, sadly they scam you by dropping you off in a remote place, put you in a waiting area and try to sell you overpriced taxi / tuk tuk fares that you have to pay ahead so they can split the money with the cabbie. Keep that in mind.

Bus was clean an efficient, sadly they scam you by dropping you off in a remote place, put you in a waiting area and try to sell you overpriced taxi / tuk tuk fares that you have to pay ahead so they can split the money with the cabbie. Keep that in mind.

Driver was almost an hour late just like the first booking. We had to call several times. It created a lot of stress as we were on our way to the airport for a flight home. I doubt I would use the service again.
The facility eg. chair got problem. From Phnom Penh to Siem reap too many stopping for toilet break, around 4 times.
Friendly, efficient and comfortable. And great wifi :) Excellent experience with Mekong Express, thank you.

Booked longtime in advance, day before got information about car plate nummber and phone of driver, but on day of departure car not comming. After many calls with office arrive with big delay old minivan. But driver going fast and safe.
We arrived an hour and a half later than advised. The driver dropped us off at a different place than adviced and we were charged additional 10 usd for a tuktuk drive to the pier.

It was good , even though we had a flat tyre and there was an accident , I think we would have been on time ( well nearly) 
The bus was small, but we had space for our legs. The bus stops half way for refreshments or something like that.
Sleepy driver
After 18 days touring Cambodia and having taken all kinds of buses and minivans, I can say this was one of our best trips. Fairly safe driving (by Cambodian standards), punctual and comfortable seats
Good van, good driver, we left on time and aside from some traffic in Phnom Penh the trip was fine.
Quite decent van, departure on time and arrival more or less, good driving. The road is a little bumpy on this route but not the company or the driver's fault

Good van, good driver, punctual departure. From Kep to PPenh it was full of road works so the first part of the trip was very bumpy. The second part of the trip we were stuck in traffic and were two hours late on arrival, recommend morning bus

My advice for a company, let the people do the bording crossing by themselves will be faster then with help of staff. It was sorry to watch that poor girl trying break through other inspectors and customs. Best of luck. Driving and vehicle was good.
Good
This bus cost more then other, but they did free pick up from hotel and finally it was cheaper then other buses without pick up.
Very friendly driver stopped every 2 hours and on request for toilet stop. We felt very safe.
Driver good on time with good clean car , only driver very slow take 1.5 hr extra than other taxi driver also he did call 4 hrs in de car , really not good
We were absolutely satisfied with our trip that even took us over the border from Vietnam to Cambodia. Changing bus was well organized, too.

The bus is a bit small, so if its full can me complicated. 
A snack could be provided, considering is a six hour trip.
All was good, nice service
The comfort room is dirty.
All was perfect
It was overall smooth and fine journey.
we arrived almost 3 hours late; air con of the van didn't work properly
I looked my ride. Driver was nice. To bad for traffic, trip took 6h instead of 4h.

Safe driver, seats were comfy, for us from Battambang to Siem Reap in 3 hours. Only negative thing is the mosquitoes in the van upon entering. Spent the first hour of the trip trying to avoid/kill all the mosquitoes. Otherwise, a great drive.

Used this company twice. Phnom Penh to Battambang and then Battambang to Siem Reap. Safe drivers, clean vans and comfy seats. Could not access WiFi on first van from PP-BTB, but WiFi worked well on BTB-SR trip.
Very good, except that we have left Phnom Pehn with 30 minutes late, and arrived Battambang at night because of a 1h30 late.

We discovered that the service we bought on-line (direct trip on a Vip Night Bus) was not existing! The office manager kindly find a way to solve the problem, but we have to take 3 different means: a minivan, an unconfortable shared car and a tuk-tuk!
Great service for the price
had a very safe and comfortable trip on very difficult roads..
We arrived 2 hours late. Double beds.
We left more than half an hour late and there was clearly an over booking. The driver did his best to compensate for the lost time.
Departure address was wrong, bus was 2 hours late , our seat was broken, apart from that it wasn’t too bad.
Everything was fine

Driver stopped multiple times just for him (to eat, to pi etc.). The bus company stops at its own station. They told you they offer free taxi toward your hotel but the taxi driver will assault you to rent him the day after to visit the temples.
Good service, good driving.
חברת מקונג חברה טובה להזמנת נסיעות בין ערים בקמבודיה. הרכבים חדישים יחסית ומרווחים, כולל כמובן מזגן אוויר, מגשים נפתחים לסמארטפון, עוצרים במהלך הנסיעה לשרותים ואוכל, מחירים טובים - מומלץ
Very good service, very clean bus, lovely seats , on time . They gave us a snack.very easy at the border. All in all a very pleasant journey..

Bus was modern, had good air con, seats pretty comfortable.
Driver was really bad- had to do 2 energency stops during the trip so we didn’t crash, v. unsafe. Also the drive was super bumpy. 
We did arrive 15 minutes early though.

This company is a  joke. The van was in front of us and 2mn before the departure it left because of "a technical problem". I am sure it was because we were the only reservation. We were forced to find a private taxi. DO NOT trust this company
Very convenient and smooth driving
We were late by more than 2 hours (more than 50% of the promised 4 hour trip)!
the trip was comfortable with the van, the only disappointment is that they were arriving 2 hours before, for those who go in a hurry up are  precious details.
I had a seat on the back row, it was very cramped,  all the other seats had much more room as 3 to a row instead of 4. Bus was nice,  punctual and safe let than that!
I would like you to send information about the border before. So everybody knows how it works ?
Left on time. Arrived on time. Professional driver. Nice van. Able to book onward travel in SR to PP.  Water supplied. Wifi and air con worked well.

The trip from Sihanoukville to Battambang supposed to be only 9H. It wasn’t mentioned that we have to change the bus at Phnog Penh, which wasn’t mentioned by the booking. The staff was really rude and the journey took overall 13 hours!! Never ever again..
The food at the bus stop near pick Nil is horrible. Bad taste and very expensive.
The Station Facility should be improving, especially at Siem Reap, it is not clean and only one WC.

We were the only pair which bought tickets for this bus, so we were shifted into minivan instead of vip night bus. Nobody explained this change to us, but it was no problem, because we were the only passagers there. Staff helped us with crossing the borde
Journey without any problems, wide seats, nice bus.
Bus is ok but crossing the border is a pain. Mekong staff was helpful with this.
Vert good travel
We arrive safe and sound, a little bit late, but overall the journey was safe.

bus was 45 minutes late..
driver went too fast and did not hand out water...

Worst journey in Cambodia!
Uncomfortable, cramped seats! No air con and a horrible, rude driver! Kept stopping the van (crappest minivan you can image) to shut windows that’d been open for hours. Yet his friend could smoke. AVOID at all costs- do not use
crazy driver, too young. I did not feel safe at all!!!!

The ferry left Sihanoukville for Koh Rong Samloeum with 1.5hours lateness. 
Journey was fine and return to the mainland was much smoother
Nothing to say for they service
The team was very nice and efficient.
Kept picking up random people on the side of the road and dropping them off random places. Busses did not have outlets or WiFi.

Good service, pretty punctual on leaving. Driver good. Bus not in bad nick. We were given water on the journey from Siem Reap to Battambang but none on this leg. Maybe they forgot. Would use again no problem.
Bus left late but it's Cambodia, say no more. One rest stop which served coffee etc. All in all a good experience.
Far too many stops, took over 2hrs longer than stated online.
Driver was CRAZY !

The trip was awful! It was the worst in my life! Instead of one direct bus to Kep from Siem Reap IT WAS 5 different buses! I had to wait a long every time! I had to take my hevy backpacks, baby's troller, run to another one! Awful service! Never again!!!!

Never again! This was awful service! Instead of one direct bus to Kep from Siem Reap it was 5 different buses! The staff-girls were very rude! We had to take my hevy backpacks, baby, his stroller and run to another bus or wait a long time! Awful!!! Never!

The driver was late, but very nice a smiling, BUT didn't speak english. He didn't know where we were going or how to get their. It took about an hour extra, and we only got there because WE asked to stop and asked for way OURSELF. never booking again. :(
Driver was making lots of phone calls while driving. He drove too close to cars in front of him and did only stop once for his own sanitary needs along the road.
I bought a ticket for 7 a.m. bus but came to the bus terminal only at 8 a.m. So we started the trip 1 hour later. I was upset and disappointed.
we had  a slight delay,, but in general, it was a smooth ride.
Our driver was great, did wait for it when arrive and waiting luggage took longer than should.
Delay of the bus. Keep playing with the horn in the morning and caused distractions.

Your bus service came highly recommended on TripAdvisor & it did not disappoint! The inspector was awesome! 
When I got to Vietnam, the lady working in your office (Moon) was incredibly nice & helpful. 
Only negative - wifi on bus was not working.

great vehicle..
safe driver .
on time...
only issue was the tourist in the front passenger seat playing his music like he was dj-ing at a club...
complete idiot who also jumped out of the van and opened the rear hatch like he was boss
Our booking was for 8:30. Arrived at 7:50. Got on 7:45 bus that left at 8:10. Need cooler a/c. With individual controls.
Very good experience. Safe driver . Nice clean

The driver did not speak a word of English although we had requested it. He drove pretty wrecklessly, with sudden braking and constantly texted while driving (at some point with two phones). 
The car was adequate but was dirty and with garbage inside.
great driver and service will be use again
Good

Our trip was from PP to HCMC. There is a stamping fee that the inspector will ask some individuals for, depending on the type of visa you have. It is not a scam. We were held up at border and ended up taking 8 hours. Not the fault of MK, but be prepared.

The bus left on time!
But because of a lot of traffic we arrived 1 hour later then scheduled. 
Driver was really good.
Good value and quick.

The driver hit very fast on the dark and narrow road. The company should have a meeting with him and advice him because there are many passengers in his car, he does not die alone. I swear I will never book ekareach anymore.
The driver did not understand a word english, and he used his mobilephone during the whole trip. It was not the right  var and there was not enough setbelts. An overall very bad experience.

We left on time and arrived on time. As we got close to Mondulkiri the driving became more and more erratic. Insane overtaking moves, made me feel very unsafe. However this seems to be the case at all the companies that do this route.
No probleme we arrive on time. But no bottle and no wifi
Lot of trafic on the road but still ok
Great, on time and with pickup board ready waiting for us as the airport.

We had a very enjoyable trip! The seats were comfortable, the driver drove safely, we stopped twice for food and bathroom breaks, and it was great to watch the countryside. The Wi-Fi was a little slow but no big deal.

We were very disappointed to find that despite booking car seats for our children in advance, there were none when the car arrived. We had no choice but to use the car without car seats, as we couldn’t wait around to try and contact you. Very unhappy.
They don't communicate well.  Instructions are not clear.  They were late. The bus smelled like dead rat.

It was my first time to Cambodia and I didn't know what to expect so I prepared mentally for the worst case scenario. However, I am thrilled with the ride. Not much of communication though but riders seem to know the drill of what to do during the breaks.

The ride to PP was a nightmare. A careless driver that almost got us into an accident. He drove too close to a truck and the rear mirror of the truck scratched the window causing unnecessary panic. I would not book with this bus company.

Out of previous bus trips, I enjoyed this ride the most. So much leg space to stretch. The ride was smooth. The driver interacts with us during the lunch breaks with his limited conversational English. I felt safer riding on big bus compared to mini van.
I was happy with the trip. The bus departed and arrived on schedule.
Why do all the people have to pay 35 $ for the visa in Cambodia when the price is just 30 $ when you do it by yourself? In my opinion that is scamming and every bus company does it!
The bus is ok. The toilets on the bus is ok, very convenient.
I don't know of any inspection, maybe I missed it. But overall good service.

The bus driver/helper dropped me at the Cambodian border and then the bus left. So I was not informed that the luggage should be removed from the bus and mine was lost. Big thanks to the staff in HCMC, who recovered it! Without them I would give 1 star...
Nice comfortable bus although was a little cold with the A/C so take extra layer. The bus could have got there quicker as we took several long unecessary stops.
As always, Bayon drivers are crazy. We barely made it to phnom penh safe giving the number of crashes we avoid at last second. Don't take them if you care about your life

All in all a very good experience. l would choose the Mekong express service again. 
Point of improvement: to know bevorehand the number of stops and when the bus/driver plans a stop. Also it was irritating where exactly the 
Very good price/value ratio

Lots of leg room
Toilet onboard that flushed 
It did stop at a restaurant once at the start which was annoying I’d prefer them to drive straight there. 
Water and snack provided.overall good service and would use again.
The driver was on is phone for most of the journey and drove very fast and dangerously

Is amazing !! You pay for one transport to the city and suddenly they drop you off in one Petrol Station far away to the center (20’) and 4-5 person are overwhelming and obliging you to take another transport to the city with a minimum price of 20$.
Great driver. The only thing was weird is that he didn't stop at my hotel, but it was ok, we walked back to the hotel.
Was good. Driver was careful. Was weird he didn't want to stop at my hotel when it was on the way. He stopped for other people though. So we ended up walking back to our hotel.
On time but was confused on where to go on the immigration office as there was no instruction.

The pickup location is wrong, just go directly to the pier. Also dont waste your time selecting a seat on internet, the boat will anyway be smaller than announced and there will be people standing outside during the trip. Chaotic organization.
The inspector was rude..we dont like how he handles customer..you should not that type of person
Narrow double bed but pretty comfi and clean, comes with pillow and blanket. Good experience
We arrive at 4.30am instead of 8am... In the middle of the night so nothing openned and they throw our bags in a big mud puddle...

We were picked up on time and given water bottle when everyone loaded. Arrived ok. Only criticism was that the driver had 2 mobile phones and was speaking to people throughout the journey often having to use phone keypads. This is an unsafe practice.
Nothing to complain . Very safely drive
Nothing to complain . Very safely drive

Overall this was not a good experience, the accommodation on the bus was far too small, there were too many seats on the bus for the space that was provided and sitting conditions for six hours were far too cramped. Unnecessary stops for deliveries, poor
my choice of transport between SR and PP

It took us from 9am pick up to 5pm drop off in Sihanoukville. The VIP van broke down after 80 minutes and we had no air con. We had to wait for the second van to come and collect us. The driver on the second bus was speeding and overtaking dangerously.
Van quite old and uncomfortable seats,but the ac was working.Hi speed driver,but I guess it’s common here in Cambodia. We arrived earlier than scheduled.
3h30 late...what else?

My only concern is that 'Emerald Express' minivan did not collect me. 2 buses with 'VET' asked me to board. I ignored the first bus because it was not Emerald. I caught the second bus because I did not want to be stranded. Emerald Exp should let me know.
Driver too dangerous!!!

Was a very  unpleasant experience. The air conditioning was not working and it was extremely hot for a long five hour bus ride  in very cramped seats. We have travelled throughout Asia by bus and this was our worst experience by far.

was a bit cautious after the bad reviews, but was okay. Clean and had a toilet. We didn't stop at all but we didn't really need to. A man will board the bus and try sell you visas for 1, 100. Genuine but expensive.

Worst bus compagny. 
They don’t want to wait us at border because we dont participate which something look like organize corruption. Furthermore the waitress on board blackmail us during travel. Finally we queue at slower post border and they leave us.

The van was packed with people, they didn’t consider everyone’s bags really. It left half an hour late but it only took 2 and a half hours and it got from a to b safely. You get what you pay for really

It was a long trip - we've been delayed by more than 1 hour, here was no wi-fi nor the snack (as stated on the ticket), we were forced to pay extra fee for visa processing and the staff was very rude when I've started questioning this.
Not a bad thing I could say about this trip. Great all round. Comfy seats, on time and pleasant throughout. Many thanks
Clean and comfi (narrow) double bed bus, departure and arrival in time, good service I recommend

There was absolutely no communication on this bus - at each border stop (exit and entry) we were given no information on the process, and at the food stop we were not given a time limit. The bus was also too hot and seats recline into the person behind.
Great service
The driver was more interestet in food an mobile phone than in driving. We left nearly one hour delayed.
Drive was nice but had no clue where to go exactly. Eventhough we stated the drop-off address when we booked the transfer.

Overall, the journey was fine - we arrived in Kratie at the correct time. However, the bus was overbooked, forcing four passengers to share the 2 front seats, including the driver sharing his seat. This was unsafe and would’ve been unacceptable in the UK.
Driver drove too fast, several hard braking
Nice vehicle and the driver was super pro despite difficulties on the road. We felt very safe during the trip

The space in the van was too tight.I had my knees cramping and pushing against the seat the whole ride. The driver was going way too fast, drove over a dog without even trying to break. We left an hour late, even though van and driver were there on time.

Bus said it was 6 hours, took 8. Also advertised as with WiFi but didn’t have any. 
At the border crossing a helpful guy not with the company sorted out me getting through but otherwise I would’ve been stuck. Pay more and use a better company.
There was no wifi. When asked: “Wifi is slow”. But there was no wifi at all.
very old bus
Everything good, tiny spaces, and full of luggage, but we knew it. The driver was good, maybe a little bit fast, but they know how to drive in cambodia better than us.
Everything good, tiny spaces, and full of luggage, but we knew it. The driver was good, maybe a little bit fast, but they know how to drive in cambodia better than us.
Very long trip, tiny spaces, we arrived 1 hour late, the driver stopped a few times to delivery stuff, pick up and drop off people, but overall not too bad.

The drive was very bumpy and the driver made no effort to slow over bumps. There were very abrupt stops approaching other vehicles. We were dropped off 2km from said drop off point and forced to pay very expensive remuk prices.
Left on time. Driver/inspector were kind and helpful
Schedule was on time. We were given bottle of water and snacks. Staff were kind and helpful. Gave us enough time during our stop.

Driver was excellent, swift but never unsafe.  We arrived earlier than expected.  Service from all personnel in booking, etc. was efficient and friendly and helpful.  Van was very clean and tidy.  Seats were narrow but comfortable.

Driver suggested us to bring to Otres beach from Snk for additional money,we refused,he brought us 10°38′30.45″N103°30′59.32″E refused to drive to bus station,we found tuktuk he tried to hit us by car, then found us on the road and thrown bag with trash.
Professional staff giving great service. I always use this bus service while in Cambodia.
To Much people with luggage in 1 bus
Easy fast trip. We even left early as I was the only passenger.

Champa Mekong did not said that we had to change in Kampot and made some overbooking : all the seats were full and even more, we were very incomfortable, the driver was not nice and we had to yell at him because he was always stopping to take new passenge
We arrived almost two hours late, no seat-belt. Reckless driver
Not responsable for the quality of the road !
Nice service and professional driver
The driver dropped us in a gas station not at the place mentioned on the ticket and apparently it was a tourist scam so motodrivers staleked uis to get us to the Pier and charged  6 dollars. Not nice

I do not care too much if it had taken one or two more hours... The driver went way too fast considering the bad quality of the road. Forgot to put me of in Kratie. Had to go back. Fascilities are fine. I dont need more
Excellent staff and drivers. Punctual and comfortable buses.

The bus was comfortable, and I felt safe for most of the trip. We stopped at the beginning to get something fixed at the service center, but the driver made up most of that time. Would definitely ride with them again!
Easy peasy lemon squeezy
The operator seems to be aware with the scam and maybe part of it. We rode on the bus and got 8 Camadian people to pay 180USD each for them to cross the border!!!
Thanks for being late arrival, and thanks to misunderstood us at the restaurant stop and lost my 2 USDollars when paying the food bills.
The overnight bus experience is great! The free biscuits were also good and I like the idea that you can leave your bags at their bus station and go around in the city without hassle.
Very nice trip, good driver, great seats, only dirty windows, good to check our seats as 3a and b not in the bench in the back, no view and crappy places
On our PP to SR bus our driver and guide were great. Professionally run company. Old bus and very narrow seats. Punctual. Free snack wasn’t good.
Pleasantly surprised by the overall service.  Can definitely recommend Virak Buntham for travel in Cambodia.

Sõit oli kohutav, konditsioneer ei töötanud. Aknad olid sõites lahti, kust tuli sisse mega tolmu. Juht kihutas mööda nii vasakult , kui paremalt poolt autodest. Edaspidi sõidaksin ainult suure bussiga, mis tundub turvalisem.
Everything was perfect. Very good company
La durée du trajet n'est pas respectée . Il était annoncé 4 heures de route alors qu'en fait nous avons mis 2h45 de plus.

The wifi on board was not working on both busses. Your employee at ho chi minh office told us that we could take a new Vietnamese visa at the borded but was not true. We had to book a flight and an eVisa to go back. Totally not clear information.

The driver was fine, but really liked his horn. We left a little late, and the trip took longer than six hours. We arrived around five pm, but the traffic in HCMC was bad. Good water and snack. Poor wifi, useless. Drop off spot in HCMC: 5/5.

The worst company ever. I would never travel with them again, and I’m seriously glad to be alive since the driver drove like he had a death wish. And the border crossing was just chaos. Trust me: Don’t go with them!
Good service
Comfortable ride for me and my woman to Srae Anabel. Thanks for the lift. Bus was very clean.
The driver arrived on time if not a little early to pick me up at my hotel. The drive was great except for very bad roads near kampot causing a flat tyre. He fixed it quickly however.
Departed punctually, comfortable seats, and overall a good trip. Arrived late, but due to roadworks on the road from Siem Reap to Battambang.

No complaints. The whole process was good from buying ticket online to actual transport. Departed on time and arrived as expected.Older bus but had no mechanical issue.I was comfortable for a relatively short ride.Would ride with Mekong Express again.

Scheduled trip time was 6 hours but it took 8. Said there would be internet on the bus but this was broken so internet. I also expected charging sockets for phone but didn’t have these either. Very poor service compared to giant ibis

We were very pleased with our trip with Mekong Express. My only comment would be that no one explained to us what was going to happen at the boarder crossing. Luckily there was a guided group on our bus so we could follow them. But it was very confusing.
We were very pleased with our trip with Mekong Express. My only comment would be that we arrived in a different location to what it stated on our tickets. This caused some confusion for our pick up.
Drove like an absolute maniac. Had booked the bus back with them as well but felt so unsafe I jumped on the back of some strangers motorcycle instead. Do not book with them!!
Very kind and good english speaking driver
The driver was nice but the change of vehicule made the trip much longer 4;30 instead of 3 and not comfortable

The crew in the office are soooo nice like 5 stars. unfortunately due to we depart 1hrs late on our scheduled time and our bus departs broken too after 1.5 hr far from their office. I don’t recommend them for punctuality, also I dont for safety.

The ride was fine given all the road construction.  The driver was horn happy  He'd beep his horn at anything that moved.  Beeped that loud horn every 30 seconds for the first two hours of the trip.  I'm not exaggerating.
Bus stop often to take people on the street. And take more than 10 persons at the custom. Stop often near Ho Chi Minh ! No direct bus

Abbiamo avuto un buon viaggio.
Consigliato.

Buon viaggio.  L'autista un po spericolato, ma è nella norma in Cambogia.
Consigliato.
Buon viaggio,  autista nella norma (i sorpassi in Cambogia sono d'abitudine). Consigliato.

The driver was bot poliet, wanted me to repkace my baggage by myself on the stops, when he needed to get something in his baggage. His driving was roude. Many passangers have got carsick. No WI-FI.no water, he used it by himself.
It was a great experience.
First time to ride a sleeper bus. It was an amazing experience.
It was an amazing experience.
Our driver was wonderful - very friendly and professional. So unlike the driver who took us to Sihanoukville from Phnom Penh - that driver was playing on his smart phone almost the whole time!
It was a very good experience, bus was on time, clean, drove safely and the seats were very comfortable.
When I book KSO company but they transfer me to ride on another bus company which make me feel not safe because the bus is really old. It's not reliable service.
The driver feel not good with the passenger when they stop for lunch. They just want to be hurry.

The overall experience was satisfactory. The journey took a lot longer than expected as the driver made three long stops in just a five hour journey. Also the seats were quite hard and needed better cushions
The worst transport company is CCT Transportation. They canceled my trip without explanation and they are liars.
Everything was perfect
Malgré sa pas forcément bonne réputation, aucun problème sur ce trajet ! Certes le chauffeur roule vite et klaxonne tout le temps mais pour avoir déjà roulé en Asie, quoi de plus normal que ça !!!

There was no wifi and we arrived over an hour late, having stopped 3-4 times in between. Aircon seemed to be off for the 2nd half of the trip (Phnom Penh-Kampot). But all in all it was ok since the van wasn't full.
No wifi, and detoured to Kep then to Kampot, running late arrival.

The drive took 5 hours and despite seeing some horrendous driving on the road we felt great confidence in our driver who picked us on time and helped us find the ferry at the pier in Sihanoukville. The car was comfortable. Couldn’t have asked for better.
The bus arrived 2.5 hours later than scheduled as several people had incorrect visas, and the bus inspector did not detect the errors or correctly advise them.

My seat was broken on the first leg. Bus attendant lied, saying we would not stop anymore for food/water for the next 10 hours because he wanted us to buy at the cafe we stopped at. Difficult to find which land border we would cross for the Vietnam visa.

No problems with the ride and crossing the border. We stopped about three times, once at 7/11, once for a smoke, and once in cambodia at a food stand. Only thing to note is that the address provided by bmb was wrong, I had to get a cab to Khao San road.
Good and safe trip.
No comment

The bus didn't have A/C. It was terribly hot, almost impossible to breathe (no windows). Also, drop off point wasn't the one stated in Bookmebus (company's office). They left us at the bus station. Had to take taxi to town. Will never recommend Bookmebus.

Bus did not show up for some vague reason, it probably got merged with a later one which was cramped. We departed 2,5 hours later with no explanation whatsoever. This was the actual definition of a company not taking their stuff seriously. Don’t do this!

The driver let us out at 13:50 (ferry leaves at 14:00) somewhere in Sihanoukville. There his friends waited with TukTuks to take us to the ferry. Of course they wanted to be paid. $ 3 per person. The ride took 15 minutes. Of course we missed the ferry! :(

The trip was quoted as being 4 hours. Instead it was over 6 and a half. We were dropped off nowhere near our destination in the dark even though the female employee working at the office told the driver that everyone on the bus was staying not downtown.
Clean bus but we can't see out the windows as the seats are so high/windows too low!! This is such a shame.  We were 45 minutes late. Good stops.
Driver talkative by phone, mostly busy phone talk.
Very tied seats for an european guy. They take some of other objects within the bus, so there is quite less place for the people. Too much stops on the way
Mauvais terminal d’arriver déçu mais ça va
Mauvais terminal d’arriver déçu mais ça va

Not only the trip took 6 hours, but the driver stopped twice. Once was for an hour at a Coffe shop
Besides, he didn’t leave us where he was supposed to. I’ve booked my hostel near the stop but i was forced to take a tuk tuk due to this
I don’t recommend

Very fast, nice driver and staff.
Arrived 1hour and a half in advance of schedule
Prompt and on time.  But worst seats I've ever had in a minibus. Almost unbearable.
It was okay. The driver was seasoned, but driving skill was a bit dizzying. Still, we always found Mekong Express to be more reliable and comfortable than the others.
Excellent driving, driver was very helpful & knowledgable.

We broke down twice and were left sat with no idea what was going on. The journey took an extra hour and we left 15 minutes late for no apparent reason. Dust came in up under the door and filled the van with thick dust. Lack of legroom. No toilet or WiFi.
Bus didn't leave. They said it was broken but I really doubt it.
Goos service, bus with air conditionwr

My bus was on 29 of December 2018, so I hope you did not
Charge me again.
But in December it was okay
to fast in the small village
In the Restaurant for the lunch, the team was not very nice and asked more than the price

Very good service, and sharp, too.
The only flaw is the fast driving style, which seems quite normal widespread in Cambodia, anyway.
So the judgement remains totally positive.
Good
On time. As comfortable as you can get. The road is bumpy and roadworks are constant, but the driver made the ride as smooth as possible.
Really nice driver, helpful and punctual! I enjoyed chatting with him.
Verry good driver, Thank you ... ;-)

Great journey,great Driver,comfortable ride.

No Wi-fi though

Would use again very professional
We were way above the 100km/hr maximum for a VIPVan, but we did make it on time. We had two near-miss accidents, but besides that, good trip.
Very easy ferry, and they even waited for me since my van had arrived late! We left five minutes late (because of me) and arrived on time!
Very fast and punctual. Thanks!
Ta men hen hao!
Really good! Left on time, drove safely, breaks were short, and reached Siem Reap from PP after 5 hours 30.
Old bus, no safety belt. Two hours late. Had to change bus to Kep.
Very pleasant travel. It leaves half an hour late, but arrives on time.
Longer than expected due incredible amount of traffic. Pleasantly pleased that they stopped to buy ferry tickets before dropping us at the pier. Thanks
Really awesome service
Reliable bus service. Happy to recommend
Something happened that after 2hours of leaving Phnom phem the bus stopped and for almost 2hs couldn’t continue goong. That happened twice along all the trip. So we arrived 1:30h late ?
Car broken along Thema wah
The inspector charged us extra 5$ from each one of us i dont know for what .

Old bus. After 2 hours of travel the engine broke down. We waited for another bus to take us to Phnom Penh. No comfort on board and air conditioning that worked very little. Narrow and narrow seats. For 10 dollars you could not ask for more.
We changed driver half way the trip. The second one was a bit slower. But excellent service!
Stopping for no reason several times pulls over and picks no one up. A toilet break after 45 minutes then nothing for 3hrs 15 mins.

Unfortunately to get to Sihanoukville there is only one road and in this time it is full of trucks and suv and tuktuk. Terrifying the over 100 overtaking on the right and left of our van. The most reckless my trip.
Everything was ok
Maybe on the next ride, the driver can provide a much cheaper venue for meals.
Really great service and comfortable ride. Thank you :)
Good driver ...
Improve your price and include visa service at beginning not in the middle of a trip.
A good ride overall.

We booked two seats but the company told us that our seats have been given to other people and refused to give us back the money. Me and my boyfriend, who suffers from back pain, had to travel in a tiny space next to the driver. Awful service.

My ticket and receipt said February 1st at 9pm like I ordered but when I got to the station they told us the company had booked us for the night before instead. Thankfully it was worked out and we got on the bus and to our destination.

Took the VIP van from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville. No seatbelt on my seat, arrived 90 min late, driver didn't speak english, the drop off point in Sihanoukville is a gas station in the middle of nowhere with a bunch of tuktuk drivers waiting to scam you.

Service was good. Older bus, but was comfortable. Driver didn't take any unnecessary risks and drove at a reasonable snd safe speed. One comfort stop. I think we had a timely arrival - hard to tell. Rough roadworks on the outskirts of Battambang.
Bus was 20 minutes late.  They picked up some extra people along the way and put folding chairs in the aisle to accommodate them.  Driver spoke no English.  Strong aircon.

the trip from Vietnam to Cambodia was good. Departure on time and arrival on time
However the return trip was very bad. Bus departed almost 2 hours late and instead of 6 hours trip it took almost 10. Because of that, i could nt find my hotel once back
Excellent service
Pleasant journey. Surely will choose this company.
Shabby bus, dusty road, no safety belt. Unpleasant travel.

Véritable cauchemar !!! Minibus inconfortable, pas de climatisation, horaire non respecté, chauffeur dangereux et imprudent,  arrivée a Kep avec trois heure de retard mais vivants.
Compagnie a ne surtout pas prendre!!!
Everything was ok

Driver late - couldn't find our address & English not his strong point  so impossible to explain. After that it went well - he made up for delay by going formula one all the way to Sihanoukville pier. Car reasonable condition and comfortable

Poor organisation. No time management. Confusing communication. Insist on keeping us all squeezed in small  office with poor ventilation. Then shift us to another pier. You never know what's going on. Boat is ok. Enjoy

Never again
They force you to pay 5 dollars or let you behind at the border

Trip of 4 hour took 8. We where placed in a bus with people who had a start time a hour later. And instead of driving straight we stopped at other places. The only thing CTT said when confronted: "I don't care, Go away"

Rudest and worst company.
The trip was good, only the bottom seats are too tiny! I loved the free biscuits and water!
Comfortable and timely
We were not given a snack like we were supposed to get.
No problems. Very helpful at the border.
Great experience from a to z.

Seats were very small and cramped.
Luggage was pushed under the seat so there was no space for our feet.
The driver was friendly

The bus was late 30 mnts, the staff members in sihanoukville where I had a transfer were rude,the van to kampot was old and had no space for luggage so bags were tightly packed behind the drivers sit. The way from Siemreap to sihanoulville was alright so4
Terrible, customs take long time. Was meant to arrive 7pm didnt arrive until 9p. Wont use this bus again
Professional with satisfaction
Our AC was broken so it was really cold. Except that, the trip was good !
On a fait 2 arrêts en même pas 1h et du coup on est arrivés également avec 1h30 de retard

We were told the ferry was at 4pm so needed to be at check in for 3:30pm. At 3:50pm we asked why we weren’t moving from the minibus. They took us to the ferry and then we were told it wasn’t leaving until 5pm. Poor communication and not punctual at all.

Perhaps the worst trip I have ever had in Asia. We have traveled extensively in Thailand  & Cambodia and to sit and wait endlessly for a bus connection in Kampot on what was supposed to be a direct trip is not on!!!! Bad service and worse administration!

It was a comfortable space.
They loaded my big bag behind the car.
Thank you for your kindness.

We chose the VIP van and the company website says 4 hours. The reality is it took 6.5 hrs. There is no WiFi. Air condition is not that good. The seat is not very comfortable either. The van looks old. Not VIP
A lot of wait (1h30 late) before the departure without explanation.
No remarks. There seemed to be a minor problem at the ticket office in Kampong Cham, and the staff didn't really want to tell me what was wrong (double booking, I guess). But nothing to worry about.
Veru good service I would definitely recommend
The van was good and convenient, but have to confirm with bookmebus.com and the bus company.

We booked our seats in a smaller bus, but i guess due to high demand, the bus was upgraded and we got different seats. But, in the end, the seats were fine and we had enough space for our legs (we're Europe folks).
This may be one of the most surreal trips one can have. You’ve been awarded with the “right to bear Öz  forename”medal for the up coming year by the Anatolian Coach Enthisuasts Clup.

Very poor service. Air-conditioner was broken and the rear seat was extremely hot. I almost got sick. There was no traffic jam but it took more than 7 hour. I can’t trust the timetable anymore. I don’t reccomend Mekong to my friend.

Good service despite exagerated pictues on ads.
Carefull though, the road for this trip (Phnom Pehn ==> Kaampot) was excessively bad... the trip then quite difficult.
The address at destination was different than stated in the confirmation email.

We had to wait 45 minutes in the airport then had to walk outside the airport to the car.we had to struggle across a busy road carrying our luggage with no help from the driver. The driver ran out of lpg 5 kms from our destination and had to pay for a tax

The bus is incredibly old. Sometimes I thought the bus would not arrive in PP, since it seemed to have problems to keep on going. I am from Brazil, and in my country, authorities certainly would have prevented that bus from moving.
Good driver. Bus left on time, arrived earlier than planned. 2 stops on the way.
Ingen overnatting.
Great ride. Very ponctual. Recommend strongly passenger to sit in front ... better air conditioning.
difficult to find the route from where depart and where to stop and so on
I booked 1h before departure during chinease new year in HCMC. Everything worked well at the boarder. I will book again
We did not take the four hours that he put on the web, but almost six. We chose Mekong express because we thought it was fast
Great service

Bus was a bit old and seats quite small snd close to the one in front and a bit hard.
Driver was good. Didn't take unnecessary risks.
Timing was ok until we arrived at Siem Reap and the automatic door would not open. They had to take the door off .
I enjoyed the ride. Thanks for the free bread and water. I just hope the pick up is always on time.

Bus was delayed half an hour , then drove for 20 minutes to another part of the city to be put on another bus, so didn’t start going out of the city until an hour later. Driver also took a really long lunch break at stop.

The service of bookmebus is terrible!  I use option for pick up, and nearly missed my bus because they dont do pick up.  Van was excellent.  Appreciate their patience in waiting for us after the mess with the booking company
The driver drove very fast, crazy, ... very hard to close one eye.
Dangerous driving, persistent use of phone whilst driving, breaking speed limit, only took breaks to suit him
Great driving over some of the worst roads in the country. Everyone associated with the company was both courteous and accommodating. Would recommend!
The whole process - buying tickets online, getting picked up at the hotel, and the trip itself was easy and pleasant!
All excelent
Bus departed 20 minutes late.  Arrived 50 minutes late.  Seats very small.  Aircon vents were broken, and very weak in general.
A perfect trip
Slept all the way... although I thought it would take 6h instead of 7.

The bus is quite old, but space is ok. I didn't like that they charge you 5dollars extra because they are the ones doing your visa...no option there...when the border was empty and I could have perfectly done it by myself.

We left 30 min. late and drive around the city for 30 min. to switch bus. One of the seats of this bus was broken, so one girl had no back support. You advertise with Wi-Fi.. none of you bussen has Wi-Fi. You Need to step up tour game. Do what you promise
Good drive, nice amount of stops and got us here on time. Would recommend but please be aware this is a minibus so space is limited.

Dreadful. Chaos. Defensive ticket collector stopping us from boarding. Different pier at arrival. Very steep climb out of boat with bags requiring younger legs to make it. There must be a better way of organising this. Doesn't require much effort.
Very big chaos on border it should be possible to go throught border with own paszport
Highway Nr.3 its a great building site at the moment!  Driver give all for safe trip...
Very comfortable ride. It was good that I could get off on the way.
None

Horrendous. Despite booking seats company oversold enough tickets for more than 2 additional overfilled busses. Some forfeited ticket and got taxi. Very late. Bus station man yelled at passengers for asking if/when bus was coming. Bus had no ventilation.
The air conditioning was nit working well. It was hot and stuffy after we pass the customs at the cambodian boarder. Overall the bus conductor and driver was good.
Very quick service,  Phnom Penh to Battambang in four hours including two stops
The backseats are very small for non asians
Wish the bus had WiFi.  Otherwise very comfortable & large bus with ability to recline & relax. Very enjoyable & punctual.

Première partie pas bien car au lieu d'avoir un Van avec boissons , wifi... Nous avons eu une voiture pour 5 personnes avec un chauffeur qui ne disez rien, sans aucune aide pour le passage de frontière à chaud Doc. Très bonne deuxième partie en bateau ave
Les places du fond sont trop petites, on est très serrés dans le minibus. L’arret Repas au café ne s’est pas bien passé, on a jamais eu le deuxième plat et moi j’ Été malade après ça

The driver was polite but he was driving so fast even if the road's speed limit is 40-60-80, he was steady driving on speed of  110-120.
We were often on the opposing lane. I was stressed the whole trip as we could bump into other's cars or big trucks.
Pleasant enough bus for the journey, took 8 hours rather than 6 but I knew it might not arrive on time.
Smooth trip and comfortable. Would prefer to take this transportation company again.
Booking process were smooth plus the journey also convenience. Sum up, it's a pleasure for choosing this service.
Smooth trip

The driver was 1 hour late and seemed to have hangovers
We hired a private taxi, but was asked if he could take his wife and child along. Felt we could not say no
The driver drove much too fast and was close to run out of fuel. Could not find hotel
The backseats are too small.
The driver spent the whole trip texting and having phone calls. I didn’t feel safe. The backseats are too small for an adult.

The address we were given to get the bus was incorrect. We were given the name of a very long street and some co ordinates. We spent a long time looking for the station but could not find it due to the bad address so we were not able to board the bus.

The most terrible experience I ever had.bus should arrive Kampot at 10:00 am, but the first transfer arrived the station at 12:00 am, and the bus driver is not responsible for the late. we have to go to office by ourselves, wait another bus untill 5:00pm

No bus turned up at 7.30am luckily a post office worker made a phone calls and told us to wait. About 25 minutes later across the road a Bayon VIP bus turned up and he told us to get on that. Not anything like what we'd booked but we got to Phnom Pehn!
Pick-Up from Hostel did not come and we had to take a Tuk-Tuk on ourselves. Apart from that good. Free water and cookies.

We took the bus from Phnom Penh to Kep, it was 40 minutes late but that was not important. The driver was careful and very helpful, we asked him to stop us at our hotel since it was on the way and he agreed.
The driver was fast good driving and we arrived on time

The driver was fabulous. But I would never recommend a van for 6 hr ride. Very cramped & kids that would not stop jumping around. Also people on their phones & Aldo eating meals that smelled awful. Noghtmare. Take a big bus or VIP van.

We found the stops a bit long-fifteen minutes maximum would be preferable. 
Overall a better trip than expected. The driver was awesome.
Now this is the way to go 6 hrs. Wished for internet, but rather have room to recline. Never take a van

Heath Bun is the most patient & well versed with traffic pattern. Found me st arrivals right away. I was 4 hrs late, bug communications with Bookmebus was amazing!! Heanh was professional & so polite. Versed in Japanese & English. Only one not to get lost

Used this company to travel from Bangkok and through the Thailand/Cambodian border and into Siem Reap. Everything went very smoothly. The bus left on time, provided snacks and lunch, and helped us through the border crossing

Confortable seats and good driver BUT bo wifi on the bus as written. The movie was on the bus speakers so really difficult to read or listen to your own music without hearing this crazy movie. Not good at english and didnt tell us how long yo stay in stop
Spent time to wait
The aircon at the back seats were broken. It was hot. The bus stopped more than 5 to 6 times between Siem Reap and Kampong Thom.

Rhe night bus (sleep coach) departing from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap on 5Feb 2019 11.30pm has broke down shortly it departed. We were transferred to a non sleep coach. We also arrived later than the indicated time (5.30am). Very bad
Good.
Very good experience. We made very good time and was a pleasant drive.

One bum per seat! So I was about that. I recommend the 7.30am bus as you get out of the city before peak hour, which saves around 30 minutes. Get on the bus first so you can nab one of the single seats.
First class vehicle transport in Cambodia.
Would leave 5 stars, but the seats are not comfortable. Everything else was perfect!

Big contrast with our return ride we had with Giant Ibis. With Seila Angkor:
- Driver is insane: 3 (local) people threw up during the 5 hour drive (no joke, only smell)
- Keep on pushing people in the van
- Tiny seats (and i am average sized in EU)

The one thing we felt was that the two stops were unnecessarily long-yen to fifteen minutes would be sufficient.
In spite of a stressed toddler with occasional outbursts, it was a better trip than we expected. The driver did an awesome job.
An excellent service. Helpful staff, well driven and arrived in good time. I would use this service again.
AC was out of work!

This ride from Kep to Phnom Penh was overall okay. It was punctual and air conditioned. However as we went with Cambodia post we had to make several stops at post offices and were forced to take long and VERY bumpy back roads to get there
A comfortable ride. Only one stop half way and lots of traffic which is unavoidable. The driver was very professional.
Pick up at hotel was appreciated. However bus was 30 min late leaving bus station and arrived about 1.5 hours later than scheduled time. Price was good.

It was a horrible trip. They were 2 hrs late because they totally overbooked on purpose due to chinese new year. The bus was completely overloaded. Then their ferry ticket didn't work, they had to come to the pier which also took them 30 min.

Extremely upset. The bus left late, and,10 mins into the journey, it got into its bus depot, stopped for 30 mins and then we had to change bus due to a breakdown. It was past midnight and we changed from bus with sleeper seats to a normal bus. Cheated!
Your guide stole from me 5 usd for visa without reason and got very upset when I told her I don't want to pay it
Best bus company in Cambodia! Driver was really good and I felt safe!
We were told that we could cross the border to Vietnam, but we could not so we had to return to Phnom Penh. Tried to change our ticket to a later date,but does not work, bad service.

Bus was clean and comfortable. Pick up location was clear. We had to pick others up which delayed our departure from Phomn Penh but as we took the 6:30am slot, there was little traffic on the road and even with the delay we arrived to Sihanoukville early.

We were allowed on the 11am boat as we arrived early. However, this was at 11:40am and the boat didn’t leave until 12pm. Some people had been sat on the boat for 1 hour. Once we got going, the trip was relatively smooth and the stop at Koh Rong was fast.
N/A
Everything was ok except the van's AC wasn't cool at all. Everyone in the van was sweating from the heat. Please fix the AC.
Good  but  I need more comfortable

I waited for 2 hours to get my ticket and I did not get one so I booked a bus from my hostel. I lost 8 dollars becouse of you and I'm going to tell everyone that your service is a scam. I also contacted your customer service chat and they did not help
No troubles, good service with two brief toilet stops. Arrived early.
No troubles, good service with two brief toilet stops. Arrived early.
Bus was clean and comfortable (not overcrowded as some we’ve been on. Left on time and arrived an hour early. Overall good service.
As usual for my business trip I always choose Mekong Van comfortable, spacious and convenient
Driver is good, the fleet is clean and arrive safely.
Everything great!
Good, safe, on time, professional driver
Everything was perfect. Thanks a lot
Departure Delay half hour no explaintion. No AC and the van very very old. Seat is very uncomfortable.

Snack and water included, spacious seats, tv, everything on time, but women (inspector - empolyee of Mekong Express) which was coordinating border crossing, took another 25$ for no reason (we had all paperworks for visa done and fully paid)

Bus left 15 minutes late.
Our 00:30 bus sat for 2+ hours. Announce this  before leaving. Post this info. I was yelled at when I said the bus was TOO COLD.
It was ok.
Low air conditioning system. Too hot inside. Comfort Room is filthy.
Overall a pleasant experience
Overall a pleasant experience

The bus left and arrived to destination on time. On the way it stopped once to drop off mail and once for toilet break. It was english speaking radio station on which wasnt too loud, there was aircon too. Overall very comfortable ride.
Good trip with this operator.
Good trip

Hey Book me bus team, i really enjoy using your service, however the people at the bus stops do not know anything about the reservation, sometimes they are not aware of the booking, this happen to me twice in SR and PP, train better your STAFF!
Air conditioning was not adequate enough. It was very hot on the bus.

Pour cette traversée nous étions inquiètes après avoir lu certains commentaires.
Peut être avons nous eu de la chance, nos traversées A/R se sont bien passées malgré une mer assez mouvementée, l'horaire a été respecté, le personnel rigoureux et attentif.
Good experience! Highly recommended!

One of the worst trips I've ever been on. Paid for VIP with Aircon and Wifi, bus was 40 mins late, journey was 2 hours longer than advertised, air conditioning stopped 30mins in, no wifi. No explanation/apology.

Very bad trip. Got through border, which was perfect & thought hard part was over. But then bus was boiling hot. No AC. Extremely bad exhaust/burning rubber fumes. Could hardly breathe. Bus broke down, smoking, & we had to wait 2 hours on side of road.

Very good service 
We used many time in Cambogia during our long holiday and we will use again in the next days
Best service and quickly online Booking 
Thank you
arrived almost 3 hours late, packed boat, not enought lifevests
Punctual bus, road was a bit bumpy but all in all, a good experience

They do not honor seat assignments printed on the ticket. Instead they force female passengers to sit in the middle in order to make male passengers 'more comfortable.' Only women are asked to move. Sexist and disrespectful.

They do not honor seat assignments printed on the ticket. Instead they force female passengers to sit in the middle in order to make male passengers 'more comfortable.' Only women are asked to move. Sexist and disrespectful.

Both 30 min trips ended up taking two whole hours (the boat either departed an hour and a half later, or had multiple stops along the way). On the return trip they sent a very small boat, and half the passengers couldn't get in and had to way 2 more hours
Very comfortable drive up from Phnom Penn to Siem Reap. New bus, aircon good, felt safe. Not huge amount of leg room (for tall people!) but fine. Prompt departure, all in all great thanks :)
a very Nice driver who was very comfortable and spoke good english
i been told its gonna take 4-5 hrs but it was 7, noone mentioned stop in kampot where people change,overal not very good service ??
Good comfortable journey
I had a great seat next to the driver - very comfortable journey with sufficient breaks.

Overall it was a very smooth trip from Phnom Penh to HCMC. The staff was really helpful with all visa procedures. It would be better if the seat number tags are displayed clearly (mostly missing) and they used a microphone when talking to the passengers.
Very bad relation to baggage. Suitcases are strongly soiled and one is broken during the road.

I just would like to tell you that I met the two drivers, one from BTB to PP and recently from PP to BTB who didn't  obey the traffic light. I was ahamed by this because many drivers stopped your drivers just passed without any care. Hope never again.
The driver was driving crazy.
Good!
A good cimpany
Comfy bus and nice driver but arrived 2 hours late

It was inconvenient and the bus conductor is very unorganized. It is a tiny detail but I had to ask him several times about the migration form and when he finally handed to me, It was so crumpled and no pen! Small details but it adds to professionalism^^
Driver arrived late, drove very risky and stopped four times. One time for gas. One time for his lunch break, one time to pray or bless his car and one time for toilet.

THIS WAS THE WORST COMPANY OF BUSES I HAVE EVER USED. What a disapointment. We paid for a LUXURY BUS from Siem Reap DIRECTLY to Ho Chi Minh. They stopped 3 HOURS in the middle of the night in Phnom Phen and they changed us to a local bus. NEVER AGAIN.
Bus left on time.  Arrived 45 minutes late due to hangup at the border.
Run for the hills!!!!
All good. (Perfekt would have been if i had the Information before the trip, that I have to pay 5 Dollar because of the E-Visa at the vietnamese border.)

The van is quite old but spacious.
Poor air conditioner, the driver is talking with the phone while driving, it's very dangerous.
Very good
There's nothing nothing more I could ask for, but the new coach stands out the most.
I'm not sure how I can rate a taxi for accommodation and inspector, but take 5/5. The driver was on time, car was comfortable and clean.

Driver made me feel safe for the whole trip.
The van was very comfortable. Best way to get to and from Koh Kong and Phnom Penh.

The tour was alright, but more than 1 1/2 hours late, as we stopped several times on the way to deliver packages etc. 
Also the driver was mostly driving to fast, which once in a while left an unsecure feeling. A small water bottle was provided.
Beware of their scamming fee to “help” you get the visa to Cambodia. You can do it yourself and will take you less time!
the ride was ok so far but unfortunately we were 3 kilometers before the destination without a comment simply carried out of the bus. That is no go
Especially the quick and professional service via WeChat has to be pointed out.

Staff are helpful. I felt safe the whole trip and appreciated the fact that there is a toilet on the bus for such long distance journey. The inside is quiet old and needs maintenance. Overall a positive experience.
The driver was a careless driver. He was driving too fast. I was praying the whole ride.

The bus was broked dowm in mid way. We 5 people found another car to Phnom Penh,$5 each. It took at least 8 hours. 6 hours on the bus,and 2 hours by car. If we don't find another car, we don't know how long time to Phnom Penh. The bus almost catched fire.
Notre bus avait 1:30 de retard, pas cool!

It was a very bad experience. Air condition was broken, it was SWELTERING HOT, Wifi was broken, seats were so close to each other, our knees hurt, the inspector lady was anything but nice and we left with 1/2 hour delay. Honestly not worth the money.

Less leg room than the Giant Ibis we had taken previously. Wifi not working even though it was advertised at booking an a major reason why we chose your company. Air con not adequate so it got really warm.
Very good but road down to kompot terrible
Nice
Very ineffective at the Vietnam border. Other buses who arrived after us already left and our bus still stuck at the border to wait for stamps

Smooth efficient service. Only slight problem was being told that bus would pick us up from our accommodation an hour before departure time. When it arrived 15 minutes before departure time, one of the others guests said they were told 15 minutes!
This was a very comfortable bus. Air conditioner worked well.

We did a previous trip from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh and it was great. This time we left 30 minutes late, the driver was not prudent, he did not take us to the post office in Sihanoukville. Everybody was pushed out in the middle of nothing! No good
Fantastic service a always! Even the office staff are so obliging & really helpful. Keep it up. Cambodia Post will always be my first choice travelling to the places they cover. Well done!!  :-)

At the border crossing, all other groups could pass the Vietnam border before us. Others paid the officials so they jumped the queue but we literally were the last ones there. In the future please consider paying the bribe to save time. 4 hours late!!
Not what I'd expect from a VIP  bus, was very crammed and not comfortable. Driver was very nice and helpful.

You need +1 Hour. In bookmebus the arrival was at 11:00. for that time we had a pickup from our hotel. Because we arrive at 12:00, we had to pay for our own hotel transport. Please correct because +1h is normal.
good trip

Absolutely terrible ride. The driver picked up about 10 hitch hikers and dropped them off at their location in our general direction. What was supposed to be 5 hours ended up being 7 despite the speeding and terrifying overtaking resulting in close calls.
Scheduled to leave at 5.30pm but Bus left 40 min late at 6.10pm. The waiting area in Sihanoukvile is so bad and dirty. No water bottle is given in the bus. Never again

HORRENDOUS experience. Risky driver driving way too fast and driving in the wrong lane to pass out cars. Driver had a terrible attitude. Van had zero leg room, was dirty, and had cockroaches and ants all over the seats and floor. Will NEVER go again.
Driver arrived early.  Alert cautious driver, very pleased with service - recommended

The driver never came to to pick us up. When we called the 2 phone numbers provided one answered or replied to my WhatsApp messages. A waste of money, we ended up taking a tuk tuk instead. A shame as we used BookmeBus 2 other times and they were great.

Arrived at Sambo Steakhouse to get our tickets. Were told a bus would take us to Pier 52. The bus was on time 11.30 but the ferry was late leaving. Tell them which luggage is yours so it makes it on the bus, it gets piled at the front after we got on.
The bus was actually smaller,  than we booked.  There was no free water.

Described as a "not so good trip". I booked a seat for VIP van from Phnom Penh to Sihanouk Ville but instead they arranged to coaster 17 which is slightly slower than the VIP fan. Driver also stop by many times to pick up passenger which is uncomfortable.
Perfect driver with perfect car! Thanks to BookMeBus for arranging this even i booked and paid at the last minute!

Departed 15 min late,immigration at border gate took 1 hour, despite the bus assistant insisting we give $1 for quick crossing. Bus assistant doesn't know Phnom Penh,he told me to get off in the middle of nowhere & find a tuk tuk instead of giving advice
Picked up and dropped off exactly on time. No problems at all.

They packed too many people onto this bus and the AC did not fully work. There were many stops along the way, which was unexpected. This made us 1-2 hours late to arrive. The driving did scare me a bit at times. Thankfully there was a seat belt I put on.
It was an average trip. There was some garbage left around the bus and quite a few stops on the way there but other than that it was good. Would take again.
Not true their buses have WiFi. Also beware of the places they stop. Usually they overcharge tourists for food

A basic ferry to get you to and from the islands. Those with mobility issues may have trouble getting on and off the ferry. Make sure to let the staff at the office know when you plan on departing ahead of time.

We stopped 6x to pick up ppl on the side of the road. Driver pocketed cash. Driver refused to stop at a restroom for women and children and ended up having them pee along the side of a busy road. We were 2 1/2 hours late - missed our boat because of it!!!

Very good service on time 
Easy to find the office near the Pier
When you arrive in Koh Rong Sanloem you must reconfirm the place for return
Unfair to have almost no seats left for passengers who have booked months in advance because of overbooking by gtvc during Chinese new year.
Best transport in Cambodia

I’m slightly disappointed with the quality of the service and the bus. Mostly because of the late departure (and arrival) and the unhelpful and rather rude staff on the bus, who hassled the passangers for “neccessary police bribe”. Uncomfortable seats.

The driver we used from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville was great, but the drive back from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh on February 14, 3pm was extremely disappointing. The driver was reckless, drove too fast and too dangerous. He was on the phone all the time
Your service would be greatly improved if the passengers were informed at the border where to find the connecting bus on the other side.

The ride was decent. I hate when they stop to pick people up along the way. Why don't these people meet at the pickup spots and quit making everyone else be inconvenienced...that's irritating! Many people complain about this, but they don't seem to care!!

Perfect service
Mekong Express was this trip excellent

A superb service,from booking online to reaching my hotel,could not fault the service or customer service.
I couldn't find my e ticket the day before,I emailed them and within 10 mins I had an email containg the e ticket,absolutely first class.
Bus was 2 hours late to destination
Brilliant service, will use again.

The AC wasn't working, the bus was not confortable (old towels on the seat to make them look confortable), no place for legs (i'm 5,1 feet tall....), WC were not clean and very smelly. DON'T RECOMMEND
It was way too cold in the bus. Bus ride took 8 hours instead of 6.
Took 8hrs to get to kratie, multiple stops at stations/agencies along the way, lunch stop was at 1:45pm!

The trip was good and uneventful. The back 4 seats in the vans are too small for most adults. That is not Mekong Express' fault. I will remember to not order those seats again.  The four of us sitting in those seats were quite uncomfortable. Thank you.
Great first time experience.

no wifi in bus
instead  of 4 hours, was more then 5.5 hour (and no rush hour in p penh)
Really good. Staffs are really nice and helpful. The website is really useful for foreigners to go through the different cities.
No free bottle of water like with Mekong Express but a fast, efficient, and comfortable ride up to Phnom Penh, would definitely choose them again!

The pick-up was at the hotel, but obviously it meant that it had to go to 5+ other hotels for other guests and that delayed the actual departure by a half hour.  Bus was a bigger bus, quite old and not too comfortable.  Free water bottle was provided!
So good way to travel between cities without waste a night in hotel
The driver was nice, provided an unexpected breakfast, comfortable bus/ van

We had a hotel reservation in Sihanoukville and with no bus from Koh Kong till 8 am the next morn. I contacted bookme.com and let them know I was using the wifi @ a local bank & the operator texted me & got a driver within the hour. Great service! Thanks!
Too many stop on the ways (pick up unbooked customer).

I’ve booked MeKong Express many times in Cambodia and Vietnam. This is the 1st time I’ve had trouble. I arrived 3 hours late. We left 1.5 hours late and then we had a flat tire. The tire can’t be helped of course but leaving on time is expected.
Wait for a long time at Phnom Penh customs.
Poor

travel time from phnom penh to ho chi minh was given as 6 but took more than 8 hours and it happened both ways. seating space is so less, mey hong gives better seats than your buses. you also need to check into the hotels that the buses stop.in. pathetic
The driver is very approachable. They always answer our questions good. I like the experience too. I can recommend it to my friends... thanks for accommodating us... see you next time...
Very nice trip and service! Although the bus was a bit too small for big legs... :)

Overall a good journey. Driver on time and polite. Some doubtful overtakings, but overall safe ride considering the traffic in Cambodia. On the minus side, driver had very poor English, since we asked for an English speaking driver.
Very good and confy

We had no problems. Van got us to Phnom Penh earlier than expected, and the van itself was fine - not super spacious but comfortable enough. The confirmation email listed the wrong meeting place - that should be changed.
Trip went smoothly!

The receptionist in the office was very professional and apologetic that the van was late and did let us know what was going on. Although it was no fault of the driver, the van was very late. I didn’t check the exact time but it was at least 40 mins late.
Good driver en perfect timing
A very good service, bit ATM most journeys are taking the best part of 6-7 hours but that's the flow of traffic

A BIG problem was that the location  you gave on the ticket as the arrival place was not where we were dropped. This caused many problems for us becuase we had arranged transportation from the place where your ticket said we would stop!!!

Bus left 30 minutrs late. I did not get the seat I booked. Other drivers stop to let me get out. This time he left a Cambodian woman exit. But took me to the main bus station, which was further then the usual drop off at Orisy Market.
We departed late and journey took longer than advertised, driver was a bit agitated at times with road works!!!
The driver was speeding half the time so even though we left late we actually got to Kampong Thom earlier than expected.
Fast, fair price, good sittings

Horrible. Do not use this bus. The staff was extremely rude and refused to help non vietnamese customers. Our seats were changed numerous times. They made us sit in the back by luggage so we couldnt even recline our seats. HORRIBLE SERVICE
Bus had a flate tire. It is vetter that the driver inform the passangers about this.

I was not given any information about the border crossing. The inspector asked for my passport and when I asked why she didn't answer. After that they left me aside to wait for processing and then threatened to leave without me. All that for 2$ of bribe..

My perplexion is not with the bus company, it was advertised on Bookmebus that the bus would arrive at 1pm. The bus did not arrive until 5:45 and the inspector told me so as we departed. I recommend BMB update the timings to reflect the actual journey.
Arrived before the scheduled arrival time! Fantastic!

Bus Hôtel de nuit TRÈS rudimentaire. Pas de toilettes. Plus de wifi.L âge avancé et l état du bus rendent le trajet très inconfortable sur des routes cambodgienne très abîmées. Pour le 2nd trajet dans un très beau Van nous avons mis 6h au lieu de 4h !
It got very warm on the bus especially when caught in Phnom Phen traffic and the air on barely working
Very good service. Very easy to book online.
The driver drave to slow as he felt so tired and lazy on driving or responding to customer...
Wifi only worked in Vietnam. When we arrived Cambodia, it can't be used anymore. The seat is too small and there is no bench divider. If you seat next to stranger then you have no privacy.

S to PP: one flat tire, one engine broke down, 1h delay 
In PP : 1h30 delay as we were waiting for a passenger coming from another bus that had issued
PP to BTB : second flat tire

In the end we arrived at 10h30 pm instead or 7pm.
Very good driver but it toke more then one hour longer to bring us to our destination, so we almost missed our boat.

They changed the bus fit for other bigger and older, changed the seat I booked, the bus broke for hours on the sun with out windows or aircon, and the door was blocked so we had to dismount the tinny window of the driver to get out and survive. The worst!
The trip took about 2h more than planned, mainly because of the heavy traffic, but everything else was fine.

We were angry because our 7.30 Bus don’t Leave the town because we (2 people) were the only one who Booked... so we have to wait for the next... a very unfriendly Person told me about sending an E-Mail about this case... i didnt got an E-Mail !!!!

J ai 35 ans et voyage en Backpack.A éviter absolument ! Notre car a été annulé ! Nous avons réussi à en prendre un autre 1h plus tard dans un très mauvais état (ce qui peut faire son charme) et sommes arrivés avec plus de 3h de retard....long !
I emailed to your customer service about my dissatisfaction with the service. Thanks.
Safety Belt not working 2a and 3b
Safety Belt not working 2a and 3b
Safety Belt not working 2a and 3b
Everything was fine.

Was confirmed they would pick us up 1 hr before 11pm departure we wait 9-10:55 until we said that's too close to the time so we got on a tuk tuk to make it just in time!Meanwhile everytime we called they said on there way!We arrive then they leave instant

Le chauffeur était attentif à nos besoins et notre confort. De plus, il était très gentil! Bus propre et très confortable! Organisation parfaite à la frontière! Rien à redire, bravo! Seul petit bemol: pas de wifi dans le van.

All was good. Especially on the the Phnom Penh
-
Siem Reap part the lady was very kind. On the day we took the bus it was super hot and air condition was far from adequate which was th only negative.
Excelente servicio, el viaje fue tranquilo a una  velocidad prudente llegando sin inconvenientes al destino. Espero que los demás viajes que tengo programado sean igual de buenos. Saludos
The ride was all fun - speed, bumps, horning. All safe and on time.

Dopo poco dalla partenza si è aperto il portellone e ha sparso i bagagli lungo la strada.
L'autista ha fatto soste dove prendeva la percentuale e è arrivato con 2 ore di ritardo. Pessimo

Dopo poco dalla partenza si è aperto il portellone e ha sparso i bagagli lungo la strada.
L'autista ha fatto soste dove prendeva la percentuale e è arrivato con 2 ore di ritardo. Pessimo
Driver was faster that the limit of the van.Lunatic driving, I will never book by them again, everyone was on high risk of accident, really bad experience.
Little recklessly driving on not paved roads

Totally fine with me. The space oso nice for big person. I had a good night sleep. The bottled water and biscuits is really good service. If the waiting room got more seats and had a cool air conditioning, it would be better. Overall, very good services.

the bus seats were very small. it took us 8 hours to reach ho chi minh. i accept the traffic is more on that route but 8 hours is a bit too much. the place where they stop for food is also not a great place.
The vehicule was really comfortable, a big Lexus. The driver spoke basic English and was very nice. I would absolutely recommend

Bus totally fine. We booked the VIP mini van to Sihanouk. Set off bang on time at 7am from Orrusey. AC on the bus (still a bit warm but better than nothing!) and a bottle of water. Rucksacks fitted in the boot. A few stops en route for toilet / food. Good

We booked a seat from PP to SHV 7:30 am. We arrived in SHV at 1 pm which was  only 30 mins late. The driver was really good he drove defensively and never go too fast. The first row seats behind the driver have a lot of leg room.
Good value with a/c and wifi

The driver was excellent and the staff courteous. Ran about an hour longer than projected, but this due to one of the worst highways in the country, although it is under construction, it's still a long way from being completed. Anticipate delays.
Your employee who take care of the customers and passports was very helpful, friendly and a pleasure to travel with.

A very efficient service. Make sure you are online as the van will leave as soon as everyone on board.we were only 5 passengers so comfort was great but van was new and very clean.  Would definitely recommend
The drive was so good, but it's a bad time for me and my wife to travel on 22-Feb-2019 from PP to HCM city. It was so annoyed by a young group passengers.
It was a great trip but the aircon condensation was dripping on my head, lap, arms ...all the way to Battambang! ...I just had to laugh it away...

Born and raised in NYC and lived around the world, I don't scare easily. However, this.man driving through Cambodia was rough. I'm sure he knows the roads and rules but I just didn't feel safe. God speed.
No space for luggage because space in back was taken up with packages. Many stops to deliver packages. Driver was overtaking wrecklessly and used the horn 50% of the time. Wouldn’t recommend.
Best driver in Cambodia! I felt safer than on all my other trips in Cambodia.

Stop for lunch and after that a quick stop by a smal temple with a beautiful view. This smal details made this more like an excursion were you got to see the real Cambodia. Sympathetic driver who bought us energy drinks by the road to give us energy boost

Wykupilismy specjalnie 2 miejsca za kierowca , Bardzo nam zalezalo na tych miejscach . Ze zdziwieniem stwierdzilismy ze nasze miejsca sa zajete przez obywateli chinskich , aroganckich i agresywnych , nie mieli oczywiscie biletu ani nie znali angielskiego
Horrible. the  bus was not full so the driver take the wrong road for picking passenger, and he stop very often for drop them or taking new one. So the journey make 6hours against 3hours.

We arrived two hours later than expected. The driver would stop the bus every 40 minutes to pick things on the street. To add to this, he stopped at a restaurant to have a 40 meal. It was an average experience overall.

Not the newest bus, but still very comfortable. The guide was very good. There was a toilet on board. The bus didn;t stop anywhere for too long so we kept ongoing. By the way, ALL buses between HCM and PP are 8 to 8.5 hours and they all take your passport
The driver was on time and greeted me with a label of my name at the arrival hall though my flight is a little delay
On time!

Bus driver was so good at driving us safety and bus attendant are friendly. But we was late about 2 hours at the border point, most of foreigners are ignoring to check the visa by Vietnam's immigration police.

Se agradece parar en el camino, pero 4 paradas fueron demasiadas. Por lo anterior llegamos a Phnom Penh con una hora de retraso. El chofer adelantaba continuamente de forma peligrosa, por lo que hay que ir preparado.
Not your fault but the road from Phnom Pehn to Kampot is awfull!

The driver was very nice and competent. 
His car was immaculate and non-smoking as requested. He came early to meet us.
Vehicule VAN assez peu confortable.
