I was absolutely shocked at the attitude of the woman who was working on the bus throughout our travel from Ho Chinh Minh to Cambodia. I will not be recommending this service to my friends who are all planning on travelling this route in the near future
Recommended using Mekong Express Van, especially the driver  drives safely.
Recommended using Mekong Express Van, especially the driver  drives safely.
Recommended using the Island Speed Ferry
Just great
I have almost missed my plane due to delay in bus arrival.
Driver drove too fast and don't obey the tragic law. One more, temperatures were hot on that van.
Friendly driver and very helpful. Don't book A2 seat because it has a small leg room and very straight up sit. Its very uncomfortable to sit.
This service was truly excellent! I received an email confirmation the day before with detailed instructions on how to meet the driver. He was very punctual and drove safely. Highly recommended!

pros ontime 
cons no wifi signal
The staff on the boat are friendly and helpful. The boat reach Long Set beach in 30 mins only.

It was a good trip over all. The bus was old but had a toilet on board.
The departure and arrival time was pretty good.
the departure in battambang worked well. the driver was fast but in my opinion safe on the way. we arrived in phnom penh with an hour late. for this road conditions and the traffic okay.

departure in phnom penh good.
the trip was given with 4 hours. we were 6h30 on the way.in sihanoukville we were thrown out about 2km in front of the busstation. then we enjoyed a decent rip-off of a tuktuk driver.
I advise against booking this company!

I paid extra because this bus was supposed to leave Sihanoukville at 7:30am & get to Siem Reap at 5:30pm but it was super late. We had to go to Phenom Phen first, switch buses & then head to Siem Reap. Bus driver was slow AF so we got there 2 hours late.

Got a hotel pick up last min which was nice. The driver gave no instructions on what to do once we go to the pier. We left late. We got back late. The ticket guy was upset that my ticket got wet on accident and tried to threatened me into buying a new one
Driver was great. Wish we didn't have to make so many stops but had some locals on the bus. Arrived at a decent time, wasn't too far behind.
No room in tiny van because space was taken up with packages. Door was rattling constantly. Driving was fast but dangerous at points. No luggage space. Many stops.
crazy driver almost killed us 2 times on the road

I booked my return at the island as soon as I arrived at the pier. The booth indicated departure time, but as I went before said time (1445) to take the ferry, it left at 1430 which fucked over my connecting bus out of SHV. Beware!
Really easy and comfortable trip!driver 10/10 we really rested in the bus! Didn’t feel long way at all.

We were the first ones that booked seats in the bus and we couldn't sit on them. Then we had to sit in the frontseat but the seatbelts were broken. The driver drove 6 hours on the left side on the road, way to hard while using is phone. I was so scared

The driver didn’t keep us informed with what was happening. At one point we stopped three times in the span of 10 mins and had no clear direction. Half of the passengers had no idea we were in Phnom Penh.
Driver drive very fast SR-PP take only 5h with 2 stops (1st stop 20mn. 2nd stop 10mn).
The trip from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap was good. We arrived 30 minutes earlier even with a few bathroom breaks.
We arrive several hours late at the destination
Overall a good experience, definitely value for money. The booking process was very easy
Driver was rude and drive recklessly. He picks up guests along the way.

The driver was really nice. apart from that the ride was an absolute shambles. Terrible from start to finish. The air con was broke, no room at all where we was sat at the back, there was bags all over the place, people at front had more room, no WiFi! 1*
Always good
The shuttle van no air-conditioning from Siem Real till Phnom Penh. Now I got sick
Very reliable bus company.we stopped at a place for 15 mins to go to toilet ( decent toilets for Cambodia) , and to pick up snacks.value for money

I booked tickets but it was only after I’d done this that it became apparent that we could not take suitcases in the minivan. 
I emailed 4 times requesting a refund as per their policy, even emailed in Khmer but no response and no refund 
Can’t give 0

Bus is old. Dirty inside. Half of the bus filled up with commercial goods, even they put cartons at the bottom of all seats. handles of the seats were broken. This was my worst travel experience. However, they were on time. But I won’t recommend this.
Van was very old and not very confortable. The door was even blocked at some point. Driver was nice, and drove safely.

Good service from Mekong Express, not so good from Bookmebus. They refused my pick up point and via their online chat  told me also it wasn’t available. Hotel manager called Mekong Express directly as he said they do pick up where I stayed, and they did.
Note to self: PP city to the airportin rush hour = 1,5 hours!
Wifi not available, air conditioned not cool, quite old bus and shaking, toilet has bad smell.

The bus from Siem Reap to PP was comfortable, but the bus from PP to Ho Chi Min had no enough leg room. Only stop was 5 mins, no lunch stop, plus 20 mins stop before the cambodia-vietnam border. The lady staff was nice..It was OK all in all
Was okay, late but qe already expected to be late! Driver was very good!

This was our last Taxi service in Cambogia and like the other time was perfekt 
Thank you very much
See you next time

No wifi, bit warm and uncomfy seats. So many stopover because they still pick up passengers along the way. It took a lot of time at the border since the locals put money in their passport for them to stamp first by the police. Guide is not approachable.
The drive was pleasant enough although the driver was probably going a bit fast. Bus did not have wifi and no snacks were provided. We could not be dropped near our hotel either.

Company did not pick from hotel as promised. Office lady was rude and did not apologise for having written incorrect instructions for the driver who went to pick us. Needs lessons in customer service. Driver and inspector were great but soured by office.

They overbooked our bus so we weren't allowed on (despite checking in 45 minutes early). We had to wait 2 hours for the next one. The A/C broke so it was awful. We were lied to constantly (don't trust a word they say). Please avoid this company.
Relatively fast and comfortable.
We had a problem with the motor between Phnom Penh and KAMPOT, the way wasn't so safe for anyone. We were really late for the arrival. Not a really good trip for anybody.
The website said the trip was 4 hours, but the actual time was over 6 hours, leading us to miss our ferry. Please change your website to accurately reflect the travel time.

I changed my pickup time twice by email/WhatsApp and each time I received a prompt reply and it was no problem at all to make the change. The driver kept singing, quite annoying as he wasn’t very good and I had a headache...
Impressed with service - only a few minutes late and all passengers given a bottle of water
Our driver was very efficient and safe. I also liked how kind/friendly he was, it made the whole journey a breeze. It is definitely worth the extra money.

The driver didnt speak any English but thats not the issue...he never smiled once he was on mobile phone basically the entire trip no seat belt unless he thought there were police and he drove 140km an hoyr most of the way..we gotbthere in one piece but .

Driver drove at break neck speed everywhere, not slowing on corners and overtaking everything in his path without hesitation. Not sure if this may be because it’s sold as a 3 hour transfer which clearly isn’t possible as it took 4.5 hours to arrive.
Good very fast. Bus seats were very spacious and comfortable seats but a bit old. They stopped at good stops but the stop in kampong thom was very expensive shop.

Dispite what everybody says the trip doesn't take 4 hours but more than 5/6 hours.
Every time of the day the road is very busy and if your driver drives very slow, it will take you even longer.

Comfortable van. Only one quick toilet stop on a 6 hour journey. The driver picked up a lot of Cambodian locals on the way which added to time but we did arrive half an hour earlier than expected due to how quickly he drove.

we are only two they cancel our van from sihaoukville to PP(4h) we wait 1 hour and we are oblige to do sihanoukville -> kampot (2h) and after kampot -> PP(4h but in reel 6h) .... we are very upset because no refund .... don t take this company...
Driving was excellent compared to other buses  we have been on.  Plenty of comfort stops.  Would definitely use them again.
This driver much better than the one going from Siem Reap to Mondulkiri. But bus too full of people and luggage etc..very squashed.

The driver was supposed to drive me at the airport, he didn’t stop and told something in Khmer (which I don’t understand) then I asked the company and the driver to pay my tuk tuk to go to the airport the driver pretended he didn’t speak English anymore
Everything went well
We left on time, efficient service, good driver
ព្រូឡានមានឥរិយាបថមិនសមរម្យ សម្តីទ្រគាំបោះបោកខ្លាំង។ មិនបានសួរថា ភ្ញៀវណា ទៅដល់ណា។ ខ្ញុំត្រូវចុះនៅក្រុងសែនមនោរម្យ ប៉ុន្តែគ្មានអ្នកប្រាប់ថា ដល់ណា! ដូច្នេះខ្ញុំហួសផ្លូវអស់ជាង១០០គីឡូម៉ែត្រ
Nice, on time, good driving....nothing to add.

Google say the trip will take 5 hours. Mekong express day it will take 4. To deliver on that they have to be the fastest thing on the road and overtake everything. But the driver was good and it never felt unsafe
Excellent service excepted arrival 1 hour late but depending of the traffic of course. Excellent and careful driver ?
The bus has no wifi (it was indicated in the page that there is a wifi) and the AC is not good the weather inside the bus is too hot.

We started absolutely on time and everything worked very well! The trip took 4 hours though instead of 3, but we already expected that as it says so in lonely planet. Maybe mekong express should say 4 hrs instead of 3. But overall very good!

The ride should take 4 hours but it took almost 6 hours. You need to put that on your site, 4 hours is just not achievable. Be honest about tha

And I don’t know what you mean with ‘inspector’ so I can’t rate that

Excellent way to get from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. Comfortable ride, good safe driver and a beautiful spot for lunch in the way. Way better than flying as you see the Cambodian countryside, even from the highway.
The van stop more or less 5 times to do everything the driver and others want
Travelled from Phnom Penh to Kampot. Says it should take 3 hours but it took 6.5 hours because the driver took a detour to drop off locals.

They have no Servicepoint. The bus is Standing in Front of a little glashouse from the Tourist information in the middle of the street. Nobody is there. You have to be there at the right time. Maybe somebody comes or not!? It's really strange.

I did not go on this trip. I emailed and sent an SMS message with no reply from either. You need to respond to foreigners communication. 
Thank you

The ride was one thing only. Complicated! Driver took the wrong direction then it was the wrong driver and we had to drive back change the driver. The guy organising the whole thing was a complete a.. what can I say instead of 5 h drive ->9,5h never again
Dangerous driver, very bad roads,: the passagers are not quiet and tired after three hours.
It is just ok, but it is not VIP as mention. Aircon seems not working well.

The staff onboard was rude, the bus arrived at destination point after 7,5 instead of advertised 6 hours, the bus was in a bad condition and the restaurant stop is in a terrible, dirty and expensive place. Avoid!
Fantastic bus, driver stopped a few times with no instruction, good timing, yummy snacks
Please stop cooperate with the restaurant at Pich Nil. The food is horrible...

I dont want to choose again.. I'm so serious.. From SR to Kampot it was nightmare. In ticket 8:00 pm to 10:00 am. Bus has many problems. We arrived late and they send us to Kampot at 11:00 am. again bus problems and we arrived to Kamp;ot 3:00 pm !!!

Good driver and over all a good trip, but no room for luggage. On these vans that do not allow room below the back seats, the luggage ends up on the floor in the passenger area. Need to remove the rear seat, or possibly look at luggage storage on the roof
Driver was very courteous and kind. We only had one short toilet stop and we always felt safe and at ease. Great experience.

Read the review made me worry. But it is all true. Cair aircon not cool. Journey wasnt 3 and half an hour. But actually total 5 and half an hour. However the driver that day was ok. And overall, i dont recomend this company.
Good driver, good price, left on time, arrived a bit early, air con worked, so did wifi and seatbelts. What more to say?
It was very comfortable bus!!good timing of rest time.Thank you!
Deparature with 30 mn of delay and no any place for luggage...
Great driver, though a lot of traffic, we always felt safe and even got dropped off on the way to the post-office. Very much enjoyed the ride!
The overall experience was good.
change pier without prior notice and delay the ferry 90 mins. it took me 3 hours from SHV to Heaven island while stated only 1 hour in trip info.

Great service. Bus attendant got us through customs very smoothly and two rather rude ladies who did not understand they had to wait for their visa.....were treated by him, with great tolerance. I shook his hand for putting up with such rude silly women.
The bus was quite late and the seats were much more uncomfortable than usual, comparing to other buses we have taken in Cambodia.

it was a good and smooth trip from ho chi minh to cambodia. Just a reminder to travelers,  please have your travel docs ready including e-visas. So that it will not take you long in the immigtation/cross boarder.
The van was in good condition, the driver was fast aa always around here. We did a short 5min toilet/snacks stop on the way. It was super convenient to buy the ticket online!

Absolutely shocking. 
Van does not have air con. Driving was dismal, speeding and cutting people up. Caused my girlfriend to be sick. 

Took 6 hours instead of the scheduled 4 because they stop at rancid shops where they get commission. DO NOT USE

Caution!The telephonenumbers which you get in confirmation are from Cambodia - NOT the country you are in! Driver drives in the highest gear somehow possible even if the engine shakes the whole bus. I wonder how many times they have to change the flywheel

I live in Southeast Asia for 4yrs, so I understand how traffic works, but my driver was driving way too fast, etc... Vietnam has one of the highest road fatality rates in the world and it is undoubtedly because of drivers like this. Avoid this company.

All the passengers were in the van at 1.20pm. De driver drove away at 1.35pm, thought that was strange. Especially because he was just watching some video. 
The ride itself was ok
Nice newer Toyota Hi Ace van, good driver, and a welcome sight, a smooth road. Made great time and even with two stops, made it a half an hour early. Would use again.

Il servizio è stato puntuale e conforme alle aspettative.  Anche il pick-up con bus navetta presso il mio hotel è stato puntuale oltre che gratuito. Il bus utilizzato non era nuovo, ma ha svolto egregiamente la sua funzione.
Pretty good value for that long trip.
This was horrific! Bus was clearly broken and needed to stop every hour to have the driver do work on it! Impossible to sleep, we were also 4 hours delayed
The driver was good but he spent too much time on his cell phone ! He seems to be bored and keep calling and be called all the times. His phone ring was loud as well as his voice....

We left battamang 30” later.the bus immediately stopped...so it took a while before leaving.during the night the bus stopped 2 times to fix the engine,no wc on board.we arrived destination 5 hours later.inPP the girl helped us for changing bus .
Stoping for break all the time, trying to get customer on the street all the time, honking so much for no reason. It used to be the best company but now it is the worse.
Experienced driver.  We felt safe and in good hands.
Although there was a lot of traffic due to major road construction, the driver kept is calm and smile all the way!

The worst drive I've ever had in my entire life. The bus driver drives like he's the only one in the car and keep everyone's life at risk. He almost hit other cars serveral time and he doesn't listen when we tried to talk nicely to him.I prayed not to die
Trip was seamless, bus was clean and comfortable. Host on bus kept us informed of stops and border crossing processes. Buying tickets with Bookmebus was great!

The A/C barely worked so the journey from Kampot to PP was very hot and uncomfortable. The driver ignored my request to turn up the A/C. The bus was late arriving, as they usually are. Not recommended.

+20 minutes late, doesn’t speak English at all, spending the whole trip in phoning loudly and watching videos (!) He was very rude letting us carrying all our bagages over the last 200m etc. Please to better select your drivers
Drive too fast (really), no attention to his passengers

We left on time from HCM. The inspectors/bus assistants were helpful. They assisted us in the immigration(w/o any fee,contrary to what I always read).Arrived on time also.The lady in the bus PP to SR helped me to look for a tuktuk to bring me to my hotel.

The driver was there at the agreed spot well before schedule. He drove safely. The whole trip was comfortable. The only negative to mention is that he spoke zero English - in fact he didn’t say a single word during the whole trip.
Excellent and prompt service
Great!
I loved the bus. Enough leg room and the chair can be reclined to sleep. Staff were very nice too. Journey was very smooth and only took us 9 hours including border process. Thanks!

Amazing customer service from A to Z. Drivers on time ! Cars not thaaaaaat confortable but it is fine ! I would use them again and again . Tjey fid everything so we don’t miss our ferry boat ! Love them !
Driver always on the phone ! Had to call the company to tell him to stop using his phone ! But the customer service of the company was amazing !
Nice trip, excepted your driver looked a bit tired for the 3rd part of the Journey, maybe too much hours Driving, but actually good trip.

The service was great. Left on time and arrived on time. Stopped for quick bathroom breaks and a lunch breack. Driving was good and comfortable seats with AC. Very clean. I would definitely use this service again. It's cheap and great

Le pick up annoncé n'a pas été fait. Quant à l'arrivée ils nous ont fait descendre à la gare routière en dehors de la ville alors qu'un arrêt était prévu au centre de Koh Kong....
Le but: Le business des tuk tuk !!!!
Lamentable!
Driver was likely drunk, driving pour

No complaints service was efficient we were picked up from our accommodation 45 minutes before our bus was scheduled to leave. The bus was in reasonable condition. We stopped once for a toilet break. Driver was good and we received bottled water.

Took the bus frm Mondulkiri to Siem Reap March 19. My booking seats was taken by someone else. The seats assigned to me (lower level, A) bed was dirty where saw roaches and bugs. The bus was full so can't change seats. Poor experience.
Safe and punctual. Quiet and comfortable

Air con didn't work very so the bus was very hot that and the bad driving made me very ill. Journey took one hour longer than stated and Driver did not speak English so didn't understand when we asked how long we had left. Worst bus I've taken in Cambodia
All good and nice driver with good service

Glad you asked
This trip was a scam 
I left kep am 8.10 with a minivan to go to Kampot and take the public bus at 9 that came back to kep! It took me 7.5 hours to reach Phnom Penh and I lost the next bus So I had to pay for hotel and new bus today.
WiFi not working for whole trip. Was showing as working but needed rebooting. Nobody had WiFi

The bus started & reached on time. 
Only issue was, there were mosquitoes.
Great and safe trip. Very good service. Will be back soon..
We were concerned the driver would not appear or drive recklessly, but he was punctual and very safe (for Cambodia standards, anyway). Pleasant experience all around and would happily book again.
The bus was supposed to start at 12:30, but as it certainy was not full, the company Champa Mekong sent us to another company with a bus starting one hour later. Not really fair...
Maybe driver could tell next time if what time should the passengers return to the van to know if they could eat a heavy dinner.
Worst Bus Company in cambodia, 1,5 Hours Delay, Minibus very bad condition, driver fast but alright, no service at all
Great driving, bus almost on time and a lot of space. I could not expect more : perfect!
Bus driver was nice . Good at english . Easy explain.

Terrible experience!!!! We were left at the border at 9pm! Really scary. No drinks, WiFi or food stop. Ruined a big part of our trip. We had to get a taxi back to phnom penh to get flights to Ho Chi Minh. So cost a fortune and two days of our holiday.
Good  driver,  safe courteous, goid bus trip, Arrive on time, all good
We took boat 5 pm because the nightbus was late,on site it was written 3 pm boat but didn t exist so we had to wait,always double check
Our 4-hour-trip took 6 hours.
It was the worst bus I’ve ever travelled on: poorly maintained, a/c not working, inconsiderate driver. The bus was crowded and uncomfortable.
Perfect
Careful and friendly driver,comfort stops at good intervals.Smooth trip  :))
Overall the trip was fantastic rather then the behaviour of the driver he was not ready to uttar a word from his mouth on our enquiry....Rest is fine
It was really nice. We arrived earlier than we should. We made 2 stops in the middle of the trip. The driver was not crazy and was nice. Would recommend.
I have used this company again and again and have never had a problem. Comfortable seats and they don’t make unnecessary stops like some other companies. The staff are friendly and helpful.
Great service. Most comfortable way to travel in Cambodia.

We had a terrible experience. You promise us a mini van. It was a very old bus with no air conditioning. It broke doe in the way. So they fix it right away. Then they drove very slow. We arrived 3 hour late. I will never book with this company again.
Vehículo para tirar a la basura, cero puntualidad, el conductor un suicida, temimos por nuestras vidas y las chicas de la oficina una trato fatal.
The bus left on time and was comfortable. It made 1 break after 3 hours driving. Due to roadworks between Battambang and Siem Reap, the bus arrived 1 hour late, which was not a problem for me.

Everything was ok. 
The buscompany picked us up at our hotel. We depart about on time.
We only arrive 1 hour later than scheduled... 
Before departure they provide us with a bottle of water.
We had one busstop of 20 minutes, which I think is enough

The first time in life to travel from PNH to BKK spend 23 hours even I buy the direct bus; as well as booking online with your company is not provide the full service as I need to wait and standby for check in at Khmer border.
there was too much time we had to spend in the traffic jam.
The driver was incredibly unsafe, the bus was over packed and there was no room for our bags. Was carsick the entire time from the erratic driving, I will never use this company again.

I have used Mekong Express many many times... Sometimes its a good experience sometimes not so good. The bus on this particar occasion was late arriving in Sihanoukville, consequently we were late leaving... However, the driver was apologetic so all good
Good company
我沒有搭上車，公交公司也沒有提供電話聯絡的服務，我抵達時，售票員只用冷酷的表情表達，妳沒有準時請妳重新買票，搭乘下一班車。所以我重新付錢買票，搭下一班車14：30，整個路程使用7個小時，21：40才抵達西哈努克，跟網路上顯示的4小時完全不符合，整個過程讓我很不愉快，我不會再搭這間公交公司的巴士。
The guy who was in charge of do the visa tramits, was incredible rude, i cant recommend this company who has employees like him

We were not satisfied with your service. It took us 7 hours to go to Sihanoukville instead of 4, we had an incident on the road and our driver was not speaking a word of English. It is the 2nd time I have a bad experience and would not recommend it!

Very bad service  and it is my nightmare ,,, the company allow broken down car to operate. After we left around 30hrs the car is broken and they don’t find any solution. 19customers need to transfer to local small and old-car which we had to sit crowdly

Our bus had a engine damage after 1 hour drive, than we had to wait 5 hours for a new bus. This bus had a engine damage too after 1 hour!! Than we just drove with a mini van which came along the way. After all we arrived after 14 Hours (!!!). NEVER AGAIN!

I booked with VIP bus from Sorya trainsportation but what i get is the oldest bus with law sevice from them... i feel so regret with this app and please let the costumer know the sitting number or the photo of the car or just let us know clear...

I booked with VIP bus from Sorya trainsportation but what i get is the oldest bus with law sevice from them... i feel so regret with this app and please let the costumer know the sitting number or the photo of the car or just let us know clear...

Took the night bus.... Despite the frequent and unannounced pee stops, in the middle of nowhere, (no toilet on board) we arrived on time and the ride was comfortable...driver did not speed, nor did he communicate

I would like a refund. The bus made several unannounced stops which is very inconsiderate. We were late to arrive in Sihanoukville and missed the 2 pm ferry which we had reserved. We had to wait for 5 pm ferry. Terrible customer service from staff too
I think its good if you have time that is exactly on the opening of the immigration so we do not consume so much time waiting.

Very rice ride, it was a direct bus to Bangkok. Our bags stud in the bus while we were crossing at the border which was very nice. They waited for all of us and gave us lunch (rice with shrip, pretty ok considering it was “bus food”.) I recomend it

Avoid Mekong Express at all costs. Vans lack seatbelts, driver parks on shoulder of highway as trucks are speeding past. Got into a collision with a sedan, which luckily wasn't going fast, or else the woman next to me would have been injured or worse.

I was assured by the ticket sales agent that vans on the notoriously unsafe route to S'ville would have seatbelts, but there were none in my assigned seat. I wasvmoved to a seat with them, then moved back to the original unsafe seat after we'd departed
They changed the sleeping night bus to the VIP one without any notice. It was hard to sleep.
Cramped seats. No water or wet wipes given. Bed sheet was not big enough to wear
Though arrived 2 hours late due to traffic but driver was good and very cautious driving
Never showed up and left us hanging to find out own ride

Driver from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh was very good but the driver of van from PP to Sihanoukville was so bad. Nearly all the way talk with a local lady at his right side back, baba baba babala... affected the drive and so noisy.  Thank you!

Driver feel sleepy during drive time. And not so friendly. 

Air con not cool enought

(+) the seat is big and spacious
(-) I could see some cockroach on the wall and seat sometimes.
ល្អ​បង្គួរ​

The drive can seem quick and dangerous but it is not the case it just the Cambodian driving style.
But at the end the driver did a good job and i think that it's the fastest way to join mondulkiri. Its not only a Tourist transport but also for Cambodgian
Travelling with Mekong Express, it's always safe and on time. Keep on moving.
Usually the service is excellent but this time the driver stopped too many times and nearly had an accident.

1. There was no WiFi
2. The bus driver drove very dangerous, going over 100 km/h, and outruning others by driving median strip where it's forbidden
3.We got a window broken on a way, and the driver drove with it and broken glass was falling inside bus
The aircon not function well, very hot from taking the minivan from Vietnam to Cambodia. Need to be improvement.

The aircon not cooling, is hot.
Long distance from Cambodia to Vietnam feel uncomfortable.

I booked my seat 1A-2A but when i went to the counter they said my seats are already taken. It was double booking. Maybe error. What the f. I paid my money. BOOKMEBUS and Virak Buntham have to improve on this. DO NOT let this happen again for not just me.

The ride was fine, picking up strangers off the side of the road was not the safest idea. The worst part was the border where we had to give the attendant all of our passports and then wait. People behind us got through faster it was not organized at all

Please do not do that to travelers. Everything you promised was not deliver. We supposed to travel in a mini bus. Instead we had a very old old bus with no air conditioned. It took 3 extra hours. It was horrible
it was good, but car horn was so noisy that I can not sleep.
Sleeping seat was too narrow even for a regular Asian size. Not so comfortable to sleep.

left suitcase at departure 7 hours away...had to argue to get delivered before we left cambodia next day..to their credit though...sent suitcase and received 12 hours later before we left country. driver good and safe behavior
Always appreciate the Mekong Express service everytime I go to BKK; however, just one small comment, there are not much choice of timetable to select during this route.
Very good, could be faster?

The bus was comfortable and it was nice being given cold water when we boarded. We were making our way to Siem Reap to catch a flight however and we were very irritated when an unplanned stop was made for the driver to have lunch. 30 minute delay!
Too much cell phone on speaker phone, playing loud music and videos. by other passengers.  There needs to be a quiet policy on van.

Engine broke on our way to Kampot.
The driver had to leave us in the middle of nowhere in the heat and comeback for repair.

Siem Reap to Battambang was a large bus.. Staff were organised, bus left on time.No water or snack provided.
Stopped for 30 min break at nice rest stop and arrived 15 min later than expected arrival time. 
Was pleased with overall experience.

The air-con is so hot.
May drop along the way back to Phnom Penh
Terrible punctuality. Over an hour late leaving. Then over two hours late arriving.
Terrible punctuality. Over an hour late leaving. Then over two hours late arriving.
Terrible punctuality. Over an hour late leaving. Then over two hours late arriving.
Terrible punctuality. Over an hour late leaving. Then over two hours late arriving.

The trip was worth the 7 $ but perhaps a short stop for 10 minutes before the lunch stop would have made the trip excellent! The stop for lunch was very good, much better than the one chosen by the Giant Ibis. We will definitely choose you next time.

According to schedule for Battambang to Phnom Penh we should arrive at 12... But we arrived about 2-3 hours later. And for that distance/travel hours there's only 1 stop. I think 2 stops is more convenient.
driver changed a tyre with no fuss and made sure the bus was safe. the bus left 30 minutes because of late arrival of passengers. we arrived safely in Battembang, the driver was excellent,
The driver was very good.safe, driving skill, all perfect. 9:30 phnom penh to sihanoukville

I have used Mekong Express on many occasions...However I wish they would be more HONEST with the time it takes to travel from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville and back. The last five trips I have made have all been over 6 hours...all of them so beware. :-(
Everything was very nice,punctual,spacious but the driver very rude..can not speak english and think we understand what he said..

Trip was good.  Timely and safely arrived at my destination.  

However. There was no WiFi as advertised and little air conditioning.  

But overall a good trip.  Thank you
One of the worst busrides of my life.
Really good and safe driving
The bus was an hour late otherwise the ride was ok for the money.

Air conditional not function well, too hot. 
Do you monthly check and service?
Driver felt sevetal times asleep while driving. Only 1 seat belt at rear, the other did not work. Worst drive ever!! I do not recommend you at all!
Good service
Good service
Driver drove very dangerously almost hitting a scooter, scrapping her along her shoulder. My food bag went missing so I went to the front of the bus to ask the driver and he just laughed at me
Was in time, Nice car, good sriver
The promised Wifi was not in the bus. The driver drove carefully and prudently. I like!
Very comfortable bus. Amazing service.
We was just surprised that they accept passenger at the middle of the trip and let then sit on the narrow aisle beside our bed
In the HCM didn't check every passenger passport visa, cause us in the Vietnam and Cambodia customs gate delay a lot of time for waiting.

A bit rubbish really. We changed our ticket and got the new ticket through for the bus 2 hours earlier. when we arrived they told us we were on the old reservation as they hadn't changed it. they got an extra bus and a bigger bus but we were 2 hours late.

I have never been so scared on the road in my life. At several points we were travelling over 120km/h and after we asked him to slow down he didn’t change. Countless near misses with oncoming trucks/cars when driver kept overtaking and speeding.

Paid more for 4 hour trip instead 5/6.
But it took more than 6. And only one short 5 minute toilet break after 2 hours. (in kampot) because some had to get out overthere.

Very poor bus condition.
AC was not worked at all, sitting in that bus like sitting on the boat without roof.
Bus very shakes and I almost take off all of my shirt. The bad experience ever I used to met.
Everything was great! Thank you!
The boat left 30 minute later than planned

Bus was fine, though was a bit frustrating that there were lots of personal drop offs at different locations - we were the last passengers on the bus and only ones to go to the bus station, and we arrived 2.5 hours late largely because of this.

Great ride and very quick. We stopped at all the towns along the way for breaks and deliveries. Unfortunately we hit and killed a dog on the way which is bound to happen with uncontrolled breeding and the way you drive in Cambodia. Don't blame the driver.

Dirver from Sihanoukville to PP was good. Arrived on time. Night bus from PP to Siem Reap was not so good, my seat was bad and cannot fix upright, I told the staff, he said cant help and cant change seat. I will choose others if visit Cambodia again
everything was great. on time left, on time arrived, the driver led the bus very quickly, there was water in the bus and Wi-Fi
Good driver, reasonable stops, on time.
Supposed to arrive at 12:30pm at SHKVille and arrived around 2:30pm. Instead of 4 hours, it was more 6 hours.
Horrible. The driver let me alone at the border and left Without me

The van reached in just  on time and driver is courteous.
Only deficiency is No WiFi service in as promised.
No fake promises please.
The vehicle is a bit old. The driver he drive too fast nearly knock my ppl on the road.
The vehicle is a bit old. The driver he drive too fast nearly knock my ppl on the road.

Very good, but a fellow passenger - a francophone idiot - twice flicked his filthy footwear onto my upper torso during the journey, while he fidgeted about in the seat behind me. And why weren’t Khmer music videos being shown on the Tv inside the bus ?!!!

C'est une arnarque, vous mettez 8 h et pas 5. Les bus sont dans un état pitoyable , voir dangereux notamment le premier . a eviter . le surcout qu on prend pour aller plus vite et etre dans un mini bus n'en vaut pas le coup.
Surprisingly pleasant journey given some reviews, two stops at clean toilets, driver smiled, smooth ride, left on time, good value for money
Perfect !
Driver keeps stopping at commission based restaurants and travel agencies.
good
The AC in the bus is not cold at all. So hot and uncomfortable. Will never take this bus again!
Not at all confortable. I really don’t recommend

The minivan was overbooked and they sent us instead to a bus for a cheaper price in the main station, which took almost 4 hours longer. 
How everything ran was very sketchy and without a proper English person to speak with. Not good! Wish that money back

It bus ride was alright. Roads are not the best in Cambodia, but we got there on time.
Just stopped at an overpriced restaurant during the trip and one of the staff was playing his techno music the whole time.
Reliable, were there to meet us on arrival amd knew where our destination was, would recommend.
Booked a return trip after a successful initial lick up, driver turned up on time (actually a little early), would recommend.

Hotel pickup was efficient and van left on time. Good air con. Bottle water provided. 1 stop1/2 way.  Didn't relax till 2nd half of trip when another passenger agreed to swap seats so I could have seat belt. Driver was good as per SE Asia standards.

Easy online booking, probably paid more than just turning up $15 return but it was worth it for peace of mind. It was organised chaos at the pier but we were signposted to our speedboat by staff without fuss. Great punctual 30 minute crossing. Loved it.
This was a great service. Always on time to leave but be prepared for delays due to traffic. Great drivers and guide. This service made it very easy to tour around Vietnam/Cambodia.
Al very welll
Arrived promptly and was very comfortable and the driver was very cautious so we felt safe unlike other trips by bus we have made

Having read reviews I was very nervous but it was acceptable. Loaded in time for a 7am departure then left until 7:30 where one more coupe joined. Can only think they were the only ones on the next bus so they grouped us together but not explanation.

Extremely dissatisfied that there were not seatbelts for assigned seats. What does VIP mean? Safety needs to come first. Driving was too fast, though the driver was good. I will return to Phnom Penh on the van only because I already have purchased a ticke

The driver told US, it's no time to make to eat, too many people and the stop is just 10 minutes. We have nothing eaten and sat 10 minutes in the bus. The driver came after another 20 minutes with two locals and grinned only, they had course lunch. Thank
Very unpunctual.
Bit crampt and A/C not remarkable but rapid, comfortable and cheap.
I was shocked! Nice van, also.

We appreciate Company's effort for the pick up at the hotel because it was too hot for us to go to the bus station on our own. Though it was late for more than half hour and the trip took longer than we expected due to border control in Vietnam.
Great service for the cost! I would recommend and use this company again!
Nice, clean and safe
Seat is generally comfortable. Bus is punctual.

Worst bus ever. Waited at the border for hours. Waited to depart. Waited around the city for nothing. Then waited again in Pnom Penh for hours. The drivers screamed loud. No idea what they are saying. Yelling at passengers. Bed was dirty. Not worth $22
Can't complain. The bus was not pretty empty so I got 4 seats to myself. The ride was smooth and we arrived early.

Left from the first stop by the Olympic market, took around 2h inside the city picking up people on the way in other stations. Otherwise the ride was ok, stopped halfway through for a 20min break (bathroom, snacks, food).

Old Minibus for 13 people. No space for luggage and legs. Driver left us To thé border and he did not give information because he doesnt speak english.
We had 2 hours late. On arrival To phu quoc ferry no bus for us waiting. Wé used taxi To finish our tr

Excellent driver, in a comfortable Hi Ace van. If you are a little apprehensive about the driving of some of the other companies, the Postal Service vans are an excellent alternative. May take a bit longer, but your nerves won't be shattered. Recommended!
Brilliant service and great punctual trip. Would definitely use again.
Overall is excellent, except we were 2.5 hours behind ETA.
The only problem is the last bit of the highway is still under construction.Soon will be much smoother

Driver was very fast (realitive to the other buses Ive taken in Vietnam)

Border process was so easy and much nicer than some of the horror stories id read online.

I was really happy with this shuttle service! I’ve been on a few shuttle services around Asia and this was by far the best! It was efficient, no pick ups or passenger transfers along the way. The driver was fast but safe and slowed for big bumps. Great!!
Arrival time at 2.40 p.m instead of 1.30 p.m. Maybe it will be better that customers know that the trip lasts 6 hours minimum and not 5 hours.
Good experience in comfortable van.
It was a very pleasant journey. A little extra help for foreigners during the pit stops would make it perfect.
Great service!!!!
Very bad. Went to kep first.....not kampot as advertised.  Journey therefore took over 5 hours....not 3 hours . Driver didn't communicate or care about frustrated passengers.
អាក្រក់បំផុត បុគ្គលិកលើកដាក់អីវ៉ាន់ អន់ចរិន លួចគាស់សោរ វ៉ាលី ហើយលួចរបស់

The driver is totally not skilled to drive.
Siem Reap bus was not good.The seat  adjuster was not working and hence uncomfortable Dparture time not maintained.
Driver again not skilled.

Difficult to understand why the time of departure was not the one I booked. And so I had to wait 3 hours in the bus station in PP. Without toilets !!! The driver and the other man / woman where nice. Particulary in the 2d bus.

Difficult to understand why the time of departure was not the one I booked. And so I had to wait 3 hours in the bus station in PP. Without toilets !!! The driver and the other man / woman where nice. Particulary in the 2d bus.

Nattakan is the best.
Good Service, very professional

Good service by Nattakan.
Only annoying that the driver stopped 4 times for private businesses.
The driver keeps stopping the bus and add more passengers along the road.
Good bus and good driver

Phnom Penh to Kampot very poor service. I was booking with back sit but finally, I go to the front seat. The bus air-con was broken and it is very very hot. I feel really disappointed.
Kampot to Phnom Penh, it was good but the driver drove faster

On the rest break of our trip the bus drove away for 30 minutes without telling where they were going or what they were doing. At the end of the trip, the padlock of my friends bag had been broken open and everything inside had been gone through.

Comfy trip with plenty of short rest stops. Departed and arrived on time, however one guest requested to be dropped off before the designated final address and they made everyone get off at the same time, about 1km from designated address.
Unfortunately, no wifi was available.
Overall was good, but just driver drove very fast
Good service.
The driver doesn’t speak English. No explanations while the stop. 30 minutes delay. Why they are asking to arrive 30 minutes before if they 30 minutes more of delay. We wait 1 hour for nothing.

We took the van from Phnomh Penh to Kampot, the ride itself was good and on time. Just the entire road is currently being constructed so the road was very bumpy and suffered some delay due to road works.
Bad...

We booked a mini van from Phnom Pehn to Sihanoukville, the van left on time. But we arrived almost more than an hour late. 

The scariest part was after our first stop when it got dark the driver actually dozed of SEVERAL TIMES!

The only complaint I have is that the air conditioning was not working well on the van. The driver tried to fix it at a stop, but it didn't help. Other than that, great job, Cambodia Post! (I don't know who the Inspector is that I needed to rate.)
Good driver. But this is our second trip with this company and we arrived later again than previously arrival time. The bus was very dusty inside and there was no belt at my seat.
All good!
We arrived one hour later. Other than that, it was okay, we got a free water bottle and there was AC in the mini bus.
Trip went very well.abd as the only westerners on the bus we were made very welcome. Driver polite and helpful. Would definitely recommend as great quality price service.

The bus was more than 1 hour late for departure and then we had to change busses just outside of PP. 

At the border, the bus team tried to charge me an extra $1 to "verify" my e-visa for Vietnam. A total scam, as most of these bus company staff do.

Bookmebus គួរតែផ្លាស់ប្ដូររយៈពេលធ្វើដំណើរ ព្រោះភ្នំពេញកំពត់លែង ៣ម៉ោងហើយ ផ្លូវខូចច្រើន ត្រូវជិះផ្លូវវាង ប្រើរយៈពេលយូរជាង៣ម៉ោង។ សម្រាប់ភ្ញៀវបរទេសអាចមិនពេញចិត្តព្រោះមិនទៅដល់ទាន់ពេលកំណត់ភ្ញៀវខ្លះស្ដីអោយអ្នកបើកបរព្រោះពុំដឹងថាមានផ្លូវខូច គិតថាអ្នកបើកជិះខុសផ្លូវ

We were sent a text and e mail letting us know our bus would be at meeting point at 1 pm. We got there really early at 12.20 to find that the bus had already left. Luckily he doubled back for us but was clear he wasn't happy and felt really uncomfortable.
Trip was extremely long, departing PP at 9.30 and arriving shv at 4pm. Please try to be more punctual.
The seats were old and need to be changedI had a sore butt all day.
For me ok....
I do recommend this bus company. The bus left the station in time. The vehicle was in good condition, clear and also the AC was working. There was a 1h 15 min delay due to road construction.

We made the booking for an easy bus from Kampot to Kep. We couldn't even take the bus. They said they didn't have a bus for the time we had booked it online. Completely lack of professionalism or respect. At least they gave us back the money...

the ban was very nice, clean and confortable and working ac. 
everything went perfect ??
Magnificent show chaps !
The trip was so smooth. On time left but Journey took one hour later than stated. A.c. worked well. Cleav van.

It was a pitty that the driver could not speak English and that he asked for a tip! Normally you do not ask for it. And when you gave then something he laughed with it.
A comfortable and punctual ride with enough breaks, but still within the promised range of time. I’ll definitely use TCT Mondulkiri Express again!

Left Battambang 20 minutes early, forgot to pick up two passengers in Pursat, luckily didn't get too far down the road when driver received a phone call and returned to get them, still arrived in PP thirty minutes early....................................
Old bus, and very hot
No food, no toilet, no wifi, but bus was fine.

There was no wifi in the bus, the lady from the company handeled our visas on the border and I'm glad she did because no one knows what is going on there. They transfered us on a differnt bus from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville which was very very late.
Excellent service. Recommended.
thanks you for the trip, all was very good.

Book me bus better to update during of travel cuz some road are fixing so can't drive fast. Some travel foreigners blame the driver cuz not on time. I think it's a book me bus website fault not driver.

Website book me bus make a mistake
Better update duration of travel, from pp to kompot not only 3h but 4h to 4h30. Passenger blame driver cuz not be on time but how could ? If the roads is so difficult.

The bus was late at the start. The driver kept on stopping along the road to shop, buy food and other things... We arrived 2h late. If you are tall expect to have sore legs and no head rest. Be ready to have a bumby ride. Good luck
Good trip and ponctuality. Good overall.  But buses of this company could be cleaned (very dusty one more time).

Bus broke down (strut attached to wheel broke) - This led to a delay. We were not informed of how long the delay would be or when a replacement bus would arrive (or even if one was coming). Delay was understandable, but communication was terrible

I do not understand Why drivers take passengers on the road.
They explains anything when they stop for take passengers. And they don't speak english...

Tout avait bien commencé pendant 1h30.. jusqu'à une casse de roue .. obligé d'attendre la venue d'un autre car, avec de moins bonnes prestations, deux heures d'attente sur place, plus de 3h de retard en tout ... climatisation pas très efficace.

Don't rely on their pickup service.I waited to within 10 mins of the departure time and they still hadn't shown to pick me up.When zi asked to be reimbursed tuk tuk fare to their office they laughed and refused.

Because of old bus, it was very hot at noon, hot and tired.
The bus broke down, we could have all died... the front wheel broke off... you should inspect your bus more before killing people...  took us over 6h from Battambang to Seim Reap.
Friendly staff, nice modern minibus, comfortable and air-conditioning.
Le van est nickel, nous sommes partis à l'heure mais nous sommes arrivés avec deux heures et demi de retard sur l'horaire indiqué...
It was very hot inside, the air conditioning did not work well !!
The driver was wonderful. One of the front tires exploded and he stopped like a marvel. Then changed the tire using wooden pieces... Very very impressive.
The chairs are too hard.
The chairs are too hard.

The only boat starting early (6:45am) from Koh Rong Samloam to Sihanoukville and thus allowing an onward bus getting into Phnom Penh at a reasonable time in the afternoon. Good fast boat with lifejackets available for all.
Während der Fahrt platzte der vordere Reifen. Unser Fahrer reagierte souverän und sicher...und nach ca. 35 min. war das Rad mit vereinten Kräften gewechselt :-)
Bus was really!!! old. Does not qualify as modern and comfortable! Please buy new busses for long distance service
Thank you again to the lovely lady who helped us at the border crossing
The bus made plenty of short stops, to pick up and leave others. We arrived about 70 minutes late.

We were told the drive was 4-4.5 hours long, it ended up being over 6 hours. We stopped multiple times so the driver could pee on the side of the highway, use washrooms at gas stations, and buy a red bull.
Smooth trip,safe driver and still arrived 30mins early. :))
Without informing us beforehand they decided to take a detour which took us 3 hours extra
Good service, friendly staff, would use you again . new and comfortably mini buses
Overall the trip was good! We made many stops but still arrived over an hour earlier which was a surprise. Bus was clean, process was easy. Would do it again.
Perfect service - no issues
Excellent - arrived one hour late but we were in almost standstill traffic for the first hour. Sorry - what does inspector mean - I don't understand.
No wifi inside whereas it has been mentionned. We had 1 hour in delay
Confortable but 1 hour in delay
Poor itinerary. They left us hungry on the entire trip, no decent food.
NOT direct to Kep but via Kampot and NOT four hours as advertised but five, incl 15 minute stop for driver to buy food for himself. Otherwise not a bad service.

Very bad experience.
Driver either didn’t come to pick-up from hotel or didn’t wait.
We had to look for another drive..
បេី​បរិយាកាស​ ក្នុង​ឡាន​ ល្អ​ជាង​ហ្នឹង​ប្រសើរ​ណាស់​
The bus was delayed for 30 minutes, and the driver ran too fast to arrvie at the destination in time. Terrible experience.

I booked a bus ticket from Bangkok-Siem Reap online a few months ago. Upon arrival I was informed that that particular bus does not run anymore. However, the lady was most helpful and arranged another bus for me on the same day within an hour.

Took a bus from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh. Aircon worked great, Wifi had its moments but for the most part worked. Free snacks and a 25 min break at a cafe inbetween. Very pleased, great option for people traveling on a budget
The ferry left in time, arrived in time. If you book online, do not forget to grab your ticket from the local ticket office (2 min walk from the pier). I do recommend the company.

Le chauffeur ne m'a pas déposé à mon hôtel !
Il a apparemment appelé mon hôtel en chemin et, ayant expliqué à mon hôtel qu'il était pressé de retourner à Phnom Penh, ils ont convenu d'un point de RDV en ville... Et le chauffeur ne m'avait rien dit !!
Driver made us feel safe all trip long, he was driving carefully without taking any unnecessary risks. We arrived on time and the free water was nice too. Would highly recommend Mekong Express.
arrival not on time 18:00 instead of 14:30
Resan tog betydligt längre tid än vad som angetts från början. Wifi fungerade ej-
Service and driving was great! Second year I’ve used the service and will use it again. Great job!
Great help from everyone and driver was terrific! Would look forward to using the company again next visit.
Driver pick guest on the way to Kep (strangers), no water, WiFi is not working
I took the VIP and the seats where indeed more comfortable than usual. Not much to say about anything else, just a usual bus ride.

Few open seats made it more comfortable. Super hot day but AC did its job. Baby cockroach onboard but didn’t crawl into my ear. Roads were good, stops weren’t excessively long and we made good time - just over five hours from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap.
This was SO much nicer than the other ferries! Easy ride, air-conditioned, the staff was great and super professional, and left pretty close to on time!

Let's call this a picturesque trip. Not my first time with Khai Nam: cheap, punctual, honest and kind staff. That time the bus was very crowded, with a fragrant stock of coffee occupying the back of the bus. Passengers sleeping on it. Poor aircon. Funny..
Responsibility driver, smooth journey and  reached destination on time. The only thing I found inconvenience is that the vehicle AC is not cold enough. The rest are fine.
Website says it takes 3,5 hours, well it was 5 hours. Driver was like maniac and some point there was 17 people in the car, but only 11 seats (inc driver).

- The A/C was bad, quite hot to me.
- The VIP VAN is not really VIP, but it’s ok for me.
Un trajet prévu pour une durée de 3h, qui finalement a  duré 4h15!!!!! À l'aller et au retour...

Bonne présentation, un peu de retard à l’arrivée mais compréhensible vu les travaux.
Je recommande !!!
This app really good and easy to booking. Thank
From 9.45Am and Arrive Kratie on 6.20 PM too much long time. Bus should be have direct way to kraite . not detour like this.
AC not strong enough, very cramped conditions

One of my worst nightmare journey. Driver was careless, ate snack and food during driving. What even worst is he was talking on the phone all the time even browsing his smart phone and chatting as well. Very dangerous experience. Poor driver

Je n'ai toujours pas compris pourquoi le chauffeur a fait un arrêt à Phnom Penh pour que je change de voiture ET de chauffeur. La route était en très mauvais état et du coup ça manquait de délicatesse, je pense que c'est habituel pour eux..
Bus left late and arrived over one hour late because we made 3 unscheduled stops to let people on/off. Bus was clean and driver was very safe. Overall very satisfied except for punctuality.
Bus never came

Bus was supposed to leave town at 1:30. After driving around town for half an hour, were told that this bus was to Phnom Penh and that ours was broken. Told us to wait on corner for half an hour and another company picked us up. Didn't leave until 2:45.
Easy booking and check-in by just showing e-ticket on smarphone. staff friendly and speedboat is clean.
There’s so many stops along the way for picking up random passengers.
It was very long hectic trip

Great driver! Departure was right on time, driver was safe but wasted no time-got us into Phnom Penh ahead of schedule. I felt completely safe as he was really skilled at navigating Cambodian traffic. Thank you!
Good trip!
Drive so fast, pass car on and on.
Van was 3 hours late with no explanation and  little to no promise of it ever arriving

Better than expected.
We had a bus scheduled at 1.30pm.
We arrived in the morning and asked the reception if it's possible to take an earlier bus.
It was no problem.
They confirmed and we took the bus at 11.
Unfortunately no AC.
Driver super friendly and forthcoming attentive. Good support at border crossing. Overall I felt in good hands.
When booking on your site, it wasn’t made clear that it was a bus with beds. Also, half of the bus windows were cracked. Why? That did not feel safe
We booked a direct Bus from Kep to Phnom Penh but had to change the Bus in Kampot. In Kampot we waited 1 1/2 h!!! Bus was very old and uncomfortable. We arrived in Phnom Penh with 2 1/2 h delay!!!
Very punctual. Reliable service. Everything went smoothly. We arrived on time on our destination as mentioned during the booking procedure. Highly recommended. Big thumbs up
Contrary to negative reviews i have read before finalizing the booking, service extended to us was good enough. No hassle, no hanky funky. Highly recommended! Thumbs Up!

Original driver was late.  Spoke no English whatsoever.  Got a message that they would be switching drivers halfway through. Both drivers late and did not answer phone calls.  No English spoken whatsoever. Terrible experience overall. Won't recommend.
All very good. Bus was comfortable. Driver very competent

Well, what can I say. The roadworks didn’t help. The journey took more than 5.5 hours of bone shaking. The centre door of the van kept coming open. The front brake, or bearing needed water poured on it every so often.  2 stars, honestly, take the train.

The driver left a bit early since all passengers had arrived. He drove safely. He did not stop to pick up extra passengers along the road. We arrived at our destination in a timely manner in spite of road conditions.

Phnom Penh-Kep. Overall a good trip. The road is under construction, so the trip was an hour longer than advertised. The driver stopped a lot to to pick up extra passengers along the road and used his horn more than necessary, but was very friendly.

A/C was weak that feeling stuffy inside.
WiFi was good almost all the way.
The driver was amazing

Driver was answering his cell phone and using hand to hold phone more than 10 calls he got and he answered all by using his hands which is very much concerned all we all were feeling unsafe. He was also driving very slowly hence we reached 1hr 30 min late

The driver had a dangerous driving.
More over, no wifi, and the driver was lost so the trip dured 6hours !! 
We are very disapointed and tired.

Worst trip ever!!
First of all, we booked for a luxury bus and when we got there, the bus was completely different - NO WI-FI and NO Lights for the lower beds. Second, the driver drove like a complete maniac, we got to Siem Reap 2hr earlier. TRY TO AVOID

never ever recommend or book a bus with you again. The transport was just horrible! 
- bus arrived one hour later and took 3 hours more to arrive at destination
- driver horrible: stopped with no reason picked more people up than even seats!! etc
Mini van confortable avec la clim et bouteille d’eau offerte. Route interminable et  route catastrophique

The price of my ticket is 23$ but the staff asked to give them 4$ more saying the bus was having problem and need to change to luxury bus. The staff said the luxury bus has toilet, but there is no toilet on that bus.

The AC did not work in the car.  This made the trip very unpleasant as it was extremely hot and the drive was 5 hours.  I paid for this service expecting AC in a comfortable car.  I would not have booked if there was no AC.
Fantastic driver!
Very happy with service. Would use again

Travel time considerably longer than advertised - according to Google, it's impossible to make this journey in allotted time even in a car. Usual visa and passport scam at border crossing. Attendant threatened to leave us behind if we take too long. AVOID

Travel time considerably longer than advertised - according to Google, it's impossible to make this journey in allotted time even in a car. A few unscheduled stops, dangerous driving at times. But to their credit they dropped us off at the pier for free.
Overall good, despite traffic jam in Phnom Penh and the bumpy roads at the end.
Overall OK. A bit late compared to the planned departure time.
Overall good. 1 hour late compared to the planned departure time, driver was good, not too fast and we appreciated the free pick up service directly at the hotel.
Good driver

They picked us up 40 minutes too late. Due to very bad road conditions, traffic jam+2 broken wheels we lost so much that we didnt made it to the fast ferry on time. Had to wait 2 more hrs for the slow boat that took 3 hrs. We arrived at the hotel at 8pm!
It delayed 15 minutes.  And because of traffic jam in Phnom Penh, it took time.   And not so much space for baggage.  But driver was good.
Bus delayed for more than 2 hours to depart from Phnom Penh
Driver Speaks no English - Car was not in good shape. Engine Control lamp was on - not very much confidence for the Client.
Driver Speaks no English - Car was not in good shape. Engine Control lamp was on - not very much confidence for the Client.

No leg room whatsoever, air conditioning useless
, driver didn’t care and completely ignored us, will never use your bus company again

I dont think many companies offer this service. The owner was very thorough in explaining the process and what to expect for fees at the border. This was good. I did get sick from lunch. Communication was difficult but everyone was super friendly!!!

I dont think many companies offer this service. The owner was very thorough in explaining the process and what to expect for fees at the border. This was good. I did get sick from lunch. Communication was difficult but everyone was super friendly!!!
The driver drives too fast, and when there's a break, he only aound 2 or 3 minutes. It's too short for a break.
Driver drives too fast with very little breaks.
Driver never offered the free drinking water even though it was in the van.The air con was so weak passengers were sweating.

Driver was OK, seats not very comfy, no toilet on board but three breaks. Took 8 hours not 6 but that's OK. Additional service fee for border crossing of $5 and the extortion, to be left at the border is absolute impertinence. Luggage handling is bad.

The bus arrived very late at night in Phnom Penh and the total length of travel was 10 hours, not 6. Also, the bus driver wasn’t good and we had to get out of the bus after it broke down. It was bus “3A-4087”. I would like to get a refund for my trip!

No wifi
It was not a direct bus. Many stops

I booked this bus because it’ was the shorted ride in all of the companies. It showed 4 hrs from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville. Don’t trust what you see! It was actually 6hrs and 30 mins ride. Disappointed! Don’t let the time fool you and it’s not cheap!!
The road is terrible. It was a very hard journey because of the bad pavement and for that and because of rain, we got one hour later than expected.

The bus left on time and the driver was good. Total trip time was unrealistic given the hold-ups with traffic and getting out of Phnom Penh (even on Sunday)! The road to Kampot was bad (roadworks) but not the fault of Mekong Express. Total journey 4hr50m
Driver was driving carelessly and rarely put both of his hands on the wheel
The driver drove too fast. Short breaks. No wifi . Air con is weak.

- ON TIME : Bus left exactly at 8.30. Ride 7H

NONE

It was a very nice and uneventful trip, but we arrived 3 hours late. A supposedly six-hour trip from 8:30-2:30pm arrived at 5:30pm instead. Apparently this kind of delay is common and I wish there had been a warning on the website that it could happen!!
N/A
The driver is always use the phone without hands free while driving on damage road. and spend the time alot with his telephone.

Overall , it was a good drive
Very nice ride with Cambodia Post... have another scheduled soon
it takes 7 hours to get from Siem Reap to PP. Everything is good. Driver is good and organises everything to be punctual.
Good vehicle, save driver but too long drive and to many & too long breaks

Bookmebus helped me in extraordinary situation with lots of stress involved. My flight was cancelled so I could not make it in right time. I contacted them and informed about flight schedule change just 1 hour before scheduled pick-up time. They did it :)
We were very happy with the promptness of GTVC. They were very helpful and loaded our belongings. They confirmed reservations promptly .
Terrible service! They changed the address but not update the website, and if you call them for help, you will get nothing except ugly words!
We came 1 hour late due of traffic and bad road constructions overall very satisfied.
The trip went smoothly, punctual.  We had a few people get on and off at different points, all done very quickly and effectively.  Good trip.
Very nice service as usual :)
Very good trip.  Delayed for over an hour due to construction on the road but this was not the fault of the bus company.  Appreciated the test stop in-between.
Booking was change my seat without information. They not prefer online booking. I’m afraid to booking this again. Please improve your operation between company with online booking.
The driver was just crazy. When he realized we would not make it on time, he started to drive in a risky fashion, sometimes in the opposite side of the road, to get ahead of other vehicules.

Thought this was an express bus straight to Mondulkiri but there were about 20 or so stops over the 9 and a half hours picking people up and dropping them which was annoying. Too many people in the bus -  there were people sitting on the floor.

Bus was an hour late to pick us up. The instructions indicated to be ready 1 hour before departuee time. The driver didnt speak english and there was not enough room for our bags. A mediocre trip but am hesitant to book with your website again.

I left a message on "I would like to...." For pick me up, but the message didn't show to the Bayon VIP bus company. I almost missed the bus. If I didn't contact again to the Bayon VIP bus. System error!
Trip was great !!
Drivers were late, went on multiple personal stops to deliver items to shops. We were in the city of destination for over 1.5 hours before They finally dropped us off.
Best hotel bus in East Asia so far! Perfect driving really safely. Really clean and confortable. I recommend it to you after a lot of bad experience with other buses
We had a good trip
Great, comfortable ride. They even provided a water, snack, and face wipe. Would definitely ride with this group again.

Ferry ok-no complains. Really annoying that the ticket just said "22$ tickets round trip,12$ tickets one way" in terms and conditions.It wasn't written anywhere what we paid!We could no convince the stuff that we paid the 22$ fare!Buva or bookmebus fault?

I Reserved a seat at infront in privatcy(single bed) in night bus but in actially they gave me at the back site in sharing bed with 5 people instead. they should inprove and response for what guest who reserve throught online as offline booking aswell.
change the passenger seat number without telling passenger
Punctual departure. Arrival with some delay because of construction work on the road. Only minor point is the seat: old, needs replacement.
We left more than one hour late and the driver stopped a couple of times on the road to try to get more travelers. The minibus was ok.
Bus was on time, waiting for us outside of our hostel. Driver was polite and helpful, and made stops along our trip as we requested. Was an easy trip from PP - Sihanoukville

Trip from mainland to Koh Rong went well, boat was on time. However, return from Koh Rong to Sihanoukville was very poor. Boat was 1+ hour late, nobody on island or on the phone had anything helpful to say. Staff was rude on multiple occasions to us.

Trip from mainland to Koh Rong went well, boat was on time. However, return from Koh Rong to Sihanoukville was very poor. Boat was 1+ hour late, nobody on island or on the phone had anything helpful to say. Staff was rude on multiple occasions to us.

Excellent! Recommendable to all, nice service, I am delighted.

We left Siem Reap in time and arrived in Phnom Penh 20 min late due to the traffic jam in the city. The driver was driving a bit fast. The AC was working fine and the bus was comfortable enough for this short distance. Good price/value.
I paid for 2 seats, I got 1 without seatbelt between the bus driver and the passenger seat. It was very dangerous

Overall good experience, but there is few things disappointed:
- I ordered a pick up from hotel via phone. The pickup transport never arrived to the hotel
- onboard wifi didn't work
- drop-off location was different than declared
The bus was very comfortable, 1-2 Seat configuration. The AC work good, driver good, and better than our previous trip from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap.
The bus was in bad condition, the AC was not cold at all, we're sweating all over. And very slow driver, we arrived late at Siem Reap.
I cannot find the bus, hotline cannot help, no driver call me back, i end up ask someone van to come back
Trip took 6 hours. With a 30min stop halfway. Car and driver good. Punctual pick up
Trip took 6 hours from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville. With a 30min stop halfway. A lot longer than we thought it would be. So just plan for this. Car and driver good. Punctual pick up.

The driver was excellent, and the bus seats were very comfortable. It took about 30 minutes longer than the smaller vans that I have used before, but was well worth it for the comfort, and it was less expensive too. I would use them again. Recommended.

I though were not going to unload our bag at the border of Cambodia and Thailand, much more the Immigration officer in Cambodia asked for 3USD from each of us before returning our passport without explaining for what it is and and there were no receipts.
Bus was a little too late, no worries, we arrived at time
Took over 2hrs to get to our pier. And the boat left 30min late. Not much space either. Not guaranteed that everyone gets a seats.
Great authentic service. The only westerners on the bus and only five dollars. Will use again.

The bus was advertised as a limousine but with a toilet. I was informed by the inspector buses to Battambang have no toilet. The driver was really lovely but due to an incident with a passenger we were 4.5 hours on this journey. Please amend information!

The bus left on time. It took longer than the announcement because of the traffic jam and the processing for VISA, but it was not bad. Especially they helped a lot for getting VISA. It was the great experience. Enjoy!

Driver was prompt to pick me up and arrived a bit earlier than promised.  Car was clean and tidy.  Overall very satisfied with trip.  Thanks
Can't comment on accommodation/ inspector - didn't have/don't know what this is.

Driver picked up promptly, arrived at destination on time.  BUT driver stopped to go to the toilet on the side of the road, not just a pee either! :O  
And car had mechanical problems, I was worried about getting to the airport on time!
Cant really fault the service or the driver, just the road works from pp and kep were quite a bit bumpy mostly half of the trip, once infrastructure is imptoved lm roads will be smooth and faster!

The journey was very uncomfortable and my friend had to move out of her seat as it had apparently been triple booked. The bus was over an hour late arriving into Pnohm Penh, which meant we actually had to kindly ask the driver to stop at airport
Good service, over than expected. Good value for money. Will use it next time with confidence and will recommend to other travellers

My overrall experience taking account the country standars was fine. The bus left 30 min after the time mentioned on the ticket so its okay, expect this all the time or even more. However, the space for each spot is not enough even if you get two seats.

Van was 15min late by no reason.

My experience with Mekong Express is very favourable, my only comment is the journey time quoted needs to be more accurate, in all the trips not once did the journey meet the given arrival time, the best was 20 min the worst 1hr 45 min late

Got on the van to phnom penh, already seated, I got told that I have to get off and wait for another van, I waited then got told I'm going with a van going to kampot first, I was supposed to arrive at 6pm I only got to phnom penh after 8pm.

The trip was very fast. We only spent 10 minutes at both border crossings and there was little traffic on the road. The air worked well and the seats in the first row of the mini bus are comfortable and wide.

It was a great experience booking my tickets with BookMeBus. I just had to show my phone with the barcode and there was no problem. The whole process was fast and painless. I would definitely use this again.
The air conditioner is working in poor level. The driver always use bump. Lunch time they bring us to the expensive food, it cost more than 4$ per plate.
Not a direct bus as advertised; drove by Kampot and used 6.5 hours instead of the advertised 4 to PP. Aircon not working.
Add more passenger on the way

Great ticket agency and great bus company!
Travelled to and from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville with no issues.

Will use again and would recommend!

I notice that the driver is using his phone without any headset for 37.4% of the overall trip. The A/C is so cold that I can imaginr like I'm sitting in hell. Very Nice .... If I can give a -2 stars right now, I would press TF out of -5. ?

Bus was broke down and  delayed for 1.5 hours. There was very little communication to update the passengers. 

The bus was brand new... most likely 25 years ago. seats are tiny and it was cramped with 2 small people. Will never book the bus ever again.
As usual, nothing to complain about rhos company. Safe driving and vehicle kept in good condition. Still my fav VIP van option.
អ្នកបេីកបរបេីកលឿនពេក
On time, spacious, not to warm, and even though the road was not eniterly in good shape we arrived only half An hour later.
Driver have problem,stop add passenger alot of 5-6,i think drive not safe

Very bad experience. I booked two tickets on 16 of April, two days before I departure, when I arrived at the bus station, there was no ticket for us. I booked and was confirmed our seat is no 7 and 8 but they gave us no 9 only and with extra  cotton chair
Next time i will take Giant Ibis. Bus is better.
There are alot of stop to take more passenger on the way so arriving the destination late.
Good Service
Overall the bus journey was comfortable and we were provided with a snack and a drink. There were a number of unscheduled stops by the drivers which delayed the bus however.
Everything was perfect. I could not be better
Very good service. I always use van but this time I took a bus and saved me a few $
Bus left late, aircon was broken, then arrived one hour late to destination. Definitely not the best experience.

On time and decent journey.
Really BAD!
Airco broken way to long standing still. Claustrofobic and very hot een standing stil. Not al the Windows could open. No lifehammer in case of emergency

No A/C as promised, the driver drove like a maniac and there was a very loud woman who did not stop talking for 6 hours straight!!

Very disappointed the driver could find the location that was on the ticket and when we called the number for your company that was displayed on the ticket no one answered the phone. We tried calling multiple times. Never again will we use this service

First driver - rude. Thai side one - friendly. No-one explained that we will just wait in the bus for three hours. Inspector arrived late, so we were not at the border early. Waited 4 hours in queues. Could have been there 1st!! Chairs not for sleeping!!!
The driver was excellent. Cautious and careful. Much appreciated.

On the way to Kampot from Phnom Penh, we actually left early! Everyone was there, they loaded us up, and we were on the road! The driver was fast, safe and friendly. The van was a great temperature. Kimseng is highly reliable.
The van was very delayed. We took in total twice more time than what was announced. Very bad company.
The air con wasn’t working. We sweated all the way home. The bus inspectors were helpful and polite.
Le bus est parti avec 1:00 de retard sans explication, nous sommes arrivés à 21:00 au lieu de 7:30 pm. Le chauffeur a passé tout le trajet au téléphone en brayant. Sinon le bus est confortable.
The van was overload, the driver allowed one passenger to share sit.
The Van didn't have courtains and sun is directly me, air conditioner isn't enough and the van was hot

The ride was simply horrible and I DO NOT RECOMMEND them. They asked for a huge bribe, I "bought" 5$ with 10EUR. Outrageous! The bus attendant was extremely RUDE & DISRESPECTFUL, kept yelling at me. The bus is old, disgusting, very hot and was super late.
Lovely driver. Good standard of English
Lovely driver. Good standard of English
very good
30min late, because change their schedule, without telling us.
No water and biscuit complement for those who pick up outside the bus station.

Bus journey was fine, although once arrived at our destination my bag was soaking from something In the storage area and also had a tear in the front which was not there before. But overall the journey itself was fine and would do again

The beds are small for a tall person, but otherwise, we were very happy with the night bus. It was actually safer than during the day with local traffic on the roadway. It was also good that there were beds for individuals so you didn't have to share.
No comment
You should improve your AC. We were not comfortable because it was too hot during the whole trip.
There was hardly room for one person in the beds, and yet alone two. Way to small and the driver drove like crazy. Impossible to sleep and we arrived 1.5 hours early

the trip from saigon to phnom penh started from 8.30 to 5.30 pm . there was some stop overs to the borders which took time. had lunch stop over too . it was kinda traffic that time so it took ages to arrived to phnom penh which is very traffic city too ,
dangerous driver, wait long time for people before living, driver put music loudly and use a lot telephone.
going to KRS was a bit late and got some stop overs. Going back to Sihanouk was so fast like 30 mins only no stop over. i would book this again.

PoiPeth-Bkk was forfeited. Said it's our fault we arrived 30min. late, I said not our control what time we finish in the immigration. They never budge even with my countless pleadings to facilitate us transport to Bkk. These people should undergo PR trng.
