Taxi not ready for us (again) with no contact. Messaged main number on WhatsApp. Apparently taxi had broken down and would be available in 35mins - actually took over an hour. Then the driver couldn't find us. Not worth booking in advance. Poor service.

Was expecting to be greeted at arrival. No driver there. Called HQ who made out he was there. The airport emptied out, still no driver. Eventually turned up 40mins late dropping off a fare. Not worth rebooking - just pick up a taxi at the airport.

The ride was simply horrible and I DO NOT RECOMMEND them. They asked for a huge bribe, I "bought" 5$ with 10EUR. Outrageous! The bus attendant was extremely RUDE & DISRESPECTFUL, kept yelling at me. The bus is old, disgusting, very hot and was super late
Wireless not working.. broken chair.. air-condition very weak
The departure was 1h late. Very disappointed
Inspectors came twice or triple times, this was a bit confusing, but a minor issue. All went good, thx for the good trip :)
Van condition is fine, just air outlet is not cool enough. I feel the cabin was hot and I’ve sweat.
Van condition is fine, just air outlet is not cool enough. I feel the cabin was hot and I’ve sweat.
AC is not working well hot and sweat

We were happy to book our places on the mini van with Bookmebus and the staff of Virak Buntham was very welcoming. Unfortunately the driver stopped too many times on the way to Siem Reap and he was driving too fast without respecting any speed regulations
Good
The air conditioning was damage during the hot season, the travel was so damn.
Driver act so bad
Nice company

DON'T book this company. We read all the bad reviews and thought we would still take our chances. We shouldn't have. 4 hours late, oversold tickets so people left behind, terrible vehicles, reckless driving and luggage on passengers laps and in the aisles
Very good, would use again. Much more comfortable than a rival company used previously.
Driver on the trip to phenom penh stopped maybe 4 times the driver to Battambang stoped 2 times. But was good
Bus was comfortable, and the ride was smooth and on time. Only downside was that the wifi didn’t work.

Trip into was 4 hours from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville with Mekong Express VIP Van but as expected it took 6 hours. No problem for us because I expected 6 hours. For those on a tight schedule it might be an issue. Overall it was a comfortable & safe trip

Wasn't expecting the best for this ride but was very pleasantly surprised. Booked because of the WC on board which was fine, meant 1 quick 25 min stop. The air con worked fine. There was a problem with the bus but got sorted in 20mins. Comfy seats, too.

Staff are very rude and unhelpful.
Information hard to find about the trip.
Overall good enough given all the road works made it a slow trip and challenge for the driver.  Seat belt would be good.  Aircon was excellent.

The driver was honking his horn every 5 seconds, driving on opposite side of the road. Bus broke down twice, men had to push the bus for it to start again. 
Inspector lady forced me to go to the shop during a stopover which I didn't get!

We askead for a private taxi.The driver arrived with one hour delay. I started to ask online support (Lee) for help and he mentioned it was not able to find the hotel. No single word in English and when I claimed the driver stopped and no way to move on.
7 hour of Nightmare!!, friendly staff good service, however, AC blowing warm air, so hot, sweating soak and wet for 7 hour of steam bath!!
delayed over 1 hour
Punctual hotel pick up, clean and comfortable interior with wifi. Arrival on schedule.

Great up to date information provided on the website. Easy and convenient to use.
Will definitely use this site again ?
途中十分な休憩もありながら、到着は時間通りでした。バンですが、座席が広めで窮屈でありませんでした。

I booked a single seat for a night bus. The company changed buses but after a few exchanged emails this company ENSURED me I would still have a single seat. I turn up on the day, and all solo travellers have to sleep with stranger on small "double beds"

The driver stopped just after we started the trip because he had to switch all the wheels in the van. I don’t know why, but it took him like almost 2 hours, and our arrival to Kampot was delayed. Next time do it before you pickup all the people.

I book Mekong express because in the review it is supposed to be punctual. We took more than 7 hours (instead of 4hours) to arrive to destination and we miss our boat to Koh Rong. We had to pay again. Very bad experience.
We departed almost one hour late, the pick up point was so nondescript it could very easily be missed and they were very disorganized. Poor, even by local standards.
Fairly well-organized and punctual. I often chose Kim Seng.
I recomande to travel with this company

The hotel bus was very good to phnom peng, but the bus to koh kong was horrible. Totaly overbooked...people had to sit 6 hours on very small chairs on the floor...not save. And they made very short toilett breaks....nearly drove away without my friend.

Your car has no air condition . Too hot   I was six with the heat . Your is too old . It’s not like you advertised, i won’t recommend to my friends to take this bus. The driver is nice . The tour guide is good. The service is Ok but the is too old .
This bus provided us with free pickup service at our hotel and depatured and arrived on time. Overall, every thing is good and we did not have any complaint

Bookmebus provided us a good service online because I could not contact Mekong bus so I could only contact Bookmebus via facebook and they are very friendly and helpfull. Tks Bookmebus for supporting us through our trip.
Overall, bookmebus is my first choice! but this time, I booked for my parents so I can not give the review.
It was very helpful that the inspector told every information twice at the front and in the middle of the bus in clear english.

Too less space between seats for tall people.
Driver didn't inform in english about the duration of the lunch break, so that nearly all foreigners didn't eat in the restaurant.
There was no information to get off the bus in the center of Siem Reap.
Bus vieillot, la climatisation fonctionne mal, pas de WiFi (publicité mensongère), retardé de presque 2 heures, le chauffeur s'arrête 2 fois pour prendre des passagers.

7 of us enjoy our travel with your bus from Siem Reap to Pnomphen. we did not expect that there is a free snack during our travel. However from PhnomPhen to HoChiMin  were not comfortable with your bus. It is so hot during our trip. Thank you.
Too tired seats, air conditionning system, and bus ! Far from the « luxury » service descripted and so experted !
Second time with Mékong express : a younger bus than the first Time but always disfunctionnal air conditionned and a 4h20 journey instead of 3! Always very far from the top luxury service !!!!
We were lucky to get on an earlier bus but we’re not provided with any water or towel like stated, air con was terrible and the journey was 2 1/2 hours longer than predicted. awful cramped bus
Aircon is poor in hot season.
Yeah! Its great.. is it that our passports in the border were never collected by the one who checked it and we were required to pay 2 dollars.. its a trap!

The bus is really narrow, if you are taller than 1.8m I recommend to book the seat alone close to the door, has more room, otherwise I'll reconsider to choose another transport, they usually fully booked the busses and you will have  a unpleasant journey
Love Mekong Express. Simply the best transport provider in Cambodia.
Trea dificil de trouvé la station se départ....sur net se marqué  une gare qui maintenant e un sort3 de garage de autobuse...on été  vrment embêté.
Excellent service. Thanks!
Great experience ever
I like they service
The trip was fine. My seat was a bit uncomfortable - stuck in recline position. Organisation good and will use the service again

Overall - Great overnight bus!
GOOD: Seats clean, got a pillow and blanket. Checked bag felt secure: must produce ticket to get bag at destination. Slept well!
BAD: Driver left rest stop after 20 mins (told me 30 mins) - lucky I was back on board!
When you book a bus, it should be a bus and not make multiple stops to drop of packages.
Pick up 20 minutes late, bus departure on time but very cramped and aircon inadequate. Driver excellent but I will look elsewhere for greater comfort.
Siem Reap to Phnom Pehn is good but Phnom Penh  to Vietna is not. Bus 28 is an old limosine bus and aircon not cool. Really hot inside for an afternoon trip to Vietnam
Awful!!! The first bus was very small and the A/C was barely working. It got worse in the minivan. No A/C and no proper seat. Driver was horrible..
Awful!!! The first bus was very small and the A/C was barely working. It got worse in the minivan. No A/C and no proper seat. Driver was horrible..
Departure and arrival right in time.
It was a good and comfortable drive. Enough stops on the way. Drop off at a conveniently located place (the siem reap office). Would recommend!

Express minivan left on time.  Driver didn't speed, never went above 100kmph.  8-9 hour trip.  6 stops to pick up locals but this is good.  Not really fair if the only minivan Siem Reap to Sen Monorom caters just for tourists travelling from Siem Reap. 5*
very safe and good driver and pick-up from guesthouse worked fine as well. recommended!
By far the best bus I’ve been on in Cambodia. They were super kind, comfy and it actually ran on time which was great ??
Overall are good.
Lot of stops. Seats okay, not many space but you survive.
Super comfortable and everyone was very nice to us
The safest travel option after Giant Ibis.
The beds are to small to share it with a stranger and there was only one stop to Go to the bathroom. The Bus was Late.
Bayyon SHIHANUKUVILLE Office staff are no good management ,it was no comfortable !
Our driver was super nice . His driving was very good
poor seat (damaged), stopped by town (took long time)
Great services. Provided with clean pillow, blanket and snacks. Bonus, they do not play karaoke in the bus.
Got me where I was going but I did need a bit of direction on how to actually get into the Airport once I arrived.

Old bus had old interior and smelled of gasoline. the air con was not working properly. 
The other passengers were allowed to talk loudly, listen loudly to phones (film streaming) etc witch made is disturbing. 
The bus was two hours late = 33%
This was the small VIP bus. Always prefer these for the large old uncomfortable busses. Seats are good, air on works, driver can drive faster and thereby keep the time plan.
Can't praise the service enough, really friendly and accommodating inspector and driver, but the bus was old and wobbly. Not very comfortable for a 6 hour trip. And on such hot and humid weather too.
Good service, punctual, friendly
Very bad experience
This was one of the best bus rides we had when in Cambodia.  Thanks.

This was the worst bus trip we had in Cambodia.  The air conditioner was barely working and the vents were broke so could not direct any air even if you could feel it.  Not a comfortable trip at all.  He did get us there 40 minutes ahead of schedule.
The only problem is the way the driver kept overtaking in the face of oncoming traffic and the couple of close misses we had with other traffic.
The bus was broken and sounded really noisy from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. And they were late for our schedule nearly 3 hours because of this

When booking this busride, it said on the site that the trip would take 4 hours. The trip took 6(!) hours. Because of this we missed our boat to koh rong. It would me much more customer friendly if the real departure and arrival times would be displayed.
Has camera on dashboard to prevent minivan driver from speeding.  Minivans in Cambodia need to be proactive to ensure the safety of their passengers.
Bus was cancelled without any reason
We left with 45min of delated. We did an accident so we had to change bus. Then we arrived with 2h of delated. But the khmer people are very kind.
Vehicles should be carefully checked up before departure to avoid breakdown in the middle of the trip.
Service excellent
Nice everything! Thanks
Trop de retard,.pas de wifi.publicite mensongere

Midway fr SR to Kratie, my 10yr old son & I were transferred to a local public van where our paid reserve seating wasn’t applicable. We weren’t informed that this was going to be the case. The local van was beat up, hot as hell and with a suicidal driver.

Bus was very comfortable, on time and didn’t pick up random passengers on the road. The driver was the most responsible driver we’ve seen in all of Cambodia. Felt very safe for myself and my 10yr old son. Highly recommended! Mondulkiri to SR was a breeze.

My flight was delayed. I send a message via WhatApp. I was told that there would be no problem and they are tracking my delayed flight. However, they didn't tell the driver of the delay. He waited an hour and then left before I arrived.

It was all great. Punctual, convenient and the bus host spoke good English and was also very nice.
Thank you and keep it up!
Very comfortable and punctual. Highly recommend
we were delayed leaving. The ride took about 7 hours when we thought it would be 4-5, but that was in part due to traffic / construction, not the company itself.

There is a transit in Phnom Penh. The bus from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh was not so good, uncomfortable seat, I didnt have water or wet tissue, and they stopped many times to catch new passengers. The other bus from Phnom Penh was good, comfortable seat,

I was confirmed that by seat was not available after booking. The time of departure was delayed due to the car had not arrived yet so it meant the car and driver had no time to break after along trip (Phnom Penh) and this is caused high risk.
Perfect

At the border, there was a guy who was “helping us expedite” the visa process. Anyone who needed a visa had to pay him extra and if one had an e-visa, they still had to pay him. He never gave us change. The van’s a/c was fine but the bus was so hot.
The aircon is not working.its too hot

The driver was very rude. The bus departed 1 hour late. AC was broken, wifi is not working, very hot inside the Van so I open the window and the driver insisted of closing it and shouted at me. It was a horrible trip from SHV to PP. Will not book again.

We travelled from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap, the driver was punctual and we arrived on time. The drive itself was fairly hair-raising with painted road markings being largely ignored (to be fair not just by our driver but by pretty much everyone)!

Its my first time to ride at mekong bus. I would say that this bus is really good for foreigners. A man from the bus can speak English and is very accomodating. He explains where we are and accompany every passenger at immigration. Thanks.
very nice bus!!!!
There was something beeping in the van during the whole trip. It wasn’t the drivers seat belt warning bit.
A really comfortable trip. Thanks very much!
The driver was very kind and safe driving.  Thank you so much!
It was comfortable and the aircon was just right.

Mekong Express said it will take 3 hours.
But it was 4 hours, really.
Because I think the driver is very safety. Good!
The road was under construction but the driver keep driving crazy fast. Unsafe.

We booked online is c and d seat (together)
But the bus actually only 3 row, so I and m friend have to sit not next to each one, very unhappy about this

Drive took longer than expected but we got there. Driver was really helpful by helping sort out connecting journey to the hotel. Be aware if getting off before the final destination the Tuk tuk drivers will pounce.
Fantastic trip will definitely book with you again.
The Van doesn’t have wifi though the bus is really comfortable. It was nice that they assisted us in our passports.

I had an issue with my passport at the border. This resulted in my processing taking 50 minutes. The bus left without. There NEEDS to be a better system for keeping track of people that have passport problem. Would not take again.
It’s good
Great Bus Experience, Smooth Ride, Dependable and On Time
Safe drive, comfortable seats had a couple of stops in journey to use facilities. After using another company Mekong Express won both times.

Very poor first experience with this company. Departure delayed 35 minutes with no prior notification. No WiFi on bus. Driver drove erratically (sometimes very fast, sometimes very slow while talking on his phone and playing Facebook). Not recommended.
The van is a little bit old.

We arrived earlier than expected. Nice!
There was AC in the bus, I was also lucky that the bus was not full so I had two seats for myself. Slept all the way! :D
Excellent all around!

A poor experience.  Someone was in our seats so didn’t get what we booked, no room left for our bags which were wedged between our legs, some fast and dangerous driving and we had to ask for a toilet break despite being told we would stop half way.
Driver was going at full speed but steady and very professional. A long trip in a small van but overall quite good.
Safe driver and smooth journey from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh. The journey took shorter time  than estimated time to arrive. Overall a pleasant ride. Recommended.
There is a collection of 2 USD for passport stamp processing! Other than that no problem.
Mekong express was great. On time and only 1 stop of about 40 minutes. Driving a bit scary but the roads are chaotic. I would recommend this service!
Good fast ferry, just 40 minutes late. Otherwise I would recommend
I would not recommend Virak. The driver drove SO badly putting travellers lives in danger. He was also running his own errands so we stopped something like 6 times. Don't use

The bus was on time and the lady who handed out the snacks was nice. The driver wasn’t a very good driver and honked all the way to Phnom Penh. There were 2 or 3 men without tickets that paid them for empty seats and rode part of the way. AC doesn’t work.
Good trip!
Good trip!
Late departure due to other passengers taking too many bags. Not the companies fault.

The lady that acts as a conductor and host doesn't know how to handle complains of the passenger. Gave me attitude, did not lend me her pen for me to fill up the immigration paper even I saw her she have. I find her rude

The lady that acts as a conductor and host doesn't know how to handle complains of the passenger. Gave me attitude, did not lend me her pen for me to fill up the immigration paper even I saw her she have. I find her rude
Front office staff helpful. Bus left on time. Wish the driver's wouldn't overtake when oncoming traffic but it seems to be the way Cambodian bus drivers drive!
bus good, staf friendly

driver and assistant were able to repair a belt on the engine 2 hours from Phnom Penh. The delay was no problem for me...
I will continue to use Mekong Express in the future.

This was a brutal experience. I booked online with bookmebus, but when we arrived, they had overbooked and I waited in the bus station for 2 hours while the women at the help desk did nothing until I told them I wouldn't leave until it was resolved.
Good service !!!
Good service !!!

Such a bad experience.Arrived at the bus station and they say the bus is broken. I ask for my money back, they say they can't do it coz I booked through the website. They arranged my trip with another company that was a nightmare, local bus stopped everyw
Terrible. I expected better from Mekong. No AC, no space and took longer than cheaper companies to arrive. Paid premium rates for poor quality.
Terrible. I expected better from Mekong. No AC, no space and took longer than cheaper companies to arrive. Paid premium rates for poor quality.

Knowing where to queue and boarding was chaotic! On the return trip the boat came at a different time to what we expected and knowing what was going on was most unclear which was worrying as we had a connection to make when landing.

The driver was nice. However, I feel a bit sad and uncomfortable when the driver always stops and carry some passengers along the way. I think he needs money, but he needs to make sure it is not annoy other passengers. Small kids sometimes keep crying. :(

picked up too early,12.10pm,for a 2pm departure. The driver apologised. I should have made my own way as my hotel was two minutes away. Sat in office for 1hour. Bus air cond not very effective. I was worried about luggage, it was all piled on top.

the driver didnt allow to eat meal at the bus stop pich nel, i took the VIP Car with this driver 2 times, and he didnt allow to eat both time, the car left at 5pm and arrive at pich nel at 8 pm, it is time to eat, but he want to come pp fast,
Which special day in Vietnam is 2nd May to require 3 dolars fee to pass customs? At least is the money the assistant asked for...

I booked 2mos. ahead and arrived 3hrs earlier than my online reservation. As soon as they knew a bus was vacant, they let me take that ride. It was a long trip but we stopped twice so everyone can pee and once at a restaurant so passengers can eat.T.Y. <3
Trust company, thank you...
Nice service, and good driver.

It's a comfortable journey. Bus condition was excellent - spacious seats & good aircon.Services from the company's staff are commendable. Stated time taken to reach SR was not unduly delayed. I'll book Mekong Express again.

We waited more than one hour in the lobby of our hotel.The TUKTUK driver did not pick us up on time so we missed our bus-had to chase the bus with the tuktuk.air conditioner did not work. The guy on the bus didn‘t speak English. No recommendation from us.
excellent, value for money.
សូម​ចេញ​ដំណើរ​អោយ​ទៀត​ពេ​ល​វេលា​

New bus with functioning seatbealts, which I loved. But it is the first time I have felt unsafe because of speed in SEA. Will probably go with someone else next time, as seatbelts doesn't help much if you crash going 100 something miles per hour.

The boat was 45 minutes late. It did not have life jackets as far as I can tell. They overbooked the number seats and there were people sitting in the isle which seemed very unsafe. Like many things in Cambodia, this company is not professional. Stay away
It was good but we payed for the wifi and there was no wifi in the bus.

The worst bus journey of my life. The bus departed 1.15 min late. The lady cheking the tickets very rude. they made me seat in front, the middle seat which wasn't a seat where I didn't have space for my legs neither I could push the seat back. Nightmare
The driver drove too fast and almost hit a car.

I was very unhappy with this driver. He spoke no English. He picked up two hitchhikers along the way which made me extremely uncomfortable. I told him it was NOT OK. The driver was constantly on his cellphone which was not a safe thing to do.
The bus plying at noontime has weak airconditioning unit. Cannot sleep in the long trip because of heat.
Different bus than advertised. Older and less comfortable. Rest ok and on time!
Good Transfer van

The bus was cramped with poor AC. No snack or towel as advertised, and the driver didn't speak English or wear a uniform as advertised. At arrival, they threw our luggage off before we could get off. Literally threw it onto the sidewalk. Unprofessional.

Driver was very dangerous, speeding and swerving constantly. He didn't speak any English and looked like he was picking up friends. Also strong Durian smell in the van, which is NOT ALLOWED. It was gross. Horrible journey.
Bus leave on time and driver was very nice and helpful.
Dangerous driver, who uses his cellphone and doesn’t respect the speed limits.
Great service, all on time, clear change over and god free snack!

Bus left ontime but is old, not like the pics. Trip was 6 hours, not 4 as advertised so we missed our connecting boat. There were a lot of trucks on the road. Stop half way was a nice place. Driver was ok but there was a mix up about where to drop us.

Driver was texting while driving. Overtaking on bends with lorries coming in the other direction. Stopped many times throughout the journey which we didn't want, including to pick up his kid. Very unrelaxing and scary drive. Very disappointed
Everything great. So good I’m about to use again now

generally i thought the trip was ok but we arrived much later than it was scheduled. i think just add time to the schedule so people know when they will arrive. this will be helpful for your customers
journey lasted 6.30am instead of 4.00am

I was in port an hour early I was never called or the boat did not come. already I had paid the return while it was included in the price to go and I had to pay it again with another company I claim reimbursement I am very disappointed
20 min delay to the arrival in Sihanouk waiting for almost 1h30 in poor conditions and no indication
Everything was fine
The driver was horrible. But is was the only way to get from sihanoukville to kampot for cheap. The departure was with a few Minutes delay.

No wifi
Please clean the washroom

The drivers were very rude, playing very loud music throughout the night making it impossible to sleep. Also picking up too many people along the way to Sihanoukville, so there was no space in the aisle at all. The bus was way past occupancy.

No communication at all. Bus broken, we wait 4h, the staff doesnt  talk to us, doesn't explain anything. We just wait, we felt like 5 years old kids ! No excuses for delay,no water wifi in New bus. Bus driver extremely rude. 17h for siem reap to ho chi mi
Excelente servicio. El chofer fue muy puntual y amable. Lo recomiendo 100%.
Wifi very poor and only in Cambodia, the stewardess was not nice, take giant ibis instead is way better

I would try another company next time I do the overland journey - There should have been a bottle of water (at least shown in the symbols when booking), but there was no water, and the service wasn't much to brag about... Chaotic at Poipet - both sides:-(
Transport was on time and reliable, we had water, wat tissues and even cookies !
Staff at their office was gruff.  The bus was not full and no one checked my ticket.

I have lost my bag. I call staff to ask if they see or not, but no one pick up my phone, and it's hard to contact their phone number. I try to call them 3 hours in row. What should I do, now, to know where my bag is? ??

The driver dropped us in the wrong place so that a loc taxi driver could pay him a bribe so that the taxi driver could scam us and charge us $50 even though the price should be $15 for the trip to our hotel. Also, we arrived nearly 2 hours late.
Overall the trip quite good, friendly and punctual
2h late, with 1h waiting at the border despite paying 5$/p to the inspector to have our passports considered "quickly".... No a/c nor wifi during half of the trip.
On time. Empty. Comfortable. Air con adjustable. Border control quick.

Bad experience with Virak Buntham. With 5 more seats in the van when departed from Phnom Penh, the driver kept stopping to ask people by road side whether they want to take the ride. When arrived Sihanouk at 10pm, the driver dropped me at somewhere dark.

Needed a minivan and I booked one on BookMeBuss via the mobile app.  I've got me a great deal with Seila Angkor Express and think I'm going to use their services again in the future. Oh and did I forgot to mention, I've got a 30% discount via PiPay!

We booked our bus from Sihanoukville to Kampot, when we arrived at the station there was no room and bus for us. We had to wait for a bus later. After a big discussion we got our money back and took a taxi.

Regardless of the one hour delay - instead of leaving HCM at 1pm we left at 2 pm - I have to say that I was shocked how unfriendly the woman who did all the organizational stuff was. I was the only foreign person and she treated me like I was the worst.
Driver constantly stopped to pick up and drop off goods and or people.  This delayed the trip a lot. Overall, not a good experience.  There are better deals for your buck.

What can I say, wanna have better service, go Giant Ibis, it costs you a few bucks more, but from time to time I travel Virak.  Must admit it is my number two to travel.  WAS!!! I recently had a drive with Seila Angkor Express and was very surprised!
Handy leaving from the post office and arriving to the post office. Hassle free.
Just driver drove abit fast
A bit cramped but had aircon and the driver stopped a couple times for toilet breaks. Drove quickly but wasn’t too bad, made it in 5.5 hours.
Supposed to be a sleeper bus, ended up in a van...
The bus was very comfortable with its sleeping seats. It's worth it for 8usd. But the departure was delayed for about 30 minutes. overall the service its very good.
The driver stops a of times to pick up cargo.
The driver stops a of times to pick up cargo.
Great trip and service.
Good service.
good. not bad . but delay 50minute is only the defect

I bought a ticket with your service Virak Bunthum from phnom penh to bangkok just one point I disappointed was I have to hold my passport to do the service myself at Cambodia pass but if I bought tickets at counter they will do it for me.
បុគ្គលិក​រឹកៗណាស់សួរមិនចង់ឆ្លេីយទេលោកអេីយ​ មួយៗដូចស្តាច់ចឹងសួរមិនខ្ចីមេីលមុខ

My bus arrived Phnom Penh 3 hours behind schedule.  Staff in Sihanoukville office showed no hospitality on my check in
Nice trip! On time and confortable bed!
The bus could have been more comfortable
The bus could have been more comfortable
The ride was quite smooth from sihanouk to pp... the odd stop for people and nice little 20 min break in between for food... will use again as i usually do :)
Good
The Bus is good and comfort but they spend alot of time to stop by province before coming to poipet directly. So it make us wait too long.
ចំនេញក៏ចំនេញចុះតែកុំថែម កៅអីដោយលើសពីធនារ៉ាប់រង
Driver drove too fast for second part of trip.
Lucky we are still alive, crazy driver.
driver was not good. Drove way to hard and dangerous!! Also no word english..
Driver's personality was not bad, but he came late more than 30min, and we felt driving was not safe.

Bus was older as per reviews, got us from a to b. We left 20 minutes late so we got caught in a major traffic jam. Expected trip time was 5 hrs... Arrival in 7... We weren't in a rush so wasn't too much. We went from Phnom Penh to kampot via kep. Beautifu
Well, it is express, it super fast, though the driver has a freak out situation for 3 times, no break and air con. doesn’t work, unlucky we can breathe and arrive fine.

It’s was not a good experience because along the way to Hochiminh city, even all seats were fully sit, the bus stopped and allowed extras guests to sit on the aisle which people can’t even move or even go to the toilet.

The bus was slightly late which was not a big deal. Unfortunately, there was a flat tire which took 4 and a half hours to fix. At the same time, there was no communication about approximately how long the repair would take.

Our bus arrived in Sihanoukville 3.5 hours late so we missed the last ferry to the islands and had to stay in Sihanoukville over night missing a night of already paid for accommodation in a resort on the islands. Do not recommend
The lady collected a fee of $3 and said that it's for the Immigration. I dont think it is necessary.
Excellent trip. Arrived in Phnom Penh earlier than scheduled. Everything went well.
Your bas depertured on time. Then, it's safety drive very good.
អ្នកបេីកបរ​បេីកលឿនដូចហោះ​ ផ្លូវរលាក់ក៏មិនបន្ថយដែរ​ ជាំថ្លេីមអស់ហេីយ

I booked the last spot (seat 1) and sat right at front and didn't even have a seat belt. We left around 30 min later than planned and the driver speeded most of the time despite rain. 
We made it on time, however, I wouldn't pick again this company
Bad everything ? especially bad behavior
50 min late deparyure

By happen, on the way to Phnom Penh and way back to Ho Chi Minh,same dtiver. He is gentle, kind and trying to meet passengers’ requests. He is such a nice person and I appreciate him and respect him. Mekong Express is so lucky to have him as a member.
Thank you for a good bus trip. Next time I choose Mekong Bus
Excellent trip. Arrive Phnom Penh better than expected. Very good driver, and very friendly, beautiful female staff at the bus
The ride was smooth. The bus seats were very comfortable. The only hiccup was leaving a half hour later than scheduled. Great experience overall.
Horrendous! Should have been 4 hours but took 8 & 1/2. This ride should not be advertised as 4 hours. I never would have booked if I had known it would take so long.
Excellent trip. Good driver who got us to Siem Reap earlier than advertised time. So much better than Sihanoukville drive which I don't recommend
Nice for them to take good care of our passport!
Mekong did not call to inform me until I called them

It went okay untill Phnom Penh. There I was refused my pre-booked seats and was told to sit all the way in the back. The lady who told us was very rude and unpleasant. We took our luggage and went for another buscompany. The driver was reckless, too fast

Office staff, hang up during phone conversation, rude, laughing and unprofessional, unable to answer "Where is the van departing from?". Second and most importantly, the driver drove like crazy, kept looking away from road, always driving on other side.

First time I took a Mekong Express Bus, from Phom Penh to Siem Reap. Turned out is was the VIP Night Bus on it's retour trip to SR. Euhm, well overall it wasn't that bad. Just the busterminals are a bit out of the center of PP and SR.

កន្លែងអង្គុយគ្មានផាសុខភាព ពេលវេលាចេញយឺតយ៉ាវ

Thank you.

Super Fahrer, er kam 20 Minuten früher als ausgemacht. Er konnte sehr gut Englisch und ist sehr sicher und anständig gefahren. Das Auto war sauber und ließ auch keine Wünsche übrig. Kann den Service nur empfehlen.

The bus from Siem Riep to Phnom Penh was excellent: Excellent driver, friendly and helpful inspector, perfectly on time and VERY roomy and comfortable seats. The minibus from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville however was the complete opposite, driving was scary

The driver stopped to buy himself food, ate driving, talked on the phone at the same time. Whistled and spoke loud. Not safety. 
We've been waiting for over 30 minutes. Bad service

The bus let's say OK, the seats were quite uncomfortable but at least it took us until Ho Chi Minh "in one". But the travel itself was the worst organized one I took in Asia until now. It took 9,5 hours instead of the advertised 6, and no info about anyth

The name express is given credit when taking this mini-van service. A bit overloaded with packages and luggage limiting the confort each passenger had. But given the price you pay, a good value for money.
There is bad smell in the bus station at Siem Reap. The driver is not friendly.
Very comfortable,would definitely use again

OMG that was the worst trip I have ever had! Not because of the bus, but road. Bus was ok. Road was so bumpy and full of holes that there was no way to sleep or read or watch anything. Just very bad road.
Worst
There was enough space in the bus. Airco, free water, we left in time but it took 4 hours instead of 3. The driver drove nice and the bus was clean.

Our van arrived an hour & a half late in Sihanoukville, so we really thought we'd missed the ferry. Fortunately the 2pm ferry only left at 3.20pm, but they were really great & it was certainly to our advantage. I'd use them  again but not book online!

We booked the van though the website. But we missed our van because the departure time that website showed and the actual departure time was different. And the company said they didn’t have our phone number and couldn’t call me.

We booked the van though the website. But we missed our van because the departure time that website showed and the actual departure time was different. And the company said they didn’t have our phone number and couldn’t call me.

I have used this company on numerous occassions  but not to Sihanoukville. To Kep & Kampot they were great, but I won't use them to Sihanoukville again. The driver was quite reckless, & kept stopping, so we were 1 & 1/2 hours late. Almost missed our ferry
Recommend to travelers who need a comfortable trip with VIP Van.
You should change the restaurant that you stop for lunch time. It is very slow and bad service, foods there also very dirty.
This was my 2nd trip travelling with Mekong Express. The driver for this trip was snaking in out of the traffic and making the bus to swirl left right and making the whole journey very unpleasant.
I Always use Bayon VIP reliable ok.
Good Service .

Our trip from Siem Reap to Ho Chi Minh took more than 16 hours. It was a lot tiring compared to our trip from Ho Chi Minh to Siem Reap. There were a lot of unnecessary bus stops and the seats were much more uncomfortable for this trip.

The trip was safe, but the boarder crossing was corrupt and not fair. Paid an extra 10-15$ each just so we can leave your country.. not happy. It’s crap how we couldn’t do it our self and the person on the bus made give him our passport. AVOID
At the other trip bus, I had been stolen my wallet and passport!!   It's like a heaven bus at this time. I LOVE IT!!!!
First time using this service and are very pleased!! Fast, convenient, and hassle free! Thank you!
Departure was delayed 1 hour. The driver was an expert, but too overspeed.

Please kindly fix your bus aircon system. It is freaking hot inside plus the bus is old. My girlfriend almost passed out without enough air. I trust Mekong bus service for a long time but now it disappointed me.
Departure was late 1 hour. The driver is friendly and has nice personality. The Van was not so clean.
It got me from A to B, there was plenty of space on this bus, hardly full at all, it arrived in good time. This is Cambodia, it cost 5 dollars. Excellent value for money.

Arrived early, they let me go on an earlier bus. It was full, it was fun, it was comfortable. It only cost 5 dollars. How could I fault it. It took as long as it took to get there. No wifi, only windows to look at reality through. Perfect.

Bus was on time and clean with plenty of stops for food and bathroom breaks and the driver was very safe by Cambodian standards but a bit liberal with the rules of the road by European/North American standards. I would recommend this company to others.
Airconditioner not work

Some mess is expected and understood, however obvious trash from a previous trip was strewn about the bus. There were also a number of roaches who were clearly living in the bus. Finally, the ac was broken so that it leaked a lot of water on me.
Perfect and relaxing ride
It was a very good trip. Maybe more airconditioning , or more divided. Not two opposite each other. And maybe tell guests to have some consideration for others, not play loud music

I know it is not your fault. But you should not accept supplier such as this shit company(Champa Mekong). I booked a van before departure date around 8days and I choose VIP van with van price , but on departure date i rode on the old bus. Shit travel ever

Driver seem drug, rude, and worst of driving skill. I spent 9 hours from Phnom Penh to Kampot. Only 1 bus that drive customer to Kep and Kampot. OMG, if you were on the bus, you will understand passenger feeling. Luckily i didn't choose it when i cameback
Good service. Arrive on time. Driver very polite and easy going. Staff at the office is friendly and take of customer.
Driver was in the phone the rest of trip. Messages, Facebook, talking, face time... I did not  feel safe

Comfortable bus. 
Good Driver.
Good price.
Old bus. Arrived late. Not much information given during the border cross. No WiFi during the trip
ល្អគួរសម

The bus from phnom penh to ho chi minh was good and the air conditioning was cold and the bus was new too. But the bus from ho chi minh to phnom penh was worse, the bus was old , not clean , have smell and the air conditioning was not cold.

The bus was about 45 min late at departure, but I appreciate they accepted to pick me up from Tatai bridge. 

Rather safe driver and bus with good seatbelts. 
I wish there was more leg room.
My family really love this traveling with Mekong express
Car very old and seat so small

Seats are uncomfortable. It was very cold because of air cond. which worked all night. Blankets were too narow to cover with. Important information was spoken in the middle of cabin and was not heard in first rows. Bus departed at 1.40 instead of 12.45
Easy to use service, is cheap so don't expect 5 star, 2 stops, 15 passengers in 14 seat mini bus and luggage, so nice and warm, its an experience

If you just want a drive from a city to another without being too demanding, you can trust this company. You will reach your destination. However, don't expect the driver to follow the European driving rules and expect to have about an hour delay.
On time but terrible driver, he picked up several people without tickets on the way and was too busy talking to them or on his phone for most of the trip

If you want 4x4 action in the back of an old transit then go no further than going to kampot via this company. Next time I'll be taking a bus. Slow down fella. No rush. He did get us from a to b however.

On the way to Battambang the AC was not really working. There was no space and it was hot. And that for 4 hours.
On the way back it rained and water dripped from the ceiling on us and others.

Would not recommend. The price is not good for that Bus
The best bus company to go to Kampot. Very nice service and professianal driver. For $10 ticket you get lunch box and water! Road is bad as always.

Inspector demanded cash for border crossing despite this being listed NOWHERE on your website and I already had the necessary visas. Giant Ibis do not do this to their customers, I will ride them in the future.

They never picked me up for my scheduled time, despite me and my hotel calling them multiple times and being assured they would pick me up. Had to wait 5h for the next service. Will use Giant Ibis in the future.

The roof was leaking quite badly, but the management did not listen to the passengers about the problem. That same van broke down on the road 45 minutes into the drive. I’ve lived in Cambodia 6yrs and will never take this company again. Really terrible.
The ride took 5h instead of 3, the driver took random people on the way, making it longer (express?), the AC wasn’t set really high and it was really hot in the car.
Wonderful staffs and services from this company, BOOKMEBUS.COM. We enjoy every moment of talking to them and have no hesitation to reach to them. Best service ever ❤️❤️❤️
The bus station so far from city and driver not help to drop at the next station (Pshar Reatrey) which in middle of city.

Our ferry from the islands was late, missed our bus and couldn't be put onto another bus. They told us we had a taxi then said there were no taxis available. We bought another bus ticket with Mekong Express then VB told us a taxi was here to collect us.
comfortable
VIP Van very clean and comfortable
VIP Van very clean and comfortable.
Frequently damaged cars
Автобус приехал вовремя. Водитель вёл аккуратно. В минивэне было чисто.   Единственное - был заявлен WiFi, на деле он не работал.
Good company
Guide was really nice. Punctuality and process in Immigration took so long
Clean Comfortable and safe
តៃកុងឡានបើកបរបានល្អរួសរាយឡានមានផាសុខភាពអ្វីដែលកាន់តែពិសេសគឺតម្លៃធូរថ្លៃជាងក្រុមហ៊ុនផ្សេងៗ

I've used this service a number of times to Kep,  & all was great, but from Sihanoukville the van arrived about 2 hours late, & we got back to PP after 9:30pm instead of around 6:30pm. The driver was friendly & kind & dropped us near TK, so that was good.

I understood the Sihanoukville situation which is worst(car doesn’t move to..). but I book a bus to go Phnom Penh for direct, not dropping one place and to go... Driver rushed into Sihanoukville and never explained to go to Kampot... 6 hours duration..
Good trip and good value for money, though driving was a little reckless at times.
i was running a little late, so i called and asked them if they can wait for me and they did! excellent customer service and very accommodating
The driver drove so fast, and it could makes me dizzy. The expected during is five hours and half, but he drove only four hours and half. Driver should use more polite words.

The Bus is very slow in  driving which was actually ok. However, the one we had does not look a limousine bus. The Bus got busted on our way to Siem Reap near Baray Market. We waited for 3 hours to be transferred to a new bus.
There is a bad smell in the Bus station in Siem Reap

Sigh! The driver start collects passenger along the way to fulfill the available seats. Moreover, I thought from PP to SHV with price 10.5$ per person, the service should at least give passenger a bottle of water, but it is none??

First time and last time travel with this company. F... Shit, always late for departure even from PP or Sihanouk...
Not recommended!!!
Excellent as ever with the VIP bus. Friendly inspector, and very efficient staff at the very erratic and infamous Cambodian/Vietnamese border.
After booking, I found that I had a mistake, wrong direction. It should be PP-HCM, not HCM-PP. I tried to contact both terminal ends to correct, and even two mail back. However, no solution.
Congratulations to the driver for his driving skils due to the bad road before Kampot.
Very good ! Air conditioner a little bit too cold...?

The lady inspector assigned to us was very snobby. When she took our passports to the immigration of Vietnam, she did not inform us properly what to do while waiting for her leaving us clueless. The arrival time took longer than expected.
So far so good but the aircon seem doesn’t work
This is a local Cambodian bus. Not on time and stopped multiple times. Too hot and too many people.
Pick up at hotel on time, departure late due to a delayed tourist, brought us to the agency where we had to buy ferry tickets. friendly and good driver. over all very good service!

The trip overall was okay. The van arrived on time  and we passed through the Cambodia-Vietnam border without any problem. The driver though did not know how to communicate even in basic English thus we ended up not eating dinner during the stopover.
Perfect service

The driver was 40min late. He added another passenger somewhere outside of Phnom Penh to Shianoukville. We did not mind as the seat on front was empty but wonder if this is normal to take another passenger if we pay a private taxi? Besides that all fine.

Passengers should be warned of the massive road works between Phnom Penh and Sihanoukville.The journey was scheduled 8.30 - 12.30 we got in at 4.30 pm dreadful service I missed 2 very important meetings overnight end and left on the 19 th by taxi
He drive with 130 km/h. And talk loudly on phone 90% along the way. So bad
Around trip both delay for arrival.
the bus arrived too late , it affected somebody's plan is late and feel very tired.

Never book with them. They are lying on the seats' availability. So I booked 3 tickets to leave at 1:30pm and when we arrived the lady said "cannot, this van is full, but you can leave at 3:30pm". And I have to raise my voice to get a full refund.

They said that there's Wifi, but there is none. The lady asked us to pay for $2 for the officers to stamp our passports. Idk if its necessary, however the transaction is so smooth. The journey is also safe. Overall 3.5/5. Its actually okay
It arrived in Phmom Penh 1 hour late
Driver is very good
Driver great.  Some confusion as I thought he was calling to tell me ge had arrived, he was actually calling to say when he would arrive.  Very polite, clean vehicle and safe transport.
When book online, they change my seat number.. Originally, I booked seat No 19 and 20 but after they change my seat to 25, 26 without inform me.
I had booking on 20th but I didn't know why the email sent me on 19th.
The trip was very good, the seats were comfortable for sleeping. The temperature in the cabin was good, air conditioning systems are adjusted individually. Everything was good.

Overall service is great. Since we're in the Digital Age i still choose booking online. And i find Bookmebus is really useful. Fast easy reliable, always get the seat that i want. more over they have the best support. Keep up the good work.

The service at Siem Reap is good, I booked the wrong date due to my confusing of the hours shown in bookmebus app. The staffs were happily exchanged the tickets for me. The app should be more accurate anyway.
- The sitting spaces are too small
Nice
On time departure - minibus in good condition - good driving but travel time closer to 4 hours due to construction on the road
The van didn't have air conditioner, was so horrible. Please let know the costumers when have this problem before to buy tickets or made a booking.

Due to traffic the bus arrived 3hours late. We did get a sencere appology. I think the driver wanted to make up for lost time as we drove really fast. Needing to most abruptly hit the brakes when there were bumps on the road. My back really hurts now.

The Mini Van was too hot due to inadequate air conditioning the driver tends to be unsafely always trying to overtake even in crowded road and there are approaching cars and truck in the counter flow lane although he was able to managed and arrived safe.
Drivers keep picking passengers and sitting them on the hall , makes it uncomfortable and very dangerous in case of emergency

The bathroom...oh my god filthy. And there was only 1 stop during the entire 8 hour trip. Because we are supposed to use this horrific and filthy bathroom? No way. you need to make regular bathroom stops for hygiene purposes!

We are a Family of 8 who travel in and out of Airports and take Private tours. This van was the tightest we have. Our Luggage barely fit in the back. I emailed the Company and never heard back. I paid a good Sum for this. Van cleanliness and Driverwere ok

The bus was 30 mins late to leave and 2 hours late to arrive. The air did not work and would not open the windows. While we left at capacity the driver stopped to pick up people on the side of the road that made it to where seats had to be shared.
The driver was in time. Drive us to Our destination, but was not si friemdly. Looks like he was very tired and sleepy
They changed my bus ticket departure time without informing me ahead of time. The aircon was not functioning properly.
They changed my bus ticket departure time without informing me ahead of time. The aircon was not functioning properly.
Arrived one hour left, but not the fault of mekong express staff, we spent lot of time at the border.
the driver to slow ,we arrived after 6 hours
The driver was really friendly.
The driver was a bit erratic, he side swiped a truck, and struck the vehicle’s mirror.
I suggest that you choose upper seats :) But overall, it was a smooth ride.
It was not a seat belt. I couldn't take the seat belt.

The arrival time is not correct with the actual time that u set on ur website. It different between 1 or 2hours. So please confirm that correct estimate arrival time with company bus. Even the water the company bus didn’t provide for us.  Thank you
We waited a lot the second bus but it was during Songkran so we understood. They also charged you $10 more than the real price for getting the visa.
The bus didn't fetch us in the hotel on time. The bus has a bad smell and we were not able to sleep well.
The driver of Cambodia Post Office (PP to/from SHV is not friendly and so aggressive, and he keep us like we ride for free, not his customer)
I would book their service again for my next trip.

Everything are acceptable but driver is a bit rude. It is his personal character but please respect more to your client. I don't know his name that why i cannot complain directly to company. More than 50% of passengers were got car sick during his drive.
Recommend Mekong Express extent route from Phnom Penh to Surin Thailand (Khmer people always travel to Surin for Medical Treatment and Surin near Cambodia than Bangkok)
Took the bus to Battambang and thr driver was polite and drove safely.
Driver is good and fast service
The car has problems with the lights! Company should check it well before putting it into service!
Best service BtB yo PP and return
The driver is careless and yesterday the car is broke down in Khompong Chnag ...Bad service
No complaints whatsoever. Good driver, very kind and helpful assistant. Great experience.

Driver drove recklessly. Assistant was rude and didn't explain clearly anything. Bus old and seat was broken. Air conditioning was not working a lot. Driver was rude to the passengers and to the foreigner, he was not respecting them. Bad Experience.

Unnecessary stop overs that could be lessen so travel time can be shorten. 8hrs travel and not 6hrs. They assisted us and very helpful when crossing Vietnam to Cambodia. Bus is a bit old but you get the service for the price you pay for.

I actually arrived the port late and I havent picked up my ticket too but the lady works at the counter is nice. She changed the new ticket for us, to different company speed boat without charging extra. This is helpful and nice. Totally recommended.
ok

I arrived the port late but the lady works at the counter is nice, she changed the new ticket for us, to different company speed boat without charging extra. But the return trip by this ferry took us 2hrs to reach the mainland.

I was disappointed  that we can't cancel or over ticket for another day, also we called Bookmebus to cancel after 2 h we booked at 10:42 Am cancel at 1:43 pm the trip will start at 9pm. we also sent email but no update until 24h n we asked again no cancel
Perfect!
Would highly recommend no issues :)

Trajet horrible! Je ne recommande pas du tout cette compagnie, le chauffeur roule à une vitesse folle sur des routes en terre à contresens parfois..!! bref un vrai danger. Et il n’y a même pas de coffre pour stocker les bagages un comble! A fuir!

I think your customer service is terrible.  I’ve tried to contact you on 4 separate occasions.  No excuses for terrible customer service.  I had a problem with no resolve.  Pass the buck doesn’t cut it.  Your response is horrible!

You cheated me out of $12.  I booked a round trip ticket on line to find out I had no return ticket from PP to HCMZc so I had to buy another ticket.  No response from your customer service.  Horrible service!  Don’t book on line!
No WiFi but it was advertised that they did have it. Otherwise pleasant
Good service but vinyl seat were hot and A/C was working but limited

Bought a round trip ticket and was scammed on the return trip.  No ticket.  Had to buy another.  No help from staff.  Customer service is terrible.  After multiple pleas nothing.  Even emails not answered.  Don’t book online.
I had to change my date for the ticket and BookMeBus was very helpful in promptly doing so in a day of time. Also online help was very helpful.
Driver and guide didn't call me while i was waiting until 8:30 bus.
Exellent service very comfortable
The Larryta office has closed in Sihanoukville and the contact number is for Virak Buntham who were not helpful.
Nice service thank you
We were 3 hours later than advertised and missed our 3pm ferry. Driver said he would have the company refund our 3pm ferry via island speed ferry (2 people)

The receptionist is extremely rude and impolite. I asked what time the van left, he didn't see or even reply after i asked few times.  Later, he said just wait, dont ask too much in front of many people. I have his photo, too. Very rude!!
Very good friendly driver who arrived to pick us up on time and didn't drive to fast. He then helped us find our guesthouse.

The minivan was on time. It was a good journey. I just wish the driver at least greet the passengers and inform when it is time to stop for lunch break or toilet break. Not just stop the van and expect us to understand.
The overall trip was okay. The driver was accommodating to stops a long the way, but he made so many stops to pick up staff or for us to eat when we didn't want to stop either.

Did not have interactions with the driver. Not sure what was the accommodation was besides the life jacket. They did have the AC on which was nice, but they weren't able to stop people from smoking which was terrible. The ride took almost 3hrs.
Recommended. The ride was comfortable and only stopped twice. Would have left on time, but they waited for one customer. So good overall.
Satisfactory service. The state of the road is not the driver's responsibility.

I will never take this bus again. giant ibis was amazing I took them 3 times and my one experience on Mekong express was horrible. The WiFi didn’t work AT ALL, half of the bus smelled of nail polish and nasty curry balls and shit. Take giant ibis please.
Convenient service
Despite arriving before the departure time, we were told we were late and had to wait an hour for the next bus. That bus was also late to arrive. Good food stop though.

Wie immer bis jetzt in Kambodscha, gute Fahrt mit Mekong Express, anständiger Fahrstiel und recht freundliche Angestellte. Drop off dort, wo angegeben, keine Tricksereien. Nur die Verspätung von einer Stunde gibt etwas Abzug.
overall it was a great and hassle free trip

Nice seats, and departed on time. Broke down at one point but they were quick to fix it. However, dropped us off very far from town where no tuktuks would take us for a reasonable price. Ended up walking a few km to town.

១. ព្យាយាមតេទៅក្រុមហ៊ុនសាខាបាត់ដំបងជិត១០ដង តែគ្មានអ្នកលើក 
២.សំដីអ្នកតេមកភ្លៀវដូចអាចន៍

Experience was horrible. Staff was unprofessional and rude. First they told our ride was delayed for no reason, then we couldnt have our money back. After all customers were fed up and demanded justice, the staff panicked and arranged a bus for us. Insane

Driver spent too much time on the phone while driving, it is dangerous.
Driver picked up people on the road and dropped them also on the road, so we arrived later than planned in Battambang
Good for me

Excelente todo el guía Tork impecable un poco la información de parte de uds del punto de encuentro 
Todo lo demás excelente

Driver kept pick people up along the road and that made me and my team feel uncomfortable. His attitude towards me when I made comment regarding to he picking people up is unacceptable. Disappointed. Not gonna use their services again. suck!

The service was ok, but giant ibis is much better. The minivan left 30 mins late with no explanation and arrived 1hr late. People were picked up and dropped between the stations, and the driver blasted terrible karaoke music for the 2nd half of the trip.
I always support Cambodia Post despite it’s a public company, yet how it’s punctual and good service.

I like the staff and the driver on how they deal with people except the bus was quite old and the trip from Saigon to Cambodia was 2 hours delayed but going back to Saigon was on time. However, I do recommend Mekong Express.

Okay until we got to the Cambodian border. Long delay getting exit cards and visas processed. Older bus with uncomfortable seats, inadequate air cond and no WiFi. Bad roads in Cambodia and the delays at the border resulted in a 2 1/2 hour longer trip.
Driver stoped on the road and pickup passengers who did not have ticket.
Bus took 7h30 was not match with the duration that mentioned on ticket and please make the briefing formality at the border more clear.
Very bad driving. The driver frequently disobey law and tend to drive on the wrong side of the taffic.
Because the road was broken we had to walk with all our luggage through the mud for up to an hour to the border. Some notice could of prepared us for this horrible scenario
Late to leave and arrive PP on 06:30 am...
Not commended... Always late to departure and the seller is not responsible and talk rudeness to customer...
Not recommended company as usually late for departure.

When booking online, even we buy direct from PP to BKK, they will not assist for Cambodian fast border checking unless we buy from their company direct, so do you need to go online just fucking sell at your own office.
I have no choice for night bus from PP to BKK, or i will not choose your service company. Shit!

The worst ever Kep-Kampot-Phnom Penh bus service which took in more guests than legally allowed having at least 5 pick-up/drop off stops for such a simple journey and the safety and the comfort of passengers are practically non-existent.

The worst traveling with this driver ever! He not turn on the AC. He picked up so many people at borei seang nam, after 10 mins pick up others at Domdek and waiting along that ways, after we reached kampong thom he wait for someone to join car again.
It should be more clear from the start that there will be a 5 dollar fee charged. This was not explained and we already had paid for an e-visa so we did not understand why we had to pay again.

It was punctual and safe. Nothing to complain about. It took us only 6.5 hours to arrive. Staff assistance at the immigration was helpful. I wanna make sure that all of the seats have seatbelt for security?!
Good service.

It took a bit longer than communicated and expected.
Good trip, but not truly a VIP bus. 
No Wifi as communicated
Some trouble to get the engine started. But in the end... all good!

All went smoothly! 
Only downside, when you book a private transfer - having a driver that understands/speaks english would be a big plus!

All went fine.
Only the boat was too overcrowded and reserved place were not respected.
Calm driver &nd great SUV's. Trip was split in 2 parts, going over Phnom Penh and not direct. By consequence, the drive too +2 hours longer than expected.
Great one ever
Reliable driver, came on time despite my unusual requests, and flexible regarding my last minute changes. I recommend this company if you need a vehicle  in Cambodia!
Neang sieb
On the plus side, we were pretty fast and on time, but the driver was just reckless and there were no seatbelts

Overall trip was smooth and nice. Removal of shoes before entering is very good to maintain cleanliness. However, needs a little improvement to the fabric and smell of the bunk beds as it was less air circulated.
Great and smooth trip. Driver was punctual and very safe. Van was clean. Easy way to get to Siem Reap.
I booked for departure time at 1:30 but one day before departing I got the confirmation from bookmebus that staff got confuse on inputting my booking by change to 1:00pm.

Very surprised me. When they came to my place where  I stayed to picked me up for station. Good service. Stopped when I asked for toilet brake. Good conditioner and water. And friendly stuff. Would choose again. Thank you lovely people again!!
The seat was quite uncomfortable since I couldn’t adjust it to my liking but overall, great service. Keep up the good work!
Shit
I just hope that they have been true to what it says on free WiFi and light snack. If not providing this, pls update your info.
Bus is too hot
Few stops along the way, arrive later than estimated time, 1:50pm arrive sihanoukville.
It was good service. On time. Air condition. Arrived even earlier. And stopped for a break.
the bus did not stop at the station that I want

The driver was very kind.
Departure on time
Drive too fast, and does not care with passenger.
Overall experience was at best stats.
The overall trip experience with ekareach express as well as the booking service through bookmebus were very convenient. It will be my next trip first option of choice.

We have been travelling through Asia for a year now and have used lots of vans and buses, the driver on this trip was the best by far. Checked the van over at every stop travelled at a safe speed and left on time which is almost unheard of here.

Great trip- left on time/ a bit earl , working air con, toilet on board and  a short dinner stop, helped us over the border, gave us snacks and water. Drops you off in the backpacker area in Saigon - would recommend
It was a great trip and the staff even helped my husband find his phone he left on the seat. This was the first time we went during the day, so it took a little more time at the boarder.
Comfy beds, clean, however recommend if a westerner couple travelling together, booking 2 beds each as 2 beds can be a tight fit for 2.

Just a terrible driving experience. Always was on his phone while driving and not paying attention to the road. Had to ask him to stop just to use the toilets. 
No water provide, no WiFi. When booking it said vip van. It was just a VAN! Awful
Quite okay trip not too hot like last time

The bus company over sold the bus , and clearly were saddened when we arrived as it meant all the paid customers arrived. After half hour of phone calls we were finally aloud on the bus and the driver made two other paying customers squeeze into seats
You have a good service

The bus from Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh was good and the staff were lovely. The vip van from Phnom Penh was not so. We were on the back seats which were smaller than the rest and the air con was not good at the back. Our clothes were very wet from sweat.
Driver of minivan picked us up at our hotel right on time. The van was clean with adequate seating. He consistently drove safely at proper speeds.
Very helpful

Smelly, rude driver arrived early with an extra passenger, who paid him upon arrival in Siem Reap. Arrived quickly because of bad driving, slowed just before police checkpoint. Asked my Khmer friend so many questions about me. Really bad journey

Everything was ok to car really clean, nothing to say for that, the only which is really important to my eyes, is the driver has to calm down with the speed, seriously. We almost had an accident, and killed one dog. 
There re no point to drive that fas
Almost got accident, driver used phone a lot during driving.

Arrived on time. Left 5 mins late which is acceptable. Kind of cramped for long legged people. It was a 3pm schedule so expect a hot day; air conditioning wAs not as powerful but as the soon went down, became bearable and enough.Arrived safely after 5h30m
So nice to have an air conditioned car waiting for us after such a long trip. Made our late night arrival very easy
Everything was fine except of crying children that could not be calm for 70% of journey
I was super suprised how smooth this journery went. Very friendly staff and driver which was not a daredevil
You have a good service and hope I can use your service again. Thanks,

Bus arrived about 75 minute late (18h15), but still ahead of most other companies (and some of the blame goes to Phnom Penh rush hour traffic). Stops weren't too long, which I appreciated. Comfortable seats and air conditioning. Would use again.
The ride was good. He took a different route that was more bumpy. Overall it was good!
Very good ride. Sat in the front next to driver. Aircon worked well! He drove nice and fast.
Air Conditioning need to address. WiFi should be there too... it’ll be very helpful for the passenger. Over all experience was just fine.

But broke down numerous times. Took us 8 hours to do a 5 hour trip. On the way back the company made us hitchhike from the side of a highway. No one in the van spoke english and we were unable to know what was going on. Wouldn't refund us.
Excellent Driver and the mini bus was very good
This is for phnon phen to siem reap. Bus was 35mins late leaving and when it rained windows leaked the roof leaked passengers got wet  my worst trip ever in a buss in 75 years. Terrible

How the bus company offers to me (as the customer) is different from from they write on the website. I was not given a bottle of water (they said that water is out of stock in the bus), a snack and the phone charger didn’t work). This was a good trip.

All good. Plenty of space, on time , AC and fast.
The road has only two lines. Sometimes the driver has to pass slow vehicules by going in the wrong way, but is understandable. If not, it could take 1-2 hours longer. The driver didnt so anything risky.
Efficient but cramped. Driver should not take phone calls when he has the responsibility of all those people on the bus.It is an accident waiting to happen.

Wouldnt do it again. No clear information available about where we are stopping or changing. The place on the map for departure was actually a different office so we had to take another truck to go to the bus, the bus was old and worn out...
I like this travelling
Good seats with WiFi! Some short stops. Friendly and helpful staff. The best we had in Cambodia!

The driver was nice. He turned up early and spoke enough English for effective communication. He allowed us toilet and snack stops. The vehicle was in good condition. That said I would never do that overland trip again. Way too many maniacs on the road.
Great driver, comfortable minibus, arrived ahead of schedule, easy online booking setup and excellent value for money; I fully recommend VGS Express

The ride was also good on time.
I was happy to arrive early but I was a little scared because the speed was so fast.
I booked a 45 minute ferry which took 2 hours. I almost missed my next booked boat to mad monkeys. We first boarded one boat them had to hop off and board another. Felt very unorganised

Booked a bus for 12:45, did not set off until 14:15. Asked repeatedly to both the driver and inspector and either got ignored (driver), or was told 10 more minutes by the inspector which turned out to be lies.  No communication at all.
Driver and bus were fine no complaints. just no WiFi as advertised
Very good night journey.
Good driving in difficult weather confitions

I have booked VIP Van but they changed to bus country-20 and the driver kept talking on phone since PNH to SR. His driving skill is very make my friend vomit and this is really bad experience I ever met.
Excellent services at very reasonable price, Really liked a very prompt and friendly driver
Fast efficient service.

Basic but good, was an hour late to pick us up but the driver was on lunch (take the times online with a pinch of salt), mini bus was packed with people but comfortable. Just what you’d expect from a mini bus ride in Cambodia!

Disastrous! Not safe for tourist. The bus had a breakdown and we had to take another bus and pay extra charges. We want at least a refund. For the tourist never use this bus. U can find other buses with better accommodation at the same rate.

The journey was two and a half hours longer than advertised, with too many unnecessary stops along the way, which was frustrating. To cap it off, the driver dropped us near the port and the tuk tuk driver tried to charge us $30 for a 2km journey.
Good driver, my only concern is always the same: drivers picking up Khmer people on the road and dropping them also but not allowing foreigners the same

Best boat trip ever. Thank you so muchhh

The taxi description when booking said an SUV but instead we got a Prius. Should be clear about what to expect. Also there are alternative less crowded routes from PP to Kep and perhaps the driver should know the condition of both to select the best.
This was a convenient way to get from Ho Chi Minh to Phnom Penh. It certainly wasn't a luxury ride but it was cheap and convenient.
Driver was good, but was definitely the most cramped minivan we’ve been in. Won’t be using again.
comfortable van,vip leather seat
Driving was good and inspector was very helpful and friendly ...Will use the company again...
I love how they assist us from our baggage , snacks and direction for the immigration in the boarders

The times shown are quite wrong so dont expect reaching destination after a few more hours. Cambodian side is terribly slow.Once in Thailand, drivers are very much reliable when it comes to drive reasonably fast and catchup with the delay. not their fault

Five hours is an understatement. It took us 7 hours to reach and despite telling the driver that we have to be there later by 5pm, he still took his time, had long breaks which caused us to miss our ferry.

The trip from Phnom Penh to Shianoukville is only 116 miles but took us 7.5 hours this meant we missed our ferry to go to Koh Rung and had to pay for a hotel for the evening. The weather was bad as was the traffic but the driver was very slow and no warni

Horrible night ride from Mondulkiri to PP: the bus departed 1 hour later, also arriving much later than scheduled. The driver was blasting loud music all night long and ignored any requests to decrease the volume at least. Also crazy very unsafe driving.
Good driver comfortable seat

Promised: 4 hour drive starting at 3.30 PM to Phnom Penh. Reality: departure 4 PM, duration >7 hours. (Young) drive was very tired, only stopped 1 time after 2 hours for 10 minutes. Very unsafe situation, especially during rain. Van was good, 1 place pp

The driver kept stopping many times to pick up some additional passengers as there were vacant seats,so it caused to the arrival time of being late.We left PP at 8:30am & scheduleed to be in HCM at 2:30pm but instead, it's 5:30pm. time-consuming at border

Driver picked up some additional passengers along the way, so it caused on late arriving in PP. We scheduled to leave HCM at 1pm and to arrive in PP at 7pm, but it was 8:30pm instead. No clear information from staffs to passengers related to break or so.
A few extra stops along the way but driver was safe and cautious and still arrived earlier than schedule.
Very good and save driver . Not ok to Stop earlier than end bus stop for tourists to be cheated by overpriced tuktuk driver.

On June 12th, I left HCMC to Phnom Penh at 6:30 am. I was riding in one of the mini buses. There were only 3 customers. I was able to lay across the seats and sleep. The border crossing took a total of 10 minutes from leaving Vietnam to sitting on the bus

It was a pleasant night bus ride. The single sleeping bed was quite comfortable and the AC was a bonus...
so far so good, car is good condition only driver need to be careful

Great service, comfortable journey with good aircon and very friendly driver

We got from Pakse to Siem Reap in the correct time. However, there was a lot of confusion involved with getting off our bus into a truck to go to the border, then being left to figure out the border crossing ourselves. More clarity was needed.
On time departure, the driver drove safety and stably, picked up some passengers somewhere in Vietnam. But arrival time was earlier than when I expected.

The driver Mr. BUN THIN was an excellent gentleman. He was very safe and the drive from phnom penh to siem reap was comfortablr.

Very flexible company. We had to make a few last minutes changes and the manager and driver very accommodating to our requirements (no accommodation used)
Left at a reasonable time. Considering the state of the highway it arrived in good time. Quick efficient and friendly service. Happy to recommend.

The driver was furiously fast. It was a scary experience on that Van. He almost hit people "several times". People in the car gave him feedbacks, but he still keep doing that. Never ride with that company again.
I was happy with the service. Driver arrived on time and did a good job getting me to my destination on time despite poor road conditions.
The price is very low but the driver drives very slow. We had a delay a bit over an hour without any traffic to speak of. The driver does not inform how long stops will be.

Terrible journey and booking. Took almost 8 hours for 4 hour journey. CTT Driver didn't leave until late and didn't care we missed our boat. Requested hotel pick up and no reply from bookme! Very dangerous with no visibility in dust clouds van shaking.
The aircon didn't work for the entire trip. And the windows could not be opened either. We were suffocating and sweating the whole 4 hours.
I slept the whole way from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh.  It felt like the quickest trip I ever had.

The driver from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh was really nice, so 5/5 for him. But it would’ve been nice if the driver from Phnom Penh to Ho Chi Minh used the horn less. The first bus was good, lots of leg room, but it would’ve been nice with the same on bus 2.

The time of departure and arrival were falsely advertised. The advertised journey was 4 hours, the real journey was 6.5 without traffic. This meant we missed original ferry booking... Bus was dirty, driver was frankly dangerous and staff were rude.

Safe and comfortable ride.
