Safe and comfortable experience.

Our driver, Mardi, was absolutely fantastic.  He delivered us quickly, safely, and comfortably, demonstrating a great deal of experience navigating the challenges of the road between Siem Reap and Battambang.  His English is superb!

Went to Champa the day before and was informed that there was not a 10:30 bus only one     at 9. Arrived at 8:40 and at 9 we were sent by cab to a different location. Between Kampot and Phnom Penh, the bus made 14-18 stops, arriving in Phnom Penh at 2.
Next time please put driver name on Car so We can give direct feedback to driver who drive careless.

Very nice experience all together.
Thanks
The safest bus ride I have ever journeyed to. It’s just that the bus aircon seems to be old hence the hot adventure. Good overall.
We should have been in Phnom Penh around midnight. we have been there at 5 in the morning!

Not very good experience! The driver didn't ask for us at the airport,he was close to us with my name written in a fold paper.... We had another mate in our taxi, who was vomiting in the back. The taxi had a flat tire and we had to stop to inflate it.....

There was a total lack of communication.  I knew I had to change buses but I didn't expect to do it twice.  The bus was advertised as leaving at 7 but left an hour late.  No information about toilet stops either.
It's very bad, you send me sleepy driver... and we not finish to sihanoukvile... it's bad transportation
I'm a big guy, the seats were very small with very limited leg space, maybe think of addressing this issue, other than that the trip was good
It was a long and tiring trip BUT it was all worth it.  Thanks to our Driver and his Assistant...sorry was not able to get their names...:)

The bus was very warm, no wifi as advertised but it did take us from siem reap to battambang.
It's an old bus with really bad air con and no wifi so don't expect either
I am really satisfied your service.
The driver is pretty to rude to the passenger. Not to me but to the passenger near by.

Mr. Om Marady was an absolutely fantastic driver.  I recommend him and this service to any foreign traveler who may be a bit nervous about the roads in Cambodia:  we found Marady to be careful, bold, and safe:  great English and great conversation!

Impossible to hear the people on the phone when calling to confirm on multiple occasions.  Bus was small and hot very uncomfortable not like other VIP buses we have used in Cambodia/Vietnam. Bus takes 6.5 hours not 4 so unsure why this isn’t stated.
A little bit late but there was a lot of people on the road. Maybe a little too much of stop (3)
Inspector is hands on and good in english.
The driver was good and the accommodation was good as well. But I held my heart at the high speed and the many overtaking maneuvers.

Scary experience with the driver. We almost hit a truck on our way to Mondulkiri. He was also driving at full speed during the heavy rain. I will commend though the accommodating receptionist and punctuality of the driver.

Hotel bus, B means up, A means down, beds are 1,75m so if you’re taller it won’t be confortable for two people, and I’m 68kg (and my girlfriend 50) but I’m sure that if you’re slightly overweighted you won’t be confortable. We arrived two hours late.

Worst company ever, try to avoid booking with them, there’s no office in the Sihanoukville so pick up point is in a crossroad. At some point a woman came to inform me that bus would be half an hour late, it was two hours late and from a different company!
Nice office in Kampot, nice staff, we departed in time but the travel took longer than expected
Faultless. Departed in good time, drove appropriate to the road conditions, informed people how long we had for pee stops, and arrived in good time in PP. Happy to recommend.
Driver came late. He forgot the location to bring us hence made extra distance and he demand for more money.
It took more than 20 hours to reach Bangkok. The bus itself made 3 hours late by arriving the border around 9AM.
If youre a bit taller it can be a bit cramped in the minivan, but overall everything was good!
Driver drives very fast and he is so aggressive.
Seat is a bit small

To be cleaner inside of car 
Due to contesting at Cambodia side, 1 hour late arrival
Driver was good.
ឡានអត់មានដាក់​វាំងនន​ការពារ​កំដៅ​ថ្ងៃ​ ។ សុំអោយដាក់​ វាំងនន​ផង​  អរគុណ…​
Good

Professional services and safe driving. 
We have been informed by both call and email about an update for our trip back and the customer car managed to refund our tickets to buy new ones.
Efficient and quality services, to recommend.
Cambodia post arrived on time, was v reasonably priced. There wasn't much AC but the journey was fine, and we also arrived in siem reap way ahead of schedule. I would definitely use again!!!
Not sure why drivers keep charging 5 to 10 usd more to customers than the visa rate , and then customers complain they just ignore speaking English and keep the money , bad practice
Besides cheating guest with 5 usd more on visas , bus is dirty , pick passengers on the say without a seat , they say not speak english, air con broken, terrible
Everything ok except they keep lying offering WiFi , have take that bus 3 times and never have WiFi so no need to lie to customers
Good carefully driver. Arrived earlier than suggested. Would definitely recommend.

The driver was totally crazy!! 
Fast and furious
The driver was very careful, this bus had bigger seats than the previous one that made a very big difference in comfort for me, they even let us get off before the station near our house
It was fine
Virak Buntham customers services is very bad as always. Speak without hospitality and rude. Mostly the lady staffs, very bad in talking
Excellent service!!
On time and good service.
Was great. On time. Stopped for toilet breaks. Asked us if we wanted to stop for lunch. He was great
A/C not work and we all felt like hell and almost passed out. Such a bad experience and the company must be so something about this but nothing.
The air conditioner on the bus did not work. The driving was dangerous and we left well after the scheduled time.
Should check the van before starting to go on trip because in my case, there was a little problem with the van ans we wait for about 20 mins or so. Anyway, overall the service is nice.

It was an ok service. However, the staff should handle suitcases more careful. They broke one wheel from my suitcase on the yesterday’s trip. I am really upset about it as I don’t know how I will carry on my trip with 3 wheel suitcase.
While driver was very professional, please have him stand in a more easy to recognize location instead of waiting at a corner with a small sign

The Mekong Express delivered exactly what was promised — a quick and seamless bus trip. The staff were friendly and hospitable, they listened to my requests and acted on them almost immediately. The private bus bathroom was very convenient.
Thanks driver.

It was tricky to reserve my seat on a hotel bus without knowing which one is an upper bed or a lower bed. The ceiling of my back seat was the way too low, AC should be designed for the body, not for face, so it was very uncomfortable to sleep.
Excellent
Always provide with good services?
Good service , on time , seats a touch uncomfortable and a touch cramped but no real dramas

The service is okay, but to bad you lie on the webpage.
-No bathroom on bus
-No wifi on bus
-No explanation of visa process.

I got to the destiny but I woudn't recommend mekkong mainly because i felt lied to. Next trip I'm using ibis
Best ride driver was fast and safe. The van was nice n cold.

Arrival of the bus was late , didn’t leave the city until 5.40pm , be mindful with the ‘5pm’ bus traffic is horrific so took us 1.5 hours to get out of the city (not at all the buses fault) but advertising it as a 3 hour bus is unrealistic.

Avoid at all costs. No office - had to wait on the street. Left well over 1 and 1/2 hours late and arrived 3 and 1/2 hours after time we were told. Staff were not realistic and would say anything to stop you asking questions. Driver was dangerous.

At first I was scared that I might be able to experience as well the bad reviews I've read about mekong express. It turns out the real opposite. The ride and the crossing of borders were smooth. No scams. Inspector knows how to speak in English.
Ride was really smooth. It's just the beds were really small and the aisles are narrow. Anyway, at least it was a safe ride.
Good service and easy to communicate with  tge company..Many thanks!I will definitely book again.
មេត្តាកែតម្រូវពេវេលាម៉ោងចេញដំណើរអោយបានត្រឹមត្រូវតាមការកណត់

The van came in on time, the driver was accomodating and helped us in the border. The sleeper bus from phnom penh to siem reap was also on time and clean. I would definitely recommend Mekong to my friends who is planning to take indochina trips.
The driver is on time and very nice
Some drivers know have free chair then they try to catch passenger.

Bullshit, i booked night bus at 1am, seat number 7B, 8B. Since Wednesday 26 June 2019. But when i come to check at bus Agency counter for the booking they know nothing. And stupid call to check with their team. Finally i got 15A, 16A. Company should check
Poor service
the price is quite expensive than other companies

It was the best trip I've had on the Cambodia Post van. The driver didn't know that he had a passenger, so if I hadn't gotten there very early, I would have missed it, he left at 1pm not 1:45 as per my ticket time!! Advise them when there is a passenger!
មិនគោរពពេលវេលាកក់ម៉ោង 07:30 ដល់ម៉ោង 08:40 បាន បានចេញ
យកចិត្តទុកដាក់ភ្ញៀវ
Driver was early and very nice. Great ride! Thanks.
Poor service. Didn’t use this company as the bus we were meant to get was cancel. And only told us once the 6:30 bus left with numerous seats left and could of easily fit us on.
We did not travel with Mekong as the ‘bus had broken down’ so had to go with another company...not happy at all.

This is my second time but never see any improvement. The schedule was late, the beds are narrow that can barely fit the whole body. On our departure, the bus was broken that led us to wait for hours to get a supplement van, but there was not enough space

Dear sir 
The trip was canceled more than a week before departure but I have still not received a refund. Please send me the money immediately.

The van was supposed to leave at 6:30am. Surprisingly it left at 7am. We did not get explanation as for why and no one told us we will be leaving late either. This was very disappointing.
The Wifi did not work when we crossed to Cambodia. I trusted that!
I wish you could tell the driver to be best at their driving cus lives cannot be trade in the market
Confortable seats in de bus
The aircondition was too cold in the bus, the driver was too enthusiastic with his horn
ឡានដូចចាស់ពេកហើយ

Customer buy ticket from your website is not treat fairly with others who buy ticket directly on counter. Chat ask for detail from online support, just to provide my ticket number and then get ignored.

Selected a pick up, our hotel was on the list provided, received an email saying it was rejected. Bus left late. Took 8 HOURS. Wasn't dropped at destination.Left stranded, had to take tuk tuk for an exorbitant price then stress over if we can get boat.

Crazy driving gets you there in 5-6hr. Van travel isn't great but no other option.  Stopped TEN times. Legroom is very tight, expect boxes under your feet/next to you. Overbooked vans, loud children, people talking (screaming) on phones, broken seat belt.

Comfortable van and great driver, however the ride took 8 hours at which point all passengers left the vehicle to walk to our destination as traffic was standstill. This was extremely inconvenient. Please advertise correct journey times.

Prompt! New vans = better leg room/AC but not all new so sit toward front. Small roach problem but not bad. Deliver huge amounts of boxes to remote towns so expect stops, falling boxes, stuff under feet. Very full bus plus many kids on laps... chaotic

The bus was good. It was a minivan with a side door. Sit in the middle, not in the back or the front ;) The back gets filled with bags. The driver was a little crazy, as they usually are, but he did get us there early! I'd recommend it.

Good service. The drivers go a little fast and do some risky manoeuvres, but it's normal in many bus companies here. The ride was quite comfortable. If you have luggage, get there early. Theres a great brew pub very close to this company's Siem Reap stop.

Sihanoukville - Phnomh Penh
Bus 1 hour late, they drove us in a small van + a car to reach it to avoid traffic. Then went the long way round on broken road for 60km. Should not seat 4 at the back for same price, very uncomfortable. Book front or middle.

Our supposedly 6hrs trip became almost 10hrs because of some bus issues. We were transferred to another bus but it only catered 16 passengers to seat and the rest stood up. We even waited for another bus for 2hrs.

There was no wifi while in Cambodia. I was looking forward to it. The van looked quite in disarray and not to the standards, not in cleanness and not in design. I am not sure why they were insisting of taking our passports in the Khmer border.
Did a good job considering the state of the road.Not for the faint hearted.?
Nice Driver ,but Please becareful and safety drive,too

Everyone was nice and helpful. I forgot my bag in the bus cause I wasn't sure if we would cross the border on the bus. But the people from the office contacted the driver and somebody brought my bag within 10 minutes. It was very helpful. Thanks a lot!

Overall very bad experience. The van is so packed. It shouldn't call VIP van. Bear in mind, there is no free WiFi, snacks and drinking water as stated in the booking page. Slow aircond, it is very hot sitting in the van for 7 hours.
it's a very comfortable trip

The bus started at 7am. The ticket said I should arrive at Siem Reap at 3pm. We reached at 6pm, because the Van took to many unnecessary stops to pick up people without ticket. I had a flight to catch and I barely made it.

ជិះឡានសាងបន្ត
អត់ចូលចិត្តសោះ
ឈប់ជិះហើយ លាហើយខេមបូត្រា
ភ្នំពេញមកប៉ោយប៉ែត
Fast trip, fast processing, was glad and surprise there is no additional charge
Mainly very pleased with the service and staff were very pleasant. The journey took longer than advertised.
The driver drived very fast & make most of the passengers feeling car sick

Went from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap - bus left on time, made a couple of stops on the way, the driver was reliable and drove safely. Overall a good experience and I would recomment this bus company. Cheers, Adela
Bus driver was a little crazy and had actually crashed the back of the bus and front of the bus into vehicles. The journey took close to 8 hours and is a horrendous journey. I would fly if you can.

This transport company did not provide what was advertised. We started in a CTT bus but were quickly asked to move to a horrible small bus without seatbelts and a leaking AC. It got us to where we needed but definitely would not recommend!!

The trip was long but on time. Our guide really help us with our visa arrangements at the borders. With complimentary biscuits and water. Dont forget to bring headset and something to make you busy while on trip. TV on bus not english.

The trip was long but on time. Our guide really help us with our visa arrangements at the borders. With complimentary biscuits and water. Dont forget to bring headset and something to make you busy while on trip. TV on bus not english.

The driver was nice.
Too bad he was not speaking english.
Good service
We use your bus regularly but this was the first time we didn’t have a toilet-the driver stopped regularly but it’s still better to have one in case of an emergency!

The road from Sisophon to Battambang is under construction and is a nightmare. The trip takes 4.5 hours from Siem Reap, rather than the 3 hours advertised. This is not the bus company's fault, but travelers should be warned.

The Van didn ‘t look at all as shown on the internet. Our Van was really old. 
Besides that, the driver was speeding at high risk for the passengers and the people on the street: 80 km where the limit was 40 and 110 km/h when the limit was 60!

Everything is good for my first experience trying this, only one thing that is annoying is the waiting at cross-border for Vietnamese officials to stamp on passport which outside of the company's control, I think.

Traffic in Sihanouk due to major growth makes 4 hr trip literally impossible. Google maps before you leave for accurate time. 4 hour trip took 8 hr with no breakdowns. Left at 8am and missed all island ferry’s. Sihanouk is a dump, awful accommodations

Driver was waiting for us in the Phnom Penh arrivals area, on time, in a visible spot, with my name on a card. Car was clean, well air conditioned, and modern. Driving was safe and direct. Driver helped with luggage into and out of the car.

Driver is very friendly. I was called to be ready in the lobby of the hotel before 09:45, but wife finished everything about 10:00, when we were in the lobby, the van was there and the driver welcomed us with a warmly smile.
ល្អគួរសម
Seats a little small for westerners but a pretty good value. Nice air conditioning.

Terrible service. When I phoned to confirm my bus collection time the previous evening, staff were unable to retrieve my booking despite me providing booking reference. Online help also failed. Had to rebook with different company in the end.
Car much snakker than expected. Driver did hardly say a Word. Ok but nothing more
Xe Hoa Mai là nổi tiếng lâu lắm rồi. Tôi hay đi Vũng Tàu công tác và đi chơi, chuyến nào tôi cũng chỉ đi duy nhất Hoa Mai. Chất lượng tốt, nhân viên lịch sự. Tôi rất hài lòng và sẽ tiếp tục ủng hộ
I really love Hoa Mai's luxury van. I spent about 1 hr and 30 mn to travel from Ben Thanh to Vung Tau with massage chair. Van moved fast but safe. The driver was very careful, and helpful.

The drivers are TERRIBLE. Our bus driver was typical of Vietnamese driving - no rules, no safety, high speed, dangerous passing, driving on the shoulder, talking on the phone, honking everyone out of the way.
ជារួមល្អអាចទទួលយកបាន
Super helpful drivers, who were very friendly and were very informative at the border crossing. Free tuk tuk was a lovely bonus aswell as the snacks along the journey.
Nice travel, good seats and arrived on time!

My trip was cancelled without previous notice. I arrived at the destination 5 hours later than I should have. I am never taking reservations with this company again. Very dissapointed. No punctuality, no WiFi, and seat belts stuck and thus not useful.
Fantastic driver,  punctual, considerate and speaks English well. Highly recommended transportation  between PHNOM  PHEN n Siam reap. Can hassle free prebook for airport pickup. Great service.
Slept the whole time to the Thai border. Great bus.

We decided to take the bus instead of flying from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh. The bus was very enjoyable, spacious, clean and we even did a lunch stop. Our bus was about 30 minutes late arriving in Phnom Penh but it was fine. I highly recommend it.
Polite, ontime, clean. Good value for money

Old mini van, crazy driving...even on the gravel of the wrong side of the road! The road was in terrible condition, why not take a different road? Aircon stopped working. Connections not explained at the border so we left some things in the mini van.

ខ្ញុំcallទៅមិនទទួលកក់ ឲ្យខ្ញុំកក់តាមApp រឺ Website តែពេលខ្ញុំកក់តាមWebsite មកដល់គ្មានលេខខ្ញុំ ខ្ញុំទិញតាមApp Bookmebus តែមកដល់នៅតែគ្មានកន្លែងឲ្យខ្ញុំដដែល សួរថាមានវិធីណាកក់ស្រួលជាងនេះទេ គាត់ថាគ្មានទេ ខ្ញុំត្រូវខក់ការធ្វើដំណើរ2ដងដោយសារពួកគាត់
Very good and polite driver but the aircon was not working so well
Xe chạy êm, tài xế tốt bụng hay nhắc khách xuống xe, nhưng mà có nhận hàng dọc đường, là đồ ăn nên cũng có mùi khó xịu xíu. Chắc lần sau em đi xe Limousine chắc an toàn hơn :D

Great experience. Left on time, good quality van, friendly and fast driver, and safe!
Best experience I had with a bus company in Cambodia.Very recommended

Absolute joke. Booked a ticket, bus doesnt show. Called them, an extremely arrogant and unfriendly man told me flat out there is no bus to Kep today and that they wont refund me. Avoid like the plague! Disgusting behavior and a sham of a company.

The vehicle is OK, nothing to say, but driver and the staff at the station, they all didn't speak English. They didn't even check my ticket, just glanced at my phone, and say "Go", I know that they are not good at English, but feel that not friendly.

The vehicle is OK, nothing to say, but driver and the staff at the station, they all didn't speak English. They didn't even check my ticket, just glanced at my phone, and say "Go", I know that they are not good at English, but feel that not friendly.
The service is good as usual.

The driver made far way many stops which was a waste of time. He filled up the gas and he didn’t stop the car machine and the passenger door was locked. It was not a good and safe experience. I won’t recommend the company to my friends. Please take action
One of the biggest let downs was that online it said it would take 4 hours for the journey, but in fact, it took 6 hours and a half. False advertising.

ទៅដល់គ្មានសំបុត្រឲ្យ(1A) ឲ្យដូរទៅ 11A ចុងក្រោយគេ គ្មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវ សួរគាត់ដែរ តែគាត់ថាទិញតាមAppចឹងហើយ មើលមិនទាន់ គ្មាដំណោះស្រាយល្អដល់ភ្ញៀវ នឹងមិនចង់និយាយជាមួយ រឺ ដោះស្រាយឲ្យ មានតែបង្ខំចិត្តយកកៅអី11A មិនហ៊ានទិញតាមApp នេះទៀតទេ
2 hours of late, it was single beds and not bed for 2 people and there were too much air conditionning

The Bus was 45 minutes to late to pick me up. More people in the Bus then seats. Lunch stop Charge you tourist price and beggers came to me at every stop. 2 hrs more than said on the booking. Had the seat at the door and woke up when someone need to goout

Honestly the most uncomfortable 6 hours of my life. The bus driver drove like a mad man breaking suddenly and driving so fast, the seats were so small I couldn’t actually move my legs and the air con was minimal. Never using this service ever again.

Private taxi from PP to Kampot and back. Reasonable price, but the service might be better, drivers keep talking on the phone, even in zero visibility conditions. Delays on the way due to package deliveries. The driver couldn't stop for toilet for over 1h
The tyre exploded during the trip and we need to wait almost one hour in the road.
1 Hour to late, we all had not enough space. too many people in the minivan!!!
All in all ok experience. But the driver dosnt speek english, so there is no information at All.
good service
កន្លែង​គេង​សុទ្ធ​តែ​ដី​និង​ ទទួល​ការ​កក់​ច្រឡំ​កៅ​អី។
កន្លែង​គេង​សុទ្ធ​តែ​ដី​និង​ ទទួល​ការ​កក់​ច្រឡំ​កៅ​អី។
Communication about stops (e.g. toilet stops) would have been appreciated but the trip was otherwise fine for the first leg. Bus for second leg arrived late.
I don’t understand the bad comments! We left Kampot on time and arrived at Sihanoukville on time. A/C worked well and our driver was great !

The overall ride was good, the bus ride was smooth, the staff was very respectful and helpful and the bus depart and arrive on time. The bus stop is a gas station to go to the toilet and is a restaurant for lunch. I recommend this bus line.

the bus was very different from the photo on the site, the seats were narrow and without armrests. there were no outlets. There was no escort at the border, which was also promised, they just gave out a badge and told where to go. I and two girls lost.

My seat belt was broken and unusable.
The wheel balance of the tire was broken and the vibration was severe.
Would be nice with an explanation of what to do at the Cambodian / Vietnamese border (before we arrived at the border).
The bus was to hot, and the driver never informed us about nothing, he stop for ate in the morning in the middle of the travel.

bus was one hour late departing 
bus was full of young group of people who
drank to the point of intoxication and made   the bus stop twice so they could urinate.
bus arrived at destination 1 hour and 45 minutes late. As a result we missed our ferry .

Far from a VIP bus. In fact this was the worst bus experience we had in SEA. Small cramped seats with little leg room. There were so many additional bags and boxes that you couldn’t put your feet on the floor. Air Con was barely working. Never book!!
អ្នក​បើក​បរ​ចាប់​ម៉ូយ​តាម​ផ្លូវ​ ​ងាក​ឈប់​ៗ

I was very pleased with our van trip from Phnom Penh to Battambang. Our driver was very careful and drove safely. We had to get the tyre changed on the way and we still made pretty good time. The trip took 7 and a half hours instead of 7hrs.
All good

The driver was always searching for new clients At everything corner to make extra dollars for himself (3 clients). It took longer to get to Kampot for that reason and because of the construction. Driver would’nt want to talk in English (just some words)

The driver was waiting patiently despite my flight being delayed and he soon had me on my way to my hotel.
The car was comfortable (Honda Prius) and extremely clean.
The driver was safe and very polite.  I would definitely use the service again
Thank you so much for our smooth trip and nice driver.

I booked on line one month before trip but when I
went to boatd the bus I was told they had not received the internet booking and the bus was full. I had to wait 2 hours for the next bus.
Unacceptable.
The bus driver was excellent and the service was efficient.
Seats are not good as well as the air conditioning are very hot. We were stranded right after we across the border of Vietnam and Kingdom of Cambodia for almost an hour due to aircon fan belt.

I do love Seila Angkor transports services, the van are not old and the drivers drive not too fast and too low, they know the situations of the roads and traffic. The price is suitable, feel comfortable to choose this company. Highly recommended ☺️☺️
The 8 hour journey actually took 11 hours. 3 hours over is really unacceptable

The trip was good and so much better than when we read about it in the internet. The bus was confortable, clean with a good ac working well. The driver was arrogant and serious rude most of the time. Looks he didn't liked to be there.
Very bad! We got removed from the bus at the Vietnam border. Just left there alone with no help at all. Not good!
Beds too small. Bus old and slow. Bad experience at the border. Will not use again

The bus is  in good condition. The seats are comfortable for this journey. Aircon is a bit weak during daytime but comfy in the evening. Driver is good. Road is overall fine but mostly 2 lane and there is a lot of traffic. We are delayed by 2 hours.

A poir quality vAn came without aircon first. After we reported, a second van was sent and it took 1.45hrs. During this time, we were in the first car. Due to this whole incident, we were late to reach destination

The driver is nice compare to most of drivers in Cambodia. The seat is comfy. He made one stop for guests to have a break and eat breakfast. But the food’s quite overpriced consider the restaurant without AC in the middle out of no where. Overall good
I have booked for return also but cant use the 15% code and there is no pick up service in Ho Chi Minh according to your staff...very sad
Aircon is not good.
overbooked, no leg room because of luggage
Not happy they wifi is offer and rhe vann has no wifi
Driver was very safe, professional, and friendly.
What I didn’t like is the fact that we need to pay 2dollars if first time to enter Cambodia. I didn’t know what that for. They said for the stamp! I don’t get it.
Overall it was good.
Manque un peu de fraicheur avec la clim 1 pause impeccable

The driver was extremely rude. Our pick up was 830 yet he arrived 810 and was in an obvious bad mood. He stopped with no explanation as to why or for how long. He was appalling. No customer service! I would not recommend.
Very comfortable journey
I book vip (11seats) company give me ride another bus . Driver always talk phone with his girlfriend while driving . Bad experience ever .
The seller in Battambang is very rude. No customer service skill.
Why the driver stop and take any others customer a lot of places? Is that you serve the ticket VIP customers?
Be warned if you are a tall person. There is very little leg room, and even less of the person in front of you leans their seat back. I managed by stretching out in the isle down the middle.
The bus is comfortable,cool,fast and the driver is so sweet
Good service ??
Driver arrived well before the agreed time, travel was without any problems, we had safe travel from PP to our hotel in Kampot
Driver arrived on time to pick us at the hotel, the car was good, we had safe travel from Kampot to PP, only in the end the driver took a wrong road to PP which caused a delay of approx. 45 minutes

Hi, we took a mini van from Phnom Penh to SIakhounville. The van was ok and left on time.However, the driver drove really fast during the whole trip. Next time, I will take a big bus, I guess it is much safer
No seatbelts!
Wifi didn't work but otherwise all good, leg room, toilet, on time, convenient pick-up from hotel
Amazing service and friendly driver.  Would definitely use again.
Very nice business trip with good services on the bus
Took the same van twice. The first time has quite a good experience, but the second time, driver took a very high speed.

មិនគោរពពេលវេលា
ទិញសំបុត្រឡានថ្លៃហេីយសេវាកម្មឡេីងអន់ខ្លាំងបំផុត
ថ្ងៃក្រោយឈប់ជិះហេីយ
ទិញសំបុត្រថ្លៃថាបានគេងស្រួលគ្មាទេគឺលំបាក

Although I never felt in danger, I would have preferred the driver not to be on his phone as much. His vehicle was clean, but we had to stop for repairs. We also weren't given an option of lunch but simply pulled into somewhere that cost $17 for lunch
No reminding call from the company (BTB). The staff at BTB office is quite rude. The van driver could not be reached. All in all, poor service. It was the worst experience for me.

Our bus driver was rude, our journey was much longer than it was suppose to be. We had no inspector. It was not the VIP van we had booked and paid for. We kindly asked for a refund as a result of this and basically been told to get lost.

PP-Kampot. Advertised as 3.5 hours direct, actually via Kep and 5 hours. Your fare facilitates a parcel/favour delivering service for the driver. Second leg was operated by a young upstart who used his phone the entire time and nearly caused an accident.

Worst driver ever, picked up and dropped off random customers along the way, asked them over price, foul mouth, disrespectful. Drove super fast and care less (I prayed if i can survived). Don't use this company or you will be too disappointed
The seat is not comfortable
The trip tool longer than expected because we had to pick up guests several times in Phnom Penh and because we made two longer stops along the way. The driver tried to drive as fast as possible so he

Départ légèrement en retard mais arrivée à l'heure prévue. Climatisation ok. 
Le point négatif : le chauffeur ne parle pas anglais et bus fort bruyant (musique du chauffeur, appels sur haut-parleur,...)

Horrible experience! The driver did not respect the passengers wish to drive more carefully, he just «hushed» us and kept on. Passing all cars in 120km/h in dark with cars coming towards. I had middle seat burning my ass and no seatbelt! Glad i’m alive.

Driver was looking down at his phone for most of the trip and nearly caused several accidents. He was driving aggressively and using the horn several times per minute even when he was in the wrong. Cambodia roads are too dangerous to drive like this.
Terrible trip. I got dissapointed of Mekong express.

The departure was late 30min. They sent bus instead of minivan. The bus tyres were worn. The bus break down after a few kilometer and need to wait long for the replacement bus. It is not the conpany fault but roadworks. So a 3 hour journey become 7 hour
La conduite n'était pas très sécurisante, le conducteur cherchant à doubler tout le temps mais nous avons eu bien pire le lendemain. Pause de 30 minutes dans un restaurant à Pursat.

The Nattakan service was very good before. At the moment it is a disaster with an old bus, full of merchandise, very dirty, without water, without WC, without instructions to cross de borer and without English speaking staff.

Boardingpoint was not correct.
We booked a VIP-Van and got a bad bus.
The drivetime was confirmed from 1 p.m. to 4 p.m.
We drove from 2 p.m. to 7:30 p.m. (!)
Everything is fine except the bus is a bit old.
Aircon in car is nit working at all

Arriving late into Phnom Penh and almost getting ripped off by local operator, Book me Bus got us onto bus leaving 7:30 am without a drama at unreal price including Ferry. Bus a bit ordinary but super comfortable and the real adventure. Highly recommended

You did not email me the confirmation of booking so I could not catch the bus. You simply took my money and ran. Appalling and disgraceful. Words can't describe how I feel about you but needless to say you get a Zero recommendation for me !!!!

You did not email me the confirmation of booking so I could not catch the bus. You simply took my money and ran. Appalling and disgraceful. Words can't describe how I feel about you but needless to say you get a Zero recommendation for me !!!!

Bus annulé car trop peu de réservation. On nous a mis dans 1 autre bus qui partait à la même heure mais au lieu de mettre 8h nous avons mis 11h pour aller de mondulkiri à siem reap. Pas un mot d excuse ou un geste commercial de leur part. À éviter.

Bus annulé car trop peu de réservation. On nous a mis dans 1 autre bus qui partait à la même heure mais au lieu de mettre 8h nous avons mis 11h pour aller de mondulkiri à siem reap. Pas un mot d excuse ou un geste commercial de leur part. À éviter.
Driver did a good job. Nice driving but poor conditioner.
Best

We came to the station and were told that our departure hasn't been scheduled in a while and Bookmebus has been informed many times yet hasn't removed the departure from their website. Champa Mekong refunded the fare and we took a taxi to the airport.

We were scared by the critics but our trip went perfectly, the driver managed to get us on perfect time to our destination. The seats were not the most confortable ever but very ok, and the ac was perfect. 
Would recommend easily
Journey was terrible for first half as the road was completely in a state of repair for the first two+ hours.

It was a very bad trip (Kampong Chnang to Phnom Penh on 16th July at 2 PM). The driver was the worth we ever had in all our trips, he drives very fast and so dangerous. Don't take this company (we paid more to have a good company but it wasn't at all).

It was a very bad trip (Kampong Chnang to Phnom Penh on 16th July at 2 PM). The driver was the worth we ever had in all our trips, he drives very fast and so dangerous. Don't take this company (we paid more to have a good company but it wasn't at all).
Ok for the price
Amazing trip thanks to everyone involved.

Trip from Battambang to Phnom Phen, driver was very fast, efficient and safe, best driver yet! However the French woman boarded at 2pm Kampong Chnang,bwas awful and harassed the driver making it unsafe as she was sick and demanded numerous extra stops.
Bad service
The driver drove WAY too fast. We’ve had speedy drivers but this was something else. Don’t drive recklessly with so many passengers. We even saw a crash and that did stop him.
The driver drove WAY too fast. We’ve had speedy drivers but this was something else. Don’t drive recklessly with so many passengers. We even saw a crash and that did stop him.
Everything good but had only one stop during 6 hours of travel and the stop wasnt nice..
Oringial bus cancelled 2 hours before departure, replacement was late and much slower, almost doubling journey time.

9am was cancelled, likely due to lack of passengers. Pick up at hotel was botched and we had to take a last minute tuk tuk. We waited at the office near the steak place which was a dump. Then they took us in a van to another port 15 min away.
ちょっと狭かったかもですが、プノンペンに着く頃、ホテルの場所がわからずにおりましたら、ドライバーさんが事務所の通る道の近くまで乗せてもらい、無事トゥクトゥクに乗せてもらい到着できました。また利用させてください。宜しくお願いいたします。

Good driver, nice mini van. I was travelling with my 2 sons and husband. The van had very, very, very little space for the long leggs of the guys. 
Happily not al the seats were booked so we could take some more seats to put the leggs in front.
Driver was 30 mins late and brought a friend with him on the journey. Driver also tried to take secret photos on his phone of my girlfriend!!!
It was a really comfortable journey, made better by friendly staff. We were even half hour early at the destination.
Ready and waiting outside at the pickup time and location.  A smooth ride, good car and got us to the airport earlier than expected.  Very good service, I can recommend this company

The driver didn't show up and no phone numbers worked. We used WhatsApp to finally get the driver to show up and he was angry about being tired and hungry. He made us extremely late to our destination. The car was dirty and there was minimal room for bags
Five star experience...!!!

The driver was very good and accomodating.
Everyone tried there best the help.
So this is good.
The bosses are getting a bit older now. Even just keeping them clean would help.

I was sitting between tons of cartons and packages and had nearly place at my feed. What does they smuggle from Vietnam to Cambidia I ask myself. The bus was an old, dirty vehicle.But the trip was ok. The inspector helps us, to cross the border fluently.
Good bus but the driver was rude, stopped every hour for a break and also drove like a lunatic!

We never meant to offend the staff, but they should understand that giving our passports away to a stranger is just something we cannot do. His rude reaction made it even worse. Travel rule nr.1 is to never lose your most valuable property out of sight.
no comment but its better that the driver knows a little english.
Great driver. Very helpful and even though we had bad traffic and saw someone that was hit by a truck I felt very safe with him driving. Hats off to Cambodian drivers, it was crazy.

Terrible experience. AC smells so bad. Space is not enough to stretch the feet.
Even the staff at the terminal was damn rude. Never use this one anymore.
Driver drove bus very slow, so bus took 2 hours more to reach Siem Reao

Over email they are polite - but I’m unsure if that’s the bookmebus people or Buva Sea, I called into the Buva Sea office on Koh Rong and I was treated like dirt. The man fobbed me off and ignored me when I was asking further questions. Not impressed.
It was a good ride with a small hiccup - flat tire which was fixed quickly

Driver stopped regularly and did not tell passengers what was going on. AC vents were broken and could not direct the airflow effectively. Very cramped for room and made worse by bags being stored under seats. Won't travel Bayon VIP bus again.

It was overall a save trip to Phonm Penh, but i wish they could have 2 stops for the bathroom usage. We were urgently need the bathroom and the driver was told that they might not have the second stop because it is dark.Actually it was 7 pm at that time.

Bus was nice and air conditioned. Comfortable ride with plenty of stops so we didn’t need to use the on board WC. We were running late and were able to call and they held it for us for 10 minutes. Boarder crossing was a little confusing but we made it.
Ok so the 4 hour journey actually took 6 hours, however the traffic was really bad and the heavy rain caused delays. Overall I was happy with the journey though

Très bon service pour aller de Bangkok à poipet en 5h de route avec un arrêt repas. Passage rapide de la frontière si vous y prenez votre visa. Nous avons enchaîné la route pour battambang avec la même compagnie en voiture privée pour 25$ par personne.

We hooked bus inclusief return ferry Koh Rong. We dus not receiver tickets die the boat and at least the let us on the boat ranking picture of the mail of reservatiin. We stoel neef to go back nu boat to Sihaknouville but donut of the let us on the boat .
Good driver, ferry was delayed and waited 2 hrs for us. Provided water and toilet breaks too.
It was terrible. I have been shocked the conditions of your vans. I will never recommend your company.
The driver has bad attitude. Too much delay and stop too much along the road to pick up more customers.

Poor service. Ladies at the service desk are very rude and don't care about their clients at all. We bought our seats online  but then we arrived these seats were already sold out to another person. What the fuck?

Comfy van, smooth trip.
The only things is that they dropped us off in a different place than the one displayed on the ticket, a little bit further out from the city.
But overall totally recommended.
I booked no 7 but at the end i got no 14

The driver was pretty good considering the traffic and the state of the road especially just out of S'ville.  The van was completely loaded up to the hilt though which made it pretty squashed for everyone. Driver communication to us was not good though.

I missed my departure time because the  tuk tuk was late. I had to pay for another one way trip. Received no receipt just a tag around my neck. It was taken away so no proof. Was told get off at the wrong stop. Ended paying USD 30 to get a ferry to my pla

I missed my departure time because the  tuk tuk was late. I had to pay for another one way trip. Received no receipt just a tag around my neck. It was taken away so no proof. Was told get off at the wrong stop. Ended paying USD 30 to get a ferry to my pla
Very uncomfortable seats, not enough room, very old van and dirty. The driver was careless and dangerous and the journey was very unpleasant. Too expensive for the service
Overall was good but the AC was not working at all. I was literally sweat since I first got into the van. ?
The driver was very fast and risky, but we arrived alive and on time, so it was OK in the end.

Van PP to SR (2-8pm). On time departure & arrived earlier. Wifi is good. Disappointed on the Siem Reap terminal stop as it was stated in booking that it's ME office 1 (nearer to my hotel) but they stopped in ME office 2 so I have to avail of tuktuk :(

Whole experience felt very sketchy. 

Showed email address on phone. Walked out of airport to dark street to get car. Got in car with another driver. Car broke down. Switched cars in a pitch black road. 

Thankfully arrived safely but did feel dodgy!

Booked bus SR to PP for 7pax. But they gave us minivan instead of our desired bus. Trip was smooth and okay BUT this is 2nd time in 3days that they don't give us exactly what we planned and booked online. Don't trust what their website indicates.

Booked a bus PP to HCM for 7pax (6hrs) but travel took 8hrs with so many stops in first 2hrs to pick up paxs for vacant seats. Also, inspector asking 75usd for the actual 50usd stamping fee for my new business visa so I just processed it by myself.
The place was so hot. They asked me to switch from my place to the back of the bus. I couldn't sleep the whole night. They also picked passenger along the road
The driver was late by an hour. Very disappointed
Punctuation
Bus was an hour late, they kept lying about when it would show up, no wifi like promised, refused to give us our money back. Trip took 6.5 hrs instead of the promised 4.

A/C was barely working and dripping. The driver reminded me of my fathers road rage where everybody slower is an idiot and everybody faster a maniac. We made it to our destination nearly 1,5 hours earlier than planned. Typical Cambodian bus experience.
Good driver .Trip was ok  Arrived BTB at 2.10 so good time .Always more 5.1/2 hours .never 5 hours .
No wifi in the vans do not lie to customers second time I buy and always excuses why is not working

Driver was a very nice man, however we were very disappointed in 2 aspects of the “service” that were advertised. We paid an extra $8 to take the bus that’d get us to Sihanoukville in 4hrs and had WiFi on board. It took 6hrs and there was no WiFi.

Driver was a very nice man, however we were very disappointed in 2 aspects of the “service” that were advertised. We paid an extra $8 to take the bus that’d get us to Sihanoukville in 4hrs and had WiFi on board. It took 6hrs and there was no WiFi.
I don’t know why the travel time was listed as 4 hours. It is not a good estimation for the passengers. It took nearly 7 hours. Be more realistic when advertising the travel time.

Minibus avec peu de climatisation et pas de wifi. On est arrivé 1h en retard à la destination finale. 
Bien mais sans plus
The bus was late

I was doubtful about this trip due to the largely negative reviews and older feedback from guide books, they are wrong.  This was a good trip, it left all but on time, 3 seats per width of bus meant the most comfortable bus seat I’ve ever sat on.

Not as comfortable in the VIP van as it was in your bus on the journey to Battambang, but we knew we were booking a van as opposed to the bus due to timetable and we wanted to experience both.  The unofficial local pickups and sitting in isle left me cold
Excellent experience, very goid service!
First time to try overnight bus. Surreal! It was an amazing experience! I slept soundly throughout the travel!
We have to change cars after crossing the border of Cambodia. Our driver was a fast driver but a happy driver. one hiccup was our aircon was not working on the first leg of the journey. It was hot!
First time to booked an overnight bus! It was an amazing experience! I slept throughout our trip. The bed was comfortable enough and AC is working. No WIFI in the bus though.
Very bad, aircon no work.

Arrived in PP safely and with good time, but the driver stopped 3 times to pick up extra passengers, making the already cramped bus more cramped. Stopped at a ridiculously expensive restaurant, went across the road to the market instead ?
The pick up and drop off points are convenient. The driver is very nice and he can speak English. It's very safe to travel by Cambodia Post.
The way from Siem Reap to Ho chi minh was fast, comfortable.

the good thing: the company came to pick us up at the hotel. 
Negative points: we left with an hour late, the trip was much longer than expected and the air conditioning vent was broken
Great seats but no USB charger on the seats with two

We had a mini van booked for 1:30, turned up early as requested, got told it was coming at 2. A lot more people turned up who had been waiting since 12 elsewhere. We were all put on a big bus at around 3pm with just enough room for everyone.

The customer service is excellent via email and phone. We could get the bus at a stop convenient to us (At the airport). Once at the final destination they took care of us to make sure we could get to our place safely.

The Van was super full. There were no place for luggage. My bag was stepped on because it had to be placed inside the van (not the booth). Super uncomfortable seats, no leg room. The driver was very reckless with a lot of sudden breaks. Didn’t enjoy it
ដាក់មនុស្សតាមផ្លូវរហូត
The driver was OK. The bus had badly damaged rear suspension on van 51 that meant that we felt every bump on the road. The rear springs looked sprung to me. Thanks.
Bus was early arriving.
The best bus I ever had

Tout s'est passé comme prévu. Horaires respectés, van confortable climatisé. Ils nous ont accompagné jusqu'au passage de la frontière et nous ont fourni un taxi privé pour rejoindre battambang. Rien à reprocher.
Actually we’d booked the trip for 10:30a.m. in your office we got the info, our bus would depart at 12:30p.m. We were asked if nobody inform us about this. So we had to wait more than 2hours.

Mekong Express is by far the best bus/van company in Cambodia. The seats are the most roomy, the vehicle always leaves on time and doesn’t have unpredictable stops, it’s very clean. It is worth the few extra dollars it costs if you want a seamless ride.
There was no AC!

The was in a bad condition, so we werde 30 min late. It's better to be warned. The seats i booked weren't available, there was no seat 5D. So we had to ask other Passengers to change seats. Also the AC was very, very weak. Wasn't a good experience.
SAFE AND SOUND!
SAFE AND SOUND!
The driver drove very fast

We travelled between Phnom Penh and Siem Reap on the VIP van, and it went smoothly. The bus left on time, the drivers were courteous (though their driving can be a little scary when they are overtaking other cars), and most importantly, the AC worked!
Aircon is not that okay. No detailed instructions for foreigners on what to do.
The driver was safe, the bus was comfortable. We left PP at 2.20pm and arrived in SR at 7pm. Excellent trip, excellent service ?
បើកបរល្អ

Overbooked bus - we were all packed in the minivan + then it stopped every km or 2 km for about one hour and a half to drop the passengers, it was very hot in the bus, little space for legs, departed late, and stopped by Kampot (not announced)
Driver was texting and talking on the phone. He also did his hair multiple times while driving. It felt very unsafe as a passenger in his van.

Van offered free bottle water and 2 stop overs. Driver was safely driving in a typical south east Asian style.   Ride between both cities takes 5-6 hours so if you are pressed for time the schedule should consider the added traffic to let passengers plan.

Van offered no bottle water and 1 stop overs. Driver was safely driving in a typical southeast Asian style.   Ride between both cities takes 5-6 hours so if you are pressed for time the schedule should consider the added traffic to let passengers plan.

Is good, only receptionist at PP branch near night market. Look at the phone all the time (time around 8:40am, date 23/July) I walked in book the ticket.
Told me to download the company app. I asked: Is Catmekong app, “yes”
Correct: Mekong Express.

Thr trip to Phnom Penh from Siem Reap took only about 5 hours. This was due to the ridiculously fast driving style of the driver. We could not rest during the trip, because of the constant pulling up and braking again. So, not pleasant but fast
មានផាសុខភាពខ្លាំងពេលធ្វើដំណើរ
Good trip with no problems
Good comfortable ride (booked two seats)
The bus got in the terminal so late! Really bad service!
Amazing inspectress. Shes very friendly and helpful. Schedule is on time and have not experienced any issues. Seats are comfortable and charging ports were available.
호치민에소 프눔펜 가는버슨데 현지인들이 타는버스라 그런지 아무런 안내고뭐고 눈치껏 하셔야합니다. 영어 잘 하면 상관 없긴 할듯...

To help with understanding, it would be good if someone explained that our passports would be collected and taken away by a man on a scooter to help cross the Vietnam border. This would reduce the stress of giving your passport to a stranger.

This was a great way to cross Cambodia! The driver was courteous and careful, and it was nice to see the countryside. I also appreciate the potty breaks and the lunch stop!

(What is an inspector? I'm not sue what I'm rating, here.)
Everything great.
I requested an E visa. The inspector got me a tourist visa. I'm perfectly capable of filling out my own visa application. Your service is backward and stupid. I won't be returning with Khainam again.
The driver was fast , but they made many stops. The seat was a little uncomfortable.
Only 30 min journey so was ok but it seems all of the transport of this company is really old and uncomfortable
When I got the the station I was told no bus was booked for me even though I had the receipt from BookMeBus. Eventually, the minivan arrived, we were more people than seats, AC not working
all was well organized and completed.

Le chauffeur a d'abord téléphoné une heure trente voire deux heures à sa copine. Ça avait l'air d'être une conversation sympa ! Moi je ne dormais pas. Ensuite il a adoré klaxoné toutes les cinq minutes histoire de s'assurer que cela durerait. Bref...

Due to a medical emergency I had to cancel the tickets. I could not change/exchange the tickets
Your website says  ticket changes have to be within 48 hours
Your ticket agent said changes had to be made at least 24 hours before departure
Great service
Very impolite driver and un-organized company. The van is old and seat are narrow, the aircon is hot!!! They add chairs in the car and stop everywhere he wanted too. Bad company, never try.
Departure on time, not bad.
Front row seating is tight and with no push back option, sitting in upright 5-6 hours is really tiring.

The trip was fast and easy. However the AC was not working and it was a pretty tight fit. It is the most convenient choice between Siem Reap and Battambang so we will ride again, but expected more space and comfort.
The condoctor dont know How to speak in English.. if you will ask them they dont know what is the answer because they dont understand English

I Will Never use it again. 
No more Words needed
On time. Comfortable seats and good working A/C.

The driver was constantly looking at his phone while driving, and often made dangerous overtakes... my seat belt was broken, the buses consistently left 30 minutes late on three journeys, the buses were quite old and not very comfortable for long journeys

I did not travel on your bus because I tried to change days for travel but your staff said it was too difficult so kept my money and gave me nothing. I wanted to change booking and book four more seats as well but too hard they said. I would like my money
Very good and comfortable trip. Wifi would stop working from time to time but not a big deal. Overall great experience

When we arrived we were told our bus was cancelled and got put on a mini bus at an earlier time in back squishy row. Deliberately booked the bus based on front seats due to travel sickness. They could not accommodate due to every other seat already full

2ieme mini van de cette compagnie que nous avons réservé et qui a été annulé... Aucune information de leur part. On nous a mis dans un mini van d une autre compagnie qui partait 1h après. /!\ Compter 6h-7h pour relier sihanoukville-Phnom Penh et non 4h!!!
Very pleasant trip from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap in a 11 seats private van. The driver drove very safely
This is the worst trip ever.  We were stucked for almost 2 hours without any notice. The driver should have checked the condition of the van before traveling.
Good

Hello, good minivan. I got off at Kampong Thom from Siem Reap. 
Didn’t know how to go about buying a ticket to there, so had to buy one to Phnom Pehn but get off early.

This was an overnight sleeping bus. I wish that I had known that there are 2 persons to a bunk (sleeping space) when I booked my trip. I was fortunate in that no one else had booked the other sleeping space in my bunk.

I contacted Bayon VIP telling them I felt unsafe and the driver was going 110km. They told me the speedometer was wrong and I should calm down. Then I tracked it with my own speedometer that said 123km which was what the van speedometer was saying.

Very poor service. Rude staff. Totally unnecessary $2 paid to the service staff for presenting the passport at the border. It’s a skam. Bus is uncomfortable, aircon too much, wifi broke down after 30 mins. I wouldn’t recommend it to my worst enemy.
The speed and overall experience is great

posted 4 hours trip .... over 6 hours and 45 mins total time 
2 stops .... seats to small ... no wifi 
never use again ...... the worst

ទិញកៅលេខនេះអោយអង្គុយកៅអីលេខផ្សេង
ម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ម្ដងបេីកម្ដងបិទ។
Plan on 6 hour commute on any van line from Phnom Penh to Sihanookville. Traffic, construction and stops is normal. Do not book your connecting rides/ferry based on 4 hours.
Plan on 6 hour commute between Phnom Penh  and Sihanookville on any van line. There is always traffic, construction  and multiple stops. Ride on Cambodia post is reliable with working a/c.
This was my second time travelling in Mekong Express.minivan. I appreciated the overall experience including hotline service. I would recommend it
Our Driver did his best to kill us on the way he was erratic and over the speed limit for 90% of the time
Excellent transport service between Phnom Penh and Siem Reap. Quick and painless check-in process, comfortable and clean mini-van bus, and an excellent driver.
I booked this bus because I wanted my own bed, but then then they told me that there was something wrong with the bus and that I will have to share with someone. Not a comfortable trip.
The vans were full with noisy people who always talk a lot. The car smells not nice. There’s full of stuffs from the passengers. I feel it was more like a normal bus than the VIP vans.

Service was OK. But the driver tried to plug an extra US$10 for himself arguing that my final destination - the jetty for Alila at Koh Russey - was not specified in my request. It was. It's not about the money; it's the attitude.

The bus had a bad smell. Chairs could not be reclined. The driver and inspector were not welcoming. They were very snobbish and not helpful. Connecting bus from Phnom Penh to Ho Chi Minh didn't know what to do with my e-booking and told me to go back Siem

I arrived to find that they had cancelled the boat service 2 weeks earlier, not contacted any of the passengers who had prebooked online (like myself).  The lady at the GTVC desk was asleep and just shouted when I asked for her help.
Driver pick up passengers many times on the way. Someone over speed, I didn’t feel comfortable.

I searched for a Trip from the 2nd to the 3rd. As top Choice i was presented a Bus starting at Midnight which i booked. Coming to the bus I was informed, that I booked the bus of yesterday - Bad luck.
Late departure.  Driver stop to eat after 1,5 hours during 30 minutes, we have to wait 45 minutes. We arrived 1 hour delayed. No Wi-Fi in the bus, but it was announced with. Smalls seats

The seat I was staying was the most uncomfortable seat ever. It was the seat just next to the driver. I could not move or sleep or do nothing. It would be nice to be informed before. I was a girl staying in between Two man. Driver was helpful.
Don't communicate that the bus takes 4 hours while you know in advance it is going to take 6.5 hours!
អ្នក​បេីកបរ​ ឈប់​ទទួល​អ្នក​ដំណើរ​ច្រើន​ពេក​ ។
The office where we waited were friendly and watched my bags so I get food, driver helped with bags etc. half way stop was a good location. Bus was clean and on time.

Shame ! Canceled the departure. the staff disrespectful, they threatened me ! Badly polite, they yelled at me when I was just asking when we were leaving. and finally they insulted me. dangerous driver. this is a scam. Please avoid this company.
Staff are friendly and accommodating. The bus a bit old but inside is okay.
Bus arrived over an hour later than expected so missed on going travel

Our driver was punctual, just enough stops for bathroom breaks, stopped for lunch at a beautiful restaurant, which was a nice surprise. The only reason I have a 4* for the driver (and he was great) is he was talking on the phone almost the whole way.
The bus was not very clean, the glass of the front window broken and fixed with scotch, the AC hardly worked, the wifi wasnt available.
too slow for long distance. But okie.

No Transparency! Company doesn’t  have office at Poi Pet. A Taxi picked us after departure time to get on the van at BMC. In stead of using regular van, Siena was used in stead. Anyway, Driver did perform well in order to bring us in time but too speedy?!
Great trip!
Satisfaction
It was annoying when the driver picked up some other customers along the street without any tickets, and he just took the money from them.
Seem less responsible
Everything was ok but WiFi did not work. Very small leg space in a3,a4 and a5
Good
GREAT SERVICE. Our pick up waited for us while our accommodation took ages to sorted out an issue with their eftpos machine. Ride was comfy, clean and exactly want you would want.

Car too old
And no AC in car
Good and comfortable trip.
Very good service, comfortable and fast trip!
The journey took much longer than advertised.
WiFi connection on the bus should be stable connection.

The bus were clean and relatively comfortable. We left and arrive on time. The drivers on both ways however were driving recklessly (stupidly fast, overtaking everything so frequently driving on the wrong side of the road, and honking constantly).

No Transparency! Company doesn’t have office at Poi Pet. Taxi picked us after departure time to get on the van at BMC. In stead of using regular van, Siena was used in stead. Anyway, Driver did perform well in order to bring us in time but too speedy?!
pick up guest along the street. waste time in travelling.
Very good. A bit hard for viberation

The driver was friendly and helpful. He is a good driver and I could tell he has control of the vehicle. There were people along the road who asked to add two extra unscheduled passengers,  but the driver refused, which I think was good policy.

The van was very punctual and clear communication was given about which van to take. There were enough stops at places where we could be refreshed or get food. I felt safe with the excellent driver, who was friendly and helpful. Aircon was a bit too cold.
None of the Poipet staff spoke English which made communication very difficult, especially as the office is not where the map says it is and a driver had to pick me up to go to the next town over.
The AC being so chill we could use a warmer blanket or a raise in the AC temperature by 1-2 degrees.  Rest all is very good service.
លើកនេះធ្វើឲ្យខ្ញុំអន់ចិត្តខ្លាំងបំផុតដែលឲ្យខ្ញុំរងចាំមួយម៉ោងជាង , ដែលត្រូវធ្វើដំណើរចេញនៅម៉ោង 3:30 pm តែត្រូវរងចាំរហូតដល់ម៉ោង4:51 pm ។ សង្ឃឹមថាលើកក្រោយមិនដូចលើកនេះទៀតចុះ។

Bus was late due to rain, but at one point broke down and when it was fixed, left the 3 girls who had gotten off without trying to wait for them (came back to get them 5 mins later). Trip from Sihanoukville to Kampot was 4 hours, not 2. No pit stop made.
Good jouney considering adverse weather and some bad road surfaces
The bus arrived 3h late
I booked bus but no bus on mini van. I don’t know why !!!
ខ្ញុំ​កក់​ឡាន​ក្រុង​ តែបែជា​ ឡាន​តូចទៅវិញ​។  អត់​យល់​?
Please make the seat belts work.

Driver honked consistently - felt like it was nonstop the whole 4-5 hours. Also road conditions were bad and the drive felt slightly unsafe, but we also still ended up getting back late. Not sure which is preferred.
Air Conditioner was broken one hole, but that’s good experienced

The trip was good. Driver was safe and got us to Siem Reap a little early. My seat did not have a functioning seatbelt - this is important and should be fixed. The van was in good condition otherwise. One of the passengers powm in the van.

Car interior was nice, but air con wasn’t working well enough so i felt like I didn’t have enough air to breath. Driver drove recklessly. Too fast and passing every vehicle with high speed. I was so car sick, slid off my chair a lot, and felt unsafe.
Pick up, Fahrt, Pausen ohne Probleme. Der Bus hat zwar schon bessere Zeiten gesehen  habe mich trotzdem sicher und gut aufgehoben gefühlt.
The aircon wasn’t working.
It took 4 hours longer and nobody explained to me.

Many stops on the way out of Phnom Penh. Took the long route through Kep so at least 5 hours driving time. Driver caused an accident with a motorcycle. 3 passengers on the moto had leg injuries but we waited an hour for them to pay for the damages. AVOID!

Your staff and drivers are the very kindest nicest guys I usually do the mini van, the drivers are so nice, the buses are basically the same with all the companies, but not the drivers Mekong express is by far the best I take it two times a month
Awesome service!
Good
Properly organized！
late departure。staffs are helpful.

The driver was very competent . Ticket advised to wait outside Hotel where a man with security clothing grabbed my bag walked down to bus station and demanded $1 USD in threatening manner . I did ask or want him to carry my bag
Left on time, took few breaks for WC and/or food and water. Safe driving, got to destination as planned. Thank you.

Taxi was delayed by an hour due to original car having broken down, I had to contact to get the info we needed, however our new driver arrived very quickly and was lovely, he probably made up some of the time on the journey, all in all I would use again.

AVOID! If you travel from HCM to Phnom Penh, they will process your visa at the border. But from Phnom Penh to HCM, you will have to do it by yourself and it is a pain! They do not care about you or your safety. The buses are clean but it is not worth it.
start from pick me up in hotel at 6am to Phnom Penh over 7 hours when I arrived to Phnom Penh around 1:30pm ………...this is so bad experience.
ok but too long when I arrived to Sihanoukville, thanks !

Uncomfortable small seats, no room for the legs due to bags under the seat. The driver was crazy and drove very fast on bumpy and crowdy streets. At the end of the trip little car accident. Horrible experience not recommended.

Uncomfortable small seats, no room for the legs due to bags under the seat. The driver was crazy and drove very fast on bumpy and crowdy streets. At the end of the trip little car accident. Horrible experience not recommended.

The boat was 1'30 late. Nobody told us that the transfer to Kho Rong Samloem, a 30-45 min travel, will take nearly 2 h because we went not directly to our destination, but though the Kho Rong several beaches.
It will help people to explain the changes

the bus departed on time from Phnom Penh but arrived nearly 2h later (we arrived at 13,45 instead of 11,45) at Sihanoukville.the wether and the traffic was terrible. We nearly missed the boat, thanks the boat was in delay
The driver pick us up on the hotel 1h late. He drives too too fast
There was an accident during my ride. There was no injury but it spent too much time to wait; therefore, I arrived Kep around 6:30pm.
We did a night trip, and the driver was a beginner in driving, so we were forced to let one of us drive in his place because we were afraid of the way he drove
Driver could speak english. It was very comfort and convenient drive.
ល្អ
ល្អ
ល្អ
Top!
5 h of delayed
Car not clean
The van arrived to the destination very late as they had so many stops to pick up the street side passengers.

We were meant to catch an 1:30 bus from Sihanoukville to Kampot but got there at 11 so they asked us if we wanted to catch the 11:30 bus instead which was great. The bus was quick had aircon but a tiny bit late (because of the weather though).

I've used Kampot Express two times and am honestly really happy. They take a quick route back to Phnom Penh and make it there in a timely manner despite horrible road conditions. They also stop at a pretty clean rest stop. :)
Not good.

Drivers drive very quickly, but safely.
Good travel; to my opinion, too much stops : 2 will be enough.

What’s a pity that the road were blocked due to the rain... so the travel was 9h instead of 4 h!
We would appreciate a discount for the next trip, for example!

Check in was quick and easy. Given bottle of water and box of cookies before we departed. Had a pillow and thin fleece (airline type) which helped with comfort. Slept most of the way. All in all not bad and would choose this mode of travel again.
Delayed at the Viet border due to a couple of  prima-donna customers with inadequate documentation
The bus supposed to leave at 11pm but it delayed till 11:40pm.
Young driver was on time waiting.

we used the private taxi service and it went all smoothly. We originally booked our taxi for 6 pm but it was no problem to antecipate our trip since our driver available. The driver was nice and polite and drove us safely to our destination.

we used the private taxi service and it went all smoothly. We originally booked our taxi for 6 pm but it was no problem to antecipate our trip since our driver available. The driver was nice and polite and drove us safely to our destination.
On the website they say that the trip takes 4 hours. In reality it took us 7 hours..

The trip from Battambang to Siem Reap was slooooww. 4.5 hours from start to finish. Safe driving is the trade off. My confirmation said pick-up from Battambang Resort. Unfortunately when I had the hotel staff ring Mekong express, they refused to pick up.
Too many stops with no explanation, bad driving
Driver was good. Van was ok. WiFi didn’t work. That was quite annoying as I primoised my 10 year old  son he could use WiFi.
Bad experience with this company, they are cheating, I booked van but actually not van that is a old sumyoung car air con not good, I recommend do not use service from this company
No chance to meet advertised journey times with comfort stops, border time and bad roads so be honest about overall journey time. Actually around 8 hours rather than 6 hours advertised.
Driver not speaking English but punctual, kind and safe driving
Left 45 minutes late causing us to miss ferry. Driver proceeded to drive like a maniac while raining hard. Extremely dangerous! Never again will I travel with this company.
Left 45 minutes late causing us to miss ferry. Driver proceeded to drive like a maniac while raining hard. Extremely dangerous! Never again will I travel with this company.
Everything was OK even if the driver doesn't speak and understand much English still the trip was above expectation for my family of 10pax. well done

The trip was great, the punctuality and services offered by the crew were really good. 

Regarding the visa procedure they charge 5 usd but they make everything! You don’t even have to queue for nothing and because of that the border crossing goes fast
Air conditioning wasn’t working properly - it was so hot I felt like I was going to pass out!
Great bus service and great driver. Very punctual. However the wifi didn't work for a big part of the trip. No complaints though.

Bad punctuality, keep picking up customers on the way! Driving very dangerous!
Very bad experience for me and my group!

The buses are punctual and clean. But there is 1 big problem - the mini bus is too small for foreigners. I was in pain the whole trip and couldn't wait to arrive. The big buses are much better but I never saw a big bus at 2pm from Siem Reap to Battambang.
The Over all trip was distractive, cant even leave on time from Kep, in middle of road, back to take another passengers, and the stop at Kompot cost more than 2 hours. The whole bus operation failed
Bad driving, bus broke down and we were over an hour late. Bus could use some cleaning as well, old and dirty

កាលពីយប់ថ្ងៃទី11 ខែ8ឆ្នាំ2019 ខ្ញុំបានជិះឡាននេះពីសៀមរាបទៅភ្នំពេញ ចេញម៉ោង10កន្លះយប់ អ្វីដែលខ្ញុំយល់ឃើញមានដូចជា:

2, អោយអ្នកជិះយកថង់ដាក់ស្បែកជើងខ្លួនឯង
3, បើកបរលឿនពេក( ចេញម៉ោង10កន្លះ ដល់ភ្នំពេញម៉ោង3 ព្រឹក) បើកសាហាវជាងឡានតូចទៀត

There were several problems with this trip. They ripped our new luggage while moving back and forth and threw it onto the ground at each stop since there was no room in the stowaway.  The A/C was not cold enough so everyone was hot the entire trip.
thanks
thanks
Driver is so bad and rude.
Horrible bus, atrocious inspector, terrible service. Hope I Never go through such hell again. God save everyone who travels by Virak Buntham buses.

The bus was ok, small for tall people. Overall it was bad because it didn't leave us on the arrival point and the driver was rude. We had to take a taxi after. Furthermore at 5am they turned the radio on and the music was very loud.
A customer kept on chatting over the phone with his girlfriend for 6 hours non-stop. The company should set a courtesy policy.

Driver was extremely rude & was fighting with drivers on the road and cursing them out. Before we left Phnom Penh, we asked which bus went to Siem Reap & he rolled his eyes and ignored us. The people in the office are extremely rude as well. Never again
Stop long time

All was perfect !
the best company I used to travel in Cambodia
Spaces between seats are not too big - a bit uncomfortable while seating.

I have taken many buses between HCM City and PHN and I must say the driver was one of the best I had, 
Friendly and good driver, respected enough safety rules,
The driver was driving too fast. He was recklessly talking on the phone. How could he be so irresponsible toward his passengers life?
Met crush

everything went well! no delays, process was also very smooth, although we didnt arrived 2:30 as scheduled but thats ok because it was already explained that any delays due to traffic is something cant be controlled. till next time!
Driver was over speeding and always on phone. Not good for passenger safety. Other things were fine.

twas my first time to try the limo or night bus and i must say it was one of the coolest i ever experienced! no delays, driver was great not over speeding. i fell asleep so didnt noticed we arrived. there was just mosquitoes so something they can improve

Toyota Hiace transform to Ford Transit and seats is not comfortable. Van has no hand break. Driver stoped along the road to pee and Van is rolled because no hand break. This is kind of put all passengers in danger. Not recommended at all.

Drivers do not let you know what you are stopping for - no customer service whatsoever!  They also tore our backpack in 2 places because they kept it in the stairwell and kept moving it each stop and threw it on the ground each time!  No A/C, no Wi-Fi!
I had booked a van for 10.30 but my booking ostensibly wasn't in the system so there was no van at 10.30. They booked me a seat in a bus which came an hour later. No apologies nor compensation!
I had booked a van for 10.30 but my booking ostensibly wasn't in the system so there was no van at 10.30. They booked me a seat in a bus which came an hour later. No apologies nor compensation!

All was satisfied. Nice trip.
Left 2 hours late due to bad road conditons which was fair enough but there was no information or apologies from staff even after the nee departure time had passed
I had a good trip with Seila Angkor.
All ok. The bus was good but quite old and not really clean. Anyhow the trip was OK.
Good!

Rude and impatient driver. Despite entering drop off point online and paying in full, driver immediately demanded another $10 from us, on top of the $60 we had already paid. He ended up dropping us at the bus station and not our hotel. Regret using.
Excellent service. Very careful driver.

We took the Bayon V.I.P bus trip from Battambang to Phnom Penh; Bayon were on time with a courteous pick-up, the bus was in fair order, clean and comfortable.  Driving must be a huge challenge with the awful traffic conditions - we arrived on time safely.
Pickup and dropoff location clearly states will be at Serendipity beach. I was abandoned at the other port on the complete opposite side of Sihanoukville and missed my bus as a result
Excellent service and very friendly and accommodating driver.
delayed arrival for 3hours were not good
The bus was OK, 1h of delay was, well, expected. One thing though: The bus was full of mosquitoes!!! And I mean, really full of them. Maybe it is an idea to spray before departure?
Departed on time, clean and comfortable seating, received a bottle of water and box of cookies, AC was great and thin fleece blanket (airline style) was great! Toilet on board. Couldn't ask for more.
Good, we have arrived 1 hour earlier

Driver was good and safe but it was the worst journey with lots of unscheduled stops. We found cockroaches & there was no wifi as stated in their website! We could smell exhaust fumes and halfway through the journey the air-conditioned was switched off!
Last row seats are too close, we were pretty much stuck compared to other travelers. Van arrived in Battambang 1h late.

1 hour after we have left Siem Reap, the van were in breakdown... we need to find a garage (loosing 3/4 hour). Then, each hour we were obliged to stop the van and the driver add some water (5 l. each time) in the engine. we arrived 1h30 in late.
No one told me that we arrived at Siem Reap, I find myself at 2 hours from Phnom Penh and no one cares, they just drop me somewhere and I have to find a solution myself at 3am
The van was late, the driver was rude, the interior is old and unkept and the overall experience wasn't the best. Wouldn't recommend as there are better alternatives.
Last time I take this company, driver drive too fast for 2019 in Cambodia, no camera to check him and overloaded people inside, not comfortable.
Overall it was a good trip, too much stop and we need 5.30 hours
Great bus. no complaints at all. bookmebus were very helpful in rescheduling.
The service is fine. A little late of the departure time but the driver still manage to drive fast and carefull also.
Not bad

The driver was terrible. He was complaining about the vehicle problem to his company on phone but his driving was more problem. Often sudden braking, aggressive passing on narrow roads. Had many bus rides before but this time was the worst. plus 1h late.

The beds are admittedly not too big, but big enough to be fully comfy for two not-so-tall girls. Be careful during the toilet stops and when you need to get off at your destination. No one checks that you're back or have properly understood
Late setting off and arriving. Driver a little fast at times due to road condition (poor!). Didn't need so many stops (3). Seat a little sloping and seat belt broken.
Wouldn't recommend due to their refund policy. Bought a ticket destination wrong way round bought a new ticket corrected but only offered 30% of original ticket to be refunded. :(

Prompt and comfortable ride. Highly recommended.

We booked the trip 7 months in advance, only  to find out on the day that service was no longer  available, we received  no communication from this company to let us know. We not recommend  anone to use this company. Sill waiting for response and refund.

it was a safe and smooth drive. when I needed to
go to the toilet, the driver looked for a place that had toilet and accompanied me. Thankyou very much!
