Not friendly to tourist and not on time. They dropped off our bags when I went out during one of the stops to pee and, without warning and just left us there in the middle of a city we were not familiar with.
Pleased with cost. Visa forms could be given in advance. This may help to speed up the process at Cambodian border. Bus was comfortable. Member of staff at Phnom Penh was a very pleasant guy.
Driver always on phone during driving and sometimes drive so fast. Improve your driver personality during on service hour.
It was a bit too fast.
Thanks for your take our arrived home and safety.
Very easy booking system, comfortable bus and kind staff
Not recommend to friends. Bus is too old and not comfortable! Ínspector is not helpful and NOT friendly!
It was a nice and wonderful trip. Excellent experience.
We went by taxi from PP to Kratie, the driver was 30 minutes late. On the way he made several stops without saying anything to us and sometimes he drove in a quite dangerous manner.

The bus was different from the big bus showed in the picture on the website, it was dirty, small, uncomfortable and without air-conditioning. We had to ask before they turned on wi-fi network, and it didn’t work anyway. Never again!
The driver was impolite and never informed passengers if what is happening. The car was old, had problem on the way and air conditioning was not cold enough.
Everything good
It's very comfortable. I will use again.

We booked the bus online from Sihanoukville to Kampot. When we arrived the day after in Sihanoukville, the girl in the office told us that the main office didn’t call Sihanoukville’s office. Every bus of the day was full. We had to take a taxi for 45$
The price was very good so we cannot complain at all however the service could have been inproved with wifi and stronger air conditioning. Overall good value for money.

Bus left on scheduled time. Waiting area needs some improvement. The bus dropped passengers on road side in Phnom Penh. Inspector is helpful but does not smile. Should give clear instructions for immigration. Snacks are good.
Bus was 2 hours late to depart. When I asked staff if they had an update on departure time all three started shouting at me and threatened to have me removed from the bus station. Charming!
Bus 2 hours late to depart, no help from staff who were extremely rude and shouting abuse at one passenger who asked for an update on departure time.
Very comfortable but too many stops.
Excellent very friendly service and a lot cheaper than other operators even with a more spacious bus.
Was hesitant to book this because of the rating but overall the trip was good. Thank you so much! ??
Hesitant at first but still booked the bus because of their time slot. No regrets at all. Thank you. ??
Waited for one hour, bus never came to pick me up

Tres bon voyage de Phnom Penh vers Siem Reap 
Ponctuel  conducteur tres prudent.Sommes arrives avec 1h d avance  depose au centre de Siem Reap et Tuk tuk a l arrivee  pas de soucis pour aller a votre hotel Tres bon service prix t 9 usd tres correct.
Otherwise good, but VIP van was definetely not made for tall people. We are 184cm and 177cm and our legs didnt fit there properly.

Possibly the worst experience of my life. Bus was involved in a fatal crash in which my girlfriend and I witnessed the gruesome death of a man on a bike. Heard nothing from the company and went back to Phnom Penh as very shaken. This event has scarred me.

Bus from Kampot to Sihanoukville, departure 15.30. They let me wait till 15.35 to finally bring me to the other bus agency. Waited until 16.20 for the bus to depart. Driver threw us out 2km away from the normal end point. So I payed 2 USD more for Tuktuk

Absolutely excelent, very easy on the border, nice drive, super comfortable, no extra charges, free wifi (it stopped working but we didn't care so we didn't ask to reset it), free water. I would definitely use it again

Good experience  :)
Seats were not comfortable sitting 5 hours. The windows of the bus shaking was too noisy.
The service was on time and staff was very helpful, but the bus was a bit dirty.

We were told that we were supposed to arrive at 6pm at phnom pen (it was written on the ticket we booked) and we waited for an hour and half at Kampot with no explanation apparently this was a routine... very disappointing ! And we arrived at 8pm..

More than 2 hours late, so we didn’t arrive to the border. They didn’t want to put us in the first bus in the morning, said there was no bus at 8 Am but it was In the time so we had to pay for taxi, they said they pay half but only gave our half to driver

Thanks a lot.
Staff helped me a lot. I enjoyed tour.I appreciated their kindness.
The service was very good. The driver was mostly very safe, except for tailgating and talking on his cell phone while driving. Mekong Express is a good company.

- Driver: Impolite, rude

The ride to sihanoukville was supposed to take 4 hours and drop us near serendipity pier. It took 6 hours and they dropped us off ages away at a bus stop, they didn't care when I showed the drop off point on the ticket and tried to charge us for a tuk tu
Amazing service will definitely book with this company again!!
Punctuality is a word that doesn’t exist in Buva
Nice seats, quite comfortable. Both the AC and WiFi worked 90% of the time.

Thai was a very accomodating PR.
The van is too old and driver drive risky. Later than expected more than 3 hours

The communication wasn't great. An employee demanded we'd give her our passports and 35 m USD for the Cambodian visa, which is only supposed to be 30 USD, and once we got to the border no one really knew what was going on. Other than that the bus was ok.

The bus departed 40 min later and arrived at destination 2 hours later than expected.Seats are uncofortable with no space for legs.Wifi and bottle of water should be included in service and we didn’t have anything of that.Such a terrible experience
Had a great trip it was like being in a mobile cubby house. Loved it.
The bus was dirty but overall good service, great value for money and helpful staff.

Terrible customer service, ignored when i asked where the bus was that was 45 mins late. All companies on here are lying when they say 4 hours, it literally cannot be done, ignore the constant traffic. Fastest is 4:15 in a car with no traffic.

Great trip. Friendly and English speaking conductor. Smooth border crossing, the conductor arranged the visa at no extra charge and filled out the arrivals forms for us. Crackers and water. The wifi wasn't working, however.

Great trip. Friendly and English speaking conductor. Smooth border crossing, the conductor arranged the visa ($5 charge as expected) and filled out the arrivals forms for us. Crackers and water. The wifi wasn't working, however.
good
El viaje decia que era de 4 horas y fueron 6 horas y media. Casi perdemos el ferry a Koh Rong...

The service is suck when we return from Koh Rong Sonleom back to the mainland. There were around 5 to 6 pick up from differences resort/beach from both Koh Rong and Rong Sonleom which we spent around 1 hour 30 mins just to pick up people.

Pickup late by 20 minutes. The car exterior dusty but interior clean. Booking for a SUV but we had a Toyota Prius. Young driver polite but needs to check English words on playlist & stop playing with phone. Driving speed/ overtaking on open road unsafe.
Good service
Perfect. Good service

I give 0 rate to Bookmebus.com because your info is slow to update and also miscommunication with transportation company. The place that I ordered were full but bookmebus me those were available. Then I have to moved to place that I don't want.
Drive too fast. Unsafe!
Lack of hygiene, many unnecessary stop to pick people or drop. Stop at usual places unlike other bus company. Staff are low key rude and unprofessional. A/C was out, only air that I got.
Very good service indeed. Punctual and responsive. Highly recommand.

Check in worked well. We left 15 minutes late and the driver kept picking up people and searching for them. People were dropped at individual spots. In total 1 hour and 45 minutes later then estimated arrival.
Last 4 seats are narrow.
Van arrived late, driver drove a little dangerously and fast to make up lost time. It was dark and raining, not good combination to be on.
excellent

Starting from the pick up from hotel, nothing went right. We started late. Then we went to their office at Orussey market and were further delayed. They quoted the journey time to be 4 hours but it took us 6 hours. Driving so rough that we felt unsafe.
It was a nice and comfortable drive which was on time. Thank you.

i am so disspointed when i book with Larryta i got no seat selection, since i bought 3 seat i want to seat next to each other, but i found out where i seat after i arrive station, have to seat next to driver the most uncomfortable seat ever.

I missed my bus because the addresses given to me of the office were wrong and there was nothing to be found at either of them. When we tried to call Larryta the number did not connect and when we called another number we were hung up on

I used this bus twice, and I thought the route to mondulkiri was bad however on route back they had over booked therefore some people were sat on a unsecured plastic chair and another 4 people sharing a 3 seater. Beyond dangerous and surely illegal.
Good trip. Comfortable van and fast but safe.
Bus was poor condition internally (old)

A very good service. The driver was early for pick up and the journey was as efficient as promised, considering the traffic. I would recommend this service, especially as I was travelling alone. I felt safe and secure getting from Phnom Penh to Kampot.
It's like Fast and Furious! I like it

Your company is by far the best I’ve taken your bus to Vietnam from cambodia 40 times at least , your whole staff is amazing, I was in the hotel business for 45 years, I own a hotel still in Southern California , your staff is outstanding

First part of the trip good driver, bad vehicle. Had to stop several times to fix it. Was not comfortable at all. 
After leaving Pnom Penh we had a better vehicle, not a good driver. Vehicle was more comfortable.
Driver is friendly but traffic in Cambodia is crazy
Very happy with this trip. Thanks you
Trip was stress-free. Bus was comfortable, staff was friendly. The dinner stop was at a restaurant that did not look too sanitary. We arrived 1 hour late. Overall a great trip.
5 star service very good driver. Plenty of restroom stops. Careful and polite  driver would reccomend this company.
5 star service very good driver. Two restroom stops and one lunch break. Careful and polite  driver would reccomend this company. 6 hours

Great service. We were coming back from Koh Rong Island with 45minutes late due to weather condition on sea. We change the location of the pick up  last minute... But the Private Mini-Van was there waiting for us. He was there 1h before pickup time. Thank
Friendly service! Booking using Bookmebus was very fast and easy.

I used from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh. I had asked them to pick up at the property in advance, but the day was not picked up even when it was time for pick-up. When I called them for confirmation, they responded that I have to go toBus station on my own
Very Express
Our driver changed the route in order to drop a passenger!!!!!

DO NOT BOOK THIS. This trip from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh could kill instantly! The driver was so unprofessional and over speeding. We asked him to slow down a bit but he refused to. He said that it was TOTALLY OKAY since he's been driving every day. (!!!)

I highly recommend this company. I was in late to catch my bus and they accepted to change my ticket 10min prior departure via email. The driver and all the staff were really kind and the mini van very comfy. We even arrived in advance!
Reckless driving
It didn't  stop where it should've stopped. The bus stopped at Kleang Leu and I had to wait for another one to take me to Ekareach. No one explains this. Really dissapointing.
OK trip.. One 30 min delay after breakdown.. They never do in 6 hrs more like 7 hrs +

ឡាន​លើក​នេះ​កន្លែង​គេង​វែង​ស្រួល​ដាក់​ជើង។
តែ​ពួក​គាត់​បាន​ប្តូរ​កៅ​អី​ខ្ញុំ​ទៅ​កន្លែង​ផ្សេង។
Good bus. Driver was also driving rationally. Didn’t feel unsafe for a moment. Though the timing needs to improve leaps and bounds
The driver was fantastic. Was an hour late but as I understand original driver didn’t turn up. A Prius was then sent and we had paid for a Lexus so was very frustrating
ឡានចាស់​ ហេីយខូច
Great service and comfortable bus
I tried to cancel many times but no one response

We arrived with 3 hours delay.
Scheduled at 15 but actual arrive at 18
So lost the last boat to koh rong
Fast service, comfortable, the best choice of express

Was almost an hour late for pickup. The van was very small with no room for bags. Had to keep them under our legs and have no leg room. We were lucky to have packed light. They should put a limit on the time at stops. People took a long very time.

The car left 10mn late unlike the others. Also, the car was broken after had a small accident. So, the passengers including me needed to wait for exchanging to the other car which was more old-fashioned, dirtier, and uncomfortable. We were at BTB 2h late.

Direct bus!! with two changes!! I would understand one on the border (thailand - cambodia), but why there was second to another bus about one a.m.?! And nobody did not speak english and could not say us what is happened..

It all went fine, maybe te driver could slow down more when there is little visibility during downpour. It was a little bit worrying. Other than it was good, I have not seen him talking on phone or text messaging. Great,

The driver was very rude and kept making prolonged stops where he just seems to chat to his friends, this meant we arrived in Phnom Penh 1.5 hours late, took even longer than the day bus when there is traffic!! Unimpressed. But very clean.
Safely driven by drivers from Siem Reap and Phnom Penh even on difficult roads.
But the car a bit old
Everything is great except there is no wifi on the VIP Van as stated on the booking. l
Old Van. No water and snacks given even stated on the booking

**SCAM** Thai men came on to bus at Aranyaprathet, gave us passes, pretended to look official - then told us the visa price was 1700 baht ($55). Did NOT tell us we had a choice. Cambodia visa is $30. Confused, hurried passengers paid up. DO NOT BOOK HERE!

130am bus was late, it arrived past 2am.  Booked seats were already occupied by someone else & driver/inspector did nothing about it.  Seats/sleeping area (sleeping bus) was dirty, the pillows and blankets were already used they did not change.
The trip was on time, and they provided water as well. There were 2 stops, for bathroom breaks, and for dinner.i
The trip was on time, and they provided snacks and water as well.
The trip was on time, and they provided snacks and water as well.
The van did not leave on time. No water or snacks were provided. We waited so long in the Vietnam border.

Bus broke down on roadside ~9 pm. Driver gave no information on how long (or if) a new bus would come. Everyone started hitchhiking away until I was almost left solo, so I joined last group of hitchhikers. Driver did nothing to ensure my safety. So bad.
Our booking was no prepared instead of doing it a few months ago. We booked a vip van and finally we had to pick up a bus. So we are not happy with the change and the information that we didn't have.
Very friendly inspector and good driver. We arrived at time, and very good price.

Hello, I think you should mention that the bus stops in few locations between SR & PP, because it slows down the trip and for people expecting to take another transport, catch a plane, etc...the information that it may take more than 6 hours is important.

A Really bad driver who took unnecessary risks with weaving through traffic. We had TWO near miss accidents where all the passengers
 had to hold on to their seats!!!! Most unsafe was that he used his cellphone a lot....real bad!!  Driving too fast too
The journey took almost twice the expected time. The driver was very nice and the vehicle was great too. Air condition worked well.

One of the best minivan service or our journey. It was clean and not so crowd as usual. It left on time from Mondulkiri, but it was quite in late during the way. They gave us free bottles of water. A problem was the very high speed.
លឿនរបស់គេដល់មុន១ម៉ោង
The bus left one hour late without any explanation. I booked a minibus bus ticket but got an old bus instead, not confortable at all.
Everything is alright but buses are old already. I hope you would replace to buses as Japanese used ones again. I don't like Korean, SAMCO and else because not so comfortable and poor suspensions.

Booking was super fast, and their customer service is on point, always available to help. We did not have any issues with the tickets, we just showed them to the bus terminal receptionist, and they printed the tickets. Very satisfied. Will use it again.

Driver is punctual, but the only problem is the seat in the car increases to 13 while normally there are only 11 seats for buying tickets. The ticket seller might personally added 2 seats just to get money, and didn't inform the drivers. no space for bags
Excellent service start to finish
Bad experience Ever!
Car seats are too narrow.

Bus was perfectly on time. The seats were very nice, and there was lots of room. There was room in the back for bags. Water was provided. At the two stops along the way, passengers were quick so we did not waste time.

Was told it would take 4 hours, but it was more like 7. As a result I missed my ferry and was stranded in Sihanoukville over night. The website should be more honest about how long it takes. Everything else was fine

Bus modern, air con, seatbelts missing, seats uncomfortable for the long drive. Driver safe BUT went in the wrong direction for 30 mins to drop off locals + pick up parcels. Lots of stops. Left us in siem reap outskirts with overpriced tuk tuk to hotel!!

Battambang ==> Phnom Penh
No seat belts, driver drove too fast, only stopped when he needed...

PP - Saigon. The trip delayed. Should have called but just let me wait for 1hour30mn. 
Siagon -PP Driver horned even there is no one on the street just to annoy others. He just stopped without telling everyone why and left the bus

From the beginning the bus was acting strange and kept stopping. Then the bus broke down for TWO HOURS in the middle of the night. They kept trying to restart and it smelled like gas. They switched us to another bus that WAS NOT A SLEEPER. I feel cheated

Please everyone don't ride this bus. I need to Visa in Cambodia That's why I can apply for visa in border line of Cambodia. However driver don't wait foreign traveler. I don't know why he doesn't wait for us. Always ignored us when we tell something.

You didn’t supply the vehicle booked which was an SUV. you supplied a Toyota Prius. Original driver didn’t turn up and you never contacted me. I had to call you. 45 minutes later you supplied another driver in a Prius. Driver excellent  your company not

We did not get the seats we 1Cand 1D
Because this bus seat was rowed2-1. So despite early booking after complaining we got seat 2A and 2B

Very bad services!!!
The driver was rude and drive like a maniac. I'm sure we arrived 20 minutes sooner than expected, but we almost died several times in the process.

Advertised travel time is 3 hours. Google maps showed 5 hours. It took roughly 4.5 hours inclusive of the stops. Would be nice if advertised times were closer to fact.

NB: Bus does not leave from office but from Siem reap bus station. Almost missed it.
Really dangerous, late and impolite

I arrived bus station 7:57 pm while my departure was 8 pm. I was so disappointed the bus was leaving because they couldn’t check bookmebus booking. Finally i need to pay extra on Tuk Tuk to the other station and use bike to catch up bus on the way.
The departure was delay nearly 1 hour

The seats were disgusting, whilst the stains were clearly old & therefore unlikely to transfer to clothing it was all v tawdry.  We were only 8 passengers & by the time we got to Bangkok the loo stank, I hate to think what it’d been like with more.

Airco was not working properly.
driver was good although could use the  horn much less
Late

The driver did not speak English at all. We were driving at night time and we are happy to be alive. He drove so dangerously even thought we told him to slow down few times. He could not keep his car in proper line in the direction of traffic.

The bus I took from SR to BTB was old and loud. The driver horned alot along the way. It disturbed passengers
The seats were also old with handrest so old and disgusting to put arm on.

Damn! I booked 7 seats, upon arrive at bus station, the staff said There is no bus for me. They said Bookmebus does not send confirmation to them. I needed to wait 3 hours for endorsement and we take separately bus.
Good driver, skilled on road No.4
Driver needs lessons on safe overtaking, too slow to overtake, stays out too long, not quick to return to correct lane, has a habit of overtaking on blind outside bends!

Bus departed on time, but due to terrible road conditions and sheer volume of traffic, trip took 2.5 hours longer than displayed on ticket. Driver drove really well under the circumstances, taking no unnecessary risks.
No seatbelts! Very fast driver and not very polite to passengers.
Driver cheching vehicle, tyres and so after departure. Why not do that before. Driver took sometimes unnecesarry risk passing other vehicles. We had no inspector ( van)
Nice
Great transport service from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. Really enjoyable experience, time went very quickly. Driver was very safe.

This was recommended to us by a friend, and we are so glad we used Cambodia Post VIP Van. It was very affordable and safe, with enough leg room and AC! It took about 5 hours from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap with a 20 min stop for bathroom and lunch.

From Bookmebus web site and ticketing, through to the care and attention I received at Phnom Penh Sorya bus station, to a comfortable and interesting drive to Kampot. I would thoroughly recommend this service.
Seating was spacious with more than enough room. Driver is a good gentleman. Thank you.

Overall is okay, some mosquitos inside the vehicle. Vehicle is clean and quite new. A short break for quick meal in the middle of trip. Air-conditioning is abit cold so recommend to bring a jacket or scarf.
Overall, it is okay. But for the route PNH-SHV and Kampot, you should change the travelling duration as road and traffic conditions now take us longer than before. It took me 7hrs from PNH to SHV.
Excellent
Great service. Pick up from hotel to Airport. Only one issue was recognizing the driver but once sorted out it was fine.
Office was not at the location it said it would be. Boat left 30 minutes late.
Office was not at the location it said it would be. Boat left 30 minutes late.
Very efficient and friendly.
a vehicle change was made that is not written anywhere, a vehicle occupied by 13 people including us maximum insecurity
about driver and accommodation I don't know  because I don't have any experience with them I only purchase the ticket to ride on ferry, staffs are friendly and helpful
Very satisfied with our trip, no complaints

Do not take this bus. The journey from Kampot to PP took about 5.5 hours as the driver spent at least the first hour going in the opposite direction (towards Kep) and made many stops to pick up lots of people. No prior explanation. And seatbelt was broken

Mekong express is the best , I use them for the 5 years I’ve lived in Southeast Asia, mostly Phnom Penh to Saigon and back , the drivers are kind and the buses are clean and on time, I love me,omg express it’s by far the best bus service is Southeast Asia
The bus honks his horn for extra safety, since you horn complainers know nothing about Southeast Asia traffic just put some headphones on and relax Mekong express is the best with the best drivers,

I travel back and forth, from HCMC to Phnom Penh at least once a month and I always book with Mekong.  This trip was the very best trip I have experienced by taking a bus.  There was absolutely nothing wrong!

This ride was the worst so far. The driver started 20 mins late, then he spent another hour by picking up passengers one by one. We were 2 hours late in Phnom Penh and I missed my connecting bus. 10$ wasted.
I missed this bus due to coming late with another bus. Guys had no understanding so had to pay another ticket even when next bus was half empty.

Very very small van. I changed my seat coz I am too all to sit in back. But inspector insisted to stay on back seat. So 6 hours I couldn't move, it was very painful drive. Driver wasn't very careful but we survived :)
Good comfortable bus and left on time. We travelled from Kampot- Phnom Penh took longer than stated but this is to be expected in Cambodia with the road conditions and traffic

Got to the bus station in Sihanoukville and was told driver was going to be 2 hrs late so instead of getting the 1.30 we actually got the 3.30 . And spending 2 hrs in Sihanoukville is not a nice experience- the traffic and roads in Sihanoukville are bad
good service but driver drive too fast
Good service but driver drive too fast

R.5 under construction. As a first-time traveler, Company should provide information on the road situation so that it can be understood (in advance) when boarding.
Some youth groups are noisy. Compay should be alerted to speak quietly (when they call)
The driver was very unprofessional. Drove so fast and kept blaming the road when he hit the potholes. Talked on the phone so loud too!
It was a long travel and I felt sick, but the service and the staff were very kind and helpful. Thank you so much.
Speedy

Everything was great, bus was a little late coming in but nothing major, I think it was just Phnom Penh traffic as it was 5pm, though I think it would have been helpful if the staff communicated this. I’ve used this company many times and love it.
There is no custom pick up. Pick has limited places, very bad.

The service advertised the service received did not match. There was no VIP van but a taxi type that pick people up. Also, the van was too old and the regular cost would be 2.5USD instead I was chart 7.5. Such a rip-off.
Old bus, tire explode in half way, more than 3 hours late

It's pretty fast and quick
The bus took long time than other I think, I don't recommend to use this one for the best one

We've been in Cambodia for 9 days and this ride from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh was the worst travel expirence we had. I gues Cambodia Post has such good reviews because not many people survive to tell the tale. When in Cambodia always use Giant Ibis!

Punctual and safe. Cheapest option for PP- Siem Reap. I was the only westerner on the bus, so I guess most choose other, more expensive option. AND I received a discount coupon for my next booking on bookmebus :-)
Second time of having a private taxi and both times was only a Toyota Prius when stated would be a Lexus suv!!

Well mini bus was broken down so I took the big bus, it was fine we got a flat tire and everyone on the bus thought we were stuck, but in 20 minutes we were back on the road , longer trip with the big bus mainly because of its size I recommend the mini
Good service
Comfortable, in time and good service.
Comfortable, in time and good service.

The worst company ever! We took the night bus from battambang to Phnom Penh and It arrived 4 hours late so we missed the autobus to Sihanoukville. We convinced them to change our ticket so we took another bus to sihanoukville that came 3 Hours late ?
No problem with my e-ticket, there was no need to print. Clean and spacious bus. It was just a smooth ride, overall. Free water bottle provided. No WiFi though, but that's normal anyway.
The driver drove so fast.
Horrible... ok the van was very nice but it’s nothing, because it was just 2 horrible hours with a driver who was very very very very dangerous.. I’m very happy to be alive.

Do not use this company.  There were cockroaches everywhere!  The bed linens were filthy.  When we reached the destination nobody thought to check each compartment to wake people up.  So I was stranded at the bus depot, no luggage and nobody helped me

The sleeper bus from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh was comfortable,however, the wifi and outlet are not working. We were transferred to a bus from Phnom Penh to Ho Chi Minh, thankfully, the wifi and usb port for charging are working. It took us 17hrs not 13hrs

It was the road condition that affected the score because truly for the price you have to pay you can't complain.. It got me from A.... To...B  spot like l needed and with water

The driver was very punctual but he was driving too fast. He should understand it’s very dangerous. And the van was quite dirty i saw roaches
Fast, efficient, very comfortable for a minivan, less seats, so more space, trip took 2hrs longer than stated, but this was due bad roads and heavy truck traffic.

I usually worry when pre-booking a car that it will  waste time/be difficult to find the driver, but that wasn't the case with this service. They were prompt, WhatsApped me as soon as I landed and the driver was waiting for me with my name on a sign.

The driver did not know where he was dropping me off and had to use my google maps to navigate. The trip took 7 hours and the driver used his phone frequently though out the trip to phone friends and send voice messages. He was on time to fetch me.
reckless driving and bad customer service
bus/car less maintenance which is caused to broken along the way and cause the trip delay and not convenience.

There was a lot of traffic jam so we arrived much later than scheduled, but the driver did an excellent job!
Everything is perfect. Bus is on time.
Comfortable bus and timely departure.

The bus departure on time but we’re expected arrival time around 6 to 7 hours to arrive Ho Chi Minh from Phnom Penh but reality it’s take nearly 10 hours and return back the same. 
The return bus a bit old and so hot on the bus while air-con not cold.
Easy ride. Very smooth and on time. No hassle :)

Rode from Phnom Pehn to Battambang. Small van so a bit squished for space. Our van was hit by a truck that led to some argument and delay. Coupled with bad traffic (?), we ended up arriving three hours behind schedule.

The Bus from Phnom Penh's departure was on time and I liked how they rule the passengers to removed the shoes/slippers.However, it makes a lot of stop during the trip all the way to the border.Virak didn't even escort us in Thailand Border so we are lost.

Besides the bus driver driving super fast it was perfect. Bus left phnom penh at 1pm and arrived just before 7pm. The 6 hours busride included 2 stops along the way to stretch our legs and one flat tire.

Overall good experience.
The driver was very professional and drove quite safely and ensured I made it to my Airbnb. He spoke very good English and was friendly and helped me a lot.

Overall,everything was good,the guide can speak english and very helpful. Our transfer was very smooth although it took us some time to leave the immigration.there are also Free stuffs like water and biscuits.

Old bus, air conditioning didn't work well. The trip took 3 hours longer than advertised because of unecessary stops and poor driving. I won't be using Mekong Express ever again.

There were many stops while on the way to Siem Reap, but I understand driving in the night is not easy. Bus was clean, seat was comfortable, provided a water bottle with biscuit packet. If Airfare is a expensive, choose Night bus with sleeping seats.
Not bad

Late departure (1h delay) + driver stopped to pick up non-VIP guests&make money. A baby threw up in the bus while we stopped. The mum didn't want to clean up, nor the driver. I had to do it so that my daughter's feet wouln't be in the vomit: unbelievable!

good overall service.Took 1 additional hour to get to Kamput though but could have been down to heavy traffic and bad roads.The air con on board works well also which is essential in this kind of heat.

Trip to Battambang to from Siem Reap, we left late, made a long stop, driver was driving crazy, was suppose to be 3hr trip ended up 6 hrs. Very dissatisfied. This was Sat Oct 12 8am, Giant Ibis bus is so much better.

Very unhappy. Bus station asked for my visa before hand and said it was fine and let us in the bus. right outside the Vietnam border they told us our visas wouldn’t work and that we would have to pay $400. Then the bus driver made us pay him to go back.

It was a six hour journey from Phnom Penh to Battambang with very little traffic (and driving at a fit pelt). Left on time, comfortable enough, enough room for my very large suitcase, one stop for lunch, all fine!

Sleeper Bus: Siem Reap - Ho Chi Minh
On time. They assisted us when crossing the border. Bed size is fine for me cause I'm only 5'1. If you can, bring your own blanket & pillow case. Watch out for your things.

We used a private taxi to go from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville. It took us 6h despite leaving at 5.45am. Sihanoukville is a hellhole with lot of traffic. Driver was really safe on the road. We just didn't appreciate he stopped for breakfast for 20minutes.

The trip was exactly as described.  The minivan left right on time.  The driver was excellent.  Most importantly, the seats in the minivan were comfortable with lots of leg room.  I would definitely recommend this service and would definitely use it again
យឺតជាងពេលកំណត់
Great travel but the departure was 30 minutes late.

The trip was posted to be 3 hours.  It took 2 to get out of Phnom Penh.  The driver was the most dangerous driver I have ever encountered.  Pouring rain, bad roads, he is racing to complete the drive.
Enjoy my ride. Excellent service
Bus didn’t stick to schedule and information about stops wasn’t clear. Bus was clean and in good condition.

The Aircon broke down... this made the journey very long and hit indeed. We went to the place indicated on our tickets to be picked up, and no, that was not the right place. The van came and collected us but we went much further out of town. Not so nice.

They took my passport and money the bus attendant insisted and persuaded me  they did not give it back for 3 hours. To my questions they pretended they did not understand anything. I will never go by BookMeBus and Cambodia buses

Best bus we had in Cambodia it was clean spacious airconned and we only stopped once (some buses stop constantly and make it a long journey). The weather was awful but due to rainy season but the driver took it in his stride!
តៃកុងយកភ្ញៀវតាមផ្លូវហូរហែរ ឡើងចុះៗ ខាតពេល
good safe driver, arrived on time, no problems
The driver of the day is the lowest ever. Recent driver attitudes are bad
Bad service ever. I will stop use it. I change plan because of this stupid company. I lose of time , hotel fee, and money to buy this stupid ticket. Company not care about the customer safety.
Bad service ever. I will stop use it. I change plan because of this stupid company. I lose of time , hotel fee, and money to buy this stupid ticket. Company not care about the customer safety.

Battambang-Siem Reap, Oct 20. Many roadworks on first half: bumpy, dusty, slow. Seating plan had no relation to that of the one I booked with (didn't matter). Half-hour repair stop as we had a panel smashed. Plenty of leg room, and we got there by 6pm.

Driver is not careful and not obey the traffic law. He drives in a way that unacceptable. Moreover, he almost hit a guy that come across the road. It such a scared experience with virakbuntham this trip. Please improve to educate your driver.
Not my recommendation on the list. Does not treat passengers well. If you want to have a try, go ahead. But not for me anymore.

aircon of bus didn't work after 1hr into the bus ride. driver did not help by winding down the windows. mini bus was also not according to what was shown online during booking. very disappointing journey!
Polite and punctual service. Only issue with too cold A/C in the bus.
I don't care so much, but as a fact, the arrival delayed 3 hours because of several stoppings and vehicle malfunction. Need considerable effort for service improvement.
Very professionally run. Slept most of the way ... a testimony to both the comfort of the bus and the high standard of driving.
1st driver took more then other service provider. 2nd drop location was near Pub street but dropped at bus stand 5.5km from the actual drop location. No transfer service.
good driver, on time, careful, messages before arrival

Engine broke immediately as we left the dock; captain did not have the tools to repair the motor so we had to get tools from another boat. repairs on the water. and we were delayed by an hour. We arrive at the airport 35 before our flight!!
Good trip  Arrived on time .

I didn't realise so much effort went into the journey from Siem Reap to Don Det (2 buses, back of a Ute, and a boat) but  the company was hassle free and got us to our destination in 8hrs.cannot complain about the service at all, was actually a fun day.
Driver talked all along the way on his phone.

Bus was near enough on time, only a very short delay. The only criticism we had was that none of the three services we've been on with Mekong Express has the onboard WiFi worked. Seats are also not built for westerners. Very short, narrow, and cramped.

The driver is very good. He arrived early. The road is dark and a bit bumpy near the end of the journey but the driver drove safely. He is super polite and professional. The car is a lexus suv which is spacious. I enjoy the drive.
Excellent driver. He drove safely while having to manoeuvre around all those trucks on the highway. Some English would be nice though.
The trip was faster than expected, it was a smooth ride.

BAD! In the BookMeBus app, the place of departure for the Mekong Express bus from Siem Reap to PP said “Street 63” at 9:00 AM but they left already. All busses leave now from Borey Seang Nam(!!!) at the posted time. That was too far away and I lost my $$!
Good Service, very  responsable driver, safe.

Be sure to have a huge buffer if planning additional trips as this journey wil get longer. Huge delay on Cambodian side, arrived approx. 4 hours later that advertised. Everything ok, border crossing and Thailand transportation well managed.

AC not working, just some air.
It was supposed to take 3h but it took 4h
Good service
Ferry was on time to depart from the Sihanoukvile and got pick up from Long Set beach as arranged. Good experience and would use again.

- Driver could not speak English.
- stopper on reclining seat 3C could not  not work.
- WIFI IS NOT AVAILABLE. in fact we pay more, but WIFI IS NOT AVAILABLE. This is bery basic requirement, so Management please pay attention on this. Thanks.
Everything is goood. The seat is a bit small.
The driver made unnecessary pit stop,  and seat no. were not specified.
Thé driver drive too fast
Driver drove like He wanna suicide

The driver doesn't speak english but he is very careful in the driving. Although he allowed some passenger to drop off near the bakery shop at Phnom penh road going to hi way number 5( forgot the name of the bakery). Almost 15 minutes we waited and drive
Driver talk a lot on the phone while driving.
Hood and very good

The driver arrived on time at 5am.  There was a change of driver for this 11 hour drive which was good although the second driver spoke no English. We arrived at Sihanoukvilke in good time to catch our ferry. I would recomnend this service.

- The staff is rude, not Speaking English (Speak or doesn’t want to speak English) 
- 7 hours between Ho Chi Minh - Phnom Penh
- Carrying of scared packet
- Driver drove dangerously 
- The Path was horrible, I don’t recommend
Driver always stop. Time to go was delay over an hour because of driver stop the car.

Pros: experienced driver.
Cons:
Low value for money. Uncomfortable seats, old car, delay with arrival

The aircon wasnt cold. 
We sweat along the way to PP. 
One of our booked seat has been change to another seat.

The 6:30 am service we booked through Bayon VIP from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh didn't exist. We were instead put on the 7:30 service, and were worried when we showed up at 6:15 and they had no record of our bus. Hopefully BookMe Bus corrects this soon.

Worst lying piece of crap information I’ve ever been given . DO NOT BOOK A BUS WITH COMPANY! Max 12 on luxury bus With recycling seats. Lies. We we’re told 5 hours on website. It took 9 hours. No toilet breaks . 18 on bus. Worst nightmare ever! Avoid!
Arrived about half an hour ahead of time. Driver was daring but also quite skillful.
very bad services very bad bus.
we left kampot 45 min late. almost missed my last ferry to phu quoc. it took us 3h from scheduled time to get to ha tien!
Bad service, bad company stupid staff
Stupid staff and sevice
We had no Wifi in the Bus. Nothing for tall people. It takes longer than 5 hours!
Good travel, oldish bus with a lot of space

It was so kind. It was some issue but they solved the problem. It makes me surprised. I booked the Vip van as it will take only 4hrs to reach but it took almost 8 hrs. I couldn't hear the reason as driver couldn't speak in English. Except this all good.
Wifi not available as mentioned but overall it was a good one
Wifi not available as mentioned but overall it was a good one. But seat was not the same as per the staff it was a different bus which showed onli9
Wifi not available as mentioned but overall it was a good one. But seat was not the same as per the staff it was a different bus which showed online

It was our second time. Driver was friendly and very punctual. HOWEVER I saw many small cockroaches and bedbug-kinda insects crawling in and out of the tiny gaps between doors, windows, seats, everywhere. Please sanitize inside of the vehicle!!!
the driver may lower the driving speed otherwise passengers will vomit.
That all

Configuration of coach/bus was front half with seats, rear half open space for cargo (dangerous). No seatbelt, no wifi, no WC. Other passenger said that sometimes it is new bus, sometime old bus for this 16:00 service from HCMH to PP. Staff helpful.

Excellent, smooth pick up and drop off. Driver doesn’t speak English very well but it was okay as we didn’t need to interact so much. The coordination via WhatsApp was really good and reassuring. Thank you!
ទៀតទាត់
The driver is a bit rude to the customers.  Should change this habit.

Our driver was courteous and friendly.  We were late for our departure but he waited for us and even helped us load the suitcases.  It turned out there were 5 other passengers that were late too but he was very accommodating to everyone.
Our driver was very safety conscious and drove carefully. He was a very nice man. I don’t think he spoke English but that was not a problem for us because we speak Khmer.
It was a fantastic rollercoaster, reaches speeds of 120kmph, at some points it takes off the ground, would have been nice to have been provided a helmet for the ride

Departure and arrival on time. 
Driving safe. 
Staff very helpfull !

Bus very confortable, driver safe, great company. 
Unfortunately, people were so noisy ! Smartphones, childrens, people on phone, music, movies....

it took us 7h from PP to Kampot !!!!
how slow can it be?
Good
Excellent
Easy service. Great driver. Very happy

The driver would to keep back his delay and didn’t hesitate to drive very fast on holy roads 
Air conditioning : OK
No WiFi
Trajet agréable.
ពេលវេលាធ្វេីដំណេីរមិនត្រឹមត្រូវ

The bus says a 4 hour trip - Im sure this is impossible even without bad traffic. The overnight bus took 5.5hrs so allow 8 hours during the day. We left late as they waited to fill the bus. I would have liked to know this so I did not rush.

I would like to lodge a seriously complain about this trip. The bus has left me and a couple of other passengers at the Ho Chi Minh border control as we denied to pay $2 bribe to the inspector. We had to take another bus and come by ourselves.

Driver made no effort to communicate whenever he made unexpected stops, continually failed to overtake cars in front and spent most of his time on the phone. One hour delay is acceptable on these roads but not the lack of communication.
តៃកុងឡានបើកបរគ្មានភាពទទួលខុសត្រូវ មានភាពយឺតយ៉ាវ ធ្វើអោយខាតបង់ពេលវេលា ធ្វើអោយប៉ះពាល់ដល់ការងារ
ស្នើរអោយក្រុមហ៊ុនធ្វើការកែប្រែ
There were 2 drivers. Second driver (after stop) was fine. First driver was extremely dangerous and consistently put passengers and road users' lives in danger

Driver was fast, but sensible, respecting passenger and road user safety. Minibus was fine and on time. Mekong Express need to change the Google maps link they send with e-tickets...it is about 1 km South of the actual pick up point in PP.
Super quick and safe trip - arrived about 45 min early.
Two hours late, WiFi not working, seats would not recline and very uncomfortable, dangerous driving, the place of departure and arrival are very inconvenient.

It is not pleasant or safe to see the driver take over often from the right side. We were glad to reach Phnom Penh safely, with an hour delay which obviously is caused by traffic and not the driver; but the driver could be more cautious.
Everything is ok. They will help you with border crossing.

Booked online night before 8:30am departure seats 6a 6b.
Arrived 8am for checkin in.   They issued tickets for 11a 11b. Back row and deleted the email from my phone. Then had the cheek to say I booked 11a 11b.

The driver was careless and not paying that much attention to the road, almost hit multiple people, as well as some cows. While he sat there chatting with his buddy, and had his buddy run out and get him drinks, and food.
Very happy about my trip. The journey went well. I recommend to use Bookmebus for a private taxi.
Great service as always

We took many bus in our trip, your company is a basic one. We don't have the wifi in the bus and it was uncomfortable. Keep improve and everything gonna be ok :) thanks a lot for your service, take care

We booked & expected to get on a bus, but a van came saying that the bus was broken. We expected to have a direct bus ride from HCM to Siem Reap but we stayed for more than 2 hours in Phnom Pen and that's when we were transferred to a very old & dirty bus
The whole process was pretty easy and straight forward. The ride was safe and efficient. The minivan was old but running well. I would recommend.
The driver drives over speed
I suggest you make atleast 2 stops, to buy food because of long hours travel
The driver was not so concentrated. But he knew where the horn is.

Driver was so fast that when we rode over potholes bits fell off the ceiling of the bus - a light and an AC port. Journey was terrifying - It was pouring with rain and roads were wet but this did not seem to put off the driver.

Friendly and competent staff. Dropped me further along the road from organised drop off that was nearer to my accommodation. Took longer then advertised but that is expected for Cambodia. Overall i felt it was reliable and would book again

After arriving one minute too late at the bus station, we didn't got any refunds when booking the same bus 30 minutes later. Kind of sad as we had massive traffic jams. In addition, the adress of the bus station on the ticket wasn't correct.

The wagon platform in Ho Chi Minh was difficult to understand.
Overall driving etc. was good
There was a cooler above the designated seat number 002 on the bus and it was noisy

I was worried about getting the bus from SR to PP because of all the bad reviews. But honestly the drive was super comfortable and the driver drove safely. He also allowed us a comfort stop half way. Would recommended this service
Best experience with this express since the departure is behind schedule (15mn late) and driver picked up the passengers on the way ..

This is the worst trip ever. We booked at 7:30 am and they leave at 8 am which ruined our trip. During the journey the driver talk loud af from PP till Sihanoukville, couldn’t even sleep. And it’s a VIP bus but they layover at Kompot & waste lots of time.
excellent and very friendly driver. communication with google translate worked well

Everything were OK except the bus isn’t quite what Ive expected. No WiFi provided, the blind inside the car a bit broken, and when through the bumpy road isn’t comfortable seems like theres something wrong with your car’s suspension.

Everything were OK except the bus isn’t quite what Ive expected as “VIP VAN”  No WiFi provided, the blind inside the car a bit broken, and when through the bumpy road isn’t comfortable seems like theres something wrong with your car’s suspension.

Very horrible experience - arrived half an hour late. Then we couldn’t even fit on the seats which were supposed to be “big even to sleep on?” Then; our 6 hour drive ended up being 10 hours, missed our hotel booking - very disappointing
អ្នកបើកបរខ្វះការប្រុងប្រយត្ន័ បើកលឿនៗ
អ្នកបើកបរខ្វះការប្រុងប្រយត្ន័ បើកលឿនៗ
The 12.00 bus was cancelled due to lack of ppl and the 1.00 left twenty minutes late with no explanation

I didn’t use the my ticket, I emailed the company 2 days before the departure date to rebook my ticket , they replied asking me if I would like to rebook I replied yes, but no response anymore!!,, what is the use of online service!!!!
Excellent driver, bus was in good shape. However we lost like 1 h due to traffic and bad road conditions

Punctuality...1h25 late
And the driver was speeding like crazy on  accidented roads.
Good service
Driver drive so fast please advise him to become slow down alitl bit it okay.
It's very safe even at night time. The driver is good. But just only 1 toilet break.

The office in Sihanoukville was hard to find and didn’t have anyone from CTT working there. The bus was 2 hours late and it was hard to know why? However, once on the van and on the road, things went smoothly. You get what you pay for!

First night bus for us both and not as bad as first thought. Slept most of the way. Only negative was the member of staff that dumped my backpack in a oil spillage, spent most the morning cleaning myself and my bag.
Very nice trip !
Absent passengers delayed the departure. Do not see the point why the van has to start out at the bus station, assuming that's why the price up by one dollar.

The van was late from the last shift. 
Dad luck with this trip. It took almost an hour to get out of the road 217 Stung Meanchay due to an awful traffic jam.
And the vehicle was nearly dead for a gear problem at 2km outside the town, and no backup
Delayed over 40mins. Not to bad, older coach, aircon worked.?
អ្នកបេីកបរល្អ ! ប៉ុន្តែអ្នកលក់សំបុត្រនៅមានកម្រិត....
Very punctual and fast. Arrive 30mins earlier than estimated time.

The car has problem with the wheel that we need to wait for the service shortly after leaving. It also has the problem with doors too that during the rain, the rain water dropped inside the car.
There was a delay of more than an hour.
Good bus. Professional driver.

They delayed the departure for 1 hour and even misguided on which bus I should ride towards Phu Quoc. Need more careful and customer-oriented services.
This ticket includes bus and ferry tickets outward to Phu Quoc, but the return trip is not like same.
The bus left an hour late. There were no bathroom stops and arrived two hours late. Aircon and water good
Late departure over 45mins. No stops. Aircon worked and spare seats at back of bus. Older bus, worth the experience I suppose. It was okay & cheaper than taxi!
The driver picks up passengers on the road. :-(

The van wasn't comfortable: the seat was narrow and hard, there was not enough room for luggage. 

The driving was ok but road conditions were bad. Took 4 hours.

Left in in time and arrived at 10:30, way earlier than scheduled
Was an overall good journey, wasn't it the case that they tried to scam us. Don't pay the extra fee and just go through customs on your own. 30 dollar + 100 baht. At 7 am it was not busy
No issue on KEP to Kampot route at this time.

Facility was not so good, but driver kindly stopped for taking rest and washroom and let me charge mobile phone based on the requests. The service can be improved more if they announce when they stop places on the way and estimated time of arrival timely.

No bus appeared until 2 hours after schedule time, passengers sweltering waiting in bus depot office. Also seemed to be mix up about how many expected passengers, not drivers fault. Don't depend if need to be somewhere set time.  Nice friendly driver.
Booking was very difficult.
Booking was very difficult.

Inaccurate ETA. Arrival was 1 hour and a half late, which lead to us missing our ferry boat.

Very polite and good driver.

Driver drove like a mad man, got us to KPC in just under 2 hours.

Always great I've used this route at least 20 times easier than flying , not to mention they drop you off at the best tourist destination in Saigon,  bui vien street and bin thanh market are walking distance,  the city bus station just a few meters away

This trip took twice as long (6hours) than it had advertised to be. If you make this drive everyday you should be properly telling people the length of the trip. The bus had no WiFi and was not nearly as nice as photos advertised it to be. Very poor ride!
I was surprised based on reviews. On time, no hotel pickup though. Basic minivan, aircon worked. Was okay ?.

The driver was friendly.
But I was waiting at the Poipet for 4 hours because of miscommunication problem between Cambodian driver and Thai bus company.
I don’t use this company anymore.

Nói chung, chúng tôi hài lòng về chuyến đi từ PP đến SG.

Phong cách của nhân viên lái xe tốt, nhân viên văn phòng Orussey 6/11 không tốt.

Very comfortable. With charging port. Someone(i think a partner of Sapaco) will assist all passengers in the border which is a good plus. We stayed in the border control for around 5mins only. Very seamless. Highly recommended!

16 passengers & their luggage for a maximum 13  passenger van.No room for feet because of luggage everywhere and 10 cases of water that the driver was delivering to a local store.No aircon because Khmer passengers in front were cold.We were told NO aircon

Great bus trip
Bus was late by an hour departing, beds were far too small for two westerners to share, aggressive staff and unpleasant journey (and ive been all over Asia by sleeper buses)
Very poor service. Our luggage were clean before we rode the bus! When we got it back, there were mud all over our bags. The driver is not very friendly as well.
If you buy ticket from Bookmebus, Mey Hong will not contact you, and if you late even just few minutes, they willing to sell your seat to their walk in customer. Double shot. No Refund.
Good clean bus. Left only 10 minutes late and arrived only 20 minutes late. Driven very well. Stopped at nice place for lunch with menu in English. Good choice of bus
Top Driver. But the whole staff was very friendly, quick and well organised
This bus service is an inexpensive way to travel. We always get to our location safely. I would recommend this service for traveling to Siem Reap.
Driver was very safe and the ride comfortable

Good
Great transport, they've accomodated our last minute request to pick us up earlier. Grear driver  we arrived half an hour earlier than predicted.

I lost my luggage and they didn't even responsible for it. The only thing the bus crew said to me was "I don't know" but the thing happened because they kept picking up customers and dropping customers off along the way. Such a disappointment!!!
ដាក់ចំណាយពេល១២:៣០ តែទៅដល់ ១៧ម៉ោង ភ្នំពេញទៅបាងកក
Great transfer passing through villages and countryside, convenient stops, arrived early.
Good
We sat at Seat 3, the driver put many goods and luggages in front without securing. No safety. Not convenient because no stopping at main hotels. Disappointed

Bus is great until sihanoukville, truck down to port is interesting.. But I was told I would arrive on koh rong at 14.25, and arrived at 19.00. The ferry stops EVERYWHERE, so it takes way more than 45minutes

Van left with 30mins delay from PP.....no big deal since this is Cambodia. 
All 4 tires of the van had no more profile on it, hazardous!
Van breaks to replaces, hazardous!
Khmer Driver should pass a driving test: guess he never did it!

Long drive 8hrs, the stop for lunch in Bavet was quite late at 1pm, the Vietnamese owners are not friendly, food quality and teste are not good and a bit expensive compared to the price they charged.  On top of that, the restaurant is on dusty road.
The driver was professional.
The bus left 30 minutes late, and arrived 1 hour late. But overall, the night bus was clean and nice enough for one night.
Bad Car, 2 drivers but shared the drive 10/90%, fast driver (killed a cat and! a dog), no WiFi, 9 hours instead of 5 hours
We departed 6 minutes late and arrived two hours late. The new mini van is in a good condition but the AC wasn't cool enough. I will think twice next time if I need to take this VIP van.
This ride gave me a headache.. We arrived one hour late but the road conditions were bad. I would not take this van. This was my first and last time to ride the cambodia post mini van.

There was no WiFi and the bus was not clean or comfortable. Bus was not as described. Would not recommend to friends. We are returning on Tuesday to Phnom Penh on this bus, and hope it is a better vehicle.

There was no WiFi and the bus was not clean or comfortable. Bus was not as described. Would not recommend to friends. We are returning on Tuesday to Phnom Penh on this bus, and hope it is a better vehicle. Staff were nice and professional.
The time scheduled for the trip is 4 hours. Finally the time of the trip is 7 hours, is too much time to disagree. If you have a planning this delay could to do lost other transport or a booking
Driver speaks while driving , its terrible
ការទិញ សំបុត្រមានការerrorនិង មិនបានលេខកៅអីដែរយេីងកក់ សូមកែតម្រូវ ធ្វេីយេីងខាតពេល
សេវាល្អ
Great service
Great service

The driver was very aggressive with his driving, he doesn’t care the safety of the passengers at all 
Bad driving
On time, great service and nice snack

It was a very safe drive. Had a little break during the trip for toilet and a quick meal. The minivan was in very good condition, we got a bottle of water and a snack and arrived in Siem Reap half an hour before the statet time. Highly recommended
Driver was super nice but drove like a maniac. We had 3! almost crashes bc he has no patience and wants to overtake other cars... bus was also a little late and quite old dated.

Plugs had no electricity.
My chair couldn't be adjusted

Driver was always playing with his phone and we nearly missed our 2pm boat because of this. He didnot know the way to the drop off place and i had to show him vis my google maps. On top of thia he didn't speak a word English.

Very enjoyable ride. Great driving skills and wasted no time. Stopped every hour at the beginning which was annoying but we caught up the time lost. Fixing the air conditioning would be good next time. Overall it was comfortable and I recommend this

It's understandable that roads are not the best and no issue with this, but we were flying over these bumpy roads and the whole trip was a continuous accelerate and overtake at any cost then sudden braking to avoid accidents. Drive slowly!

I understand that your fellow tuk tuk drivers will make some extra $ out of this, but if you tell someone to show in a specific place for departure but the actual departure site is different, it's pure dishonesty and incompetence.
The driver had too many sudden breaks and swinging in and out trying to overtake vehicles
The drop off in Siem Reap is at the Crocodile station and not in front of the pub street.
45 min delay. the boat should departure at 6.45 and came to the pier at 7.20 and left with passengers 10 min later. could be a problem with the flight
We left PP early but we arrived late. There were no nice views along the way since we took the Kampot route. All I saw was dust and mud on the road.
We left PP early but we arrived late. There were no nice views along the way since we took the Kampot route. All I saw was dust and mud on the road.
Departure one hour late, minivan very old and inconfortable, driver using phone while driving on a very bad and dangerous road...
Worst experience ever!
there were several different buses at the bus station, but easy to find which bus i should take. the bus itself stoped many times on the way to pick some guests or deliver something.

Bus departed with 40 minutes delay w/o giving any information how long we'd have to wait. Seats were uncomfortable (hard back). Driver was using horns almost all the way, I think he enjoyed it rather than needed. Overall it took us 6:30 hours PP-SR
So fast !!
So fast !!
So fast !!
ជួយកែរតម្រូវមេីលអ្នកបេីកបរផង
ជួយកែរតម្រូវមេីលអ្នកបេីកបរផង
The driver has felt as Schumacher, good that we arrived alive ... the bus was very tiny
William Justin Beacham did not book the tickets so I'm not sure why He would be the one addressed to MY email.
Perfect trip. No complaints!

I booked online, but when my husband and I arrived at the boarding point, our names didn’t show up in the system. TCT Mondul Kiri said because our names were not recorded in their system, all the seats were sold out. We couldn’t board the van. Disappointe

no comment, the driver is careful in the driving. My comment is he place a pine scent hanging deodorizer in front of the windsheild which gave a strong scent and making all of us sneezing. But he also take it off after some passenger complaint.

Very Bad!! When we went to the Bus station in Bangkok we were told that there was no bus going to Siem reap today. We booked our tickets online but still didn’t get any email nor information that the bus was cancelled! We didn’t even get all money back.
Driver being too fast !!!

When we book a 2 places and select our place in the night bus but when we arrived they change it to another and have to fight to have a similar one. After in the second bus the same think happen but they separate my wife and me to be with stranger
Very friendly staff, everthing worked very well. I recommend the Services from Champa Mekong

Absolute Katastrophe

Wir sind an der "Busstation" angekommen .  Da diese als solche nicht zu erkennen war, fragten wir den jungen Mann hinter dem Schreibtisch ob wir denn richtig seien. 
Nunja, dieser hatte allerdings kein Interesse mit
Very safe driver. Stopped along the way for photos, snack and fruit market.

I learned a lot on this journey on how vehicles can and should drive on the roads of Cambodia. Fearlessly! Our driver got us to point B safely and in good time. I just hope the road users travelling in the opposite direction did too. ?
អ្នកបេីកបរគួរសម មានសុជីវធម៍ខ្ពស់ !
អ្នកបេីកបរគួរសម មានសុជីវធម៍ខ្ពស់ !
Bus was broken and the delay was about 2 hours
Not safety
The driver is very kind . I had a trip very comfortable.
Punctuality, but too many stop, and expect to get SR at 2, but nearly 3PM
All is good. the bus clean and comfortable, the chair is big :D
ភោជនីយដ្ដានស្ទឹងសែនថ្លៃណាស់
Okay
Bus was late almost 2 hours. Because of that we missed the boat to the island. Never again
Ok
On time and great service. Thanks.
Driver was exactly on time. Ride was safe and I made it to my destination on time. Customer service was quick to respond to all inquiries. Highly recommend!

I'll sue Bookmebus n MekongXpress n live on FB if I face this experience next time given my travel was changed to Khai Nam at 12 which is so rushes as the receptionist told me that the tickets were overlap but I booked this around 15 days in advance.
Insane erratic driver with an apparent death wish.  The guy should be in jail.  We very very narrowly avoided a head on with a large truck.
Good ride from Phnom Penh to Kep
The driver was perfectly on time and was a very safe driver. I would definitely book again using bookmebus

Bus driver Mr. Rathana (excellent driver) picked us up at The Riverside Hotel in Pursat before proceeding to Phnom Penh (coming from Battambang). Bus was clean and half empty, but it's actually not a VIP bus - rather an old worn-out Toyota High Ace. Brgds
Good

Not good

No electricity. Couldn't use my phone to find hotel after that. 
My seat was spoiled - not able to adjust.

I stated my hostel during the booking and there was an option. On the day itself i was told that my hostel was not in the coverage zone. I would appreciate it if i was informed earlier so i can plan my way there. Dissapointing.
Aircon broken down at my seat, almost vomit along de way because of car sick

It was a bad experience that I was changed to other bus service Khai Nam at 12 which they gave me back 2$ per ticket n told me that it was overlapped tickets. I was completely unhappy given I booked the ticket around 15 days in advance

The app isn't working well when u select drop off or pick up point. With help from your help line and with using whatsapp this was solved in the end. Please improve your app

អ្នកបើកបរបើកលឿន វ៉ាស្ដាំ មិនគោរពច្បាប់ចរាចរ
