I would like to recommend to the driver! Please, drive in a way that not too fast and make your passenger feel safe. Because, driver has the high responsibility in taking care all the passengers as our life depend on you !
Be more friendly, Thank you !
The driver talked to loud and make the noise while the passengers slept. Plus, they stopped and pick up unknown passenger on the way to PP.
They pick up unofficial customers along the way. Let's them sit on walkway to restroom.
Good
A good service.
Great and fast ride!
So jerky.  Hurt my back.  No suspension in bus.

The driver drive so fast! 
We booked seat 17,18,19,20A .. But 19/20A were not available (keep for the drivers) so we got exchange seats to the others..  That was abit unexpected.
They didn't treat us like normal customers. They didn't accept our passports unlike other customers and instead let us process ourselves as they said our tickets are too cheap.

The driver wouldn’t have been out of place in F1, he was brilliant. 
Painless to book and travel

Bus was at first 45min late. After that, they said that the aircondition was not working. They said we will have to wait for 30min. Axtually, took them about 1h. 
Driver was driving way too fast... like he was in a hurry because we left later.
Unfriendly driver. He drove so rude.
បេីក​កញ្ឆក់ៗ​  ចាប់​ហ្រ្វាំង​ច្រេីនដង​ធ្វេីអោយ​គេ​ពុល​ឡាន​ដោយសារគាត់។ ​ បេីក​លឿន​ សុី​ផ្លេ​ជែងគេ​រហូត​ ហេីយជែងខាង​ស្ដាំទៀត​!
Very nice trip !
Driver is very kind and helpful.

The guy from the bus have charged me more 5$ to make the on arrival visa to Cambodia, saying that it was a fee to avoid the cue. There was no cue, there was nobody there. We could have done it by ourselves. You just wanted to steal me.

I had been worried whether the driver would turn up but he did and 5 mins early. Car was clean and had air can. Driver spoke no English but that is fine as I cannot speak any Khmer. So no chat on the journey. Roads are in terrible condition.
very good
the bus condition is not good, but as some people mentioned that the company require customers to pay additional 5 dollars, this didn't happen to me.
good sensible driver, no crazy stuff
បើកបរគ្មានសុជីវធម៌ បើកជែង ហើយសុីផ្លេដាក់គេរហូត។ បើកជែងខាងស្ដាំ ហើយល្បឿនលឿនមិនថេរ ចាប់ហ្វ្រាំងរហូត ឡើងពុលឡានហើយ!! លើកទីមួយហើយជិះសិលាអង្គរជួប driver បែបហ្នឹង

Very fast trip, lots of overtaking and braking, definitely wear your seatbelt.
My biggest complaint is the same as last time I took this bus, find a different first stop the toilets are absolutely disgusting.
Driver was using his smartphone too much while driving.
Very satisfied with Bookmebus' service. All was fine and the support service is very reactive and helpful. Definetely a service I will use again and recommend to others

Good driver and arrived 1 hour earlier (due to low traffic since it was the last day of the water festival?). Still would have preferred the driver not using his mobile phone, especially not reading messages, while driving.
ខំទិញសំបុត្រតាម​អនឡាញ​ ពេល​ទៅដល់ថាកៅអីមានគេទិញហេីយ​ ​រញ៉េរញ៉ៃ​ណាស់​ នេះសំណាង​ហើយ​ដែល​កៅអី​ផ្សេង​នៅសល់​ កុំអីអត់ទៀត
Great service offered by bookmebus. The communication via WhatsApp is fantastic!

Everything negative I have read on the comment before I purchased a ticket was correct. This was ride from hell. The driver was 1/2 hour late. The driving was erratic and dangerous. The air con was not strong enough, sweating profusely throughout the trip

The ferry company was very disorganized. Total confusion at the pier. Full of tourist confused as to which boat to take. Very little help and they where 1/2 hour late to leave the dock. The large ferry was safe as it sailed across the water.

Had to catch a flight and the schedule bookmebus gave me was INCORRECT! If you have to catch a flight, best you book directly from the ferry companies at the docks. There are many sailings back and forth, with different companies.
អ្នកបើកបរល្អ
Charging ports are not working but the bus crew helped me to charge my phone so all good. Good service!

bus: outdated, no wifi. The "inspector" tried to scam me to pay an extra $2 per person to "help" process my evisa at immigration. I said no, he said if I take too long, bus will leave me. I paid for your service to be THREATENED to be left behind. 1 star.
ភោជនីយដ្ឋាន ស្ទឹងសែនតម្លៃថ្លៃ ម្ហូបអត់ឆ្ងាញ់

When I booked I was under the impression that we would be picked up at Hotel(Billybong) as in past. We received a weak excuse that you were not picking up because of the Ester Festival which was over. Also I thought the bus had a toilet which it did not.

I have no comment in his driving. Only one thing is the pine scent deodorizer hanging in front the windshield which gives me the sneezing but he took it off after we made a stop 9vet near the restaurant at hiway number 5. going to Prey khmer.
Great driver, very easy service to use. Would use again.
Very good service. Was a little bit late leaving but that is to be expected. No problems at all.

The third trip I've taken with Bookmebus. The booking and payment system is so easy to use. Despite the expected duration being 3.5 hours, our driver got us there in 2.5! Absolutely thrilled as we expected the Water Fest to make it longer! Awesome service
The van was two hours late, with no update on ETA.
I arrived early and contacted them via WhatsApp. The driver was there within 10 minutes!
Nice ride
Very punctual and drive from Siem reap only took 5hours 15 mins. Nice car and good driver. Stopped for nice lunch too.
All good!
The bus driver was not focused on driving. I have had many bus trips. However, it was the first time for such a slow driver. This driver was always driving while talking to someone on the phone.
Excellent service from check in to drop off.

It was the worst trip I've taken. The schedule wasn't correct and we didn't leave kampot until 345pm. We were suppose to leave 230pm kep but that wasn't accurate.. The van was old and the suspension was out. Worst ever trip.
The return boat is difficult. Cannot find seat to sit. Overload people.
Don’t pick up this company. Awfull trip.late, i had to complain only to go to kep, what i paied for!!! Bus awfull,not enought seats for every passagers.
Very happy with our driver!!
Very happy with our driver!!
good
The trip start 30 min before the scheduled time, but we stops two times to pick up 4 people more. In place for 3 people was 4 people during all the trip

Warning!!!!!Do not use this service. The drive nearly killed us on numinous occasions as he keep on going to sleep. A four & half hour trip took 9 hours. My wife & I were furious
and we even had a few verbal arguments because of the drive. Warning !!!!
Very relaxed trip. The very friendly driver expected me on time in front of the terminal and took me to my hotel. Would use the service any time again.

Le premier van de Battambang à phnom penh avait une conduite horrible !!
Pour phnom penh à Sihanoukville, la conduite était mieux mais que d'arrêt en cours de route... De plus le chauffeur a essayé de faire descendre les touristes loin de l'arrêt prévu.

The driver drove really badly, we were terrified the entire trip. He nearly crashed into other cars on multiple occasions and followed a van, opened his window and shouted at him. He also spoke on the phone whilst overtaking vehicles the entire time.

The Mini Van can recommend, but the Agent ( OTA ) was bad, when I have a problem with a ticket, I tried to called them they just ignore, even i asked for mini van company number, they passed me to check direct with company. At least they have some respond

The driver drove carefully and it never felt unsafe, unlike other bus companies I have experienced in my travels in Cambodia. The bus also left on time which again I was quite surprised by as I have had different experience with other companies.
We were given the wrong seat number, we booked #3 and #4 but we were moved to 6,7

The service provided was terrible. The first impression I entered the bus was not good. There were no charger station and Wi-Fi as described on the website. Their service at the border (Bangkok) was very poor and I feel uncomfortable
There is no inspector hence the one star. Mekong express buses are comfortable and the service efficient. I have used them several times with no problems.
The driver drove in a very dangerous way, we really did not feel safe on board.  We arrived more than one hour and a half earlier.

This was the worst trip I have ever experienced to Kep. Driver driving irresponsibly flipping through his mobile whilst driving. Kept driving into oncoming traffic at high speeds on a road that was undergoing works. Very lucky to have got to Kep alive.
Efficient and easy. Bus was tightly packed but we arrived in good time, and the Ac worked. Would use again :)
Bus is old. Based on the booking, direct tripis about 12.5 hours but it took us about 16 hours. Traffic is not that bad. Anyway, still a good experience for us.
Departure on time with good service. bus is clear and clean and drving also feel safty.
Left 25 mins late, driver was good and safe on some difficult road / traffic. One of seats loose in back of van.

Bus left 15 minutes late. Driver rude & aggressive. Picked up other passengers along the way. Office toilet was dirty. Bus was old, stopped for repairs. A/C worked well. Wifi did not work in van. Driver did slow down later. Will never go Bayon VIP again.

Car needed to be refurbish. Help service for taxi at arrival station in Ho chi Minh will help a lot.  We were extorted by taxi No 666. The driver with tie is replaced by another driver half mile from departure. It is very traumatic
The road was bad and the driver not really carefull... scared me few times!
good sensible driver, nothing crazy. good English too

Such a faultless and smooth journey from Phnom Penh to Ho Chi Minh. The complimentary biscuits and water were a nice touch, and the conductor guided us swiftly through customs and immigration so it wasn't any trouble. I'd 100% recommend this journey.
Driver drive so fast and feel unsafe with how he drives.

Very disappointed not having been warned about the change between night bus and mini van, I would have book another bus. Instead I took the van, too noisy to sleep, no space for the legs, and very upset by my neighbor who tried to touch me many times.
We never used CTT in the end as the bus had a problem apparently. We were transfered onto a Larytta bus. It was fine but the trip took much much longer.

Driver video chat on his phone while driving They made several stops to load/unload goods & the driver helper got food and ate all day They didn’t invite us to get off to use a bathroom or communicate with us at all except to ask for 5 baht per person.

Due to language barrier, there are some things we dont understand. Maybe the driver and inspector can give us an overview of the trip at the start of trip. Overall, we can say that the trip is smooth. The driver is good and not reckless. Thank you so much
All are good. They are very accommodating and helped us with our inquiries.
Language barrier problem. Need to have a background of things at the start. But overall they are nice and safe in driving. Salute to them
Nice bus, comfortable and clean. Good driver. We’ve made 3 stops between Phnom Penh and Battambarg to eat something, stretch the legs and go to the toilet.

Won an hour on the schedule for the trip PP to SR and you get adrenaline shots all the way. Better than a theme park roller-coaster.
For more fun, driver is a third of the time on his phone sending text or calling. I assumed he was the secretary of the co

The first driver drove safely while the second one seemed to be not professional enough in driving compare to the first. 
But thanks for driving us safely.
The bus is abit old

Le chauffeur est fou, passer les 120km/h en pleine nuit sur des routes dangereuses. Plusieurs fois il a piler. Prend des risques inconsidéré, nous avons eu peur à nos vies. Je ne prendrais plus de mini van de nuit, avec un tel chauffeur.
The last row of the mini van is awful.

The driver did not bring passengers to final stop directly. He dropped off some passengers to their preferred drop-off locations which are not on the way to final stop in order to get some tips. I had been driven around and late arrival at final stop.
the company is okay.
Trip took around 2h longer than announced and bus wasn't as VIP as others, it had one more row of seats than others, making each leg space smaller.
Car was broken at night time and wait for another transferring car to pick up for nearly 2h
Drive on time!
This company is one of the best on the Phnom Penh-Saigon route. The VIP bus (twice a day) is recommended for the 1+2 per row seating. Much space for the legs and much reclining. Ideal to sleep.

That was the best schedule for me to reach Siem Reap before noon, and I almost cancelled after reading the reviews in Bookmebus. Surprisingly, that was a great and super comfy trip. The staff was super helpful. Very good bus with large seats at toilet.
Good service!!! ??

The vehicle was old and the interiors quite shabby. It looked nothing like the photos on the websites. The driver was careful and drove without hurry. The attendant made all of us feel at home instantly. Overall : great staff - badly maintained vehicle.
After the lunch break, driver slammed the passenger door shut and said វានៅឈរអាលីអាឡើនៅហ្នឹង only because he waited only for a few minutes for us to buy som dnacks. In fact no one was late at all.

Very good service, overall. The assistance with the passports while crossing the border makes everything easier. Trip took 2h longer than predicted though, which I can understand, but it would be nice to have a more realistic schedule in the site.
Awful customer service, was given incorrect information, bus was dirty, cramped and hot, driver could barely change gears, all round bad experience.

I asked three different staff members if I should do anything upon check in and they all rudely told me just to sit down. When I went to board bus was told I need to check in. I believe they are racist. The entire ride no rest because staff were yelling.
Excellent, will book again
The estimated duration online stated 4 hours: the trip in fact took us 7 hours!
Good ride, though lots of stops and we were 2 hours later than expected time but this didnt affect me

Bus was old but comfortable to make a trip from Battambang to SiemReap. The driver was good. We have made 1 stop (20 minutes).

We have arrived 1 hour late but not because of the bus. Because the roads and the traffic is complicated in Cambodia.
Too hot inside the van. There is no space for legs. It was supposed to be a 5h trip and finally it took 6h. People was too loud and noisy. Horrible.
All good. Every hour a quick stop. Nothing to complain about on this journey

The driver was a little hastening, which caused sudden brakes a couple of times.
Wi-fi service wasn’t  available in the car.
Van was clean and cool enough for the trip. We wil definitely book again.
On Time, fast. At 5pm at phnom pehm there is a lot of traffic, we arrive 1h late
Good
Good
អ្នកបើបរ ដូចជាបើកហួសល្បឿនកំណត់ ហើយមានវាជែង ក្នុងស្ថានភាពអាចប្រឈមគ្រោះថ្នាក់។
The bus was punctual and everything was ok. If you don't expect any fancy accommodation for the price,this company is good one to travel with.

Driver was late to pick us, we had to call many times, n then he was very casual, made many stops on way first to see his mother for 5 to 10 min , then take something from some one, car was comfortable though...

We booked 10.30 bus 1 month ahead, arrived 10am to be told you don't now do a 10.30.  Waited for 12.30, bus waited round corner for 20 mins then we had to change bus. Puncture on way due to driving off road, & arrived about 6pm at different bus station.

I booked air conditioning and WiFi and had none of this 
Disappointed as I have children with me travelling

The driver was aggressive.
Booking site showed that the destination was the Bayon VIP office, but we were led to get off at the bus terminal, and  had to take a tuktuk to get to our hotel near the office. Felt like being deceived.

1. យកចិត្តទុកដាក់លើភ្ញៀវអោយបានច្រើនជាងនេះ

Reasonably quick, we actually departed earlier than planned since everybody was there. Also, driver was flexible to drop us off in a convenient place in PP.
Vehicle a bit worse than thought, but acceptable (good AC and enough space)
We waited 20 minutes for a person who was late. He then made up the lost time and had us in Kratie in 4 hours. Amazing!!!!  Especially when other transportation take 7 hours.
Great service. I will use next time I need a taxi service. Thank you.
Journey was alright, just no one acknowledged me as I arrive at the departur point in HCMC which is always a bii stressful (am I at the right place?)
Good
Comments: 1. Keep schedules. 2. Follow Up customers. 3. Be careful during driving....

Overall it was very nice. This could improve:
The Wi-Fi didn't work
When we had a break, it would have been nice know how long the break was going to be, so we could order food.
The transition at the border to Vietnam sucks... Wrong information and corruption starting with the busoffice in Phnom Penh....

Check-in was easy and seating was comfortable.  Driver should have been more clear about break times, we had to wait 15 minutes for a passenger who was "stuck" in the bathroom at a rest area.  The bus lacked AC and WiFi, two things I was expecting.

Check-in was easy and seating was comfortable.  Driver should have been more clear about break times, we had to wait 15 minutes for a passenger who was "stuck" in the bathroom at a rest area.  The bus lacked AC and WiFi, two things I was expecting.

We had a nice trip from Saigon to Phnom Penh by a cruise on the Mekong, then took a bus arranged by Mekong Express to back to Saigon. Although we spent 6 hours on bus but it was ok. The driver was helpful and on time.

What bus company would leave their passengers alone at the border checkpoint? I simply cannot think of more horrifying thing for foreign travellers, not mentioning the bus broke down due to runout of gas. What a trip!
Great ride, long journey but bus was OK and driver made enough stops
The lady is not really accommodating. She should smile more. Bus indicates it has wifi but the lady did not wabt to give password
No complaints. Trip time was not too far off from the estimate. Van was in good shape with cold AC. Stop midway for gas/toilet/snack break.

Phnom Penh to Kampot. I was 3 minutes late and they were sill waiting and polite. That's unusual for Cambodia. Only negative was van had one seat more than shown on chart, so I did not get the legroom I expected. PP-Kampot took 3:45. Decent driver

Went from Battambang to Phnom Penh. Due to the condition of the roads, the ride is very rough. We made a couple of bathroom stops and a lunch stop. Bring lunch money and toilet paper. The trip was longer than on the schedule. Left 8:30am; arrived 3:30pm.
I'll be back
Made Brexit look like a child's game !!!
Bus was quite comfortable and the hotel pick up was a bonus

Booked the 4hr bus from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville ; however trip took almost 7 hours as there was a stop & went via Kampot. The 1st driver was good but once drivers changed in Kampot, the 2nd one was constantly texting or answering calls while driving
Great trip overall. The driver was on time and we made it in less the 6 hours
The journey has been very good, the bus arrived punctually at destination, I will suggest your company to other friends that will visit Cambodia
The driver is a bit quiet, but he’s good at driving. I reached the destination before expected time.
Excellent service, strongly recommend, was ready for us 10 min early, comfortable ride, super easy to book online, would use them again
I don’t like it when the vehicle is changed without prior notice.
We set off on time. 2 stops along the way.  Took 7 hours in total thought it would take 5. Driver was nice. Bus was comfy. Water was provided.
Perfect service.  Highly recommend.
Thank you for great trip

ទូដាក់ឥវ៉ាន់អត់អនាម័យ!
Shir!
Very comfortable bus making trip easy. Clear guidance from crew on boarder procedures. Only wish information about additional, higher visa costs were known upfront.

It’s taken 4,5hours from pp to the border, it’s making uncomfortable!
Because it’s less then 200 km
The curtain didn’t look clean. Sit behind driver was not comfortable enough. It stopped twice in gas station with nice toilets. Recommend if u one to travel early in morning.

Wondering if it's possible to walk on purchase tickets ever from PP to Kep. Buy ticket pay cash and travel without pre booking. My cards from Canada would not work had a friend book my tickets. This was not ideal.
The van wasn’t a van but a very comfortable 8 seater - really great journey and we arrived early
The bus supposed to leave at 6:30pm but it was delayed till 7:10pm. However, the bus and the driver is nice except the delaying of the departure.
Safe service and relatively efficient. Would use again
Driver got us to Siem Reap in record time.
Was happy.

This was supposed to be a direct journey to Ho Chi Minh. In fact, there was a change, and we arrived 4 hours later than anticipated. The bus stopped often for the passengers to spend money at Mekong facilities. Not recommended.

Old vehicle rattling like mad, a/c not working so everyone sweating profusely, late departure in PNH by 30 min,, stopped 4 times to pick up people on roadside, no wifi - 'broken', no bottle of water which is standard now, 8 hours PNH to Bbang.  TERRIBLE.
Okay

Good information and service at departure in Phnom Penh . Good safe driver, comfortable ride . Good punctality. Always going to be about 6 hours so website booking should indicate  this . Never  5 hours
Great on time taxi service. Thanks
Arrival was 45 min earlier of expected time. Temperature  inside was ok. Overall good service.

Delayed departure, van broke down multiple times along the way, ended up at destination 1h45 later than expected. Driver took unnecessary risks and dangerous driving when comparing with drivers from other companies.

Really unsafe, I acknowledge driving in Cambodia is hard but he was off roading to undertake lorries, overtaking into oncoming traffic- due to this we had a flat tyre which he got pumped up and continued on- didn’t fix/change tyre. Would not recommend.
It's a safe trip. The driver is good.
Leave on time and arrive on time. Clean car with free water.
I lost one ticket. I called to change another time. They said no even next car has available seats
They should clarify its 2 person pero bed, we were 3 people and 1 of us had to share the bed with a stranger, it’s better to book a regular bus, very uncomfortable
Today i met an accident i felt like not safety and not responsible too maybe next time i never use your van again
Ac not cold and car so old
Bus stoped not at the same bus stop written on ticket. Bus stop was 25 minutes far away from sihanoukville.

Bus was an hour late to leave and more than hour late to destination. Hope there will be a more efficient bus conpany that launches SR to battambang. As the lack of competition has lead to poor service and punctuation

The driver was friendly and good humoured. My seatbelt worked. The only negative is that the driver appeared to speak no English at all and the vehicle was quite old. But the driver's friendliness made a great difference and he drove acceptably.
Very accommodating crew and very helpful.
Late arrival due to traffic, but driver drove safely along the way. Seats were comfortable.
Driver Long Sok arrived on time at pick up point. Efficient and very friendly
Best service

Glad I choose GTCV for our ferry. On the way to the island we left right on time. Heading back to Sihanoukville the ferry was a little late but nothing significant. Boat was clean and fast. Driver was safe. Overall, smooth, positive experience! Recommend.
Thanks great service
Virak butham vip van are the most comfortable vann transport I never had for the last years. Driving safe.
Very satisfied ! No delay and the driver was really professional and nice. I highly recommend
The Company office has relocated to the Yasmin Cafe beside the pier. Our taxi driver advised us of this. We were not advised of this by the company. Ferry left an hour and ten minutes late.
Overall the ride was very good, but the driver was a bit erratic and noisy always honking the horn.

Our flight  arrived ahead of schedule, the driver was for us He took us via some back roads and we arrived at our destination at least thirty minutes before other passengers who were on our flight. He also advised us that we had incorrect location.
The sleepboxes is to small for two adults.

There were NO space for the legs or backpacks. The air condition was broken, so on the 6 hours I was in the bus, the cold air blow me on my neck, head and shoulder. Horrible! The driver spoke no word English. For good transportation, book somewhere else!!

Alles in allem wirklich kein Grund zu klagen. Wir hatten großes Glück, die Fahrt von Sihanouk ville nach Phnom Penh am.Mittag war kaum besetzt  und wir konnten die drei Plätze hinter dem Fahrer belegen. Zwei kkurze Pausen für Toilette, pünktliche Ankunft

8am a tuktuk dropped us off at another company. 2h trip, became 3h and not deposited in the right place not planned. reserved seats already allocated ...

Bus left Phnom Penh more than 30min late. Driver stopped numerous times to buy himself food without making any attempt to communicate how long we were stopping for. He drove fairly aggressively trying to catch up time. Pretty standard trip I guess..
Drove way too fast, took risks on the road, did not care about safety of passengers. NO WIFI  AND NO WATER. Never again....

Very good service for the Phnom Pehn - Siem Reap travel. The van was on time on departure, ñ driving felt very safe, and we arrived have an hour early.

Good service

I say no more trip with this company.

Loads of legroom, safe driver, more comfortable than expected. Border crossing to Cambodia was messy, at fault, partly staff, passengers and the system, but all well in the end. Passengers doing a little research on border crossing beforehand would help.

My only complaint is that the driver was a little too fast in general; and we did hit/kill a dog on the way.  But, this is a great ride - the stops along the way are mercifully few and short unlike most companies.
4 hours advertised, it took 6. Wifi advertised as well as water, both wasn't available.
Driver on a cellphone the entire trip! Roads are bad (expected) but the cellphone made the trip dangerous!

The van was 45 minutes late and it took six hours instead of five, which made us arrive 1h45m later than expected. Very cheap, but if you have the money, I would recommend to invest in a better transport. The rooster in the luggage was pretty silent.

4 hours turn into 6,5 hours and thats no good! Why they say its 4h trip cos they know its not! Well now I know betteralso. I had ferry reservation so I had To say To the driver that no stopping and I did not step out of van so he had To continue the trip
A driver had a bad attitude, talked shit about the customer, driving crazy, ask for money. Car number is 2AP-9643 (46)

., zero no buz have arrived there on time but there were no buz to pick me up. I called the contact number but they say they can't talk to me in English. They just put my life in danger and caused me a lot of time. Not recommended.
The bus was late, got a flat tire, driver drove dangerously. We should receive money back for this trip.

The ride from Phnom Penh to Mondulkiri lasted about 6.5hours included two short stops. The minivan was comfortable with AC. 
We left Phnom Penh pretty much on time (a few minutes after 9.30am)
The road is in an excellent shape. Pretty smooth ride.

This bus is a much smaller bus compared to the bus from Siem Reap to be Battambang. And the driver told all the passengers to load their luggage on the back of the bus seats - he stack them on TOP of one another! Dangerous if the bus brakes suddenly.

Be sure to check when you book with this Ferry. The company didn't include that they were making a second stop in Koh Rong after pick up in KRS, which delayed us by an extra hour. They advertised a 40 min boat ride when it turned into almost 2 hours!

I was already delayed from my Ferry in Sihanouk, but the driver waited for me. One area to improve is for the driver to be aware of airport departure time (PNH), could've helped with getting through traffic and extra urgency to make it to airport.

Very careful driver, stopped 2 times.
Departed on time. 
No wifi onboard although said to be.
But in total very satisfied with the trip!

Terrible service! The bus was supposed to leave at 1:30pm. By 2:40pm the mini bus hadn’t arrived, so we lost our patience and booked a private taxi from Sihanoukville to Kampot, with others from the group joining us. Bad rating to go on TripAdvisor
Great and safe drive!
clean car, safe driving, in time arrival, recommended operator
Very long nuit the right timing indicated. An

You have to have absolutely trust in the driver. But he knows what he is doing. This is not Europe, this is Cambodia. So his driving skills are fabulous. He is totally and constantly focused. The way he overtakes trucks and other cars. Great driving!

Hi. My driver did not show up. Nobody was there. I would like a refund please. Are you a scam company? Please make contact via my email to arrange. I will be pursuing this further. 
Thank you
Adam
Such a deeply low service, serve a cheap attitude to the customer. Do not have responsibily to the time departure. So cheat...the customer won't get the service as expected. Do not recommend....

He was at the wrong pickup point so we got away late. The trip ended up being seven hours not four. No music limited English and he spent majority of the drive on his phone talking loudly so even sleep was not possible.

It was quite chaotic on the pier. Very hard to understand which boat that goes to which destination. Also hard to communicate that we wanted to be dropped off at the Hill Beach pier once we got on the correct boat.
Safetybelt at the righthandside at the back is in a bad shape and in case of an accident it might torn.
Very punctual. Driver super friendly.

Didn't have a visa to cross through Vietnam from Phnom Penh as an American...it was my fault and was told if i pay 200 dollars i can still go. Not sure if scam, when i said no, the workers laughed at me and said "good luck."
Driver waiting with sign (as requested) in easy to find spot after I exited customs. Excellent ride and found hotel with little difficulty.

Our driver, Chiva was waiting for us on arrival at the airport, having sent an sms 10 minutes earlier with confirmation of the meeting point. Very pleased with the experience and can recommend the service
Everything was ok. The bus arrived on time; I was at my hotel 20.30. (Very good compared to December last year when the bus was very much delayed)
Good trip, good driver ( very skilled)  but people allowed to carry too much luggage which blocks up the alley way which is a safety risk !
over all ok, just the timing is a little off

Was good overall, driver picked us up on time. The only thing was the arrival time was an hour later than advertised though this was likely due to the poor road conditions/road works. Accommodation N/A

Was good overall, driver picked us up on time. The only thing was the arrival time was an hour later than advertised though this was likely due to the poor road conditions/road works. Accommodation N/A
Arrived slightly early.  The ride was comfortable enough. Decent driver
Big bus but they didn't let you store the bags in the hold so had to carry it all on. I had booked a seat which they gave to someone else. Luckily enough space on the bus.

The coach & trip was wonderful but  online experience required chasing bookmebus to issue  the tickets and when visiting the operator bookmebus hadn't notified them so we had to get new seats issued. On the border crossing operator gave no instructions.

To Stung Theng and the connection to Don Det, including the boat ride and the border crossing, went smoothly. However...
....the bus arrived half-hour late at 05:00. Waiting on an empty street, with a closed office, caused anxiety about a missed bus.

This is the worst experience i've ever had with Express company in Cambodia. The driver is extremely rude. Staff are irresponsible and unfriendly. They depart and arrive very late. Miscommunication between staff will ruin your trip and theydont even care.

250words won't be enough to describe the worst experience with buva sea. They always arrived at least 1 hour late, the staff are rude. will scream at you for no reasons. we miss our van. They changed their schedule likemad. some people miss their flights
The bus is not like in the the description present at the moment of the booking. Seats were broken, no safety belt and no electricity charger.

Un servicio muy bueno en todos los sentidos. El vehículo prácticamente a estrenar y muy cómodo. Paradas suficientes para ir al baño. La conducción en Camboya es complicada, pero bueno... Dentro de lo que cabe, el conductor ha sido prudente.
Driver was on time, helpful and polite.
All perfect
A bit longer at control.

For a family of four travelling from BKK to Siem Reap the experience was good and kids had an experience of the life time going through the land based immigration. Bus departed 30 min late, though at the end the arrival time at Siem Reap had no impact.

Driver was punctual and made good time but turned up with no car seats. Apparently they don’t have them so it is misleading and questionable for bookmebus to offer them as it falsely markets a product they don’t have.
Exactly as offered. Driver waiting at time arranged and comfortable vehicle. Excellent choice.

I'm satisfied, start punctual, we arrived later than planned but only a bit. Nice low price. Regular stops (every 2 hours or so) for WC, breakfast, lunch. Driver was talking on the phone almost whole time, and was driving too fast but seemed in control.

Dear bookmebus, your website sell hotel bus from the company but it give us normal seat and no real seat arrangement at all! It is your fault To provide wrong Seat arrangement on you app for customers to book. Ur website suppose to be reliable.

L'unica cosa positiva la puntualità. Il van era sporco ancora con i rifiuti lasciati dai passeggeri precedenti, poco confortevole, poco spazio. L' autista non gentile, niente  confronto a Mekong express

Booked a private taxi from PP to Battambang at 7 am. We stood at pickup address 15 mins early as advised. Driver wasn't there at 7 so we texted the number. Driver showed up 55 minutes late. Then stopped for breakfast 2 hours later. Would never use again.
I was expect a VIP minin van but it turns out a very old car

Very bad. Not recommend to use this company. The staff is rude, and I book night sleeping bus, but when the time come they said have only seat bus, so everyone spend the whole night with uncomfortable. The worst travelling ever!!!!

The bus arrived 1h and a half late and nobody could tell me when or which bus was mine.
The luggage had to be taken with us inside because the storage was too full, there were more people inside than the max capacity so some were sleeping on the floor
ការធ្វើដំណើរល្អ។

Driver picks up random people along the way ! Almost two hours late arrival. Loud music during the whole trip (starting 6 am) and we got dropped of randomly 30 minutes out of town and forced to take a tuktuk and pay an additional 20 dollars. Never again!

Very nice and professional service. Driver was very courteous and nice. Took great care and drove safely.

Definitely recommended ??
Driver drives so fast
Services were good but the departure time was delay 1 hour.
Awesome service and smooth driver! Very well recommended mode of transportation from Siem Reap to PNH
Travelling on this bus is not great but if you plan to travel by bus there one might not get enough options. People are really kind and good and somehow able to communicate using google translate
Doing good

bus system in Cambodia was awesome!!
they picked me up from hotel to the station. BUT! if there was not ur hotel list, you'd have difficultief to get pick up service. I recommend you go directly to the station by yourself.
Ferry was 40 Mins late; no safety instructions
Driver didn‘t speak english; He disappeared for 20 Mins without explanation and had lunch; driving style a bit risky but safety belts in the back worked and made us feel quite safe
ឡានឈប់យកមនុស្សតាមផ្លូវច្រើន នឹង បើកបរយឺត
Very good driver and service i never met in Cambodia.
Why can't I cancel my trip?
it was fantastic because allthough we were 20 minutes delay we got our connection to kratie!!! really great!!!! and the bus driver dropped us directly in front of our guest house. thank you!!!!
Great Bus trip, but got stuck in traffic in siem reap but all good
the trip was o.k. but unfortunately we were 1 1/2 hour late in phom phem so we had a lot of trouble to catch our conneted bus. regards claudia
I wasn't able to take the bus but I did attempt to get in touch with customer support via chat and email and still have yet to hear from them.

We were travelling from Kep to Phnom Penh 1:45pm vip van and our experience was terrible. The driver was picking up people from the street to earn extra money and so the bus was packed. The driver was very impolite and drove harshly. Never take this van.

Everything went well.
Departure/arrival on time. Comfortable seat, good driver, several stops to allow you to eat or go to the toilet.Hifhly recommended

Hi , 

I had used the service using BookMeBus long time ago. This was a first time for me to experience with bad service with this transport company. 

It was very irritated. 

First, seat number were overlap. 
Second, bus collect people all on the way.

They never arrange properly on the delivery things. 
They let the passengers waited too long. 
Finally, the arrival time late 1 hour. This was very irritated.

At first the driver was really friendly but he took on the way a girl with us and she paid for the short trip. We paid for a private taxi so I think this was not suitable.
At the end of our trip he was naughty and want a tip and was really unfriendly
Friendly driver, arrived early, safe driving, pleasant journey.

The worst Cambodian experience ever! Our driver was rude, constantly yelling, and very unprofessional. He picked up 6 hitchhikers off the road, was constantly blaring his horn, and ran over every pot hole possible. I did not feel safe. Fucking asshole.
Good trip. I suggest this company.
Wifi was not available.
Good driver, safety first! This was really appreciated. The car was modern, just a bit dirty, but nothing serious.
xx

Me and my kiwi friend traveled with this company and I can honestly say it was amazing. I wish planes where that comfortable! Aircon was great, we where only slightly late which was expected for New Years and plenty of stops! Would recommend.

Our pick up time should be 9.10am. But we can't met your driver on time. We are waited your driver about 30 mins.
After we get in the car, he is driven to find gas and find the place to full fill wheels.
Half a hour late departur time because We waited on somebody that never showed up.
suppose to leave at 11pm but leave around 12pm instead. receptionist don't tell clear information and a bit rude
Driver drove too fast!!!!!! Please check on this!!!
the bus's air-condition not working properly, diver dive so bad and the bus quality is so bad.
Driver is talkative and funny it made the trip back more enjoyable.

Dangerous driver 
Very poor condition mini bus. We arrived about 2 hours later than scheduled
AC was barely functioning

Good condition van
AC worked like a charm
The driver and the controller were driving safely and did some breaks to rest in between long driving hours
We arrived about 30 min after scheduled time but considering the road condition this is totally fine

The young driver seems always in rush with aggressive driving (not sure if it's due to stress in the end of year).
But he still speak normally with customers.
For space, not recommend for big people and large luggage, and their meal break is 20 minutes.

Suppose to be a 3.5 hours trip from Kampot to Phnom Penh, took a total of 5.5 hours and we miss our flight. On the way to Phnom Penh, they do side jobs of picking up and dropping off packages and mails. Do not recommend if you are expecting a flight.

The beds were so small that two people couldn’t fit in. And also the air condition was so high that we got sick because it can not be turned off and it blowed right to our face and neck. But we arrived on time.
Anything all right like every time

I found the driver was expert in driving on the way from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh.
The car was clean and comfortable seat.

Our night bus broke down so we resorted to private taxi. The driver was very nice, punctual and accommodating. Roads are not well lit at night so we chose to stay up and keep driver company with the music on but I think it would have been fine anyway.

The bus ride took 9+ hours. We kept stopping every twenty minutes. Myself and 5 others got off the bus outside Sihanoukville and paid for a tuktuk because we would have been on the bus for another hour.
Departure wrong tag , Information for bus type also get wrongly . Please renew your website ...
Very good service, polite driver and very good communication with staff in bookmybus.com.  We wanted to change our VAN ticket for private taxi and they arranged it very promptly. Thank you so much.

The bus delayed by more than 2 hours. I can understand there’s jam, BUT, I have asked beforehand if we can drop at other location, the staff said NO. End up throughout the trip, the driver randomly dropped off people and caused more delay.

The bus delayed by more than 2 hours. I can understand there’s jam, BUT, I have asked beforehand if we can drop at other location, the staff said NO. End up throughout the trip, the driver randomly dropped off people and caused more delay.

Driver was lovely and nice but she was on her phone too much. It’s okay to take phone call but she is too busy looking at phone to drive. We had a long day driving and just wanted to get to hotel. We would have gotten there faster if she paid attention
Air conditioner is not worked and it’s hot full day during driving and the Company didn’t give any water or some snack to passengers with no friendly talks and he’s look to aggressive.
Ma pire expérience cambodgienne
Great night bus experience overall! Just need to calibrate better the hotel pickup! Beside this all good!
Driver, he drives the car by taking the phone all the time, and drive by his mind mind ( angry ? drive sometimes ( not not satisfy customer satisfy his mind)

Very happy overall. Two recommendations for you (1) driver could not locate us, because the bookmebus form requires that you choose map location, better you can write hotel name (2) I wrote hotel name in Note, but Note data not given to driver, should be.
Feel comfortable with this company

តៃកុងឡានមិនដឹងថាដឹកភ្ញៀវទៅខេត្តណា ព្រោះគាត់មកជំនួសគេហើយមេក៏មិនបានប្រាប់ រហូតដល់តៃកុងឡានខលសួរមេ បានដឹង។ ទីតាំង និងពេលវេលាដែលត្រូវឲ្យភ្ញៀវឈប់សម្រាកញាំបាយក៏មិនដឹងច្បាស់លាស់ ។ ឡានបើកទៅមុខរៀងផែលៗ វេៗ ហើៗ ពួកខ្ញំពុលឡានសឹងទាំងគ្នា ។
Too much stop over
OK, so we did arrive on time and actually a bit early. But would have preferred 30 min later and the driver could have slow down a bit.

Trip from PP to Kampot took longer than expected. I thought it takes around 3.5 to 4 hours, but it took 6 hours for the trip, driving across Kep before going to Kampot, stop multiples times. I may not use this bus again cos the duration is so long.
សៀមរាបភ្នំពេញ​ ០១-០១-២០២០​ ១០am មានទំនួលខុសត្រូវខ្ពស់​ ទោះមានឧបសក្គតែគាត់អាចបត់បែនលឿន
Highly recommend

We were fairly pleased with the private taxi service. The driver was on time, he drove a bit fast and "agressive", but we never felt unsafe. The communication was tricky since he didn't speak english. But everything worked out great.

The driver spent the first two hours loudly exchanging private voice messages on WhatsApp and the rest of the trip listening to very loud music on YouTube. The all time he wouldnt stop burping and smoking in the vehicle. Terrible experience.
Very comfortable mini-van. Driver was safe and on time.
Our driver was great.  Plenty of stops, comfortable ride, I would use again.

Pire expérience de tout le séjour et pourtant on en a fait des trajets ! Organisation nulle, précisions dans les réservations nulles aussi, l'attente a Phnom Penh pour changer de bus durant 3h une horreur, amabilité 0
So good
Driver was punctual and friendly. He knew the route very well and we arrived at the expected time.

I am usually very happy with BookMeBus. Unfortunately this time, the van was very old, with amazingly uncomfortable seats (leaning forward) and no seat belts for any of the back seats despite a request for this. The driver also brought a personal friend.

the bus was almost 30 min late and I booked the front seats but they had me moved to the back seat and the bus stopped along the way to pick up customers without tickets and make us girls seated next to random guys. It was the most uncomfortable trip.
Luckily, there was an English-speaking Vietnamese passenger. Otherwise, it would’ve been a lot harder as I booked and paid online, and the driver didn’t speak/understand English at all.

I was so lucky that I met an English-speaking Vietnamese passenger who helped me with communicating with the driver and other staffs regarding my online booking and payment. They always seemed mad and easily irritated when we couldn’t communicate in VNese

I love this bus company: everyone is very efficient and super courteous. Driver is safe and friendly and takes care of passengers at customs/immigration. I took them from HCMC to Phnom Penh and then from Phnom Penh back to HCMC. They great both ways!

No respect for time
Poor service
Trucks are difficult to travel
The Driver and the the staff are Ok. The car are quite tiny seat to accomodate 15 passenger.
Driver prompt and courteous. The road from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville is precarious but the driver felt safe. Thank you.
Poor servic
The Steung Sen restaurant that they stop for lunch/dinner break, they were too rude, unhygienic, and bad service. Mekong Express should reconsider to stop at other restaurants.
My seat was broken, I didn't have enough space but the guide was veery nice

Phnom Penh- Sihanoukville. El servicio ha sido muy bueno, aunque el autobús era más antiguo que para Siem Reap. El problema ha sido la puntualidad, ya que indicaba un viaje de 4 horas y ha durado 6,5. Cuidado si tenéis enlaces.
Driver was very friendly,  but over 1.5 hours late.

Salió media hora más tarde, pero la hora de llegada fue casi puntual. Es un poco caótico el acceso y los asientos no son numerados, así que lo mejor es ir con tiempo, porque es probable quedarse en tierra aún con billete.

Should take care customer more. You should have a training course for receptionist about your app and technology, how to check customer ticket booking on the app. Do not change customer seat after they booked online.
Good, fast and quit drive.

BookMeBus's e-ticket should show the price of the ticket as well. On other note to Cambotra company, if possible please change the stop place (the restaurant near Krokor). The food are not good but expensive. Thanks.
Very good and save driver, thanks for good service. We have travelled with other companies, but this was the best.

I was on the bus and felt like it's not going to work well. But I think the drivers didn't notice and identified problems before the bus was leaving from Siem Reap. If the problem is identified early, we might not have to take 10 hours to come to PP.
No air conditioning
delayed statting 1 hour without any reason. terrible vehicle and driving.
Very good pick up service! Will book again from kampot to phnom penh!
Good bus, on time departure and save drive. Perfect!
Very good
Although the booking was for a 12-seater van, the vehicle that was sent was a much smaller 6-seater. We had intentionally booked a larger vehicle because we had a lot of baggage.
The driver stopped many timea to pick up passengers Long the way, this led him to drove fast and killed 2 lil puppies. His driving is okay but he's a killer.
His driving is good, but he stopped to pick up things from his company station many times, which extended time of traveling. Overal is fair good but not recommended for the elders.
Very punctual actually ahead of time

I was Informed by the passengers that the driver said he did not know he has to drop the passengers past the Japanese bridge. I think it was his technique to complain to get tip. I am not happy with this, when I booked I specify the pick up and drop off

The bus we planned to take was swapped for a sleeper bus, we were emailed in advance about this change. it meant we could comfortably sleep if we wanted Arrived early which was good. The service spot was expensive. Overall we were happy.

Driver stopped 20 min after departure to have breakfast for 30 minutes. Also stopped several times to pick up other passengers for extra money and transported other goods. Even though there was no excess traffic the journey took 65 minutes longer.
Perfect trip to Vietnam. Careful driver, professional and friendly attendant. Everything went smoothly reg. border control etc. Mekong Express recommended!

Bus was reasonably comfortable not as good as other buses we caught in Vietnam. The air con didn’t seem to work very well, the bus smelt of moth balls and they played a movie very loudly of which I think no passengers were actually watching.
Our driver is the BEST! we brought our dog with us and he's super cool with it.
the driver is super cool and he kept saying sorry when there's a bumpy road.
Customer service was bad. She called me if I go then I told her I don’t go then she finish the call. It was so rude to way to talk to customer.
Not as fast as advertised but not sure how it could be. Driver was nice. Bus was okay--mostly clean and aircon worked. Some roaches on the bus. Thx for the water and wipes.
Bus was late with not enough seats, seat numbers were double booked.

The bus was late and when it arrived it was small for the amour of people that needed to fit in. One seat was loose. Luckily there was airconditioning and the ride was short and arrived in time. Good; Bus driver stopped at request for a toilet break.
Quite a good service, and new van. Like the service. Another company I would look for to go with next time.

We got to our destination - just 4 and a half hours later than planned. The buses were fine, driver / staff fine, but I wouldn’t recommend getting this if you have somewhere to be at your destination. Ended up travelling from 08:30am - 11:30pm.
Driver is not friendly, bad characteristic, talked to woman while driving.

I took the Siem Reap to Bangkok busm The bus reached the poipet transit zone from Siem reap at 5 AM. We were taken to immigration at 6.20 AM where already there was a big queue. It would have been easier if we were asked to get down at least 20 Mrs earlie
Never got the bus because the guy at the office kept lying and saying the bus was stuck at the airport. First 1 hour then 2 hours then 3. So I got a private driver, will never book with you again.

The driver was very punctual and he brought us breakfast! Very kind. We stopped for one bathroom break which was good as is didn’t take too much time for the travel. AC worked. Small seats but it’s fine for a 3-4 hour ride.

Overall an awesome ride however the wifi was apparently not working (though I do believe the attendant simply did not know the password). They gave us water and an entire box of crackers! I would use this service again.

It is joy comfortable in the car since the customers who was picked up along the road open a video player with a heavy sound. It is not affordable environment compare to the price of what I have purchased the ticket. Please check it

It is joy comfortable in the car since the customers who was picked up along the road open a video player with a heavy sound. It is not affordable environment compare to the price of what I have purchased the ticket. Please check it
Bus was 90 minutes late
Cheap. Reasonably good

The trip was good. The bus speed was good enough that  I felt very safe.
My feedback would be for the toilet in the bus. There were no water to use. 
hopefully that gets addressed for a more convenient trip.

We paid the full price for horrriible tiny seats right next to the driver. Nice guy but I’m 190 cm tall so WTF?! It was the worst! VIP my a**! Ryanair is pure luxury against that. 6 hours is a long time. No seatbelt. And trust me you want one!
Shock absorber broken

Overall everything went well. But when we were almost at our destination the driver couldn’t find the hotel. And it seemed that he did not know how to use the gps of his phone. It ended up with me activating data roaming on my phone to direct him.

You need to change bus at the border, go through the immigration yourself and take another bus after the border. I had to go figure out myself how to do that and where to go. It would have been good if someone explained that before.

Bangkok - PP. You need to change bus at the border, go through the immigration yourself and take another bus after the border. I had to go figure everything out myself how to do that and where to go. It would have been good if someone explained that befor
Driver drives recklessly. Suddenly overpass some cars without giving signal. And drive over speed.
It's my first time travelling with Ekareach. Yet it's quite satisfying, the Van Driver is really friendly, and helpful. And the departure time is punctual following to the schedule.

We weren’t picked up as agreed. When calling the company they said there we’re no such agreement. The bus was 30 minutes late. The trip took 5 hours as the bus had to had its tire replaced. The bus’ condition did not match the picture.
The boat was crammed and was told to get off at the wrong stop resulting in having to spend a further$40 for canoe taxi to koh Rong Sanleon.

Departed on time but the advertised journey time of 5 hours is a serious underestimate. We'd been on the bus for 7 hours when we took the decision to jump out on the outskirts of Sihanoukville & take a tuktuk. The bus would've taken at least 30 mins more.

We left on time (or like 5-10mins late but still ok) and arrived on time, stopped twice so it was a smooth ride. It could be nicer if you gave informations about where we should meet the car in Siem Reap bus station as there is no informations

Good: The van was clean, but it was quite warm. Driver was good. The toilet break was properly timed at the +2 and +4 hours. We reached the destination one hour before the scheduled time. 
Bad: No bottled water was given to us.
អ្នកបើកបរឧស្សារឈប់ដាក់ម៉ូយ

Standard is slowly going down with this company, compared to when they started to operate... No water, 15 minutes late departure, driver looking he's just out from a party at 7 AM... Sad... That service was good and really convenient before.
First driver would not recommend,second driver much better.First driver late picking up.Second driver friendly and helpful.
Good driver; prompt; could explain some places along the way.
Ferry to the island was fine; return ferry stopped in middle of water; crew got it working again, but we were late returning.
Good driver; prompt; explained some places along the way

Excellent service - driver was waiting at ferry dock with our name, pre-agreed as the road to the dock was inaccessible by car. We completed the 5-hour drive to Phnom Penh Airport on time while driving with care. The driver was very pleasant and helpful.

Unorganised, thieving and incompetent. Bus driver allows tuk tuk drivers to unload bags. Therefore possessions get stolen. Buses don't run anywhere near advertised time of departure for connections. Mild racism...Khmer get priority

Other than feeling like the driver was going to crash head on multiple times to on coming traffic trying to weave around cars and talking on his cell phone while driving it was okay. Almost had a panic attack a couple of times with his driving.
It's acceptable to all categories✌
The trip was fine; one hour or so delayed, but no big probleme -
យកមូយតាមផ្លូវច្រើនណាស់

The bus departed with 2 hours delay. Then we came into a traffic jam. On the way, approximately 40 km from Phnom Penh, the bus broke down and we had to take a tuktuk for another 12 $. The bus was rather taken by locals, since we were the only foreigners.
Cool and safe ride from PP to Siem Reap. Thank you.
Excellent organizational operations. Adjusted on the fly to accomadate other travel srvcs highly recommend

The beds are a lot lot smaller than the photos. Overall the journey was OK but when I left the bus my luggage was soaking wet. It must have been laying in something wet in the under carriage. Tried to talk to the man about it but he was busy couldn't wait

First of all, the company forgot to pick us up in our hotel and we had to call them ourselves. Afterwards it was smooth till the bus. Bus drive was good and we had a stop at a nice place. So overall we are happy.

It is a great service and you helped us with everything - especially at the borders. One thing, the pickup and drop off points were different than the ones mentioned in the ticket. This was very confusing, please inform your passengers in advance.
The driver from Phnom Penn to Siem Reap was really great. He met us on time and drove us to hotel in Siem Reap. The car was clean with good a/c. The driver was friendly and drove very well.

Driver was early, polite, car was clean. 
There was no communication before the trip, I had to message the company an hour before to check they were coming. They did respond promptly to my messages.
The driver keep nagging about the traffic from Phnom Penh to SHV. He drove like fast and furious ! And rudeeeeeee !

Don't book from Kep to PP as the bus goes through Kampot and you have to sit and wait for the driver to arrive from Sihanoukville. We left Kep at 230pm, should have arrived in PP between 530 and 6pm. Arrived at 830pm.
Sakal Meas

My seat had no seatbelt which was not advertised otherwise I never would have booked the seat. The driver drove like a maniac the whole journey, we made several stops (one for 30 minutes) and finally we arrived over an hour late. Worst journey ever.
The bus was smelly. The places to use toilet and eat along the road were terrible. The seats old and broken.
Accommodation, Inspector ??
Overall travel experience was good. However, the whole trip took 3.5 hours instead of 3 hours. My driver had to wait for half an hour to pick me up to the hotel.
Very good service
Excellent service both to/from PP airport.  Very prompt replies and good support from 'SIM' on Live Chat. Recommended.
Phnom Penh  to HaTien  was very good and fast trip. I recommend it.

Very good service. Pickup from town was excellent. 
Make your booking directly on their website for the lowest price.
I suggest that instead of locking the bus door while passengers are inside during a stopover, Mekong Express should have left at least one staff to assist them.
The bus was on time, clean and driver was very pleasant. Unfortunately we came across a World bike race, first for Cambodia. This resulted in a 3 hr traffic jam. Driver remained happy. Good job?

The driver arrived at the right time at the border. The problem is that during all the trip he was on his phone while driving. He was not driving safely so we asked him to stop using his phone. At the end of the trip, he didn't say bye to us.
Driver crazy

Bus broken down after like 40 minutes, we waited 1.5hours.
My seat was not adjustable to get to a beter position, at the next bus it was, no wifi is on the bus. 
Busses were pretty like 20 years old, the second smelled.like a petrol station.
Mekong Express = Mosquito Express. Wear lots of repellant! But otherwise good service.

Voyage ponctuel entre sihanoukville et battambang. Changement de bus à 1h du mat' à Phnom Penh.
Les places du bas sont beaucoup plus étroite que celle du haut... Si vous réserver prenez les places B (étage du haut). Pas de lumière perso dans le bus
Reliable as always. My first choice

Bus broke down in the middle of the road and the inspector didn’t explain what have happened so all the passenger were force to disembark from the bus and collect luggage in the middle of the road which is very dangerous.

Everything was fine until they picked up an extra person that was not part of the seat assignment and they put him sitting on a bag of rice, right next to me. I was squished and this extra person was sitting on my seat. I had barely any room. It was dumb.
The bus was stopped for 2 hours due to bike race, AC stayed on for the whole wait which was great!
The bus was stopped for 2 hours due to bike race, AC stayed on for the whole wait which was great!
The trip was ok.
Very friendly staff, everything went great! We would totally do it again...
The driver picked us up in time and delivered us in time. I tolk action when he realized that We were short on time. BUT SOME ENGLISH WOULD BE NICE IF THE DRIVER COULD SPEAK.
Phnom Penh to HaTien was very good and fast trip, the driver is very friendly.

The driver wanted two of us to share a seat for over 2 hours to Kampot. This would have been extremely uncomfortable and the manager was only willing to offer us one free ticket despite making two people very uncomfortable.

excellent service and excellent driver, due to flight delay we left at 20.30 from siem reap to battambang but changing time, contact with bookmebus went very fine and driver was ready at the airport. He was one of the best and safe drivers ever! Big tnx-s

Company service not good, booking departure time 4:00am, in policy inform to arrive bus station 20min before departure time. But actual the van arrive 4:30am. I had call to office few times to ask but no one pick up my phone. And  take customer on the way
It was too cold due tu air conditioning

We booked a ticket for 1.30 pm and they canceled it to combine with the bus later at 2.30 pm to fill the bus. They told us it was for the traffic but we understood this was not the reason since the seats we booked on the bus of 1.30 pm was already booked.
Driver driving so rude, never know traffic law in Cambodia.
It's a very good travel

No Follow to customer.
Not well respone to customer

សម្ដីគ្មាន សុជីវធម៌ ឈ្លើយ ឡានគ្មានផាសុកភាព 
គ្មានការជិះលើកទី២ទេ

The bus is quite old and dirty. else the trip is uneventful. Bus Guide can give more details about holding onto our passports especially during border crossing as we are foreigners and not used to having to separate from our passports for extended period.
Driver so rude. Doesn't know how to drive.

This driver is not qualified  to be a driver for such fancy VIP van. His attitude seem to not care about customer inside the van. I strongly recommend that he shall educated more from Management  Team or else just fire him.
Good
Excellent service, the ride was super comfortable. We did not feel the 5 hours ride at all. I recommend it for families as well.

A terrible trip;late pickup from hotel by Tuktuk; late departure by bus, not VIP van, from ME office; mechanical breakdown on Sisop bypass road; hours sitting on the ground waiting for another bus. It arrived with no water for the hot and thirsty guests
Everything perfect. Nice and helpfull staff

All good. Driver was great, roads fantastic, (compared to being here 20 years ago!). Route was Siem Reap to Kratie via route 6, then 71,then turning off to the Mekong through Phumi Spoe Tbong. We followed the left-hand bank and ferried over 30 S of Kratie

This trip was very good. However we had another trip booked with Mekong Express between Sihanoukville and Phnom Penh - we found out the SAME DAY that they cancelled this route!! No notification at all. It wil also take 3-4 WEEKS to get reimbursed.

The bus itself was ancient and not comfortable at all. The worse part was the staff member's unhelpful attitude throughout as she gave us no guidance about the Visa and insisted on us paying extra to both leave Vietnam (1 USD) and enter Cambodia (5 USD).

The temperature on the bus was freezing and the  air conditioner was very noisy. Almost impossible to sleep during the night!
The sleeping sits were comfortable.

The temperature on the bus was freezing and the  air conditioner was very noisy. Almost impossible to sleep during the night!
The sleeping sits were comfortable.

The time taken for the trip was advertised as 3 hrs, when the journey takes a full 4 hrs. The roads are not very good. The minivan is a pretty tight squeeze, poor leg room. 
That said, the AC is ok, price is good and driver was safe with his driving.
Driver driving good.

Our first bus was amazing and our guide was lovely. He dealt with a lot of bad situations very well. I was frustrated that the trip was supposed to be 5.5 hours and turned into 7. That's not counting the hour we had to stop to wait for a second bus.
Perfect ride. I would definitely recommend to anyone.

The driver was professional and made us all feel safe in traffic. He was on time, and also stopped at a good restaurant on half way. The bus was a little bad standard without seat belts but it worked since we did a late booking. Good overall experience.
Crazy driving style! Bus departure to late (which actually happens most of the time with Virak! Seats were to small! Very unconfortable
​ខក​ពេលវេលា​ទៅដល់​ទី​តាំង​ ដោយសារ​ រក​ផ្ញៀវតាមផ្លូវ​។  សូម​ជួយ​កែ​សម្រួល​ឡេីង​វិញ។
Excellent service. Comfortable vehicle, time expected despite lots of roadworks. Polite and friendly driver.

Couple travelling from France
Please note that the van station point in Phnom penh is quite far from the center, so planned a 30 minutes leeway to be able to commute to the station, especially early in the morning.
The bus was comfortable but the driver drove very risky and fast. He was also honking a lot so we couldn’t sleep.
New and comfortable van, departure was straight in time. BUT. Dear Kim Seng Express management, please, instruct your driver that he transports people, not lifeless things
Safe driver. Old van, an air conditioner didn’t work in appropriate way. Departure was late on 3o min
Got me the best rate for private SUV from Phnom Penh to siem reap with stops at oudongk and beng mealea. Punctual, safe and eager to help. Great experience.
Good all round
Driver was extremely good, showed us places we  would never have seen other wise, also took us to a really nice place to have lunch. Would raye him first class.

Vehicle in poor condition, seats smashed, curtains damaged, no service on board, the driver is alone, he does not speak English.  He took the time to dine at the border but only made a single 10-minute stop for the passengers'
Poor service - bad journey.

The bus departed on perfect time, the driver doesn't spoke english, so the lady from the office told him I had to go to Kampong Chhnang, wich isn't an usual stop. As usual we had a 20 min stop for eating. Driver was fast, classic Khmer style. Van vas old.

Bus was 30 min late and we had also a 30 min stop, so the timetable wasn't respected at all, but it seems to be normal in Cambodia. Bus was old but comfy, we got also a bottle of water. Driver was fast, Khmer style.
I am giving a poor review of this company because someone (one of the bus employees likely) stole $600 from my checked bag. I won’t ride with this company again.

Das Fahrzeug ist auch für kambodschanische Verhältnisse eine Zumutung. Der Sitz ist lose, alles ist ungepflegt und dreckig. Mein Freund hatte Flohbisse danach. Der Fahrer ist zwar vorsichtig gefahren, hat aber zwei Stunde lang grauenhafte Musik gespielt.

Boat crowded. But got us there both ways. Had to transfer to Orchid as no Sandy Beach pick up due to swells. Crew did a good job of not allowing Last minute ticket buyers on Samloem to take seats until all scheduled confirmed passengers boarded.
Isn't me ?? I don't take this bus !! Let me know soon please !!!
Great, efficient and very comfortable service!

Pretty good trip overall. Only 3 hours Kratie to Sen Monorom when we expected a lot longer. Driver could have done with knowing the way - stopping to ask directions on the wee shortcut he took was not confidence inspiring, but all in all a gray trip!

The bus was fine , the roads in bad condition but that is not the fault of the bus company. Now the reason I’m mad , it was very very cold ? and I wasn’t the only one who thought that several passengers I talked to complained, but the driver just laughed
The air conditioning was on 18 degrees, many people freezing and a driver who just laughed at our complaints, so never will I use Virak Buntham again.
Fast and efficient way to get to Phnom Penh from Battambang. Passengers should be informed as to when the stops will be prior to the van leaving.
ម៉ាស៊ីន​ត្រជាក់​អត់ត្រជាក់​
Leaving exactly on time and arriving a bit late (heavy traffic so not the operators fault), overall good ride, would recommend to use

Bus left on time. Driver stopped for ages to help fix another van - added an hour to our journey then rammed our bus full of passengers from broken down van with their luggage. Hot, uncomfortable, long. Would not use again

Bus left on time. Driver stopped for ages to help fix another van - added an hour to our journey then rammed our bus full of passengers from broken down van with their luggage. Hot, uncomfortable, long. Would not use again

The van was comfortable, could fit our luggage and the rest stops perfectly timed. The restaurant we stopped at for lunch was incredible. 
A relaxing way to traverse the countryside.
Thank you for Sim who contacted me to arrange another van to go back to SR because the one i booked online was full.
Sak was an excellent driver.  He displayed high professionalism, used care and caution while driving, and is very friendly.   I quite enjoyed the trip, and our conversation.  Highly recommended.
Horrible ! It's a shame to treat peoples like that! No place for our legs ! Even our arms ! Because the van was full of luggages. I don't recommend at all! 6 jours like that it's hell!
Bus is good as cheap price.
Everything is good except booking email says we get free pickup but when I email back I’m told you don’t pick up passengers~

The bus departed on time however managed to lose two hours along the way. The traffic was pretty bad in a couple of places however that didn't account for the full two hours. The staff did not give clear instructions when we reached the border

We booked a taxi to Keep for 63 USD. We had to change the trip to Kampong Chhnang 1 hour shorter drive but the driver refused and we offered 20 USD extra but the greedy asked 30 USD extra to drive a shorter distans than we paid for so we walked. RIP OFF

Worst journey ever , don’t write or talk about service when the driver just laugh in the face of a customer when he’s asked if he please can change the air conditioning from a freezing temperature to a more normal temperature. Never again a Virak Buntham

In Kampong Chhnang at the office nobody speaks english.The departing time on my ticket was wrong, 30 min earlier.The van came 10 later and it was full stuffed with baggage and package near and behind me.Not so save on the bumpy streets and the fast drive.

Mondulkiri>Phnom Penh. 6 hours. We got bumped to begin with and had to keep hassling to get on the bus we had actually booked - then had to sit with bags between legs and on knees whilst others sat comfortably in seats we booked. Don’t use VET!!!
Good service and very organised.
Best night bus ive taken. Staff spoke excellent English, seats were clean comfortable and fun pattern, snack provided, arrived at times scheduled.

Really old minivan with cockroaches inside. We were stuck in a traffic jam of 2 hours which could have been avoided using available traffic information. 
Roads very bad (not the fault of the company of course, but 4 hours time indicated is not correct).
The bus trip was much batter than expected. Reliable, friendly with one stop for dinner.

The travel went fine. They were super helpful with imigration that went really fast. They do charge an extra 10$ for it but they take care of everything, which means you don't have to wait in line for 3hours!
The puck-up at the hotel was late, they eventually came to pick us up after the departure time whereas they ask to be at the meeting point 20min prior departure! I think that to be a but ironic.
The Driver was good but the car not so comfort.
They keep changing my seat
Good trip excellent hotel vary varied
The docks, which are shared with other ferries/boat operators and are not owned or maintained by Buva, could be improved, but the Buva Sea boats themselves were excellently maintained and operated.
Always pick up and drop off passenger without ticket from company
We have never tryed a trip so bad as this. The driver was driving mad and we had to ask him to slowdown, as he was taking to many chances to overtake other cars
The only problems i have with this bus is that they pick up people on the road, chair not comfy, and stop where to eat is  no healthy.
Nothing to complain besides the seats being a little uncomfortable

It's not a VIP service seats are not really comfortable, no service at Orussey neither on board, no service at the border... Passengers with too much luggages and noisy, only one stop (except the border), driver using cellphone driving, driving too fast

I had to select this route as there is no direct option from Kampong Thom to Phnom Penh so far. Also required to contact with their operator or driver to confirm the pick up time and location even after online booking. Requested to improve this situation.
Very good operation.

The ride was comfortable and it was good to have AC. The operators helped with getting the luggage on and off the boat. It only took 30 minutes to get to the island but much longer on the way back. The service was helpful when we nearly missed our boat.

The driver was rude but the staff on the bus was friendly, but they do not speak English. Had to stop for 30 min because another bus from the same company had an accident and we had to pick their baggage up. 
Instructions by staff only in Vietnamese!
A terrible experience. Bus was late to depart - did not travel all the way to Kep but only to Kampot. Had to wZit for another bus. Never again.
No WiFi even tho it said there was

Not acceptable in any way. Overcrowded boat. Will never recommend this company. When we initially booked the boat, we chose the pick-up option. Although pickup was confirmed by email, the company didn't pick us up!! Totally unaccaptable!!
Was a nice ride though!
Satisfied trip, great driver

Overall it was a nice ride. It was a little frustrating at times because we were supposed to leave at 330 and didn’t end up leaving until 530. The van was pretty squishy and hot, but the little air conditioning helped. Would take again.
Extremely narrow space. You’ll have a cramp.

The seats in this bus are not so comfortable - to hard for this bumpy road . We arrived late at the border but I get the bus to Bangkok . The transfer at the border was well organised . So in the end I would say , it was good . Thanks to the team
Always great, sometimes slow due to border activities, but it’s not the company’s fault , all in all great as usual
Our driver was very friendly, spoke good English, and new the back roads!
I posted my review here https://bit.ly/36RERzl, here https://bit.ly/30nvy7J and other places.

As readen in other comments our driver stops a few times to grab some extra passenger, but nothing traumatic. We had a short toilet stop, we leave Phnom Penh on time and was in Kampot on time. Driver asked us how was the trip and give us a handshake. Nice
They never come to pick me up! All the numbers doesn't work and they don't want to refund me. So, maybe call or write an email before to be sure they pick you up!

The bus was very ordinary when it comes to the facilities on offer. The driver asked us to keep our luggage in the trunk space of the bus by ourselves. 
Water bottles were not distributed voluntarily by the inspector.
Arrived in Phnom Pehn two hours late!
This service is amazing! 1 bus from start to finish, you stop short of the border in Thailand and get your Visa so no need to queue on arrival. Would really recommend!!

Все прошло лучше чем я ожидала, ехали в luxury Hotel bus. Автобус новый, все чисто. Доехали чётко по расписанию, все время спокойно проспала. Единственное что сильно дует кондиционер, прикрывала голову кофтой.
Bus driver missed the our stop.

Best thing are the seats large and comfy. 
First driver to Phnom Penh very helpful as kids needed toilet breaks. 
Second driver made them wait an hour after asking and this was hard. 
Drive took 14hrs not 10 as advertised.

Hotel pickup was good. Bus interior was okay but the bus broke down half way through the journey. 2 and a half hours later and a nice new bus turned up to take us to the final destination. Company needs better maintenance plan as this seems quite common!
Trip was good and left in time. Drivers should adjust their time though. Arrived 1 hour later than mentioned in the description. Make sure to add +1 hour of you want to catch the Ferry to Koh rong.
Air conditioner could be better
Good
ឡានvipតែឡាន​ ចាស់​ ដាក់ឥវ៉ាន់ជាងឡានសាំមយ៉ុងទៀត
Prompt friendly service woul r e command.
Prompt friendly service would recommend.
clean car, was on time, nice and friendly stuff. can recommend it.

tires of the van had no profile so front tire exploded, the company didn’t send another van so we had to wait for 1 hour in the sun till he changed the tire and he didn’t know what he is doing.. awful experience

I thought the driving was reckless and very dangerous so I will not be travelling from Battambang to Siem Reap with you. The office staff in phnom Pehn changed the dear when I asked why he just yawned only smiling when he was on his mobile phone
The bus was old and the trip took 8 and a half hours

Reading the comments I was ready for everything... It's all a bit chaotic but we had "only" 30 min delay... We needed 1 hour more as said but I think it is the same with every company. Driver was very good, not bad at all!
The exact location for departure unknown and the instructions when crossing the border unknown

Took the VIP van from PP to Banlung. The van left on time at 6am and before the said arrival time. We stopped an hour after departure and 2 more times on the way. I picked the seat #8 - good leg room but on the way for others to get in and out.
Good service, i would recommend.
It was kind of crammed for such a long shuttle and had no recline. But the shuttle departed on time and the driver was pleasant.

This hotel bus was one of the more comfortable means on internal transportation I have taken in Cambodia, good bit of leg space and nice air-conditioning.
The bus left 30min late though and reached and hour late. Wish they did not make as frequent stops.
Prompt courteous service. Excellent driver, relaxed, thoughtful and drove with the utmost of care. would use again and highly recommend.
Good service
