The bus tour itself was fine. A shame that there was goods tucked under the seats (no room for legs). GREAT job by the border, it went smooth However we did not know exactly what wss going on. It was an hour late, but it was OK

My seat was terrible,really unconfortable, luckily I could change it after 2 hours
Nevertheless, the bus was too bad and too old. Please, try to invest in your fleet.
Cambodia post bus service is such an easy to access service. I have used it many times and will continue with their service.

Bus departed on time, arrived about 1 hour late. Driving standard was okay. Back row of seats (4 in a row) is poorer value as the seats are smaller. Interior of the bus was good condition and aircon worked well. Rest stops were good.
Very polite and welcoming driver. I got a banana and water as well!
The driver thought he was driving a rally. Very dangerous driving.

Dro med buss fra Phom Pehn til Siem Reap,   Turen var behagelig brede seter og masse rom for beina.  Var litt engstelig da det ikke kom noen ved Pick up service fra hotellet.
Men de hadde kontroll.   Kom først da bussen hadde adgang.  Bussen ventet.
Great service driver was punctual and courteous. Car was clean and comfortable. Thank you

We were led to believe that the buses had Wi-Fi.  The first bus had none at all and on the second bus the network was visible and the attendant gave out the password but it did not work for anyone.  In 2020, Wi-Fi absolutely MUST work.

Journey was awful. Car did not have air conditioning. Driver took an insane route that cut across very inhospitable roads and took a long time. Driver’s phone made a whistling noise every 5 seconds which drove us crazy.  Terrible.
Thank you, it was very easy and comfortable

The driver was very good and going with Cambodia post gives you lots of opportunities to get out and stretch your legs aswell
as toilet breaks as they do a quick drop off of the mail at main cities in route. Good value for money.
The bus left on time but we arrived an hour late (took 6 hours instead of 5 hours) - which made me miss the last boat to the island. Also, there is no WiFi on the bus despite what the website says.
Booked a minivan and ended in a 40 years old bus full of mosquitoes, water was leaking in the luggage compartment... If you can choose another bus company then do it, Mekong Express is a joke lol

The bus was on time. They took care of us at the border, no stress at all. The inspector on bus was a student, she was very helpful. We left our bus to go to Battambang which they organised. Roadworks on way there was a pain but not drivers fault.
The bus arrived by 2 hours earlier - at 6 a.m. instead of 8 a.m. of course it is not crucial but anyway made some problems to us
Good! However, there has been some confusion with the mobile ticket when boarding - try to sort that out.
will use again!

They cancelled my journey, leaving me without transportation 2 hours before departure. Super unpolite on the phone, shouting and hunging up the phone. Unadmissible, they still didn’t learn what politeness and client service means.
Thank you
Very good!
Don't use bayon service

Driver was aggressive but safe. Leg space was very cramped. Bags,etc under seats so had to keep backpack in leg space. A/C was barely on. Stop for lunch was good food. Punctual. Good way to travel cheap.

Driver most often stop to get another passenger a long the way and also stop to put another sender wealthy at another places too. Moreover, the cars sound is noisy and we spend nearly 6 hours from PP to SHV. The good point, driver driving softly.
Given the road works, the driver did a very good job.
The seat was not really comfortable because the leg space is so small. It could lead to cramps for a longer journey. thanks.
Excellent service thoroughly enjoyed trip would highly recommend
Good service ?
Tutto perfetto grazie

Bus was nice. Aircon was great. Bus was not full but would have had enough space per seat to be comfortable even if it was. Arrived 1 hour later than planned bit I think that was due to traffic. Drive was bumpy bit not the drivers fault. Would recommend
The air conditioning is so damn fking hot.
The Air Conditioner is damn fking hot. Not sure if it's to cold you up or warm you.
Comfortable trip and exactly on time
My seat was broken so i had to move. Ventilation could not be turned off above my new seats.
Return boat was half an hour late arriving causing problems for those with connections. Too many people on the boat - very squashed. But otherwise a good and very fast was to travel to the islands
Great service as usual.

Took the Banlung - PP VIP van. It was meant to be 7 hours. We arrived more than 1 hour late. The driver disappeared somewhere at some point without telling us how long for was the break and kept stopping to drop or get something/someone.
Horrible service, no communication and left over an hour late! Would recommend spending the extra few dollars and getting a Tuk Tuk from Kampot to Kep instead!
I did not travel with you as the driving is dangerous and reckless
Brand new van, big seats and very comfortable.

Truly not worthy. We arrived at the supposed pick up place and no one was there. They then told us to go to the office and made us wait. An hour after the bus was supposed to have left we were still waiting. We ended up paying for a tuk-tuk. AVOID
Probably the best Mekong Express driver in my opinion

I booked the ticket with BookMeBus but it turned out that the seat I booked is duplicated with other. When the staff checked for me, my booking number is not on their system. Anyway, staffs are helpful and allow me to take the bus. Please BMB careful.
After yesterday's rickitty bus. Today BB to SR was a nicely refurbished 23 seater with lots of leg room.   Shame the suspension was not designed for serious road reconstruction. But a good ride..

No cambodia post’ van for departure and no one told me about it 
Changed to another company without my agreement. Not the same seat and not the same bus station on arrival in Phnom Penh 
This is a fault of Book me bus and not Cambodia post
Pickup car doesn't arrive at our hotel.
Driver was speeding a lot and drove on largely unpaved roadside ditches.

The ride was very good, the only thing that would be considered not good was the amount of time it took (8 hours) to get to Phnom Penh.  Of course, the reason for the extra time was due to the amount of traffic on the road (beginning of the Tet Holiday).
It took way longer. I booked a mini-van but it was just a normal bus. Not enough space to store all the luggage so it was quite an uncomfortable ride for some...

In my experience I won't take this company again, I arrived early and they said my bus change the hour to one hour after and I didn't receive any email about that. It supposed to be 5 hours but took 7, you should change the details of this service
Driver was very nice!
The van was not what pictures in the page show, it is old, the driver did a good job in a very difficult and dangerous road
Good

Our driver from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap was very good. Stopped at a local restaurant for lunch. Arrived safe and well in a large air conditioned car. 
Thanks
Driver drove very fast.  Do not sit in last row.  It is hot and uncomfortable in the last row.  Book early to avoid last row.
So hot
The best trasportation Service I've experienced, espeicially the driver are very friendly.
a little bit delayed because of adjusting the time of departure. that's why its late arrival going to Ho chi minh.

The bus company had some issues and we were switched to three different busses and had to carry our heavy luggage every time we switched. And we were dropped off at another location. NOT THE POST OFFICE which I paid for. WOULD NOT RECOMMEND
He was a great driver and it was a comfortable drive down in a new car with good a/c
We left about half an hour late but the ride was rather comfortable. The driver was safe throughout and dropped us off at our hotel when we got to Banlung.

On-time departure. Bus comfortable and seatbelts available. Due to major construction works on the road, companies should really reconsider the ETA. Trip took approx. 90 minutes longer, no way to arrive on the scheduled arrival time.

I had booked car right before my flight departure, unfortunately flight was postponed and I contacted company by WhatsApp . At no extra charge driver was waiting for me at the airport :) . Car is big , comfortable and had air conditioning. Very satisfied

Zero star, POOR SERVICE. Everyone please avoid this transportation. They cancel my departure at 1PM the last time of departure which i can’t find another van for travel to PP. and they cant find solution for me while another RITHYA EXPRESS can help us.
Good transportation company, u can trust

Old bus, hostess abrupt, more than 2 hour lateness.
5$ fee to process the visa, but the alone travelers were much faster than us.
I’m gonna suggest other solutions rather than this to go to Phnom Penh.

I read horrible reviews, but took a chance. Service was wonderful, friendly staff, no hassles. For the price, you are getting good value. It is small, it takes 6-7hours from Phnom P to SVille, roads are busy and need upkeep. BUT IT'S CAMBODIA! Thank you!!

Van left on time, got in a bit late. We were picked up at our hotel free of charge which was lovely. Van was comfortable. Free water, moist towel, and box of cookies. Lots of bathroom stops and a short stop for lunch—maybe more stops than we needed.

Excellent efficient service, good bus, good value, polite and helpful staff. Only criticism would be the food offered, coffee but no hot water, and far too spicy chicken not much good for vegetarians. A healthy, simple food much preferred by most people.
Everything was perfect.
There was no WiFi or water like you advertise. It is okay for the price but don’t false advertise. Also where we stopped to have a break was not good at all, I can suggest you to stop somewhere else.
Hatien to  Phnom Penh  was fast and comfortable trip. The driver is very friendly.

Got the Koh Rong speedboat. I was meant to get in the 2pm boat but They overbooked it. Couldn’t get in the boat with 8 other people. Had to wait for another one. Luckily it arrived 10 mins later and managed to get there same time as 1st boat.
Did the PP - Sihanoukville VIP van. We departed 10 late as someone was missing. We stopped twice and got to the town 30mins later. The drive was pretty smooth.
Fast and safe ??
Glad i have arrived in one piece.....
What happens when you put 16 people with luggage in a small minivan. Very cramped conditions with no legroom. Still the driver was good and enough stops.

It was a good service, with speedy passage through the border. The driver was reckless, passing lines of cars as oncoming trucks approached. I have seen this many times. The driver will learn only when someone dies.

The bus departed 1 hour late.  We kept asking when the bus would depart they kept saying 5 mins.  We use this as transportation for work, so it disrupted our work day.  The driver was driving crazy to make up for lost time. It was unsafe.
Much better than expected wiyh some nice touches and a great pit stop for toilet and refreshments
Bus was hour late in Phnom Penh. Bus stopped at the restaurant where non-cambodians are charged much more for shopping. Driver was rude. Overall it was bad.
Booked our seats on the book me bus website got picked up and taken to change buses onto a small coach not what we had booked at all had to sit in the aisle on broken seats. Would not recomend
Drive too fast.
Journey took 2 hours longer than advertised but I can't see how it could be done in the advertised time. Back row seats very cramped and Aircon didn't reach them.
Good Service no problems

Too old bus conditions
Very uncomfortable
More than 5 hours late on arrival and a collision with a pick up truck, we almost got killed
2h late.
The bus departed on time but was 2 hours late. Also, the attended was not very approachable. The good thing is the bus is comfortable but the AC needs improvement.

Journey which was claimed to be 5 hours became 8 hours as driver was too slow and stopped unscheduled to many places.my stay to sihanoukville turned out to be few hours which was supposed to be a day.regret traveling by Larryta and won't recommend
The driver was very friendly and drove well. Thank you!

My ticket said the bus was gonna stop inside Siem Reap, but it stopped almost 30min with car outside of the town. So had to grab a Tuktuk. They were lined outside when we arrived of course. Making me pay 5$ in addition to the ticket, so that sucked

Driver always on the phone when driving
Bus dirty inside
Seat 2 no confirm at the description (I was seating between the driver and the messenger dating near the Windows (no espace for my legs)
Good service. Keep it up
ក្តៅម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់ឡានមានបញ្ហា

The bus never came. The company told us the 3.30pm service we booked didn't exist and the bus had departed at 2.30pm. I had to your office twice to have clarification on what do to do and in the end you couldn't even offer me another bus option.
Took the GVTC speedboat. They had a few more people than the available seats. Fast and on time

Took Sihanoukville-PP vip van. The driver kept slowing down at places to get more people in. He was also often on the phone without handset like other drivers. Slow drive. 30 minutes late from supposed arrival time.
Overall the service was good. One area to improve - once a driver is confirmed, please communicate to customer right away. In our case, we had to contact you to check if driver is on the way.
Our on line booking wasn't transmitted to the Battambang Mekong Express office! And the hour of the departure was false. The on line booking is just catastrophic, it's better for you to stop it.
Nice minibus.  Liked the free water and biscuits.  Only negative was that the bus set off 14 minutes later than scheduled
The Drive is almost mit 6 hours. Maybe two hours longer. In my opinion we have to much stops. But over all a cheap was to travel.
Great Service

If you are not on a schedule and not in a rush, this company and their van will get you from A to B. But as we had to catch the flight, it was dissapointing to see the service level, had 2 hours delay. There was no wifi not bottled water provided.

I went to bus terminal I was told it moved locations. The bus was late getting started. The seat footrest was broken on one side so it was a mess under my feet. The bus made multiple stops and arrived 1/2 hour late at SR. I do love the 3 wide seats.

The mini van came on time and at the pick up location which was agreed. We all received water and some cold wet wipes which was nice. We stopped on the way to Battambang for a 10 mins break so that we could use the toilet or have a snack. Good service!

The night bus was okay; however, the bed is technically for two people and if you dont know the other person is uncomfortable. Luckily I was with my partner. We changed bus in PP, but they were so disorganised, kept asking for our tkts and to change bus.
Driver was in time. Car was old but in good condition. We feel save all the time.
There are 3 aussie boarding the van. There drank wine and vaping all the way from siem reap to phnom penh. This is panthetic.

Very good service. Bus started with small delay ( 10min ) as we were waiting for delayed passanger - nice from them that they have wait. :) 
Clean, save, fast drive to Phnom Penh. The driver even drop us off near the hotel instead Main Station,THANK YOU
TCT bus seats are not as comfortable as they used to be.
Great service.
Great service.
Very good, puntual and the driver helps a lot in the frontier with camboya

The bus arrived 5 hours later. We were threatened by the staff on board that if we didn't pay the 2USD/pp "stamp money" - which is basically a bribe - we'd have to wait in a separate line and the bus would leave without us. Such a horrible experience.
Advertised 6.5 hours but the trip took 9 hours. I don't think it would be possible to do the trip in 6.5 hours, should advertise a more realistic time to allow people to plan accordingly.
Good driver. Travel too long 7 hours instead 5 .....due work road.

The bus depart late 10min without information.
Customer service give different instruction from BookMeBus for the scanning code. They said it could eventually seat duplicate.
The bus driver drive very slow that make our trip late 1h30 min of arrival.
Overall great service. A comfortable & relaxing journey.
U shouldn’t have to stop for 2 time in only one way like from Pp to kpt u should have stop only at one restaurant not first stop at café and after stop at restaurant it’s waste time
Ok

avoid seats 12 to 15.  they are way too tight.  the bus left a bit late, took an hour trying to meet people at the airport.  this was the fault of the people, not the bus, but it made the bus very late.
Never been so happy on a bus trip to Ho Chi Minh

When I arrived at the office I was informed that my 3 o’clock bus from BBT to SR doesn’t exist.
I was hauled into a shared taxi.
On the plus side: I was in BBT under 3 hours, the down side was that it’s very cramped with 4 in the back seat.
The bus broke down 5km from downtown Sihanoukville! We found a taxi to take us into the city! I doubt I will use the same service again
Superb bus! Roomy seat, good A/C and a very safe driver. I’d recommend Meg Hong any time! Thanks guys for a comfortable hassle-free trip!
We were asked to wait in front of park cafe in phnom Penh to finally learn that the shuttle cannot pick us up there. The airport staff had to help us because the driver didn't speak English.
Please khmers customers, understand that if you watch videos, make calls, play games: its more convenient to use earphone and not annoy other customers with your noise
Service from hochiminh to Phnom Penh was executed professionally and promptly.., thanks

Very satisfied with the service.
Much cheaper and ecolo than taking plane and night buses appeared to be very convenient
Driver was om time and would stop for breaks. However his English skills were very poor and two seat belts did not work which is why we chose a car over a bus.

Driver was very friendly but a vary erratic driver. I drive for a living normally and even I felt uneasy for a lot of the trip. The air con didn't really work so we were roasted until the sun started to go down. Alright trip for 4 dollars I suppose.

Sleep bus clean but beds too short for me at 178cm (5’10”) which isn’t tall. Complete shambles at Pnom Penh. Rude staff. Was booked on 0630 to Sihanoukville but didn’t get on bus until 0730. Office area filthy and restroom unusable. Bus stopped 3 times
Very nice service

- Nice driver, he use a lot the horn :-)
- no AC climatisation, it's a pity. We was in an old bus without confort

We where booked on a VIP van for 2pm, we arrived at 1.30 pm to be told the bus broke down we had been transferred to a big bus at 2.30 pm we had no phone call to inform us of this, no wi fi on the bus and that was 1 of reasons we booked
Serivce should be better

Bus was comfortable but i had a free seat next to me. They made me pay $1 for the visa stamp which I'm almost certain the guy pocketed as it's not required at the border. Bus broke down a couple times, we were 2 hours late. Made us get on and off bus lots
If you value your life I would avoid this bus, it is a disaster waiting to happen.
Excellent service, you will see me again soon

I took the van from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh at 9 am and had a great experience! We arrived on time, even e few minutes earlier. They gave us one bottle of water and refreshing towel for free. One stop for toilet and food. Driver style was really safe.

It would be nice to be contacted via email if there are delays. I don’t have a phone number for cambodia so I could t be reached. I could have made different plans during the day had I known.  Now I’m worried about the bus I’ve scheduled for tomorrow.
Parfait..réservation ok.pas de problème.

Rented a private transfer from Siem Reap to PP. Driver Leang was slightly erratic. Driving quite fast & giving me a few scares. He also breaks hard leaving me uneasy at times. Despite that he was nice and I didn’t feel threatened. Improve safety plz

Before we arrived in Sihanoukville, the bus stop in suburb and got out of bus and told us that place is a ferry station to Koh rong even if it was not. After we had got out of the bus the bus driver left and we were supposed to take tuk tuk to get to ferr
Nice experience. The driver drive safely and the timing has been respected . We received a Bottle of mineral water and croissants (3 pièces) for the breakfast. I recommend this Company

went from Battambang to Kampot - they pass through Phnom Penh center and the car and driver change - this takes about 1 hour because of the traffic - would be better, if the car change is outside PP and you don't waste time passing through the whole city

kindly staff and clean seats.
it was good to choose this company.

Delay 10min 
Stop on the way 3 times
No enough aircon 
Bus is old
Can not get a booking seat.
No any issuse.?

Bus from SIam Reap to Pnomh Penh.
Traveled in very good condition.
The boarder crossing was very confusing and not well communicated. It would be great if the bus were a liitle newer, as the AC didn't work all the time (or was turned off?). But, we got there...
Only one trouble is duplicate sear booking, so you can imaginate what will happen when duplicate booking seat.
Ok

Bus left on time and arrived early.  Ac was not working very well so I was sweating buckets but other than that was a good ride.  Driver was a bit aggressive like most bus drivers here but not too insane.  Better than expectations after most reviews
Website needs updating. Bus pick up point has moved. Bus was clean but seat was broken.
Website needs updating. Bus pick up point has moved. Bus was clean but seat was broken.
Please improve, they always pick up people on the road.
Please make sure witch is the real car for customer book
Please make sure witch is the real car for customer book

We arrived alive; the only positive. We were picked up late. I requested an English speaking driver, our driver didn’t speak one word of English.  He stopped for lunch even though we indicated we didn’t want to. He was unnecessarily an aggressive driver.
I wouldn’t wish this trip with Bayon VIP upon my worst enemy

So - there are NO direct bus from Siem Reap to Ho Chi Minh City. That is just Virak Bingham “selling a dream”, don’t bite it. We had to change bus in Phnom Penh, waited here for 1,5 - 2 hours for a new bus. The sleeping beds are okay, but super tiny.
The vehicle is simply too cramp and stuffy
I travel from battambang to pp. The van delayed along the way and late at the beginning. The driver is not polite enough.

Driver didn’t speak much English. Driving was erratic, high speeds & overtaking when very unsafe. Initially I thought it was the ‘Cambodian’ way but have since had other private taxis with different experience. Would not recommend

At the immigration, the conductor could have given better instruction before we leave the bus. It was kinda a mess, everybody left the bus without knowing what to do next. Our bus is the first to arrive and last to leave. Otherwise it was a delightful rid

I traveled on Chinese New Year's and it was very full.. All the seats on the boat were filled as was the rear deck. Beyond that, there were at least 15 people standing between the seats. It appeared to be overloaded and unsafe. For sure a problem.

We had a great drive to Kampot. There were only 3 of us in the van so that helped :) driver was nice, we left on time, and he drove safely. Take an early van and expect traffic. That was the biggest reason it took 4 hours.
The driver is so rude and not responsible. Worse, the way he drives is dangerous and too fast. Please report this driver. Thanks.
Really happy with our journey.  Stops every 2 hours for a stretch plus a lunch stop.  It took a while in Siem Reap Bus station to find the place it was leaving from.

driver was driving very correctly even during night 
it is well appreciated company like mekong express focus on security 
I will travel again for sure

Okish service. When compared with Giant Ibis they are bellow in quality, namely as they use relatively old buses with a pretty narrow leg room. Further more, during our trip, we had smoke (from the bus itself) coming inside. Pretty annoying.
It says 4 hours but actually it’s 5. The bus stopped in Kampot for 30 mins waiting for Two passengers

очень мало места в автобусе между кресел! даже для женских ног! вместо твоих ног под тобой рюкзаки и чемоданы.
дороги ужасные! 500 км ехать 11 часов - как так можно?
Poor service , late pick up, rude driver.

Driver wasn't at the airport terminal with a sign, which they said he would, this had us worried. We had to wait 30 minutes for someone to actually turn up, and when he did he just laughed in our face. However,he was helpful when we arrived to hotel. Bad!

The bus was nice with big seats and comfortable. 
The driver was a safe driver.
I wish he had not used his loud horn all the time. It felt very rude and it was so noisy and disturbing. It was hard to rest and relax with the loud horn blowing so often
The driver make me feel car sick driver like ride moto bike

Don’t use BookMeBus  to book bus Ticket......I paid for them already but I didn’t get my online ticket .
So unfortunately I had to pay again . Bad experience

After we left the bus station, the driver found that the battery has some problem. So he brought us back to the bus station and we switched to the other bus owned by same company. Maybe because of that problem, they forgot to give us a bottle of water..
Left right on time, 14 seater v. omfortable, arrived PP 15 min early, good driver. Overall excellent and efficient service.
សូមមេត្តារៀបចំ​ពេលវេលាអោយច្បាស់លោះ​ ។ ?
Pleased the minivan had wifi.
Minivan's wifi wasn't working.

Restricting access to the pier at both ports and only allowing people onto the pier with valid tickets for the next ferry would benefit everybody, both ferry companies and passengers. Total chaos trying to board ferries.

The driver was some kind of crazy aggressive.Though I wanted to help him he did not undetstand and he shouted and jumped a lot.I told him why he was shouting crazily and I was helping him he ontinuied doing .Later on we realized that it was his 3rd drive

We were not dropped off at at the agreed (as per email confirmation)
Arrival: , St. N. R6, Next to Sing Angkor VIlla Siem Reap Province, Kingdom of Cambodia

We booked our accommodation to be near the above address so that we could walk.
Good service, but the bus stop in Siem Reap is quite far from the location they told me in e-mail, it is out of our expectation.
Parfait

Terrible! Not exactly am expecting to experience. The air condition was not working well. We were not comfortable. Poor aircon, no TV and no Wifi! Driver was a madman. Inspector has no intention to return my change. 7-hour agony from HCm to Phomn Pen!

Very happy with the amount of leg room on the bus.  I am tall and it was much better than any other bus we have been on.  Second bus left at 4pm not 3pm.  VET now stop at the edge of town.  1 tuctuc there so no choice than pay $15 to get into town
The departure address listed on the ticket was different from the actual departure address. I had to rush to my bus. I will never take this bus again.
Very late and resulted in people missing their flights. It also resulted in my having to get emergency accommodation in Sinoukville.
Driver To dangerous

Not the good information about the way to go from the cambodian border to phnom pen. 1 hour waiting in the van at border + 1:30 hour in Kampot .... the driver was unplaisant talking to us like to dogs... i dont recommand you to continue with this Company
Very low quality of service and van
មិនមែនជាសេវាកម្មមីនីវ៉ាន់វីអាយភីដូចរថយន្តដឹកអ្នកដំណើរខ្នាតតូចដែលពោរពេញទៅដោយកាបូបនោះទេ។
None of the seats had working seatbelts. Something that should be a given.
Driver was so bad service, aggressive, Inappropriate speech, bad attitude to customer. It's feel dangerous to ridding car with him.
Aircon not cold and weak. No curtains on window leading to direct sunlight on passengers for whole trip. Seat 8C. At end of travel, I was drenched in sweat. Terrible trip.

Your services advertise WiFi, bus, charging stations.  14 hour ride to Siem Reap-no WiFi, no charging stations, broken toilet. From Phnom Pemh to HCMC-no WiFi, no charging stations, no toilet.  I’m extremely unhappy with the service.

Overall a great service. Online booking was easy you can print ticket/electronic version. Outbound boat was a smaller and very comfortable, the return journey boat was bigger and less comfortable maybe due to the sea conditions. Booking return was easy.

Driver was a very nice person. The van was a bit old, but we made it okay to PP.

Note to BookMeBus: What does "inspector" mean?
Seriously the best driver and car I ever had in 6 years in Cambodia. Extremely professional and good driver. His SUV was very comfortable.
The driver arrived pick up point earlier than our fixed timing. We can depart to Kampot early. However the driver cannot speak English therefore we are unable to communicate during our journey.

The final stop is not at all on the place they display on the map. You end up spending more money on tuktuks. Also, we were told the driver wasn't going to town because of the traffic, but it was 6am, town was COMPLETELY empty. WTF...

The final stop was not the same place as the place Which is Angkor Travel Focus when I booked the ticket! Very far from that place!  Make me travel plan was totally mess! Horrible, never take your bus anymore.

Driver was great and nothing wrong with the car, nice guy. The booking process was a total pain in the arse and took ages to sort out though. I would have liked to leave hours earlier than I did and could have if the team had given me timely resposes
Top service. Arrived at pickup early and arrived at destination early. Safe driver. Comfortable car.
aircon broken.

Driver called to our hotel and he was told that we have been moved to another hotel and would be checking out the next day. This wasn't true, but nobody contacted me and thanks to the episode, we left an hour late. The ride was ok.
You always have to count 2 hours more for the arrival time. If we wouldn't stop to pick up or drop off other people or wait while they buy their groceries, we would get there earlier.

Sihanoukville harbor is THE CAOS. Any signal concerning boat departure pier. We waited for our boat more than 2 hours without any clear explanation. If you really wants to get to Koh Rong please be well prepared to be patient.
Very professional staff. We left on time, we made some stops on the way but not to much. The van was clean and comfortable with a bottle of water for each passenger

Service left on time and was an 11 seater mini van with plenty room and comfortable. We stopped twice, once for a comfort break for 5 minutes and once for lunch for 20 minutes but only the driver ate as no one felt we had enough time.

Overall good experience.Well trusted.Left a little late but ok.Woman made sure we sat in assigned seats but on the way back a new employer let people sit anywhere.I had to move out of someone's seat but someone was in mine.Dropped off at an unlisted spot!

Firstly, the email I received upon booking that told me the pick up address was wrong. So you need to fix that to stop other passengers waiting at a stop that isn't even correct. Also the bus time online said 1.30 departure.. the bus didnt leave til 2.45
Comfortable clean bus, great a/c. Left on time, arrived on schedule. Driver was good and friendly. Comfortable seats... and seatbelts!
There was no bus at the booked time. But people were very helpful and put me in a taxi, 4 persons in the back, but very quick and in time. Thanks to the heplful employees of ctt!
The bus broke down. Not only that, they went to pick up and made a long detour before setting off to phnom penh

Hour and a half late, no communication 
Aggressive driving making people sick 
Driver stopped to wash the van delaying us further and also stopped again to get only himself and his friends food .
Avoid this company if possible

This was a great decision over a flight. Door to door in less than five hours, with a rest stop half way through the journey. The driver was excellent, we felt very safe and comfortable.
The car was luxurious. Would definitely recommend.

After reading other reviews I was ready to bolt and hire a private taxi, but this trip was absolutely fine. 
Pick up office was easy to locate, van only left six minutes late, and whilst old it quickly got me to Kampot with only one short fuel stop.

Driver, instructor, punctuality all excellent.

Cleanliness not so good, mosquitos everywhere and toilet out of service the entire journey. Luckily there were loo stops, but If diabetic you’ll struggle.

The bus was due to leave at 08.00 but only left at 08.30.  The driver was good but I scored low because he was constantly on his mobile phone and effectively drove most of the way one handed.  The seats were very comfortable but mine had no seatbelt
Very good company ! I will book here again
Great driver in a comfy bus with great a/c
The fucking Last company . The sells seats before dapature time. After we want a refund to book an private Taxi they don't give us.  Never book here of you want good service.
Very comfortable and new vehicle which made the journey comfortable. We made one stop which allowed people to grab a snack or a drink and use the toiler. We left and arrive on time.
ដាក់ម៉ូយតាមផ្លូវពេក ខ្ញុំទៅដល់បាងកកម៉ោង ១២យប់ កូនយំ ផង ក្តៅខ្លួនផង

Hello 
9 hours on the van is difficult.. moreover when we made 7 stops on the trip. I think you could win at least 1 hours (minimum!!). We arrive at 5.15 pm.
We appreciate our driver skills but he didn't talk to us during all travelling even we asked him for something... :-/
Excellent. Highly recommend this service!

The driver & van were ok.
But he forced us to leave the bus before the city center. And we had To take a tuktuk to get in...
The bus was very late. We missed our connection in Phnom Penh and then arrived in Sihanoukville 5 hours late. Very disappointed. Will not use this operator again if possible
Bus ride was ok but seat was wet cause of ceiling leak......damp experience. Breaks good but long and tedious border cross. Good at dropping people off at various spots when in HCMC though
I did not use the ticket, because my trip was cancelled and I did not get a reimbursement. Would like to have my money back.

The bus left at the said time. It was clean and comfy to sleep in, however toilet lacked tissue

The bus arrived on time in Siem Reap. Will definitely ride again

Nice and smooth boat trip. Started some minutes late but we weren't in a rush. It's great that there is a return ticket included. Can't really recommend using this boat if you want to go to the sunset beach because it's quite some distance to walk.

Nice and smooth drive. The driver really hit the gas so we arrived more than 30 minutes earlier. Had 2 breaks (~20mins) in between. The car was kinda full with the luggage and there isn't much space for tall people but my friend (~2m tall) still survived.
Quick and smooth drive. Enough space even with the luggage. The bus change in Phnom Penh was done without any problems. Arrived later than said due to some heavy traffic on the way.
Worked well to be picked up at Kampong Chhnang, half way through the bus journey, driver spoke to guesthouse and agreed meeting place and time. Thanks!
So late
Great driver very safty minded, drove cafefully. He assisted at the boarder crossing which made things easy . Disappointed that there was NO WIFI as noted in their advertisement online.
To many stops on way, without explanation bei the driver about the time of departure after the breaks.

Two boys from station Phnom Penh pushed with violence our two suitcases under the seats in the microbus and damaged then! In Siem Reap we were at the Bayon office to confirm the damage and the man of the office and the driver did not recognise the damage.
Too fast and dangerous driving. Even after told him. We waited for him one hour
The timetable was not actually!!! The ride took more time than written: but this is important if you want to book the ferry connect ...

Worst experience ever. The driver miss our stop and headed to ratanakiri. We told him to go back it was not far. He refused, he was pissed. So we went to far and then we took another bus to kampong cham. 7 hours of bus instead of 3hours. Never again.

Service was a little late leaving and arriving, but since I was very early for my bus they allowed me on the earlier bus without fuss. Plenty of space, AC worked well. Comfort stop half way. Very good for the money if you have entertainment with you.

excellent service all round. 
Snack , water, hand wipes and an english movie on bored
Driver coughing all the way, not wearing mask! Could not sleep and very concerned about the global spread of the new coronavirus
Late departure.

We left right on time.  The mini bus was very comfortable.  We picked up only one person on the way. We arrived on time and stopped only a couple of times. That’s pretty standard on this root.  The pick up in Siem Reap was in a convenient location.

It was advertised as a direct route, it isnt.
Transfer at PP was slow(2h) and waited for nothing, we waited for another bus, never arrived
Had to switch busses due to missing papers
Lots of extra stops for random passengers
Old bus, 
4h delay

Notre van n’est pas venu nous chercher donc nous avons été redirigé vers une autre compagnie. 
Nous avons eu 2h30 de retard. 
Chauffeur qui s’arrête sans cesse et nous rit au nez quand on demande des informations !!!
Large, comfortable seats.  Very good driver.
The staffs (a man at the luggage storage, a woman onboard to serve us, men who helped us at the border) were all very nice and we enjoyed the journey. It was more than we expected:)

I was quite concerned about this trip after reading other reviews and as such was actually pleasantly surprised.
The bus looks nothing like the ‘hotel bus’ pictures advertised but was clean and has lie flat sleeping beds. Keep your luggage with you!
Some problems at the departure but the travel was alright, a few stops on the way.
The bus/van was not as nice as what is pictured on the website
We were very happy with our driver and journey to Siem Reap and would travel with Mekong Express in the future

We were 40 minutes late for departure. Driver drove off and left people stranded at petrol station so we had to wait 10 minutes for staff to get them back. Kept stopping and picking up passengers along the way. Took far longer than expected.
RAS
Perfect and safe trip!
Your staff should friendly more
Fast and efficient, driver did a good job and we were home earlier than expected

Worst trip and service ever. You don’t even receive your spot that you reserved. The driver is stopping more than 20 times to get people inside the van when there is no space. And just laugh when you ask if we will be on time. Everything was wrong.
Modern comfortable bus, quicker trip than expected!
Modern comfortable bus, plenty of leg room & quicker trip than expected!

Arrival schedule at 12:00 but unfortunately arrived at 2:30 pm.
the inspectors sent us to the wrong bus for like 30 mn and if I didn’t double confirm with the drivers they would sent me to another unknown city name. They always use local language to curs
Comfortable trip , good driver, took longer than expected due to road conditions

It used to be excellent, but now the van is in a very poor condition with one whole window completely broken and torn off. For 6 hours, the passengers had to intake all the hot dust and bad smells on the road. The driver was very unkind.

The bus was overbooked. They only had 1 empty place instead of 2. We arrive 30 minutes in advance but they said nothing. Before we go in the bus, they say that we wont go tonight. After 30 more minutes we get on the bus and add to change place after 10min
Very good. Clean. Warm-welcome. the guide was helpful and lovely .

We left a bit late and the road was incredible bumpy for most of the ride but other than that the van was clean and comfortable and we arrived safely. Please make sure the customer knows the address in Kampot for return trip. It is not on the ticket.
Driver got us there in good time. We only stopped for a break once. Would have preferred twice. Van was clean and comfortable.
Driver got us there in good time. We only stopped for a break once. Would have preferred twice. Van was clean and comfortable.

Reckless driving, a window was shattered when a stone hit it, it took us all screaming for the driver to pull over as the glass fell in. He got 2 passengers to put the window out. He also picked up 5 Cambodians in Phnom Penh to sit across 4 spare seats.

The first driver was crazy like driving too fast and honking for no reason. The second one was good. It is a good transport company, you have space for your legs and between you and your neighbor. I recommend it
A driver was really helpful and a really nice person with good manners.
excellent driver - drove very careful - felt save during the whole trip

Left a little late and picked up passengers from the roadside, but journey time was quite good. The stops were reasonable (first at a petrol station, then at a small market with food, etc.). Bus is a bit cramped, but didn't bother me much.

The Driver was very good, but didn't speak English too well. There were to many stops on the way. I selected a seat when I booked the ticket, but a different seat was finally assigned (not a very good one...)
When I arrived at the bus station it was closed and discovered I had been sold a ticket for a bus that wasn’t running that day (Sunday).

The bus was nice and clean. I know that driving in Cambodia is different than what I am used to in the U.S., however, this driver was exceptionally aggressive. Stated a “direct” drive, but driver stopped often to pick up passengers. 2.5 instead of 2 hrs.
refund policy was not clear when paying by credit card and could not cancel or refund.

However, je first driver from KAMPOT to Phnom Penh was not pleasant. He was late because nobody gave him the change of the pickup location even if I had a Email confirming that the driven got the info, and it made it mad I suppose...

However, je first driver from KAMPOT to Phnom Penh was not pleasant. He was late because nobody gave him the change of the pickup location even if I had a Email confirming that the driven got the info, and it made it mad I suppose...
Note i do not know what ‘inspector’ means and neither anyone else. Road condition extremely poor. We felt unsafe. Aircon did not work well. Loud Cambodian pop music. Do not recommend this service
Bus driver was helpful and organised a tuk tuk for a great price to take us to the airport from a closer location than the bus terminal.
Everything bad what you can read about this company is true. Delayed, overpacked old busses and zero organisation. One of my worst trips in asia.
Very comfortable ride.
Overall the trip was fine. However despite it meant to be a direct service, we had to change bus without explanation and wait for a second bus at 1am

Driver kept stopping to pick up and drop off local people who were paying in cash, this made the journey long. He told everyone going to koh rong to get out early and pay for a tuk tuk they didn’t need as the bus later stopped at the ferry, big scam!

Rücksichtsloser Fahrer, Fahrzeug hat keine Stossdämpfer bzw. so kommt es einem vor. Bei den zurzeit miesen Strassenvehältnissen rast er über die Schlaglöcher und Schotterpisten, wie kein zweiter. Kep->phnom penh. Ralleyfahrt???

We have used a number of different bus companies and i have to say these seats were the most uncomfortable. The roads werent great for the majority of the trip which wouldnt have helped but have done longer trips where the seats were better

Good service departing on time and arriving almost 1 hour earlier (fast driver). People very kind, with almost zero English.
Bus/Van is very, very small and tight seats.
អ្នក​បេីកបរមានស្មារតីល្អ​

The driver was too busy slowing down looking for people to pick up along the road to notice the hundreds of holes in the ground. I understand it’s hard to avoid them all, but I don’t think he tried even once. Also, there was no window on the left side.

Orario fornito dal sito bookmebus.com errato. Il bus è  alle 12am e non alle 11am. Il trasporto è stato effettuato con un bus e non  da un minivan partendo in ritardo di 40 minuti e con tutto il corridoio occupato dalle valigie. Autista prudente ma lento

Booked earliest time to get on large bus, but they put us in a cramped van ("broken big bus" probably means lack of passengers). Dashboard’s cardoor-open light was broken, so kept beeping for full 6hrs to Phnom Penh. AC stopped working after half an hour.
Good
Great driver arrived early, bought water for the trip and allowed a stop for lunch. Quick but very safe driver with his English. Would recommend

Loved everything. Only two things to mention -
1. If you can give wifi, that’s perfect
2. When driver stops for break, he should announce the departure time so we know when to come back to bus.
Otherwise, very good service, thanks!

- first bus was nice but no aircondition- terrible hot
- second bus was old and small
- driver was good but noisy with horn
- worst thing we came 2 hours later than scheduled even though there were no big traffic jams that is unacceptable
We arrived 30 minutes earlier. Good driver!
Good service, the bus was clean and nice. Nothing to complain about.
The driver's style was quite dangerous at some moments (too fast, late on brakes, overtaking from right,...). AC didn't work well. Some seat belts were missing.

It takes in minimum 6 hours from Phnom Penh to Sihanoukville, not 5 as stated when booking. Comfort is little as not much space. Expected more legroom as I was told, the Post VIP van has less seats then others, which wasn't true in this case.

Driver spoke no English & didn’t know where the hotel was, as a result. Drive took 6&half hours instead of 4!!! Took every back street in Sihanoukville!!! Stopped for lunch even though we wanted to keep going & then driver gets to eat free, at our expense
ឡានមានក្លឹន មិនល្អ
Bus left an hour late. The staff were rude and not helpful. The ride took 10 hours instead of the 7 hours as posted.
Verry Good

Good service. Driver made sure to call the destination and time before letting us get on. Sleeping compartments were clean and comfortable with individual AC. Only thing was my power outlet didn't work, but everything else was great!
Nice and easy. We already had 3 tours with Post VIP Van and all of them were good. Thanks for driving us.
Great service .. best recommend from me ??
Nice journey. Good driver. Only passengers for part of route
Valuable price, comfortable drivr
1hour later at the departure!!!! I book for 12h45 we go at 14h!!! And stop to kampot.....

La route était vraiment merdique sur la fin... 
Le gros point noir fut qu'on a été accompagné d'un bébé qui a fait que gémir, et de bidon d'essence qui nous a infesté (seulement la derniere heure car il les a chargé pendant une pause)

Our bed wasn't clean and full of sand along with having no curtain to close our cabin off.
The lady next to us also had small beatles in her bed and was laughed at by the inspector when she made a comment.
We also booked the luxury bus.
among the bus services it was written free WiFi and instead got on the bus we are told that the WiFi was not there.

Travelling PP to SHV 12:30am midnight
Stop at least 40 time on the road -
Putting more and more logistics-
Bus was clean enough-
Departure time 12:30am real time leaving PP is 2:30am ( 2 hour later )
Rate 4/10
The bus was broken in the middle of the night and we had to wait for the other bus to be arrived for 2 hours which delayed our arrival time to Siem Reap.
The trip was ok but less comfortable than previous 2 trips I’ve made in the country. Personal space was very little especially in the back seats and air con not enough for the space/number of people.
The driver is good and on time but the car air conditioner is so bad?
That's car is to old
It was acceptable. Better value than other minibuses. Some stops along the way which slowed down. A lot of mosquitoes too but they eventually left. I would give 4/5 stars.

The bus had 2 hours of delay. There was a lot of traffic, but a cambogian company that does every day that road must know It and do not promise a different time. Seven hours are very tired. There was not WiFi which was written to the Mekong Express site.
The bus was on time and it brings me in front of my guest house
The van was punctual and the driver was very careful and did a very good job.The worst part was the uncomfortable seats due to the van having very little suspension making it very bumpy.
Outlets didn’t work. Bathroom an atrocious mess. Left the lights on for 20 mins for no reason. Hot. Bus itself was noisy. Made local stops - not direct.
An excellent bus service, punctual, comfy seats and good rest stops. A great way to travel around Cambodia.

I was swindled out of this site Bus tickets were not booked and voucher addresses and phone numbers were fake. Time was running out and I was forced to buy the tickets again. I sincerely hope that this site will go bankrupt and people will not be cheated

It was a pleasure travelling with Mekong Express bus from Phnom Penh to Ho Chi Minh City. The bus was clean and comfortable and the entire staff accompanying us on this journey were courteous and well trained.

It’s all different from what they said on the ticket
Time is the main thing that making me feel bad 
12:30 leaving from station 2:30 still in PP
6:30 arival time ( real time 7:30 )
Good

Car was clean. Driver was punctual. Journey was as efficient as it could be. Driver didn’t know GPS maps so didn’t know where our hotel was exactly. We helped with google maps so no problem! Nice driver. Very smooth.
Driver was a bit scary at the times. Driving quite dangerously.

The driver is very friendly and professional.
The company must have attention to the fares of the van. The lights are weak so that the driver to see the road has to put the lights on the maximum position even when there are veichules on the opposite lane

General state of the vehicule is bad (brakes, suspensions, pneumatics, the bedroom curtins etc.). The AC is an lower temperature. The inspector and the driver allowed to transport industrial gas bottles in the baggage wich is against all security rules
Great service.

Nice driver, not driving too dangerously, seatbelt was missing.
Thx for the ride.
Punctual, friendly driver.

Kep to Phnom Penh. Driver likes to hit bumps hard, speeds and loves to hammer on the breaks. We also picked up locals on the way and we had 1 extra person to the number of seats so a girl had to sit just about on his lap.

super rude driver, use horn everytime, all customers cannot sleep. drives fast to race with other truck. one customer next to me droped from bus because he's scare of accident happen, i used to take the bus with this driver once & have same experience.
I don’t like talking to the driver

DONT TAKE THIS BUS! upon arrival, instantly told the bus would be late. We stopped for over 1 hour waiting for someone half way through the journey. the driver didnt take the highway, making the journey longer. stopped twice to pick up random people.

We had bad experience when the boat was late 50' minutes and they drove small boat instead of big one as describe. Consequently, there was not enough seat for all passengers, then they forced us to stand in whole trip
Good nothing to say

We had a few unplanned stops for the smokers, I think it’s not correct and takes the time of other people.
Thank you!

We had a few unplanned stops for the smokers, I think it’s not correct and takes the time of other people.
Thank you!
The trajet was good and quick
Bed is not good smell
ពីមុនធ្លាប់មានទឹកសុទ្ធ និងកន្សែងត្រជាក់ ឥឡូវមិនមានដូចមុនទេ។

Very disappointed!! The driver was late so I tried to call the company but no one answered and the office was closed. I asked someone at a hotel to help me, then I saw my bus in front of the meeting point. I ran to catch but it left without me!!!
Excellent service, highly recommended

It's a good company.It's punctual and clear arrangement. No over seated and no pick up others along the way. They stop twice for toilet and break for lunch. 
The driver is responsible, good that they got headphone during driving, we felt pretty safe.
Good company

Although we were supposed to start at the bus station, they called us and told us to come to a place at a bigger street. A little bit annoying cause we needed to pay another tuktuk to get there.
The rest was good, we arrived even one hour earlier!
Definitely not a VIP van, no air con or windows so was very hot! All passengers sweating. Van left late, but at least the journey time was as stated.
Excellent service provided - 5 stars
The driver drove crazy all way long. Its behaviour was really risky and put all passengers in danger several times! I would have preferred arriving 1 hour later but being way safer during the trip.

The minivan was cramped with seats and luggage. The trip from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh was about on schedule, but the following trip to Sihanoukville was delayed by almost 2 hours. Would recommend flying from Siem Reap to Sihanoukville.

The Coaster bus was alright with decent legroom. However, the aisle was filled with luggage for the whole trip. The arrival in Phnom Penh was nearly 2 hours delayed, so the driver made a stop at the airport to drop off passengers rushing for flights.

SHV-PP:Left on time, only picked up passengers in SHV who had reservation. Then straight to PP with 2 short stops. Drove quickly but not dangerously. AC worked well, some outlets couldn't be adjusted.

There was a software glitch on the program so two people were booked for the same seat. Luckily, there was an empty seat available but that could have been a huge problem if the vehicle was full. Driver would not let us turn the AC up. He said it's loud.

There must have been a software glitch because two people were booked for the same seat. Luckily, an mpty seat was available but that would have been really bad if it was full. Driver would not let us turn the AC up. He said it was too loud.

The trip was very long which is obvious given the objective distance from Mondulkiri region to Siem Reap, but as the driver stopped 8 times to drop on/drop off passengers and for several lunch/WC pauses, the journey was extremely long.

At 07:00 am on my reservation, the bus ticket departing Ho Chi Minh City has been changed to VIP bus. I was contacted by email in advance. The driver is safe and very kind. The bus was comfortable and departed and arrived on time.

seevice left on time. A few postal pickups along the way allowing for bathroom break. For the price I can't fault the service. People talk about hairy driving but it's Cambodia. Basic service with air conditioning is all I needed. Convenient drop-off too.

I was booking the seat 4 months ago. When we at front desk.they tell us the bus is fully somebody used my seat and we need go to upstairs without any “sorry”.upstair space is smaller and very freezer. The AC is from upstairs to downstairs.be care for
Came with a water bottle. Driver was good.
Ignore my first post. That was for a different service.
Overall a good experience. Driver was good but didn't speak English. Good driving and got us where we needed to go with stops along the way. Good value for money

It was Great expirencie didnt expect that! Driver stop on request when needed toilet which is good. But staff in bus Station not helpfull at all. Also when arrive to destination we couldnt get accurace information wbrew we are and what to do
Great service
Good driver
Lots of roadworks made for a bumpy ride and a delayed arrival. We were very unhappy that the driver used his phone whilst driving.
I booked the 10am boat and arrived at the pier at 9:30. There isn't a 10am boat, only 9am and 11:30am. Had to wait an extra 2 hours...

This service does not take 4 hours as advertised - it took 6 hours including picking up other passengers and a lunch stop for the driver. Do not book it if you need to catch a ferry for the specific arrival time.
All good.
This bus company is excellent! There may be late departures sometimes, but all else is quite good

Best thing we did in Cambodia, maybe even the best thing we ever experienced. The pure joy of not knowing when to arrive and the pure thrill of having a couple of near death experiences is world class. 10/10

The driver drives a bit too fast and he stops for costumer pick up along the way which made the travel duration late than usual. The bus station at Sihanoukville was very poor and the receptionist seems to be so careless about their guess.
So far i'm very happy with the company services.
Great ride and very comfortable

The customer service was very poor. They don't even want to look at me when talking to them at the counter. The driver talks very loud and using inappropriate language. They don't really care about people sleeping on the night bus.

Samedy was an amazing driver. We felt very safe. He was very attentive to details (gave us water and stopped when we needed). Would definitely recommend 100%. Non-smoking car and very clean. Thank you!!!
Poor service from the office

There's a (long) restroom break. Then the driver turns on the engine and everybody go back to the bus. The AC is on, the engine is on, all doors are open & passengers waiting but the driver stays outside for 15 minutes... Zero consideration for ecology...
Some delay because of the goods wich did not fit easy in the bus. And a lot of stopt to drop/pick up packets.

i booked a bus from Sihanoukville to Siem Reap, the bus was delayed and I missed the next bus for Siem Reap. I had to take the next bus and arrived at two in the morning in the middle of the city. This was not part of my plan.

My seat was double booked. I had to call and try and sort it out. In the end I'm not sure what happened, but the driver gave me an empty seat- why did I have to call for that? And how did the double booking happen? I've never had a problem before this
stupid drivet

All went perfectly smooth! We were explained all the details of border crossing and boat trip to Don Det. One can also go to Don Khone in same trip & same price, but ask at the agency before trip starts, otherwise boat driver asks for a small extra charge

Cons: 1) Half an hour late from starting point
2) They did change my seat from my online booked seat.
3) Apart from this everything is good

The office was very helpful when I had many delays and the driver kindly waited for 3 hours at the pick up point. The taxi broke down in the middle of nowhere but the drivers friend quickly came to help us and the whole experience was fantastic!

Our bus broke down after 90 minutes. It was not possible to continue our journey, so we had to sit on the floor for 3 hours on another bus. After 3 hours another bus arrived. The air conditioning was broken and he was very dirty.

We asked at each pier if it was Long set beach and the said no. So we got to the last pier and asked again and were told that it was the first pier. So we had to get a taxi boat back at our own expense. So not well informed. Regards
Shane Knox
No wifi
The driver was punctual but we felt unsecure because he was driving crazy (driving fast and horning at every car he overtook).
Best ride ever!
PP-KP: The seats are very uncomfortable, my butt was hurting like crazy. Highway number 3 is one long construction site, makes the ride very uncomfortable.
Easy boarding process. They stop to pick up many people along the way, but it doesn't result in much delay.  Leg room is quite limited

seats were narrow with a buckle that made it uncomfortable for my husband.
did not like the restaurant we stopped at.
driver was great...made it to PP early.
Great service, smooth sailing at the border.

We booked the bus because of longer leg space, wifi, possibility to connect electronicsl device. We got a mini an with none of the amenities we wanted. We also never received the confirmation Email but had The booking number which was accepted. Not good.

Nicely air-conditioned and we'll paced rest stops. Sat in A8 which meant I was able to stretch my legs out. Noted that though the seats recline all passengers were very considerate to those sitting behind them. A pleasant journey all round!
The bus was relatively new but its air con was broken half my journey to Koh Kong. The van almost hit another minivan which made the experience very unpleasant for everyone on board.

Really impressed with the service after reading mixed reviews about the border crossing online. Snacks and food provided were a nice surprise, as well as the tuk tuk service on arrival. 
Only thing to improve would be a bit more guidance at the border.
Everything was okay but only too warm to be comfortable in the mini bus
The travel was very smooth

Hotel pickup is very convenient and thankful. Moving buses is also comfortable. However, it is a shame that the Siem Reap bus stop point specified on the net is different. Couldn't meet free pick-up staff at hotel.
ហេតុអ្វីត្រូវឈប់ដូរឡានកណ្ដាលផ្លូវពេលវេលាជាមាសប្រាក់របស់ភ្ញៀវ ជួយមើលបុគ្គលិកឡើងវិញផង bayon VIP
Bus delayed more than 2hours and the staff only spoke to Cambodian passengers and could not here what he said. Overall it was not a pleasant experience
Driver was driving like crazy. Even for Cambodian standards. Even there was a 2 months old newborn baby on board. We were seriously afraid of our lives. Use at your own risk.
Everything was amasing, very comfortable, punctual. I highly recommend!!!!
Bus very comfortable, sleeping bads, cookies, water and fresh towel given during check in. Punctual, nice.

Ok company. Bus old. But why say that from PP-Kampot 3,5 Hrs? Trip always take minimum 5Hrs.
This problem is not only with Vibol, its with all company. Some even say 3Hrs but ALWAYS take abot 5.
សេវាកម្មល្អតែម៉ាស៊ីនត្រជាក់មិនសូវត្រជាក់.

The bus I booked was cancelled but Suttep Express advised me in advance and took me to Meanchey Express Bus.
Once we got to Kampong Chhnang, less than halfway, I got my bags and got off.
The driver should have been jailed. How we didn’t die amazes me.
Very good service. Great customer service and quick responses when booking via email

Driver not very nice 
Journey scheduled : 4h30 / reality : more than 7 hours...
Very nice driver, safe and punctual
Driver is friendly and on time.
Took the same vehicle to return to Kopmpt, unfortunately which had the A/C problem unresolved. And yet it was still running for a following shift to Phnom Penh with that problem.

I've to inform you, that the confirmed pick up from la vogue hotel wasn't executed! We waited until 30 minutes before bus station departure but there was none. So we had to take a tuk for 12 d. to get to the bus station. Please arrange a refund.
They obviously installed the seats themselves, there is no leg  room whatsoever, and it's a 7 hour ride
Comfortable seat than large bus used to take before. I faced difficulty to find loading point at morning so I recommend to put some photo to find easier.
Pls provide water

Something had happened to the big bus, so we left a little late and we left in two mini vans, which actually probably turned out to be more comfortable and quicker to cross the border. Good driver, AC, no complaints.

first part of the way was good. Second part awful. Time on online ticket was 6:30 departure but was at 7:15, arrival was 3 hours later! We missed our ferry to island! No marks on buses where they are goung, We have to ask every bus which is its destinatio

I have spent 10$ for a ticket to get a better transport experience than the other. Yet, I received the worse. The car is not new, the AC is not cold, and the seat is not comfortable. Won't choose for next service.

I was pleasantly surprised as the journey was comfortable and we felt safe with the driver. We had read a few negative reviews, but we booked seats at the front of the bus and overall had a comfortable ride. The journey took 9 hours.

I was pleasantly surprised as the journey was comfortable and we felt safe with the driver. We had read a few negative reviews, but we booked seats at the front of the bus and overall had a comfortable ride. The journey took 6 hours.
Great Stuff , Great Driver !!!
Driver drove safely and considerately, which made my trip enjoyable and comfortable. Thank you.

We took a mini van. The AC was super bad, it was very hot. There is almost no leg room and the driver was honking ALL THE TIME. Even when the street was empty - it was for no reason and supper annoying. All in all a very bad experience, not again.
The driver brought another passenger that we did not know. That passenger paid separately. We were supposed to have our own car. Please note that this is the first time it happened.

1. Always late, bus does not be on time 
2. Not comfortable, air conditioner is not good.

My husband and I loved the experience..from the AC at the station office to the van and especially the driver..He did a great job on the busy riad to get us safely to Siem Reap on time.
He went out of his way for other customers as well

The ride itself was very decent! Good friendly driver, safe but fast. The pick up was quite difficult because the original car broke down we were taken to a gas station in Sihanoukville were we had to wait for 1:30 for our car. Overall good chaotic servic
Sleeping bed is not spacious and length is a little short for tall passenger.
Was a good journey, but the driver did not speak a single word in English.
Driver drive car with different road and car old, I was go out from Phnom Penh at 1:30pm but arrive Kampot on 8pm. He have many stuff to put many place. Make the trip arrive point too late.
Very good service
Bus left on time, had plenty of stops for bathroom/snacks and made very good time getting to destination. Would very happily take again.

We traveled on 14th Feb and i must say it was one of the worst VIP Vans I’ve ever stepped on. The driver kept on picking people up along the road not to mention him stopped randomly just to get food. Car was not as nice as the company claimed.

We traveled on 14th Feb and i must say it was one of the worst VIP Vans I’ve ever stepped on. The driver kept on picking people up along the road not to mention him stopped randomly just to get food. Car was not as nice as the company claimed.

the driver didnt have any english skills. he picked up and dropped ther guests on the way, so the trip took more than 4 hours. wifi didnt work in the minibus.
Seat was too narrow

The journey was as expected, swift & near enough on time. 
The problems with the trip were solely down to the staff working the operation. Both booking office & on board staff were arrogant, immature & untrained in customer relations. All need training.
the driver made us girls feel uncomfortable...

Driver put 2 times our lifes in danger
Start with 1 hour delay. Said on your website travel duration 4h30 , it took 7 hours. In place to arrive around 4pm it was 7pm
No place for the luggage....
Will never travel with that company.

Overall we enjoyed the trip. Driver was not going like crazy (as many comments say). He was driving pretty fast, but we felt safe. Just bus came 40 min late and the whole trip took like 9 hours (instead of mentioned 6), and also bus broke on the way.

From Mondulkiri to Sihanoukville we had to change in Phnom Penh. The hotel bus was just amazing, comfortable, maybe just a bit too short if you are tall. The second bus was also OK, but driver look very tired, he was going very slow and we arrived 2h late
The price is more experience than purchase at office directly.
A good service. Recommended

Actually, I booked a VIP Van seats but on the departure time they switched to Country Van without letting me know and the seat that I booked got randomize. IT SUCKS WHEN YOU TREAT YOUR CUSTOMER LIKE THAT.
Highly Recommend! Outstanding Service; driver met us at Thai side after getting Thai visa. They took my bicycle no questions asked for $10
I’ve used Kim Seng a few times now and always have a good experience.
It was a very pleasant trip. The driver was very careful.
comfortable, very good service, free snacks and water

Drop off place was in the boonies.
If there is no closer drop off to town next time then we will change bus companies. Journey was Ok.
The driver is easy-going and friendly but the car is too old inside which is below my expectation when I booked via the app.
Always had a comfortable trip
Good
Driver is not good. សំដីឈ្លើយ
The driver drive very fast and was overtaking when not safe. It was a scary trip on a usually very safe one.

I was concerned about the reckless driving reviews for Meanchey Express, but I thought everything was fine--this is just the way they drive in Cambodia.  We left on time and arrived a little over 6 hours later--lots of traffic and road repair issues.

Everything is ok. The driver was great ?. 
The trip was 5,5 hours and we stopped only one times for eat, drink and toilet.
Unclear what 'inspector' refers to

Bkk-Siem Reap. 9am departure. Travel mart codeshare (?) The guide was outstanding. Very courteous and kind. Thorough at the border crossing. Driving pretty on the conservative side and still well ahead of schedule. Well done!

My seat was at the front, in the middle between the driver and the passenger at the right. Extremely uncomfortable, not because it was narrow (as I'm v short), but because it hasn't got a proper pillow, it's very hard. Ticket should have been half price.
Safe and Fast
Great trip, ran on time, good stops for snacks and the toilet. Just a little cramped if you're tall
It was a great and comfortable journey. We were only 30minutes late due to construction. The driver drive really safely and the rest stop was excellent.

Bus late 1 hour, no one speak a word of English, several stops in the middle of nowhere, no space for luggage. Back truck full of water bottles, no space for luggage. 2nd bus late as well, a trip planned for 7 hours took 12. Very bad.

Difficult, because problems with online Ticket... Thats why we missed the Ferry at 9.00, we have to wait 2h! This ferry leaved 11.20, but on the way, the engine has Problems, we had to return and to take another ferry and change the luggage ourselves!

The driver stopped a lot on this “express, VIP 4.5 hour journey”, even stopping at a car wash to clean his van (!) enroute and thereby hitting rush hour in phnom penh. He didn’t care, obviously, that it was a 7-hour trip. They could stop pretending

Sold as lux bus, the one i get on into was a crapy old bus which lots of broken features. After two hours drive the bus broke down and we had to wait for the replacement between 2:30 and 3 hours. 
Horrible! little or very little explanation
Fast but was hot in the bus,, AC was weak
We left a little late but still arrived on time. Bus itself was ok but the chairs not so comfy

There was no wifi or water given. Bus came 45 mins late. 

My seat was double-booked. I booked A3 from kg chhnang to phnom penh, but someone else also booked A3 from Poi Pet to Phnom Penh.

Wrong timing, 2:30pm in stead of 2:30am
That's y make me confused my travel time
Have had a good time for my very first time with night bus. Jesus blessed you!

Very good driver and services.

Driver showed up right at our hotel on time. Driver is safe and courteous. Not much English but enough. No hidden fees and dropped us off right where we needed to be.

Very good professional driver, no hazardous overtaking, no risks, just perfect. I felt very safe on the entire trip, highly recommend. Bravo Larryta

They care only for money esp. the one at Banteay menchay. I admit it was my fault by not knowing Banteay Menchay and Poipet are different, I have 2 tickets one for me and my son I plead and beg for them to re-sched not refund but they denied it. Inhumane!
3rd time using this platform.... gets me from A to B no doubt will use again before I leave Cambodia.... better than CamboTicket which payments fails on for me

probably the best van trip I've had in 3 years of living in Cambodia. Vans are new and clean, driver was not a crazy maniac, and bottled water was provided. plus there was a 20 minute meal break on the way. My new 1st choice for van trips! thank you!

Will definitely use the service again.
good experience again with Seila Angkor
It’s not bad for night bus. As your client please keep this quality. Thanks

Absolutely awful. Everything about the service is a lie: no WiFi, no water etc. The bus was filthy from floor to ceiling, the driver was late by hours, taking two petrol stops,  one tire check & an unscheduled lunch while running late. Avoid at all costs!

Almost 3 hrs late, had four stops in an ancient van that hasn't been cleaned in years. Driver spoke no English,  and never communicated what was happening with any of the four unnecessary stops. Any other provider would be better, this ruined the holiday.
Very safe driver, and polite. Loved the trip

Currently, Virak Buntham VIP van is the only option to go SHV by using Highway road. However, again punctuality is never their strong suits. After they went and took us from 1st stop, they got to another station waiting for at least 30mins to take parcel.

The bus driver drove dangerously fast. On some legs of the journey he constantly hooted trying to get traffic out of his way.

Everything else was alright, but is ultimately irrelevant if you risk death with every trip
Still Low quality service, since I've been using this service for too long, from 2015

4 hours late, arrived at 7pm instead of 3pm, bus broke down, driver was stopping for lunch which wasn’t scheduled in the itinerary as well as a toilet break. Played Cambodian music really loud for over an hour until someone had to ask him to turn it down
best quality
The departure was late, the seats aren't comfortable, the driving dangerous, no place to put the baby stroller in the trunk I had to take it with me on the seat
The driver’s complaints about the traffic could be a bit annoying for the passengers (me). Overall it’s a good experience.
The food at the bus stop is trash and expensive
I am not recommend to use Vibol express. The front desk is rude and the car is too old
We were able to travel safely and quickly on the new highway.
Phnom Penh to Sein Reap in 5h perfekt
the driver call ask for early departure before 1 hour without notice and drive fast. bad attitude.
not comfortable

The link to search for the bus station for the departure from Koh Kong indicates the wrong location. The link takes you to another departure station.
Even if the right station is not far away, it seems right to be able to correct the error. Thank you

Took a night bus from Bangkok to Siem Reap. Surprinsgly a rather pleasant night bus. It wasn't full. The seats are rather spacious and comfortable (and that's from a tall guy pov). You can make them lean back. It was not easy to find the bus though,
Peelan was punctual and we felt safe travelling with him. He seems like a nice person and I wouldn't hesitate to ride with him again.
អ្នកបើកបរនិយាយទូរស័ព្ទរហូត ណាត់គ្នាលេងបាល់ មិនយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ក្នុងការបើកបរ
This was a very comfortable option for a 6 hour journey. We felt very safe with our driver and the inspector was helpful

Once at PNH Airport, I simply contacted Sam's Taxi on their WhatsApp site and they dispatched the driver to meet me. In less than 10 minutes I was on my way for a 2-hour, 20-minute ride to my hotel in Kampot. I would use them again.

Larrytas busses are in good condition and the driver was friendly and drove safe. There is little space for luggage in the back so some of the luggage was put in the isle next to the passengers which limited a bit the seating. Overall good experience

Driving smooth and nice. Fast & Comfo
Fine - left pretty much on time, driving felt safe, had seatbelts. Knocked off 1 star as the AC was quite weak so was a bit hot (but not unbearable, and I had a personal fan I brought with me).

Battambang — PP. Overall fine, left about 20m late. Took about 5h. Vehicle good condition, good AC, driving felt safe. Knocked off a couple of stars as there were no seatbelts on back row seats, and a little cramped. But fine journey all round.

Very good transport service overall. Driver was a bit of a concern with speed and driving on the wrong side of the road, but the bus was air conditioned and comfortable and I would try again. Please give the driver proper safety training.
friendly staff and actually the bus arrive before of the time, compare to another company, I think I can rate for this company about 3 ⭐

Superb driver. Fast but safe. Got me home in three hours.

Your rides are so uncomfortable and it's smelly. Please do some cleaning to your inside vehicle. Stink so much. Your driver bring us to restaurant  stops which overcharge and food taste bad. Had diahorea . Really bad service . Sucks.
Great driver! highly recommend
Good journey but too hot. Aircon not working properly
I had no issues with the trip. One of the best services I've used. Thanks!

Driver arrived 15minutes ahead of time, spoke acceptable English, stopped at gas stations when requested (restroom breaks etc). Fantastic service, would definitely recommend to anyone looking to travel by land from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap and vice versa.
This company is shit. They deleted my bus only the minute before. Shit shit shit. Don’t book with this scam

Overall, a very confortable way to travel. The 6h didn’t seem particularly long, the seats were confortable and you could even recline the seats. We’ve got a couple of stops which were enough. It was quite hot though.

Overall, a very confortable way to travel. The 6h didn’t seem particularly long, the seats were confortable and you could even recline the seats. We’ve got a couple of stops which were enough. It was quite hot though.

3 hours of delay and no information and no apologize from the compagny. The driver is not cool and started the course with 30 mn of delay without raison

Our experience was wonderful: clean car, good driver, regular bathroom breaks on the 8.5 hour journey from Siem Reap to Sihanoukville. From all my research, this was significantly more reliable than plane, train or bus and Sam’s did not disappoint.

Il faut réparer la boîte de vitesse du bus! Il n'y a plus de synchro de 4.
