Not very comfortable, the driver is skillful but drove too fast. There were many stops in between the ride from Bavet to Phnom Penh to drop off or pick up passengers.
Departure schedule is 2:45pm, it left at 3:30pm.

Service was excellent, as always. Word of caution: I took the 8:30 from Battambang, and we would have made PP in under 6 hours, but traffic going into PP was so bad, we sat for an extra hour stuck in the traffic jam. Consider a time other than 8:30.
Great tour of all the main temples, good guide and very punctual org
Overall positive experience. Same level as seila angkor,met hong transport and way ahead of transport like capitol bus which is shitty.
you should not allow animal in the car …this trip there is a dog in the car and it poop everywhere. I don’t know how can you seat with 6 hrs on dog poop. this is not acceptable.

Used Kim Seng Express to travel from Phnom Penh to Kampot and return. They use Ford Transit vans which are well maintained and in a much better condition that some of the rival companies. Depot in Phnom Penh is a bit out of town about 10kms from airport.

This van drive from Sihanoukville to Phnom Penh was really quite scary. The road was quality was terrible with heaps of pot holes and people veering from the other lanes into our on-coming traffic, and vice versa. It's the cheapest way to get there tho!

Highly recommended.the black van  was very spacious with  lots of leg room.driver was very careful and van has front cameras.arrived pp super.fast..

If you can sleep when you travel this is great! Such a time saver! Though I would say, the beds are very small and you're sharing. For me this was fine as I'd just met a group of people to go with but maybe difficult with a stranger.

Excellent driving.  Picked from PP airport and drove through rain and darkness to Siem Reap in comfort and safety.

Perfect

Excellent service, A/C, ideal for small groups (it fits 9 passengers, it can easily feel like a private hire). Two stops, one longer (25m) and a shorter one (10m). The driver was most helpful stopping for on us as he was just driving pass our hotel.

The bus left at the given time but it was supposed to arrive at 1.30 am but we arrived at 3 am. The road was really bumpy and the driver was really rushing over it such that the bus was shaking enormously. The beds were comfortable.

When the driver stops at different places ( the bread shop or the van is broken), he didn't tell us clearly. We waited for another van to pick us up. It took 2 hours. He didn't advise us to eat first. He didn't stop again for a meal until arrival at 4pm.

The driver was punctual. The ride is calm. We left at 7.20 in Siam Reap were at 13.20. We managed to see the temples of the small ring. They came back at night. I recommend using the services of this company.
The bus driver returning to HCMC drives impatiently and talks on the phone while driving.
Good
The car so hot , AC not work . Please check it before departure due to long way travel.
We left half an hour late, due to the rain and the traffic jam. The driver did his best to make up for the lost time. Excellent experience!
Thank you for the safe drive
Better than the more expensive virak and larita

The bus was so cramped. 1 bunk is for 2 people, but the size of it is just a bit bigger than a single bed. I am 170cm and my feet touched the wall, and there's no other place to put my small bag and my shoes. With my husband and I inside, I can't move.
Worked as it should. No delay and nice guidance though boarder control. No complaints
Bunna is a very good driver and he came on time as I expected.
The webpage told us 3 hours. It took us 6… so yeah, NOT punctuality at all!

We got the 8:30pm - 8am Siem Reap to Sihanoukville, bus arrived early at 6:40am which was great. Bunks were comfortable but we booked two each to make sure we weren’t sharing and had plenty of room, book upper as you get window and are off the floor.
Excellent service. We were looked after all the way. During immigration, a lad from the company kept us informed and was waiting for us when we exited. Highly recommended
Clean van, pleasant and helpful driver.

nothing else to say. it toook probably 1hr more due to following camion roads. and also dropoff where the driver though convenient. 
very bad
My trip was cancelled due to medical reasons. Is there anyway I can get my refund under special circumstances?

The air conditioner works horribly. And the bus is very, very, very cold. I was in two sweaters and two blankets and I was cold and my throat hurt.
I will not go with this company again because of such inhumane conditions.
1 heure de retard, conduite vraiment dangereuse et aggressive ce qui pour nous est une première au Cambodge où habituellement nous avons eu des voyages très cool.
I've booked seat number 10, but unfortunately I got seat number 28.
Driver arrived in Tatai quite late and other passengers were very loud - passengers should not be allowed to play sound on their phones (they should wear headphones).
Driver arrived in Tatai quite late and other passengers were very loud - passengers should not be allowed to play sound on their phones (they should wear headphones).

-seat and legroom too small for European body frame
-passenger compartment door handle broken on the inside, death trap in case of accident
-a/c could only run on minimal, dripping water
-Arrived after 4 hours, one hour later than promised
NEVER AGAIN
Excellent
No correct drop-off point in website

This is the worst service which I was served. I booked a seat via online. They canceled the trip when I was arrived to pickup location without any prior notice. They asked to use next vehicle leave after 2 hours from PP.finally only 50% was refunded to me
Our driver was wonderful, he made the car ride very comfortable, got us the most delicious hot bread and was a very good driver! We highly recommend him!

Although the trip was good, the driver was quite rude, didn’t talk to us at all but simply honked every time he wanted our attention and when we were 10 minutes away from our destination, he decided to pull over on the side of the highway to take a piss.
The vam was one hour late (we arrived 1.5 hours later then expected) and we didn't get much information while we were waiting for the van. The drive itself was fine.
Good & comfortable
To har blow on cold aircon
Overall much more positive and higher quality sleep than expected!
ឈប់តាមផ្លូវរហូត កៅអីក្រោយ ជាងដាក់មនុស្ស រហូត6នាក់ សំបុត្រ 8$ តែរកន្លែងអង្គុយគ្មាន
ឈប់ឥតល្ហែ
Great trip - quiet and comfortable. A,/C was set very low though ⛄
ឡានចាស់ខ្លាំង កន្លែងអង្គុយពិបាក កៅអីបាក់ កក់កៅអី២កៅអី ១នៅខាងមុខ ជាក់ស្ដែងបានទៅអង្គុយនៅខាងក្រោយ កក់កៅអី១ទៀតខាងក្រោយមិនបាច់និយាយ ពិបាកជាងឡានកាំពីតូលចាស់ទៀត តម្លៃ៤ម៉ឺន ដាក់សុទ្ធតែ VIP Bus ទៅដល់ចប់និយាយ
Very comfortable.  The air bus is so much better than other vans and busses in Cambodia.  I hope they will add air busses to Siem Riep and other destinations soon too.

Great service. Crossing the border was a lengthy endeavour and a bit of a pain, but as to be expected. Driver took the time to drop my partner and I closer to the airport which was a huge help, although the destination arrival wasn't going to met.
clean van, have breaks every few hours. overall good services. highly recommended
Driver left on time and got to Siem Reap earlier than expected. Cambodian border crossing was a breeze.
Great trip despite the negative reviews. Love the bus! Comfy seats.
good!!
អ្នករួមដំណើរឡូឡា

The ride was comfortable. However we had to stop at a mechanic due to some issues with the A/C. Therefore we were 1,5 h late. We still made it on our speed boat as the driver dropped us off at the pier for a little surcharge.

Your driver is dangerous to all on the road and the people in your care on the bus. Including a toilet stop and a stop to repair a tire it took only 4.15 minutes- that will tell you how fast he was going. We slid across the mud road . I asked him to slow
Not as good as I thought would be. poor communication due to language barrier.

After spending two days worried about traveling again on your bus due to dangerous driving, I spoke to the driver and asked him to please drive slower. He was lovely and was careful all of the way back. A much safer ride , considerately better safe driver
Mini van left on time, stopped halfway for 15 minutes break, free bottle of water for journey. Cannot complain.
I book Seat No. 1&2 and the staff say no seat was available. how come? since you already cut my money??
Safe and able driver. Very satisfied with service
Punctual. Clean by asian standards. They made sure everyone had the correct travel documents before we left. Crossing the border was quick and efficient.
非常棒，临时提前上车改签也不收费用。五个半小时不到就到达，中途停两个休息区。

On time and waiting at arrival.
Experienced driver, good comfortable van for 4 adults.
Will use them again.

We booked our tickets for 10am. We showed up there at 9:30, then the operator said it was cancelled and starts at 11:00. (well, finally started at 11:40!). we’ve not gotten any email that our bus was cancelled!
Missed our ferry. Very exhausting day.

15 minutes after departure, we stopped unannounced at a mechanic. Driver got out, talked to the staff, and walked away as they took the whole front of the van apart. I had no idea what to expect. Finally got back on the road and arrived 2 hours late.
Uncomfortable journey.

After boarding, driver disappeared for 45 minutes while passengers sat with van running. A few Khmer passengers complained to the station staff, but no one did anything. Van was packed to the ceiling with vegetables that fell on us. No room for bags.

(Continued) Passengers were crammed in around vegetables. We had to sit on our bags. Consistently drove a terrifying 100km/hr into oncoming traffic to pass every vehicle. Picked up more passengers for 10k riel each, packing us in more. Arrived late.
The driver was very erratic and was using his phone constantly, on Facebook, YouTube and FaceTime. At some points he was using 2 phones at once. There was little to no air con.

We were a bit worried because of the comments but we had a great experience! The boat to Koh Rong Samloem and back was once a few minutes late and on the way back even early! Everything worked perfectly!

Bus was clean. We left on time. A bit cool but you have a blanket
 Not bad trip. A bit of rough road makes sleep difficult.
Overall no problems and would use again for long trip.
the bus was spacious and comfortable. the guide was incredibly friendly and helpful. we got decent food, snacks and drinks too! the toilet was also clean!

The minibus was replaced with an mpv. It left on time. The driver was pretty careful and I didn't feel in danger at all. He stopped for a toilet break once and drove fast but carefully. The journey took less than 3 hours and not the 4 as advertised.
Journey was shorter than 4 hours, comfy and air conditioned bus.
So glad we drove from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh instead of flying. Our driver was on time and drove cautiously. The roads are excellent. We took a few stops along the way.
Great service, highly recommended
It was very comfortable. The driver was really friendly. I would like to use this service when I come back to Cambodia.
回金边开的更快，预计六小时实际加上中途休息的时间五个半小时不到
Book with BookMeBus seat number 30 but shown in bus system different number.

Booked 2 seats with one being the middle one at the front next to the driver. The seatbelt was not working and therefore this was not a safe position to be sitting in for such a long journey, especially as the driver drove erratically. Would not use again

Don’t use this company! Worst bus i’ve taken. No inspector, no visa check before departure, no food stop, not enough space for even one small bag person. Bus full of mosquitoes. Bus had no suspension so always flying around over every bump. Bad, bad, bad.
Superb service - very happy

Sleep bunks a bit too narrow. I advice if you book to take the middle row. The drive itself was okay, driver was not speeding or honking. 

If I might have a remark. No communication in English how so ever. Bit confusing for foreigners who travel.
worst driver ever as the driver always on his headphone none responsible
Extreme Expensive!

Too little space for Europeans, too load in van due to constant video calling for 6 hours, a lot of mosquitos. 
Short breaks every 60-90 min, Dinner restaurant too expensive. Driver drove fast and arrived 30 min earlier. Would not chose again.
Friendly staff smoothly trip recommend to use this transportation
New and clean van with good ac setting (not too hot, not too cold), safe driving and minimum stops, arrival on time.
Quite a shaky drive on the N3. Carry a confort cushion if you can...
Please inform the Company វីរៈប៊ុនថាំ to be punctual for departure time. It was late 30 minutes  for departure during my last trip.
Driver went far too fast , touching 110kph at times. The bus was packed with goods that were being transported leaving no room in the luggage compartment. Punctual but I won't use Salt again.
Its hot at the back even at night.

Good driver. Traffic heavy because Chinese New Year. Aircon not working much. Left close to departure time and arrived before advertised time. All in all not a bad trip. Arrived safe in Phnom Penh. Thanks
The driver was talking on the phone many times, So I did not know if he could concentrate on driving.
Punctual, safe driver who was very good about making rest stops. Great experience.

Good value for money. The only negative issue is that the process, route and distances between the two border sides are not well explained. PLEASE make this available in some way. The crossing from Phnom Penh to Bangkok was easy, return more confusing.

Good value for money. The only negative issue is that the process, route and distances between the two border sides are not well explained. PLEASE make this available in some way. The crossing from Phnom Penh to Bangkok was easy; return more confusing
On time, felt very safe. The driver even dropped me off at the airport as that’s where I needed to go and we were driving past it.
On time, felt safe, clean van. The driver even dropped me off at the airport as that’s where I needed to go and we were driving past it.
it was great travel by bus. however, I wasn't aware that small bus was used to Cambodia border from BKK
The driver was asking for 15$ more to stop at an ATM only 1km away.
Le bus est parti à l'heure, le personnel était très gentil et les couvertures très douces et chaudes. Plusieurs arrêts pour les toilettes c'était parfait je recommande
Great service and well ran operation. I would give it 5 stars if I was shorter in height. This buses are not that comfortable for people over 6'1" or 1,85 m.
ឡានតូចចង្អៀតព្រោះដាក់កៅអី បួនជួរពិបាកជិះពេលយប់
The engine was out. Almost one hour late. The second driver drove safely but the bus was over filled (12 pax and 2 kids)
Efficient journey if a little later than expected.

Barely any space (if you like cuddling with strangers it's fine) and too warm. Windows were tinted but the seat was too high to properly look out the window anyways. But I guess the price is cheap. No seatbelts in the back.
Great Trip!
Everything great, on time and comfortable trip!
The trip was okay. We were on a hurry because we had another bus to catch so they offered us to pay 2$ more by person to take the highway instead of the small roads. So it took 3h instead of 5h
Everything was fine until your Aircon went out on the bus. Someone needs to maintain your buses better.
The driver drove like he was chased by the police!. Didn't like the forced use of facemask!
Great pick-up, on time to destination
Super pleasant drive. Bus was half full so a lot of space.  Driver was super smooth.

The driver was driving like a lunatic. Going with 120 through villages, not keeping distance, overtaking left and right, we had 4 almost-accidents. From the bus, we texted a cambodian friend to call the company, they told him to mind his own business.

Worst experience of my life. Bus was late for 2 hours and no one in the bus station knew anything. Buses and station was extremely dirty. When bus arrived I had no seat/bed. They drove me to another bus sat next to driver for 1 hour. Company must close!!
Great bus. Travel went as planned. Great experience including online purchase, assigned seats, and complimentary water. Would recommend!
Friendly, safe driver who made good time on a long drive and stopped at the spider market so I could try a roadside snack. ?

I am an experienced who I gives fair but honest reviews every time I travel

Traveling with this company was so confusing that 250 words will not cover it. If you are really interested in my opinion I am happy to share it with you but without limit

My second trip with this company. I must have arrived at the hotel pickup point too late and the shuttle had left already. The company put me in taxi so I could catch the bus that was stuck in traffic. Amazing military operation on their behalf. Impressed
Excellent service. Highly recommended

Super level of organization. I was at the border for a long time, lagged behind my bus, they found another bus for me, then there was another transfer. Everything is fast and clear without loss of time. Buses are comfortable
Good journey and travel in comfort. Was on the large coach, good toilet on board, got a nice breakfast roll (chicken) and bottle of water. Stopped after 2 hours for 10 minutes break. No complaints.

Old, dirty Van, no space, fully packed with stuff everywhere, they dropped us of at another point than the one which was indicated on the booking. When we made that present to the driver he doesn‘t cares. So we where forced to pay another 10$ for tuktuk

Old, dirty Van, no space, fully packed with stuff everywhere, they dropped us of at another point than the one which was indicated on the booking. When we made that present to the driver he doesn‘t cares. So we where forced to pay another 10$ for tuktuk

I took the minivan from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh. We arrived in almost exactly six hours. The driver left promptly and made two quick stops along the way for bathroom/food. Little explanation in English, which was fine. Room for (reasonable) luggage.
Old orange car with high price tickets. Uncomfortable hot, broken seat.

Really disappointed with Cambodia Post bus service. Only good thing was the bus left on time. Once we left, seemed like we stopped every 45 minutes to pick up another passenger or envelope. Driver was unfriendly, bus cramped, & arrived almost 1 hr late.

The driver stoped a few times just for him… or to snack or to go to toilet but just himself and not even unlock the door. So we couldn’t leave the bus even if we wanted to or if there was some emergency situation.
the bus didnt show at the scheduled time and nobody called me
Wan (the group leader) was a star! Attentive, knowledgeable and helpful ?
នៅបង្អួចអត់មានវាំងនន តាមផ្លូវថ្ងៃចាំងចង់ឆេះ។
ល្អ
Good service, left on time from post office in PP and arrived in Kampot 3 hours and 15 minutes later, including a rest stop on the way.
Punctual and comfortable ride from Phnom-Penh to Sihanoukville
Perfect ride, the driver was very responsible. I would certainly recommend.
The most comfortable overnight bus I've ever taken!

The bus company was great. The confirmation email from BOOKMEBUS gave the incorrect departure address and we had to scramble to find and make it to the correct address. The bus had left, but Pacific Express stopped it en route and got us a ride to it.
very quick ,,,two and a half hours,and safe driving

It was on time and relatively comfy. I initially had 2 seats to myself but then part way through they moved a stranger to sleep next to me with 0 explanation. Made it very cramped and hard to sleep for the remaining 5-6 hours :/
Driver keeps stopping to drop off passengers/items picked up in Kampot and take money
No place to put baggage
the staff was amazing, the driver even turned back as i was running late (ferry from koh rong was late). thanks again!
The staff at the bus station in kampot was not very helpful or responsive. the drive was okay, although there was noch much room
Safety and Good luck.

The description implied that the whole trip will be with the sleeper. We went by minivan until border.
7 hours duration is from our opinion not makeable. It took as a little more than 8 hours.
Bordercross was very well organized.
Good value. Departed on time, arrived 15 mins early. Cannot say much more. Recommended
The driver was good, but a bit too fast, considering other obstacles on the road.
Bravo particulièrement à l'hôtesse et son soucis du bien être des voyageurs.
The driver was helpful and courteous, however there was no communication from the operation staff about the drivers information nor the arrival of our driver, which caused a delay in our trip.
Driver was right on time and the vehicle was very clean and comfortable  driver was very courteous … I recommend
No complaints, stopped 2 times for 10 minutes each. Left on time, no delays. Would use the service again
It was on time and and relatively comfy. Nothing special but did the job.
Excellent and reliable service

It was a small minivan. I am only 165cm and my knees were touching the seat in front. There was so much luggage under the seats that you couldn’t move/stretch your legs at all. It was a very cramped 5 hours. Dangerous driver too with numerous near misses.
We arrived quickly. At the border, everything was fast too. The seats are comfortable - you sleep lying down

This isn’t a Westerner style coach/bus. It was a cramped minibus with speeding drivers overtaking into oncoming traffic. Poor communication at rest stop – I was the only English speaking person on board.  Only good thing was he did the journey in 5 hours.
bus is dirty, Aircon is not working well ( hot), lunch place is also dirty.
All great
best price/value! and one stop in between for eating and WC which was very nice! will travel again with them!
Clean minibus with a driver who drives safely. Unfortunately the seats are tight. But overall I was happy with the service.
The dispatcher was well speak english, but the bus arrived was 15mins late. Pillow and Bed sheets not smell good, you cant sleep well unless you are tired so much. Overall not good experience…
Well done...
Overall trip was great. Return bus was comfortable but as with most buses here there drive irrationally. Drive went pass drop off point which had been agreed

Easy to book on line. Found the bus station from the link provided in ticket. Driver was fast and furious and we arrived at Poipet safely and ahead of schedule. Plenty of stops for food and comfort breaks. Overall, a great experience
The beds where way to small for european people. Both in length as with a very tiny bed.
The beds where way to small for european people. Both in length as with a very tiny bed.

The rest area is good. Clean bathroom and 24h mart available which is very convenient. One tiny feedback, my bag was placed on the wrong bus and I have to wait for a while after arriving to get my bag. Better be careful with the arrangement next time.
Very good service - made our trip delighted! ;)
Worst company, avoid all costs.
No space for bags in bus.
Make sure to call & verify the location. We wasted much time trying to find the place because the location on Google Maps is wrong (as of FEB 2023).
I like but 30 minutes waiting

Salida puntual, pero una vez llegue a Siem Reap, casi me hacen pagar el billete nuevamente porque ya yo había borrado mi reservacion y a no ser por el recibo del pago en mi banco, el que me recibió en Siem Reap fue muy grosero pensando yo no había pagado

Very little space in minivan  when full (14 passengers)
Not much indication as to which can to take when more than one bus leaving. Driver goes really fast and takes many risky decisions to pass others. AC inside, small seats but fairly clean.
I hated the services. They were late by 2hours.
I hated the services. They were late by 2hours. I dont recommend.  Never again
Really good
Very good experience.
Good Value service from Phnom Penh to Lamp[ot and back again! Book online it's cheaper by $4;-) Driver always felt capable and very able to do his job.
the bus waits for passenger not the other way around
Nobody speaks much English, but everything went smooth.

The smooth ride. Departed on time and arrived just 15 minutes later than was stated in the ticket. Stops every 2 hours for toilet (toilets were free and clean). A lunch stop before the border. Safe driving. Bus was a bit old but comfy

Phnom Penh to HCMC
Left on time, smooth journey, did arrive a little late.
Border crossing was super easy. Took passport at boarding and returned before border. At Moc Bai they did passports for us and checked visas had been applied. Would recommend.
Bus left almost 2 hrs late, no ac and VERY hot the whole way. Only drove half the way on tge new road. Lots of stops to wait for packages. One of the worst trips in 6 years in cambodia...

2 punctures and 3 hours delay...
They need to do better maintenance on their vehicles.
We booked MBUS for a trip from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap. The bus was new, the staff helpful, the price reasonable, and the trip was on time.
Everything was great!

Absolutely horrible, the driver drove as if he’s on the run from the police and when the bus broke down he didn’t even let the passenger know what was happening or if there was any backup!! Thank god all the passenger were so understanding
N/A

While the bus was ok, but speeding of up to 120 km/h, measured with my GPS, while the maximum speed is 80 km/h. Seat belts would not have saved, ... broken. The driver did not announce at stops anything like, duration, location of toilet etc. Overall poor

Overall experience was ok. But the driver really ruined it for me. He was driving very hasardous: last second breaking, risky overtakes, driving really close (less than one meter) to the vehicle in front, and an excessive use of the horn (every 5 sec)
It was a fantastic . Shehan was our driver and he was safe pleasant and very good . From booking to the trip it was great no problems thank you for a great experience.
Very good service. The staff were very helpful. We got through the border easily and arrived in Ho Chi Minh at the estimated time
Rien a redire, si ce n'est la conduite générale des cambodgiens qui transforment une deux fois deux voies en deux routes chacunes a double sens...
I booked a seat in the back row, and barely had enough room to sit comfortably. If you're taller than 160 cm, avoid the back row and go for the single seats - they have more leg room
Good overall.
We arrived with more than two hours late. The driver didn’t speak English impossible to give him our hotel’s address. A lot of waiting time after crossing the boarder before leaving
Booked the day before,  taxi turned up on time and drove at a good pace, No complaints at all.
Our driver was so fast he got us there 1 hour ahead of schedule. 1 toilet stop and 1 rest stop. Choose seats 1&2 for best air conditioning and best view
Our driver was so fast he got us there 1 hour ahead of schedule. 1 toilet stop and 1 rest stop. Choose seats 1&2 for best air conditioning and best seatbelts
ក្រុមហ៊ុនគ្នានទំនួលខុសត្រូវ
F*k company
Quick, efficient and friendly service. Nice staff!
Excellent bus very comfortable air conditioned driver made 2 stops for bathroom breaks was given a bottle of water before leaving the station. Actually arrived in siem reap early.

Larger car, 7 seater. Left slightly delayed but nothing major. Drivers changed half way (with one going the opposite way, quite amusing to watch as on motorway). Cooler packed up, had to stop 2x to top up with H2O - anyone checking the cars at all? -No AC
I couldn't see out the windows ?
All good!
Clean vehicle and steady driver. I would recommend this company.
The driver was really patient, steady and friendly. In addition, the bus was clean and reliable.

The trip was OK, but, on the side of the bus, it says "Making your trip delighted" it should say "Making your trip delightful" not delighted.... Otherwise it makes no sense.... You are using future tense and past tense in the same sentence!!!! Incorrect.

It was the worst drive in my live.
The driver was driving incredibly fast even when hé was making several phone calls while driving. Irresponsible driving

Literally no comment. If you want to aboard the bus for the sake of frustration go ahead ?

Clim too high and driver does not listen.

Nothing you can do about City traffic so don't rely on arrival time.
Safe driver so no issues ...
Bus two hours late without letting us know, an angry man had to take our passport two times without explanation. Okay other than that.
the vechecle seem old and air con is not work properly. it was a hot ride
ការសុំចូលបន្ទប់ទឹក មិនមានការយកចិត្តទុកដាក់ពីអ្នកបើកបរឲ្យទាន់ពេលវេលាដោយប្រើរយៈពេលជាង ២០នាទី

I had spend 7 hours drive from Phnom Penh to Koh Kong. I met a very helpful and polite driver. The service provided is not bad at all. But just need to be careful if the departure delayed or else, should have informed to the passenger in advance.

They speak only Vietnamese, so you do not understand anything when they communicate to passengers.
Seats couchette are good though.
Took a while to pick people up from different vendors.  Supposed to depart at 11:30 but we never really left until towards 1 pm.  Van looked older but operated fine.
Could‘ve easily made it on time but the driver was very slow so we were late
Driver drove well but we arrived one hour late after 35 mins late departure then drooping off package and picking up someone
Very comfortable ride. Would've been made better only if WiFi was provided. Just enough room to fit me.
Everything went smoorh
Really comfortable bus, felt very safe and the journey was perfectly timed. Thank you!
Drive too fast, driver took many risks

Pleasant journey with Virek Buntham from Siem Reap to Battambang. The minibus was much more spacious than others in Cambodia, although the AC is strong and it was cold on board. The driver drove safely. Arrived earlier than scheduled.

Travelled from Battambang to Phnom Peng with Saly VIP. Arrived on time. The mini bus was quite small and cramp for a person of 185cm. Nowhere to put any carry on luggage. The windows were heavily tinted so the back felt claustrophobic.

Travelled from Phnom Penh to Mondulkiri (return) with Thy Socheata (T.C.T.) Express. The bus was ok with some storage overhead for bags. The seats were quite narrow however, and a bit uncomfortable. The journey was at least one hour longer than scheduled.
Travelled from Phnom Penh to Kampot (return) with Kim Seng Express. The buses were ok with some storage overhead. The driver drove well. We were on time in both directions.

It was a pleasure to be in a fresh recent bus, nice looking inside with USB recharge plugs. The bus left late, which is normal in the middle of the day but was on time at PP! The driver was safe and confident. I recommend this company after many uses
the driver wait for me at the airport with my name and at time! he drives ver well and the car was confortable. He bought a bottle of water for me and we stop to go to bath. everything was perfect!

We were really happy with the service, the driver was friendly and didn't drive too fast. They took our luggage all the way to the next mini van, which I didn't expect, and they guided us in the right direction. Would definitely take them again.
Everything went as expected with the bus journey.  Bus comfortable.  Driver friendly and drive safely.  Just over 3 hours 15mins travel time.  Would use again.
Everything went as expected with the bus journey.  Bus comfortable.  Driver friendly and drive safely.  Just over 3 hours 15mins travel time.  Would use again.
Totally the trip was very good. I recommend Larryta Express first~

Very bad experience. Old ferries + generally poor customer service. They overbook all their ferries partly because their online system doesn't integrate properly. We were supposed to leave Koh Rong at 12, but we ended up leaving 4 hours late. Never again.
Perfect ride. Everything went smoothly.

Left 20 mins late as waited for local ppl to arrive late all relaxed!! Lunch was meant to be 20 mins but took 40 waiting for ppl! AC broken. Hot, uncomfy journey. No leg room at back. Braking like crazy my boyfriend flew out of his seat. No space for bags

Driver was driving fast and aggressively. It was pretty hot in the van. Not enought space for the legs. Baggages were not really respected (forced to compress when closing the trunk with a lot a force). Despite the agressive driving, we arrived on time.
We didn‘t use the Bus and didn‘t got our Money back.
Very good
As always, Mey Hong shines. Smooth, painless trip from Siem Reap to Phnom Penh with three stops along the way, friendly staff, and safe driving.

A customer decided to no wear his seatbelt for the entire journey resulting in 3 hours of beeping in the car. The driver did nothing to amend this. Incredible frustrating for all passengers involved except for the selfish person
The driver was continu on his phone. We needed to change a tire and he didnt give is any information. We went on a bompy road for almost An our
Very comfortable and cheap connection. Furthermore the staff is amazing. They managed to drop me close to the airport so that I was able to catch my flight. Thanks again:)

Driver good
Bus was very poor needs upgrading
Punctuality late setting off
Overall journey was very uncomfortable due to road conditions and seating .

The journey started pretty bad : in Bangkok the employes didn't seem to want to talk to strangers. Not even a hello, agressive. But the rest of the trip was fine, especially at Poipet border. Employees even helped us avoid scams by following by guiding us
Everything was great. Waiting room with air con, check-in smooth, new boat and engines, friendly and professional staff, arived to destination (Kog Rong) on time.
bad ???
Horrible trip. Many stops on the way to drop off and pick up people. The driving style was far too fast, wild and  dangerous. At the end half an hour delay.

Thean was waiting when we got off the speedboat pier, it only took a few minutes to find the car because my ringer was turned off. He communicated well and stopped as needed. The Lexus car, although 20 years old, was comfortable and clean.

Great service, way better and cheaper than flying. Driving experience was standard south east Asia, fast over taking and crazy traffic in places but the driver was experienced and got us there very quickly with no close calls.

Pick up location in Bangkok is correct.
The staff had limited English. The bus left 30 mins late. The journey consisted of a mini van, a guide to escort me to the border, a scooter ride to an office and a car journey to Siem Reap. We arrived 2hrs late.
Minivan left on time, was not speeding. Overaöl good experience
Bad airconditioning, old van, driver rides to fast

With minivan van Bangkok to the border
At border Cambodja pickup bij tuktuk what brings you to an office. There was a private car waiting to bring you tot Siem Reap. Work fine

I went from Ho Chi Min to Phnom Penh with no issues. I had US Dollars with me ready to pay in cash for Cambodian visa. Staff were efficient collecting passports & we waited at a restaurant to get them back. But no wifi or charging on bus
Too strong aircondition after the sun went down

Bus left late. Picked up fandoms on way. Stopped on side of road for an hour with no communication as to why. Bud was hot and uncomfortable. Stopped once to grab food and use RR for 7 hour bud ride. Not satisfied.
អត់គោរពពេល ចង្អៀត
Good service with great staff
We came with the right bus and everything was fine, but we were 1,5 hour late, because the driver stopped 15 times and drove 50/t
The driver took so many break for himself but only one for us in a small and no useful place ... drove like an asshole and so many dangerous overtaking..

The company and the driver are very good but the accommodation is unpleasant and uncomfortable is better a normal bus than a sleeping one because you can be assigned to a bottom place that is claustrophobic, fortunately the driver was so kind to give top

Supposed to leave at 2pm, but it’s 2:50pm now and the bus still hasn’t arrived. Staff didn’t say anything until I asked 5 min passed 2pm, and she said the bus is running late but no apology or whatsoever. I’d rather have taken cheaper and older bus.
le van est tombé en panne au bout d'une heure de route. resultat des courses on a attendu 2h qu'un autre vienne avec peu d'informations exactes.... a fuir
The minivan was quite spacious and clean and very well maintained. The driver drove pretty aggressively, but that also made us arriving earlier than scheduled, so that’s fine with me.

The minivan was small, looks dirty, and was very hot. The staff was nice they kept apologizing to me before departing bcs we departed late due to some passengers were coming 15mins late. Although somehow I ended up arriving 1hr late than scheduled..
très bien
On time, safe, friendly and helpfull staff. We definitely recommend this.

The driver was lovely, seats were comfortable, we arrived early, but the wifi didn't work and we didn't get water until the border. The inspector didn't give us any instructions about how to cross the border, just took our passports and ushered us around.
Be warned that the 5 beds at the back are actually one wide bed, there are no dividers between the people, so you sleep like one big family.

Inspectors explained very thoroughly how to cross the border which was nice. Wifi worked, we got water, food, and blankets. Seats were comfy. We spent over an hour sitting at the border after we crossed and were 2 hours late in arriving.
it's dirty
Nice trip and having a good night !
Very efficient and budget-friendly way to travel to Kampot.  Nice driver and two rest-stops on the way - would definitely recommend ?

Everything seemed okay until they keep receiving strangers on the way. On the booking website you see only 8 seats available for a van but uninvited people will join with you. I booked n.5 but one stranger came in and stole my seat and I had to sit middle
Ok!
Best Nightbus I have taken so far, the double beds are very comfortable and I slept like a baby.

It was an enjoyable trip for the most part, I sat in the front seat and appreciated the views. The driver was friendly. However, the mini bus broke down about 4 km from our final destination, and we were stranded. Had to get another ride.
No. inform change car
The travel was hassle free as well as the Immigration process. Recommendable

The trip was a total disaster since the beginning. Travel mart promised us that they will have someone available to bring us to the terminal but no one came. The AC of the bus is not working. We need to change from VIP bus to Van. Unacceptable.
ល្អប្រសើរ

Bus was about 30 minutes late.  Office didn't open till about 2.50am.
I didn't realize it was a sleeper bus to border.  Westerners would be cramped.
Border crossing took usual 1-2 hours.  Traffic heavy into Bangkok, so van a little late, about 12 noon.

Taxi was clean and punctual. Driver was polite and profesional. We stopped for breaks in the 5 hour trip and the driver showed us a few items along the way. We were very happy with the taxi that takes you from door to door, better than a bus. Exellent
bus was very tight, no leg room at all and 2children more than the amount of seats. but drive went well and got there on time

I was positively surprised by the MBus nightbus experience. 
It was very clean, good neutral smell, looks pretty new and the driver had a safe driving style. Buying a ticket and checking in was easy. Only the air condition was too cold.
Driver was 15 minutes in advance, and was very kind, car was bigger than expected, perfect service.

Drive was pretty good, the beds were fairly comfy and the journey was good.
At the ticket office, although there were difficult language barriers, the people at the office were extremely helpful when we were searching for lost property.
Great driver- happy we used this service!

Everything was fine: a careful driver, a clean bus. We arrived 2 hours early …
I cannot comment on „Inspector“ …
Despite a blanket, it was freezing cold in the sleeper.
Nice and speedy crossing
Quiet trip. We were not informed that the is a drop-off at the ferry port. So we took a (tuk tuk mafia) tuk tuk …

We arrived from Koh Rong and waited for 1 1/2 hours for the pick-up bus. A nice local staff ensured us that everything was just fine, nothing to worry at all. The pick-up arrived when our bus was scheduled to leave … We managed to catch the bus.

The trip went smooth and we arrived on time. However no information was given in English at all during the few stops on the way. So we had no idea whether it was just a stop for gas or if it was a break - and in that case how long of a break.
Ok?!
Good driver,  only thing I can notice is that he didn't speak english very well
The air was standing. No wind. Unbelievable hot inside the ferry. I was grateful when we reached our destination.
TOP BUS SERVICE BANGKONG TO PHNOM PENH

Wonderful leader to drivers. Lost item was returned at our hotel.
Great, great service.
Highly recommended to anyone.
the bus is really made for asian peoples, not that much for westeners. It would be a cool idea to pack the luggage on the roof or attach a trailer to the bus to have more room in the bus

Shocking service! DO NOT BOOK. 
The bus we booked did not run. We missed our connecting ferry with little apology or care from the company. The bus drive was rude as hell! Worst bus company i have used in South East Asia
very punctual, smooth ride, good cool aircon with comfortable seats.
we arrive at 5 PM, instead of 2 PM!! 3 hours late

Bus was a little into Battambang.  The office didn't open till about 02:50am, causing some concern for those waiting in the dark.  The bus was  a sleeper which wasn't comfortable for a foreigner.  Heavy traffic into Bangkok made bus late.
Always friendly and fun staff?
new bus, comfortable, on time, very nice!!
need to wait a long.

Everything was perfect! The bus left a bit later than expected but that’s wasn’t a bad thing as it meant getting to SR closer to sunrise. The bus was very comfortable, the staff was nice and helpful. I would book again with no hesitation.

I rated 5 starts because we made it safe to our destination. took the 8 hour long trip and it ended up 12 hours. Immigration took the long time. The driver was 15 minutes late. Add that to traffic in Bangkok. Out of characters.. ig @rickiswalkingtours

I rated 5 starts because we made it safe to our destination. took the 8 hour long trip and it ended up 12 hours. Immigration took the long time. The driver was 15 minutes late. Add that to traffic in Bangkok. Out of characters.. ig @rickiswalkingtours

Horrible experience. The rear of the bus, which was designed for luggage, has been adapted to accommodate more passengers. Luggages are placed under the seats and stacked in the aisles. The journey is really painful, and the driver drives like a madman
All very efficient. Clean comfortable minibus with plenty of room

Terrible. Something went wrong with the online payment,The chat serviced didn't helped me. I went to the office to buy the ticket. Then the BookMeBus charged me. I tried to get refunded one of the tickets and not BookMeBus neither Kim Seng Express helped

Overall a very good experience. Had a booking for 8 am. They seemingly forgot about me and I had to wait for the next bus at 9am.

Very good experience overall though. Very polite people and a good service. Highly recommend.

Very pleased with the overall service provided by Long Phuong; from the initial questions I had re booking online to the actual journey and safe arrival via a border crossing in Phnom Penh. Full marks- well done!!

Accidentally booked incorrect direction and Bookmebus changed without any hassle. Larryta bus was clean and air conditioned. Driver stopped twice for toilet/food/breaks which was appreciated. Thank you
Great, clean, non-insane van option from town to town in Cambodia.  Whenever possible I take the Post bus - too bad it doesnt run as frequently as the others
Drive was great and very comfy. Only thing to remark was the border crossing where I felt quite left alone with the procedure as no information was given by the staff about the next steps.

Bis was rather old and AC was - even on highest level - not sufficient for the bus. 
Left Sihanoukville 15 mins late and arrived in Phnom Penh 1 Hour later than announced on the website.
Good service, good driver. Arrived even sooner to Siem Reap than announced.
The driver stopped at least 10 times to pick up and drop off random people on the way
Arrival time to Battambang is 3am, not 5:30am as advertised.
They dropped my friend off in Kampot instead of Kep. Then said for $20 they would take her to Kep. They were just too lazy to drive to Kep with one passenger.

The driver persistently overtook other vehicles, speeding with 12+ passengers on board so he could get to Phnom Penh slightly earlier. He put my life at risk, all for the sake of getting to Phnom Penh a few minutes earlier. I was horrified and scared!

Arrived at bus station and told they overbooked no seats for us or other passengers. We were put on another company's van without our luggage.  No leg room all squashed in, worst trip ever . Arrived different bus station. No luggage for over an hour.
Run away
Nice trip and arrived on time at Phnom Penh
The trip was nice, punctuality, driver and overall was good. I will repeat for sure

plus de 2h de retard, bateau pour koh rong loupé ! compagnie plus que nulle
As usual very good service. Very ponctual.
Trip took nine hours, not seven, which you must know by now how long it takes. So much confusion at the border and even before. Some clear instructions would go along way. Bus itself was fine.

The driver was on time and the drive back was in very good time. He made is back in 5 hours 30

Nice little Van with 8 seats so very private. Bus was late 15 minutes but made up for it on road. Very good and chilled driver. Only things to criticize are that sleeping is quite difficult

driver’s skills is too low. His driving doesn’t make everyone comfortable. most of passengers almost got carsick

The seats on the bus are very comfortable and you are provided with water. We even arrived in Ho Chi Minh half an hour earlier than planned.
Perfect trip ! Just Too much air conditionner

I was shocked by how good this bus was. We got a full explanation as to what would happen with the border crossing. Water, snacks and lunch were provided. The bus was clean and comfortable with wifi, AC and charger sockets. The bus left on time.

I arrived to the departure point to be told the bus will leave 1 hour and a half later than what it said on the ticket. As I had a flight to take I couldn't wait and they sent me in a different bus with very bad seats, no good aircon and no bathroom, bad

Arrival delayed more than one hour.  It would have been helpful, if we were informed of  break time on the way.
We did not know when our bus would start and just had to stay around.
Very nice and safe trip.
Sitze Super bequem und pünktlich, wenn nur noch mit euch.
Eher für Warenlieferungen, Rest weniger, Zeit spielte keine Rolle ;)
Saly VIP is my go to travel company from Battambang to Phnom Penh. Always professional, clean and friendly.
Saly VIP is my go to travel company from Battambang to Phnom Penh. Always professional, clean and friendly.
travelled a few times from Phnom Penh to Siem Reap and vice versa. Nothing to complain so far.
very good to excellent transfer experience, no complaints thank you!
Phnom-Penh to Battambang leaving at 8:30AM. comfortable brand new mini-van with lot of room legs. Safe driver, 2 stops on the way for breaks. arrived even 1h earlier than schedule.
Too much stops for the people before the bus stop in Phnom penh

Good driving, punctual. The minivan seemed to have a mechanical problem (cooling) but driver managed it well. Broken airway above my seat but the van was almost empty so we could seat elsewhere. Overall, good and efficient trip
Very good trip, highly recommend this bus company. The bus was brand new and very comfortable, smooth driving. 30mn late from departure and at arrival, but nothing too problematic.
Not the best trip we've had in Cambodia. Driver was very reckless, and still we ended up arriving almost 1 hour late due to all the stopping on the way. Comfort ok.
Very good trip, highly recommend this bus company. The bus was brand new and very comfortable, smooth driving. 30mn late from departure and at arrival, but nothing too problematic.

Good trip, overall. Minivan was full so not much space but it was ok, we only wished that we found out how the seat before us could be "untilted" so to have more space for the legs. Driving was fine and efficient.
VET is the best bus service on Cambodia!

Was a bit afraid after reading some comments but it was perfect. We left from PP to Battambang with about 15mn delay but arrived 5mn before the scheduled time + there was a long break. Comfortable and reliable. Small water provided and enough space.
Driver and staff dress well. Talk and act well, punctual also the Van is clean.
ALWAYS LATE . It’s the third bulbs we take with you and we ALWAYS arrive so late, because we spend more time making sops rather than moving.

The travel from Bangkok to Siem Reap was pretty smooth. A van brings us at the border in Poipet, we passed the immigration by ourselves and one of the staff was waiting at the exit and bring me to the next transportation, a big bus. Friendly staff.

Excellent driver, clean bus. Seats are very narrow (smaller that economy flight seats) and legroom limited. If you taller than 5.5 ft your knees will touch the seat in front. If you are taller make sure you books seats in the front.
Super helpfull staff. Correct on Time. No crazy driwing?

Would totally recommend as a way of travelling for 2 from siem reap. Driver arrived early at the hotel and spoke enough English to get by. We were dropped at our hotel in phenom Penh 5 hrs later. Costs more than a bus, but less than a plane. but worth it.

The bus total travel time was supposed to be 3h but ended up being almost 6h since the driver made extra stops and took detours. We missed our connecting ferry because of this and therefore had to buy new tickets. We lost both time and money on this trip.
Best service ever! Very glad I booked with them!
Luxurious hotel bus but very bad service, bad driver, uncomfortable and not clean. We won't ever using this service again ever.

Good experience over all. Only problem is we booked the bus from PP at 11pm, supposed to arrive in Siem Reap at 8am. We were happy to sleep in the bus after a long day but the bus already arrived at 04:40 in Siem Reap. It was a long wait for check-in…

The buses are basic minibuses, but they do not overfill them so you still have enough room. Aircon works well in the buses so you aren’t too hot. The driver didn’t let me sit in the seat that I had booked but other than that a good journey!!

Everything worked great, driver was in time, and nice as well. Relaxed drive up to Siem Reap.

I thought I booked a mini van but it was a bus, it was early and left on time and the drive wasn’t slow as I thought it to be. It arrived on time! Nice and clean bus

Checked in at the Virak Buntham office and waited in a clean waiting room with WiFi. All staff were easy to communicate with. Bus departed on time, and was clean and comfortable. Provided with a bottle of water. Bus arrived at destination on time.

Kimseng express was great ,The van was very clean and in new condition The driver was helpful and staff in company was very kind to us I would book again

The boat was late for more than 30 minutes, no staff could give any relevant information about the delay. The boat is outdated, needs some renovation. The service in general is ok and quick. The company needs to improve the customer service .

They changed the bus from a minivan to a big bus, but that wasn‘t a problem at all. The seat was really comfortable and the staff nice. We arrived 20 minutes later than planned, but I think this was because the big bus couldn’t go so fast.

Very smart clean  modern bus, seats comfortable but no more room than other big buses.  Air con a little to cold.  My seat back unit didn’t work.  Food was ok, coffee is pre mix so powder creamer and sweet.  No complaints well worth the money.

can take again when visiting  cambodia.

Everything went really well. The bed was comfortable and we got there on time.

The bus arrived late 30mn and drop also late 30mn. Total late in this trip is 1h. It’s almost made me late on meeting.

Second trip with this company & have to say again, it was great & the cleanest, nicest van I have travelled in here in Cambodia. Really wonderful!! Before booking saw comments about the aircon but both times the air con was working well, very cool air!!
not bad for this, can recommend good.

This luxury van service was right on time and professional. The AC and seats were comfortable. We appreciated the bottled water and rest stop half way through the trip. We would definitely use this service again.

Very clean and spacious. Careful driving with no speeding. Attentive to needs of the passengers. Good rest stops.

Cramp! Cold! Dirty! The space is so cramp for two people in one cabin which is like trick to me as the booking was shown as 2 separate cabins for 2 people. One of my friend need to sleep right next to the stranger. Plus, the driver was nasty.

he drives very well and very friendly

Little bus departed kampot on time. AC was barely blowing air. Reliability of the vehicle is questionable as it stalled few times and one time it did not re-start. After about 10 attempts, it started.

Perfect! highly recommended

Was wonderful , the bus seats 40 and there were 15 people on the bus including a waitress, there’s a toilet below if you need the toilet , got snacks , a 3 hour trip with a 10 minute stop at a road cafe with clean toilets . Highly recommend
